40001001	Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to akaba ali muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, kandi wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Baataata baa Yesu niibo bani:
40001002	Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabyala I̱saka, I̱saka aabyala Yakobbo, Yakobbo aabyala Yu̱da na baana baani̱na Yu̱da oghu,
40001003	Yu̱da aabyala Peleeji̱ na Jeela, aba aabyayʼo mukali̱ wee Tamaali̱, Peleeji̱ aabyala Heji̱looni̱, Heji̱looni̱ aabyala Laamu,
40001004	Laamu aabyala Aminadaabbu, Aminadaabbu aabyala Naasoni̱, Naasoni̱ aabyala Salu̱mooni̱,
40001005	Salu̱mooni̱ aabyala Bbowaaji̱, oghu aabyayʼo mukali̱ wee Lahaabbu, Bbowaaji̱ aabyala Obbedi̱, ni̱na wee ali Lu̱si̱ya, Obbedi̱ aabyala Yese,
40001006	kandi Yese aabyala Mukama Dhau̱dhi̱. Dhau̱dhi̱ aabyala Solomooni̱, ni̱na Solomooni̱ oghu niiye akaba ali mukaa U̱li̱ya,
40001007	Solomooni̱ aabyala Lehobbwamu, Lehobbwamu aabyala Abbi̱ja, Abbi̱ja aabyala Aasa,
40001008	Aasa aabyala Yehosafaati, Yehosafaati aabyala Yolaamu, Yolaamu aabyala U̱ji̱ya,
40001009	U̱ji̱ya aabyala Yotaamu, Yotaamu aabyala Ahaaji̱, Ahaaji̱ aabyala Hejekiya,
40001010	Hejekiya aabyala Manase, Manase aabyala Amooni̱, Amooni̱ aabyala Yosiya,
40001011	kandi na Yosiya aabyala Yekoniya, hamui na baani̱na Yekoniya oghu, mu bwile obu Banabbabbu̱looni̱ baabaagha bahambi̱ye Bayu̱daaya babatwete mu ehanga lyabo Bbabbu̱looni̱.
40001012	Haanu̱ma ya kubaaya mu ehanga lya Bbabbu̱looni̱ hambali baabaagha babahambiiye: Yekoniya aabyala Salati̱yeeli̱, Silati̱yeeli̱ aabyala Jelubbabbeeli̱
40001013	Jelubbabbeeli̱ aabyala Abbi̱yu̱di̱, Abbi̱yu̱di̱ aabyala Eli̱yaki̱i̱mu̱, Eli̱yaki̱i̱mu̱ aabyala Ajooli̱,
40001014	Ajooli̱ aabyala Jadooki̱, Jadooki̱ aabyala Aki̱i̱mu̱, Aki̱i̱mu̱ aabyala Eli̱yu̱u̱di̱,
40001015	Eli̱yu̱u̱di̱ aabyala Eli̱yeeja, Eli̱yeeja aabyala Mataani̱, Mataani̱ aabyala Yakobbo,
40001016	na Yakobbo aabyala Yojeefu̱, bali̱ wa Mali̱ya ni̱na Yesu, oghu bakughilaghamu Ki̱li̱si̱to.
40001017	Baataata be aba bakahi̱ki̱ya buusukulu eku̱mi̱ na bbunaa ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabaaghʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwile obu Mukama Dhau̱dhi̱ aabaaghʼo. Kandi buusukulu eku̱mi̱ na bbunaa ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu Dhau̱dhi̱ aabaaghʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwile obu baabahambi̱ye kubatwala mu ehanga lya Bbabbu̱looni̱. Kandi buusukulu eku̱mi̱ na bbunaa ku̱lu̱gha obu baalu̱ghi̱ye Bbabbu̱looni̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa bwile Ki̱li̱si̱to aabyahuwe.
40001018	Ku̱byaluwa kwa Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to kukabʼo mu mulingo ghuni: Yojeefu̱ akaba amali̱ye ku̱lu̱gha Mali̱ya ni̱na Yesu, bhaatu batakaswelangaane. Mali̱ya oghu eesanga aku̱li̱i̱ye haabwa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40001019	Bhaatu bali̱i̱ wee Yojeefu̱ oghu akaba ali musaasa ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ataabbala kumuhemula mu bantu. Aatu̱wamu kumuleka mu ki̱bi̱so.
40001020	Obu aaneeli̱li̱kanagha eki, malai̱ka wa Mukama aamubonekela mu ndooti̱, aamughila ati, “Yojeefu̱, muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, otoobaha kuswela Mali̱ya kuba mukaawe. Aku̱li̱i̱ye etundu haabwa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40001021	Aku̱byala mwana wa wabusaasa du̱mbi̱ omuluke li̱i̱na Yesu, nanga niiye alijuna bantu be bibhi byabo.”
40001022	Ebi byona bikubʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi Mukama aasangu̱u̱we abu̱ghi̱ye kukwama mu mulangi̱ wee ati,
40001023	“Manaabukali̱ atamani̱ye basaasa aku̱ku̱li̱ya abyale mwana wa wabusaasa bamuluke li̱i̱na Manu̱weli̱” (elikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu “Luhanga ali naatu.”)
40001024	Obu Yojeefu̱ aasu̱su̱mu̱ki̱ye, aakola ngoku malai̱ka wa Mukama aamughambiiye mu ndooti̱, aaswela Mali̱ya.
40001025	Bhaatu Yojeefu̱ oghu taabaaye na Mali̱ya oghu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu aabyaye mwana oghu. Yojeefu̱ aamuluka li̱i̱na Yesu.
40002001	Haanu̱ma ya Yesu kubyaliluwa mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteleheemu mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya, bwile obu Mukama Helude niiye akaba alemi̱ye kyalo eki. Basaasa baa kalimagheji baalu̱gha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, baasa mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yelusaalemu.
40002002	Baabu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya oghu baabyaye eni, ali haa? Nsooli̱ya eghi yooleki̱ye ngoku aabyahuwe twaghiboneeye ewaatu bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, ti̱ naatu twasi̱ye kumulami̱ya.”
40002003	Obu bantu baaghambiiye Mukama Helude ebi baa kalimagheji aba baabu̱ghi̱ye, eye aasobeluwa kandi na bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu bakani̱ye nabo baasobeluwa.
40002004	Niibuwo Mukama Helude oghu aabilikiiye lukulato lwa bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Aababu̱u̱li̱ya hambali balangi̱ baaghi̱li̱ye bati Ki̱li̱si̱to akubyaliluwa.
40002005	Baamukuukamu bati, “Mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteleheemu mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya, nanga eki niikiyo mulangi̱ aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ngu,
40002006	“Ai̱, enu̱we bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteleheemu eghi eli mu kyalo kya Bu̱yu̱daaya, tau̱ni̱ yaanu eghi teelikala etamanu̱u̱we mu maatau̱ni̱ aghali mu kyalo kya Bu̱yu̱daaya agha balemi̱ balu̱ghi̱yemu. Nanga mu tau̱ni̱ ya ewaanu eghi niiyo balibyalila mu̱lemi̱, oghu akuloleelela bantu banje baa I̱saaleeli̱ ngoku mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya akuloleelelagha bisolo biye.”
40002007	Niibuwo Mukama Helude aatu̱mi̱ye bantu mu ki̱bi̱so kughambila baakalimagheji aba kwisa ewe. Ti̱ mbaasi̱ye, ababu̱u̱li̱ye amanye bwile bwonini obu baaboneeyemu nsooli̱ya eghi.
40002008	Obu baasi̱ye mbaamughambila buwo, du̱mbi̱ aabatuma e Bbeteleheemu, aabaghila ati, “Mughende bwangu mubbale bhyani hambali mwana oghu ali. Ti̱ nimwabaaye makamubona muti, mwise mungambile hambali ali niikuwo nanje ngende nimulami̱ye.”
40002009	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi Mukama oghu aabu̱ghi̱ye, baaghenda. Baatodha baabona nsooli̱ya nga eli yoonini eghi baaghendagha banaboone ku̱lu̱gha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba. Yaaghenda enabahikiiye eli mu mwanya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu yaahi̱ki̱ye haa ki̱i̱kalo hambali mwana oghu ali du̱mbi̱ yeemilila.
40002010	Obu baaboone nsooli̱ya eghi niyaaleka kughenda, baadheedhuwa kwonini.
40002011	Obu baataahi̱ye mu numba baamubona mwana hamui na ni̱na wee Mali̱ya. Baateeli̱ya kandi baalami̱ya mwana oghu. Baasambuula bikapa byabo, baayamu bisembo bya muhendo bya milingo esatu: feeja, bubbani̱ na miila.
40002012	Ti̱ obu bwile bwabo bwa kukuuka ewaabo bwahi̱ki̱ye, baakwama kihanda kinji kughenda, nanga Luhanga akaba naabaghambiiye mu ndooti̱ ati batakuuka ewaa Helude.
40002013	Obu basaasa baa kalimagheji aba baaghendi̱ye, malai̱ka wa Mukama aabonekela Yojeefu̱ mu ndooti̱. Aaghila Yojeefu̱ ati, “Oomuke bwangu, otwale mwana na ni̱na wee mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱. Muukaleyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mbaghambiiye ku̱lu̱ghayo. Nanga Helude niibuwo aabbala kwita mwana oghu.”
40002014	Mukilo eghi, Yojeefu̱ aamuka, aatwala mukali̱ wee na mwana wabo mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱.
40002015	Baakalayo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Mukama Helude oghu aku̱u̱ye. Eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki Mukama aabu̱ghi̱ye kukwama mu mulangi̱ wee ati, “Nkabilikila mutabani̱ wanje ku̱lu̱gha e Mi̱si̱li̱.”
40002016	Obu Helude aamani̱ye ngoku baa kalimagheji aba baamu̱ghobeleei̱ye, ki̱i̱ni̱gha kyamukwata kwonini. Aalaghila baasilikale be kwita baana baabusaasa boona abaabaagha mbahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka ebili nʼabatakaghi̱hi̱ki̱i̱ye. Baana boona abaabaagha mu Bbeteleheemu na mu byalo ebilabhaane na Bbeteleheemu eghi, naasighikila haa bwile baa kalimagheji baamughambiliiyemu.
40002017	Eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi mulangi̱ Yelemi̱ya aabu̱ghi̱ye ati,
40002018	“Elaka lya kulila kwamaani̱ baali̱i̱ghu̱wa ku̱lu̱gha e Laama. Elaka lya kutakangana kandi kutuntula kwamaani̱. Lakeeli̱ naalila kwonini haabwa baana be, kandi ataakubbala muntu ku̱mu̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱kani̱ya, nanga boona bakaba mbaabaati̱ye.”
40002019	Haanu̱ma ya Helude ku̱ku̱wa, malai̱ka wa Mukama aabonekela Yojeefu̱ mu ndooti̱ e Mi̱si̱li̱.
40002020	Aaghila Yojeefu̱ ati, “Oomuke, otwale mwana na ni̱na wee, mukuuke mu ehanga lya ewaanu I̱saaleeli̱. Abaalengaghʼo kwita mwana Yesu oghu, baaku̱u̱ye.”
40002021	Yojeefu̱ aamuka, aatwala mwana na ni̱na wee, baakuuka ewaabo mu I̱saaleeli̱.
40002022	Bhaatu obu Yojeefu̱ aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Ali̱keeli̱yo mutabani̱ wa Helude niiye alemi̱ye di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ese wee, oobaha kughendayo. Luhanga akaba naamughambiiye mu ndooti̱ ati ataghenda e Bu̱yu̱daaya, Yojeefu̱ aalu̱gha e Mi̱si̱li̱, aghenda mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya.
40002023	Aaghenda aakala mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱. Nahabweki eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki balangi̱ baabu̱ghi̱ye bati, “Balamughilaghamu Munajaaleeti̱.”
40003001	Bwile obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aasa, aatandika kutebeja mu elungu lya di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya.
40003002	Aatebeja naaghila bantu ati, “Mwekuukemu, nanga bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli haai ku̱hi̱ka.”
40003003	Yohaana oghu niiye mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱yʼo hambele ati, “Muntu niibuwo aalangilila mu elungu ati, ‘Mweteekani̱li̱je kwisa kwa Mukama; mukole ebi abbali̱ye!’ ”
40003004	Yohaana oghu aalu̱walagha ki̱lu̱walo ki̱koleeu̱we mu byoha bya ngamila, aalu̱walagha mu̱ci̱pi̱ ghwa luhu. Byokuliya biye aaliyagha njighe na bwoki bwa njoki, ebi aagubhagha kutunga mu elungu.
40003005	Bantu bakani̱ye baaghenda ku̱mu̱tegheeleli̱ya mbalu̱gha e Yelusaalemu, na mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya yoona. Na banji baalu̱ghagha mu byalo ebyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye maasi Yolodaani̱.
40003006	Ti̱ abaakaatulaagha bibhi byabo, ababati̱ji̱la mu maasi Yolodaani̱.
40003007	Bhaatu obu aaboone Bafali̱saayo na Basadukaayo bakani̱ye mbaasa hambali akwete kubati̱ji̱la bantu, aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we abali na bubhi nga bwa njoka! Mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa kwonkaha kukuleka Luhanga atabafubila?
40003008	Hatiini mukole ebikwoleka ngoku mweku̱u̱ki̱yemu.
40003009	Muleke kweghila muti Luhanga taakubafubila haabwa enu̱we kuba baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, nanga mbaghambiiye, Luhanga naabbali̱ye akugubha kuuhila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ baasukulu, nankabha mu mabaale ghani!
40003010	Ti̱ nʼendindi Luhanga eeteekani̱i̱je kufubiilila kimui abakukolagha bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, Ti̱ na bu̱li̱ kiti ekitaakwana bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye, bakukijomba na ndyankui, bakikube mu mulilo.”
40003011	“Si̱ye nkubabati̱jagha na maasi kwoleka ngoku beeku̱u̱ki̱yemu bibhi byabo. Bhaatu oghu akwisa andabhi̱ye tani̱hi̱ki̱ye na kuba mu̱heeleli̱ya wee, nanga ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱. Eye akubabati̱ja na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi na mulilo.
40003012	Eeteekani̱i̱je kukola bantu ngoku mu̱li̱mi̱ akweteekani̱jagha akwata kitalo kiye kweha mucele ghuwe kuuyamu bisunga. Oghusemeeye aghubiika mu nguli kandi bisunga abikuba mu mulilo ghutaaku̱li̱magha.”
40003013	Niibuwo Yesu aalu̱ghi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, aaghenda haa kyambu kya maasi Yolodaani̱ Yohaana kumubati̱ja.
40003014	Bhaatu Yohaana aabbala kubhenga, aaghila Yesu ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye nkwetaaghisibuwa uwe kumbati̱ja, ti̱ uwe waasa oti si̱ye nkubati̱je?”
40003015	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Endindi niikuwo kibhonganuuwe kuba kitiyo. Tukulaghiluwa ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya bikoluwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye byona.” Du̱mbi̱ Yohaana aasi̱i̱ma aabati̱ja Yesu.
40003016	Yesu makamala ati kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa, du̱mbi̱ aalu̱gha mu maasi. Bwile obu bwonini aabona eghulu li̱i̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye, aabona Mwoyo wa Luhanga naalu̱gha eghulu, aasa aamu̱su̱ndʼo nga ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo.
40003017	Niibuwo elaka lyalu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu ndighila liti, “Nuuwe Mwana wanje oghu nku̱ndi̱ye, oghu needheedheeu̱we.”
40004001	Du̱mbi̱ Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aahi̱ki̱li̱ya Yesu kughenda mu elungu, niikuwo Si̱taani̱ amwoheli̱ye yo.
40004002	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa mukilo na ntangaali̱ anasi̱i̱bi̱ye, njala yaamukwata.
40004003	Niibuwo Si̱taani̱ aasi̱ye aamughila ati, “Okaakuba oli Mwana wa Luhanga, olaghile mabaale ghani ghafooke byokuliya.”
40004004	Yesu aamughila ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Muntu taakubaagha mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwa byokuliya byonkaha, bhaatu haabwa kighambo eki Luhanga aku̱bu̱ghagha mu kanu̱wa ke.’ ”
40004005	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱taani̱ aamutwala mu kibugha ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye Yelusaalemu, aamu̱ni̱i̱ni̱ya haa kasui kakangami̱ye kaa Numba ya Luhanga, aamughila ati,
40004006	“Okaakuba oli Mwana wa Luhanga, ohalale weesimbe hansi. Nanga kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, “ ‘Akulaghila baamalai̱ka be bakuloleelele, kandi bakukwatilile mu ngalo syabo, niikuwo oteehuulila ebaale ohendeka kighele.’ ”
40004007	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Otalyohi̱ya Mukama Luhanga waawe.’ ”
40004008	Niibuwo Si̱taani̱ aamutwete haa mwena ghukangami̱ye, aamwoleka makama ghaa munsi ghoona na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyagho.
40004009	Aamughila ati, “Ebi byona nkukuha biyo, niwaateei̱ye kundami̱ya.”
40004010	Yesu aamughila ati, “Si̱taani̱, ondu̱ghʼo! Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Olami̱yaghe Mukama Luhanga waawe, kandi aaniiye waaheeleli̱yagha enkaha.’ ”
40004011	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱taani̱ aamu̱lu̱ghʼo, baamalai̱ka baasa ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya.
40004012	Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Yohaana bamukwete ali mu nkomo, Yesu aakuuka mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya.
40004013	Aalu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, aaghenda aakala mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱. Tau̱ni̱ eghi ekaba eli mu kyalo hambali ntu̱la ya Jabbu̱looni̱ na Nafutaali baabaagha bakaaye.
40004014	Eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye ati,
40004015	“Enu̱we bantu bʼomu kyalo kya Jabbu̱looni̱ na kya Nafutaali. Kyalo ekili mu kihanda kya kughenda haa nanja ya Galilaaya na maasi Yolodaani̱. Ekili mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya eghi bantu batali Bayu̱daaya bakani̱yemu.
40004016	Bantu abali mu mweli̱ma ghwa kutamanya Luhanga, baaboone kyeleeli̱ kyamaani̱ kya kumumanya. Abaakalagha beelalikiliiye kifubilo kya Luhanga kya lu̱ku̱ bakutunga kyeleeli̱ kya kujunuwa.”
40004017	Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu na kweyongelayo, Yesu aatandika kutebeja naaghila bantu ati, “Mwekuukemu, nanga bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu bwahi̱ki̱ye.”
40004018	Kilo kimui Yesu naalubhatangila haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja ya Galilaaya aabona baani̱na emui babili, Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo na Andeleya mbategha bu̱ti̱mba mu nanja nanga bakaba bali bakomani̱ baa nsu̱i̱.
40004019	Aabaghila ati, “Munkwame, nkubafoola bakomani̱ baa bantu.”
40004020	Du̱mbi̱ baati̱gha bu̱ti̱mba bwabo, baamukwama.
40004021	Obu aalu̱ghi̱ye haala asanga baani̱na emui banji babili Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo. Bakaba bali mu bwati̱ hamui na esebo Jebbedaayo, mbaghomola bu̱ti̱mba bwabo, aababilikila.
40004022	Du̱mbi̱ baati̱gha esebo na bwati̱ bwabo, baamukwama.
40004023	Yesu aakwama mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya yoona neegheesi̱ya mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya. Aalangililagha Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, kandi naaki̱li̱ya bantu ndwala syona.
40004024	Ti̱ makulu ghe ghaamalakaka kyalo kya Si̱li̱ya kyona, kandi bantu baamuleetela abalwaye ndwala sya milingo yoona. Abali mu busaali̱ji̱ bwamaani̱, aba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete, abalwaye mpu̱mbu̱, nʼabaghenagheneeu̱we, boona aabaki̱li̱ya.
40004025	Biigambi̱ bya bantu abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Tau̱ni̱ Eku̱mi̱, Yelusaalemu, Bu̱yu̱daaya na luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, baamukwama.
40005001	Obu Yesu aaboone biigambi̱ bya bantu ebi mbimwisʼo, aani̱i̱na haa mwena aasitama haakpengbu̱ yaghuwo. Beeghesebuwa be baasa baamweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya.
40005002	Aatandika ku̱beegheesi̱ya naaghila ati,
40005003	“Bali na mu̱gi̱sa banaku mu mwoyo, nanga baliba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40005004	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abatuntuuye, nanga Luhanga alibahu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya.
40005005	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abadhooti̱, nanga baligwetuwa nsi.
40005006	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abali na njala kandi eliyo lya kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga baliikuta.
40005007	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abali na kisa, nanga Luhanga alibaghilila kisa.
40005008	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abali na mitima esemeeye, nanga balibona Luhanga.
40005009	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abaku̱lu̱ngani̱yagha bantu niikuwo habʼo mpempa, nanga Luhanga alibaghilamu baana be.
40005010	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa aba bakubabona-boni̱ya haabwa kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga baliba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40005011	“Muli na mu̱gi̱sa bantu mbaabambuuye, bababona-boni̱ya kandi babahangilila bintu bya bu̱li̱ mulingo haabwanje.
40005012	Nanga niikuwo baahiighani̱i̱je batiyo balangi̱ baa Luhanga abaadu̱bhi̱i̱ye enu̱we. Nahabweki mudheedhuwaghe kandi musemeeleluwaghe nanga Luhanga aliha enu̱we mpeela ekani̱ye mu eghulu.”
40005013	“Enu̱we muli kisula kya nsi. Bhaatu bu̱nu̱li̱ mbwakihooyemu, buuye bakugubha ku̱bu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yamu bati̱ya? Kikuba kitakyali na mughaso ghwona, kuuyʼo kukikuba, bantu bakikpeetaage.
40005014	“Enu̱we muli kyeleeli̱ kya nsi. Tamukwebisa nanga muli nga kibugha eki bakweye haa keena eki bantu bakuukalagha baboone bbeni̱-bbeni̱.
40005015	Buuye haliyo muntu weena oghu akubhaki̱yagha kaatadhooba akaswi̱ki̱la na kighegha? Akukataagha haa meeja niikuwo kabbeneli̱ye bantu mu numba.
40005016	Naanu muleke kyeleeli̱ kyanu ki̱bbeni̱ye mu bantu, niikuwo balole bikoluwa byanu bisemeeye, kandi basinde Eseenu̱we oghu ali mu eghulu.”
40005017	“Muteeli̱li̱kana muti naasi̱ye kuuyʼo bilaghilo kedha ebi balangi̱ baa Luhanga beegheeseei̱ye. Naasi̱ye ku̱bi̱i̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya.
40005018	Majima, mbaghambiiye, eghulu na nsi bitakahooyʼo, nankabha kaghambo na kamui akali mu bilaghilo ebi takali̱lu̱ghʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kighendeleluwa kyabiyo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40005019	Ti̱ weena oghu aku̱sobi̱ya nankabha kati̱i̱ haa bilaghilo ebi kandi eegheesi̱ya na bantu banji kutabi̱hu̱ti̱ya, taaliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu. Bhaatu weena oghu akubyekambila kandi abyegheesi̱ya banji, aliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40005020	Nanga mbaghambiiye, mutaabaaye bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kusaali̱ya beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo, tamukuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40005021	“Mumani̱ye ngoku hambele baaghi̱li̱ye baataata baanu bati, ‘Otaliita,’ ti̱ ‘weena oghu akwita muunakiye ali̱twi̱lu̱wa musango.’
40005022	Bhaatu si̱ye mbaghambiiye, weena oghu akukwatiluwa muunakiye ki̱i̱ni̱gha ali̱twi̱lu̱wa musango. Kandi weena oghu akwambula muunakiye ati, ‘Oli kidhoma,’ balamu̱twi̱lagha musango mu Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱. Ti̱ weena oghu alighila muunakiye ati, ‘Atali uwe naawe!’ Aliba ali mu kabhi kaa kukubuwa mu mulilo ghwa Gehena.
40005023	“Nahabweki olakabaagha nooghenda kuhaayo kisembo kyawe haa eki bakuhongelaghʼo bihonguwa ti̱ oosukilʼo ngoku muunakyawe ali nʼeki akusuuwaliiye,
40005024	oti̱ghʼo kihonguwa kyawe eki. Odu̱bhe oghende mwekuukilanganemu na muunakyawe oghu, du̱mbi̱ oghende ohe kisembo kyawe eki.
40005025	“Mumalaghe nsonga syanu bwangu na muntu oghu akubbala kukunyegheelela mu kooti̱, munali mu kihanda. Kitali eki naanaku̱ki̱dhi̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa mu̱cu̱, mu̱cu̱ oghu akukukwati̱ya muusilikale akute mu nkomo.
40005026	Mbaghambiiye majima, tooku̱lu̱gha mu nkomo omu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya osasuuye bu̱li̱ kaasente aka bakukutonga.
40005027	“Mumani̱ye ngoku hambele baaghi̱li̱ye baataata baanu bati, ‘Otali̱syana,’
40005028	bhaatu si̱ye mbaghambiiye, weena oghu akulola mukali̱ naamweghomba aamali̱ye ku̱syana naye mu mutima ghuwe.
40005029	Niikiyo nkubaghambila nti li̱i̱so lyawe lyabuliyo ndyakuhaaghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa, oliiyemu! Ni kilungi kufweluwa kimui haa bi̱twi̱ke bya mubili ghwawe, kusaali̱ya kukukuba weena mu Gehena.
40005030	Kandi mukono ghwawe ghwabuliyo ngwakuhaaghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa, oghujombʼo oghukube eli! Ni kilungi kutaaha mu eghulu oli na mukono ghumui kusaali̱ya kukukuba weena mu Gehena.
40005031	“Mumani̱ye ngoku hambele baaghi̱li̱ye baataata baanu bati, ‘Weena oghu akubhinga mukali̱ wee, abhonganuuwe amuhe bbaluwa ya kumubhinga.’
40005032	Bhaatu si̱ye mbaghambiiye, weena oghu akubhinga mukali̱ wee, kuuyʼo amu̱bhi̱ngi̱ye haabwa kuba mu̱syani̱, akuba amuleeteleeye kufooka mu̱syani̱. Kandi weena oghu akuswela mukali̱ oghu eba wee abhi̱ngi̱ye akuba asyane.
40005033	“Mumani̱ye ngoku hambele baaghi̱li̱ye baataata baanu bati, ‘Otalilahila busa, bhaatu okole eki waalahiiye Mukama.’
40005034	Bhaatu si̱ye mbaghambiiye nti, otalilahila na kati̱i̱, nankabha ku̱ku̱mi̱ya eghulu nanga niiliyo ntebe ya bukama ya Luhanga,
40005035	kedha ku̱ku̱mi̱ya nsi, nanga niiyo katebe kaa bighele biye. Kedha ku̱ku̱mi̱ya Yelusaalemu, nanga ni kibugha kya Mukama wamaani̱.
40005036	Otalahila nankabha na mutuwe ghwawe, nanga naghuwo tooghuliyʼo bu̱toki̱, tookugubha kuhindula nankabha kasoke kati̱i̱ kukafoola kajilaghu̱li̱ kedha kajelu.
40005037	Kuuyʼo oleke eki waaghi̱li̱ye oti, ‘Ee,’ obe oki̱si̱i̱mi̱ye, kandi eki waabhengi̱ye oti ‘Bbaa,’ obe oki̱bhengi̱ye. Ekisaaye haala kikuba ki̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Si̱taani̱, Mubhi.
40005038	“Mumani̱ye ngoku baaghi̱li̱ye bati, ‘Nuwaaleeteli̱i̱je muunakyawe kumuuyamu li̱i̱so kedha li̱i̱no, naawe balakuuyaghamu elyawe.’
40005039	Bhaatu si̱ye mbaghambiiye nti, oghu aku̱koli̱ye kubhi otamukolagha kubhi. Muntu naakutali̱i̱ye haa etama lyabuliyo, omugaali̱li̱ye na li̱li̱.
40005040	Kandi muntu naabaaye naabbala kukunyegheelela haabwa saati̱ yaawe, oleke atwale na kooti̱ yaawe dhee.
40005041	Muntu naakuhambi̱li̱i̱je kughenda naye mailo emui, oghende naye na mailo yaakabili.
40005042	Muntu naakusabi̱ye kantu, omuhaaghe ko. Ti̱ oghu akubbala ati omweholi̱ye, otamubhengelelagha.
40005043	“Mumani̱ye ngoku baaghi̱li̱ye bati, ‘Okundaghe muunakyawe, kandi woohaghe ngi̱ghu̱ syawe syona.’
40005044	Bhaatu si̱ye ndimabaghambila nti, mukundaghe ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi musabilaghe abakubahiighani̱ja,
40005045	mu mulingo oghu mukuba nimwoleka ngoku muli baana baa Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu. Eye oghu akulekagha musana ghutuwa haabwa babhi na balungi, kandi atooni̱ya mbu̱la haabwa bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye na batali bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40005046	Buuye nimwaku̱ndi̱ye ababaku̱ndi̱ye bonkaha, Luhanga alabaha mu̱gi̱sa ghwaki? Na bakumaani̱ya baa musolo taaniikuwo bakukolagha batiyo dhee?
40005047	Kaakuba mulamu̱ki̱ya baghenji̱ baanu bonkaha, mukuba musaai̱yʼo ki bantu banji? Na bantu batamani̱ye Luhanga taaniikuwo bakukolagha?
40005048	Nahabweki enu̱we mube bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ngoku Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
40006001	Mwelinde, mutakola bikoluwa byanu bya bi̱hi̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghaa bantu, muti niikuwo ebo bababone kandi babasi̱i̱me. Nimwakoli̱ye mutiyo, Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu taalibaha mpeela.
40006002	“Nahabweki, nuwaanahaaye munaku kintu, otaghenda nooghambila bu̱li̱ muntu nuweepanka ngoku ngobi̱ya sikukolagha mu malami̱li̱yo na mu maakpengbu̱ ghaa nguudhe niikuwo bantu basinde ebo. Mbaghambiiye majima ebo baamali̱ye kutunga mpeela yabo eghi eesuuye kwonini.
40006003	Bhaatu nuwaahaaye munaku, otaleka mukono ghwawe ghwabumesu ngumanya eki ghwabuliyo ghukwete kukola.
40006004	Ti̱ maha munaku kisembo, omuhe kiyo mu ki̱bi̱so, niikuwo Sowaawe wʼomu eghulu, oghu akubonagha ebikukoluwagha mu ki̱bi̱so, akukuha mpeela.
40006005	“Ti̱ obu olabaagha noosaba, otabaagha nga ngobi̱ya, abakubbalagha kusabila mu malami̱li̱yo kedha mu maakpengbu̱ ghaa nguudhe baamiliiye bati niikuwo bantu bababone. Mbaghambiiye majima, aba bakamala kutunga mpeela yabo eesuuye kwonini.
40006006	Bhaatu obu olabaagha noosaba, otaahaghe mu kisiika kyawe, ooghalaghe lwighi. Otandikaghe kusaba, niibuwo Sowaawe wʼomu eghulu, oghu akubonagha ebikukoluwagha mu ki̱bi̱so, akukuha mpeela.
40006007	Ti̱ obu olabaagha noosaba, otaakaliililagha kukuukilila bighambo ngoku abatamani̱ye Luhanga bakukolagha, mbeeli̱li̱kana bati haabwa ku̱bu̱gha bighambo bikani̱ye Luhanga akubakuukamu.
40006008	Enu̱we mutasabagha nga bantu aba, nanga nankabha mutakasabi̱ye, Luhanga Eseenu̱we akusanguwagha amani̱ye ebi mukwetaaghisibuwa.
40006009	“Musabaghe muti: “ ‘Eseetu̱we wʼomu eghulu, bantu boona bahu̱ti̱ye li̱i̱na lyawe.
40006010	Bukama bwawe bwise. Ebi obbali̱ye bikoluwe munsi ngoku bikukoluwagha mu eghulu.
40006011	Otuhe obwalo byokuliya byatu bya bu̱li̱ kilo.
40006012	Otughanile bibhi byatu, ngoku naatu tukughanilagha abakutukolagha kubhi.
40006013	Otatu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kwohebuwa, bhaatu otucungule ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Mubhi. [Nanga bukama, maani̱ kandi bu̱toki̱ mbyawe bilo nʼebilo. Aami̱i̱na.]’
40006014	Nimwanaghaniiye bantu banji ebi babasobeleei̱ye, naanu Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu alibaghanila dhee ebi mu̱mu̱sobeleei̱ye.
40006015	Bhaatu mutaghaniiye bantu banji bibhi ebi babasobeleei̱ye, naanu Eseenu̱we taalibaghanila bibhi byanu.
40006016	“Obu mulabaagha mu̱si̱i̱bi̱ye, muteeyolekagha haali̱i̱so nga bantu mutuntuuye ngoku ngobi̱ya bakukolagha. Tabakunaabagha haali̱i̱so bati niikuwo naabeelaghuuye bantu bamanye ngoku ebo basi̱i̱bi̱ye. Mbaghambiiye majima, aba bakamala kutunga mpeela yabo eesuuye kwonini.
40006017	Bhaatu enu̱we obu mulabaagha mu̱si̱i̱bi̱ye, munaabaghe haali̱i̱so kandi mwesighaghʼo bigita.
40006018	Mukolaghe eki niikuwo bantu batamaniililagha enu̱we ngoku mu̱si̱i̱bi̱ye, kuuyʼo Eseenu̱we oghu bantu bataakubonagha. Ti̱ Eseenu̱we oghu akubonagha ebikukoluwagha mu ki̱bi̱so akubaha mpeela.
40006019	“Muteebiikila etungo lyanu lya mughaso munu munsi, hambali nenje sikugubha ku̱li̱bhi̱i̱hi̱li̱ya kedha kumoma ku̱li̱bhi̱i̱hi̱li̱ya, kandi hambali basuma bakugubha kuhenda kuliibha.
40006020	Bhaatu mwebiikile buguudha mu eghulu, hambali nenje sitaakugubha ku̱bu̱bhi̱i̱hi̱li̱ya kedha kumoma ku̱bu̱bhi̱i̱hi̱li̱ya, kandi hambali basuma bataakugubha kuhenda kuliibha.
40006021	Nanga hambali buguudha bwawe buli, na mutima ghwawe niiyo ghukuukalagha dhee.
40006022	“Ngoku maaso ghaanu ghakulekagha mubona kyeleeli̱, niikuwo ebi mukubbalagha kukola mu mitima yaanu ekwolekagha ngoku muli. Mitima yaanu niyaabaaye esemeeye, mukugubha kukunda kandi ku̱heeleli̱ya Luhanga.
40006023	Bhaatu mitima yaanu niyabaaye ebhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi mughimaliiye kwonini haa bintu bya munsi muni etali haa Luhanga, mukuba na mululu ghwamaani̱ kandi mukubhiihila kimui!
40006024	“Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya bakama babili. Akukunda omui, oohe omui, kedha akutʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo ku̱heeleli̱ya omui, aghaye omui. Niikiyo kimui naanu dhee, tamukugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya Luhanga kandi sente.
40006025	“Nahabweki ndimabaghambila nti, muteelalikiilila ebi mukwetaaghisibuwa mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu, bintu nga byokuliya, kedha byakunuwa, nankabha byaku̱lu̱wala haa mubili ghwanu. Buuye bwomi̱i̱li̱ tabusaai̱ye byokuliya? Kandi na mubili taghusaai̱ye byaku̱lu̱wala?
40006026	Muloleeni noni̱ sya mu mwanya, tasikuhelagha kedha kukesa, kedha kubiika mu nguli, bhaatu Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu akusihaagha byokuliya. Ti̱ buuye enu̱we tamuli baa mughaso munu ewe kusaali̱ya noni̱ esi?
40006027	Buuye ni ani̱ mu enu̱we nankabha atuntula ati̱ya oghu akugubha kwongela haa bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe saaha emui yonkaha?
40006028	“Ti̱ eki̱leki̱ye ngoye sibatu̱ntu̱u̱i̱ye nkiki? Mulolele bimole byʼomu kisaka ngoku bikukulagha. Tabikukolagha mulimo kedha kusona ngoye.
40006029	Bhaatu mbaghambiiye, nankabha Mukama Solomooni̱ mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye kyona, taalu̱wete kusemeeye kwengaani̱ya na kimui haa bimole ebi.
40006030	Luhanga alaba naaku̱lu̱wi̱kagha atiyo bi̱si̱ngo bya mu kisaka, ebiliyo obwalo kandi munkiya babijomba babikuba mu mulilo bihiya, taakubalu̱wi̱ki̱la kimui kusaali̱ya biyo, enu̱we abali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukee?
40006031	Nahabweki, mutatuntula muti, ‘Tukuliya ki?’ Kedha ‘Tukunuwa ki?’ Kedha muti, ‘Tu̱ku̱lu̱wala ki?’
40006032	Nanga ebi niibiyo bikutwali̱li̱jagha munu abatamani̱ye Luhanga, bhaatu Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu amani̱ye ngoku mukubyetaaghisibuwa.
40006033	Nahabweki mu̱du̱bhe mwekambile kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga kandi mukole bikoluwa bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ebi abbali̱ye, kandi bintu mukwetaaghisibuwa ebi byona, akubongelʼo biyo.
40006034	Ti̱ mutafuwʼo ebikubabʼo mu bwile bwʼomu maaso eghi. Nanga bu̱li̱ kilo kili na bijibu ebikukiisilamu. Kilo eki mwahi̱ki̱yʼo haliikiyo mwafuwʼo bijibu ebikilimu.”
40007001	“Mutatwi̱lagha baanakyanu misango, niikuwo naanu Luhanga atabatwi̱laghayo.
40007002	Nanga ngoku mu̱ku̱twi̱la baanakyanu misango, niikuwo naanu Luhanga akubatwi̱layo. Ti̱ hambali mukwengaani̱ya kutwalikani̱ya baanakyanu niikuwo naanu balabatwalikani̱yagha.
40007003	“Nkiki kyanguleka ookala oboone kabubi kati̱i̱ akali mu li̱i̱so lya muunakyawe, onasaaghu̱u̱we kubona lubbaau luunamu̱li̱to oluli mu li̱i̱so lyawe?
40007004	Buuye okugubha kughila oti̱ya muunakyawe oti, ‘Oleke nkuuye kabubi kati̱i̱ akali mu li̱i̱so lyawe,’ kuni onasaaghu̱u̱we kuuya lubbaau luunamu̱li̱to oluli mu li̱i̱so lyawe?
40007005	Ngobi̱ya uwe, odu̱bhe ooye lubbaau luunamu̱li̱to oluli mu li̱i̱so lyawe, obone bbeni̱-bbeni̱, niikuwo ogubhe kuuya kabubi akali mu li̱i̱so lya muunakyawe.”
40007006	“Mutabhi̱i̱ya bwile kwegheesi̱ya bantu butumuwa bwa Luhanga bantu abakubhenga ku̱bu̱tegheeleli̱ya. Kikuba nga kukubila mbuwa sisaakaaye kintu ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kedha kukubila mpunu kintu kyamughaso kukikpeetaagha.
40007007	“Musabe, mukuheebuwa; mubbale, mukutunga; mukonkone, bakubaaghulila.
40007008	Nanga weena oghu akusabagha, akuheebuwagha; oghu akubbalagha, akutungagha; oghu akukonkonagha, bakumuughulilagha.
40007009	“Ni ani̱ mu enu̱we oghu mwana wee angusaba mugaati̱, aha mwana oghu ebaale?
40007010	Kedha oghu mwana wee oghu angusaba nsu̱i̱, amuha njoka?
40007011	Ti̱ enu̱we bantu babhi obu mulaba mumani̱ye kuha baana baanu bisembo bisemeeye, buuye Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu taakusaali̱yʼo kuha bisembo bisemeeye abakumusaba biyo!
40007012	Ngoku mwangubbali̱ye baanakyanu kubatwalikani̱ya aaniikuwo naanu mwabatwalikani̱yagha. Eki niikiyo bilaghilo hamui na balangi̱ beegheesi̱yagha.
40007013	“Mutaahile mu mulyango oghubhokaane. Nanga mulyango oghukutwalagha mu kuhwelekeelela ghugbaatikaane kandi ghu̱dhooti̱ye, ti̱ bantu bakani̱ye niimuwo bakukwamagha.
40007014	Bhaatu mulyango na kihanda ebikutwalagha mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo bibhokaane, kandi bantu bakee munu niibo bakukwamaghamu.
40007015	“Mwelinde balangi̱ baa bisubha. Niibuwo baabaasamu badhooti̱ye nga ntaama, bhaatu mu mitima yabo baasaakaaye kwonini nga mihaga ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya enu̱we.
40007016	Ti̱ bikoluwa byabo bikuleka mubamaniilile ngoku bali babhi. Nanga taaliyo oghu angugubha kukobha miyembe haa mpoku̱, kedha mapeela haa matolu̱.
40007017	Kiti nkyabaaye kisemeeye kwonini kikwana bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye, bhaatu kiti ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kikwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
40007018	Kiti kisemeeye takikugubha kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, kandi kiti ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye takikugubha kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye.
40007019	Ti̱ kiti kyona ekitaakwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye, bakukijombagha bakikuba mu mulilo kihiya.
40007020	Niikiyo kimui na balangi̱ aba, bikoluwa byabo bilileka mubamaniilile balaba bali babhi kedha balungi.
40007021	“Taali bu̱li̱ muntu oghu akungilagha ati, ‘Mukama wanje, Mukama wanje,’ oghu aliba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu. Bhaatu abakukolagha ebi Tita wʼomu eghulu abbali̱ye.
40007022	Haa kilo kya Luhanga ku̱twi̱la bantu musango, bakani̱ye balingila bati, ‘Mukama wanje, Mukama wanje, buuye tatwalangililagha mu li̱i̱na lyawe, kandi tu̱ku̱mi̱ya li̱i̱na lyawe kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱, kandi tu̱ku̱mi̱ya li̱i̱na lyawe kukola byakuswekani̱ya?’
40007023	Aba niibuwo ndibaghambila bbuwa nti, ‘Mu̱ndu̱ghʼo enu̱we nkoli̱ sya bibhi, tambamani̱ye bbaa!’
40007024	“Nahabweki, weena oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wa kandi akola ebi si̱ye nkwegheesi̱yagha, ali nga muntu mugheji oghu akweye numba yee hʼetaka lyomiiye.
40007025	Eghi mbu̱la ekutoonagha, mi̱goli̱ yamaani̱ ekongoma, kyegha kitandika kuhunga, kandi kihuula numba eghi, eteegenga, nanga musingi ghwayo kukweluwa hʼetaka lyomiiye.
40007026	Bhaatu weena oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha ebi nkwegheesi̱yagha, kandi abhenga kukola ebi bilaghiiye, ali nga muntu mudhoma oghu akweye numba yee hʼetaka lya musene.
40007027	Eghi mbu̱la ekutoonagha, mi̱goli̱ yamaani̱ ekongoma, kyegha kitandika kuhunga, kandi kihuula numba eghi, du̱mbi̱ yeegenga ebhiihila kimui, ehuwʼo.”
40007028	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kwegheesi̱ya naabaghambila bintu ebi, bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu abaabaaghʼo baaswekela kimui ku̱u̱ghu̱wa neegheesi̱ya bintu ebi.
40007029	Aabeegheesi̱yagha na bu̱toki̱, etali nga beegheesi̱ya baabo baa bilaghilo.
40008001	Obu Yesu aanasu̱ndu̱kagha ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena, bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu bakaniiye kimui baasa bamukweme.
40008002	Musaasa alwaye ntumbi aasa ewaa Yesu, aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa Yesu, aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Mukama wanje, olakaba obbali̱ye gutu onki̱li̱ye niikuwo nsemele.”
40008003	Yesu aananula mukono ghuwe aamu̱ku̱mʼo, aamughila ati, “Mbbali̱ye, kila!” Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu ntumbi yaamukililʼo aasemela.
40008004	Yesu aamughila ati, “Otaghambila muntu nʼomui, kuuyʼo oghende ewaa mu̱hongi̱ akulole ngoku waaki̱li̱ye. Kandi ohonge kisembo eki Musa aalaghiiye nga buukai̱so mu bahongi̱ kubooleka ngoku waaki̱li̱ye kandi waasemela.”
40008005	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye e Kapelenau̱mu̱, mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ baa Looma aamwisʼo. Aasaba Yesu kumukoonela,
40008006	aaghila ati, “Mukama wanje, mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje alangaaye e ka haa bulili, weena aghaghanaliiye kimui kandi alwaye kwonini.”
40008007	Yesu aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Nkughendayo ku̱mu̱ki̱li̱ya.”
40008008	Musaasa oghu aakuukamu Yesu ati, “Mukama wanje, si̱ye tambhonganuuwe uwe kwisa ewanje bbaa. Nahabweki obu̱ghe kwonkaha, mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje akukila.
40008009	Nanga nanje ndi na bantu abali na bu̱toki̱ hali si̱ye, abakundaghilagha bya kukola. Nanje nʼaba na baasilikale aba si̱ye ndemi̱ye aba nkulaghilagha bya kukola. Oghu nkughilagha nti ‘Ghenda’ akughendagha; oghu nkaakughilagha nti ‘Wiise,’ akwisagha. Nkaakulaghilagha mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje nti ‘Kola kini,’ akikola.”
40008010	Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye musaasa oghu naabu̱gha atiyo, aasweka, aaghila abamukwamiliiye ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, tankabonagha muntu oghu ali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nga kwa musaasa oghu mu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona.
40008011	Oleke mbaghambile kini, bantu bakani̱ye batali Bayu̱daaya bali̱lu̱gha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba kandi bughuwa ejooba kandi basitame mu bi̱i̱kalo byabo hamui na Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka na Yakobbo haa ki̱ghenu̱ mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40008012	Bhaatu Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakani̱ye, aba Luhanga aali ateekani̱li̱i̱ye kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ buwe obu balibabhingamu. Babakube mu ki̱i̱kalo kiisuuyemu mweli̱ma, hambali baliikala mbalilila kimui kandi mbenena ngaga haabwa kubona-bona.”
40008013	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye mukulu wa baasilikale oghu ati, “Oghende eka ewaawe; eki waahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je oti kikukukoleluwa, niikuwo kikaakukukoleluwa.” Ti̱ saaha eghi yoonini mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa baasilikale oghu aakila.
40008014	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye mu ka ya Peetelo, aabona ni̱na mukaa Peetelo aalangaaye haa bulili alwaye mu̱swi̱ja.
40008015	Yesu aaghenda, aaku̱ma mukali̱ oghu haa mukono, du̱mbi̱ mu̱swi̱ja ghwamukililʼo, aamuka aatandika kuteekela Yesu.
40008016	Lwagholo olu, bantu baatandika kuleetela Yesu bantu bakani̱ye aba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete, aabaki̱li̱ya. Aakalaghilagha bi̱li̱mu̱ ku̱lu̱ghʼo bantu na kighambo kimui kyonkaha, bibalu̱ghʼo. Kandi aaki̱li̱ya bantu bakani̱ye abalwaye.
40008017	Eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye ati, “Akatwala buceke bwatu bwona, kandi aatu̱ki̱li̱ya ndwala syatu syona.”
40008018	Obu Yesu aaboone ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu ki̱mweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, aalaghila beeghesebuwa be ati bani̱i̱ne bwati̱ babhasuke luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja.
40008019	Niibuwo omui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo aasi̱ye ewaa Yesu aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, nkughenda naawe hambali olakaghendagha hoona-hoona.”
40008020	Yesu aamughila ati, “Buuwakame buli na bi̱i̱na, na noni̱ syaba na bisui hambali bikulaalagha. Bhaatu Mwana wa Muntu taali na ki̱i̱kalo kya kuhuumulilamu bbaa.”
40008021	Mweghesebuwa onji wa Yesu aamughila ati, “Mukama, nkukukwama, bhaatu oleke ndu̱bhe ngende niikale na tita ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱u̱ye, ni̱mu̱ji̱i̱ki̱ye.”
40008022	Yesu aamughila ati, “Onkwame endindi! Oleke abaku̱u̱ye bajiike abaabo abaku̱u̱ye.”
40008023	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ baatandika kubhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja.
40008024	Niibuwo kyegha kyamaani̱ kyasi̱ye kyabedu̱ngi̱li̱sani̱ya haa nanja ya Galilaaya. Mighina yaatandika kusamba bwati̱ obu. Bhaatu Yesu akaba alangaaye mu bwati̱ obu aghwesaghiiye.
40008025	Beeghesebuwa be baaghenda baamu̱su̱su̱mu̱la. Baamughila bati, “Mukama, otujune! Tulimadhikila mu nanja!”
40008026	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mwobahi̱ye nangaaki? Enu̱we abali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukee.” Niibuwo aamu̱ki̱ye aatanuka kyegha eki hamui na mighina eghi, ti̱ byona byabhonda, kandi nanja yaateekanilana kimui.
40008027	Beeghesebuwa be aba baasweka kandi baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Oni ni muntu wa mulingo ki? Kyegha na nanja nabiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wagha!”
40008028	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja mu kyalo kya Gadala, basaasa babili aba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete, baalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo kya bituulo eki baajiikaghamu bantu, baasʼo Yesu. Bakaba basaakaaye kwonini, nahabweki bantu tabakwamagha kihanda eki bbaa.
40008029	Baaguga nʼelaka lyamaani̱ bati, “Uwe Mwana wa Luhanga, oku̱tu̱bu̱ni̱ya ki? Waasi̱ye hani kutubona-boni̱ya bwile bwatu bwa Luhanga kutufubila butakahi̱ki̱ye?”
40008030	Haakpengbu̱ yabo nga hali̱, mpunu sikani̱ye kwonini sikaba siliyo nsiliya.
40008031	Bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi byesengeleli̱ya Yesu biti, “Nuwaatu̱bhi̱ngi̱ye mu bantu bani, otusindike mu mpunu esi.”
40008032	Yesu aaghila bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi ati, “Mughende!” Du̱mbi̱ bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi byalu̱ghamu basaasa aba, byaghenda mu mpunu esi. Ti̱ mpunu esi syona syali̱gi̱ta bwangu, syakota mu nanja, syona syatwi̱ki̱lamu.
40008033	Bwile obu abaali̱i̱si̱yagha mpunu esi baali̱gi̱ta, baaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ baaghambila bantu makulu agha. Baabaghambila dhee na ebyabaayʼo basaasa babili aba bi̱li̱mu̱ byabaagha bikwete.
40008034	Du̱mbi̱ bantu bakaniiye kimui baalu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ eghi baasa hambali Yesu ali. Obu baamuboone, baamwesengeleli̱ya bati alu̱ghe mu kyalo kyabo eki.
40009001	Haanu̱ma yʼeki Yesu aani̱i̱na bwati̱, aabhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱, aaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ hambali aakalagha.
40009002	Niibuwo basaasa bamui baasi̱ye baheekeeye haa kalili musaasa aghenagheneeu̱we, baamuleetela Yesu. Obu aaboone ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo, aaghila musaasa aghenagheneeu̱we oghu ati, “Mwana wanje, ogume mutima, bibhi byawe byakughaniiwe.”
40009003	Bamui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, obu baaghu̱u̱ye eki, baaghambilana bati, “Musaasa oni niibuwo ambula Luhanga!”
40009004	Yesu aakenga ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana, aabaghila ati, “Mukwete kweli̱li̱kana mu mitima yaanu byeli̱li̱kano bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mutiyo nangaaki?
40009005	Eki̱dhooti̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ni kyahaa? Kughila nti, ‘Bibhi byawe byakughaniiwe,’ kedha kughila nti ‘Oomuke kandi olubhatange’?
40009006	Bhaatu nkubbala mumanye ngoku Mwana wa Muntu ali na bu̱toki̱ munsi muni kughanila bantu bibhi.” Aaghila mulwaye oghu ati, “Oomuke, okome kalili kaawe, weeghendele ewaawe.”
40009007	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aamuka, kandi aaghenda ewe eka.
40009008	Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo baaboone eki, boona boobaha, baasinda Luhanga haabwa kuha bantu bu̱toki̱ butiyo.
40009009	Obu Yesu aanalubhatangagha ku̱lu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, aabona mukumaani̱ya wa musolo, li̱i̱na liye Matayo, asitami̱ye mu ekumaani̱li̱yo liye. Aamughila ati, “Onkwame.” Aamuka, aamukwama.
40009010	Lwagholo olu, obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaliyagha mu numba ya Matayo oghu, bantu bakani̱ye baasa, bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱, baatandika kuliila hamui kyalwagholo.
40009011	Obu Bafali̱saayo baaboone bantu aba, baabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa baa Yesu bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya waanu oghu, akuliyagha hamui na bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱ nangaaki?”
40009012	Obu Yesu aaki̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Abatalwaye tabakubbalagha mutambi̱li̱ bbaa, kuuyʼo abalwaye.
40009013	Mughende mweghe eki kini kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu, ‘Nkubbala mukole bikoluwa bya ngughuma, kusaali̱ya kuhonga bihonguwa.’ Tanaasi̱ye haabwa bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bhaatu haabwa basi̱i̱si̱.”
40009014	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ baasi̱ye, baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati, “Etu̱we hamui na Bafali̱saayo tu̱ku̱si̱i̱bagha, bhaatu beeghesebuwa baawe tabaku̱si̱i̱bagha, nangaaki?”
40009015	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye baghenu̱ abali mu bu̱ghenu̱ bwa kuswela bakugubha bati̱ya ku̱si̱i̱ba kuni oghu akuswela anali nabo? Noo bwile bu̱li̱hi̱ka obu balibaayamu oghu akuswela oghu, obu niibuwo bali̱si̱i̱ba.”
40009016	Niibuwo Yesu aabahaaye lu̱si̱mo ati, “Taaliyo oghu akubhandikagha ki̱twi̱ke kya lughoye luhyaka haa lughoye lukulu. Nanga ki̱twi̱ke kihyaka eki kikubhula lukulu olu kilutemule, kihulu kyeyongele.
40009017	Kili ngoku otangugubha kuta vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka mu mpu sikulu, nanga vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka eghi niyabi̱mbi̱ye ekwati̱ya mpu sikulu esi eseeseke. Nahabweki vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka bakughitaagha mu mpu sihyaka, niikuwo niyabi̱mbi̱ye etasyati̱ya eseeseka, kandi niikuwo byombi biikale kusemeeye.”
40009018	Yesu naanabu̱gha ebi, omui mu balemi̱ bakulu bʼomu ki̱twi̱ke eki, aasa aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa Yesu, aamughila ati, “Muhala wanje aaku̱wa endindi! Gutu wiise omu̱ku̱mʼo, niikuwo atodhe abe bwomi̱i̱li̱.”
40009019	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu hamui na beeghesebuwa be baamuka, baaghenda hamui na musaasa oghu.
40009020	Mbanaghenda mukali̱ oghu akaba alwaye bulwaye bwa bakali̱ kumala myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, aasila mu bantu aba enu̱ma sya Yesu. Mukali̱ oghu aaku̱ma haa lughoye lwa Yesu.
40009021	Nanga akaba neeli̱li̱kaane ati, “Ninaanaku̱mi̱ye haa katwi̱ke kati̱i̱ konkaha kaa lughoye luwe, nkukililʼo.”
40009022	Mukali̱ oghu makalu̱ku̱mʼo ati, du̱mbi̱ Yesu eegaali̱ya aamulola, aamughila ati, “Muhala wanje, ogume, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.” Du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu aakililʼo haala hoonini.
40009023	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye naataaha mu numba ya mu̱lemi̱ oghu, aasangamu bali̱mbi̱ mbakoleesi̱ya du̱ngu̱ kulimba bilimbo byʼejiika na bantu banji mbalila kandi mbatakanganilana kimui.
40009024	Aabaghila ati, “Mutuwe enja; manaabukali̱ oni taaku̱u̱ye bbaa, aghwesaghiiye kwonkaha.” Bhaatu bantu aba bo baatandika kumusekeelela.
40009025	Haanu̱ma ya bantu aba kumala kutuwa mu numba omu, Yesu aataahamu, aakwata manaabukali̱ oghu haa mukono. Manaabukali̱ oghu aamuka ali mwomi̱i̱li̱.
40009026	Ti̱ makulu ghaa ekyabaayʼo eki ghaamalakaka kyalo eki kyona.
40009027	Yesu naanalu̱ghayo, basaasa babili aba maaso ghaaghaaye, baaghenda bamulabhi̱ye mbanagugangana bati, “Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱! Otughilile kisa!”
40009028	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye naataaha mu numba, basaasa aba baamwisʼo. Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngu nkugubha kubaki̱li̱ya?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Ee, Mukama waatu.”
40009029	Du̱mbi̱ aabaku̱ma haa maaso aaghila ati, “Kibakoleluwe kusighikila ngoku ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu kuli.”
40009030	Du̱mbi̱ basaasa aba baabonelʼo haala hoonini. Yesu aabeekonkomeelela ati, “Kini mutakighambilʼo muntu nʼomui.”
40009031	Bhaatu ebo baaghenda mu kyalo eki kyona mbanaha makulu agha oghu baakasangi̱ye.
40009032	Basaasa aba makaghenda bati, bantu baaleetela Yesu musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete kandi kimuughaaye kanu̱wa.
40009033	Yesu akaba makabhinga ati ki̱li̱mu̱ eki, du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu kanu̱wa kaabaagha kaaghaaye oghu, aatandika ku̱bu̱gha. Ti̱ ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo baasweka kandi baaghila bati, “Tatukabonagha kintu nga kini mu ehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ lyona.”
40009034	Bhaatu Bafali̱saayo baatandika kughila bati, “Mukulu wa bi̱li̱mu̱ niiye amuhaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhinga bi̱li̱mu̱.”
40009035	Yesu aabunga mu maatau̱ni̱ ghakani̱ye na mi̱bhi̱li̱ ekani̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Aaghendagha naatebeja mu malami̱li̱yo ghaabo Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga kandi naaki̱li̱ya bantu ndwala sya bu̱li̱ mulingo.
40009036	Obu Yesu aaboone bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu bikani̱ye mbimwisʼo, aabakwatiluwa kisa. Nanga bakaba bali na bijibu bisaalukaane kandi batali na mu̱kooneli̱. Bali nga ntaama esitali na mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya.
40009037	Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Haliyo bya kukesa bikani̱ye, bhaatu bakoli̱ niibo bakee.
40009038	Nahabweki musabe Mukama wa kukesa oghu atume bakoli̱ bakani̱ye mu kukesa kuwe oku.”
40010001	Niibuwo Yesu aabilikiiye beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili kumwisʼo. Aabaha bu̱toki̱ kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ na kubaki̱li̱ya ndwala sya bu̱li̱ mulingo.
40010002	Mali̱i̱na ghaa bakwenda eku̱mi̱ na babili aba niigho ghani: Wʼoku̱du̱bha ni Si̱mooni̱, (oghu baaghilaghamu Peetelo) na waani̱nawee Andeleya, Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa Jebbedaayo, na waani̱nawee Yohaana,
40010003	Fi̱li̱po na Batu̱lu̱maayo, Tomasi na Matayo mukumaani̱ya wa musolo, Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa Alifaayo, na Tadeewa,
40010004	Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalwanililagha ehanga liye, na Yu̱da Esikalyota, oghu akamu̱ghobeli̱ya.
40010005	Eku̱mi̱ na babili aba Yesu aabatuma kandi aabalaghila ati, “Mutaghenda mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaa batali Bayu̱daaya kedha Basamali̱ya.
40010006	Kuuyʼo mughende mu Banai̱saaleeli̱ abali nga ntaama si̱bu̱li̱ye.
40010007	Mughendaghe nimulangilila butumuwa buni muti, ‘Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu bwahi̱ki̱ye.’
40010008	Ti̱, mu̱ki̱li̱ye balwaye, mu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱le baku̱u̱ye, mu̱ki̱li̱ye abalwaye ntumbi basemele kandi mubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱. Mwaheebeeu̱we busa, naanu muheele busa.
40010009	Mutaghenda na sente sya bu̱li̱ mulingo mu nsau syanu.
40010010	Kandi mu lughendo olu, muntu ataghenda na kikapa kedha lughoye lwakabili, nkai̱to kedha mwi̱gho, nanga mu̱koli̱ abhonganuuwe kumuha byokuliya.”
40010011	Eeyongela kubaghila ati, “Mulakaki̱dhagha mu tau̱ni̱, mubbalaghemu muntu oghu aku̱beebali̱ya mu ka yee, kandi muukalaghemu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱lu̱ghi̱yeyo.
40010012	Ti̱, hambali mulaki̱dhagha, musabilaghe bantu aba mpempa.
40010013	Bantu aba balakabaagha babhonganuuwe mpempa eghi, balaghitungagha. Bataabhonganuuwe mpempa eghi, elakuukilagha enu̱we.
40010014	Muntu nʼomui ataabeebali̱i̱ye, kedha ku̱tegheeleli̱ya butumuwa bwanu, malu̱ghayo mweku̱nku̱mule tu̱u̱tu̱ ya mu bighanja byanu kwoleka ngoku Luhanga alifubila bantu aba.
40010015	Ti̱ mbaghambiiye majima, haa kilo Luhanga ali̱twi̱lamu bantu musango, alifubila bantu baa tau̱ni̱ eghi kusaali̱ya ngoku alifubila bantu baa tau̱ni̱ ya Sodomu na Gomola.”
40010016	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye, ndimabatuma, bhaatu mumanye ngu muli nga ntaama ndimatuma mu mihaga. Nahabweki mubeelinde kandi mube bantu bateekaane mu njikala yaanu.
40010017	Mwelinde bantu aba, nanga bakutwala enu̱we mu balemi̱, babahuulile bibbooko mu nkulato sya malami̱li̱yo ghaabo.
40010018	Haabwanje bakubatwala mu balemi̱ na bakama niikuwo bantu aba baaghu̱we nimumpeela buukai̱so mu maaso ghaabo hamui na batali Bayu̱daaya.
40010019	Bhaatu mbaabakwete, byaku̱bu̱gha kedha mulingo mu̱ku̱bu̱ghi̱lamu bitabatu̱ntu̱li̱ya. Bwile obu muliheebuwa ebi mu̱ku̱bu̱gha,
40010020	nanga taali̱i̱nu̱we mukuba ni̱mu̱bu̱gha, bhaatu Mwoyo wa Eseenu̱we niiye aliba naababu̱ghi̱lamu.
40010021	“Muntu alihaayo mwana waani̱na wee ati bamwite. Na ese mwana alihaayo mwana wee ati bamwite. Niikiyo kimui dhee, baana balijeemela babyaye baabo kandi babaate.
40010022	Bantu boona balyoha enu̱we haabwanje. Bhaatu oghu aliikala anangumiiyʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱u̱ye, alijunuwa.
40010023	Balakabahiighani̱jagha mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui, mughendaghe mu kinji. Mbaghambiiye majima, tamukumalayo bibugha byona byʼomu ehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ Mwana wa Muntu atakaku̱u̱ki̱ye.
40010024	“Ti̱ mweghesebuwa taasaai̱ye mwegheesi̱ya wee, kandi mu̱heeleli̱ya taasaai̱ye mukama wee.
40010025	Mweghesebuwa akugubha kuba nga mwegheesi̱ya wee kandi mu̱heeleli̱ya akugubha kuba nga mukama wee. Si̱ye mwegheesi̱ya waanu, balaba mbangilamu Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱ mukulu wa bi̱li̱mu̱, naanu bakubabbaaki̱i̱si̱ya batiyo dhee.”
40010026	“Nahabweki mutoobaha abakuboobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya. Taaliyo kintu kyona eki bantu balikolelela mu ki̱bi̱so ekitalimanuwa, kedha eki bali̱bi̱sa-bi̱sa ekitalimanuwa.
40010027	Eki mbaghambiiye mu nsi̱ta, mu̱ki̱bu̱ghi̱laghe mu bantu boona, kandi eki mbaghambiiye mu biiweewe, mukilangililaghe bbuwa.
40010028	Mutoobaha abakugubha kwita mubili bhaatu abataakugubha kwita mwoyo. Kuuyʼo mwobahe Luhanga oghu akugubha ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya byombi mubili na mwoyo mu Gehena.
40010029	Buuye bu̱si̱i̱li̱ya bubili buunabwana, tabakubughulagha si̱li̱ngi̱ ataano syonkaha? Bhaatu taaliyo na kamui akaku̱ku̱wagha Luhanga Eseenu̱we atasi̱i̱mi̱ye.
40010030	Kandi Luhanga amani̱ye nankabha muhendo ghwa esoke elili haa mutuwe ghwawe.
40010031	Nahabweki mutoobaha. Muli baa mughaso munu kusaali̱ya bu̱si̱i̱li̱ya bukani̱ye.”
40010032	“Ti̱ weena oghu alyatula mu bantu ati ni wanje, nanje ndimwatula mu maaso ghaa Tita wʼomu eghulu.
40010033	Bhaatu oghu alineehighaana mu bantu, nanje ndimwehighaana mu maaso ghaa Tita wʼomu eghulu.
40010034	“Mutateekeleja muti naasi̱ye kuleeta mpempa mu bantu. Mbaghambiiye tanaaleeti̱ye mpempa bbaa, naasi̱ye kuleka bantu mbeetambulani̱yamu.
40010035	Nanga naasi̱ye kuleka mwana neetambulani̱yʼo ese wee, kandi manaabukali̱ aleetambulani̱yaghʼo ni̱na wee, na mugholi aleetambulani̱yaghʼo ni̱nabyala wee.
40010036	Ngi̱ghu̱ sya muntu, balabaagha baa mu ka yee boonini.
40010037	Ti̱ weena oghu akukunda ese wee kedha ni̱na wee kusaali̱ya ngoku anku̱ndi̱ye, oghu taabhonganuuwe kuba wanje. Weena oghu akukunda mutabani̱ wee kedha muhala wee kusaali̱ya ngoku anku̱ndi̱ye, oghu taabhonganuuwe kuba wanje.
40010038	Kandi weena oghu ataaheeki̱ye musalaba ghuwe kandi ankwama, taakugubha kuba wanje bbaa.
40010039	Nanga weena oghu akukukutila bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe akubufeeluwa, bhaatu weena oghu akubuhaayo haabwanje, akubutunga.
40010040	Nahabweki, weena oghu akubabhasila, akuba abhasiiye si̱ye, kandi oghu akubhasila si̱ye, akuba abhasiiye oghu akantuma.
40010041	Ti̱ weena oghu alyebali̱ya mulangi̱ haabwa muntu oghu kuba mulangi̱, Luhanga alimuha mpeela nga ya mulangi̱ oghu. Kandi weena oghu alyebali̱ya mu ka yee muntu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, haabwa kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye wa Luhanga, muntu oghu Luhanga alimuha mpeela ngʼeghi aliha abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40010042	Mbaghambiiye majima, weena oghu aliha nankabha kiikopo kya maasi ghaa kunuwa, omui mu banali bato mu ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja haabwa kuba mweghesebuwa wanje, majima taalifeeluwa mpeela yee bbaa.”
40011001	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kwegheesi̱ya beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili, eeyongelayo kughenda kwegheesi̱ya na kutebeja mu maatau̱ni̱ ghaa mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya.
40011002	Ti̱ obu Yohaana, aanabaagha mu nkomo, aaghu̱wa ebi Ki̱li̱si̱to akwete kukola, aatuma beeghesebuwa be
40011003	ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye nuuwe oghu baaghi̱li̱ye bati okwisa, kedha tulindilile onji?”
40011004	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mughende, mughambile Yohaana ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye kandi ebi muboone.
40011005	Abaaghaaye maaso niibuwo baabona, abalema niibuwo baalubhatanga, abalwaye ntumbi niibuwo baakila kandi baasemela, abaaghaaye matui niibuwo baaghu̱wa, abaku̱u̱ye niibuwo baahu̱mbu̱u̱ka, kandi Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga niibuwo baaghalangilila banaku.
40011006	Ti̱ ali na mu̱gi̱sa oghu ataakuleka ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja.”
40011007	Obu beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana aba baakuukaghayo, Yesu aatandika kughambila biigambi̱ bya bantu abaabaaghʼo ebikwetʼo Yohaana oghu. Aaghila ati, “Obu mwaghendagha mu elungu kulola Yohaana, mukaba mumani̱ye muti mukusangayo muntu wa mulingo ki? Mweli̱li̱kanagha kusangayo muntu mwoba kandi oghu atagumiiye haa eki acuuyemu?
40011008	Mwaghendagha kulola muntu oghu alu̱wete kusemeeye? Bbaa, nanga abaku̱lu̱walagha ngoye sisemeleeye kimui bakuukalagha mu bikaali bya bakama.
40011009	Ti̱ buuye mwaghendagha kulola ani̱? Mulangi̱? Ee, mbaghambiiye majima, oghu asaai̱ye mulangi̱.
40011010	Nanga Yohaana oghu niiye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we byabu̱ghi̱yʼo biti, ‘Ndituma mutumuwa wanje ahikile akuteekani̱li̱ye kihanda otakaasi̱ye.’
40011011	Mbaghambiiye majima, taakabaaghʼo muntu nʼomui oghu abyahuwe mukali̱, oghu aabaayʼo oghu asaai̱ye Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱. Bhaatu nankabha mwana mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu, aliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kusaali̱ya kya Yohaana.”
40011012	Kandi ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabaaghʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nʼendindi, bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu obu bukwisagha na maani̱ kandi beekambi̱ niibuwo baalengʼo kubutunga.
40011013	Nanga balangi̱ boona hamui na bilaghilo bya Musa, byabu̱ghagha ebyaghendagha kubʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Yohaana aasi̱ye.
40011014	Kandi mulakaba ni̱mu̱si̱i̱ma ebi nkubaghambila, mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je ngu Yohaana oghu niiye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we byaghambagha obu mulangi̱ aalangililiiye ati, Eli̱ya aku̱du̱bha kwisa.
40011015	Oghu ali na matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, aaghu̱we.
40011016	Mujo ghuni ndaghususaani̱ya na ki? Bali nga baana basitami̱ye mu katale, kandi bakubilikila baanakyabo bati,
40011017	“ ‘Twabalimbiiye bilimbo bya bu̱ghenu̱, tamwabi̱ni̱ye! Twabalimbila bya lu̱ku̱, mutaalila.’
40011018	Nanga obu Yohaana aasiibagha ataaliya kedha atanuwa, baaghilagha bati, ‘Ki̱li̱mu̱ kimuli haa mutuwe.’
40011019	Mwana wa Muntu obu akuliyagha kandi anuwa mukughilagha muti, ‘Mulole ali na mululu, ni mutami̱i̱li̱, kandi bhootu̱ wa bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱!’ Bhaatu magheji ghaa Luhanga ghakweyolekelagha mu bikoluwa byagho.”
40011020	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aatandika ku̱bu̱ghʼo bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ esi aakoleeyemu byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye, nanga ebo kubhenga kwekuukamu. Aaghila ati,
40011021	“Ngamulikibona enu̱we bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Kolaji̱i̱ni̱! Ngamulikibona enu̱we bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetesai̱da! Nguli byakuswekani̱ya ebi naakoleeye ewaanu, naabikoleeye Ti̱lo kedha Si̱dooni̱, bangubaaye beeku̱u̱ki̱yemu hambele, balu̱wala ngoye sya bujune, kandi beesiigha ki̱bu̱ kyʼomu mahi̱gha.
40011022	Bhaatu mbaghambiiye, haa kilo kya ku̱twi̱lamu musango, Luhanga ali̱twi̱la enu̱we musango ghwamaani̱ kusaali̱ya ngoku ali̱ghu̱twi̱la bantu baa tau̱ni̱ ya Ti̱lo na ya Si̱dooni̱.
40011023	Ti̱ enu̱we bantu baa Kapelenau̱mu̱ abaabhengi̱ye ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti Luhanga alibaha ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ mu eghulu? Bbaa, alibakuba Eku̱li̱mu̱. Ti̱ nguli byakuswekani̱ya ebi naakoleeye ewaanu byakoleuwe mu tau̱ni̱ ya Sodomu, bangweku̱u̱ki̱yemu kandi tau̱ni̱ eghi yangubaaye enaliyʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nʼendindi.
40011024	Bhaatu mbaghambiiye, Luhanga ali̱twi̱la kwonini enu̱we musango kusaali̱ya ngoku ali̱ghu̱twi̱la bantu baa Sodomu.”
40011025	Bwile obu, Yesu aaghila ati, “Tita, Mukama wʼeghulu na nsi, nku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma nanga majima agha okaghabisi̱i̱li̱la baamagheji kandi basomi̱ye. Waaghasu̱u̱ku̱li̱la baana bakelembe.
40011026	Ee, Tita, eki niikiyo waaboone ki̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye kwonini.
40011027	“Tita niiye akampa bu̱toki̱ bwa bu̱li̱ kintu kyona. Taaliyo nʼomui oghu amani̱ye si̱ye Mwana kuuyʼo Tita oghu, kandi taaliyo oghu amani̱ye Tita kuuyʼo Mwana, kandi nʼaba Mwana akukomaghamu kuleka mbamumanya.
40011028	“Munjisʼo enu̱we boona abalu̱hi̱ye kandi abaalyoteleeuwe, nkubahu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya.
40011029	Mundhootele kandi muleke mbeegheesi̱ye, nanga si̱ye tansaakaaye kandi tankughayagha muntu weena, ti̱ mukubona ngoku mukuba na kihuumulo mu mitima yaanu.
40011030	Nanga ebi nkubalaghila kukola bi̱dhooti̱ye, kandi ebi nkubbala nti mukole tabitimbikaane.”
40012001	Bwile obu, haa kilo kya Sabhato kimui, Yesu aasaalilagha mu kihanda ekikweme mu misili ya ngano. Beeghesebuwa be haabwa njala kubakwata, baatandika kukobha mituwe ya ngano eghi kughiliya.
40012002	Obu Bafali̱saayo baakiboone, baaghila Yesu bati, “Olole! Beeghesebuwa baawe niibuwo baakola ekitali mu bilaghilo kukoluwa haa kilo kya Sabhato.”
40012003	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye Tamukasomagha eki Mukama Dhau̱dhi̱ aakoli̱ye obu eye naaba aabaagha naye njala yaabaagha ebakwete?
40012004	Akataaha mu Numba ya Luhanga, aaliya migaati̱ eghi bahongi̱ bahongeeye Luhanga. Kandi aaghiha nʼabaabaagha naye. Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, migaati̱ eghi tayaalibuwagha bantu banji kuuyʼo bahongi̱ bonkaha.
40012005	Kedha tamukasomagha mu bilaghilo, ngoku bahongi̱ baahi̱ki̱li̱ji̱buwagha haa kilo kya Sabhato kutaaha mu Numba ya Luhanga kukolamu milimo? Bhaatu taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aaghilagha ati baasobeei̱ye.
40012006	Nkubbala kubaghambila nti oghu asaai̱ye Numba ya Luhanga ali naanu hani.
40012007	Nguli mwakengi̱ye kwonini eki kini kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu, ‘Nkubbala mukole bikoluwa bya ngughuma, kusaali̱ya kuhonga bihonguwa,’ tamwangu̱soghosi̱ye abatali na musango bbaa.
40012008	Nahabweki Mwana wa Muntu niiye Mukama wa kilo kya Sabhato.”
40012009	Yesu makalu̱gha hambali baabaagha haala, aaghenda mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
40012010	Aasangamu musaasa anangi̱ye mukono. Bamui mu Bafali̱saayo abaabbalagha eki bakunyegheelelʼo Yesu, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye ku̱ki̱li̱ya muntu haa kilo kya Sabhato?”
40012011	Aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye muntu weena mu enu̱we ntaama yee ni̱yeegengi̱ye mu ki̱i̱na haa kilo kya Sabhato, taakukwata ntaama eghi aghibhulemu?
40012012	Muntu eye ali na mughaso kwonini kusaali̱ya ntaama! Nahabweki ki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukola bikoluwa bisemeeye haa kilo kya Sabhato.”
40012013	Du̱mbi̱ aaghila musaasa anangi̱ye mukono oghu ati, “Nanula mukono ghwawe.” Musaasa oghu aaghunanula ghwakililʼo, ghwasusaana na oghwabaagha ghutanangi̱ye.
40012014	Bhaatu Bafali̱saayo aba baatuwa, baaghenda bahanuula ngoku balaata Yesu.
40012015	Obu Yesu aamani̱ye ngoku Bafali̱saayo aba bakwete kuhanuula kumwita, aalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki. Bhaatu biigambi̱ bya bantu bakani̱ye byamukwama. Ti̱ aaki̱li̱ya balwaye boona aba bantu aba baabaagha nabo.
40012016	Aabeekonkomeelela ati bataghambila bantu.
40012017	Kini kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱yagha eki mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye ati,
40012018	“Oni niiye mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje oghu naakomi̱ye, oghu nku̱ndi̱ye kandi oghu akukola ebi̱ndheedhi̱ye. Ndileka Mwoyo wanje amwisʼo kandi alilangilila ngoku nkujuna bantu bʼomu ntu̱la syona.
40012019	Taalitongana na bantu kedha kubatanuka. Taali̱bu̱gha na elaka lyamaani̱ mu nguudhe syʼomu bibugha.
40012020	Alighilila ngughuma baceke nʼaba bantu bakukola kubhi. Alighilila kisa abataakugubha kwekoonela, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwengani̱ja bu̱si̱ngu̱u̱ye.
40012021	Ti̱ niiye bantu bakaniiye kimui mu ntu̱la syona balyesigha kubajuna.”
40012022	Niibuwo bantu baaleeteeye Yesu musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete, oghu kyabaagha kiighaaye maaso na kanu̱wa. Yesu aamu̱ki̱li̱ya, du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aatandika ku̱bu̱gha kandi kubona.
40012023	Bantu abaabaaghʼo boona baasweka kandi baaghila bati, “Oni anguba aliiye Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱?”
40012024	Bhaatu obu Bafali̱saayo baaghu̱u̱ye bantu aba mbabu̱gha batiyo, baaghila bati, “Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱ mukulu wa bi̱li̱mu̱ niiye amuhaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhinga bi̱li̱mu̱.”
40012025	Yesu aamanya ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana, aabaghila ati, “Bantu baa bu̱lemi̱ bumui mbatandi̱ki̱ye kulwana bonkaha na bonkaha, bu̱lemi̱ obu tabukutuulʼo. Kandi bantu baa tau̱ni̱ emui kedha ka emui mbatandi̱ki̱ye kulwana bonkaha na bonkaha, tau̱ni̱ kedha ka eghi teekutuulʼo bbaa.
40012026	Si̱taani̱ neelwani̱i̱si̱i̱ye eenini, akuba eetambulani̱i̱yemu eenini. Buuye mu̱kweli̱li̱kana bu̱lemi̱ buwe bulatuulʼo?
40012027	Ti̱ buuye Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱ akaakuba aliiye ampaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱, baana baanu baku̱koleesi̱ya bwani̱? Niibo balileka babatwi̱le musango ngoku muhabi̱ye.
40012028	Bhaatu obu Mwoyo wa Luhanga alaba aaliiye ampaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱, eki kikuba nkyoleka ngoku bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bubalimu.
40012029	“Nanga taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kwegimba mu numba ya musaasa wamaani̱ ku̱hu̱ngamu bintu biye, atadu̱bhi̱ye aboha musaasa wamaani̱ oghu, haanu̱ma ya kumuboha niikuwo ahu̱nge ebili mu numba ya musaasa oghu.
40012030	“Oghu atali hamui nanje, akumpakani̱yagha; kandi oghu ataakukumaani̱yagha hamui nanje, akuhanjaagagha.
40012031	Nahabweki ndimabaghambila nti, bu̱li̱ kibhi eki bantu bakukola kilighaniluwa nankabha kya kwambula Luhanga. Bhaatu weena oghu akwambula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, taalighaniluwa.
40012032	Weena oghu aku̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi Mwana wa Muntu alighaniluwa, bhaatu weena oghu aku̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye taalighaniluwa, ebe mu bilo bini kedha mu bwile obuliisa.”
40012033	“Nanga kiti kisemeeye kikwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye, kandi kiti ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kyana bi̱ghu̱ma bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye. Kandi okugubha kumanya ngoku kiti ki̱su̱si̱ye haabwa bi̱ghu̱ma kikwanagha.
40012034	Enu̱we abali na bubhi nga bwa njoka, mukugubha mu̱ti̱ya ku̱bu̱gha kintu kyona kisemeeye kuni muli babhi?
40012035	Nanga muntu naabaaye ali na mutima ghusemeeye, akukola kandi abu̱ghe bintu bisemeeye. Bhaatu muntu naabaaye ali mubhi akukola kandi abu̱ghe bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, nanga muntu aku̱bu̱ghagha ebimuli haa mutima.
40012036	Bhaatu ndimabaghambila nti, haa kilo kya Luhanga ku̱twi̱la bantu musango, bantu balyetonganʼo ewe haabwa bighambo bitabhonganuuwe baku̱bu̱ghagha.
40012037	Ebi mu̱ku̱bu̱ghagha bilileka Luhanga ababale kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kedha abasi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ye musango.”
40012038	Niibuwo bamui mu Bafali̱saayo na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baaghi̱li̱ye Yesu bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, tukubbala otukolele kyakuswekani̱ya kyona.”
40012039	Aabakuukamu ati, “Mujo ghwa bantu babhi kandi batali beesighibuwa bakuukalagha mbabbala kubakolela kyakuswekani̱ya. Bhaatu taaliyo kyakuswekani̱ya kyona ekikubakoleluwa, kuuyʼo kya mulangi̱ Yona.
40012040	Nanga ngoku Yona oghu aamali̱ye bilo bisatu ntangaali̱ na mukilo anali munda ya ki̱su̱i̱ kiinamu̱li̱to, niikuwo na Mwana wa Muntu alimala eku̱li̱mu̱ bilo bisatu mukilo na ntangaali̱.
40012041	Haa kilo Luhanga aku̱twi̱lamu bantu musango, bantu baa kibugha kya Ni̱neeva balyemilila hamui naanu mu maaso ghe, kandi baleke asi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ye enu̱we musango, nanga ebo obu Yona aabatebi̱i̱je haa bikoluwa byabo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, bakeekuukamu. Bhaatu oghu asaai̱ye Yona bu̱toki̱ ali naanu, ti̱ mu̱bhengi̱ye ebi akwegheesi̱yagha.
40012042	Kandi na mukama wabukali̱ oghu akaba alemi̱ye ehanga lya Sebba, alyemilila hamui naanu kandi asi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ye bantu baa mujo ghuni musango. Nanga eye akalu̱gha munsi hambali aseleeye kimui, aasa ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Mukama Solomooni̱ oghu akaba ali na magheji ghakani̱ye. Ti̱ oghu asaai̱ye Solomooni̱ bu̱toki̱ ali hani naanu.
40012043	“Ti̱ ki̱li̱mu̱ kikaku̱lu̱ghaghamu muntu, kikughendagha mu elungu hambali maasi ghatali, nkibbala hambali kikuhuumulila, kandi takikutungaghʼo bbaa.
40012044	Du̱mbi̱ kighila kiti, ‘Oleke nkuuke mu numba hambali naalu̱ghi̱ye.’ Ti̱ nkyaki̱dha, kisanga muntu oghu ali nga numba eghi muntu atalimu, beeheleeye yeeli̱ye, kandi eteekani̱ji̱bu̱u̱we kulungi.
40012045	Du̱mbi̱ kighenda kileeta bi̱li̱mu̱ binji musanju̱ ebikisaai̱ye kusaakala, biisa biikala mu muntu oghu. Ti̱ muntu oghu aba kubhi kusaali̱ya ngoku aabaagha haa ku̱du̱bha. Niikuwo kiliba kitiyo naanu bantu babhi baa bilo bini.”
40012046	Obu Yesu aanabu̱ghi̱lagha ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, ni̱na wee na baana baani̱na wee baaki̱dha, beemilila enja. Baakala bamu̱li̱ndi̱ye ku̱bu̱gha naye.
40012047	Niibuwo omui mu bantu aba aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Njoko waawe na baana banjoko waawe baamiliiye enja, bakubbala ku̱bu̱gha naawe.”
40012048	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Maaha ni ani̱? Kandi na baana baamaaha mbaahaa?”
40012049	Ongota beeghesebuwa be, aaghila ati, “Bani niibo maaha kandi baana baamaaha.
40012050	Nanga weena oghu akukolagha ebi Tita wʼomu eghulu abbali̱ye, niiye mwana wamaaha kandi mwani̱naasi̱ye kandi maaha.”
40013001	Kilo eki kyonini, Yesu aatuwa mu numba omu, aaghenda aasitama haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja ya Galilaaya kwegheesi̱ya.
40013002	Biigambi̱ bikaniiye kimui bya bantu byasa byamweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, eye du̱mbi̱ aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱, aabusitamamu mu nanja bantu bo baati̱ghala baamiliiye haa ki̱si̱yo.
40013003	Aabeegheesi̱ya bintu bikani̱ye naakoleesi̱ya nsi̱mo, aaghila ati, “Mu̱li̱mi̱ akaghenda kumisa nsigho yee.
40013004	Obu aanamisangagha nsigho yee eghi, bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala mu kihandakati, noni̱ syasa syabuliya.
40013005	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala hʼetaka lya mabaale. Bwatuwa bwangu nanga etaka kutakanʼo.
40013006	Ti̱ obu musana ghwatooye, ghwabwoki̱ya, bwahotoka haabwa mi̱li̱ kutatobheela bhyani mu etaka nanga liyo kutakanʼo.
40013007	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala mu mahuwa ghaakula, ghaasoosookeli̱ya ndimo eghi.
40013008	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala hʼetaka lisemeeye, bwana. Kasigho kamui kaalu̱ghamu ki̱ku̱mi̱, kanji nkaagha, kanji maku̱mi̱ asatu.”
40013009	Yesu aaghila ati, “Oghu ali na matui, aaghu̱we!”
40013010	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be baamwi̱si̱yʼo, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Oku̱bu̱ghi̱lagha bantu mu nsi̱mo nangaaki?”
40013011	Aabakuukamu ati, “Enu̱we mukaheebuwa kumanya nsi̱ta sya bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu, bhaatu ebo bbaa.
40013012	Nanga oghu ali na kantu, niiye akwongeluwʼo na bisaayʼo, bhaatu oghu atali na kantu, nʼaka ali nako kakumuuhibuwʼo.
40013013	Eki niikiyo kikulekagha ebo mbabu̱ghi̱la mu nsi̱mo, nanga bakulolagha, batabona; baaghu̱wa, bataaghu̱wa kedha kwetegheeleli̱ya.
40013014	Ebi byasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye ati, “ ‘Mu̱ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, bhaatu tamu̱kwetegheeleli̱ya. Mukulola, bhaatu tamukubona.
40013015	Bantu aba mitima yabo yaaceki̱ye; beehighali̱i̱si̱i̱ye matui kandi maaso. Nanga babona na maaso ghaabo; baaghu̱wa na matui ghaabo, kandi beetegheeleli̱ya mu mitima yabo. Mbaakoli̱ye kuwo, bakunkuukʼo kandi mbaki̱li̱ye.’ ”
40013016	Aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Enu̱we muli na mu̱gi̱sa nanga muli na maaso aghakugubha kubona kandi matui aghakugubha ku̱u̱ghu̱wa.
40013017	Mbaghambiiye majima, balangi̱ bakani̱ye na bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bakabbala kubona ebi muboone, bhaatu bataabibona, kandi ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye, bhaatu bataabi̱i̱ghu̱wa.
40013018	“Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye eki lu̱si̱mo lwa mu̱mi̱si̱ lukumani̱i̱si̱ya:
40013019	Nsigho eghi ekalaghala mu kihandakati, ni muntu oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha butumuwa haa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, bhaatu atabwetegheeleli̱ya. Du̱mbi̱ Si̱taani̱ aasa aaya butumuwa obu mu mutima ghuwe.
40013020	Na nsigho eghi ekalaghala hʼetaka lya mabaale, ni muntu oghu aku̱du̱bhagha adheedhuwa naaghu̱wa kighambo kya Luhanga.
40013021	Bhaatu ngoku bilimuwa bitaakugubha kulebba bitali na mi̱li̱ etobheeye bhyani mu etaka, niikiyo kimui na muntu oghu, aku̱du̱bhagha ooleka kuguma, bhaatu bijibu kedha kuhighani̱ji̱buwa haabwa kighambo kya Luhanga mbyasa, du̱mbi̱ alu̱gha bwangu haa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kuwe.
40013022	Nsigho eghi ekalaghala mu mahuwa, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya muntu oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga, bhaatu kwelalikiilila bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa nsi eni, kudimaaguwa kutwalilijibuwa buguudha, kandi kweghomba bintu binji bileka kighambo kya Luhanga kitamu̱lu̱ghi̱lamu mughaso.
40013023	Bhaatu eghi ekalaghala hʼetaka lisemeeye, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya muntu oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga kandi akyetegheeleli̱ya. Ki̱mu̱lu̱ghi̱lamu mughaso milundi ki̱ku̱mi̱, nkaagha kedha maku̱mi̱ asatu.”
40013024	Yesu aabaha lu̱si̱mo lunji ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga mu̱li̱mi̱ oghu akahela nsigho yee esemeeye mu musili.
40013025	Bhaatu obu bu̱li̱ muntu weena aabaagha aghwesaghiiye, ngi̱ghu̱ yee aasa, aahela nsigho ya bi̱si̱ngo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu musili ghwa mucele oghu, du̱mbi̱ aaghenda.
40013026	Obu mucele oghu ghwatooye kandi ngwana, bi̱si̱ngo na biyo byabonekamu dhee.
40013027	Niibuwo baheeleli̱ya baa musaasa oghu baasi̱ye hambali ali, baamughila bati, ‘Wai̱tu̱, tawaaheli̱ye nsigho esemeeye mu musili ghwawe? Ti̱ bi̱si̱ngo binji byalu̱ghi̱ye haa?’
40013028	Aabakuukamu ati, ‘Ngi̱ghu̱ yanje niiyo yaakoli̱ye eki.’ Baheeleli̱ya be aba baamughila bati, ‘Buuye okubbala tughende tumeenemu bi̱si̱ngo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi?’
40013029	Aabakuukamu ati, ‘Bbaa, nanga nimwabaaye nimunameenamu bi̱si̱ngo ebi, mukugubha kumeenelani̱yamu na mucele.
40013030	Muleke byombi bikulile hamui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kukesa. Bwile obu niibuwo nkughambila bakoli̱ banje nti, “Mu̱du̱bhe mukumaani̱ye bi̱si̱ngo mubibohe bibha-bibha ku̱byoki̱ya; du̱mbi̱ mukumaani̱ye mucele mughuleete mughute mu nguli yanje.” ’ ”
40013031	Yesu aabaha lu̱si̱mo lunji ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga kasigho kaa kalatu̱u̱si̱, aka musaasa aatwete, aahela mu musili ghuwe.
40013032	Nankabha kali kaanabwana kusaali̱ya busigho bunji bwona, bhaatu kakaakukulagha kakufookagha kiti kiinamu̱li̱to kusaali̱ya biti binji mu musili. Kiti eki kiba na bitai biinamu̱li̱to, ti̱ noni̱ sikwelamu bisui.”
40013033	Aabaha lu̱si̱mo lunji ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga katu̱mbi̱so kati̱i̱ aka mukali̱ aataaye mu ki̱tu̱mbe kya kigaati̱ kiinamu̱li̱to kandi kaki̱bhi̱mbi̱li̱ya kimui.”
40013034	Yesu aabu̱ghi̱la ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki atiyo naakoleesi̱ya nsi̱mo. Taaliyo kintu kyona eki aabu̱ghi̱ye etali mu lu̱si̱mo.
40013035	Eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya eki mulangi̱ aabu̱ghi̱ye ati, “Ndi̱bu̱ghi̱la bantu mu nsi̱mo, ndi̱bu̱gha ebyabaagha bi̱bi̱si̱u̱we ku̱lu̱gha haa kuhanguwa kwa nsi.”
40013036	Niibuwo Yesu aalu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, aaghenda aataaha mu numba. Beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo, baamughila bati, “Otusoboolole eki lu̱si̱mo lwa bi̱si̱ngo mu musili waahaaye olu lukumani̱i̱si̱ya.”
40013037	Aabakuukamu ati, “Oghu akahela nsigho esemeeye ni Mwana wa Muntu.
40013038	Musili niiyo nsi eni, kandi na nsigho esemeeye ni bantu abali mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga. Bi̱si̱ngo ni bantu aba Mubhi alemi̱ye.
40013039	Kandi ngi̱ghu̱ eghi ekahela bi̱si̱ngo mu musili oghu ni Si̱taani̱. Bwile bwa kukesa kikumani̱i̱si̱ya kilo kya mpelo, kandi bakoli̱ abakukesa ni baamalai̱ka.
40013040	Ngoku bakukumaani̱yamu bi̱si̱ngo kandi babyoki̱ye mu mulilo, niikuwo kiliba kitiyo na babhi haa kilo kya mpelo.
40013041	Mwana wa Muntu alituma baamalai̱ka be, kandi baaye mu bu̱lemi̱ buwe bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekikuleeteleja ku̱si̱i̱sa kandi na boona abakukolagha bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
40013042	Balibakuba mu mulilo ghwamaani̱, hambali balilila kwonini kandi beenene ngaga nanga busaali̱ji̱.
40013043	Niibuwo bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bo baaliikala kubbyokelela nga musana mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Esebo Luhanga. Oghu ali na matui, aaghu̱we.”
40013044	Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga feeja eghi muntu aaboone babi̱si̱ye mu musili. Haabwa eye kudheedhuwa kukani̱ye, aatodha aaghibisamu, du̱mbi̱ aaghenda, aaghu̱li̱ya byona ebi aabaagha nabiyo, aaghula musili oghu.”
40013045	Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga mabaale ghaa muhendo agha mu̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱ aabbalagha.
40013046	Obu aaboone ebaale lya muhendo munu kusaali̱ya ghoona, aaghenda, aaghu̱li̱ya byona ebi aabaagha nabiyo, aalighula.”
40013047	Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga kati̱mba aka baateghi̱ye mu nanja kandi kaakwata nsu̱i̱ sya bu̱li̱ mulingo.
40013048	Obu kaasuuye nsu̱i̱, bakomani̱ baakabhula mu nanja, baakata haa ki̱si̱yo. Du̱mbi̱ baasitama baakumaani̱yamu nsu̱i̱ sisemeeye, baasita mu bighegha, bhaatu esi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye baasikuba.
40013049	Niikuwo kiliba kitiyo haa kilo kya mpelo. Baamalai̱ka baliisa baaye babhi mu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye,
40013050	kandi bakube babhi aba mu mulilo ghwamaani̱, hambali baliikala mbalilila kimui kandi mbenena ngaga nanga busaali̱ji̱.”
40013051	Aatodha aabaghila ati, “Ebi naabaghambiiye ebi byona, mwabyetegheleei̱ye?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Ee.”
40013052	Aabaghila ati, “Nahabweki bu̱li̱ mwegheesi̱ya wa bilaghilo oghu beegheeseei̱ye haa bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu, ali nga mukama wa ka oghu akuuyagha mu sitoowa yee hambali akubiikilagha bintu bya mughaso, bikulu nʼebihyaka.”
40013053	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kusoboolola beeghesebuwa be nsi̱mo esi, aalu̱gha mu kyalo eki.
40013054	Aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo Najaaleeti̱, aatandika kwegheeseli̱ya bantu mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya lyʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi, ti̱ abaabi̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye aba boona baasweka. Baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Musaasa oni aahi̱ye haa magheji agha kandi bu̱toki̱ kukola byakuswekani̱ya bitiyo?
40013055	Oni taaniiye mutabani̱ wa mulandi̱ wa mbaau? Mali̱ya taniiye ni̱na wee kandi Yakobbo, Yojeefu̱, Si̱mooni̱ na Yu̱da taaniibo baana baani̱na wee?
40013056	Ti̱ na baani̱na wee boobukali̱ tabakuukalagha naatu hani? Ti̱ aahi̱ye haa bu̱toki̱ kukola bintu ebi byona?”
40013057	Du̱mbi̱ bantu aba baamubhenga. Bhaatu Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mulangi̱ baku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱yagha hanji hoona kuuyʼo mu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo na eka ewaabo.”
40013058	Ti̱ Yesu taakoli̱ye byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ eghi haabwa kutahi̱ki̱li̱ja kwa bantu aba.
40014001	Bwile obu Mukama Helude, aaghu̱wa makulu aghakwetʼo Yesu.
40014002	Aaghila abaamukoonelagha haa bukama buwe ati, “Oghu ni Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye naakola byakuswekani̱ya ebi byona.”
40014003	Nanga obu Yohaana aabaagha anaakaaye, Helude akalaghila baakwata Yohaana, baamuboha, baamuta mu nkomo haabwa Helu̱di̱ya kukibbala.
40014004	Aakola eki nanga Yohaana oghu kuukala naaghila Helude ati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, taki̱hi̱ki̱ye uwe kuswela Helu̱di̱ya mukaa wanjoko waawe Fi̱li̱po.”
40014005	Ti̱ Helude oghu aakalagha naabbala ngoku alaata Yohaana oghu, bhaatu oobaahagha bantu nanga bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku Yohaana ali mulangi̱.
40014006	Haa kilo kya kuusuka ku̱byaluwa kwa Helude, muhala wa Helu̱di̱ya aabi̱ni̱la baghenu̱ kusemeeye.
40014007	Kintu eki kyadheedha kwonini Helude, aalaghani̱ja naalahila kuha manaabukali̱ oghu eki alakasaba kyona.
40014008	Du̱mbi̱ manaabukali̱ oghu aaghenda, aabu̱u̱li̱ya ni̱na wee. Haanu̱ma ya ni̱na wee kumughambila eki akusaba, aasa aaghila ati, “Ompe endindi mutuwe ghwa Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ haa sahaani̱.”
40014009	Kintu eki kyasaalila Mukama Helude, bhaatu haabwa kusanguwa alahiiye mu maaso ghaa baghenu̱ be, aalaghila ati bahe manaabukali̱ oghu eki aasabi̱ye
40014010	du̱mbi̱ aalaghila baaghenda mu nkomo, baajombʼo Yohaana mutuwe.
40014011	Baaleetela haa sahaani̱ mutuwe ghwa Yohaana, baaghuha manaabukali̱ oghu, naye aaghuheeka, aaghutwalila ni̱na wee.
40014012	Obu beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana baaghu̱u̱ye, baasa baaheeka mu̱ku̱ ghuwe, baaghutwala, baaghujiika. Du̱mbi̱ baaghenda baaghambila Yesu.
40014013	Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye ebyabaayʼo Yohaana, aani̱i̱na bwati̱ mu ki̱bi̱so aaghenda mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali muntu atali. Obu bantu baamani̱ye, bantu bakaniiye kimui baalu̱gha mu maatau̱ni̱, baamukwama mbalubhatanga.
40014014	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye makalu̱gha ati mu bwati̱, aabona haa ki̱si̱yo kiigambi̱ kya bantu bakani̱ye, aabakwatiluwa kisa, aaki̱li̱ya balwaye baabo.
40014015	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo, baamughila bati, “Eni tuli mu elungu kandi bwile bulimaala. Olaghe bantu baghende, niikuwo bagubhe kweghulila byokuliya mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ haai-haai.”
40014016	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Tabakwetaaghisibuwa kughenda bbaa. Enu̱we mubahe byokuliya.”
40014017	Baamukuukamu bati, “Tuli na migaati̱ etaano na nsu̱i̱ ebili bhembei̱.”
40014018	Yesu aabaghila ati “Mubindeetele hani.”
40014019	Du̱mbi̱ aalaghila bantu ati basitame haa bu̱si̱ngo. Aakwata migaati̱ etaano eghi na nsu̱i̱ ebili esi, aalola eghulu, aasi̱i̱ma Luhanga haabwa byokuliya ebi. Aabheghanga migaati̱ eghi, aaghiha beeghesebuwa be, kubiha ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba.
40014020	Bantu aba boona baaliya, baakutila kimui. Beeghesebuwa be aba baakumaani̱ya bulaghalikuwa bwa byokuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo, baasu̱li̱ya bighegha eku̱mi̱ na bibili.
40014021	Ti̱ bantu abaaliiye bwile obu, bakaba bali haai basaasa nku̱mi̱ etaano, otabaliiyemu bakali̱ na baana.
40014022	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalaghila beeghesebuwa be bani̱i̱na bwati̱, bamuhikila kughenda luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja, eye aati̱ghala naalagha ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba.
40014023	Haanu̱ma ya kubalagha, aaghenda enkaha haa mwena kusaba. Bwahi̱ka lwagholo, anali haa mwena eghi enkaha.
40014024	Bhaatu bwati̱ bukaba mbwamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ka haagati ya nanja kandi bwahunga-hungagha haa nanja mighina neebuhuula haabwa mwegha ghwamaani̱ oghwalu̱ghagha hambali bukughenda.
40014025	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye mukilo handinga-ndi̱nga, Yesu aabeebinga naalubhatangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya nanja.
40014026	Bhaatu obu beeghesebuwa be baamuboone naalubhatangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya nanja, boobahila kimui, baatandika kutakangana boobahi̱ye bati, “Oghu ni mu̱li̱mu̱!”
40014027	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mutoobaha, muteekaane! Ni̱i̱syoni.”
40014028	Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama, olakaba aaniiwe weenini, ongambile niise hambali oli nindubhatangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya maasi.”
40014029	Yesu aamughila ati, “Wiise.” Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aalu̱gha mu bwati̱ aatandika kughenda hambali Yesu ali naalubhatangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya maasi.
40014030	Bhaatu obu Peetelo aaboone mwegha ghwamaani̱ nguhunga, oobaha aatandika kudhikila, aataka naaghila Yesu ati, “Mukama, onjune!”
40014031	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aahi̱dha mukono ghuwe aakwata Peetelo. Aamughila ati, “Uwe oghu oli na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukee, ekyaleki̱ye waghuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya nkiki?”
40014032	Yesu na Peetelo makani̱i̱na bati mu bwati̱, du̱mbi̱ mwegha ghwamaani̱ oghu ghwaleka.
40014033	Beeghesebuwa abaabaagha mu bwati̱ obu boona, baalami̱ya Yesu mbaghila bati, “Majima kuwo oli Mwana wa Luhanga.”
40014034	Baabhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja baaki̱dha mu kyalo kya Genesaleeti̱.
40014035	Ti̱ obu bantu bʼomu kyalo eki baamaniliiye Yesu, baalalangi̱ya makulu mu byalo ebilabhaane na Genesaleeti̱ eghi. Kandi bantu bakani̱ye baamuleetela balwaye baabo.
40014036	Baamwesengeleli̱ya bati hakili asi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye balwaye baabo baku̱me kati̱i̱ haa lughoye luwe. Ti̱ boona abaaku̱maghʼo baakilagha.
40015001	Niibuwo bamui mu Bafali̱saayo na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baalu̱ghi̱ye Yelusaalemu baasa hambali Yesu ali, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati,
40015002	“Beeghesebuwa baawe baku̱tu̱wagha mi̱ghendi̱yo eghi baataata baatu baatwegheeseei̱ye kukola nangaaki? Bakuliyagha batakadhu̱bhi̱ye kunaaba mu ngalo kwonini!”
40015003	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ti̱ enu̱we mu̱ku̱tu̱waagha bilaghilo bya Luhanga haabwa mi̱ghendi̱yo yaanu nangaaki?
40015004	Nanga Luhanga akaghila ati, ‘Ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe’ ti̱, ‘Weena oghu alakiinagha ese wee kedha ni̱na wee bamwitaghe.’
40015005	Bhaatu enu̱we mukughilagha muti takili kibhi muntu kughila ese wee kedha ni̱na wee ati, ‘Onganile bu̱kooneli̱ obu nangukuhaaye naamali̱ye kwelaghiisani̱ya kubuhaayo nga kisembo ewaa Luhanga.’
40015006	Obu mu̱ku̱bu̱ghagha mutiyo, mukubaagha ni̱mu̱dhi̱bi̱ya kighambo kya Luhanga haabwa mi̱ghendi̱yo yaanu.
40015007	Ngobi̱ya enu̱we! Mulangi̱ I̱saaya akahi̱ki̱ya kulanga naababu̱ghʼo ati:
40015008	“ ‘Bantu bani baku̱mpu̱ti̱yagha mu kanu̱wa kwonkaha, bhaatu mu mitima yabo tabampu̱ti̱i̱ye bbaa.
40015009	Baku̱bhi̱i̱yagha bwile bwabo kundami̱ya; nanga bakwegheesi̱yagha bilaghilo bya bantu kwonkaha.’ ”
40015010	Yesu aabilikila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo ati bamwebinge. Aabaghila ati, “Mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye kandi mwetegheeleli̱ye.
40015011	Ebikughendagha mu kanu̱wa kaa muntu taaliibiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱ya bbaa. Ebi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ni ebi̱ku̱lu̱gha mu kanu̱wa ke.”
40015012	Beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Omani̱ye ngoku eki waalu̱gha ku̱bu̱gha eki, kyasaaliiye Bafali̱saayo aba?”
40015013	Aabakuukamu ati, “Bu̱li̱ kilimuwa kyona eki Tita wʼomu Eghulu ataheli̱ye balikimeena kyona.
40015014	Bafali̱saayo aba mutabafuwayo, bali nga beebembeli̱ baaghaaye maaso, beebembeeye abaaghaaye maaso baanakyabo. Muntu oghu maaso ghaaghaaye, naanahikiiye muughali̱ wa maaso muunakiye, bombi bakwegenga mu ki̱i̱na.”
40015015	Peetelo aamughila ati, “Otusoboolole makulu ghaa lu̱si̱mo waahaaye.”
40015016	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Naanu tamwetegheleei̱ye dhee?
40015017	Tamuboone ngoku ebi muntu akuliyagha mu kanu̱wa ngoku bikumughendagha mu etundu, du̱mbi̱ bituwa mu mubili ghuwe?
40015018	Bhaatu ebi muntu aku̱bu̱ghagha mu kanu̱wa ke ni ebi̱mu̱lu̱ghi̱ye haa mutima byonini, niibiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ewaa Luhanga.
40015019	Nanga haa mutima ghwa muntu niiyo aku̱lu̱ghagha byeli̱li̱kano bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, kwita, bu̱syani̱ bwa bantu abataswelangaane, busuma, bisubha, kuhabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya.
40015020	Ebi niibiyo bi̱ku̱bhi̱i̱yagha muntu ewaa Luhanga, bhaatu kuliya otanaabi̱ye mu ngalo taki̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ewaa Luhanga.”
40015021	Niibuwo Yesu aalu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, aaghenda mu kyalo ekilabhaane na maatau̱ni̱ Ti̱lo na Si̱dooni̱.
40015022	Mukali̱ Munakanaani̱ oghu akaba akaaye mu kyalo eki, aasa naagugangana, aaghila Yesu ati, “Mukama, Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, ongilile kisa! Muhala wanje ki̱li̱mu̱ kimukwete kandi niibuwo kyamubona-boneli̱ya kimui kwonini.”
40015023	Bhaatu Yesu ataamukuukamu na kantu. Mukali̱ oghu aakala anabakwamiliiye kandi naanagugangana, niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baasi̱ye baamughila bati, “Oghile mukali̱ oghu aghende, aatubulisani̱ya kuukala naatutokeelela.”
40015024	Yesu aaghila mukali̱ oghu ati, “Nkatumuwa kukoonela Banai̱saaleeli̱ abali ntaama sya Luhanga esi̱bu̱li̱ye.”
40015025	Bhaatu mukali̱ oghu aasa, eebinga Yesu, aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu, aamughila ati, “Gutu, Mukama onkoonele!”
40015026	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Taki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukwata byokuliya bya baana kubikubila mbuwa.”
40015027	Mukali̱ oghu aamughila ati, “Agha ni majima Mukama wanje, bhaatu mbuwa nasiyo sikuliyagha bu̱u̱kou̱ obukulaghalagha ku̱lu̱gha haa meeja sya bakama baasiyo.”
40015028	Yesu aamughila ati, “Mukali̱ uwe oli na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwamaani̱! Eki waasabi̱ye niikuwo kikukukoleluwa.” Bwile obu bwonini muhala wa mukali̱ oghu aakililʼo.
40015029	Yesu aalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, aaghenda haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja ya Galilaaya. Aani̱i̱na haa keena aasitama hansi.
40015030	Bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu bakaniiye kimui, baamuleetela bantu abalamaaye, abaaghaaye maaso, abakwekulumuulila hansi, abaaghaaye kanu̱wa na balema baa milingo yoona. Baabalangaali̱ya mu maghulu ghe, aabaki̱li̱ya boona.
40015031	Bantu aba baasweka kubona abaaghaaye kanu̱wa mbabu̱gha, abeekuluulilagha hansi baki̱li̱ye, balema mbalubhatanga kandi abaaghaaye maaso mbabona. Ti̱ baasinda Luhanga wa I̱saaleeli̱.
40015032	Niibuwo Yesu aabilikiiye beeghesebuwa be aabaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye nkwatiluuwe bantu aba kisa, baamali̱ye nanje hani bilo bisatu kandi byokuliya byabahweleeye. Tambbali̱ye kubalagha kughenda batiyo njala, nanga basalikila mu kihanda.”
40015033	Beeghesebuwa be baamukuukamu bati, “Mu elungu eni tukugubha kuuya haa byokuliya bikumala ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu kiinamu̱li̱to eki kyona?”
40015034	Yesu aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Muli na migaati̱ eti̱ya?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Musanju̱ hamui na nsu̱i̱ sikee sinabwana-bwana.”
