40015035	Yesu aaghambila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba kusitama hansi.
40015036	Aakwata migaati̱ musanju̱ eghi hamui na nsu̱i̱ esi, obu aamali̱ye ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga, aabheghanga migaati̱ eghi, aaghiha beeghesebuwa be hamui na nsu̱i̱ esi, kandi nabo baabitambu̱li̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba.
40015037	Bantu aba boona baaliya, baakutila kimui. Obu baamali̱ye kuliya, beeghesebuwa be baakumaani̱ya bulaghalikuwa bwa byokuliya bwati̱ghaayʼo, baasu̱li̱ya bighegha biinamu̱li̱to musanju̱.
40015038	Bantu boona abaaliiye byokuliya kilo eki bakaba bali bantu nku̱mi̱ enaa, otabaliiyemu bakali̱ na baana.
40015039	Haanu̱ma ya Yesu kulagha ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ aabhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja, aaki̱dha haa ki̱si̱yo ekilabhaane na tau̱ni̱ ya Magadaani.
40016001	Kilo kimui Bafali̱saayo na Basadukaayo baasa hambali Yesu ali kumulengesa, baamughila bati abakolele kyakuswekani̱ya niikuwo bamanye Luhanga alakaba amu̱tu̱mi̱ye.
40016002	Aabakuukamu ati, “Lwagholo mukaakubonagha eghulu lili limutuku, mukughilagha muti, ‘Munkiya bwile bukukiya kusemeeye.’
40016003	Kandi nkyambisi eghulu likaakubaagha limutuku kandi kili ki̱i̱bhu̱ndu̱, mukughilagha muti, ‘Obwalo mbu̱la ekutoona.’ Mumani̱ye kuteebeleja ebikuba mu mwanya eghulu, bhaatu tamukugubha kusoboolola makulu ghaa bikuboneka bya bilo bini ebikwete kubʼo.
40016004	Bhaatu mujo ghwa bantu babhi kandi batali beesighibuwa bakuukalagha mbabbala kubakolela kyakuswekani̱ya. Bhaatu taaliyo kyakuswekani̱ya kyona ekikubakoleluwa, kuuyʼo kya Yona.” Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalu̱ghʼo bantu aba, aaghenda.
40016005	Obu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baabhasu̱ki̱ye mbaaki̱dha luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja, baamanya ngoku baabuluuwe kuleeta ntanda ya migaati̱.
40016006	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mwelinde ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kya Bafali̱saayo na Basadukaayo.”
40016007	Bo baatandika kuhanuula bonkaha na bonkaha mbaghila bati, “Akwete ku̱bu̱gha atiyo nanga amani̱ye ngoku tutaaleeti̱ye migaati̱.”
40016008	Bhaatu aamanya ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha. Aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we abali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukee, eki̱leki̱ye nimuhanuula muti tamwaleeti̱ye migaati̱ nkiki?
40016009	Ku̱hi̱ki̱ya na endindi tamu̱keetegheleei̱ye? Tamu̱u̱su̱ki̱ye ngoku naali̱i̱si̱i̱ye bantu nku̱mi̱ etaano ni̱nkoleesi̱ya migaati̱ etaano yonkaha? Ti̱ mukakumaani̱ya bighegha bi̱ti̱ya bya byokuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo?
40016010	Kandi obu naali̱i̱si̱i̱ye bantu nku̱mi̱ enaa ni̱nkoleesi̱ya migaati̱ musanju̱ yonkaha, mukakumaani̱ya bighegha bi̱ti̱ya bya byokuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo?
40016011	Nkiki ki̱leki̱ye mutakenga ngoku ntakwete ku̱bu̱gha naanu haa bikwetʼo migaati̱? Mwelinde ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kya Bafali̱saayo na Basadukaayo.”
40016012	Niibuwo baakengi̱ye ngoku atakwete kubaghambila kwelinda ki̱tu̱mbi̱so bakutaagha mu migaati̱, bhaatu kwelinda njegheesi̱ya ya Bafali̱saayo na Basadukaayo.
40016013	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye mu kyalo kya Kai̱saali̱ya Fi̱li̱pi̱, aabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwana wa Muntu, bantu bakumughilaghamu ani̱?”
40016014	Baamukuukamu bati, “Banji bakughilagha bati nuuwe Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱, banji bati nuuwe mulangi̱ Eli̱ya, na banji bati nuuwe mulangi̱ Yelemi̱ya kedha omui mu balangi̱ bʼambele.”
40016015	Ababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ti̱ enu̱we mukungilaghamu ani̱?”
40016016	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Nuuwe Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
40016017	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Oli na mu̱gi̱sa Si̱mooni̱ mutabani̱ wa Yona, nanga eki muntu taaliiye aaleki̱ye waakimanya bbaa, bhaatu Tita wʼomu eghulu niiye aaleki̱ye waakimanya.
40016018	Nahabweki li̱i̱na lyawe nuuwe Peetelo (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya ebaale). Haa ebaale haala nkukwelʼo musingi ghwa ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja banje boona. Kandi eku̱li̱mu̱ teelibasi̱ngu̱la.
40016019	Nkukuha bi̱su̱mu̱li̱jo bya bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu, kyona eki okuughala munsi kikuughaluwa mu eghulu, kandi kyona eki okuughula munsi kikuughuluwa mu eghulu.”
40016020	Niibuwo eekonkomeleeye beeghesebuwa be ati bataghambila muntu nʼomui ngoku aliiye Ki̱li̱si̱to.
40016021	Kutandikila haa bwile obu, Yesu aatandika kughambila beeghesebuwa be ngoku akulaghiluwa kughenda Yelusaalemu kandi kubona-bona bintu bikani̱ye. Akubhenguwa bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Akwitibuwa, bhaatu haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.
40016022	Niibuwo Peetelo aamutwete haakpengbu̱, aatandika kumusoghosa naaghila ati, “Mukama, otatodha ku̱bu̱gha otiyo, eki takibhonganuuwe kukubʼo bbaa!”
40016023	Yesu eegaali̱ya aalola Peetelo aamughila ati, “Uwe Si̱taani̱ ondu̱ghʼo! Okwete kuntanga kukola ebi Luhanga abbali̱ye ati nkole. Ebi okwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi tabili byeli̱li̱kano bya Luhanga, ni bya bantu kwonkaha.”
40016024	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Muntu weena naanabbali̱ye kunkwama, akulaghiluwa kuleka kwelema, aheeke musalaba ghuwe kandi ankwame.
40016025	Weena oghu akukukutila bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe, akubufweluwa, bhaatu oghu akubuhaayo haabwanje, akubutunga.
40016026	Buuye, kikughasila ki muntu kutunga nsi eni yoona, kusa afeeluwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe? Kedha nkiki eki muntu anguhayo niikuwo agubhe kutodha ku̱ku̱u̱ki̱yʼo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe?
40016027	Nanga Mwana wa Muntu akughenda kwisa mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Ese wee ali hamui na baamalai̱ka be, kandi aliha bu̱li̱ muntu mpeela kusighikila haa ebi aakoli̱ye.
40016028	Mbaghambiiye majima, bamui mu enu̱we abali hani endindi, tabaku̱ku̱wa ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baboone Mwana wa Muntu naasa mu bu̱lemi̱ buwe.”
40017001	Haanu̱ma ya bilo mukaagha, Yesu aaghenda na Peetelo hamui na baani̱na emui babili Yakobbo na Yohaana, aabatwala haa mwena ghukangami̱ye, aakalayo nabo bonkaha.
40017002	Basaasa aba banaloli̱ye, kususa kwa Yesu kwahinduluwa. Haali̱i̱so yee aatandika kubbebbeniya nga musana, kandi ngoye esi alu̱wete syelela kimui dhiyo nga kyeleeli̱.
40017003	Du̱mbi̱ baabona balangi̱ baa hambele, Musa na Eli̱ya, mbaaboneka kandi mbabu̱gha na Yesu.
40017004	Peetelo aaghila Yesu ati, “Mukama, kyabaaye kilungi etu̱we twaba hani! Nuwaabaaye obbali̱ye, oleke nkwele hani bunumba busatu, kamui kaawe, kamui kaa Musa, na kamui kaa Eli̱ya.”
40017005	Peetelo naanabu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ kicu kibbeneeye kimui kyasa kyabaswi̱ki̱la boona. Elaka lyalu̱gha mu kicu eki lyaghila liti, “Oghu niiye Mwana wanje oghu nku̱ndi̱ye, oghu needheedheeu̱we; mu̱mu̱u̱ghu̱we!”
40017006	Beeghesebuwa aba makaaghu̱wa bati bighambo ebi, du̱mbi̱ beetu̱li̱ka haali̱i̱so yabo haaku̱ma hansi haabwa kwobaha.
40017007	Yesu aasa hambali bali, aabaku̱mʼo aabaghila ati, “Muumuke, muleke kwobaha.”
40017008	Beeghesebuwa aba obu baatodhi̱ye kulola, bataabonʼo Musa na Eli̱ya, baabona Yesu enkaha.
40017009	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be basatu aba baanakotagha ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, aabaghila ati, “Ebi mwaboone haa mwena mutabighambila muntu nʼomui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Mwana wa Muntu alaku̱wa kandi naahu̱mbu̱u̱ka.”
40017010	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be aba baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Nkiki kikulekagha beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baghila bati Eli̱ya niiye aku̱du̱bha kwisa?”
40017011	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Majima Eli̱ya niiye aku̱du̱bha kwisa kuteekani̱ja bintu byona.
40017012	Bhaatu nkubbala kubaghambila nti, Eli̱ya akamala kwisa, bhaatu bantu bataamumaniliila. Baamukolʼo bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi bakabbali̱ye, kandi niikuwo bakakubona-boni̱ya batiyo dhee Mwana wa Muntu.”
40017013	Du̱mbi̱ beeghesebuwa be aba baamanya ngoku akwete ku̱bu̱ghʼo Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱.
40017014	Yesu na beeghesebuwa makaki̱dha bati mu nti̱na ya mwena oghu, baasangʼo kiigambi̱ kya bantu bakani̱ye. Musaasa omui mu kiigambi̱ eki, aasa aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu, aaghila Yesu ati,
40017015	“Mukama wanje, gutu oghilile kisa mutabani̱ wanje oni. Ki̱li̱mu̱ kikuukalagha nkimukwata kandi kikumubona-boni̱yagha kwonini. Kyamu̱gengi̱ye milundi ekani̱ye mu mulilo na mu maasi.
40017016	Naamuleeteeye beeghesebuwa baawe, baasaaghuwa ku̱mu̱ki̱li̱ya.”
40017017	Yesu aaghila ati, “Ai̱ enu̱we, bantu bateesi̱ghi̱ye kwonini Luhanga kandi bahabi̱ye! Nkuukala naanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya dhi̱? Ti̱ nkubagu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa? Mundeetele hani mutabhana oghu.”
40017018	Baamuleetela ye, du̱mbi̱ Yesu aatanuka ki̱li̱mu̱ ekyabaagha kikwete mutabhana oghu, kandi kyamu̱lu̱ghʼo. Ti̱ mutabhana oghu aakililʼo.
40017019	Haanu̱ma ya ebi, beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya mu ki̱bi̱so bati, “Ekyaleki̱ye ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyatusaagha kubhinga nkiki?”
40017020	Aabakuukamu ati, “Nanga tamuli na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukani̱ye. Mbaghambiiye majima, nimwabaaye na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwengaane na kasigho kati̱i̱ kaa kalatu̱u̱si̱, mukugubha kughila mwena oghu muti, ‘Olu̱ghe hani, oghende hali̱’ kandi ghu̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo. Ti̱ taaliyo ekikubasaagha kukola bbaa.” [
40017021	Bhaatu ki̱li̱mu̱ ngʼeki, kusaba Luhanga na ku̱si̱i̱ba niibiyo bikukibhingagha.]
40017022	Bwile bumui obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baabaagha hamui e Galilaaya, aabaghila ati, “Mwana wa Muntu, bakughenda ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, bakumuhaayo mu ngi̱ghu̱ siye,
40017023	bakumwita, bhaatu haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.” Ti̱ obu beeghesebuwa be baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baatuntulila kimui.
40017024	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱, abaakumaani̱yagha musolo ghwa Numba ya Luhanga, baasa baabu̱u̱li̱ya Peetelo bati, “Buuye mwegheesi̱ya waanu oghu, akuhaagha musolo ghwa Numba ya Luhanga?”
40017025	Peetelo aabakuukamu ati, “Ee, akughuhaagha.” Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aaghenda, aataaha mu numba hambali Yesu ali. Makataahamu ati, atakabu̱ghi̱ye na kantu koona, Yesu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Peetelo okweli̱li̱kana oti̱ya? Bakama bakughilagha bati baana baabo boonini bahe musolo kedha bantu banji aba balemi̱ aba balemi̱ye?”
40017026	Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Bakughilagha bantu banji aba ebo balemi̱ye bati aliibo baaghuha.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Majima baana baabo boonini bali na bughabe kutaghuha.
40017027	Bhaatu tatubbali̱ye kusaali̱ja bantu aba. Nahabweki oghende haa nanja okoti̱ye ndobhaani̱ yaawe mu nanja. Nsu̱i̱ eghi oku̱du̱bha kulobamu, oghilole mu kanu̱wa okusangamu mukwenge oghukumala kusasula misolo yaatu bombi. Obatwalile ghuwo, osasule musolo ghwanje na oghwawe.”
40018001	Haa bwile obu, beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baamwisʼo, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Ni ani̱ mukulu mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu?”
40018002	Yesu aabilikila mwana aamwisʼo kandi aamwemi̱li̱li̱ya haagati yabo.
40018003	Aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, mutaahinduuye mitwalikani̱i̱ye yaanu kandi mufooka nga baana bato, tamukuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40018004	Nahabweki weena oghu akufooka mu̱dhooti̱ nga mwana muto ngʼoni, niiye akuba mukulu mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40018005	“Ti̱ weena oghu akubhasila mwana ngʼoni haabwanje, ni̱i̱si̱ye aliba abhasiiye.
40018006	Muntu weena nahabi̱i̱si̱i̱ye omui mu bantu abanali bato mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye kuleka naasi̱i̱sa, alitunga kifubilo kyamaani̱. Alyehi̱su̱ki̱ya ati hakili nguli baamu̱bohi̱ye ki̱ti̱bo mu bikiya bakiboha haa kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to, bamukuba mu nanja hambali hatobheleeye kimui.
40018007	“Nsi ngelikibona haabwa bintu ebikubʼo ebikuleka bantu mbasi̱i̱sa. Bintu ebi bikulaghiluwa kubʼo, bhaatu ngalikibona oghu akubileeta.
40018008	Mukono ghwawe kedha kughulu kwawe mbyakuhaaghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa obijombʼo! Ni kilungi kughenda mu eghulu olamaaye kusaali̱ya kukukuba mu mulilo ghutahuwʼo oli na mikono ebili kedha maghulu abili.
40018009	Kandi li̱i̱so lyawe ndyakuhaaghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa oliiyemu, olikube eli̱. Nkilungi kutaaha mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ oli na li̱i̱so limui kusaali̱ya kukukuba mu mulilo ghwa Gehena oli na maaso abili.
40018010	“Mulole ngu tamwaghai̱ye nʼomui haa baana bato bani. Nkubbala kughambila enu̱we nti, baamalai̱ka baabo ababali̱ndi̱ye abali mu eghulu, bwile bwona bakuukalagha mbaasa ewaa Tita wʼomu eghulu. [
40018011	Ti̱ Mwana wa Muntu ekyaleki̱ye aasa munsi ni kujuna bantu ababu̱li̱ye.”]
40018012	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be ati, “Buuye muntu naabaaye ali na ntaama siye ki̱ku̱mi̱, ti̱ emui emubuliilila, taaku̱ti̱gha si̱li̱ kyenda na mwenda hambali sili, aghende abbale emui eghi yaabu̱li̱ye?
40018013	Mbaghambiiye majima, naaghiboone akudheedhuwa haabwa ntaama eghi kusaali̱ya kyenda na mwenda esitaabu̱li̱ye!
40018014	Niikiyo kimui dhee, Tita wʼomu eghulu taabbali̱ye nankabha omui mu banali bato bani kuhwelekeelela.”
40018015	“Kaakuba mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja muunakyawe aku̱sobeeleli̱ya, omughendʼo mu ki̱bi̱so, omughambile eki aaku̱sobeleei̱ye. Naanasi̱i̱mi̱ye ku̱ku̱tegheeleli̱ya kandi aatula ngoku aaku̱sobeleei̱ye, okuba otodhi̱ye ku̱mweku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya nga muunakyawe.
40018016	Bhaatu naabhengi̱ye ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ebi oku̱bu̱gha, otodhe oghende yo na muntu onji omui kedha babili, nanga ‘bu̱li̱ musango ghukulaghiluwa kuba na baakai̱so babili kedha basatu.’
40018017	Muntu oghu naanakaaye anabhengi̱ye ebi oku̱bu̱gha, oghende obu̱ghe mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona eki muunakyawe oghu aaku̱sobeleei̱ye. Ti̱ naanabhengi̱ye eki ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba baatu̱u̱yemu, mumutwalikani̱ye nga muntu atali Mu̱yu̱daaya kandi mukumaani̱ya wa musolo.
40018018	“Mbaghambiiye majima, kyona eki mulatu̱waghamu muti abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye babhonganuuwe kukola kedha kutakola munsi muni, Luhanga mu eghulu aku̱ki̱gu̱mi̱ya dhee ati ki̱hi̱ki̱ye.
40018019	Kandi mbaghambiiye majima, babili mu enu̱we nimwanaaghu̱wane haa kintu mukwete kusaba, Tita wʼomu eghulu akubakolela kiyo.
40018020	Ti̱ hambali bakwami̱li̱li̱ banje babili kedha basatu baleekumaani̱li̱yagha haabwanje, nanje ndabaaghʼo hamui nabo.”
40018021	Niibuwo Peetelo aasi̱ye hambali Yesu ali, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama, muunakyanje naaneeyongeeye ku̱nsobeeleli̱ya nibhonganuuwe kumughanila milundi eti̱ya? Milundi musanju̱?”
40018022	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Bbaa, teeli milundi musanju̱ yonkaha, bhaatu nsanju̱ milundi musanju̱.”
40018023	“Ndimabaghambila nti, mukulaghiluwa kughanilangana mutiyo, nanga bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu nkubulengeesani̱ya na mukama oghu akatu̱wamu kubilikila baheeleli̱ya be bakulu kumughambila ngoku bakumusasula sente siye beeholeei̱ye.”
40018024	Obu aanatandikagha kukola eki, baamuleetela omui mu baheeleli̱ya be aba, oghu aabaagha eeholeei̱ye mi̱li̱yooni̱ ekaniiye kimui ya sente.
40018025	Nangoku atangu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kusasula sente esi, mukama wee oghu aalaghila ati baghu̱li̱ye mu̱heeleli̱ya mukulu oghu na mukali̱ wee na baana be, hamui nʼebi aabaagha nabiyo byona, niikuwo agubhe kusasula ebanja eli.
40018026	“Bhaatu mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu obu aaghu̱u̱ye atiyo, aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa mukama oghu, aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, ‘Gutu, ongu̱mi̱si̱li̱je, nkukusasula siyo syona’
40018027	Du̱mbi̱ mukama wee oghu aakwatiluwa mu̱heeleli̱ya wee oghu kisa, aamughanila ebanja eli, kandi aalaghila ati bamulekele.”
40018028	“Bhaatu obu musaasa oghu aalu̱ghi̱ye hambali mukama wee oghu ali, aaghenda ewaa mu̱heeleli̱ya muunakiye oghu eye aabaagha eeholeei̱ye sente sikee munu. Akaba makabona ati mu̱heeleli̱ya muunakiye oghu, aamughwilikiilila na ki̱ku̱bha, aamu̱ni̱gha bikiya naaghila ati, ‘Okunsasula sente syanje obwalo!’
40018029	“Mu̱heeleli̱ya muunakiye oghu aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu naamwesengeleli̱ya ati, ‘Gutu ongu̱mi̱si̱li̱je, nkukusasula siyo.’
40018030	“Bhaatu muunakiye oghu aamutongi̱yagha aabhenga kulindʼo. Anyegheelela muunakiye oghu baamukwata baamuta mu nkomo, ati aakalemu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya asasuuye ebanja liye lyona.
40018031	“Obu baheeleli̱ya baanakyabo baaboone eki, baatamuwa kwonini. Baaghenda ewaa mukama wabo oghu baamughambila byona ebyabaayʼo.”
40018032	“Niibuwo mukama oghu aabilikiiye mu̱heeleli̱ya wee aaghaniiye oghu, aamughila ati, ‘Uwe mu̱heeleli̱ya mubhi! Nkakughanila ebanja likaniiye kimui eli lyona nanga uwe ku̱neesengeleli̱ya oti nkughanile.
40018033	Naawe toobhonganuuwe kughilila mu̱heeleli̱ya muunakyawe kisa ngoku nanje naakughiliiye kiyo?’
40018034	Mukama oghu aakwatuwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha, du̱mbi̱ aalaghila ati bakwate musaasa oghu bamute mu nkomo kandi bamubona-boneli̱ye kimui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya asasuuye ebanja liye lyona.
40018035	“Niikuwo Tita wʼomu eghulu alikola atiyo enu̱we kaakuba mubhenga kughanila baanakyanu muuhiiye haa mutima.”
40019001	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kwegheesi̱ya bantu, aalu̱gha e Galilaaya, aaghenda bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱ mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya.
40019002	Biigambi̱ bikaniiye kimui bya bantu baamukwama yo, ti̱ aaki̱li̱ya balwaye abaabaagha mu biigambi̱ ebi.
40019003	Niibuwo bamui mu Bafali̱saayo baasi̱ye hambali ali kumulengesa. Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye musaasa kubhinga mukali̱ wee haabwa nsonga yoona?”
40019004	Aabakuukamu ati, “Enu̱we tamukasomagha Ekyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we? Haliyo hambali kili ngu ku̱lu̱gha mu kuhanguwa kwa nsi, Luhanga ‘akahanga musaasa na mukali̱.’
40019005	‘Eki niikiyo kilalekagha musaasa alekaghe ese wee na ni̱na wee, eebohelʼo mukali̱ wee, ti̱ babe muntu omui.’
40019006	Nanga bakuba batakyali bantu babili, bhaatu bali muntu omui. Nahabweki aba Luhanga alungani̱i̱ye mu buswele atabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akuleka mbalekangana.”
40019007	Niibuwo Bafali̱saayo aba baatodhi̱ye baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Ti̱ buuye ekyaleki̱ye Musa aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya musaasa kuhaagha mukali̱ wee bbaluwa ya kumubhinga abaaghe naamubhinga nkiki?”
40019008	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Kwomakakana kwa mitima yaanu niikuwo kwaleki̱ye Musa aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya musaasa kubhinga mukali̱ wee. Bhaatu eki taaliikiyo Luhanga aabaagha ategheki̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa kuhanguwa kwa nsi.
40019009	Nkubbala kubaghambila kini nti, musaasa naabhi̱ngi̱ye mukali̱ wee, aswela onji, akuba asyane, kuuyʼo amu̱bhi̱ngi̱ye haabwa mukali̱ oghu kuba mu̱syani̱.”
40019010	Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baamughila bati, “Bilaba bili bitiyo, nkilungi muntu kutaswela!”
40019011	Aabaghila ati, “Tabali boona abaku̱si̱i̱magha ebi naabu̱ghi̱ye ebi, kuuyʼo aba Luhanga akukoonelagha.
40019012	Bamui mu bantu tabakuswelagha nanga bakubyaluwagha badhooti̱ye mu̱ghelu̱, banji haabwa ngi̱ghu̱ syabo kubaleeteleja kudhoota mu̱ghelu̱, banji baku̱tu̱waghamu kutaswela niikuwo bagubhe ku̱heeleli̱ya kusemeeye mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu. Oleke oghu akugubha ku̱si̱i̱ma ebi neegheeseei̱ye ebi, abi̱si̱i̱me.”
40019013	Kilo kimui bamui mu bantu baaleetela Yesu baana baabo bati abaku̱mʼo kandi abasabile. Bhaatu beeghesebuwa be baatanuka bantu aba bati baleke kumutalibani̱ja.
40019014	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Muleke baana aba banjisʼo, mutabatanga, nanga abali nga baana bani niibo bali mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.”
40019015	Yesu aabatʼo mikono yee kubaha mu̱gi̱sa, du̱mbi̱ aalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki.
40019016	Bwile bumui musaasa aasa hambali Yesu ali aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, nkilungi ki mbhonganuuwe kukola niikuwo ntunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo?”
40019017	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Nkiki ki̱leki̱ye noobu̱u̱li̱ya si̱ye haa kilungi? Mulungi ni Omui enkaha. Bhaatu nuwaabbali̱ye kutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, okwate bilaghilo.”
40019018	Musaasa oghu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Ni bilaghilo byahaa?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “ ‘Otaliita, otali̱syana, otaliibha, otalihabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya muunakyawe.
40019019	Ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe,’ kandi ‘okundaghe muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini.’ ”
40019020	Mutabhana oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Ebi byona nkabikwata kwonini. Buuye ni kintu ki kinji eki mbhonganuuwe kukola?”
40019021	Yesu aamughila ati, “Nuwaabbali̱ye kuba muntu oghu atali na kamogo koona mu maaso ghaa Luhanga, oghende oghu̱li̱ye ebi oli nabiyo byona, sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu osihe banaku, okutunga buguudha bukani̱ye mu eghulu. Du̱mbi̱ wiise onkwame.”
40019022	Bhaatu obu mutabhana oghu aaghu̱u̱ye eki, aaghenda asaaluuwe nanga akaba atungiiye kimui.
40019023	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, kitimbiikilaane kimui muguudha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu.
40019024	Nkutodha kubaghambila nti, kidhooteeye kimui ngamila kusaalila mu kahulu kaa nkinjo, kusaali̱ya muguudha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga!”
40019025	Beeghesebuwa be baaswekela kimui, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye, ni ani̱ akugubha kujunuwa?”
40019026	Yesu aabalola, aabaghila ati, “Bantu tabakugubha kukola eki, bhaatu Luhanga akugubha kukola bu̱li̱ kintu kyona.”
40019027	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Ebyatu byona tukabi̱ti̱gha, twakukwama. Buuye tulitunga ki?”
40019028	Yesu aakuukamu ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima Luhanga akughenda kuhindula bintu byona buhyaka. Bwile Mwana wa Muntu akusitama haa ntebe yee ya bukama ya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱, enu̱we abankwamiliiye, naanu dhee bu̱li̱ omui alisitama haa ntebe ya bukama mu ntebe eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya bukama ni̱mu̱twi̱la musango ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya I̱saaleeli̱.
40019029	Ti̱ muntu weena naati̱ghi̱ye ka yee, baana baani̱nawee boobukali̱ na baabusaasa, ese wee, ni̱na wee, kedha baana be kedha bibanja biye haabwanje, muntu oghu akutunga ngʼebi aati̱ghi̱ye ebi byona milundi ki̱ku̱mi̱ kandi atunge dhee bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
40019030	Bhaatu bakani̱ye aba bantu bahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ endindi baliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kikee, na bakani̱ye aba bantu baghai̱ye endindi balitunga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.”
40020001	Yesu eeyongela kughila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli ngoku mukama wa musili aakeeleeye kughenda kubbala bakoli̱ abakukola mu musili ghuwe ghwa mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱.
40020002	Aaghu̱wana nabo kubasasula bu̱li̱ omui sente esi bakusasulagha mu̱koli̱ haabwa kilo kimui, du̱mbi̱ aabasindika mu musili.
40020003	“Bwile nga bwa saaha esatu haala, aaghenda aasanga banji baamiliiye mu katale batali na kyakukola.
40020004	Aabaghila ati, ‘Naanu mughende mukole mu musili ghwanje ghwa mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, nkubasasula sente syona esibabhongaanuuwe.’ ”
40020005	Du̱mbi̱ baaghenda. “Aatodha aaghenda mu katale saaha mukaagha na saaha mwenda, naanasindika bantu mu musili oghu.
40020006	Saaha eku̱mi̱ nʼemui aaghendayo dhee, aasanga banji nabo baamiliiye batali na kyakukola. Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, ‘Ekyaleki̱ye mutaakola mulimo ghwona obwalo nkiki?’
40020007	“Baamukuukamu bati, ‘Nanga muntu taatuhaaye mulimo.’ “Aabaghila ati, ‘Naanu dhee mughende mukole mu musili ghwanje ghwa mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱.’
40020008	“Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, mukama wa musili oghu aaghila mukulu wa bakoli̱ be ati, ‘Obilikile bakoli̱ aba obasasule musaala ghwabo, otandike nʼabaamaliliiye kwisa, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa baadu̱bhi̱ye kwisa.’
40020009	“Bakoli̱ abaatandi̱ki̱ye saaha eku̱mi̱ nʼemui kukola baasa, bu̱li̱ omui mukama wa musili oghu aamuha sente esi bakusasulagha mu̱koli̱ haabwa kilo kimui.
40020010	Nahabweki, obu baabilikiiye abaadu̱bhi̱ye kwisa mu musili omu, baasa bamani̱ye bati bo akubaha sisaayʼo. Bhaatu bakabona bu̱li̱ omui mbamuha sente esi bakusasulagha mu̱koli̱ haabwa kilo kimui.
40020011	Obu baabahaaye sente esi baasaalililuwa mukama wa musili oghu, baatandika kumusoghosa bati,
40020012	‘Kusa bani abaasi̱ye enu̱ma baakoli̱ye saaha emui yonkaha, ti̱ waabaha syengaane nʼesyatu, kuni etu̱we twakoli̱ye kilo kyona, kandi twakolela mu musana ghwamaani̱!’ ”
40020013	“Bhaatu eye aakuukamu omui mu ebo ati, ‘Bhootu̱ syanje, ngantaku̱koli̱ye kubhi! Tatwalaghaane bu̱li̱ omui kumusasula sente esi bakusasulagha mu̱koli̱ haabwa kilo kimui?
40020014	Twala musaala ghwawe oghende; naakibbali̱ye kusasula wʼokumaliilila nga esi naakusasuuye.
40020015	Buuye tanibhonganuuwe ku̱koleesi̱ya sente syanje ngoku mbbali̱ye? Uwe kikusaaliiye si̱ye kuba mwenge haa bakoli̱ baanakyawe?’ ”
40020016	Yesu aamaliilila naaghila ati, “Bakani̱ye aba bantu bahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ endindi baliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kikee, na bakani̱ye aba bantu baghai̱ye endindi balitunga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.”
40020017	Obu Yesu hamui na beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili baanakomagha kughenda Yelusaalemu, aatodha aabatwala haakpengbu̱ kubaghambila ebikumubʼo. Aabaghila ati,
40020018	“Tulimakoma kughenda Yelusaalemu hambali baku̱ghobeli̱ya Mwana wa Muntu. Bamuheyo mu bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Bantu aba baku̱mu̱twi̱la musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa.
40020019	Bamuheyo mu balemi̱ batali Bayu̱daaya, abakumuwawaani̱ya, bamuhuule bibbooko, kandi bamubambe haa musalaba. Bhaatu haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke!”
40020020	Niibuwo ni̱na Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo aasi̱ye hamui nabo hambali Yesu ali. Mukali̱ oghu aahi̱ka aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu amwesengeleli̱ya ati amukolele eki akubbala.
40020021	Yesu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Okubbala ki?” Mukali̱ oghu aakuukamu ati, “Obu oliisa mu bukama bwawe, oleke batabani̱ banje babili bani basitame haai-haai naawe, omui haa luhande lwa mukono ghwawe ghwabuliyo, nʼonji haa lwabumesu.”
40020022	Yesu aakuukamu beeghesebuwa be babili aba ati, “Eki mukwete kusaba tamukimani̱ye. Buuye mukugubha kubona-bona ngoku nkughenda kubona-bona?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Ee, tukugubha.”
40020023	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mukubona-bona ngoku nkubona-bona, bhaatu taali̱i̱si̱ye ndi na bu̱toki̱ bwa kukoma abakusitama haai-haai nanje haa luhande lwabuliyo kedha lwabumesu. Bi̱i̱kalo ebi ni bya bantu aba Tita Luhanga eenini aabiteekani̱li̱i̱ye.”
40020024	Obu baanakyabo eku̱mi̱ baaghu̱u̱ye eki, baasaalililuwa banaani̱na emui babili aba.
40020025	Niibuwo Yesu aabilikiiye beeghesebuwa be boona hamui, aabaghila ati, “Mumani̱ye ngoku balemi̱ baa batali Bayu̱daaya bakulemagha bantu baabo kubhi-kubhi, kandi naabasaaye balemi̱ aba bu̱toki̱ bakulaghilagha bantu na bu̱toki̱ busaalukaane.
40020026	Bhaatu enu̱we mutaba mutiyo. Oghu akubbala kuba mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ waanu, abe mu̱heeleli̱ya waanu.
40020027	Kandi weena oghu akubbala kubabaamu wʼoku̱du̱bha, abhonganuuwe abe mu̱heeleli̱ya waanu.
40020028	Nankabha si̱ye, Mwana wa Muntu, tanaasi̱ye bantu ku̱mpeeleli̱ya; nkaasa ku̱heeleli̱ya kandi kuhaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje kuba nsasu̱li̱ ya kucungula bantu bakani̱ye.”
40020029	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱ghagha Yeli̱ko, kiigambi̱ kya bantu bakani̱ye kyabakwama.
40020030	Basaasa babili baaghaaye maaso bakaba basitami̱ye haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe. Ti̱ obu baaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu niibuwo aasaala, baagugangana bati, “Mukama, Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱! Otughilile kisa!”
40020031	Bantu mu kiigambi̱ omu baatanuka basaasa aba bati baholi̱ye, bhaatu ebo beeyongelela kimui kugugangana bati, “Mukama, Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, otughilile kisa!”
40020032	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu eemilila, aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mbiki mukubbala mbakolele?”
40020033	Baamukuukamu bati, “Mukama, tukubbala otuughule maaso tubone.”
40020034	Yesu aabakwatiluwa kisa, aabaku̱ma haa maaso. Du̱mbi̱ baakililʼo, baaghenda bamukweme.
40021001	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaneebingagha Yelusaalemu, baaki̱dha mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbeti̱faage haa mwena Oli̱va. Niibuwo aatu̱mi̱ye babili mu beeghesebuwa be,
40021002	aabaghila ati, “Mughende mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu tuli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu oghu, mukuba makaghu̱ki̱dhamu, du̱mbi̱ mukusanga ndogooi̱ baghi̱tu̱bi̱ki̱ye, eli na kyana kyayʼo. Musisambuule musindeetele.
40021003	Ti̱ muntu naababu̱u̱i̱ye ekikuleka nimusisambuula, mumughile muti, ‘Mukama waatu akusibbala,’ du̱mbi̱ akubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya musiiyeyo.”
40021004	Ebi bikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebyabu̱ghi̱bu̱u̱we kukwama mu mulangi̱ ngu,
40021005	“Oghambile bantu baa Sayu̱u̱ni̱ oti, ‘Mulole, mukama waanu niibuwo aasa, ni mu̱dhooti̱, aani̱i̱ni̱ye kyana kya ndogooi̱.’ ”
40021006	Beeghesebuwa babili aba baaghenda, baakola ngoku Yesu aabalaghiiye.
40021007	Baaleetela Yesu ndogooi̱ eghi na kyana kyayʼo. Beeghesebuwa be baala bimui haa bi̱lu̱walo byabo haa mughongo ghwa ndogooi̱ eghi, aani̱i̱na, aabisitamʼo.
40021008	Bantu bakaniiye kimui kwoleka ngoku bamu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye, beehiyamu bimui haa bi̱lu̱walo byabo, na banji baajomba biitooto bya bi̱kongu̱bho biheheeye mu misili mu maahaai-haai, baabyala hansi mu luguudhe hambali akusaalila.
40021009	Bantu abaaghendi̱ye hamui naye banji bamuhikiiye na banji bamu̱ti̱ghaaye enu̱ma, baatandika kugola bati, “Ooyee! Asi̱i̱mu̱we Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱! Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama! Ooyee! Asi̱i̱mu̱we Mukama wa eghulu munu!”
40021010	Obu Yesu aataahi̱ye mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, bantu bakaniiye kimui baaswekela kimui, mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Oghu ni ani̱ bhaawai̱?”
40021011	Bantu abaabaagha mu kiigambi̱ omu baakala kubakuukamu bati, “Oghu ni Yesu, mulangi̱ oghu aalu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya.”
40021012	Yesu aaghenda aataaha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, aatandika kubhingamu bantu boona abaaghulilaghamu na abaaghu̱li̱li̱yaghamu. Aatu̱li̱kanga meeja syʼabaahi̱ngi̱i̱si̱yagha sente, kandi aatu̱li̱kanga ntebe syʼabaaghu̱li̱yagha bu̱u̱pi̱i̱so bwa kuhonga.
40021013	Aabaghila ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Numba yanje balaghighilaghamu numba ya kusabilamu,’ bhaatu enu̱we mwaghifooye ki̱i̱kalo kya basuma.”
40021014	Niibuwo aba maaso ghaaghaaye kandi na balema baasi̱ye hambali Yesu ali mu Numba ya Luhanga omu, aabaki̱li̱ya.
40021015	Bhaatu bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baasaaliluwa kubona Yesu naakola byakuswekani̱ya, kandi na baana mbamusinda mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga bati, “Ooyee! Bantu basinde Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱.”
40021016	Niibuwo beebembeli̱ aba baabu̱u̱i̱ye Yesu bati, “Ooghu̱u̱ye ebi baana aba bakwete ku̱bu̱gha?” Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ee, mbi̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye. Buuye tamukasomagha hambali Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, ‘Okeegheesi̱ya baana bato kandi nkelembe kukusinda kwonini?’ ”
40021017	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aatuwa mu Numba ya Luhanga omu aalu̱gha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu eki aaghenda Bbetaniya, hambali aalaaye.
40021018	Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo obu aanakuukagha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, njala yaamukwata.
40021019	Aabona kiti mu̱ti̱i̱ni̱ haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe nga hali̱, aaghenda kulola kilakaba kyani̱yʼo bi̱ghu̱ma, bhaatu obu aaghendi̱ye hambali kili, aasanga haa kiti eki haliyo bibabi byonkaha kitaani̱ye bi̱ghu̱ma. Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye kiti eki ati, “Otalitodha kwana ki̱ghu̱ma na kimui!” Du̱mbi̱ kiti eki kyomelʼo haala hoonini.
40021020	Obu beeghesebuwa be baaboone kiti eki kyomi̱ye, baasweka, beebu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Kiti eki kyomi̱ye ki̱ti̱ya bwangu kitiyo, bhaawai̱?”
40021021	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, nimwabaaye mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, mutaakughuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya, takili kya kulaghila kiti nkyoma eki kyonkaha mukugubha kukola bbaa. Bhaatu dhee mukugubha kughila mwena oghu muti, ‘Odhuulike haala weesimbe mu nanja!’ Niikuwo kikaakuba.
40021022	Ti̱ kyona eki mulasabagha Luhanga mu nsaala muli na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja mulakitungagha.”
40021023	Obu Yesu aatodhi̱ye kukuuka mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga kandi naatandika kwegheesi̱ya, bakulu baa bahongi̱ na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baamwisʼo. Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Oli na bu̱toki̱ ki kukola bintu ebi byona? Kandi bu̱toki̱ obu ni ani̱ aakuhaaye buwo?”
40021024	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ndimababu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kimui, mukinkuukemu niikuwo nanje mbaghambile oghu ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kukola bintu ebi nkwete kukola.
40021025	Buuye Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ akaaya haa bu̱toki̱ bwa kubati̱ja? Bukalu̱gha mu eghulu kedha mu bantu?” Niibuwo baatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Tumukuukemu tu̱ti̱ya? Ntwamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu tuti ‘Luhanga niiye akamuha buwo,’ akutughila ati, ‘Ti̱ ekyaleki̱ye mutaahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yohaana oghu nkiki?’
40021026	Kandi ntwaghi̱li̱ye tuti, ‘Bantu niibo baamuhaaye buwo,’ bantu bakani̱ye bakutusaalililuwa kandi twobahi̱ye ebi bakutukola.” Baabu̱gha batiyo nanga bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku bantu boona bamani̱ye ngoku Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabaagha mulangi̱ kwonini.
40021027	Niibuwo baamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu bati, “Tatumani̱ye.” Yesu naye aabaghila ati, “Kwesi̱i̱ni̱ nanje tankubaghambila oghu ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kukola ebi nkwete kukola.”
40021028	Yesu eeyongela aabaghila ati, “Kini mu̱ku̱kyeli̱li̱kanʼo mu̱ti̱ya? Hakaba aliyo musaasa ali na batabani̱ be babili. Aaghambila owʼobukulu ati, ‘Mwana wanje, obwalo oghende okole mu musili ghwatu.’
40021029	“Mwana oghu aamukuukamu ati, ‘Si̱ye, tita tankughendayo bbaa,’ bhaatu haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, eekuukamu, aaghenda kukola mu musili omu.
40021030	Musaasa oghu aaghila mutabani̱ wee onji wʼobuto ati, ‘Oghende okole mu musili oghu.’ Mwana oghu aamukuukamu ati, ‘Ee tita, nkughenda,’ bhaatu ataaghenda.
40021031	Buuye oghu akakola eki ese wee akubbala ni ani̱?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Wʼoku̱du̱bha.” Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na baamalaaya bakubadu̱bhi̱la kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
40021032	Nanga Yohaana akaasa kubooleka kihanda ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, mutaamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, bhaatu bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na baamalaaya baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja. Kandi nankabha nimwaboone bo mbamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, enu̱we mukabhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kandi kwekuukamu bibhi byanu.”
40021033	Niibuwo Yesu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Nkutodha kubaha lu̱si̱mo lunji: Hakaba haliyo musaasa ali na musili ghuwe ghwa bi̱ghu̱ma mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱. Aaghu̱ki̱ti̱i̱li̱la na lugho, aalimamu ndeeba ya kukamilaghamu bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, kandi aakwelamu ngbaali ekangami̱ye. Musili oghu aaghu̱ti̱ghi̱la bali̱mi̱ kumulindila ghuwo kandi eye aaghenda kubunga mu ehanga linji hambali haseli̱ye.
40021034	Obu bwile bwa kukobha bwahi̱ki̱ye, aatuma baheeleli̱ya be ati bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba babahe haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya mu musili ghuwe oghu.
40021035	Bhaatu bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baaghwilikiilila baheeleli̱ya be aba, omui baamuhuula, onji baamwita, kandi onji baamuhuula mabaale.
40021036	Nahabweki mukama wa musili oghu aatodha aatumayo baheeleli̱ya be banji basaayʼo bʼoku̱du̱bha kumuleetela haa bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, nabo bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baabakola ngoku baakoli̱ye bʼoku̱du̱bha.
40021037	Haakumaliilila, aabatumila mutabani̱ wee. Aaghila ati, ‘Mutabani̱ wanje oni baku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.’
40021038	“Bhaatu obu bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baaboone mutabani̱ wee oghu, baaghambilana bati, ‘Oni niiye bakwisa kugweta musili ghuni, nahabweki muleke tumwite, niikuwo tughutwalile kimui!’
40021039	Du̱mbi̱ baamughwilikiilila, baamu̱twesi̱ya enja ya musili oghu, baamwita.”
40021040	Niibuwo Yesu aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Buuye obu mukama wa musili oghu aliisa, alikola ati̱ya bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba?”
40021041	Baamukuukamu bati, “Ali̱hi̱ka alaghile ati baate bapangi̱i̱si̱ya babhi aba boona, kandi musili oghu aghukwati̱ye bantu banji abakugubha kumuha ebi̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu musili ghuwe oghu haanu̱ma ya bu̱li̱ kukobha.”
40021042	Niibuwo Yesu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Kini tamukakisomagha mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we hambali ki̱ghi̱li̱ye kiti, “ ‘Ebaale eli bakweli̱ baabhengi̱ye, niiliyo lyahaghi̱ki̱ye numba kusaali̱ya ghanji ghoona. Eki Mukama eenini niiye akakikola, kandi kyatuswekani̱li̱ya kimui’?
40021043	“Nahabweki mbaghambiiye nti bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bukubaahibuwo kandi buheebuwe bantu abakwete kukola ebi Luhanga abbali̱ye. [
40021044	Ti̱ oghu alyegengela ebaale eli ali̱twi̱ka-twi̱ka, kandi oghu ebaale eli lilyegengela alikpeetaaguka.”]
40021045	Obu bakulu baa bahongi̱ na Bafali̱saayo baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baamanya ngoku aaniibo Yesu aatwi̱li̱i̱ye lu̱si̱mo olu.
40021046	Baabbala mulingo ghwa kumukwatilamu, bhaatu boobaha kiigambi̱ kya bantu abaabaaghʼo nanga bantu aba bakaba bamumani̱ye ngoku ali mulangi̱.
40022001	Yesu aatodha aabu̱gha nabo mu nsi̱mo sinji ati,
40022002	“Bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buli nga mukama oghu akateekani̱ja bu̱ghenu̱ bwa kuswela kwa mutabani̱ wee.
40022003	Obu baamali̱ye kuteekani̱ja bu̱li̱ kintu haa bu̱ghenu̱ obu, aatuma baheeleli̱ya be kughambila aba aabilikiiye haa bu̱ghenu̱ obu, bhaatu baabhenga kwisa.
40022004	“Niibuwo aatu̱mi̱ye baheeleli̱ya be banji kughambila bantu aba ati, ‘Ki̱ghenu̱ kyamali̱ye kuteekani̱i̱ji̱buwa. Naamali̱ye kusala nte syanje esi̱noni̱ye kwonini, kandi bu̱li̱ kintu kyona kyamali̱ye kuteekani̱ji̱buwa. Mwise haa bu̱ghenu̱!’
40022005	“Bhaatu baghenu̱ aba abaabaagha abilikiiye baaghaya ebi baheeleli̱ya aba baabaghambiiye, beeghendela mu byabo. Omui eeghendela mu musili ghuwe, onji eeghendela mu bu̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱ buwe.
40022006	Banji baaghwilikiilila baheeleli̱ya aba aatu̱mi̱ye aba, baababbaaki̱i̱si̱ya kandi baabaata.
40022007	“Mukama oghu ki̱i̱ni̱gha kyamukwatila kimui. Aatuma baasilikale be baata boona abaati̱ye baheeleli̱ya be aba, kandi na tau̱ni̱ yabo baasilikale baaghyoki̱ya.
40022008	Mukama oghu aaghila baheeleli̱ya be banji ati, ‘Bintu bya bu̱ghenu̱ byona byahooye kuteekani̱ji̱buwa bhaatu naabilikiiye bantu batabhonganuuwe.
40022009	Nahabweki mughende mu nguudhe mubilikile weena oghu mulakasanga aase mu bu̱ghenu̱ buni.’
40022010	Du̱mbi̱ baheeleli̱ya aba baaghenda mu bihanda baabilikila aba baakasangi̱ye, bataaku̱solooli̱ya bati kedha oni ni mubhi kedha mulungi, ti̱ kisiika baakolelaghamu bu̱ghenu̱ obu nkyasulila kimui baghenu̱.
40022011	“Bhaatu obu mukama oghu aataahi̱ye mu kisiika eki kulola baghenu̱ be, aabonamu musaasa atalu̱wete ki̱lu̱walo kya bu̱ghenu̱ obu.
40022012	Mukama oghu aamughila ati, ‘Wai̱, wataahi̱ye oti̱ya muni, otalu̱wete ki̱lu̱walo kya bu̱ghenu̱ buni?’ Musaasa oghu aabuluwa kyakukuukamu.
40022013	“Niibuwo mukama oghu aaghi̱li̱ye baheeleli̱ya be ati, ‘Mumubohe mikono hamui na maghulu, mumukube enja, mu mweli̱ma hambali akulila kwonini kandi eenene ngaga haabwa kubona-bona.’ ”
40022014	Yesu aamaliilila naaghila ati, “Bakani̱ye babilikiiwe bhaatu balikomuwamu bakee.”
40022015	Bafali̱saayo baagumbaana hamui kandi baahanuula mulingo ghwa kwohi̱ya Yesu ku̱bu̱gha kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye niikuwo batunge kahanda kaa kumukwatilamu.
40022016	Baatuma bamui mu beeghesebuwa baabo hamui na bahagi̱li̱ baa Helude kughenda hambali ali. Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye, baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, tumani̱ye ngoku oku̱bu̱ghagha majima ghonkaha, okwegheesi̱yagha bighambo bya Luhanga mu majima kandi bantu boona okubengana-ngani̱yagha, tookufuwaaghʼo bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa byabo.
40022017	Otughambile eki okweli̱li̱kana haa kini: Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye kuha musolo ghwa Kai̱saali̱ mukama wa Looma, kedha bbaa?”
40022018	Bhaatu Yesu aamanya byeli̱li̱kano byabo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Ngobi̱ya enu̱we! Mukubbala ku̱njohi̱ya nangaaki?
40022019	Munjoleke mukwenge oghu mukuhaaghamu musolo.” Baamuleetela ghuwo.
40022020	Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Kisasani̱ na li̱i̱na ebili haa mukwenge ghuni, ni byani̱?”
40022021	Baamukuukamu bati, “Ni bya Kai̱saali̱.” Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Kwesi̱i̱ni̱ ebya Kai̱saali̱ mubihe Kai̱saali̱, nʼebya Luhanga mubihe Luhanga.”
40022022	Eki aabaku̱u̱ki̱yemu eki kyabaswekeli̱ya kimui, du̱mbi̱ baamu̱lu̱ghʼo, baaghenda.
40022023	Kilo eki kyonini, bamui mu Basadukaayo abaaghilagha bati bantu tabali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, baasa baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati,
40022024	“Mwegheesi̱ya, Musa akaghila ati, ‘Musaasa naasweye mukali̱, ti̱ musaasa oghu aku̱wa atabyayʼo mukali̱ oghu mwana, mwana waani̱na musaasa oghu aswele mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu niikuwo abyalile mwana waani̱na wee oghu baana.
40022025	Ewaatu hani, hakaba haliyo banaani̱na emui musanju̱. Mukulu wabo aaswela mukali̱, bhaatu aaku̱wa atamubyayʼo mwana. Oghu amulabhi̱ye aaswela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu.
40022026	Bhaatu naye aaku̱wa atamubyayʼo mwana. Mwana wa ni̱nabo waakasatu naye aaswela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu, naye aaku̱wa dhee atamubyayʼo mwana. Banaani̱na emui musanju̱ aba boona baaku̱wa batabyayʼo mukali̱ oghu mwana.
40022027	Haakumaliilila mukali̱ oghu naye aaku̱wa.
40022028	Buuye obu Luhanga ali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la bantu boona, mukali̱ oghu aliba mukaa ani̱? Nanga boona musanju̱ bakamuswelʼo.’ ”
40022029	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Muhabi̱ye nanga tamumani̱ye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we kandi ngoku Luhanga ali na bu̱toki̱.
40022030	Obu Luhanga ali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la abaku̱u̱ye, tabaliswela kedha kusweluwa bbaa. Baliba nga baamalai̱ka bʼomu eghulu.
40022031	Bhaatu haa bya bantu baku̱u̱ye ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, buuye tamukasomaghʼo kini mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu hambele Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka, na Yakobbo bamali̱ye ku̱ku̱wa, ngoku Luhanga aaghi̱li̱ye ati,
40022032	‘Ndi Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga wa I̱saka, kandi Luhanga wa Yakobbo?’ Nahabweki taali Luhanga wa baku̱u̱ye bbaa, ni wa baakaaye.”
40022033	Obu kiigambi̱ kya bantu baamu̱ghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baaswekela njegheesi̱ya yee eghi.
40022034	Obu Bafali̱saayo baaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu aaholeeseei̱ye Basadukaayo baabuluwa kyakumukuukamu, baagumbaana hambali ali.
40022035	Niibuwo omui mu ebo, mwegheesi̱ya wa bilaghilo, aabu̱u̱i̱ye Yesu ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kumulengesa ati,
40022036	“Mwegheesi̱ya, nkilaghilo ki kisaai̱ye bilaghilo byona?”
40022037	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “‘Okundaghe Mukama Luhanga waawe na mutima ghwawe ghwona, bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona, na magheji ghaawe ghoona.’
40022038	Eki niikiyo kilaghilo kyoku̱du̱bha kandi ekisaai̱ye byona.
40022039	Ti̱ ekyakabili ekili ngʼeki kikughilagha kiti: ‘Okundaghe muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini.’
40022040	Na bilaghilo byona kandi nʼebi balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye bisighikiiye haa bilaghilo bibili ebi.”
40022041	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Bafali̱saayo abaabaagha bamweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo ati,
40022042	“Ki̱li̱si̱to mu̱ku̱mweli̱li̱kanaghʼo mu̱ti̱ya? Mu̱kweli̱li̱kanagha muti ni muusukulu wa ani̱?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Ni muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱.”
40022043	Niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Ti̱, haabwaki buuye Dhau̱dhi̱ Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naamu̱koleeseei̱ye kughila Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu ati ‘Mukama wanje’? Nanga Dhau̱dhi̱ akaghila ati,
40022044	“ ‘Mukama aaghila Mukama wanje ati, “Ositame haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwanje ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndita ngi̱ghu̱ syawe hansi ya bighele byawe.” ’
40022045	Buuye Dhau̱dhi̱ eenini obu alaba naaghi̱li̱ye ati Ki̱li̱si̱to ni Mukama wee, Mukama oghu akugubha ati̱ya kuba muusukulu wee?”
40022046	Haala taabaayʼo muntu weena oghu akagubha kumukuukamu, kandi ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la haala taabaayʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akatodha aalengʼo ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kyona.
40023001	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu abaabaaghʼo hamui na beeghesebuwa be ati,
40023002	“Beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo hamui na Bafali̱saayo bali na bu̱toki̱ nanga bakwegheesi̱yagha bantu bilaghilo bya Musa.
40023003	Nahabweki mubhonganuuwe kubahu̱ti̱ya kandi kukola byona ebi bakubaghambila kukola. Bhaatu mutakolagha ebi ebo bakukolagha, nanga ebi bakwegheesi̱yagha taaniibiyo bakubikolagha.
40023004	Baku̱heeki̱yagha bantu nku̱mba sibasaalukaane esi ebo bataakugubha na ku̱ku̱mʼo na kati̱i̱ konkaha.
40023005	“Bakukolagha mi̱ghendi̱yo ekani̱ye ya di̱i̱ni̱ niikuwo bantu bababone nga bahu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga. Ti̱ bimui haa Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bya Luhanga bakubihandiikagha babita mu kaabboki̱si, babi̱lu̱wala haa bhu̱u̱su̱ syabo kedha haa mikono yabo, kandi na haa mighuwo ya mahu̱u̱ji̱ ejambi̱ye eghi yaabaagha haa ngoye syabo baalu̱walagha niikuwo bantu bababone nga bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40023006	Mu maghenu̱ babbala kusitama mu ntebe sya baghenu̱ bakulu kandi mu malami̱li̱yo babbala kusitama mu ntebe sya bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
40023007	Mu butale, babbala bati bantu babalamu̱ki̱ye babahu̱ti̱i̱ye kandi mbabaghilamu bati, ‘Mwegheesi̱ya.’
40023008	“Bhaatu enu̱we mutasi̱i̱ma muntu nʼomui kubaghilamu ‘Mwegheesi̱ya,’ nanga muli na mwegheesi̱ya omui kandi enu̱we boona muli banaani̱na.
40023009	Kandi munsi muni mutalighilamu muntu muti ‘Eseetu̱we,’ nanga muli na Eseetu̱we omui enkaha oghu ali mu eghulu.
40023010	Enu̱we batabaghilaghamu bati ngbongbou̱, nanga muli na ngbongbou̱ omui enkaha, Ki̱li̱si̱to.
40023011	Kandi oghu akubbala kubabaamu mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ abe mu̱heeleli̱ya waanu.
40023012	Weena munakwebhi̱mba-bhi̱mbi̱ya bali̱mu̱bhondi̱ya, kandi oghu akwebundaali̱ya bali̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.
40023013	“Ngamulikibona ngobi̱ya enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo! Mukutangagha bantu kumanya bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu, kusa naanu boonini mukubhengagha kububaamu, kandi nʼabakubbalagha kubaamu mubatanga dhee. [
40023014	Mulikibona enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo naanu Bafali̱saayo! Ngobi̱ya enu̱we! Mukunyaghagha manumba ghaa bakwi̱si̱ya kusa mwesabi̱si̱ya nsaala sijambi̱ye muti mweyoleke nga bantu balungi. Nahabweki mulitunga kifubilo kyamaani̱ kusaali̱yʼo.]
40023015	“Ngamulikibona ngobi̱ya enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo! Mukubhasukagha maananja kandi mughenda mu byalo bikani̱ye kubbala oghu mukuhindula, nimwamutunga mumufoola wakutunga kifubilo milundi ebili kya kumukuba mu Gehena ngʼanu.
40023016	“Ngamulikibona enu̱we abakweghilagha muti mukwebembela abaaghaaye maaso kuni naanu muughaaye maaso! Mukughilagha muti, muntu naalahiiye aku̱mi̱ya Numba ya Luhanga, eki takili na nsonga, muti bhaatu muntu naalahiiye aku̱mi̱ya feeja yʼomu Numba ya Luhanga, obu niibuwo akulaghiluwa kukola eki aalahiiye.
40023017	Enu̱we baaghali̱ baa maaso kandi badhoma-dhoma! Buuye ekisaai̱ye ni kyahaa, feeja kedha Numba ya Luhanga eghi ekuleka feeja eghi nʼeba elukwela?
40023018	Mukughilagha dhee muti muntu naalahiiye aku̱mi̱ya eki bakuhongelaghʼo bihonguwa, eki takili na nsonga, muti bhaatu muntu naalahiiye aku̱mi̱ya kihonguwa ekili yo, obu niibuwo akulaghiluwa kukola eki aalahiiye.
40023019	Baaghali̱ baa maaso enu̱we! Buuye ekisaai̱ye ni kyahaa, kihonguwa kedha eki bakuhongelaghʼo bihonguwa, ekikuleka kihonguwa eki nkiba kilukwela?
40023020	Nahabweki muntu naalahiiye aku̱mi̱ya eki bakuhongelaghʼo bihonguwa akubaagha aku̱mi̱i̱ye dhee na byona ebikiliho.
40023021	Kandi weena oghu akulahilagha aku̱mi̱ya Numba ya Luhanga aakubaagha aghi̱ku̱mi̱i̱ye kandi aku̱mi̱i̱ye na Luhanga oghu akughiikalaghamu.
40023022	Nanga weena oghu akulahilagha aku̱mi̱ya eghulu akubaagha alahiiye ntebe ya bukama ya Luhanga kandi aku̱mi̱i̱ye na Luhanga oghu akughisitamaghʼo.
40023023	“Ngamulikibona ngobi̱ya enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo! Mukuhaaghayo kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ nankabha haa bulaala na milingo enji yoona ya mikubi yaanu. Bhaatu kusa mutafuwʼo kandi mutakola ekisaai̱yʼo kuba kyamaani̱ mu bilaghilo bya Luhanga: kuba na bwengani̱ja, kisa, na bwesighibuwa. Ebi mwangu̱bi̱koli̱ye byona, mutati̱gha na binji.
40023024	Enu̱we beebembeli̱ baaghaaye maaso! Mukusengeejagha byakunuwa byanu muti mutanwelamu kalofu̱ kengaane na nku̱ndi̱, kusa mumela kintu kyengaane na kisolo ngamila.
40023025	“Ngamulikibona ngobi̱ya enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo! Muli nga bantu abakunaabi̱yagha haagu̱u̱li̱ ya kiikopo kedha sahaani̱ kusa mukati haneelaghuuye, niikuwo muusuuye mutiyo mululu na kubbala kwesemeli̱ya enu̱we boonini.
40023026	Bafali̱saayo baaghali̱ baa maaso enu̱we! Mu̱du̱bhe mu̱semeli̱ye mitima yaanu niikuwo ebi mukukola nabiyo bisemele.
40023027	“Ngamulikibona ngobi̱ya enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo! Muli nga bituulo basi̱i̱ghi̱ye langi̱ njelu ebikusemelagha haagu̱u̱li̱, bhaatu mukati biisuuye maku̱wa ghaa bantu na bu̱lofu̱ bwona.
40023028	Naanu dhee, haagu̱u̱li̱ mukususagha bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa bantu, bhaatu mukati muusuuyemu bu̱ghobi̱ya kandi bubhi.
40023029	“Ngamulikibona ngobi̱ya enu̱we, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo! Nanga mukukwelagha bituulo bya balangi̱ kandi mu̱semeli̱ya bituulo bya bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40023030	Ti̱ mughila muti, nguli etu̱we twabaaghʼo bwile bwa baataata baatu obu, etu̱we tatwangubaaye mu bikoluwa byabo bya kwita balangi̱ aba bbaa.
40023031	Nahabweki mukubaagha ni̱mu̱ghwesi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya ngoku muli baasukulu baa abaati̱ye balangi̱ aba.
40023032	Mukolele kimui mumaleyo mulimo oghu baataata baanu baatandi̱ki̱ye!
40023033	“Njoka enu̱we kandi byana bya njoka! Mulikila mu̱ti̱ya kifubilo kya kubakuba mu Gehena?
40023034	Nahabweki nkubatumila balangi̱, banamagheji kandi beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Bamui mu bantu aba mukubaata, banji mukubabamba, banji mukubahuulila bibbooko mu malami̱li̱yo ghaanu, mubahume ku̱lu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ emui ku̱hi̱ka mu enji.
40023035	Nahabweki enu̱we bantu baa mujo ghuni, Luhanga alibatwi̱la musango ghwa kwita bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aba ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la hambele obu Luhanga aahangi̱ye nsi. Kandi ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la obu baati̱ye Abbeli̱ atali na musango ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baati̱ye Jakaliya mutabani̱ wa Bbeleki̱ya, oghu baatiiye haagati ya eki bakuhongelaghʼo bihonguwa na ki̱i̱kalo kilukwela mu Numba ya Luhanga.
40023036	“Mbaghambiiye majima, ebi byona Luhanga ali̱twi̱la bantu baa mujo ghuni musango ghwabiyo.
40023037	“Ai̱ enu̱we bantu baa Yelusaalemu, abakwitagha balangi̱ kandi muhuula mabaale bantu Luhanga abatumiiye, nkulengaghʼo kubakumaani̱ya ngoku nkoko ekukumaani̱yagha bwana bwayʼo, bhaatu mubhenga.
40023038	Dheluuni, nkubaleka nga numba etalimu muntu.
40023039	Mbaghambiiye, tamukutodha kumbona ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu mulyebali̱ya si̱ye nimughila muti, ‘Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama.’ ”
40024001	Yesu naanalu̱gha mu Numba ya Luhanga kughenda, beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo baamwoleka ngoku manumba agha ghasemeleeye kimui.
40024002	Aabaghila ati, “Muboone manumba agha ghoona? Mbaghambiiye majima, bwile bu̱li̱hi̱ka obu balighaseesa ghoona kandi taaliyo ebaale na limui eli̱li̱ti̱ghala haagu̱u̱li̱ ya liinakyaliyo!”
40024003	Haanu̱ma Yesu aasitama haa mwena Oli̱va, beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya mu ki̱bi̱so bati, “Otughambile, manumba agha balighaseesa dhi̱? Kandi mbiki bi̱li̱du̱bha kubʼo kwoleka ngu olimaasa kandi mpelo eli haai kubʼo?”
40024004	Aabakuukamu ati, “Mwelinde niikuwo muntu nʼomui atalibahabi̱i̱si̱ya.
40024005	Nanga bantu bakani̱ye baliisa, bu̱li̱ omui neeghilamu ati, ‘Ni̱i̱si̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to.’ Kandi balihabi̱i̱si̱ya bantu bakani̱ye.
40024006	Ti̱ noobu mu̱li̱i̱ghu̱wa bulemo kandi makulu ghaa bulemo, mutalyobaha. Ebi niibiyo bi̱li̱du̱bha kubʼo. Bhaatu mpelo yoonini eliba etakahi̱ki̱ye.”
40024007	Mahanga ghalilwana na mahanga ghaanakyaghʼo, kandi makama ghalilwana na makama ghaanakyaghʼo. Mi̱si̱ki̱ eli̱dhi̱ngi̱ya mu bi̱i̱kalo bikani̱ye. Njala elighwila bantu bakani̱ye.
40024008	Bhaatu ebi byona biliba bili ntandiko ya kubona-bona kwamaani̱.
40024009	“Bantu balihaayo enu̱we kubabona-boni̱ya, kandi kubaata. Bantu balyoha enu̱we mu mahanga ghoona haabwanje.
40024010	Bwile obu bantu bakani̱ye balileka ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, baghobeli̱ye abampi̱ki̱li̱i̱je kandi boohangane.
40024011	Kandi balangi̱ baa bisubha bakani̱ye balibʼo kandi bahabi̱i̱si̱ye bantu bakani̱ye.
40024012	Haabwa bantu kweyongela munu ku̱si̱i̱sa, bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bakani̱ye balileka kukunda baanakyabo.
40024013	Bhaatu oghu aliikala anagu̱mi̱si̱li̱i̱je ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱u̱ye, alijunuwa.”
40024014	Bhaatu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bali̱du̱bha baghalangilile munsi yoona, kuba buukai̱so mu mahanga ghoona, obu niibuwo mpelo elibʼo.
40024015	“Nahabweki, obu mulibona Kintu Ekibhihiiye Kimui, kandi eki Luhanga oohi̱ye kiimiliiye mu ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ngoku mulangi̱ Dhaneeli̱ aabu̱ghi̱ye, (oghu akusoma bighambo ebi abyetegheeleli̱ye),
40024016	abaliba bali mu Bu̱yu̱daaya, baalukile bwangu mu myena.
40024017	Bwile obu muntu oghu aliba ali haa lusui lwa numba atali̱su̱ndu̱ka kutaaha mu numba kuuyamu kantu koona.
40024018	Kandi oghu aliba ali mu musili atalikuuka eka kwendelayo ngoye esi aati̱ghi̱yeyo.
40024019	Ti̱ bwile obu bakali̱ baku̱li̱i̱ye nʼabakwonki̱ya baana ngabalikibona!
40024020	Musabe Luhanga ngu kubona-bona oku kutaliisa kubʼo mu bwile bwa mbu̱la ekani̱ye kedha haa kilo kya Sabhato.
40024021	Nanga mu bwile obu bantu balibona-bonela kimui, kusaali̱ya kubona-bona okwakabʼo ku̱lu̱gha kuhanguwa kwa nsi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nʼendindi. Kandi bantu tabalitodha kubona-bona batiyo.
40024022	Nguli bilo bya kubona-bona ebi bitaakeehebeeu̱we, bantu boona banguhwelekeleeye. Bhaatu haabwa abakomeeu̱wemu, bilo ebi bikukeehebuwa.
40024023	Bwile obu, nankabha muntu alibaghila ati, ‘Mulole, Ki̱li̱si̱to nguni hani!’ Kedha ‘Ngu̱li̱ hali̱!’ Mutali̱si̱i̱ma ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha.
40024024	Nanga balangi̱ baa bisubha na abakuha bisubha bati ebo niibo Ki̱li̱si̱to, baliisa kandi balikola byakuswekani̱ya byamaani̱, kulengʼo kilakaba nkigubhukana kuhabi̱i̱si̱ya na bantu aba Luhanga aakomi̱yemu.
40024025	Naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye eki kitakabaayʼo.
40024026	“Noobu muntu alibaghila ati, ‘Ki̱li̱si̱to ali mu elungu,’ mutalighendayo, kedha ati, ‘Ali eni mu kisiika,’ mutali̱si̱i̱ma ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha.
40024027	Nanga obu Mwana wa Muntu aliba naakuuka, bu̱li̱ muntu alimubonela kimui bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngoku bakubonagha nkubha eghi ekubbyokelagha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba nʼabali bughuwa ejooba baghibonela kimui.
40024028	Hambali mu̱ku̱ ghuli, niiho bi̱noni̱ ebikughuliyagha bikwekumaani̱li̱yagha.
40024029	“Du̱mbi̱ haanu̱ma ya bwile bwa kubona-bona obu kuhuwʼo, “musana ghu̱li̱li̱ma, na kweli̱ taku̱li̱bbeni̱ya. Nsooli̱ya sililaghalika ku̱lu̱gha eghulu. Musana, kweli̱, kandi na bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekili eghulu mu mwanya kilidhinga-dhinga.”
40024030	“Bwile obu bantu balibona bwakulolelʼo mu mwanya, bwa kwisa kwa Mwana wa Muntu. Bantu bʼomu ntu̱la syona munsi yoona baliba mu bujune. Niibuwo bantu boona balibona Mwana wa Muntu naasila mu bicu na bu̱toki̱ kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.
40024031	Alituma baamalai̱ka be bateele ki̱i̱di̱yo kandi bamalakake kyalo kyona munsi muni nʼomu eghulu, bakumaani̱ye bantu aba Luhanga aakomi̱yemu.
40024032	“Mweghele haa kyakulolelʼo kya muyembe. Ghukaakwanagha, miyembe niyaalu̱lu̱mana, mumanya ngoku eli haai kwela.
40024033	Niikiyo kimui dhee obu mulibona bintu ebi naabaghambiiye ebi byona mbyatandika kubʼo, mumanye ngoku Mwana wa Muntu, bwile buwe bwa kukuuka bwahi̱ki̱i̱ye kimui.
40024034	Mbaghambiiye majima, kubona-bona naaghambi̱ye oku kwona kulibʼo bamui mu bantu abaliyo endindi banaakaaye.
40024035	Nsi na eghulu bilihuwʼo, bhaatu bighambo byanje tabilihuwʼo.
40024036	“Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu amani̱ye kilo kandi saaha eghi. Baamalai̱ka bʼomu eghulu tabaghimani̱ye, na Mwana wee taaghimani̱ye bbaa. Tita Luhanga enkaha niiye aghimani̱ye.
40024037	Ngoku byabaagha mu bwile obu Nuha aabaagha anaakaaye, niikuwo biliba bitiyo mu bwile obu Mwana wa Muntu aliba ali haai kukuuka.
40024038	Mu bwile obu maasi ghatakaasuuye kyalo kyona, bantu baakalagha mbaliya, mbanuwa, mbaswela kandi bakali̱ mbasweluwa, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Nuha aataahi̱ye mu bwati̱ buunamu̱li̱to.
40024039	Bantu tabaamani̱ye ekyaghendagha kubʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Luhanga aatooneei̱ye mbu̱la ekani̱ye, maasi ghaasula kyalo kyona, bantu aba boona baatwi̱ki̱lamu. Niikuwo biliba bitiyo dhee obu Mwana wa Muntu aliba naakuuka.
40024040	Bwile obu, bantu babili baliba mbakola mu musili, baamalai̱ka be balitwala omui mu eghulu, bati̱ghʼo omui.
40024041	Obu bakali̱ babili baliba mbasekula hamui mucele, baamalai̱ka be balitwala omui mu eghulu, bati̱ghʼo omui.
40024042	“Nahabweki muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je, nanga tamumani̱ye bwile obu Mukama waanu alikuukilamu.
40024043	Kandi mumanye kini. Nguli nini eka aamanyagha bwile obu musuma akwisa kwibhilamu, angukaaye abhali̱i̱ye kandi tangulekagha musuma naataaha mu numba yee kwibhamu.
40024044	Nahabweki enu̱we muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je, nanga Mwana wa Muntu aliisila mu bwile obu mutaakweli̱li̱kana muti niibuwo akwisilamu.
40024045	“Mu̱heeleli̱ya mwesighibuwa kandi wa magheji akukolagha ebi mukama wee abbali̱ye. Mukama wee akumukomagha kuloleelela baheeleli̱ya baanakiye kubaha byokuliya mu bwile babhonganuuwe kubitungilamu.
40024046	Ali na mu̱gi̱sa mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu mukama wee alikuuka amusanga naakola mulimo ghuwe oghu kusemeeye.
40024047	Mbaghambiiye majima, mukama wee oghu alimuha kuloleelela bintu biye byona.
40024048	Bhaatu mu̱heeleli̱ya mubhi oghu naanaghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Mukama wanje naye aalebbi̱ye hambali aaghendi̱ye,’
40024049	du̱mbi̱ atandika kuhuulanga baheeleli̱ya baanakiye. Atandika kuliya, kunuwa kandi kuukala na batami̱i̱li̱ baanakiye.
40024050	Mukama wa mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aliisa mu kilo kandi mu bwile obu mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu atamunihiiye kwisilamu.
40024051	Aliha mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu kifubilo kyamaani̱ kandi alaghile ati bamute mu ki̱i̱kalo akutaaghamu ngobi̱ya, hambali balilila kwonini kandi beenene ngaga haabwa kubona-bona kwamaani̱.”
40025001	Bwile obu bu̱lemi̱ bwʼomu eghulu buliba ngoku beesiki eku̱mi̱ baakwete taala syabo, baaghenda haa bu̱ghenu̱ bwa mpete kulindilila oghu akuswela.
40025002	Bataano mu beesiki aba bakaba bali badhoma-dhoma, bataano bali bagheji.
40025003	“Abadhoma-dhoma baaghenda na taala syabo bhaatu batali na palafi̱i̱ni̱ ya kweli̱ndi̱ya.
40025004	Bhaatu abagheji ebo baatwala taala syabo na palafi̱i̱ni̱ enji mu macu̱pa.
40025005	Oghu akuswela aalebba atakaki̱dhi̱ye, beesiki aba boona mpongo syabakwata baaghwesaghila.
40025006	“Haa saaha mukaagha sya mukilo niibuwo baaghu̱u̱ye muntu naaguga nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, ‘Muumuke mwise hanja, mwise musangaane mugholi aaki̱dhi̱ye!’
40025007	Beesiki aba boona baamuka baatandika kubhaki̱ya taala syabo.
40025008	Abadhoma-dhoma baaghila abagheji bati, ‘Bhaawai̱ taala syatu silimali̱ma, gutu mutuhe haa palafi̱i̱ni̱ yaanu.’
40025009	“Abagheji, baabakuukamu bati, ‘Bbaa, palafi̱i̱ni̱ tuli nayo, teekutumala etu̱we hamui naanu. Kuuyʼo mughende mu baku̱ghu̱li̱yagha palafi̱i̱ni̱ mweghulileyo yaanu.’
40025010	“Obu beesiki badhoma-dhoma aba baabaagha banaghendi̱ye kughula palafi̱i̱ni̱, kiswela aaki̱dha. Beesiki bagheji abaabaagha beeteekani̱i̱je baataaha na kiswela oghu mu kisiika hambali bu̱ghenu̱ bukuba, du̱mbi̱ baaghala lwighi.
40025011	“Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, niibuwo na bali̱ bataano baasi̱ye baatandika kukonkona haa lwighi mbanabilikila bati, ‘Mukama waatu! Mukama waatu! Gutu otuughulile lwighi twasi̱ye!’
40025012	“Kiswela oghu aabakuukamu ati, ‘Mbaghambiiye majima, tambamani̱ye bbaa.’ ”
40025013	Yesu aamaliilila lu̱si̱mo olu naaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Nahabweki, bwile bwona muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je, nanga tamumani̱ye kilo kedha saaha eghi ndikuukilamu.”
40025014	Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga nkubulengeesani̱ya dhee ngoku musaasa akweteekani̱jagha kubunga. Abilikila baheeleli̱ya be basatu, aabati̱ghi̱la etungo liye ku̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱u̱ki̱ye.
40025015	Omui aamu̱ti̱ghi̱la talanta etaano, onji aamu̱ti̱ghi̱la talanta ebili, nʼonji aamu̱ti̱ghi̱la talanta emui, bu̱li̱ omui aamu̱ti̱ghi̱la ngoku akugubha. Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda kubunga.
40025016	Oghu baati̱ghi̱i̱ye talanta etaano, aaghenda bwangu aasu̱u̱bu̱li̱ya esiye, aatungamu maghobo ghaa talanta sinji etaano.
40025017	Na oghu baati̱ghi̱i̱ye talanta ebili, naye aasu̱u̱bu̱li̱ya esiye, aaghobʼo talanta sinji ebili.
40025018	Bhaatu oghu baati̱ghi̱i̱ye talanta emui, eye aaghenda aalima ki̱i̱na aabi̱samu talanta ya mukama wee eghi.
40025019	“Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukani̱ye, mukama wa baheeleli̱ya aba aaki̱dha, aasa aabala sente siye esi ali hamui na baheeleli̱ya be aba.
40025020	Oghu baati̱ghi̱i̱ye talanta etaano, aaleetelʼo sinji etaano esi aaghobi̱ye. Aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, okanti̱ghi̱la talanta etaano, olole, nkasi̱koleesi̱ya naaghobʼo sinji etaano.’
40025021	“Mukama wee aamughila ati, ‘Weebale, mu̱heeleli̱ya mulungi kandi mwesighibuwa! Waabaaye mwesighibuwa mu bikee. Nkukuha kuloleelela bintu bikani̱ye. Oose odheedhuwe hamui na mukama waawe!’
40025022	“Na oghu baati̱ghi̱i̱ye talanta ebili, aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, okanti̱ghi̱la talanta ebili, nkasi̱koleesi̱ya naaghobʼo sinji ebili.’
40025023	“Mukama wee aamughila ati, ‘Weebale, oli mu̱heeleli̱ya mulungi kandi mwesighibuwa! Waabaaye mwesighibuwa mu kuloleelela bintu bikee. Nkukuha kuloleelela bintu bikani̱ye. Oose mu ki̱ghenu̱ kyanje tudheedhuwe hamui!’
40025024	“Niibuwo oghu baati̱ghi̱i̱ye talanta emui, aasi̱ye aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, nkumani̱ye ngoku oli muntu ati̱ghi̱kaane, okukesagha ebi otaaheli̱ye kandi ohulula ebi otaali̱mi̱ye.
40025025	Nahabweki nkakwobaha naaghenda naabi̱sa mu etaka talanta yaawe wampaaye. Olole, talanta yaawe wanti̱ghi̱i̱ye ngini.’
40025026	“Mukama wee aamughila ati, ‘Oli mu̱heeleli̱ya mubhi kandi mughala! Okakimanya ngoku nkukesagha ebi ntaaheli̱ye kandi mpulula ebi ntaali̱mi̱ye!
40025027	Sente syanje esi nguli waasihaaye abaku̱si̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱yagha, makuuka nangusangi̱ye si̱ghobi̱ye.
40025028	“Du̱mbi̱ aalaghila baheeleli̱ya be banji ati, ‘Mumuuyʼo talanta eghi, mughihe oghu ali na talanta eku̱mi̱.
40025029	Nanga oghu ali na kantu, niiye akwongeluwʼo, bhaatu oghu atali na kantu, nʼaka ali nako kakumuuhibuwʼo.
40025030	Ti̱, mu̱heeleli̱ya atali na mughaso oghu mumukube enja mu ki̱i̱kalo kiisuuyemu mweli̱ma hambali akuukala naalilila kimui kandi neenena ngaga haabwa kubona-bona.’
40025031	“Obu Mwana wa Muntu aliisa mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye kyamaani̱, ali na baamalai̱ka boona, alisitama haa ntebe yee ya bukama ya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa naatwi̱la bantu boona musango.
40025032	Bantu bʼomu mahanga ghoona balyekumaani̱li̱ya hambali ali, kandi alitambulani̱yamu bantu ngoku mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya akutambulani̱yagha mbu̱li̱ na ntaama.
40025033	Ngoku mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya akutaagha ntaama haa luhande luwe lwabuliyo kandi mbu̱li̱ asita haa luhande lwabumesu, niikuwo naye Mwana wa Muntu alita bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haa luhande luwe lwabuliyo, banji abate haa lwabumesu.
40025034	“Niibuwo Mukama alighila abali haa luhande luwe lwabuliyo ati, ‘Mwise, enu̱we aba Tita aahaaye mu̱gi̱sa, mugwetuwe bukama obu Tita aabateekani̱li̱i̱ye ku̱lu̱gha haa kuhanguwa kwa nsi.
40025035	Nanga njala ekaba enkwete, mwampa byokuliya. Eliyo linkwete, mwampa kyakunuwa. Mukaba mutaamani̱ye, bhaatu mwaneebali̱ya mu maka ghaanu.
40025036	Nkaba ntali na kyaku̱lu̱wala, mwandwi̱ka. Nkaba ndwaye, mwanjanjabha. Nkaba ndi mu nkomo, mwasa mwandola.’
40025037	“Niibuwo bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aba balikuukamu bati, ‘Mukama, tukakubona dhi̱ njala ekukwete twakuha byokuliya, eliyo likukwete twakuha kyakunuwa?
40025038	Tukakubona dhi̱ tutakumani̱ye twakwebali̱ya mu maka ghaatu, kedha otali na kyaku̱lu̱wala, twakuha kyaku̱lu̱wala?
40025039	Tukakubona dhi̱ olwaye kedha oli mu nkomo twaghenda kukulola?’
40025040	“Mukama alibakuukamu ati, ‘Mbaghambiiye majima, kyona eki mwakoleeye omui mu baamaaha bani nankabha oghu batahu̱ti̱i̱ye, ni̱i̱si̱ye mwakikoleeye.’
40025041	“Niibuwo alighila abali haa luhande luwe lwabumesu nti, ‘Mu̱ndu̱ghʼo, enu̱we abaki̱i̱nu̱u̱we, mughende mu mulilo ghutahuwʼo oghwateekani̱li̱ji̱bu̱u̱we Si̱taani̱ na baamalai̱ka be.
40025042	Nanga njala ekaba enkwete tamwampaaye byokuliya. Eliyo linkwete tamwampaaye kyakunuwa,
40025043	Mukaba mutaamani̱ye, mutaaneebali̱ya mu maka ghaanu, neetaghisibuwagha kyaku̱lu̱wala mwabhenga kumpa kyaku̱lu̱wala, nkaba ndwaye kandi ndi mu nkomo mwabhenga kunkoonela.’
40025044	“Nabo dhee balikuukamu bati, ‘Mukama, tukakubona dhi̱ njala ekukwete, kedha eliyo likukwete, kedha otali na haakulaala, kedha niweetaaghisibuwa kyaku̱lu̱wala, kedha olwaye, kedha oli mu nkomo, tutaakukoonela?’
40025045	“Alibakuukamu ati, ‘Mbaghambiiye majima, kyona eki mutaakoleeye omui mu baamaaha bani nankabha oghu batahu̱ti̱i̱ye, ni̱i̱si̱ye mutaakikoleeye.’
40025046	“Niibuwo balitunga kifubilo kitalihuwʼo, bhaatu abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye batunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.”
40026001	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha bighambo ebi, aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati,
40026002	“Mukimani̱ye ngoku bi̱ti̱ghaaye bilo bibili Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo ku̱hi̱ka, kandi bakuhaayʼo Mwana wa Muntu kubambuwa haa musalaba.”
40026003	Niibuwo bakulu baa bahongi̱ na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya beekumaani̱li̱i̱ye mu kikaali kya Kayaafa, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona.
40026004	Baahanuula mu ki̱bi̱so kubbala mulingo balakwatilamu Yesu niikuwo bamwite.
40026005	Bhaatu baahanuula bati, “Tutamukwatila haa ki̱ghenu̱, nanga bantu batu̱wa nsi̱si̱.”
40026006	Bwile obu Yesu akaba ali mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbetaniya mu ka ya Si̱mooni̱ oghu bwile bumui akaba alwaye ntumbi.
40026007	Yesu anasitami̱ye naanaliya, mukali̱ aasa akwete cu̱pa esemeeye elimu bigita bisasi̱ye kandi bi̱tembi̱ye kwonini. Aabiseesela Yesu haa mutuwe.
40026008	Obu beeghesebuwa baaboone eki, baatamuwa, baaghila bati, “Bigita ebi byabhiihila ki?
40026009	Bangu̱bi̱ghu̱li̱li̱i̱ye haa bbei̱ ekani̱ye kandi sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu basiha banaku.”
40026010	Yesu aamanya ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana aabaghila ati, “Mukali̱ oni, mu̱ku̱mu̱bu̱ni̱ya ki? Ankoleeye kintu kisemeeye.
40026011	Banaku mukuukala nabo bwile bwona, bhaatu si̱ye tankuukala naanu bwile bwona bbaa.
40026012	Anseesi̱yʼo bigita kuteekani̱ja mu̱ku̱ ghwanje ngoku bakughusiigha bigita ninaaku̱u̱ye.
40026013	Mbaghambiiye majima, hoona-hoona hambali balatebejagha Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga munsi yoona, balaku̱mi̱yagha eki aakoli̱ye kini kumuusuka.”
40026014	Omui mu beeghesebuwa eku̱mi̱ na babili oghu baaghilaghamu Yu̱da Esikalyota, aaghenda mu bakulu baa bahongi̱,
40026015	aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buuye si̱ye ninaahaayeyo Yesu mu mikono yaanu, mukumpa biki?” Du̱mbi̱ baamubalila mikwenge maku̱mi̱ asatu ya sente, baamuhaayo.
40026016	Du̱mbi̱ bwile obu bwonini aatandikilʼo kubbala kahanda kaa kuhaayo Yesu mu bantu aba.
40026017	Obu kilo kyoku̱du̱bha kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kyahi̱ki̱ye, beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Kiihulo kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, okubbala tukuteekani̱li̱ye kiyo haa?”
40026018	Aabakuukamu ati, “Mughende mu kibugha ewaa musaasa omui, mumughile muti, ‘Mwegheesi̱ya aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye kukughila tuti: Bwile bwanje bwahi̱ki̱ye, si̱ye hamui na beeghesebuwa banje tukughenda kuliila mu numba yaawe Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.’ ”
40026019	Beeghesebuwa aba baaghenda baakola ngoku Yesu aabalaghiiye. Baateekani̱ja kiihulo kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.
40026020	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, Yesu na beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili baatandika kuliya.
40026021	Mbaanaliya, aaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, omui mu enu̱we, aku̱ngobeli̱ya!”
40026022	Beeghesebuwa be aba baatamuwa. Baatandika ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya, omui-omui, bati, “Mukama, buuye ni̱i̱si̱ye?”
40026023	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ni omui mu enu̱we, oghu akwete ku̱koli̱ya nanje mu bbaaku̱li̱, niiye aku̱ngobeli̱ya.
40026024	Mwana wa Muntu, aku̱ku̱wa ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti aku̱ku̱wa. Bhaatu oghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya ngaalikibona! Kyangubaaye kilungi nguli muntu oghu ataabyauwe.”
40026025	Du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da oghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, buuye ni̱i̱syoni?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ee nuuwe.”
40026026	Obu baanaliyagha, Yesu aakwata mugaati̱, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga. Aaghubhegha, aaghuha beeghesebuwa be aba, naaghila ati, “Mukwate, muliye, ghuni ni mubili ghwanje.”
40026027	Obu baamali̱ye kuliya mugaati̱ oghu, aakwata kiikopo kya vi̱i̱ni̱ aabaha yo, aaghila ati, “Munuwe eni enu̱we boona.
40026028	Ni saghama yanje ya ndaghaano, eghi ekuseesuwa haabwa bakani̱ye, kughaniluwa bibhi byabo.
40026029	Mbaghambiiye, tankutodha kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndighinuwa buhyaka, mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Tita.”
40026030	Niibuwo baali̱mbi̱ye kilimbo kya kusinda Luhanga, baatuwa, baaghenda haa mwena Oli̱va.
40026031	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Obwalo mukilo, enu̱we boona mu̱ku̱ndu̱ghʼo, mu̱nti̱ghe nenkaha, ngoku kili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Ndiita mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya, ntaama sihanjikane.’
40026032	Bhaatu haanu̱ma ya ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwanje, nkubadu̱bhi̱la kughenda Galilaaya.”
40026033	Peetelo aamughila ati, “Nankabha banji boona baku̱lu̱ghʼo, si̱ye tanku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo bbaa!”
40026034	Yesu aamukuukamu ati “Nkughambiiye majima, obwalo mukilo nkoko atakakooki̱ye okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu.”
40026035	Bhaatu Peetelo aatodha aagu̱mi̱li̱ya kimui ati, “Nankabha mba wa ku̱ku̱wa hamui naawe, tankukwehighaana bbaa.” Na beeghesebuwa baanakiye boona niikuwo baabu̱ghi̱ye batiyo dhee.
40026036	Niibuwo Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaghendi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki bakughilaghamu Getesemaani̱. Aabaghila ati, “Musitame hani, muleke ngende hali̱ nsabe.”
40026037	Aatwala Peetelo na batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo babili. Aatandika kwehi̱ghu̱wa atuntuliiye kimui kandi ali na bujune bukani̱ye.
40026038	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Neehi̱ghu̱u̱ye bujune bukaniiye kimui kandi bukubbala kunjita. Mu̱ti̱ghale hani kandi muukale mubhali̱i̱ye ngoku nanje mbhali̱i̱ye.”
40026039	Eesu̱kanʼo kabhii, aateeli̱ya, aatandika kusaba ati, “Tita, kikaakuba kigubhukaane, oleke ntabona-bona ntiyo. Bhaatu kitaba ngoku si̱ye mbbali̱ye, kibe ngoku obbali̱ye.”
40026040	Obu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye hambali beeghesebuwa be basatu aba bali, aabasanga baghwesaghiiye. Aabu̱u̱li̱ya Peetelo ati, “Tamwagu̱bhi̱ye kuukala nanje munabhali̱i̱ye kumala hakili saaha emui yonkaha?
40026041	Muukale mubhali̱i̱ye kandi musabe niikuwo kwohebuwa kutabasi̱ngu̱la. Majima mutima ghubbali̱ye kukola ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye, bhaatu maani̱ ghaa mubili ghonkaha taghakumala.”
40026042	Aatodha aakuukayo, mulundi ghwakabili aasaba ati, “Tita, Nkyabaaye kitaakugubhukana kubona-bona kuni ku̱ndu̱ghʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kwona-kwona kumbaayʼo, oleke eki obbali̱ye haaliikiyo kyakoluwa.”
40026043	Obu aatodhi̱ye kukuuka, aabasanga batodhi̱ye kughwesaghila, nanga tabaagubhagha kwi̱dha na ki̱koleli̱yo.
40026044	Nahabweki aabalu̱ghʼo aatodha aaghenda aasaba mulundi ghwa kasatu, naasaba ngʼebi aadu̱bhi̱ye ku̱bu̱gha.
40026045	Du̱mbi̱ aatodha aakuuka hambali beeghesebuwa be bali aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Munaghwesaghiiye, kandi munahuumuuye? Mu̱beeli̱ye haala; bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye! Mulole, Mwana wa Muntu, balimamuhaayo mu basi̱i̱si̱.
40026046	Muumuke, tughende! Mulole oghu alimamu̱ghobeli̱ya nguni!”
40026047	Yesu atakahendekeei̱ye ku̱bu̱gha, du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da, omui mu beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili, aaki̱dha. Aasa ali na kiigambi̱ kya bantu, bakwete mi̱i̱gho na bihiyo, batu̱mu̱u̱we bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya.
40026048	Yu̱da oghu akamu̱ghobeli̱ya aasanguwa aaghambiiye bantu aba ati, “Oghu nku̱hi̱ka kughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha, niiye oghu. Mumukwate.”
40026049	Makaki̱dha bati, aaghenda hambali Yesu ali, aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya nkulamu̱ki̱i̱ye!” Du̱mbi̱ aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha.
40026050	Yesu aamughila ati, “Bhootu̱ wanje, okole eki waasi̱ye kukola.” Du̱mbi̱ basaasa aasi̱ye na bo beebinga Yesu baamughwilikiilila, baamukwata.
40026051	Niibuwo omui mu baabaagha bali hamui na Yesu, aabhu̱li̱yeyo kihiyo kiye, aajombʼo mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona kutui.
40026052	Yesu aamughila ati, “Ku̱u̱ki̱ya kihiyo kyawe hambali waaki̱i̱hi̱ye, nanga boona abakulengaghʼo kwita bantu banji mbakoleesi̱ya bihiyo nabo dhee bantu banji balibaata mbakoleesi̱ya bihiyo.
40026053	Tamumani̱ye ngu nkugubha kusaba Tita kunkoonela, kandi haa mulundi ghumui ansindikile bi̱bbu̱la bya baamalai̱ka bisaaye eku̱mi̱ na bibili kundwanilila?
40026054	Bhaatu bini byona bikwete kulehukana niikuwo Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bigubhe ku̱hi̱ki̱i̱li̱la ngoku ghali majima.”
40026055	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki ati, “Munjisiiye na bihiyo na mi̱i̱gho nga baasi̱ye kukwata mu̱ji̱ndi̱ nangaaki? Bu̱li̱ kilo naakalagha naanu ni̱neegheeseli̱ya mu Numba ya Luhanga, tamwankwete bbaa.
40026056	Nahabweki ebikwete kulehukana bini byona niibuwo byasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebi̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo si̱ye.” Du̱mbi̱ beeghesebuwa baa Yesu boona baali̱gi̱ta, baamu̱ti̱gha enkaha.
40026057	Abakwete Yesu baamutwala ewaa Kayaafa, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, hambali beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baali beekumaani̱li̱i̱ye.
40026058	Bhaatu Peetelo aaghenda alabhi̱ye Yesu enu̱ma bukee-buke ali hambali haseli̱yʼo, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu aaki̱dhi̱ye hanjaakati ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona. Peetelo aasitama hamui na bali̱ndi̱ kulola ebi kubʼo.
40026059	Bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba hamui na baamemba boona baa Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱ baatandika kubbala bantu abakuha buukai̱so bwa bisubha ku̱si̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya Yesu musango niikuwo bamwite.
40026060	Bhaatu bataagubha kubutunga, nankabha bantu bakani̱ye mbaasi̱ye mbahabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya Yesu. Haakumaliilila babili baasa,
40026061	baamilila baahabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya Yesu bati, “Tukaaghu̱wa musaasa oghu naaghila ati, ‘Nkugubha kugenga Numba ya Luhanga eghi ntodhe ngikwele mu bilo bisatu.’ ”
40026062	Niibuwo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aamiliiye, aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Uwe tooli na kyakukuukamu? Tooghu̱u̱ye ebi bantu aba bakwete kukunyegheelela bati waakoli̱ye?”
40026063	Bhaatu Yesu aakala aholeei̱ye. Niibuwo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mu li̱i̱na lya Luhanga Mwomi̱i̱li̱ nkubbala endindi olahile mu maaso ghaa Luhanga oghu: otughambile olakaba aniiwe Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga?”
40026064	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, ni̱i̱syoni. Ti̱ nkubaghambila enu̱we boona nti, mulibona Mwana wa Muntu, asitami̱ye haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Luhanga, kandi naasa na bicu byʼomu eghulu.”
40026065	Du̱mbi̱ mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona oghu aatemula biigandulo ebi alu̱wete. Aaguga ati, “Tunaakubbala baakai̱so banji baaki? Enu̱we boonini mwehi̱ghwi̱li̱i̱ye ngoku ambuuye kwonini Luhanga!
40026066	Enu̱we mukucuwamu ki?” Bantu aba boona baagola bati, “Ghwamu̱si̱ngi̱ye; abhonganuuwe aku̱we!”
40026067	Du̱mbi̱ baatandika ku̱mu̱twi̱lakakila matanta kandi kumutalangi̱ya, banji baatandika kumutali̱ya,
40026068	mbanamughila bati, “Ki̱li̱si̱to uwe, otughambile, ni ani̱ aakuhuuye?”
40026069	Bwile obu Peetelo akaba asitami̱ye hanjaakati. Manaabukali̱, mu̱heeleli̱ya wʼomu ka eghi aasa, aaghila Peetelo ati, “Naawe waabaagha hamui na Yesu wʼomu Galilaaya.”
40026070	Bhaatu Peetelo eehighaana boona banamu̱loli̱ye ati, “Ebi okwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi tambimani̱ye bbaa.”
40026071	Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aalu̱ghʼo, aaghenda haa elembo. Manaabukali̱ onji aamubona du̱mbi̱ aaghila bantu abaabaaghʼo ati, “Musaasa oghu naye aabaagha na Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱.”
40026072	Bhaatu Peetelo aatodha eehighaana nalahiilila kimui ati, “Musaasa okughamba oghu, si̱ye tanimumani̱ye bbaa!”
40026073	Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, bantu abaali baamiliiyʼo, baasʼo Peetelo baamughila bati, “Majima kuwo naawe oli omui mu bantu abaabaagha na musaasa oghu, kandi mbu̱gha yaawe yooleki̱ye kwonini ngoku oli Munagalilaaya.”
40026074	Bhaatu Peetelo aatodha eehighaana, aalahila ati, “Ndakaba ni̱mbu̱gha bisubha, Luhanga ankiine. Musaasa mukughamba oghu, si̱ye tanimumani̱ye bbaa!” Du̱mbi̱ nkoko yaakooka.
40026075	Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aasuka ebi Yesu aamughambiiye ati, “Nkoko etakakooki̱ye, okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu.” Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aatuwa enja aatandika kulilila kimui.
40027001	Nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱, bakulu baa bahongi̱, na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, baagumbaana kuhanuula kandi kucuwamu ngoku balaata Yesu.
40027002	Baalaghila baasilikale kuboha Yesu baamutwala ewaa mu̱lemi̱ Pilaato.
40027003	Obu Yu̱da, oghu akamu̱ghobeli̱ya, aaboone Yesu mbaamu̱twi̱la musango ghwa kumwita, du̱mbi̱ eehi̱ghu̱wa ahemu̱ki̱ye, aaku̱ki̱li̱ya bakulu baa bahongi̱ bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya mikwenge maku̱mi̱ asatu ya sente baabaagha bamuhaaye,
40027004	Aabaghila ati, “Naasi̱i̱si̱ye ewaa Luhanga ku̱ghobeli̱ya muntu atali na musango.” Baamukuukamu bati, “Etu̱we eki kitukwetʼo ki? Ebi mbyawe!”
40027005	Du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da aabakubila sente esi mu Numba ya Luhanga, aaghenda eeni̱gha.
40027006	Bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba, baakoma-koma sente esi, baaghila bati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, taki̱hi̱ki̱ye kuta sente nga sini hambali bakubiikilagha bisembo mu Numba ya Luhanga. Sente sini syalu̱ghi̱ye mu ku̱ghobeli̱ya muntu niikuwo bamwite.”
40027007	Nahabweki baatu̱wamu ku̱koleesi̱ya sente esi kughulamu musili ghwa mu̱bu̱mbi̱ wa minagha niikuwo bajiikaghemu abatali na haa kubajiika.
40027008	Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya na obwalo, baaghughilamu bati, “Musili ghwa saghama.”
40027009	Eki baakoli̱ye eki kyasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi mulangi̱ Yelemi̱ya aasangu̱u̱we aghi̱li̱ye ati, “Baakwata bi̱twi̱ke maku̱mi̱ asatu bya feeja, muhendo oghu Banai̱saaleeli̱ baacuuyemu kumughula.
40027010	Baaghulamu musili ghwa mu̱bu̱mbi̱. Baakola eki kusighikila ngoku Mukama andaghiiye.”
40027011	Obu baami̱li̱i̱ye Yesu mu maaso ghaa mu̱lemi̱ Pilaato, aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Nuuwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, ngoku waakabu̱ghi̱ye.”
40027012	Obu bakulu baa bahongi̱, na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye, taabaku̱u̱ki̱yemu na kantu bbaa.
40027013	Niibuwo Pilaato aatodhi̱ye aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Tooghu̱u̱ye ebi bakwete kukunyegheelela bati waakoli̱ye?”
40027014	Bhaatu Yesu ataakuukamu na kantu, ti̱ Pilaato aasweka.
40027015	Ekaba eli ntwalikani̱ya ya mu̱lemi̱ Pilaato mu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kulekela munyankomo omui oghu Bayu̱daaya baasabagha bati alekele.
40027016	Bwile obu musaasa omui muheekela bamani̱ye munu li̱i̱na liye Balaba akaba ali mu nkomo.
40027017	Nahabweki obu kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyagumbaane, Pilaato aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ni ani̱ mukubbala mbalekeelele, Balaba kedha Yesu, oghu bakughilaghamu Ki̱li̱si̱to.”
40027018	Aabu̱u̱li̱ya atiyo nanga akaba amani̱ye ngoku bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baghiliiye Yesu etima, kandi ngoku lyaleki̱ye baamukwata, baamuleetela ye.
40027019	Pilaato anasitami̱ye haa ntebe aasitamaghʼo matwi̱la bantu misango, mukali̱ wee aamutumila butumuwa buni ati, “Musaasa ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu otamukolʼo kantu koona, nanga naaboona-boone munu haabuwe obwalo mu ndooti̱.”
40027020	Bhaatu bakulu baa bahongi̱ na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baahaaghi̱li̱li̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu kusaba kulekela Balaba niikuwo Yesu bamwite.
40027021	Niibuwo Pilaato aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mukubbala mbalekeelele ani̱?” Baakuukamu bati, “Balaba.”
40027022	Aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ti̱ Yesu, oghu bakughilaghamu Ki̱li̱si̱to, mukubbala nimukole ki?” Bantu boona baaghila bati, “Bamubambe haa musalaba!”
40027023	Pilaato aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Bamubambe nangaaki? Aatu̱u̱ye musango ki?” Bhaatu beeyongelela kimui kugola bati, “Bamubambe!”
40027024	Obu Pilaato aaboone bataakugubha ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, kuuyʼo bhaatu bantu aba mbeeyongela kugola kandi mbabbala ku̱tu̱wa nsi̱si̱, aakwata maasi aaghanaaba mu ngalo kwehighaana musango boona banamu̱loli̱ye. Aaghila ati, “Tandi na musango haa ku̱ku̱wa kwa musaasa oni. Oghu ni musango ghwanu!”
40027025	Bantu boona baakuukamu bati, “Oleke musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa kuwe ghutubʼo hamui na baana baatu!”
40027026	Du̱mbi̱ aabalekeelela Balaba. Aalaghila baasilikale baahuula Yesu bibbooko bya minuwa, aahaayo Yesu kumubamba.
40027027	Du̱mbi̱ baasilikale aba baatwala Yesu mu bbalaki̱si̱ yabo, baabilikilana boona baamweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya.
40027028	Baamu̱tu̱u̱bbu̱lamu ngoye siye, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka kiigandulo kiimutuku nga mukama.
40027029	Baali̱ngelela bilandilo bya mahuwa ghajambi̱ye, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka kiyo mu mutuwe nga sipeewa ya bukama. Baamukwati̱ya mwi̱gho mu mukono ghwabuliyo, baamu̱teeleli̱ya mbeekola nga bantu bamu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye nga mukama mbamughila bati, “Otuule, uwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya!”
40027030	Baamu̱twi̱lakakila matanta, baamuuyʼo mwi̱gho baakala kumuhuulanga mu mutuwe.
40027031	Obu baamali̱ye kumuwaawaani̱ya, baamu̱tu̱u̱bbu̱la ki̱lu̱walo eki baali bamu̱lu̱wi̱ki̱ye. Baatodha baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka ngoye siye, baamutwala kumubamba haa musalaba.
40027032	Baasilikale aba mbanatwala Yesu hambali bakumubambila, baasangaana musaasa alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kilene, li̱i̱na liye Si̱mooni̱. Baamuhambi̱li̱ja kuheeka musalaba oghu Yesu aabaagha aheeki̱ye.
40027033	Baaki̱dhi̱ya Yesu mu ki̱i̱kalo bakughilaghamu Gologota, (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, Ki̱i̱kalo kya Kahanga.)
40027034	Baamuha vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi bataabuuyemu mubaji̱ ghwa ku̱keehi̱ya busaali̱ji̱, bhaatu haanu̱ma ya ku̱loli̱yʼo kati̱i̱, aabhenga kughinuwa.
40027035	Obu bamali̱ye kumubamba haa musalaba, baakoma buluulu kumanya ngoku bakutambulana bi̱lu̱walo biye.
40027036	Baasitama baakala bamu̱li̱ndi̱ye anali haa musalaba oghu.
40027037	Musango oghwaleki̱ye baamubamba, baaghuhandiika haa kabbaau baakata haa musalaba elughulu ya mutuwe ghuwe ngu, “Oni niiye Yesu, Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.”
40027038	Baabamba dhee basuma babili haa misalaba. Ghwʼomui baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haa luhande lwabuliyo bwa Yesu, na ghwʼonji haa lwabumesu.
40027039	Ti̱ bantu abaasaalilaghʼo baatandika kumubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya mbanadhi̱ngi̱ya mituwe yabo,
40027040	mbaghila bati, “Nuuwe okaghila oti okugenga Numba ya Luhanga, kandi otodhe oghikwelele bilo bisatu! Dheluuni olakaba oli Mwana wa Luhanga, weejune! Osu̱ndu̱ke haa musalaba haala!”
40027041	Niikiyo kimui dhee bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, hamui na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baamusekeelela,
40027042	mbanaghambilana bati, “Hee! Aajunagha bantu banji, kusa aasaaghu̱u̱we kwejuna. Eye oghu aaghilagha ati niiye Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mukama wa I̱saaleeli̱, dheluuni asu̱ndu̱ke haa musalaba haala niikuwo tu̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je!
40027043	Akeesigha Luhanga, dheluuni amujune alakaba amubbali̱ye! Nanga akeeghila ati, ‘Ndi Mwana wa Luhanga.’ ”
40027044	Basuma aba baabambi̱ye hamui naye, niikuwo nabo baakamubbaaki̱i̱si̱i̱ye batiyo dhee.
40027045	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye saaha mukaagha sya ntangaali̱, mweli̱ma ghwakwata mu ehanga eli lyona, ghwahi̱ki̱ya saaha mwenda.
40027046	Saaha mwenda esi, Yesu aataka ati, “Elooi̱, Elooi̱, lama sabbakataani̱?” Ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, “Luhanga wanje, Luhanga wanje, wandu̱ghi̱yʼo bwaki?”
40027047	Bamui mu bantu abaali baamiliiyʼo obu baaghu̱u̱ye eki, baaghila bati, “Alimabilikila Eli̱ya.”
40027048	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa omui mu bantu aba aali̱gi̱ta aakoma kijibankoba, aaki̱lu̱bi̱ka mu vi̱i̱ni̱ esaaliiye. Aakiboha haa lukaaka, aaki̱ni̱i̱ni̱ya kukita Yesu haa mu̱nu̱wa niikuwo aanuwʼo.
40027049	Banji baaghila ati, “Omuleke, oleke tulole Eli̱ya alakaba naasa kumujuna!”
40027050	Yesu aatodha aatakila kimui nʼelaka lyamaani̱, du̱mbi̱ aatwi̱kana.
40027051	Bwile obu bwonini, kateni̱ eghi ekaba edhodhookeei̱ye mu Numba ya Luhanga yaatemukamu bihande bibili, ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la eghulu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya hansi. Ti̱ nsi yaadhingila kimui, bibaale byatika.
40027052	Bituulo byehighula, bantu bakani̱ye abaaku̱u̱ye bali bantu baa Luhanga baahu̱mbu̱u̱ka.
40027053	Baalu̱gha mu bituulo ebi haanu̱ma ya Yesu ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, baaghenda mu kibugha kilukwela Yelusaalemu bantu bakani̱ye baababona.
