40027054	Obu mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ baa Looma abaabaagha bali̱ndi̱ye Yesu, aaboone mu̱si̱ki̱ nʼebyabaayʼo byona, eye na baasilikale be boobaha kandi baaghila bati, “Majima musaasa oghu aabaagha Mwana wa Luhanga!”
40027055	Bakali̱ bakani̱ye bakaba baliyo, baamiliiye baloleeye haseli̱yʼo. Bakali̱ aba bakaba balu̱ghi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, baasi̱ye na Yesu e Yelusaalemu ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya mu ebi eetaaghisibuwagha.
40027056	Mu bakali̱ aba hakaba halimu, Mali̱ya Mangadhalina, Mali̱ya ni̱na Yakobbo na Yojeefu̱, hamui na ni̱na batabani̱ babili baa Jebbedaayo.
40027057	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, musaasa omui muguudha li̱i̱na liye Yojeefu̱ aaki̱dha. Musaasa oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Alimateya kandi oghu akaba ali mweghesebuwa wa Yesu.
40027058	Aaghenda ewaa Pilaato aamusaba ku̱mu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kujiika mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu. Pilaato aalaghila ati bamuhe ghuwo.
40027059	Yojeefu̱ oghu, aaghuboha mu si̱i̱ti̱ njelu mpyaka,
40027060	aaghutwala, aaghuta mu kituulo kiye kihyaka eki aali asangu̱u̱we ali̱mi̱ye mu kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to. Aahi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱ya ebaale liinamu̱li̱to, aali̱swi̱ki̱la haa mu̱nu̱wa ghwa kituulo eki, du̱mbi̱ eye aaghenda.
40027061	Mali̱ya Mangadhalina na Mali̱ya onji, baakala baloli̱ye ngoku akwete kuta mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu mu kituulo eki.
40027062	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, haanu̱ma ya kilo eki Bayu̱daaya beeteekani̱jagha haabwa kilo kya Sabhato, bakulu baa bahongi̱, na Bafali̱saayo baaghenda ewaa Pilaato.
40027063	Baamughila bati, “Wai̱tu̱, tukuusuka, munabisubha oghu, obu aabaagha anaakaaye akaghila ati, ‘Haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu nku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka.’
40027064	Nahabweki olaghile baasilikale balinde kituulo eki ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kilo kya kasatu. Tutaakoli̱ye eki beeghesebuwa be bakwisa baabhe mu̱ku̱ ghuwe baghambile bantu bati aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye. Ti̱ kisubha kyakumaliilila eki kikuba kibhi munu kusaali̱ya bisubha ebyadu̱bhi̱ye byona.”
40027065	Pilaato aalaghila ati, “Mughende na bali̱ndi̱ balinde kituulo eki bhyani.”
40027066	Du̱mbi̱ baatʼo bali̱ndi̱ kandi baata kaakulolelʼo haa ebaale lineeteeye kimui elyabaagha haa mulyango ghwakiyo kwoleka ngoku bali̱ndi̱ye kituulo eki.
40028001	Kilo kya Sabhato eki obu kyahooyʼo, kilo Kyasande nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ butakakeeye, Mali̱ya Mangadhalina na muunakiye onji oghu naye dhee baaghilaghamu Mali̱ya, baakeelela kughenda haa kituulo.
40028002	Hakabʼo mu̱si̱ki̱ ghwamaani̱ oghwadhi̱ngi̱i̱ye nsi, nanga malai̱ka wa Mukama akasu̱ndu̱ka ku̱lu̱gha eghulu. Aaghenda haa kituulo aahi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱ya ebaale lineeteeye kimui elyabaagha haa mulyango ghwa kituulo eki kandi aalisitamʼo.
40028003	Aabbyokelelagha nga nkubha kandi alu̱wete nkanji̱ njelu dhiyo nga bilika.
40028004	Abaabaagha bali̱ndi̱ye kituulo eki baakala kutukumila haabwa kumwobaha kandi baaba nga bantu baaku̱u̱ye.
40028005	Obu bakali̱ aba baaki̱dhi̱ye haa kituulo eki, malai̱ka oghu aabaghila ati, “Mutoobaha nanga nimani̱ye mukwete kubbala Yesu oghu baabambi̱ye haa musalaba.
40028006	Taali hani, aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye ngoku aabu̱ghi̱ye. Mwise mulole hambali baabaagha balangaai̱ye mu̱ku̱ ghuwe.
40028007	Nahabweki mughende bwangu mughambile beeghesebuwa be muti, ‘Aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye kandi akubadu̱bhi̱la kughenda Galilaaya. Eghi niiyo mukumubonela.’ Agha niigho makulu naabaghambiiye ku̱bu̱gha.”
40028008	Du̱mbi̱ bakali̱ aba baalu̱gha haa kituulo haala boobahi̱ye bhaatu badheedheleeu̱we kimui. Baali̱gi̱ta kughenda kughambila beeghesebuwa baa Yesu.
40028009	Bakali̱ aba mbanali̱gi̱ta ku̱lu̱gha haa kituulo, beetu̱lakaka Yesu naabasangaana mu kihanda. Aabalamu̱ki̱ya ati, “Mpempa!” Baamwisʼo, baamughuwa mu maghulu, baamulami̱ya.
40028010	Aabaghila ati, “Mutoobaha, mughende mughambile baanakyanje baghende Galilaaya, eghi niiyo bakumbonela.”
40028011	Bakali̱ aba mbanaghenda, bamui mu bali̱ndi̱ baaghenda mu kibugha baaghambila bakulu baa bahongi̱ byona ebyabaayʼo.
40028012	Obu bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baamali̱ye kuhanuula na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, baatu̱wamu kuha baasilikale abaabaagha bali̱ndi̱ye kituulo eki sente sikaniiye kimui,
40028013	baabaghila bati, “Mughile muti, ‘Beeghesebuwa be baasi̱ye mukilo baamwiba mu kituulo tughwesaghiiye.’
40028014	Nanga makulu agha mu̱lemi̱ waatu mukulu naaghaaghu̱u̱ye, etu̱we tukumusoboolola kusemeeye akenge, niikuwo atakolʼo enu̱we kantu koona.”
40028015	Nahabweki baasilikale aba baatwala sente esi, baabu̱gha ngoku bakulu aba baabaghambiiye. Makulu agha niigho baalalangi̱i̱ye mu Bayu̱daaya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya na obwalo.
40028016	Du̱mbi̱ beeghesebuwa baa Yesu eku̱mi̱ nʼomui aba baaghenda Galilaaya, haa mwena oghu aabaghambiiye kughendʼo.
40028017	Ti̱ obu baamuboone, baamulami̱ya, bhaatu banji baaghuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya.
40028018	Niibuwo Yesu aasi̱ye hambali bali aabaghila ati, “Luhanga ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwona bwa munsi na mu eghulu.
40028019	Nahabweki mughende muhindule bantu mu mahanga ghoona kuba beeghesebuwa banje, mubabati̱je mu li̱i̱na lya Eseetu̱we na lya Mwana na lya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
40028020	Kandi mu̱beegheesi̱ye kukwata byona ebi naalaghiiye enu̱we. Ti̱ mumanye majima ngoku ndi naanu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nsi ehooyʼo.”
41001001	Kitabo kini ki̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga.
41001002	Ngoku mulangi̱ I̱saaya aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ngu, “Ndituma mutumuwa wanje ahikile akuteekani̱li̱ye kihanda otakaasi̱ye.
41001003	Aliisa naalangilila mu elungu ati, ‘Mweteekani̱li̱je kwisa kwa Mukama; mukole ebi abbali̱ye!’ ”
41001004	Mutumuwa oghu Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye ni Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ oghu akaasa mu elungu naabati̱ja, kandi naalangilila ati bantu beekuukemu kandi babati̱i̱ji̱buwe niikuwo Luhanga abaghanile bibhi byabo.
41001005	Bantu bakani̱ye baalu̱gha Bu̱yu̱daaya yoona na Yelusaalemu, baaghenda ku̱mu̱tegheeleli̱ya. Ti̱ abaakaatulaagha bibhi byabo, ababati̱ji̱la mu maasi Yolodaani̱.
41001006	Yohaana oghu aalu̱walagha ki̱lu̱walo ki̱koleeu̱we mu byoha bya ngamila, aalu̱walagha mu̱ci̱pi̱ ghwa luhu. Aaliyagha njighe na bwoki bwa njoki ebi aagubhagha kutunga mu elungu.
41001007	Aalangililagha ati, “Oghu akwisa andabhi̱ye ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱, kandi tani̱hi̱ki̱ye na kuba mu̱heeleli̱ya wee.
41001008	Si̱ye niibuwo naababati̱ja na maasi, noo eye akubabati̱ja na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
41001009	Bwile obu Yesu aalu̱gha Najaaleeti̱ mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Yohaana aamubati̱ji̱la mu kyambu kya maasi Yolodaani̱.
41001010	Makalu̱gha ati mu maasi, aabona eghulu li̱i̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aamu̱su̱ndʼo nga ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo.
41001011	Elaka lyalu̱gha mu eghulu ndighila liti, “Nuuwe Mwana wanje oghu nku̱ndi̱ye, oghu needheedheeu̱we.”
41001012	Du̱mbi̱ Mwoyo aahi̱ki̱li̱ya Yesu kughenda mu elungu.
41001013	Aamalayo bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa Si̱taani̱ naanamwohi̱ya. Aakalagha na binyama bya mu kisaka; na baamalai̱ka baasa ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya.
41001014	Obu baabaagha bakwete Yohaana ali mu nkomo, Yesu aakuuka Galilaaya naatebejayo Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga.
41001015	Aaghila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bwahi̱ki̱ye! Mwekuukemu kandi mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga!”
41001016	Kilo kimui obu Yesu aasaalilagha haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja ya Galilaaya, aabona Si̱mooni̱ na mwana waani̱na wee Andeleya mbategha bu̱ti̱mba mu nanja; nanga bakaba bali bakomani̱ baa nsu̱i̱.
41001017	Aabaghila ati, “Munkwame, nkubafoola bakomani̱ baa bantu.”
41001018	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ na Andeleya baati̱gha bu̱ti̱mba bwabo, baamukwama.
41001019	Makeesu̱kanʼo kabhii, aabona baani̱na emui Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo, bali mu bwati̱ mbaghomola bu̱ti̱mba bwabo.
41001020	Du̱mbi̱ aababilikila, baamukwama, baati̱gha esebo Jebbedaayo na bakoli̱ be mu bwati̱.
41001021	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱. Obu kilo kya Sabhato kyahi̱ki̱ye, du̱mbi̱ aataaha mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya eegheesi̱ya.
41001022	Baaswekela kimui ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya, nanga aabeegheesi̱yagha na bu̱toki̱, etali nga beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo.
41001023	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete, oghu akaba ali mu elami̱li̱yo eli, aatandika kutakangana ati,
41001024	“Uwe Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, oku̱tu̱bu̱ni̱ya ki? Waasi̱ye ku̱tu̱tu̱wa? Nkumani̱ye, nuuwe Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye wa Luhanga.”
41001025	Bhaatu Yesu aatanuka ki̱li̱mu̱ eki ati, “Holi̱ya, kandi omu̱lu̱ghʼo!”
41001026	Ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyatu̱ku̱mi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kimui musaasa oghu, kyatakangana, kyamu̱lu̱ghʼo.
41001027	Bantu boona baasweka. Baatandika ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Kini nkiki? Ni njegheesi̱ya mpyaka! Musaasa oni ali na bu̱toki̱, bhaaba akubhingaghʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ kandi bi̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wa!”
41001028	Ti̱ makulu ghaa Yesu ghaamalakaka di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya yoona.
41001029	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱gha mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya eli, baaghenda mu ka ya Si̱mooni̱ na Andeleya. Yakobbo na Yohaana baaghenda hamui nabo.
41001030	Obu aaki̱dhi̱ye, baamughambila ngoku ni̱na mukaa Si̱mooni̱ oghu alwaye mu̱swi̱ja, alangaaye.
41001031	Niibuwo aataahi̱ye hambali mukali̱ oghu ali, aamukwata haa mukono, aamu̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya, mukali̱ oghu mu̱swi̱ja ghwamukililʼo, aatandika kubateekela.
41001032	Lwagholo olu musana ni ghwakoti̱ye, bantu baatandika kuleetela Yesu balwaye baabo boona, na bantu aba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete.
41001033	Bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi boona beekumaani̱li̱ya hanja haa mulyango ghwa numba eghi.
41001034	Aaki̱li̱ya balwaye bakani̱ye baa ndwala sya milingo yoona, kandi aabhingʼo bantu bakani̱ye bi̱li̱mu̱. Taabi̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye ku̱bu̱gha na kantu, nanga bikaba bimumani̱ye ngoku ali Mwana wa Luhanga.
41001035	Mu kaloo-kalo kaa kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, Yesu aamuka, aatuwa mu numba. Aaghenda haakpengbu̱ ya tau̱ni̱ eghi enkaha kusabilayo.
41001036	Si̱mooni̱ na baanakiye baaghenda kumubbala.
41001037	Obu baamuboone baamughila bati, “Bu̱li̱ muntu akwete kukubbala.”
41001038	Aabaghila ati, “Muleke tughende mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ eghi elabhaane na ghuni, ntebejeyo dhee. Nanga eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naasa munsi.”
41001039	Aabungila mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya yoona, naalangilila mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya, naanabhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱.
41001040	Musaasa alwaye ntumbi aasa ewaa Yesu, aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa Yesu, aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Olakaba obbali̱ye, gutu onki̱li̱ye niikuwo nsemele.”
41001041	Yesu aamukwatiluwa kisa, aananula mukono ghuwe aamu̱ku̱mʼo, aamughila ati, “Mbbali̱ye; kila!”
41001042	Du̱mbi̱ ntumbi yaalu̱ghʼo musaasa oghu, aakila.
41001043	Yesu aamulagha kandi aamwekonkomeelela ati,
41001044	“Otaghambila muntu nʼomui, kuuyʼo oghende ewaa mu̱hongi̱ akulole ngoku waaki̱li̱ye. Kandi ohonge kisembo eki Musa aalaghiiye nga buukai̱so mu bahongi̱ kubooleka ngoku waaki̱li̱ye kandi waasemela.”
41001045	Noo musaasa oghu aaghenda aalalangi̱ya makulu agha. Ekyalu̱ghi̱yemu, Yesu ataagubha kughenda bbeni̱-bbeni̱ mu maatau̱ni̱ nanga bantu baamwisaghʼo bakani̱ye. Nahabweki aaghenda mu elungu, bhaatu bantu baanalu̱gha hoona-hoona, baamwisʼo.
41002001	Haanu̱ma ya bilo bikee, Yesu aakuuka mu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo Kapelenau̱mu̱, ti̱ makulu ghaamalakaka ngoku aliyeyo.
41002002	Bantu baasa bakaniiye kimui nankabha hanja tawangu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kukuba kati. Aatebeja kighambo kya Luhanga.
41002003	Niibuwo basaasa bbanaa baasi̱ye baheeki̱ye musaasa aghenagheneeu̱we, mbamuleetela ye.
41002004	Bhaatu, haabwa bantu kukanilamu kimui, tabaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱mu̱ki̱dhi̱yʼo Yesu. Nahabweki baatobhola kihulu haa lusui lwa kisiika eki Yesu eegheeseli̱yaghamu, baakoteli̱yamu musaasa oghu bamulangaai̱ye haa kalili ke.
41002005	Obu aaboone ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo, aaghila musaasa aghenagheneeu̱we oghu ati, “Mwana wanje, bibhi byawe byakughaniiwe.”
41002006	Niibuwo bamui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo abaali basitami̱yʼo baatandi̱ki̱ye kweli̱li̱kana bati,
41002007	“Musaasa oni akugubha ati̱ya ku̱bu̱gha ngʼeki? Oku ni kwambula Luhanga! Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kughanila bibhi kuuyʼo Luhanga enkaha!”
41002008	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aakenga ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana, aabaghila ati, “Mukwete kweli̱li̱kana mutiyo nangaaki?
41002009	Eki̱dhooti̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ni kyahaa? Kughila mulema oni nti, ‘Bibhi byawe byakughaniiwe,’ kedha kumughila nti ‘Oomuke, okome kalili kaawe kandi olubhatange’?
41002010	Bhaatu nkubbala mumanye ngoku si̱ye, Mwana wa Muntu, ndi na bu̱toki̱ munsi muni kughanila bantu bibhi.” Aaghila mulwaye oghu ati,
41002011	“Nkulaghiiye, oomuke, okome kalili kaawe, weeghendele ewaawe!”
41002012	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aamuka, aakoma kalili ke, eeghendela; boona banamuloleleeye. Boona baaswekela kimui kandi baasinda Luhanga bati, “Tatukabonagha nga kini!”
41002013	Yesu aatodha aakuuka haa nanja ya Galilaaya. Kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyamwisʼo; aabeegheesi̱ya.
41002014	Naanasaala, aabona Leevi̱ mukumaani̱ya wa musolo mutabani̱ wa Alifaayo asitami̱ye mu ekumaani̱li̱yo liye. Aamughila ati, “Onkwame.” Leevi̱ aamuka, aamukwama.
41002015	Lwagholo olu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaliila mu numba ya Leevi̱. Bantu bakani̱ye, bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱ banji abaabaagha bamukweme, baaliya hamui naye na beeghesebuwa be.
41002016	Obu bamui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo abaabaagha bali Bafali̱saayo baaboone Yesu naaliya na bantu ngʼaba, baabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be bati, “Akuliyagha na bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱ nangaaki?”
41002017	Obu Yesu aaki̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Bantu abatalwaye tabakubbalagha mutambi̱li̱ bbaa, kuuyʼo abalwaye. Tanaasi̱ye haabwa bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bhaatu haabwa basi̱i̱si̱.”
41002018	Bwile bumui, beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ na Bafali̱saayo bakaba basi̱i̱bi̱ye. Niibuwo bantu baasi̱ye, baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati, “Beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana na Bafali̱saayo baku̱si̱i̱bagha, bhaatu beeghesebuwa baawe tabaku̱si̱i̱bagha, nangaaki?”
41002019	Aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti baghenu̱ abali mu bu̱ghenu̱ bwa kuswela bakugubha ku̱si̱i̱ba? Oghu akuswela anali nʼabo, tabakugubha bbaa.
41002020	Noo bwile bu̱li̱hi̱ka obu balibaayamu oghu akuswela oghu, obu niibuwo bali̱si̱i̱ba.
41002021	“Taaliyo oghu akubhandikagha ki̱twi̱ke kya lughoye luhyaka haa lughoye lukulu. Nanga ki̱twi̱ke kihyaka eki kikubhula lukulu olu kilutemule, kihulu kyeyongele.
41002022	Taaliyo nʼomui oghu akutaagha vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka mu mpu sikulu bbaa, nanga vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka eghi ekwati̱ya mpu sikulu esi eseeseke na mpu sibhiiye. Akutaagha vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka mu mpu sihyaka.”
41002023	Kilo kya Sabhato kimui, Yesu aasaalilagha mu misili ya ngano. Beeghesebuwa be mbanaghenda, baatandika kukobha mituwe ya ngano eghi.
41002024	Niibuwo Bafali̱saayo baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, mukwete kukola ekitabhonganuuwe kukoluwa haa kilo kya Sabhato nangaaki?”
41002025	Aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye tamukasomagha ebi Mukama Dhau̱dhi̱ aakoli̱ye obu eye naaba abaabaagha naye njala yaabaagha ebakwete?
41002026	Obu Abbyasaali̱ aabaagha mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, Dhau̱dhi̱ akataaha mu Numba ya Luhanga, aaliya migaati̱ eghi bahongi̱ bahongeeye Luhanga. Kandi aaghiha nʼabaabaagha naye. Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, migaati̱ eghi tayaalibuwagha bantu banji kuuyʼo bahongi̱ bonkaha.”
41002027	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Kilo kya Sabhato kiliyo haabwa kughasila bantu, bantu tabaliyo haabwa kilo kya Sabhato bbaa.
41002028	Nahabweki Mwana wa Muntu niiye Mukama wa kilo kya Sabhato.”
41003001	Bwile bunji Yesu aatodha aaghenda mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya, aasangamu musaasa anangi̱ye mukono.
41003002	Bamui mu bantu abaabaaghamu baabbalagha eki bakunyegheelelʼo Yesu. Baakala bamuloleleeye alakaba naamu̱ki̱li̱ya haa kilo kya Sabhato.
41003003	Yesu aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Wiise hani.”
41003004	Niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye haa kilo kya Sabhato kukola bisemeeye kedha bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye; ku̱ki̱li̱ya bwomi̱i̱li̱, kedha kwita?” Bhaatu muntu nʼomui taamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu na kantu.
41003005	Yesu aababu̱ngi̱li̱yamu maaso aakwatuwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha, aabasaalililuwa haabwa kwomakakana kwa mitima yabo. Aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Nanula mukono ghwawe.” Aaghunanula, ghwakililʼo.
41003006	Du̱mbi̱ Bafali̱saayo baatuwa, baaghenda baakola lukulato na bahagi̱li̱ baa Helude. Baahanuula ngoku balaata Yesu.
41003007	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱ghʼo, baaghenda haa nanja ya Galilaaya. Biigambi̱ bya bantu byamukwama mbi̱lu̱gha Galilaaya na Bu̱yu̱daaya.
41003008	Obu bantu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi akwete kukola, baalu̱gha Yelusaalemu, Bu̱du̱maayo, na bi̱twi̱ke bya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱. Na banji baalu̱gha Ti̱lo na Si̱dooni̱.
41003009	Haabwa bantu kukanila kimui, aaghambila beeghesebuwa be kumuteekani̱li̱ya bwati̱ bwa ku̱ni̱i̱namu, niikuwo bantu batamu̱mi̱ghi̱i̱li̱la.
41003010	Kilo eki aaki̱li̱ya balwaye bakani̱ye; baami̱ghi̱i̱li̱lanagha bati bamu̱ku̱mʼo.
41003011	Kandi bi̱li̱mu̱ byakamubonagha, bigenga hansi aba bikwete, bitakangana biti, “Nuuwe Mwana wa Luhanga!”
41003012	Bhaatu Yesu aabilaghila kwonini ati bitaghambila muntu nʼomui ngoku eye ali.
41003013	Haanu̱ma yʼebi Yesu aani̱i̱na haa mwena, aabilikila aba aabbali̱ye, baamwisʼo.
41003014	Aakomamu eku̱mi̱ na babili aba aaghi̱li̱yemu bakwenda be, kuukala naye kandi kubatuma kutebeja.
41003015	Aabaha bu̱toki̱ kubhingagha bi̱li̱mu̱.
41003016	Eku̱mi̱ na babili aba aakomi̱ye niibo bani: Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalu̱ki̱ye li̱i̱na Peetelo,
41003017	Baani̱na emui Yakobbo na Yohaana, batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo, aabaluka kibbaako Bbowaneleege, ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya “Basaakaaye nga nkubha.”
41003018	Andeleya, Fi̱li̱po, Batu̱lu̱maayo, Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa Alifaayo, Tadeewa, Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalwanililagha ehanga liye,
41003019	na Yu̱da Esikalyota oghu akamu̱ghobeli̱ya.
41003020	Obu Yesu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye hambali aakalagha, aataaha mu numba. Kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyatodha kyekumaani̱ya. Haabwa bantu aba kukanila kimui, Yesu na beeghesebuwa be tabaagu̱bhi̱ye kutunga bwile kuliya.
41003021	Obu nganda siye syaghu̱u̱ye ebi, syaghenda kumuuyayo, nanga bantu baaghilagha bati, “Aaghuuye esi̱le!”
41003022	Bamui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, abaahoni̱ye ku̱lu̱gha Yelusaalemu baaghila bati, “Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱ mukulu wa bi̱li̱mu̱ niiye amuli haa mutuwe, kandi niiye aamuhaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhinga bi̱li̱mu̱.”
41003023	Yesu aababilikila ati bamwebinge, aabatwi̱la nsi̱mo ati, “Si̱taani̱ akugubha ati̱ya kubhinga Si̱taani̱?
41003024	Bantu baa bu̱lemi̱ bumui mbaatandi̱ki̱ye kulwana bonkaha na bonkaha, bu̱lemi̱ obu tabukutuulʼo.
41003025	Kandi bantu baa ka emui mbaatandi̱ki̱ye kulwana bonkaha na bonkaha, ka eghi teekutuulʼo dhee.
41003026	Na Si̱taani̱ neelwani̱i̱si̱i̱ye eenini, akuba eetambulani̱i̱yemu eenini. Taakutuulʼo, akuba ahooyʼo.
41003027	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kwegimba mu numba ya musaasa wamaani̱ ku̱hu̱ngamu bintu biye, atadu̱bhi̱ye amuboha. Haanu̱ma ya kumuboha niikuwo ahu̱nge ebili mu numba ya musaasa oghu.
41003028	Mbaghambiiye majima, bu̱li̱ kibhi eki bantu bakukola kilighaniluwa nankabha kya kwambula Luhanga.
41003029	Bhaatu weena oghu akwambula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye taalighaniluwa. Musango ghwa kibhi eki ni ghwa bilo nʼebilo.”
41003030	Ekyaleki̱ye Yesu aabaghila atiyo ni nanga baaghilagha bati, “Ki̱li̱mu̱ kimuli haa mutuwe.”
41003031	Baana baani̱na Yesu na ni̱na wee, baaki̱dha. Baamilila enja, baatuma muntu kughenda kumughambila ngoku bakwete kumubbala.
41003032	Ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaali basitami̱ye mu numba bamweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, baamughila bati, “Njoko waawe na baana banjoko waawe bali enja bakukubbala.”
41003033	Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Maaha na baana baamaaha ni baahaa?”
41003034	Niibuwo aabu̱ngi̱li̱i̱ye maaso mu bantu abaabaagha basitami̱ye bamweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱nu̱we maaha na baana baamaaha.
41003035	Nanga weena oghu akukolagha ebi Luhanga abbali̱ye niiye mwana wamaaha, mwani̱naasi̱ye, kandi maaha.”
41004001	Yesu aatodha eegheeseli̱ya haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja ya Galilaaya. Naaneegheesi̱ya, kiigambi̱ kya bantu bakaniiye kimui kyagumbaana. Haabwa bantu aba kukanila kimui, aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱, aabusitamamu mu nanja, aatandika ku̱beegheesi̱ya bantu bo banali haa ki̱si̱yo.
41004002	Aabeegheesi̱ya bintu bikani̱ye naakoleesi̱ya nsi̱mo, aaghila ati,
41004003	“Lu̱si̱mo nduni! Mu̱li̱mi̱ akaghenda kumisa nsigho yee.
41004004	Obu aanamisagha, bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala mu kihandakati, noni̱ syasa syabuliya.
41004005	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala hʼetaka lya mabaale. Bwatuwa bwangu nanga etaka kutakanʼo.
41004006	Ti̱ obu musana ghwatooye, ghwabwoki̱ya, bwahotoka nanga mi̱li̱ yabuwo ekaba etataahi̱ye bhyani mu etaka eli.
41004007	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala mu mahuwa, ghaakula ghaasoosookeli̱ya ndimo eghi etaana na kantu.
41004008	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala hʼetaka lisemeeye, bwatuwa, bwakula, bwana. Kasigho kamui kaalu̱ghamu maku̱mi̱ asatu, kanji nkaagha, kanji ki̱ku̱mi̱.”
41004009	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Oghu ali na matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, aaghu̱we.”
41004010	Obu Yesu aabaagha ali enkaha, beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili na bantu banji abaabaaghʼo baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Nsi̱mo syawe esi sikumani̱i̱si̱yagha ki?”
41004011	Aabakuukamu ati, “Enu̱we mukaheebuwa nsi̱ta sya bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, bhaatu abali enja yabuwo, nsi̱ta esi baku̱si̱i̱ghwi̱lagha mu nsi̱mo,
41004012	niikuwo ‘kulola balole, bhaatu batabona; ku̱u̱ghu̱wa baaghu̱we, bhaatu bateetegheeleli̱ya, mbaakoli̱ye kuwo, bakukuukʼo Luhanga kandi abaghanile.’ ”
41004013	Aabaghila ati, “Tamwetegheleei̱ye lu̱si̱mo olu? Ti̱ na sinji syona mulasyetegheeleli̱ya mu̱ti̱ya?
41004014	Mu̱mi̱si̱ naaghambi̱ye oghu, eki akumisagha ni kighambo kya Luhanga.
41004015	Nsigho eghi ekamisuwa hʼetaka lyʼomu kihandakati, ni bantu abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga, du̱mbi̱ Si̱taani̱ aasa abaayamu kiyo.
41004016	Nsigho eghi ekamisuwa hʼetaka lya mabaale, ni bantu abaku̱du̱bhagha badheedhuwa mbaaghu̱wa kighambo kya Luhanga.
41004017	Bhaatu ngoku bilimuwa bitaakugubha kulebba bitali na mi̱li̱ etaahi̱ye bhyani mu etaka, niikiyo kimui na bantu aba. Baku̱du̱bhagha booleka kuguma, bhaatu bijibu kedha kuhighani̱ji̱buwa haabwa kighambo kya Luhanga mbyasa, du̱mbi̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo kubula.
41004018	Kandi nsigho eghi ekamisuwa mu mahuwa, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya bantu abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga,
41004019	bhaatu kwelalikiilila bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa nsi eni, kutwali̱li̱ji̱bu̱wa buguudha, kandi kweghomba bintu binji bileka kighambo kya Luhanga kitabalu̱ghi̱lamu mughaso.
41004020	Ti̱ nsigho eghi ekamisuwa hʼetaka lisemeeye, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya bantu abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga, baki̱si̱i̱ma, kandi kibalu̱ghi̱lamu mughaso. Kibaghasila milundi maku̱mi̱ asatu, banji nkaagha, banji ki̱ku̱mi̱.”
41004021	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Buuye haliyo muntu weena oghu akubhaki̱yagha kaatadhooba akaswi̱ki̱la na kighegha, kedha akata e bukungwisi. Akukataagha haa meeja niikuwo kabbeneli̱ye mu numba.
41004022	Taaliyo kintu kyona eki bantu balikolelela mu ki̱bi̱so ekitalimanuwa, kedha eki bali̱bi̱sa-bi̱sa ekitalimanuwa.
41004023	Oghu ali na matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, aaghu̱we, ti̱ eetegheeleli̱ye.
41004024	“Mutoho ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ebi nkwete kubaghambila. Ngoku mukwekamba ku̱tegheeleli̱ya, niikuwo mu̱kwetegheeleli̱ya, na kusaali̱yʼo.
41004025	Nanga oghu ali na kantu, niiye akwongeluwʼo, bhaatu oghu atali na kantu, nʼaka ali nako kakumuuhibuwʼo.”
41004026	Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga buli nga mu̱li̱mi̱ oghu akuhelagha nsigho yee mu musili.
41004027	Mukilo alangaala, nkyambisi aamuka kukola milimo yee. Nsigho etuwa, ndimo eekala neenakula, eye atamani̱ye ngoku ekwete kukula.
41004028	Etaka niiliyo li̱ku̱twesi̱yagha nsigho eghi; etuwa, ndimo ekula, yaana, ti̱ yeela.
41004029	Ndimo niyeela, du̱mbi̱ mu̱li̱mi̱ oghu aghikesa, nanga ekesa lyahi̱ki̱ye.”
41004030	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga tulabususaani̱ya na biki? Ti̱ tulakoleesi̱ya lu̱si̱mo ki kukusoboololʼo?
41004031	Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga kuli nga kasigho kaa kalatu̱u̱si̱ aka musaasa aatwete aahela mu etaka. Nankabha kali kasigho kaanabwana kusaali̱ya busigho bunji bwona.
41004032	Kakaakukulagha, kakufookagha, kiti kiinamu̱li̱to kusaali̱ya biti binji mu musili. Kiti eki kiba na bitai biinamu̱li̱to, ti̱ noni̱ sikwelamu bisui.”
41004033	Yesu aakabaagha naabu̱gha na bantu, aabatwi̱lagha nsi̱mo sikani̱ye ngʼesi. Aabeegheesi̱yagha ngoku baagubhagha kwetegheeleli̱ya.
41004034	Taabaghambiiye kantu na kamui etali mu lu̱si̱mo. Bhaatu aakabaagha eelebbeeye na beeghesebuwa be bonkaha, aabasoboololagha makulu ghaa nsi̱mo esi syona.
41004035	Lwagholo olu Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Muleke tubhasuke luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja.”
41004036	Baalu̱ghʼo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, baani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ obu Yesu aabaagha asitami̱yemu, baaghenda naye. Maati̱ ghanji ghaaghenda ghalabhi̱ye obwabo.
41004037	Niibuwo kyegha kyamaani̱ kyasi̱ye haa nanja. Mighina yaatandika kusamba bwati̱ obu. Maasi ghaabbala kubuusulamu haai ku̱bu̱li̱i̱ka.
41004038	Bhaatu Yesu akaba alangaaye haa kasuli kaa bwati̱ obu eegi̱mi̱ye kaapi̱lo, aghwesaghiiye. Beeghesebuwa be baamu̱su̱su̱mu̱la, baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, toosighaane? Twatwi̱ka!”
41004039	Obu aasu̱su̱mu̱ki̱ye, aamuka, aatanuka kyegha eki, aaghila nanja eghi ati, “Holi̱ya! Teekaana!” Du̱mbi̱ kyegha kyaleka, nanja yaateekanilana kimui.
41004040	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwobahi̱ye nangaaki? Tamu̱neesi̱ghi̱ye?”
41004041	Boobahila kimui, baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Oni ni muntu wa mulingo ki Kyegha na nanja nabiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wagha!”
41005001	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baabhasuka nanja, baaki̱dha mu kyalo kya Bagadala.
41005002	Makalu̱gha ati mu bwati̱, musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete aamwisʼo naalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki baajiikaghamu bantu.
41005003	Musaasa oghu aakalagha mu bi̱i̱kalo hambali baajiikagha bantu, kandi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aagubhagha kuukala amu̱bohi̱ye, nankabha na lujeghele.
41005004	Bunji nʼobunji baamubohagha mpi̱ngo na njeghele, bhaatu njeghele aasi̱tu̱wagha, mpi̱ngo aasihenanga. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aagubhagha kumulinda.
41005005	Eesalagha kandi aalaalagha mu bi̱i̱kalo bya bituulo na mu myena, naatakangana kandi neejombakaka na mabaale.
41005006	Obu aaboone Yesu, aasa naali̱gi̱ta, aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa Yesu.
41005007	Aatakanganilana kimui ati, “Yesu, Mwana wa Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona, oku̱mbu̱ni̱ya ki? Nkwesengeleei̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Luhanga, gutu otambona-boni̱ya!”
41005008	Aabu̱gha atiyo nanga Yesu akaba naaghambiiye ki̱li̱mu̱ eki ati, “Uwe ki̱li̱mu̱, omu̱lu̱ghʼo!”
41005009	Yesu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Li̱i̱na lyawe nuuwe ani̱?” Aakuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye Kiigambi̱; nanga tukani̱ye.”
41005010	Niibuwo eesengeleei̱ye Yesu kutabhinga bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi mu kyalo eki.
41005011	Haa mwena haai-haai, mpunu sikani̱ye sikaba siliyo nsiliya.
41005012	Bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi byesengeleli̱ya Yesu biti, “Otu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye tughende mu mpunu esi, oleke haaliisiyo twataahamu.”
41005013	Aabi̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya, byalu̱ghʼo musaasa oghu, byaghenda byataaha mu mpunu esi. Mpunu esi syona, haai nga nku̱mi̱ ebili, syali̱gi̱ti̱la kimui, syakota mu nanja, syatwi̱ki̱lamu.
41005014	Niibuwo bali̱i̱si̱ya baa mpunu esi baali̱gi̱ti̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ na mu mi̱bhi̱li̱, mbanaghambila bantu makulu agha. Du̱mbi̱ bantu baasa kulola ekyabaayʼo eki.
41005015	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, baasanga Yesu na musaasa oghu bi̱li̱mu̱ byali bikwete. Obu bantu aba baaboone musaasa oghu asitami̱ye, alu̱wete kandi ateekaane, boobahila kimui.
41005016	Boona abaaboone ebyabaayʼo musaasa oghu bi̱li̱mu̱ byabaagha bikwete kandi nʼebyabaayʼo mpunu esi, baaghambila bantu abaasi̱yʼo.
41005017	Du̱mbi̱ bantu aba beesengeleli̱ya Yesu bati alu̱ghe mu kyalo kyabo.
41005018	Yesu naanani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ kughenda, musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kyali kikwete aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye ngende niikalaghe naawe.”
41005019	Bhaatu Yesu aabhenga, aamughila ati, “Oghende ewaanu, obaghambile ebi Mukama aakukoleeye, kandi ngoku aakughiliiye kisa.”
41005020	Niibuwo musaasa oghu aaghendi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Tau̱ni̱ Eku̱mi̱ naanaghambila bantu ebi Yesu aamukoleeye. Abaaghu̱u̱ye boona baaswekela kimui.
41005021	Haanu̱ma Yesu aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱, aabhasuka nanja ya Galilaaya. Obu aaki̱dhi̱ye ebhi̱mba, ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu kiinamu̱li̱to kyekumaani̱ya, kyamweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya.
41005022	Niibuwo Yai̱lo, mwebembeli̱ wʼelami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu, obu aaboone Yesu, aasa aamwebinga, aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu,
41005023	naamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Muhala wanje wʼobuto alimaku̱wa! Gutu wiise omu̱ku̱mʼo niikuwo akile, abe mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
41005024	Nahabweki Yesu aasi̱i̱ma, aaghenda na Yai̱lo. Kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyamaani̱ kyaghenda ki̱mu̱gu̱mbi̱ye.
41005025	Mu kiigambi̱ eki hakaba halimu mukali̱ oghu akaba alwaye bulwaye bwa bakali̱. Alebbi̱ye na buwo kumala myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili.
41005026	Akaba naabona-boneeye kimui bwile bwona kuukala naaghenda mu batambi̱li̱ bakani̱ye. Aabaha sente siye syona kumutambila, bhaatu tabaagu̱bhi̱ye kumukoonela na kati̱i̱ konkaha. Kuuyʼo bulwaye buwe obu bwakalagha mbuneeyongela.
41005027	-
41005028	Akaba naaghu̱u̱yʼo makulu ghaa Yesu. Eeli̱li̱kana ati, “Ninaaku̱mi̱ye nankabha haa lughoye luwe, nkukila.” Mukali̱ oghu aasila enu̱ma sya Yesu mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki aaku̱ma haa lughoye lwa Yesu.
41005029	Makalu̱ku̱mʼo ati, du̱mbi̱ aakililʼo, kandi eehi̱ghu̱wa ngoku aaki̱li̱ye.
41005030	Haala hoonini Yesu eehi̱ghu̱wa maani̱ ghaa ku̱ki̱li̱ya ghamu̱lu̱ghi̱yemu, eegaali̱ya mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati “Ni ani̱ anku̱mi̱ye haa lughoye?”
41005031	Beeghesebuwa be baamukuukamu bati, “Oboone ngoku bantu bakani̱ye baku̱mi̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye, otodha obu̱u̱li̱ya oti, ‘Ni ani̱ anku̱mi̱yʼo?’ ”
41005032	Bhaatu Yesu aakala naanalolakaka mu bantu niikuwo abone oghu aamu̱ku̱mi̱yʼo.
41005033	Obu mukali̱ oghu aamani̱ye ekyamubaayʼo, aasa naatukumila, oobahi̱ye, aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu; aamughambila majima ghoonini.
41005034	Yesu aaghila mukali̱ oghu ati, “Muhala wanje, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Oghende mpempa; kubona-bona kwawe kwahooyʼo.”
41005035	Naanabu̱gha, basaasa baalu̱gha mu ka ya Yai̱lo mwebembeli̱ wʼelami̱li̱yo eli, baaghila Yai̱lo oghu bati, “Oleke ku̱lu̱hi̱li̱ya busa Mwegheesi̱ya, muhala waawe aaku̱u̱ye!”
41005036	Yesu aaghu̱wa, bhaatu aaghaya ebi basaasa aba bakwete ku̱bu̱gha, aaghila mwebembeli̱ oghu ati, “Oleke kwobaha. Weesighe Luhanga enkaha.”
41005037	Taasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye bantu banji kughenda naye kuuyʼo Peetelo hamui na banaani̱na emui Yakobbo na Yohaana.
41005038	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu ka ya mwebembeli̱ Yai̱lo, baasanga bantu mbalila kandi mbatakanganilana kimui.
41005039	Yesu aataaha mu numba, aaghila bantu aba ati, “Mukwete kulila, nimukolekana mutiyo nangaaki? Mwana oni taaku̱u̱ye bbaa, aaghwesaghiiye kwonkaha.”
41005040	Bantu aba baamusekeelela. Bhaatu aabaghila ati boona batuwe mu numba eghi. Baatuwa, aati̱ghalamu na ese na ni̱na manaabukali̱ oghu, na beeghesebuwa be basatu. Du̱mbi̱ baataaha mu kisiika eki balangaai̱yemu mu̱ku̱ ghwa manaabukali̱ oghu.
41005041	Yesu aamukwata haa mukono, aamughila ati, “Tali̱i̱ta ku̱mu̱!” Ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, “Manaabukali̱, oomuke!”
41005042	Du̱mbi̱ aamuka, aatandika kulubhatanga. (Manaabukali̱ oghu akaba ali na myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili.) Babyaye be na beeghesebuwa baa Yesu, abaabaagha mu kisiika eki baaswekela kimui.
41005043	Bhaatu aabeekonkomeelela ati bataghambila muntu nʼomui ebyabaayʼo. Du̱mbi̱ aaghila babyaye baa manaabukali̱ oghu ati baahe manaabukali̱ oghu byokuliya.
41006001	Yesu aalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, aaghenda hamui na beeghesebuwa be mu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo Najaaleeti̱.
41006002	Kilo kya Sabhato ekyalabhi̱yʼo, eegheeseli̱ya mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya. Bakani̱ye abaamu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye baasweka kandi baabu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Musaasa oni, aahi̱ye haa magheji na bu̱toki̱ kukola byakuswekani̱ya bitiyo?
41006003	Oni taaniiye mulandi̱ wa mbaau, mwana wa Mali̱ya? Taaniiye mwana waani̱na Yakobbo, Yose, Yu̱da, na Si̱mooni̱? Tooli̱, baana baani̱na wee boobukali̱ tabakuukalagha ewaatu hani” Du̱mbi̱ bantu aba baamwetamuwa.
41006004	Niibuwo Yesu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mulangi̱ baku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱yagha hanji hoona-hoona, noo mu bantu bʼewaabo, nʼomu ka yʼewaabo tabaku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱yagha yo bbaa.”
41006005	Nahabweki taagu̱bhi̱ye kukolelayo kyakuswekani̱ya na kimui, kuuyʼo aaku̱mʼo balwaye bakee, aabaki̱li̱ya.
41006006	Ti̱ aaswekela kimui haabwa kutahi̱ki̱li̱ja kwa bantu aba. Niibuwo aaghendi̱ye mu bu̱li̱ mu̱bhi̱li̱, neegheesi̱yayo.
41006007	Yesu aabilikila beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili kumwisʼo. Aabatuma babili-babili, kandi aabaha bu̱toki̱ kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱.
41006008	-
41006009	Bhaatu batakaghendi̱ye, aabalaghila ati, “Mutaghenda na byokuliya, bikapa, na sente. Kandi mutaghenda na ngoye sinji, kuuyʼo esi mu̱lu̱wete syonkaha. Bhaatu oghu abbali̱ye kughenda na mwi̱gho, aghende na ghuwo, nʼoghu abbali̱ye kughenda na nkai̱to, asi̱lu̱wale.
41006010	Ka eghi balabeebali̱yaghamu, muukalaghemu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱lu̱ghi̱yeyo.
41006011	Hantu hoona-hoona hambali batalabeebali̱yagha kandi babhenga kubaaghu̱wa, obu mulabaagha ni̱mu̱lu̱ghayo mu̱ku̱nku̱mu̱laghe tu̱u̱tu̱ ya mu bighanja byanu kwoleka ngoku Luhanga alifubila bantu aba. Obu buliba buukai̱so ku̱si̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya bantu aba musango.”
41006012	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be aba baaghendi̱ye mbatebeja bati bantu beekuukemu.
41006013	Baabhingʼo bantu bakani̱ye bi̱li̱mu̱, baasiigha balwaye bakani̱ye magita, baabaki̱li̱ya.
41006014	Makulu ghaa Yesu ghaamalakakila kimui kyalo eki kyona. Mukama Helude naye aamu̱u̱ghu̱wʼo. Bantu banji baaghilagha bati, “Oghu ni Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye naakola byakuswekani̱ya ebi byona.”
41006015	Banji baaghila bati, “Ni Eli̱ya.” Na banji bati, “Ni mulangi̱ ngʼabambele.”
41006016	Bhaatu obu Helude aaghu̱u̱ye makulu agha, aaghila ati, “Oghu ni Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱, oghu naalaghiiye nti bajombʼo mutuwe. Niiye aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye.”
41006017	-
41006018	Ku̱ku̱wa kwa Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ kukalu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la haa Helude kuswela Helu̱di̱ya, mukaa waani̱na wee Fi̱li̱po. Nanga Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ oghu aakalagha naaghambila Helude ati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, taki̱hi̱ki̱ye kuswela naali syawe, wanjoko waawe Fi̱li̱po anaakaaye.” Haabwa Helude kubbala kukola eki̱dheedhi̱ye Helu̱di̱ya, aalaghila ati bakwate Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱. Baamukwata, baamuboha, baamuta mu nkomo.
41006019	Bwile obu bwona Helu̱di̱ya akaba anali na bu̱ghi̱ghu̱ na Yohaana. Aabbalagha bamwite, bhaatu kitaagubhukana,
41006020	nanga Helude akaba oobahi̱ye Yohaana. Akaba amumani̱ye ngoku ali muntu mulungi kandi ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Niikiyo kyali ki̱leki̱ye amu̱li̱ndi̱ye kusemeeye. Aabbalagha ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ebi Yohaana aabu̱ghagha, bhaatu aakabi̱i̱ghu̱wagha asobeeleluwa kimui.
41006021	Kilo kimui, Helu̱di̱ya aatunga kahanda kaa kukwati̱i̱si̱lani̱yamu Yohaana oghu obu kilo kya ki̱ghenu̱ kya kuusuka ku̱byaluwa kwa Helude kyahi̱ki̱ye. Haabwa ki̱ghenu̱ eki, Helude aabilikila bakulu baa balemi̱, bakulu baa baasilikale, na bengei̱ bʼomu Galilaaya.
41006022	Kilo eki, muhala wa Helu̱di̱ya aataaha hambali ki̱ghenu̱ eki kyabaagha, aabi̱ni̱la baghenu̱ aba. Mukama Helude oghu na baghenu̱ be aba baadheedheluwa kimui. Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye manaabukali̱ oghu ati, “Osabe kyona eki okubbala, nkukuha kiyo.”
41006023	Aagu̱mi̱ya ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye ebi naalahila ati, “Kyona eki olakasaba, nankabha kihande kya bukama bwanje, nkukuha kiyo.”
41006024	Niibuwo manaabukali̱ oghu aatooye, aaghenda aabu̱u̱li̱ya ni̱na wee ati, “Nsabe biki” Ni̱na wee aamukuukamu ati, “Osabe mutuwe ghwa Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱.”
41006025	Du̱mbi̱ aakuuka bwangu-bwangu, aaghambila Mukama Helude oghu ati, “Nkubbala ompe endindi mutuwe ghwa Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ haa sahaani̱.”
41006026	Kintu eki kyasaalila Mukama Helude nanga taabbalagha kwita Yohaana. Bhaatu taagu̱bhi̱ye kubhenga nanga akaba naamali̱ye kulahila mu maaso ghaa baghenu̱ be ati akumuha eki alakasaba kyona.
41006027	Du̱mbi̱ Mukama Helude aatuma omui mu baasilikale be kughenda mu nkomo kujombʼo Yohaana mutuwe. Aaghenda bwangu-bwangu aamujombʼo ghuwo,
41006028	aaghuleetela haa sahaani̱, aaghuha manaabukali̱ oghu; naye aaghuha ni̱na wee.
41006029	Obu beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana baaghu̱u̱ye makulu agha, baaghenda baayayo mu̱ku̱ ghuwe, baaghujiika mu kituulo.
41006030	Bakwenda baa Yesu baakuuka ku̱lu̱gha hambali aabatu̱mi̱ye, baamughambila byona ebi beegheeseei̱ye nʼebi baakoli̱ye.
41006031	Bantu bakani̱ye baakalagha mbaasa bataakulekeelela, ti̱ Yesu na beeghesebuwa be tabaatungagha na bwile kuliya. Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mwise tughende haakpengbu̱ hambali tukugubha kuba etu̱we bonkaha, tuhuumule.”
41006032	Baani̱i̱na bwati̱ baaghenda hambali muntu atali niikuwo bagubhe kuba bonkaha.
41006033	Bhaatu bantu bakani̱ye baababona mbaghenda, baakenga hambali bakwete kughenda. Bantu baalu̱gha mu buutau̱ni̱ bwona, baadu̱bha ku̱ki̱dhi̱layo Yesu na beeghesebuwa be.
41006034	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye makalu̱gha ati mu bwati̱, aabona haa ki̱si̱yo kiigambi̱ kya bantu bakani̱ye, aabakwatiluwa kisa, nanga bakaba bali nga ntaama esitali na mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya. Niibuwo aatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱beegheesi̱ya bintu bikani̱ye.
41006035	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, beeghesebuwa be baamwisʼo, baamughila bati, “Eni tuli mu elungu, kandi bwile bulimaala.
41006036	Olaghe bantu baghende, niikuwo bagubhe kweghulila byokuliya mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ haai-haai.”
41006037	Aabakuukamu ati, “Enu̱we mubahe byokuliya.” Baamukuukamu bati, “Okubbala oti tughende tughule byokuliya bya sente syengaane na musaala oghu muntu akukolela kumala meeli̱ munaanaa, haaliibiyo twabaha baaliya?”
41006038	Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Muli na migaati̱ eti̱ya? Mu̱du̱bhe mughilole.” Obu baamani̱ye eghi bali nayo, baamughila bati, “Tuli na etaano na nsu̱i̱ ebili bhembei̱.”
41006039	Yesu aalaghila bantu aba boona ati basitame mu bi̱bbu̱la haa bu̱si̱ngo.
41006040	Baasitama mu bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu ki̱ku̱mi̱-ki̱ku̱mi̱ na maku̱mi̱ ataano-ataano.
41006041	Aakwata migaati̱ etaano eghi na nsu̱i̱ ebili esi. Aalola eghulu, aasi̱i̱ma Luhanga haabwa byokuliya ebi. Kandi aabheghanga migaati̱ eghi na nsu̱i̱ esi. Aakala naanabiha beeghesebuwa be kubiha bantu aba. Aabheghanga dhee na nsu̱i̱ ebili esi aabaha siyo.
41006042	Bantu aba boona baaliya baakutila kimui.
41006043	Beeghesebuwa be baakumaani̱ya bulaghalikuwa bwa byokuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo haa nsu̱i̱ na migaati̱ eghi, baasu̱li̱ya bighegha eku̱mi̱ na bibili.
41006044	Kandi bantu abaaliiye byokuliya ebi, bakaba bali basaasa nku̱mi̱ etaano.
41006045	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalaghila beeghesebuwa be bani̱i̱na bwati̱, bamuhikila kughenda luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja e Bbetesai̱da, eye aati̱ghala naalagha ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba.
41006046	Haanu̱ma ya kubalagha, aaghenda haa mwena kusaba.
41006047	Mukilo eghi, bwati̱ obu bukaba mbwahi̱ki̱ye haagati ya nanja; eye anati̱ghaaye ebhi̱mba enkaha.
41006048	Aalangi̱ya beeghesebuwa be aba, mbatalibana ku̱lu̱ka na maani̱ ghaabo ghoona, nanga mwegha ghwalu̱ghagha hambali baaghendagha. Obu bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye mukilo handinga-ndi̱nga, aaghenda naalubhatangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya nanja, aabeebinga, aabbala kubasaala.
41006049	Bhaatu obu beeghesebuwa be baamuboone naalubhatangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya nanja, beeli̱li̱kana bati ni mu̱li̱mu̱. Baatandika kutakangana,
41006050	nanga boona bakaba makamubona bati boobahila kimui. Du̱mbi̱ aabaghila ati, “Mutoobaha, muteekaane! Ni̱i̱syoni.”
41006051	Niibuwo aani̱i̱ni̱ye mu bwati̱ hambali bali, mwegha ghwalekelʼo. Beeghesebuwa be aba baaswekela kimui.
41006052	Nankabha mbaaboone kyakuswekani̱ya eki aakoli̱ye, obu aakani̱i̱ye migaati̱ etaano hamui na nsu̱i̱ ebili, tabeetegheleei̱ye makulu ghaakiyo. Mitima yabo ekaba yoomakakaane.
41006053	Baabhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja baaki̱dha mu kyalo kya Genesaleeti̱. Baaboha bwati̱ bwabo obu haa ki̱si̱yo.
41006054	Makabu̱lu̱ghamu bati du̱mbi̱ bantu baayo baamumaniilila.
41006055	Bantu aba baali̱gi̱ta bwangu-bwangu mu byalo hoona-hoona, baamuleetela balwaye baabo, babaheekeeye haa mikeka, mbabatwala hambali baaghu̱u̱ye ali.
41006056	Hoona-hoona hambali Yesu aaki̱dhagha mu mi̱bhi̱li̱, kedha mu maatau̱ni̱ bantu baaleetagha balwaye baabo, babata mu butale. Bantu aba baamwesengeleli̱yagha bati hakili asi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye balwaye baabo baku̱me kati̱i̱ haa lughoye luwe. Ti̱ boona abaaku̱maghʼo baakilagha.
41007001	Kilo kimui bamui mu Bafali̱saayo na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo abaalu̱ghi̱ye Yelusaalemu, baasa baagumbaana hambali Yesu ali.
41007002	Baabona bamui mu beeghesebuwa be mbaliya batanaabi̱ye mu ngalo mu mulingo ghwonini oghu Bafali̱saayo beegheesi̱yagha bati bantu babhonganuuwe kunaabamu.
41007003	(Bayu̱daaya, kukila munu Bafali̱saayo tabaaliyagha batadu̱bhi̱ye kunaaba mu ngalo ngoku mi̱ghendi̱yo ya baataata baabo yaabalaghilagha.
41007004	Niikiyo kimui dhee baakalu̱ghagha mu katale, tabaaliyagha kantu batadu̱bhi̱ye kunaaba mu ngalo kwonini. Kandi baakolagha mi̱ghendi̱yo enji ekani̱ye, kyakulolelo nga kunaabi̱ya biikopo, minagha, na capu̱li̱ya, ebi baakoleesi̱yagha mbaliya.)
41007005	Niibuwo Bafali̱saayo hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo aba, baabu̱u̱i̱ye Yesu bati, “Beeghesebuwa baawe aba tabakwete mi̱ghendi̱yo ya baataata baatu nangaaki? Olole, bakwete kuliya batanaabi̱ye mu ngalo kwonini!”
41007006	Aabakuukamu ati, “Ngobi̱ya enu̱we! Mulangi̱ I̱saaya akahi̱ki̱ya kulanga naababu̱ghʼo ngoku kili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we kiti, “ ‘Bantu bani baku̱mpu̱ti̱yagha mu kanu̱wa kwonkaha, bhaatu mu mitima yabo tabampu̱ti̱i̱ye bbaa.
41007007	Baku̱bhi̱i̱yagha bwile bwabo kundami̱ya; nanga bakwegheesi̱yagha bilaghilo bya bantu kwonkaha.’ ”
41007008	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we mukulekagha bilaghilo ebi Luhanga aahaaye, mwebohela haa mi̱ghendi̱yo ya bantu.
41007009	Muli na mulingo ghwanu ghusemeeleeye kimui, ghwa kubhenga bilaghilo ebi Luhanga aahaaye niikuwo mwebohele haa mi̱ghendi̱yo yaanu.
41007010	Nanga Musa akaghila ati, ‘Ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe’ ti̱, ‘Weena oghu alakiinagha ese wee kedha ni̱na wee bamwitaghe.’
41007011	Bhaatu enu̱we mukughilagha muti takili kibhi muntu kughila ese wee kedha ni̱na wee ati, ‘Onganile bu̱kooneli̱ obu nangukuhaaye naamali̱ye kwelaghiisani̱ya kubuhaayo nga kisembo ewaa Luhanga.’
41007012	Tamu̱ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱yagha muntu kukoonela ese wee kedha ni̱na wee.
41007013	Obu mu̱ku̱bu̱ghagha mutiyo, mukubaagha ni̱mu̱dhi̱bi̱ya kighambo kya Luhanga haabwa mi̱ghendi̱yo yaanu mweteeleeyʼo. Kandi mukola dhee bintu binji bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ngʼeki.”
41007014	Yesu aatodha aabilikila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo ati bamwebinge. Aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we boona mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye kandi mwetegheeleli̱ye.
41007015	Ebi muntu akuliyagha taaniibiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ewaa Luhanga. Ebi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ni ebi̱ku̱mu̱lu̱ghaghamu. [
41007016	Oghu ali na matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, aaghu̱we, ti̱ eetegheeleli̱ye.”]
41007017	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, mbaataaha mu numba, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya eki aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye mu lu̱si̱mo olu.
41007018	Aabaghila ati, “Naanu tamwetegheleei̱ye dhee? Tamuboone ngoku ebi muntu akuliyagha ngoku bitaaku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ewaa Luhanga.
41007019	Nanga tabikughendagha mu mutima ghuwe, bhaatu bikumughendagha mu etundu du̱mbi̱ bituwa mu mubili ghuwe.” (Yesu ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, akagu̱mi̱ya ngoku byokuliya byona bisemeeye kuliibuwa.)
41007020	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Ebi muntu aku̱bu̱ghagha niibiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ewaa Luhanga.
41007021	Nanga haa mutima ghwa muntu niiyo aku̱lu̱ghagha: byeli̱li̱kano bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, bu̱syani̱ bwa bantu abataswelangaane, busuma, bu̱ji̱ndi̱, bu̱syani̱ bwa muntu oghu asweye kedha oghu asweuwe,
41007022	mululu, bubhi, bisubha, bughuwa-ghuwa, etima, kuhabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, myepanko, budhoma-dhoma.
41007023	Bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi byona bi̱ku̱lu̱ghagha haa mutima ghwa muntu, kandi niibiyo bi̱ku̱mu̱bhi̱i̱yagha ewaa Luhanga.”
41007024	Yesu aalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, aaghenda mu kyalo ekyeli̱ghi̱li̱li̱i̱ye Ti̱lo na Si̱dooni̱, aataaha mu numba. Nankabha ataali abbali̱ye ati bantu bamanye ngoku aliyeyo, baanamanya dhee.
41007025	Obu mukali̱ oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kyali kikwete muhala wee, aabaaye makaaghu̱wa ngoku Yesu aliyeyo, du̱mbi̱ aasa aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu.
41007026	Aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Gutu, obhingʼo muhala wanje ki̱li̱mu̱ ekimukwete.” Mukali̱ oghu akaba atali Mu̱yu̱daaya, bakaba bamubyaliiye Foni̱ke, mu kyalo kya Si̱li̱ya.
41007027	Yesu aaghila mukali̱ oghu ati, “Oleke baana badu̱bhe baakute, nanga taki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukwata byokuliya byabo kubikubila mbuwa.”
41007028	Mukali̱ oghu aakuukamu Yesu ati, “Mukama wanje waabu̱ghi̱ye majima ghoonini, bhaatu, mbuwa nasiyo, sikuliyagha bu̱u̱kou̱ obukulaghalagha baana.”
41007029	Niibuwo Yesu aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Waaku̱u̱ki̱yemu kusemeeye. Ti̱ haabwa eki waaku̱u̱ki̱yemu eki, oghende e ka ewaawe, muhala waawe ki̱li̱mu̱ kyamu̱lu̱ghi̱yʼo.”
41007030	Obu mukali̱ oghu aaki̱dhi̱ye ewe e ka, aasanga muhala wee oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kyali kikwete alangaaye, ki̱li̱mu̱ eki nkyamu̱lu̱ghi̱yʼo.
41007031	Yesu aalu̱gha mu kyalo kyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye Ti̱lo, aasaalila Si̱dooni̱, aaghenda mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Tau̱ni̱ Eku̱mi̱ haai-haai na nanja ya Galilaaya.
41007032	Bantu baamuleetela musaasa ntaama-taami̱ oghu matui ghaaghaaye. Baamwesengeleli̱ya bati aaku̱mʼo musaasa oghu niikuwo akile.
41007033	Yesu aaya musaasa oghu mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba, aamutwala haakpengbu̱. Aata byala biye mu matui ghaa musaasa oghu. Eetu̱wa matanta haa byala, aaghasiigha musaasa oghu haa kilimi.
41007034	Aalola eghulu, eehu̱mi̱ya, aaghila mu Lulamai̱ki̱ ati, “Efata!” Ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, “Eeghulika!”
41007035	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aatandika ku̱bu̱gha kandi ku̱u̱ghu̱wa kusemeeye.
41007036	Niibuwo Yesu aaghambiiye bantu abaabaaghʼo aba ati bataghambila muntu nʼomui ekyabaayʼo. Bhaatu ngoku aakabaghambiiye ati bataghambila muntu nʼomui niikuwo baakaghendi̱ye mbaghambila bantu makulu agha.
41007037	Obu bantu baaghaaghu̱u̱ye, baaswekela kimui, baaghila bati, “Byona ebi akukolagha bisemeeye bhaawai̱! Aku̱ki̱li̱yagha ntaama-taami̱ si̱bu̱gha, kandi aki̱li̱ya abaaghaaye matui baaghu̱wa.”
41008001	Bwile obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu kinji kiinamu̱li̱to kyatodha kyagumbaana hambali Yesu ali. Obu byokuliya byahweleeye bantu aba, aabilikila beeghesebuwa be, aabaghila ati,
41008002	“Neehi̱ghu̱u̱ye nkwatiluuwe bantu aba kisa. Baamali̱ye nanje hani bilo bisatu, kandi byokuliya byabahweleeye.
41008003	Ninaabalaghi̱ye baghenda batiyo njala, bakusalikila mu kihanda nanga bamui mu bantu aba baalu̱ghi̱ye haseli̱ye.”
41008004	Beeghesebuwa be baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Eni tuli mu elungu, byokuliya bikumala bantu aba boona tukugubha kubiiya haa?”
41008005	Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Muli na migaati̱ eti̱ya?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Musanju̱.”
41008006	Aaghambila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba kusitama hansi. Aakwata migaati̱ musanju̱ eghi, aasi̱i̱ma Luhanga. Obu aamali̱ye ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga, aaghibheghanga, aaghiha beeghesebuwa be, baaghitambu̱li̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba.
41008007	Beeghesebuwa be aba bakaba dhee bali na nsu̱i̱ sikee sinabwana-bwana. Nasiyo dhee aasikwata, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga. Obu aamali̱ye kusaba, aabaha siyo kusitambu̱li̱ya bantu aba.
41008008	Bantu aba boona baaliya baakutila kimui. Obu baamali̱ye kuliya, beeghesebuwa be baakumaani̱ya bulaghalikuwa bwa byokuliya bwati̱ghaayʼo, baasu̱li̱ya bighegha biinamu̱li̱to musanju̱.
41008009	Bantu boona abaaliiye byokuliya ebi bakaba bali nga bantu nku̱mi̱ enaa. Obu baamali̱ye kuliya, aabalagha, baaghenda.
41008010	Du̱mbi̱ aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ na beeghesebuwa be, baabhasuka nanja, baaghenda mu kyalo kya Dalamanuta.
41008011	Bafali̱saayo baaghu̱wa ngoku Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye, baasa baatandika kuhakangana naye. Baamulengesa mbamughila bati abakolele kyakuswekani̱ya, niikuwo bamanye Luhanga alakaba amu̱tu̱mi̱ye.
41008012	Obu aaghu̱u̱ye atiyo, mutima ghwamusaalila munda, eehu̱mi̱ya. Aaghila ati, “Bantu baa mujo ghuni bakuukalagha mbabbbala kubakolela kyakuswekani̱ya nangaaki? Mbaghambiiye majima, taaliyo kyakuswekani̱ya kyona ekikubakoleluwa bbaa!”
41008013	Niibuwo Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baatodhi̱ye baani̱i̱na mu bwati̱, baabhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja. Baati̱gha haala Bafali̱saayo aba.
41008014	Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baabululuwa kuheeka ntanda ya migaati̱. Kuuyʼo bakaba bali na mugaati̱ ghumui ghwonkaha mu bwati̱ obu.
41008015	Yesu aabeekonkomeelela ati, “Mwelinde ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kya Bafali̱saayo na bahagi̱li̱ baa Helude.”
41008016	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baatandika kughambilana bati, “Amani̱ye ngoku tutaaleeti̱ye migaati̱.”
41008017	Bhaatu aamanya ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha. Aabaghila ati, “Mwelalikiliiye haabwa kutaba na migaati̱ nangaaki? Kandi niibuwo mwaghila muti tamwaleeti̱ye migaati̱ nangaaki? Tamu̱keetegheleei̱ye byona ebi mwaboone? Mitima yaanu enoomakakaane?
41008018	Tamukubonagha kuni muli na maaso! Muli na matui, bhaatu tamu̱ku̱u̱ghu̱wagha! Tamu̱u̱su̱ki̱ye kantu koona?
41008019	Obu naali̱i̱si̱i̱ye bantu nku̱mi̱ etaano na migaati̱ etaano yonkaha, haanu̱ma ya bantu aba kuukuta mukaasu̱li̱ya bighegha bi̱ti̱ya bya byokuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Eku̱mi̱ na bibili.”
41008020	Aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ti̱ obu naali̱i̱si̱i̱ye bantu nku̱mi̱ enaa: ni̱nkoleesi̱ya migaati̱ musanju̱, mukaasu̱li̱ya bighegha biinamu̱li̱to bi̱ti̱ya bya byokuliya ebyati̱ghaayʼo?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Musanju̱.”
41008021	Niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Nʼendindi tamu̱keetegheleei̱ye?”
41008022	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetesai̱da, bantu baamuleetela musaasa oghu maaso ghaaghaaye. Baamwesengeleli̱ya bati amu̱ku̱mʼo niikuwo akile.
41008023	Niibuwo aamukwete haa mukono, aamu̱twesi̱ya mu tau̱ni̱ eghi. Aamu̱tu̱wa mu maaso, aamu̱ku̱mʼo, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Oboone kantu koona?”
41008024	Musaasa oghu aahi̱dha maaso, aalola, aaghila ati, “Mboone bantu mbalubhatanga, bhaatu tambaboone kusemeeye nanga bansusiiye nga biti.”
41008025	Niibuwo Yesu aatodhi̱ye aamu̱ku̱ma haa maaso. Dhelu obu maaso ghaamuughulikila kimui, aalola, kandi aabonela kimui bbeni̱-bbeni̱.
41008026	Yesu aamughila ati, “Oghende e ka ewaawe, bhaatu otasaalila mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetesai̱da eghi.”
41008027	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱gha Galilaaya, baakoma, baaghenda mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya haai-haai na Kai̱saali̱ya Fi̱li̱pi̱. Mbanalubhatanga, aabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be ati, “Bantu bakungilaghamu ani̱?”
41008028	Baamukuukamu bati, “Banji bakughilagha bati nuuwe Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱, banji bati Eli̱ya, na banji bati oli omui mu balangi̱ bʼambele.”
41008029	Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ti̱ enu̱we mukungilaghamu ani̱?” Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Nuuwe Ki̱li̱si̱to.”
41008030	Yesu aabeekonkomeelela ati, “Eki mutanakighambila muntu nʼomui.”
41008031	Du̱mbi̱ aatandika kughambila beeghesebuwa be aba ebikumubʼo. Aabaghila ati, “Mwana wa Muntu akulaghiluwa kubona-bona bintu bikani̱ye. Akubhenguwa bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Akwitibuwa, bhaatu haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.”
41008032	Aabu̱gha bintu ebi bbeni̱-bbeni̱ kandi baabyetegheeleli̱ya. Niibuwo Peetelo aamutwete haakpengbu̱, aatandika kumusoghosa ati aleke ku̱bu̱gha atiyo.
41008033	Bhaatu eegaali̱ya, aalola beeghesebuwa be, aatanuka Peetelo oghu ati, “Uwe Si̱taani̱ ondu̱ghʼo! Ebi okwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi tabili byeli̱li̱kano bya Luhanga, ni bya bantu kwonkaha.”
41008034	Yesu aabilikila beeghesebuwa be hamui na ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo ati bamwebinge. Aabaghila ati, “Muntu weena naanabbali̱ye kunkwama, akulaghiluwa kuleka kwelema, aheeke musalaba ghuwe kandi ankwame.
41008035	Weena oghu akukukutila bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe, akubufweluwa, bhaatu oghu akubuhaayo haabwanje kandi haabwa Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga, akubutunga.
41008036	Buuye, kikughasila ki muntu kutunga nsi eni yoona, kusa afeeluwa bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe?
41008037	Kedha nkiki eki muntu anguhayo niikuwo agubhe kutodha ku̱ku̱u̱ki̱yʼo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe?
41008038	Bhaatu oghu akunkwatiluwa nsoni̱ kandi asikwatiluwa butumuwa bwanje, mu mujo ghwa buteesighibuwa kandi ghwa bu̱si̱i̱si̱, Mwana wa Muntu alimukwatiluwa nsoni̱ obu aliisa mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Ese wee kyamaani̱, kandi na kya baamalai̱ka be bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
41009001	Yesu aatodha aaghila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba na beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, bamui mu enu̱we abali hani endindi tabaku̱ku̱wa ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baboone bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bwi̱si̱ye na maani̱.”
41009002	Haanu̱ma ya bilo mukaagha Yesu abu̱ghi̱ye ebi, aaghenda na Peetelo, Yakobbo, na Yohaana haa mwena ghukangami̱ye, aakalayo nabo bonkaha. Banali haa mwena oghu, kususa kuwe kwahinduluwa banaloli̱ye.
41009003	Ngoye esi alu̱wete syelela kimui dhiyo, ti̱ taaliyo muntu nʼomui munsi oghu angu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kusinaabi̱ya asyeli̱ya atiyo.
41009004	Beeghesebuwa aba baabona, Eli̱ya na Musa, mbaaboneka kandi mbabu̱gha na Yesu.
41009005	Peetelo aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, kyabaaye kilungi etu̱we twaba hani! Oleke tubakwelele bunumba busatu: kamui kaawe, kamui kaa Musa, na kamui kaa Eli̱ya.”
41009006	Aabu̱gha atiyo nanga eye na baanakiye bakaba boobahiiye kimui, kandi atamani̱ye eki alabu̱gha.
41009007	Niibuwo kicu kyasi̱ye kyaswi̱ki̱la Yesu, Musa, na Eli̱ya. Du̱mbi̱ elaka lyalu̱gha mu kicu eki, lyaghila liti, “Oghu niiye Mwana wanje oghu nku̱ndi̱ye, mu̱mu̱u̱ghu̱we!”
41009008	Beeghesebuwa aba obu baatodhi̱ye kulola, bataabona Musa na Eli̱ya, kuuyʼo baabona Yesu enkaha.
41009009	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be basatu aba baanakotagha ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, aabeekonkomeelela ati ebi baaboone haa mwena ebi batabighambila muntu nʼomui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Mwana wa Muntu, alaku̱wa kandi naahu̱mbu̱u̱ka.
41009010	Beeghesebuwa be aba bintu ebi baabi̱holi̱ya, bhaatu baakala mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Obu aabu̱ghi̱yʼo ku̱ku̱wa kandi ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye ki?”
41009011	Niibuwo baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Nkiki kikulekagha beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baghila bati Eli̱ya niiye aku̱du̱bha kwisa?”
41009012	Aabakuukamu ati, “Bahi̱ki̱i̱ye kughila bati Eli̱ya aku̱du̱bha kwisa kuteekani̱ja bintu byona. Bhaatu haabwaki buuye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we hambele mbikughilagha ngu Mwana wa Muntu, bantu bakumubona-boneli̱ya kimui kandi bambhenge?
41009013	Mbaghambiiye Eli̱ya akadu̱bha aasa, noo bantu baamukolʼo bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi bakabbali̱ye, ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebi bi̱mu̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo.”
41009014	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be aba baaki̱dhʼo baanakyabo, baabona kiigambi̱ kya bantu kibagu̱mbi̱ye. Beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo bali mu kiigambi̱ eki mbahakangana na beeghesebuwa aba.
41009015	Obu bantu aba baaboone Yesu naasa kubeebinga, boona baasweka, du̱mbi̱ baaghenda mbali̱gi̱ta kumwebali̱ya.
41009016	Niibuwo aabu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mbiki mukuhakangana?”
41009017	Musaasa omui mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, naakuleeteeye mutabani̱ wanje nti omu̱ki̱li̱ye. Ki̱li̱mu̱ kimukwete kandi kikamuughala kanu̱wa.
41009018	Kikaakumukwatagha, kimugenga, bi̱hu̱lo biikala kumutuwa mu kanu̱wa, aakala kwenena ngaga, weena aghaghanaalila kimui. Naaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa baawe nti bamubhingʼo kiyo, baasaaghuwa.”
41009019	Yesu aaghila bantu aba ati, “Ai̱ enu̱we, bantu bateesi̱ghi̱ye kwonini Luhanga! Nkuukala naanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya dhi̱? Ti̱ nkubagu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa? Mundeetele mwana oghu.”
41009020	Baamuleetela ye. Ki̱li̱mu̱ ekimukwete kikaba makabona kiti Yesu, du̱mbi̱ kyatu̱ku̱mi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kimui mwana oghu, kyamugenga hansi, aatandika kusambangana, bi̱hu̱lo mbinamutuwa mu kanu̱wa.
41009021	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya ese mwana oghu ati, “Mwana waawe oghu aamali̱ye na bulwaye obu bwile ki” Aamukuukamu ati, “Ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la mu bwana.
41009022	Kikumugengagha mu mulilo na mu maasi, kyalengi̱yʼo milundi ekani̱ye kumwitilamu. Gutu, otughilile kisa, otukoonele mu mulingo ghwona okaakuba noogubha!”
41009023	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Otaghila oti, ‘Okaakuba noogubha!’ Nanga nuwaahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, bu̱li̱ kintu kyona kikugubhukana.”
41009024	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aaguga ati, “Ni̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, bhaatu ndi na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukee, onkoonele mbe na kusaayʼo!”
41009025	Obu Yesu aaboone bantu mbali̱gi̱ta kwisa kubagu̱mba, aatanuka ki̱li̱mu̱ eki ati, “Uwe ki̱li̱mu̱ oghu ooghaaye mwana oni matui kandi kanu̱wa, omu̱lu̱ghʼo! Otalitodha kumwisʼo.”
41009026	Ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyatakangana, kyamu̱tu̱ku̱mi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kimui, kyamu̱lu̱ghʼo, ti̱ aalekeelelʼo. Abaabaaghʼo baaghila bati, “Dhelu aaku̱u̱ye!”
41009027	Bhaatu Yesu aamukwata haa mukono, aamu̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya.
41009028	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baataahi̱ye mu numba, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bi̱so bati, “Ekyaleki̱ye ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyatusaagha kubhinga nkiki?”
41009029	Aabakuukamu ati, “Ki̱li̱mu̱ ngʼeki, kusaba Luhanga kwonkaha niikuwo kukukibhingagha.”
41009030	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱gha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki, baakwamila mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Taabbalagha muntu nʼomui kumanya hambali eye na beeghesebuwa be bali,
41009031	nanga aabeegheesi̱yagha. Aabaghila ati, “Mwana wa Muntu, bakughenda ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, bakumuhaayo mu bantu bakumwita, bhaatu haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.”
41009032	Bhaatu beeghesebuwa be aba baasaaghuwa kwetegheeleli̱ya eki aabu̱ghi̱ye eki, kandi boobaha ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya eki aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye.
41009033	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱, baataaha mu numba. Niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Obu twabaagha mu kihanda mwahakanganagha ki?”
41009034	Baakala baholeei̱ye bhi̱i̱, nanga mu kihanda baahakanganagha haa oghu akubabaamu mukulu.
41009035	Haanu̱ma ya Yesu kusitama, aaghila beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili aba ati bamwebinge. Aabaghila ati, “Muntu weena naabbali̱ye kuba mukulu, akulaghiluwa kwebundaali̱ya kandi abe mu̱heeleli̱ya wa boona.”
41009036	Niibuwo aami̱li̱i̱ye mwana haagati yabo, aamwi̱dha, aamulela. Aabaghila ati,
41009037	“Nuwaabhasiiye mwana ngʼoni haabwanje, ni̱i̱si̱ye okuba obhasiiye. Kandi oghu akumbhasila, akuba atabhasiiye si̱ye, bhaatu oghu akantuma.”
41009038	Yohaana aaghila Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, twaboone muntu naabhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ naakoleesi̱ya li̱i̱na lyawe. Twamutanga nanga taali waatu.”
41009039	Yesu aaghila ati, “Mutamutanga, nanga taaliyo oghu akukola kyakuswekani̱ya kyona mu li̱i̱na lyanje, niikuwo haanu̱ma ambu̱ghʼo kubhi.
41009040	Kandi muntu weena naabaaye ataakutuhakani̱ya ni waatu.
41009041	Mbaghambiiye majima, weena oghu alibaha nankabha kiikopo kya maasi ghaa kunuwa, nanga enu̱we kuba baa Ki̱li̱si̱to, taalifeeluwa mpeela yee bbaa.”
41009042	Aatodha aabaghila ati, “Muntu weena nahabi̱i̱si̱i̱ye omui mu bantu abanali bato mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye kuleka naasi̱i̱sa, alitunga kifubilo kyamaani̱. Alyehi̱su̱ki̱ya ati hakili nguli baamu̱bohi̱ye ki̱ti̱bo mu bikiya bakiboha haa kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to, bamukuba mu nanja.
41009043	Nahabweki mukono ghwawe nighwakuhaaghi̱li̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa, oghujombʼo! Ni kilungi kughenda mu eghulu olamaaye kusaali̱ya kukukuba mu Gehena oli na mikono ebili. [
41009044	Mulilo oghu taghu̱ku̱li̱magha, kandi kubona-bona kwamu takukuhuwaghʼo.]
41009045	Kughulu kwawe nikwakuhaaghi̱li̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa, okujombʼo! Ni kilungi kughenda mu eghulu olamaaye kusaali̱ya kukukuba mu Gehena oli na maghulu abili. [
41009046	Mulilo oghu taghu̱ku̱li̱magha, kandi kubona-bona kwamu takukuhuwaghʼo.]
41009047	Kandi li̱i̱so lyawe ndyakuhaaghi̱li̱i̱ye ku̱si̱i̱sa, oliiyemu! Ni kilungi kutaaha mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga oli na li̱i̱so limui kusaali̱ya kukukuba mu Gehena oli na maaso abili.
41009048	‘Mulilo oghu taghu̱ku̱li̱magha, kandi kubona-bona kwamu takukuhuwaghʼo.’
41009049	Enu̱we boona abanje, Luhanga ali̱si̱i̱ma mubona-bone niikuwo ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu kugume.
41009050	Bhaatu kikubaghasila ngoku kisula ki̱ku̱nu̱li̱yagha mukubi, bhaatu bu̱nu̱li̱ mbwakihooyemu, buuye muntu akugubha ku̱bu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yamu ati̱ya? Kwesi̱i̱ni̱, ngoku kisula ki̱ku̱semeli̱yagha mukubi, naanu mukolaghe baanakyanu kusemeeye, kandi muukale hamui mpempa.”
41010001	Obu Yesu aalu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱, aabhasuka, aaghenda mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya kandi na mu kyalo kya bu̱lu̱gha ejooba bwa maasi Yolodaani̱. Biigambi̱ bya bantu byatodha byagumbaana hambali ali. Aabeegheesi̱ya ngoku aakakolagha bu̱li̱ kilo.
41010002	Niibuwo bamui mu Bafali̱saayo baasi̱ye hambali ali kumulengesa. Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye musaasa kubhinga mukali̱ wee?”
41010003	Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Musa akabalaghila ati̱ya?”
41010004	Baamukuukamu bati, “Musa akasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya musaasa kuhaagha mukali̱ wee bbaluwa ya kumubhinga abaaghe naamubhinga.”
41010005	Aabaghila ati, “Ekyaleki̱ye Musa aabasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya, ni nanga kwomakakana kwa mitima yaanu.
41010006	Bhaatu ku̱lu̱gha mu kuhanguwa kwa nsi, ‘Luhanga akahanga musaasa na mukali̱.
41010007	Eki niikiyo kilalekagha musaasa alekaghe ese wee na ni̱na wee, eebohelʼo mukali̱ wee,
41010008	ti̱ babe muntu omui.’ Nanga bakuba batakyali bantu babili, bhaatu bali muntu omui.
41010009	Nahabweki aba Luhanga alungani̱i̱ye mu buswele, atabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akuleka mbalekangana.”
41010010	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baataahi̱ye mu numba, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya makulu ghʼebi aabu̱ghi̱ye ebi.
41010011	Aabaghila ati, “Musaasa naabhi̱ngi̱ye mukali̱ wee, aswela onji, akuba asyane.
41010012	Kandi mukali̱ naalu̱ghi̱yemu eba wee, asweluwa musaasa onji, akuba asyane.”
41010013	Kilo kimui bantu baaleetela Yesu baana baabo bati abaku̱mʼo. Bhaatu beeghesebuwa be baatanuka bantu aba bati baleke kumutalibani̱ja.
41010014	Obu aaboone mbabatanuka, aasaaliluwa. Aabaghila ati, “Muleke baana banjisʼo, mutabatanga! Nanga abali nga baana bani niibo bali mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
41010015	Mbaghambiiye majima, muntu weena ataasi̱i̱mi̱ye bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga nga mwana, taakubutaahamu bbaa.”
41010016	Niibuwo aaleli̱ye baana aba, aabatʼo mikono yee kubaha mu̱gi̱sa.
41010017	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baanaamu̱ki̱yagha kughenda, musaasa omui aasa naali̱gi̱ta, aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu. Aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya mulungi, nkole ki niikuwo ntunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo?”
41010018	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Wangi̱li̱yemu mulungi nangaaki? Taaliyo muntu mulungi nʼomui kuuyʼo Luhanga enkaha.
41010019	Omani̱ye bilaghilo bini, ‘Otaliita, otali̱syana, otaliibha, otalihabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, otali̱ghobeli̱ya, ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe.’ ”
41010020	Musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, bilaghilo ebi byona nkabikwata ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la mu bwana.”
41010021	Niibuwo Yesu aakaaye aloleleeye musaasa oghu; eehi̱ghu̱wa amu̱ku̱ndi̱ye. Aamughila ati, “Oti̱ghaai̱ye kukola kintu kinji kimui. Oghende oghu̱li̱ye bintu byawe byona, sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu osihe banaku, wiise onkwame; olitungila buguudha mu eghulu.”
41010022	Obu musaasa oghu aaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabu̱gha atiyo, eehi̱ghu̱wa esoke ndyamuhuwa haa mutuwe. Aalu̱ghʼo Yesu, aaghenda asaaluuwe, nanga akaba atungiiye kimui.
41010023	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱ngi̱i̱ye maaso, aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Ngakitimbiikilaane kimui baguudha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga!”
41010024	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baaswekela kimui. Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Baana banje, ngakitimbiikilaane kimui kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga!
41010025	Kidhooteeye kimui ngamila kusaalila mu kahulu kaa nkinjo kusaali̱ya muguudha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
41010026	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baasaali̱yʼo kusweka. Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye, ni ani̱ akugubha kujunuwa?”
41010027	Yesu aabalola, aabaghila ati, “Bantu tabakugubha kukola eki, bhaatu takikulema Luhanga. Nanga Luhanga akugubha kukola bu̱li̱ kintu kyona.”
41010028	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Ebyatu byona tukabi̱ti̱gha, twakukwama.”
41010029	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, muntu weena naati̱ghi̱ye ka yee, baana baani̱na wee boobukali̱ na boobusaasa, ese wee, ni̱na wee, baana be, kedha bibanja biye haabwanje, kandi haabwa kulangilila Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga,
41010030	muntu oghu akutunga bintu ngʼebi aati̱ghi̱ye ebi byona milundi ki̱ku̱mi̱ anali munsi muni: maka, baana baani̱na wee boobukali̱ na boobusaasa, baani̱na wee, baana, na bibanja. Noobu bantu balakamuhiighani̱ja, mu bwile buliisa atunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
41010031	Bakani̱ye aba bantu bahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ endindi baliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kikee, na bakani̱ye aba bantu baghai̱ye endindi balitunga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.”
41010032	Obu Yesu aabaagha ahikiiye beeghesebuwa be mbakoma mu luguudhe kughenda Yelusaalemu, baasweka kandi na bantu banji abaali bamukweme boobaha. Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aatwala beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili aba haakpengbu̱, aabaghambila ebikumubʼo.
41010033	Aabaghila ati, “Tulimakoma kughenda Yelusaalemu hambali baku̱ghobeli̱ya Mwana wa Muntu. Bamuheyo mu bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Bantu aba baku̱mu̱twi̱la musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa. Bamuheyo mu balemi̱ batali Bayu̱daaya
41010034	abakumuwawaani̱ya, bamu̱twi̱le matanta, bamuhuulile kimui, kandi bamwite. Bhaatu haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.”
41010035	Yakobbo na Yohaana, batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo, beebinga Yesu baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, tuli nʼeki tukukusaba otukolele.”
41010036	Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukubbala mbakolele ki?”
41010037	Baamukuukamu bati, “Obu oliisa kulema mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyawe, oose oleke etu̱we bombi tusitame haai-haai naawe, omui haa luhande lwa mukono ghwawe ghwabuliyo, nʼonji haa lwabumesu.”
41010038	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Eki mukwete kusaba tamukimani̱ye. Mukugubha kubona-bona ngoku nkughenda kubona-bona, kedha ku̱ku̱wa ngoku nku̱ku̱wa?”
41010039	Baamukuukamu bati, “Ee, tukugubha!” Aabakuukamu ati, “Mukubona-bona ngoku nkubona-bona, kandi mu̱ku̱we ngoku nku̱ku̱wa.
41010040	Bhaatu taani̱i̱si̱ye ndi na bu̱toki̱ bwa kukoma abakusitama haa luhande lwabuliyo kedha lwabumesu. Bi̱i̱kalo ebi ni bya bantu aba Luhanga eenini aabiteekani̱li̱i̱ye.”
41010041	Obu baanakyabo eku̱mi̱ baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yakobbo na Yohaana baabu̱ghi̱ye, baabasaalililuwa.
41010042	Niibuwo Yesu aabilikiiye beeghesebuwa be hamui, aabaghila ati, “Mumani̱ye ngoku balemi̱ baa batali Bayu̱daaya, bakulaghilagha bantu baabo na bu̱toki̱ kubhi-kubhi, kandi bakulu baa balemi̱ aba bakulaghilagha bantu na bu̱toki̱ busaalukaane.
41010043	Bhaatu enu̱we mutaba mutiyo. Oghu akubbala kuba mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ waanu, abe mu̱heeleli̱ya waanu.
41010044	Kandi weena oghu akubbala kubabaamu wʼoku̱du̱bha, abhonganuuwe abe mu̱heeleli̱ya waanu boona.
41010045	Nankabha, Mwana wa Muntu, tanaasi̱ye bantu ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya; akaasa ku̱heeleli̱ya kandi kuhaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe kuba nsasu̱li̱ ya kucungula bantu bakani̱ye.”
41010046	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yeli̱ko. Mbanaamu̱ki̱ya ku̱lu̱ghayo, kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyabalabha. Bati̱maayo oghu maaso ghaaghaaye, mutabani̱ wa Ti̱maayo, akaba asitami̱ye haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe naasaba-saba bantu.
41010047	Obu Bati̱maayo oghu aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ niiye alimasaala, aatandika kugugangana ati, “Yesu! Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱! Ongilile kisa!”
41010048	Bakani̱ye mu bantu abaabaaghʼo baamutanuka bati aholi̱ye. Bhaatu eeyongelela kimui kugugangana ati, “Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, ongilile kisa!”
41010049	Yesu eemilila, aaghila ati, “Dhaani mumubilikile aase!” Baamughila bati, “Aakubilikiiye! Otoobaha! Wiise!”
41010050	Aahanja eli̱ eki aali eegu̱bi̱ki̱ye, aamatuka, aaghenda aaki̱dhʼo Yesu.
41010051	Niibuwo Yesu aamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Okubbala nkukolele ki” Aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, nkubbala mbone!”
41010052	Yesu aamughila ati, “Oghende, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.” Du̱mbi̱ aabonelʼo kandi aaghenda akweme Yesu.
41011001	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaneebingagha Yelusaalemu, baaki̱dha mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbetaniya na ghwa Bbeti̱faage, haa mwena Oli̱va. Niibuwo aatu̱mi̱ye babili mu beeghesebuwa be,
41011002	aabaghila ati, “Mughende mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu tuli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu oghu, mukuba makaghu̱ki̱dhamu du̱mbi̱ mukusanga kyana kya ndogooi̱ eki muntu atakani̱i̱naghʼo, mukisambuule, mukindeetele.
41011003	Muntu naababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, ‘Mukukisambuula nangaaki?’ Mumughile muti, ‘Mukama wakiyo akukibbala, ti̱ aku̱ki̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya bwangu.’ ”
41011004	Beeghesebuwa babili aba baaghenda, baasanga kyana kya ndogooi̱ baki̱bohi̱ye haai-haai nʼelembo, haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe. Mbanakisambuula,
41011005	bamui mu bantu abaabaagha baamiliiyʼo baababu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mukusambuula kyana kya ndogooi̱ eki nangaaki?”
41011006	Baabaghambila ebi Yesu aabaghambiiye, niibuwo bantu aba baasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye beeghesebuwa aba kukitwala.
41011007	Obu baaki̱ki̱dhi̱i̱ye hambali Yesu ali, baala bimui haa bi̱lu̱walo byabo haa mughongo ghwakiyo, aani̱i̱na, aasitamʼo.
41011008	Bantu bakani̱ye beehiyamu bimui haa bi̱lu̱walo byabo, na banji baajomba bi̱kongu̱bho mu misili mu maahaai-haai, baabyala hansi mu luguudhe hambali akusaalila.
41011009	Bantu abaaghendi̱ye hamui naye banji bamuhikiiye, banji bamu̱ti̱ghaaye enu̱ma, baatandika kugola bati, “Ooyee! Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama!
41011010	Luhanga aahaaye mu̱gi̱sa bukama bwa taata waatu Dhau̱dhi̱ obulimatodha kubʼo! Ooyee! Asi̱i̱mu̱we Mukama wa eghulu munu!”
41011011	Obu Yesu aataahi̱ye mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, aaghenda mu Numba ya Luhanga, aalola ngoku bintu bili. Bhaatu ngoku bwali mbwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, aaghenda Bbetaniya na beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili.
41011012	Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yo, obu baanalu̱ghagha mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbetaniya, njala yaamukwata.
41011013	Makakuba ati li̱i̱so, aabona haakpengbu̱ nga hali̱ bibabi bya kiti mu̱ti̱i̱ni̱. Aakyebinga kulola kilakaba kyani̱yʼo bi̱ghu̱ma. Bhaatu obu aahi̱ki̱ye mu nti̱na ya kiyo, aasanga haa kiti eki haliyo bibabi byonkaha, nanga bukaba butali bwile bwa biti mi̱ti̱i̱ni̱ kwana bi̱ghu̱ma.
41011014	Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye kiti eki ati, “Muntu atalitodha kukuliyʼo ki̱ghu̱ma na kimui.” Beeghesebuwa be baaghu̱wa bighambo ebi.
41011015	Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baatodhi̱ye ku̱ki̱dha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, aaghenda mu Numba ya Luhanga. Aatandika kubhingamu abaaghu̱li̱li̱yaghamu nʼabaaghulilaghamu. Aatu̱li̱kanga meeja syʼabaahi̱ngi̱i̱si̱yagha sente. Kandi aakubakaka ntebe syʼabaaghu̱li̱yagha bi̱i̱bbi̱mbo bya kuhonga.
41011016	Taasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye muntu nʼomui oghu aheeki̱ye kintu kyona kusaalila nakiyo mu Numba ya Luhanga.
41011017	Niibuwo aabeegheeseei̱ye ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Numba yanje balaghighilaghamu numba ya kusabilamu ya bantu baa mahanga ghoona,’ bhaatu enu̱we mwaghifooye ki̱i̱kalo kya basuma.”
41011018	Obu bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baaghu̱u̱ye eki aakoli̱ye eki, baatandika kubbala mulingo ghwa kumwitilamu. Bhaatu boobaha kukikola nanga ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba boona bakaba badheedheeu̱we haabwa kwegheesi̱ya kuwe.
41011019	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baalu̱gha mu kibugha eki.
41011020	Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo obu baatodhagha kukuukayo, baasaalila haai-haai na kiti eki. Baabona nkyomeeye kimui na mi̱li̱ yakiyo yoona.
41011021	Niibuwo Peetelo aasu̱ki̱ye, aaghila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, olole! Kiti eki eso waaki̱i̱ni̱ye, kyona kyomeeye kimui!”
41011022	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je Luhanga!
41011023	Mbaghambiiye majima, muntu naaghi̱li̱ye mwena oghu ati, ‘Odhuulike haala weesimbe mu nanja,’ ataakughuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya mu mutima ghuwe, bhaatu ahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngu eki aasabi̱ye kikubʼo, niikuwo kikumukoleluwa.
41011024	Nahabweki mbaghambiiye, kintu kyona eki olasabagha Luhanga mu nsaala, ohi̱ki̱li̱jaghe ngu okukitunga, kandi kilabaagha kyawe.
41011025	Ti̱ bwile bwona obu mulabaagha nimusaba Luhanga, nimwabaaye musaaluuwe haabwa eki muunakyanu abasobeleei̱ye, mumughanilaghe, niikuwo naanu Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu abaghanilaghe ebi mu̱sobeei̱ye. [
41011026	Bhaatu mutaaghaniiye baanakyanu, naanu Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu taalabaghanilagha ebi mu̱sobeei̱ye.”]
41011027	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baatodha baaki̱dha Yelusaalemu. Obu aanabungilagha mu Numba ya Luhanga, bakulu baa bahongi̱, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, baamwisʼo.
41011028	Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Ni ani̱ aakuhaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kukola ebi byona?”
41011029	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Ndimababu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kimui, mukinkuukemu niikuwo nanje mbaghambile oghu ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kukola bintu ebi nkwete kukola.
41011030	Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ akaaya haa bu̱toki̱ bwa kubati̱ja? Bukalu̱gha mu eghulu kedha mu bantu? Munkuukemu.”
41011031	Niibuwo baatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Tumukuukemu tu̱ti̱ya? Ntwamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu tuti ‘Luhanga niiye akamuha buwo,’ akutughila ati, ‘Ti̱ ekyaleki̱ye mutaahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yohaana oghu nkiki?’
41011032	Kandi ntwaghi̱li̱ye tuti, ‘Bantu niibo baamuhaaye buwo,’ bantu bakani̱ye bakutusaalililuwa.” (Bakulu baa di̱i̱ni̱ aba boobaha nanga bantu boona bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabaagha mulangi̱ kwonini.)
41011033	Niibuwo baamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu bati, “Tatumani̱ye.” Yesu naye aabaghila ati, “Kwesi̱i̱ni̱ nanje tankubaghambila oghu ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kukola ebi nkwete kukola.”
41012001	Yesu aatwi̱la beebembeli̱ baa di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya aba lu̱si̱mo ati, “Akaba aliyo musaasa aalima musili ghwa bi̱ghu̱ma mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱. Aaghu̱ki̱ti̱i̱li̱la na lugho, aalimamu ndeeba ya kukamilaghamu bi̱ghu̱ma ebi, kandi aakwelamu ngbaali ekangami̱ye. Aaghu̱ti̱ghi̱la bapangi̱i̱si̱ya kumulindila ghuwo, aaghenda mu ehanga linji hambali haseli̱ye.
41012002	Obu bwile bwa kukobha bi̱ghu̱ma bwahi̱ki̱ye, aatuma mu̱heeleli̱ya wee ati bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba bamuhe haa bi̱ghu̱ma bya mu musili ghuwe oghu.
41012003	Bhaatu baaghwilikiilila mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu, baamuhuula, kandi baamubhinga magi̱la kantu.
41012004	Mukama wa musili oghu aatodha aatumayo mu̱heeleli̱ya onji. Bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baamwati̱ya lubaale kandi baamuwaawaani̱li̱ya kimui.
41012005	Aatodha aatuma onji. Oghu dhelu eye baamwita. Aatuula naanatuma bakwenda be, bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba mbanabahuula, kandi mbanaata na banji.
41012006	Oghu aali ati̱ghaai̱ye kutuma ni mutabani̱ wee; amu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kwonini. Haakumaliilila aabatumila mutabani̱ wee oghu, naaghila ati, ‘Mutabani̱ wanje oni baku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.’
41012007	Bhaatu bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba obu baamuboone naabaki̱dhʼo, baaghambilana bati, ‘Oni niiye bakwisa kugweta musili ghuni, nahabweki muleke tumwite niikuwo tughutwalile kimui!’
41012008	Baamukwata, baamwita. Baakuba mu̱ku̱ ghuwe enja ya musili oghu.”
41012009	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mabhu̱u̱le, mukama wa musili oghu alikola ati̱ya bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba? Ali̱hi̱ka alaghile ati baate bapangi̱i̱si̱ya babhi aba boona kandi musili oghu aghukwati̱ye bantu banji.
41012010	Mumani̱ye ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikughilagha biti, “ ‘Ebaale eli bakweli̱ baabhengi̱ye, niiliyo lyahaghi̱ki̱ye numba kusaali̱ya ghanji ghoona.
41012011	Eki Mukama eenini niiye akakikola, kandi kyatuswekani̱li̱ya kimui.’ ”
41012012	Beebembeli̱ baa di̱i̱ni̱ aba baamanya ngoku aaniibo aatwi̱li̱i̱ye lu̱si̱mo olu. Baabbala kumukwata, bhaatu haabwa kwobaha bantu abaabaaghʼo, baamuleka, baaghenda.
41012013	Beebembeli̱ baa di̱i̱ni̱ aba baatuma bamui mu Bafali̱saayo hamui na bahagi̱li̱ baa Helude kughenda kwohi̱ya Yesu mu ebi aku̱bu̱gha.
41012014	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye hambali ali, baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, tumani̱ye ngoku oku̱bu̱ghagha majima ghonkaha. Bantu boona okubengana-ngani̱yagha, tookufuwaghʼo bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa byabo, kandi okwegheesi̱yagha bighambo bya Luhanga mu majima. Otughambile, kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye kuha musolo ghwa Kai̱saali̱ mukama wa Looma?
41012015	Tughuhe, kedha bbaa?” Bhaatu Yesu aamanya bu̱ghobi̱ya bwabo, aabaghila ati, “Mukubbala ku̱njohi̱ya nangaaki? Munjoleke mukwenge oghu mukuhaaghamu musolo.”
41012016	Baamuleetela ghuwo. Aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Kisasani̱ na li̱i̱na ebili haa mukwenge ghuni, ni byani̱?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Ni bya Kai̱saali̱.”
41012017	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Kwesi̱i̱ni̱ ebya Kai̱saali̱ mubihe Kai̱saali̱, nʼebya Luhanga mubihe Luhanga.” Eki aaku̱u̱ki̱yemu eki kyabaswekeli̱ya kimui.
41012018	Bamui mu Basadukaayo, abaaghilagha bati bantu tabali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, baasa baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati,
41012019	“Mwegheesi̱ya, Musa akahandiika mu bilaghilo bya Luhanga ati, ‘Musaasa naasweye mukali̱, ti̱ musaasa oghu aku̱wa atabyayʼo mukali̱ oghu mwana, mwana waani̱na musaasa oghu aswele mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu niikuwo abyalile mwana waani̱na wee oghu baana.’
41012020	Hakaba haliyo banaani̱na emui musanju̱. Mukulu wabo aaswela mukali̱, bhaatu aaku̱wa atamubyayʼo mwana.
41012021	Oghu amulabhi̱ye aaswela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu, bhaatu naye aaku̱wa atamubyayʼo mwana. Mwana wa ni̱nabo waakasatu naye dhee niikuwo aabaaye atiyo.
41012022	Banaani̱na emui musanju̱ aba, tabaabyayʼo mukali̱ oghu mwana. Haakumaliilila, mukali̱ oghu naye aaku̱wa.
41012023	Buuye obu Luhanga ali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la bantu boona, aliba mukaa ani̱? Nanga boona musanju̱ bakamuswelʼo.”
41012024	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Muhabi̱ye nanga tamumani̱ye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we kandi ngoku Luhanga ali na bu̱toki̱.
41012025	Obu baku̱u̱ye bali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, tabaliswela kedha kusweluwa bbaa. Baliba nga baamalai̱ka bʼomu eghulu.
41012026	Bhaatu haa bya bantu baku̱u̱ye ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, buuye tamukasomaghʼo mu ebi Musa aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye mu ki̱twi̱ke hambali aaboone mulilo ngwaka mu kiti, bibabi byakiyo bitaakuhiya kandi ngoku Luhanga aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Ndi Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga wa I̱saka, kandi Luhanga wa Yakobbo’?
41012027	Nahabweki taali Luhanga wa baku̱u̱ye bbaa, ni wa baakaaye. Enu̱we Basadukaayo muhabiiye kimui.”
41012028	Omui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo akaba aliyo aategheeleei̱ye ngoku Yesu akwete kuhakangana na Basadukaayo aba. Obu aaghu̱u̱ye abaku̱u̱ki̱yemu kusemeeye, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nkilaghilo ki kisaai̱ye bilaghilo byona?”
41012029	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Kilaghilo ekisaai̱ye bilaghilo byona kikughilagha kiti, ‘Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye enu̱we bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, Mukama Luhanga waatu niiye Mukama enkaha.
41012030	Okundaghe Mukama Luhanga waawe na mutima ghwawe ghwona, bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona, magheji ghaawe ghoona, na maani̱ ghaawe ghoona.’
41012031	Ti̱ ekyakabili ekili ngʼeki kikughilagha kiti, ‘Okundaghe muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini.’ Taaliyo kilaghilo ekisaai̱ye ebi.”
41012032	Niibuwo mwegheesi̱ya wa bilaghilo oghu aaghi̱li̱ye Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, waahi̱ki̱i̱ye kughila oti, ‘Niiye Mukama enkaha, taaliyo onji,
41012033	kandi kumukunda na mutima ghwawe ghwona, magheji ghaawe ghoona, na maani̱ ghaawe ghoona; kandi okundaghe muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini, kisaai̱ye kuhongela Luhanga bihonguwa byokeei̱ye na bisembo byona ebi twanguhayo.’ ”
41012034	Obu Yesu aaboone musaasa oghu aku̱u̱ki̱yemu̱ kusemeeye, aamughila ati, “Oli haai kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.” Haanu̱ma yʼeki taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akatodha aalengʼo ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kyona.
41012035	Obu Yesu eegheesi̱yagha bantu mu Numba ya Luhanga, aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo bakughilagha bati Ki̱li̱si̱to akuba ali muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱ nangaaki?
41012036	Kuni Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akakoleesi̱ya Dhau̱dhi̱ oghu ku̱bu̱ghʼo Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu ati, “ ‘Mukama aaghila Mukama wanje ati, “Ositame haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwanje ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndita ngi̱ghu̱ syawe hansi ya bighele byawe.” ’
41012037	Buuye Dhau̱dhi̱ eenini obu alaba naaghi̱li̱ye ati Ki̱li̱si̱to ni Mukama wee, Mukama oghu akugubha ati̱ya kuba muusukulu wee?” Ki̱bbu̱la kiinamu̱li̱to kya bantu bakaba bategheleei̱ye Yesu kandi badheedheleeu̱we kimui.
41012038	Naaneegheesi̱ya beeghesebuwa be, aaghila ati, “Mwelinde beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, bakubbalagha kubunga balu̱wete biigandulo bijambi̱ye kwoleka ngoku bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Ti̱ mbaaba bali mu butale babbala bantu babalamu̱ki̱ye babahu̱ti̱i̱ye.
41012039	Mu malami̱li̱yo nʼomu maghenu̱, babbala kusitama mu ntebe sya bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
41012040	Bakulombaagaghʼo bakwi̱si̱ya etungo lyabo, beetwalila manumba ghaabo, kandi beesabi̱i̱si̱ya nsaala sijambi̱ye kwesemeli̱ya mu bantu. Bo balitunga kifubilo kyamaani̱.”
41012041	Obu Yesu aali aasitami̱ye haai-haai nʼeki baataaghamu bisembo mu Numba ya Luhanga, aakala aloli̱ye ngoku bantu bakwete kutaamu bisembo byabo. Aabona baguudha bakani̱ye mbanatamu sente sikani̱ye.
41012042	Na mukali̱ mu̱kwi̱si̱ya munaku aasa, aataamu bukwenge bubili.
41012043	Niibuwo Yesu aakumaani̱i̱ye beeghesebuwa be, aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, mu̱kwi̱si̱ya munaku oghu aataayemu kusaali̱ya boona abaahaayeyo bisembo.
41012044	Banji boona baataayemu ebibasaaghiliiye. Bhaatu eye mu bunaku buwe, aataayemu koona aka aabaagha nako. Taati̱ghaai̱ye kantu koona kaa kumulinda.”
41013001	Yesu naanalu̱gha mu Numba ya Luhanga, omui mu beeghesebuwa be aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, olole ngoku Numba eni baghi̱kwei̱ye mabaale ghaanamu̱li̱to! Kandi manumba ghani ghasemeleeye kimui!”
41013002	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Oboone manumba ghaanamu̱li̱to agha? Balighaseesa ghoona! Kandi taaliyo ebaale na limui eli̱li̱ti̱ghala haagu̱u̱li̱ ya liinakyaliyo.”
41013003	Haanu̱ma Yesu aasitama haa mwena Oli̱va, oghulolaane na Numba ya Luhanga eghi. Peetelo, Yakobbo, Yohaana, na Andeleya baasa hambali asitami̱ye. Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya mu ki̱bi̱so bati,
41013004	“Otughambile, manumba agha balighaseesa dhi̱? Kandi nkaakulolelʼo ki kali̱du̱bha kubʼo kwoleka ngu bali haai kughaseesa?”
41013005	Aabakuukamu ati, “Mwelinde niikuwo muntu nʼomui atalibahabi̱i̱si̱ya.
41013006	Nanga bantu bakani̱ye baliisa, bu̱li̱ omui neeghilamu ati, ‘Ni̱i̱si̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to.’ Kandi balihabi̱i̱si̱ya bantu bakani̱ye.
