41013007	Ti̱ noobu mu̱li̱i̱ghu̱wa bulemo kandi makulu ghaa bulemo, mutalyobaha. Ebi niibiyo bi̱li̱du̱bha kubʼo. Bhaatu mpelo yoonini eliba etakahi̱ki̱ye.
41013008	Mahanga ghalilwana na mahanga ghaanakyaghʼo, kandi makama ghalilwana na makama ghaanakyaghʼo. Mi̱si̱ki̱ eli̱dhi̱ngi̱ya mu bi̱i̱kalo bikani̱ye. Njala elighwila bantu bakani̱ye. Bhaatu ebi biliba bili ntandiko ya kubona-bona kwamaani̱.
41013009	“Enu̱we mwelinde nanga balibakwata, babatwale mu kooti̱, balibahuulila mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya. Haabwanje bakubatwala mu balemi̱ na bakama niikuwo bantu aba baaghu̱we nimumpeela buukai̱so mu maaso ghaabo.
41013010	Bhaatu Makulu Ghasemeeye agha, ghali̱du̱bha ghalangililuwe mu mahanga ghoona mpelo etakahi̱ki̱ye.
41013011	Ti̱ obu balibakwata, bwile obu bya ku̱bu̱gha bitalibatu̱ntu̱li̱ya. Muliheebuwa bya ku̱bu̱gha bwile obu, nanga taali̱i̱nu̱we muliba ni̱mu̱bu̱gha, Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye niiye alibaha bya ku̱bu̱gha.
41013012	Muntu alihaayo mwana waani̱na wee ati bamwite. Na ese mwana alihaayo mwana wee ati bamwite. Niikiyo kimui dhee, baana balijeemela babyaye baabo kandi babaate.
41013013	Bantu boona balyoha enu̱we haabwanje. Bhaatu oghu aliikala anagu̱mi̱si̱li̱i̱je ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱u̱ye, alijunuwa.
41013014	“Obu mulibona Kintu Ekibhihiiye Kimui, kandi eki Luhanga oohi̱ye kiimiliiye mu Numba ya Luhanga hambali kitabhonganu̱u̱we kuba (oghu akusoma bighambo bini abyetegheeleli̱ye), abaliba bali mu Bu̱yu̱daaya, baalukile bwangu mu myena.
41013015	Bwile obu muntu oghu aliba ali haa lusui lwa numba yee, atali̱su̱ndu̱ka kutaaha mu numba kuuyamu kantu koona.
41013016	Kandi oghu aliba ali haa musili, atalikuuka e ka kwendelayo ngoye siye esi aati̱ghi̱yeyo.
41013017	Ti̱ bwile obu bakali̱ baku̱li̱i̱ye nʼabakwonki̱ya baana ngabalikibona!
41013018	Musabe Luhanga ngu kubona-bona oku kutaliisa kubʼo mu bwile bwa mbu̱la ekani̱ye.
41013019	Nanga mu bwile obu bantu balibona-bonela kimui, kusaali̱ya kubona-bona okwakabʼo ku̱lu̱gha Luhanga aahangi̱ye nsi, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nʼendindi. Kandi bantu tabalitodha kubona-bona batiyo.
41013020	Bantu boona banguhwelekeleeye nguli Mukama ataakeeheei̱ye bilo bya kubona-bona ebi. Bhaatu haabwa bantu be aba aakomi̱yemu, aacuwamu ku̱bi̱keehi̱ya.
41013021	Bwile obu, noobu muntu alibaghila ati, ‘Mulole Ki̱li̱si̱to nguni hani!’ Kedha ‘Ngu̱li̱ hali̱!’ Mutali̱si̱i̱ma ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha.
41013022	Nanga balangi̱ baa bisubha na abakuha bisubha bati ebo niibo Ki̱li̱si̱to, baliisa kandi balikola byakuswekani̱ya, kulengʼo kilakaba nkigubhukana kuhabi̱i̱si̱ya na bantu aba Luhanga aakomi̱yemu.
41013023	Nahabweki, enu̱we mwelindile kimui! Naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye bu̱li̱ kintu kitakabaayʼo.”
41013024	“Haanu̱ma ya bwile bwa kubona-bona obu kuhuwʼo, ‘musana ghu̱li̱li̱ma, na kweli̱ taku̱li̱bbeni̱ya.
41013025	Nsooli̱ya sililaghalika ku̱lu̱gha eghulu. Musana, kweli̱, na bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekili eghulu mu mwanya kilidhinga-dhinga.’
41013026	Niibuwo bantu boona balibona Mwana wa Muntu, naasila mu bicu na bu̱toki̱ kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.
41013027	Alituma baamalai̱ka be bamalakake kyalo kyona munsi muni nʼomu eghulu, bakumaani̱ye bantu aba Luhanga aakomi̱yemu.
41013028	Mweghele haa kyakulolelo kya muyembe. Ghukaakwanagha, miyembe niyaalu̱lu̱mana, mumanya ngoku eli haai kwela.
41013029	Niikiyo kimui dhee obu mulibona bintu ebi naabaghambiiye ebi mbyatandika kubʼo, mumanye ngu Mwana wa Muntu, bwile buwe bwa kukuuka bwahi̱ki̱i̱ye kimui.
41013030	Mbaghambiiye majima, kubona-bona naaghambi̱ye oku kwona kulibʼo bamui mu bantu abaliyo endindi banaakaaye.
41013031	Nsi na eghulu bilihuwʼo, bhaatu bighambo byanje tabilihuwʼo.
41013032	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu amani̱ye saaha eghi kedha kilo eki. Baamalai̱ka bʼomu eghulu tabakimani̱ye, na Mwana wee taakimani̱ye bbaa. Tita enkaha niiye akimani̱ye.
41013033	Nahabweki, bwile bwona muukalaghe mweli̱ndi̱ye kandi mweteekani̱i̱je, nanga tamumani̱ye bwile obu akukuukilamu.
41013034	“Kukuuka kuwe nkukulengeesani̱ya ngoku musaasa akweteekani̱jagha kubunga. Ati̱gha ahaaye bu̱li̱ mu̱heeleli̱ya wee mulimo oghu akukola. Alaghila mu̱li̱ndi̱ wʼeka kuukala anali̱ndi̱ye.
41013035	Nahabweki muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je, nanga tamumani̱ye bwile obu mukama wʼeka akukuukilamu. Asobola kukuuka lwagholo, mukilo, nkoko nsikooka, kedha nkyambisi.
41013036	Ti̱ naabedu̱ngi̱li̱i̱sani̱i̱ye, atabasanga mughwesaghiiye.
41013037	Ebi nkwete kubaghambila bini, niibuwo naabighambila bu̱li̱ muntu. Muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je!”
41014001	Bikaba bi̱ti̱ghaaye bilo bibili Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo na Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so ku̱hi̱ka. Bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baanabbalagha mulingo balakwatilamu Yesu mu ki̱bi̱so niikuwo bamwite.
41014002	Bhaatu baahanuula bati, “Tutamukwatila haa ki̱ghenu̱, nanga bantu batu̱wa nsi̱si̱.”
41014003	Bwile obu Yesu akaba ali mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbetaniya, mu ka ya Si̱mooni̱ oghu bwile bumui akaba alwaye ntumbi. Obu Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baali banasitami̱ye mbaliya, niibuwo mukali̱ aasi̱ye akwete cu̱pa esemeeye, elimu bigita bisasi̱ye kandi bya bbei̱ yamaani̱. Mukali̱ oghu aati̱ya mu̱nu̱wa ghwa cu̱pa eghi, bigita ebi aabiseesa Yesu haa mutuwe.
41014004	Bamui mu bantu abaabaaghʼo baasaaliluwa. Baaghila bati, “Bigita ebi byabhiihila ki?
41014005	Bigita ebi bangu̱bi̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye bi̱lu̱ghamu sente syengaane na musaala ghwa muntu ghwa mwaka ghwona, sente esi basiha banaku!” Bantu aba baasoghosela kimui mukali̱ oghu.
41014006	Bhaatu Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mumuleke. Mu̱ku̱mu̱bu̱ni̱ya ki? Ankoleeye kintu kisemeeye.
41014007	Banaku mukuukala nabo bwile bwona. Mulakabaagha mubbali̱ye, mulabakoonelagha. Bhaatu si̱ye tankuukala naanu bwile bwona bbaa.
41014008	Ankoleeye kyona eki aagu̱bhi̱ye, anseesi̱yʼo bigita kuteekani̱ja mu̱ku̱ ghwanje ngoku bakughusiigha bigita ninaaku̱u̱ye.
41014009	Mbaghambiiye majima, hoona-hoona hambali balatebejagha Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga munsi yoona, balaku̱mi̱yagha eki aakoli̱ye kini kumuusuka.”
41014010	Yu̱da Esikalyota, omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu eku̱mi̱ na babili, aaghenda mu bakulu baa bahongi̱ ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱yayo.
41014011	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yu̱da oghu aabu̱ghi̱ye baadheedhuwa, kandi baamulaghiisani̱ya kumusasula sente. Niibuwo aatandi̱ki̱ye kubbala kahanda kaa kuhaayo Yesu mu bantu aba.
41014012	Kilo kyoku̱du̱bha kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, kandi eki baasalilaghamu kyana kya ntaama kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kyahi̱ka. Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, okubbala tukuteekani̱li̱ye kiyo haa?”
41014013	Aatuma babili mu beeghesebuwa be naaghila ati, “Mughende mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, mukusanga musaasa eetwi̱ki̱ye munagha ghwa maasi; mumukwame.
41014014	Numba eghi akutaahamu, mughile mukama wayo muti, ‘Mwegheesi̱ya aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya tuti: Kisiika kili haa, hambali eye hamui na beeghesebuwa be bakuliila kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo?’
41014015	Akubooleka kisiika kiinamu̱li̱to kya kai̱na yaakabili, bakiteekani̱i̱je kandi kilimu bu̱li̱ kantu. Haaliimuwo mwatuteekani̱li̱ja kiihulo eki.”
41014016	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be aba baaghendi̱ye mu kibugha eki, baasanga bintu byona bili ngoku aabaghambiiye. Baateekani̱ja kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.
41014017	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, Yesu aasa hamui na beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili.
41014018	Mbaanaliya, aaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, omui mu enu̱we, oghu akwete kuliya nanje, aku̱ngobeli̱ya!”
41014019	Beeghesebuwa be aba baatamuwa. Baatandika ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya, omui-omui, bati, “Buuye ni̱i̱si̱ye?”
41014020	Aabakuukamu ati, “Ni omui mu enu̱we eku̱mi̱ na babili, oghu akwete ku̱koli̱ya nanje mu bbaaku̱li̱.”
41014021	Mwana wa Muntu, aku̱ku̱wa ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti aku̱ku̱wa. Bhaatu oghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya ngaalikibona! Kyangubaaye kilungi nguli muntu oghu ataabyauwe.
41014022	Obu baanaliyagha, Yesu aakwata mugaati̱, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga. Aaghubhegha, aaghuha beeghesebuwa be, naaghila ati, “Mukwate, ghuni ni mubili ghwanje.”
41014023	Aakwata kiikopo kya vi̱i̱ni̱, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga, aakiha beeghesebuwa be, boona baanuwʼo.
41014024	Aabaghila ati, “Eni ni saghama yanje ya ndaghaano, eghi ekuseesuwa haabwa bantu bakani̱ye.
41014025	Mbaghambiiye majima, tankutodha kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndighinuwa buhyaka, mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
41014026	Niibuwo baali̱mbi̱ye kilimbo kya kusinda Luhanga, baatuwa, baaghenda haa mwena Oli̱va.
41014027	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Enu̱we boona mu̱ku̱ndu̱ghʼo, mu̱nti̱ghe nenkaha, ngoku kili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ati, ‘Ndiita mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya, ntaama sihanjikane.’
41014028	Bhaatu haanu̱ma ya ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwanje nkubadu̱bhi̱la kughenda Galilaaya.”
41014029	Peetelo aamughila ati, “Nankabha banji boona baku̱lu̱ghʼo, si̱ye tanku̱ku̱lu̱ghʼo bbaa!”
41014030	Yesu aamughila ati, “Nkughambiiye majima, obwalo mukilo nkoko yaakabili etakakooki̱ye, okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu!”
41014031	Bhaatu Peetelo aatodha aagu̱mi̱li̱ya kimui ati, “Noobu mba wa ku̱ku̱wa hamui naawe, tankukwehighaana bbaa!” Na beeghesebuwa baanakiye boona niikuwo baabu̱ghi̱ye batiyo dhee.
41014032	Yesu hamui na beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dha mu ki̱i̱kalo eki bakughilaghamu Getesemaani̱. Aabaghila ati, “Musitame hani, muleke ngende nsabe.”
41014033	Aaghenda na Peetelo, Yakobbo, hamui na Yohaana. Aatandika kwehi̱ghu̱wa atuntuliiye kimui kandi ali na bujune bukani̱ye.
41014034	Aabaghila ati, “Neehi̱ghu̱u̱ye bujune bukaniiye kimui kandi bukubbala kunjita. Mu̱ti̱ghale hani, muukale mubhali̱i̱ye.”
41014035	Eesu̱kanʼo kabhii, aateeli̱ya, aatandika kusaba ati hakili kilakaba nkigubhukana ataghenda kubona-bona.
41014036	Aasaba ati, “Abba, Tita! Uwe ogu̱bhi̱ye bintu byona. Otasi̱i̱ma nimbona-bona ntiyo, bhaatu kitaba ngoku mbbali̱ye, kibe ngoku obbali̱ye.”
41014037	Obu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye, aasanga beeghesebuwa be basatu aba baghwesaghiiye. Aaghila Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo ati, “Si̱mooni̱, oghwesaghiiye? Tawaagu̱bhi̱ye kuukala obhali̱i̱ye kumala saaha nʼemui yonkaha?
41014038	Muukale mubhali̱i̱ye, kandi musabe niikuwo kwohebuwa kutabasi̱ngu̱la. Majima, mutima ghubbali̱ye kukola ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye, bhaatu maani̱ ghaa mubili ghonkaha taghakumala.”
41014039	Aatodha aakuukayo, aasaba naabu̱gha bighambo ngʼebi aadu̱bhi̱ye ku̱bu̱gha.
41014040	Obu aatodhi̱ye kukuuka, aabasanga batodhi̱ye kughwesaghila, nanga tabaagubhagha kwi̱dha na ki̱koleli̱yo! Ti̱ kyaku̱bu̱gha naye kyababula.
41014041	Aatodha aaghenda kusaba. Obu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye mulundi ghwakasatu, aabaghila ati, “Munaghwesaghiiye, kandi munahuumuuye? Mu̱beeli̱ye haala; bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye! Mulole, Mwana wa Muntu, balimamuhaayo mu basi̱i̱si̱.
41014042	Muumuke, tughende! Mulole oghu alimamu̱ghobeli̱ya nguni!”
41014043	Yesu atakahendekeei̱ye ku̱bu̱gha, du̱mbi̱ Yu̱da, omui mu beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili, aaki̱dha. Aasa ali na kiigambi̱ kya bantu, bakwete mi̱i̱gho na bihiyo, batu̱mu̱u̱we bakulu baa bahongi̱, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, hamui na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya.
41014044	Yu̱da oghu aamu̱ghobeli̱yagha aasanguwa aghambiiye bantu aba ati, “Oghu nku̱hi̱ka kughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha, niiye oghu. Mumukwate, mumutwale mu̱mu̱li̱ndi̱ye bhyani.”
41014045	Makaki̱dha bati, aaghenda hambali Yesu ali, aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya!” Du̱mbi̱ aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha.
41014046	Bantu aba baasa, baaghwilikiilila Yesu, baamukwata.
41014047	Omui mu bantu abaali baamiliiyʼo hamui na Yesu, aabhulayo kihiyo kiye, aajombʼo mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona kutui.
41014048	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Munjisiiye na bihiyo na mi̱i̱gho nga baasi̱ye kukwata mu̱ji̱ndi̱ nangaaki?
41014049	Bu̱li̱ kilo naakalagha naanu mu Numba ya Luhanga ni̱neegheesi̱ya. Haabwaki mutankwete bwile obu, bhaatu ebikwete kulehukana bini byona niibuwo byasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱mbu̱ghi̱yʼo.”
41014050	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yesu boona baali̱gi̱ti̱ye, baamu̱ti̱gha enkaha.
41014051	Mutabhana omui aaghenda eekiikiiye si̱i̱ti̱ yonkaha alabhi̱ye abaatwalagha Yesu. Bantu abaabaagha mu kiigambi̱ eki baalengʼo kumughwilikiilila,
41014052	bhaatu aabeetaasu̱li̱yamu, baati̱ghali̱ya si̱i̱ti̱ yee eghi, aali̱gi̱ta muhina.
41014053	Baatwala Yesu mu ka ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona. Bakulu baa bahongi̱, bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, boona baagumbaanayo.
41014054	Peetelo aaghenda alabhi̱ye Yesu enu̱ma bukee-buke ali hambali haseli̱yʼo, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu aaki̱dhi̱ye hanjaakati ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona. Peetelo aasitama hamui na bali̱ndi̱ kwota mulilo.
41014055	Bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba hamui na baamemba boona baa Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱, baatandika kubbala bantu abakuha buukai̱so bwa ku̱si̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya Yesu musango niikuwo bamwite. Bhaatu bataagubha kubutunga.
41014056	Bantu bakani̱ye baaha buukai̱so bwa bisubha haa Yesu, bhaatu buukai̱so bwabo butaasusaana.
41014057	Bamui mu bantu aba baamilila baaha buukai̱so bwa bisubha haa Yesu bati,
41014058	“Tukaaghu̱wa musaasa oghu naaghila ati, ‘Nkugenga Numba ya Luhanga eghi bantu bakweye eni, mu bilo bisatu nkwelemu enji eghi bantu batakweye.’ ”
41014059	Bhaatu nʼaba dhee buukai̱so bwabo butaasusaana.
41014060	Niibuwo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aamiliiye mu lukulato olu, aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Uwe tooli na kyakukuukamu? Tooghu̱u̱ye ebi bantu aba bakwete kukunyegheelela bati waakoli̱ye?”
41014061	Bhaatu Yesu aakala aholeei̱ye, ataakuukamu na kantu. Mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona oghu aatodha aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga wa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa?”
41014062	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni. Ti̱ mulibona Mwana wa Muntu, asitami̱ye haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Luhanga, kandi naasa na bicu byʼomu eghulu.”
41014063	Du̱mbi̱ mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona oghu aatemula biigandulo ebi alu̱wete. Aaguga ati, “Tunaakubbala baakai̱so banji nangaaki?
41014064	Enu̱we boonini mwehi̱ghwi̱li̱i̱ye ngoku ambuuye kwonini Luhanga! Enu̱we mukucuwamu ki?” Bantu aba boona baagola bati, “Ghwamu̱si̱ngi̱ye; abhonganuuwe aku̱we!”
41014065	Bamui mu bantu aba baatandika ku̱mu̱twi̱lakakila. Baamuboha kitambaala haali̱i̱so kandi baamutalangi̱ya, mbanamughila bati, “Mulangi̱ uwe, otughambile, ni ani̱ aakuhuuye!” Bali̱ndi̱ baamutwala, baatandika kumuhuula.
41014066	Bwile obu Peetelo akaba anasitami̱ye hanjaakati noota mulilo, manaabukali̱ omui haa baheeleli̱ya baa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, aasa.
41014067	Aakala aloleleeye Peetelo, aamughila ati, “Naawe waabaagha hamui na Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱.”
41014068	Bhaatu Peetelo eehighaana ati, “Ebi okwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi tambyetegheleei̱ye kandi tambimani̱ye bbaa.” Niibuwo Peetelo oghu aalu̱ghi̱yʼo, aaghenda haa elembo, [du̱mbi̱ nkoko yaakooka].
41014069	Obu manaabukali̱ oghu aatodhi̱ye naamubona, aatandika kughambila abaabaagha baamiliiyʼo ati, “Musaasa oni naye ni omui mu bantu aba.”
41014070	Bhaatu Peetelo aatodha eehighaana. Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, bantu abaali baamiliiyʼo, baamughila bati, “Naawe majima oli omui mu bantu aba, nanga oli Munagalilaaya!”
41014071	Bhaatu aatodha eehighaana, aalahila ati, “Ndakaba ni̱mbu̱gha bisubha, Luhanga ankiine. Musaasa mukughamba oghu, si̱ye tanimumani̱ye bbaa.”
41014072	Du̱mbi̱ nkoko yaakabili yaakooka, Peetelo aasuka ngoku Yesu aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Nkoko yaakabili etakakooki̱ye, okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu.” Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aatandika kulilila kimui.
41015001	Nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱, baamemba baa Lukulato Lukulu olwabaaghamu bakulu baa bahongi̱, na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, baagumbaana kuhanuula kandi kucuwamu eki bakukola Yesu. Baalaghila kumuboha, kumutwala ewaa mu̱lemi̱ Pilaato.
41015002	Obu baamu̱ki̱dhi̱i̱yeyo, Pilaato aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, ngoku waakabu̱ghi̱ye.”
41015003	Niibuwo bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baamunyegheleeye ewaa Pilaato bati aakoli̱ye bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bikani̱ye.
41015004	Pilaato aatodha aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Tookukuukaghamu? Tooghu̱u̱ye bintu bikani̱ye ebi bakwete kukunyegheelela bati waakoli̱ye?”
41015005	Bhaatu Yesu ataakuukamu na kantu, ti̱ Pilaato aasweka.
41015006	Mu bilo bya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, Pilaato aalekelagha munyankomo omui, oghu Bayu̱daaya baasabagha bati alekele.
41015007	Bwile obu musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Balaba akaba ali mu nkomo. Ali omui mu baheekela abaali bakwatu̱u̱we haabwa kwita bantu mu bulemo bwa kubbala kuuyʼo bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma.
41015008	Niibuwo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu beekumaani̱i̱ye, baaghenda ewaa Pilaato, baamusaba bati abalekeelele munyankomo omui, ngoku akukolagha.
41015009	Pilaato aabu̱u̱li̱ya bantu aba ati, “Mukubbala mbalekeelele Yesu Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?”
41015010	Aabu̱u̱li̱ya atiyo nanga akaba amani̱ye ngoku bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baghiliiye Yesu etima, kandi ngoku lyaleki̱ye baamukwata baamuleetela ye.
41015011	Bhaatu bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baahaaghi̱li̱li̱ya ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba kusaba Pilaato kulekela Balaba, mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kulekela Yesu.
41015012	Pilaato aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ti̱ oghu mwaghi̱li̱ye muti ni Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya, mukubbala nimukole ki?”
41015013	Boona baagola bati, “Bamubambe haa musalaba!”
41015014	Aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Bamubambe nangaaki? Aatu̱u̱ye musango ki?” Beeyongelela kimui kugola bati, “Bamubambe!”
41015015	Haabwa Pilaato kubbala kukola eki̱dheedhi̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, aabalekeelela Balaba. Aalaghila baasilikale baahuula Yesu bibbooko bya minuwa, aahaayo Yesu kumubamba.
41015016	Baasilikale aba baaki̱dhi̱ya Yesu hanjaakati ya kikaali kya Pilaato, baamutwala mu bbalaki̱si̱ yabo. Baabilikila baasilikale baanakyabo boona kumuwaawani̱ya.
41015017	Baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka ki̱lu̱walo kiimutuku nga mukama. Baali̱ngelela bilandilo bya mahuwa ghajambi̱ye, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka biyo mu mutuwe nga sipeewa ya bukama.
41015018	Baatandika kwekola nga bantu bamu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye mbamughila bati, “Otuule, uwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya!”
41015019	Baakala mbanamuhuula mu mutuwe, mbanamu̱twi̱lakakila, mbanamu̱teeleli̱ya mbeekola nga bantu bakumulami̱ya.
41015020	Obu baamali̱ye kumuwaawaani̱ya, baamu̱tu̱u̱bbu̱la ki̱lu̱walo eki baali bamu̱lu̱wi̱ki̱ye. Baatodha baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka ngoye siye, baamutwala kumubamba haa musalaba.
41015021	Mbanaghenda baasangaana musaasa alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kilene. Li̱i̱na liye Si̱mooni̱, ese Alekijanda na Lufasi. Obu aanataahagha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, baasilikale aba baamuhambi̱li̱ja kuheeka musalaba oghu Yesu aabaagha aheeki̱ye.
41015022	Baasilikale aba baaki̱dhi̱ya Yesu mu ki̱i̱kalo bakughilaghamu Gologota, (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya Ki̱i̱kalo kya Kahanga).
41015023	Baamuha vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi bataabuuyemu miila, bhaatu aabhenga kughinuwa.
41015024	Niibuwo baamubambi̱ye haa musalaba kandi baakoma buluulu kumanya ngoku bakutambulana bi̱lu̱walo biye.
41015025	Baamubamba saaha esatu sya nkyambisi.
41015026	Musango oghwaleki̱ye baamubamba, baaghuhandiika haa kabbaau ngu, “Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.”
41015027	Baabamba dhee basuma babili haa misalaba. Ghwʼomui baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haa luhande lwabuliyo bwa Yesu, na ghwʼonji haa lwabumesu. [
41015028	Kini kikaasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ekyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, “Bakamubalila mu nkoli̱ sya bibhi.”]
41015029	Bantu abaasaalilaghʼo baatandika kumubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya mbanadhi̱ngi̱ya mituwe yabo, mbaghila bati, “Ehee! Nuuwe okaghila oti okugenga Numba ya Luhanga, kandi otodhe oghikwelele bilo bisatu!
41015030	Dheluuni weejune, kandi osu̱ndu̱ke haa musalaba haala!”
41015031	Niikiyo kimui dhee bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, baamusekeelela, mbanaghambilana bati, “Hee! Aajunagha bantu banji, kusa aasaaghu̱u̱we kwejuna.
41015032	Eye oghu aaghilagha ati niiye Ki̱li̱si̱to Mukama wa I̱saaleeli̱, dheluuni asu̱ndu̱ke haa musalaba haala, niikuwo tulole, tu̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je.” Na basuma babili aba baabambi̱ye hamui naye, niikuwo nabo baakamubbaaki̱i̱si̱i̱ye batiyo dhee.
41015033	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye saaha mukaagha sya ntangaali̱, mweli̱ma ghwakwata mu ehanga eli lyona, ghwahi̱ki̱ya saaha mwenda.
41015034	Saaha mwenda esi, Yesu aataka ati, “Elooi̱, Elooi̱, lama sabbakataani̱?” Ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, “Luhanga wanje, Luhanga wanje, wandu̱ghi̱yʼo bwaki?”
41015035	Bamui mu bantu abaali baamiliiyʼo obu baaghu̱u̱ye, baaghila bati, “Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye, alimabilikila Eli̱ya.”
41015036	Musaasa omui mu bantu aba aali̱gi̱ta aakoma kijibankoba, aaki̱lu̱bi̱ka mu vi̱i̱ni̱ esaaliiye. Aakiboha haa lukaaka, aaki̱ni̱i̱ni̱ya kukita Yesu haa mu̱nu̱wa niikuwo aanuwʼo. Musaasa oghu aaghila ati, “Mulinde, muleke tulole Eli̱ya alakaba naasa kumuuya haa musalaba haala!”
41015037	Yesu aatakila kimui nʼelaka lyamaani̱, du̱mbi̱ aatwi̱kana.
41015038	Bwile obu bwonini, kateni̱ eghi ekaba edhodhookeei̱ye mu Numba ya Luhanga yaatemukamu bihande bibili, ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la eghulu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya hansi.
41015039	Mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱, akaba aamiliiye haai-haai na musalaba oghu babambi̱yʼo Yesu. Obu aaboone ngoku aaku̱u̱ye, aaghila ati, “Majima musaasa oghu, aabaagha Mwana wa Luhanga!”
41015040	Bakali̱ bakaba baliyo dhee, baloleeye haseli̱yʼo. Mali̱ya Mangadhalina, Saloome, na Mali̱ya ni̱na Yose na Yakobbo wʼobuto, bakaba baliyo.
41015041	Ti̱ obu Yesu aanabungilagha mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, bakali̱ aba baabungagha naye kandi baamu̱heeleli̱yagha. Bakali̱ banji bakani̱ye abaasi̱ye na Yesu mu Yelusaalemu bakaba baliyo dhee.
41015042	-
41015043	Hakaba aliyo musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Yojeefu̱, alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Alimateya. Akaba ali memba wa Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱ kandi bamu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye. Musaasa oghu akaba alindiliiye bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga. Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo kandi kilo eki niikiyo Bayu̱daaya beeteekani̱jagha haabwa kilo kya Sabhato, aaghenda ewaa Pilaato atoobahi̱ye, aamusaba mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
41015044	Pilaato aasweka ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ngu Yesu aaku̱u̱ye bwangu-bwangu. Niibuwo aabilikiiye mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ oghu ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya majima Yesu alakaba naaku̱u̱ye kuwo.
41015045	Haanu̱ma ya kumughambila ngu aaku̱u̱ye, niibuwo aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye Yojeefu̱ kuuya mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu haa musalaba.
41015046	Yojeefu̱ oghu aaghula si̱i̱ti̱ njelu mpyaka, aaghenda aaya mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu haa musalaba. Aaghuboha mu si̱i̱ti̱ eghi, aaghutwala, aaghuta mu kituulo eki aali asangu̱u̱we ali̱mi̱ye mu kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to. Aahi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱ya ebaale liinamu̱li̱to, aali̱swi̱ki̱la haa mu̱nu̱wa ghwa kituulo eki.
41015047	Mali̱ya Mangadhalina na Mali̱ya ni̱na Yose baabona hambali aataaye kuta mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
41016001	Lwagholo, obu kilo kya Sabhato kyahooyʼo, Mali̱ya Mangadhalina, Saloome, na Mali̱ya ni̱na Yakobbo, baaghula bigita bya kusiigha mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
41016002	Kilo Kyasande nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ butakakeeye, baakeelela kughenda haa kituulo. Baaki̱dhʼo musana ngudhuuka.
41016003	Mu kihanda, baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Ni ani̱ akutuuhila ebaale haa mulyango ghwa kituulo eki?”
41016004	Obu baaloli̱ye, baasanga ebaale eli li̱hi̱li̱ngi̱ti̱i̱ye, li̱lu̱ghi̱ye haa kituulo eki. Ebaale eli likaba lineeteeye kimui.
41016005	Obu baataahi̱ye mu kituulo eki, baasangamu mutabhana, alu̱wete nkanji̱ njelu dhiyo, aasitami̱ye haa luhande lwabo lwabuliyo; ti̱ bakali̱ aba boobahila kimui.
41016006	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mutoobaha! Nimani̱ye mukwete kubbala Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ oghu baabambi̱ye haa musalaba. Taali hani, aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye! Mulole hambali baabaagha balangaai̱ye mu̱ku̱ ghuwe.
41016007	Nahabweki, mughende mughambile beeghesebuwa be, kukila munu Peetelo, muti Yesu akubadu̱bhi̱la kughenda Galilaaya; eghi niiyo mukumubonela ngoku aabaghambiiye.”
41016008	Niibuwo bakali̱ aba baatooye mu kituulo eki, baali̱gi̱ta boobahiiye kimui kandi mbatukumila. Tabaaghambiiye muntu nʼomui makulu agha nanga bakaba boobahi̱ye. [
41016009	Nkyambisi kilo Kyasande obu Yesu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye, Mali̱ya Mangadhalina oghu bwile bumui aabhi̱ngi̱yʼo bi̱li̱mu̱ musanju̱ niiye akadu̱bha kumubona.
41016010	Mali̱ya oghu aaghenda aaghambila bantu abaakalagha na Yesu. Aabasanga bali mu bujune kandi mbalila.
41016011	Bhaatu nankabha naabaghambiiye ati Yesu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye kandi aamuboone, tabaahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha.
41016012	Haanu̱ma, bantu banji babili mu aba Yesu aakalagha nabo baamubona. Baalu̱ghagha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu mbaaghenda mu kyalo. Baamubona asu̱si̱ye muntu onji.
41016013	Obu baaku̱u̱ki̱ye mbaaghambila baanakyabo, bataahi̱ki̱li̱ja dhee ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha.
41016014	Haakumaliilila, beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ nʼomui baamubona mbaliya. Aabasoghosa haabwa kubhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi baanakyabo abaamuboone naahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye baabaghambiiye.
41016015	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mughende munsi yoona, mutebeje bantu boona Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga.
41016016	Weena oghu aku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Makulu Ghasemeeye agha kandi naabati̱i̱ji̱buwa, akujunuwa. Bhaatu weena oghu ataaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Makulu Ghasemeeye agha, Luhanga ali̱mu̱twi̱la musango.
41016017	Abaku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, Luhanga akubaha bu̱toki̱ kukola byakuswekani̱ya bini: kubhinga bi̱li̱mu̱ mbakoleesi̱ya li̱i̱na lyanje; ku̱bu̱gha mi̱bu̱ghe enji eghi bateeghi̱ye.
41016018	Kabhi takakubabʼo noobu bakwata njoka kedha banuwa butuwa. Baku̱ku̱mʼo balwaye, bakile.”
41016019	Obu Mukama Yesu aamali̱ye kughambila beeghesebuwa be aba bintu ebi, aatwaluwa mu eghulu, aasitama haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa Luhanga.
41016020	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be aba baaghendi̱ye baatebeja hoona-hoona. Mukama Yesu aakala naanakola hamui nabo kandi naabaha bu̱toki̱ kukola byakuswekani̱ya ku̱gu̱mi̱ya ngoku ebi baabu̱ghagha ghali majima.]
42001001	Wai̱ Ti̱yofi̱lo, bantu bakani̱ye baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ebi Luhanga aakoli̱ye ewaatu hani.
42001002	Baahandiika ebi abaakalagha na Yesu kandi batebeji̱ baa kighambo kya Luhanga baaboone naakola, ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la hambali aatandikiiye kukola mulimo ghuwe, baatughambiiye biyo.
42001003	Nahabweki obu naamali̱ye ku̱byetegheeleli̱ya bhyani haabwa bwile bukani̱ye, naaboone kili kilungi nkuhandiikile biyo mbi̱solongeei̱ye kusemeeye,
42001004	niikuwo omanye majima ghʼebi baakwegheeseei̱ye.
42001005	Bwile obu Helude aabaagha ali mukama wa Bu̱yu̱daaya, akaba aliyo mu̱hongi̱, li̱i̱na liye Jakaliya. Akaba ali memba wa kitebe kya bahongi̱ kya ntu̱la baaghilaghamu Abbi̱ja. Asweye Eli̱jaabbeeti̱, muusukulu wa Alooni̱.
42001006	Bombi bakaba bali bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa Luhanga, kandi bakwete kwonini bilaghilo bya Mukama byona.
42001007	Bhaatu bakaba batali na mwana, nanga Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ akaba ali ngumba, kandi bombi bakaakuuye.
42001008	Kilo kimui Jakaliya aataaha mu Numba ya Luhanga kukola mulimo ghuwe ghwa bu̱hongi̱. Kitebe kyabo aaliikiyo kikukola wi̱i̱ki̱ eghi.
42001009	Kusighikila ngoku bahongi̱ baakolagha, obu baa kitebe kyabo baakomi̱ye buluulu niikuwo bamanye oghu akutaaha mu kisiika ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kya Mukama ku̱tu̱mi̱ka bubbani̱, Jakaliya oghu niiye baakomi̱ye.
42001010	Ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu bakaniiye kimui baati̱ghala enja mbanasaba, eye naanatu̱mi̱ka bubbani̱.
42001011	Niibuwo malai̱ka wa Mukama aamubonekeeye, eemiliiye haa luhande lwabuliyo bwa eki baatu̱mi̱kaghʼo bubbani̱
42001012	Obu Jakaliya aamuboone, aaswekela kimui kandi oobaha.
42001013	Bhaatu malai̱ka oghu aamughila ati, “Jakaliya otoobaha! Luhanga aaghu̱u̱ye kusaba kwawe. Mukaawe Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ aku̱ku̱byalila mwana wa wabusaasa, kandi okumuluka li̱i̱na Yohaana.
42001014	Ti̱ mwana oghu naabyauwe, okudheedheluwa kimui kandi na bantu bakani̱ye bakudheedhuwa.
42001015	Akuba mu̱heeleli̱ya wamaani̱ wa Mukama. Taalinuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ esaaliiye kedha kitami̱i̱li̱ya kyona. Aku̱byaluwa aasuuye Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
42001016	Aku̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakani̱ye ewaa Mukama Luhanga wabo.
42001017	Akulangilila ngoku Mukama akwisa. Luhanga akumuha bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱ ngʼobu aahaaye Eli̱ya. Akuleka baana baaghu̱wane na beesebo. Akuleka abaghai̱ye bilaghilo bya Luhanga beekuukemu, babe na magheji nga ghaa bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, niikuwo beeteekani̱li̱je kwisa kwa Mukama.”
42001018	Niibuwo Jakaliya aabu̱u̱i̱ye malai̱ka oghu ati, “Ti̱ nkumanya nti̱ya ngoku eki kikubʼo? Nanga si̱ye na mukanje tukaakuuye!”
42001019	Malai̱ka oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye Gabu̱dyeli̱ oghu nkuukalagha haai-haai na Luhanga ni̱i̱mu̱heeleli̱ya. Niiye antu̱mi̱ye kukughambila Makulu Ghasemeeye agha.
42001020	Bhaatu haabwa kubhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi naabu̱ghi̱ye, tookutodha ku̱bu̱gha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mwana oghu abyauwe, nanga ebi naabu̱ghi̱ye ebi bwile bwabiyo bukaaku̱hi̱ka bikubʼo.”
42001021	Bantu bakaba banalindiliiye Jakaliya kandi basweki̱ye eki̱leki̱ye alebbi̱ye mu Numba ya Luhanga.
42001022	Obu aatooyemu, ataagubha ku̱bu̱gha nabo. Aakala naabakolela sai̱ni̱ syonkaha. Niibuwo baamani̱ye ngoku aabonekeeuwe mu Numba ya Luhanga.
42001023	Aakuuka ewe e ka, obu bwile buwe bwa ku̱heeleli̱ya mu Numba ya Luhanga bwahooyʼo.
42001024	Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, mukali̱ wee Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ oghu aaku̱li̱ya, kandi eebi̱sa kumala meeli̱ ataano.
42001025	Aaghila ati, “Mukama angiliiye ngughuma, anji̱hi̱yʼo nsoni̱ mu bantu!”
42001026	Obu etundu lya Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ lyahi̱ki̱ye meeli̱ mukaagha, Luhanga aatuma malai̱ka Gabu̱dyeli̱ mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya,
42001027	ewaa manaabukali̱ atakamani̱ye basaasa li̱i̱na liye Mali̱ya, oghu Yojeefu̱, muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, aabaagha alu̱ghi̱ye.
42001028	Malai̱ka oghu aahi̱ka aalamu̱ki̱ya Mali̱ya ati, “Mpempa yonkaha! Mukama aaku̱komi̱yemu! Aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa ghwamaani̱!”
42001029	Mali̱ya aasobeeleluwa kimui haabwa ebi malai̱ka oghu aabu̱ghi̱ye, kandi aatandika kweli̱li̱kana eki bikumani̱i̱si̱ya.
42001030	Malai̱ka aamughila ati, “Mali̱ya otoobaha, Luhanga aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa.
42001031	Oku̱ku̱li̱ya kandi obyale mwana wa wabusaasa. Okumuluka li̱i̱na Yesu.
42001032	Akuba wamaani̱ kandi balamughilaghamu Mwana wa Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu. Mukama Luhanga akumufoola mukama ngoku taata wee Dhau̱dhi̱ aabaagha.
42001033	Niiye akulema ehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ bilo nʼebilo, bu̱lemi̱ buwe tabulihuwʼo.”
42001034	Mali̱ya aabu̱u̱li̱ya Malai̱ka oghu ati, “Tankamani̱ye basaasa, ti̱ ndaku̱li̱ya nti̱ya?”
42001035	Malai̱ka aamukuukamu ati, “Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akukwisʼo kandi oku̱ku̱li̱ya haabwa maani̱ ghaa Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu. Niikiyo kikuleka mwana oghu oku̱byala mbamughilamu Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi Mwana wa Luhanga.
42001036	Olole, lughanda lwawe Eli̱jaabbeeti̱, oghu bakughilagha bati ni ngumba, nankabha akaakuuye, aaku̱li̱i̱ye mwana wa wabusaasa, kandi etundu liye lilimu meeli̱ mukaagha,
42001037	nanga Luhanga aagu̱bhi̱ye bintu byona.”
42001038	Mali̱ya aamukuukamu ati, “Ndi mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Mukama, nahabweki ngoku waabu̱ghi̱ye haaliikuwo kyambʼo.” Du̱mbi̱ malai̱ka oghu aaghenda.
42001039	Obu byahooyʼo bilo bikee, Mali̱ya aaghenda bwangu-bwangu mu tau̱ni̱ yʼomu myena mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya.
42001040	Aataaha mu numba ya Jakaliya, aalamu̱ki̱ya Eli̱jaabbeeti̱.
42001041	Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ makaaghu̱wa ati Mali̱ya naamulamu̱ki̱ya, du̱mbi̱ mwana aatandika ku̱mu̱gyanila munda. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aasʼo Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ oghu,
42001042	aamu̱bu̱ghi̱i̱si̱ya nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Luhanga aakuhaaye mu̱gi̱sa kusaali̱ya bakali̱ boona, kandi aahaaye mu̱gi̱sa mwana oghu oku̱byala.
42001043	Manya kyalu̱ghi̱ye haa, nanje kutunga mu̱gi̱sa ghuni, ni̱na Mukama wanje kwisa kumbungila?
42001044	Nanga naabaaye makaaghu̱wa nondamu̱ki̱ya, mwana atandika ku̱ngyanila munda adheedheeu̱we.
42001045	Oli na mu̱gi̱sa ku̱si̱i̱ma ngoku makulu agha Mukama aakutumiiye ghakuba kuwo.”
42001046	Mali̱ya aaghila ati, “Niibuwo naasindila kimui Mukama.
42001047	Kandi mutima ghwanje ghu̱dheedheeu̱we haabwa Luhanga Mu̱ju̱ni̱ wanje.
42001048	Nanga aasu̱ki̱ye bu̱dhooti̱ bwanje, si̱ye mu̱heeleli̱ya wee. Ku̱lu̱gha obwalo, na bilo byona, bantu boona balaghilagha bati Luhanga akampa mu̱gi̱sa.
42001049	Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi ankoleeye bintu byamaani̱.
42001050	Bantu boona, bwile bwona, abaku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱yagha akubaghililagha ngughuma.
42001051	Ooleki̱ye bu̱toki̱ buwe; aalalangi̱i̱ye abali na byeli̱li̱kano bya myepanko mu mitima yabo.
42001052	Aahulumuuye bakama baa bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haa ntebe syabo sya bukama; aaha ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa abatali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
42001053	Abakubbalagha Luhanga kubakoonela akubahaagha bintu bisemeeye. Bhaatu abataakubbalagha Luhanga kubakoonela, akubabhingagha magi̱la kantu.
42001054	-
42001055	Aakoli̱ye eki aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye baataata baatu; aakooneeye mu̱heeleli̱ya wee I̱saaleeli̱. Aasu̱ki̱ye kughilila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na baasukulu be boona ngughuma bilo nʼebilo!”
42001056	Ti̱ Mali̱ya aamala na Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ haai meeli̱ asatu, aakuuka ewaabo.
42001057	Obu bwile bwa Eli̱jaabbeeti̱ bwa ku̱byala bwahi̱ki̱ye, aabyala mwana wabusaasa.
42001058	Baliilanuwa be na nganda siye baaghu̱wa ngoku Mukama aamughiliiye kisa kitiyo, boona baadheedhuwa hamui naye.
42001059	Obu mwana oghu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye bilo munaanaa, baasa kumusali̱i̱si̱ya kandi baabbalagha kumuluka li̱i̱na lya ese wee Jakaliya.
42001060	Bhaatu ni̱na wee aaghila ati, “Bbaa, niiye akuba Yohaana!”
42001061	Baamughila bati, “Mu baataata be boona, taaliyo oghu balu̱ki̱ye li̱i̱na eli!”
42001062	Niibuwo baakoleeye ese wee sai̱ni̱, ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya li̱i̱na eli akubbala kumuluka.
42001063	Jakaliya aabakolela sai̱ni̱ ati bamuhe kaakuhandiikʼo. Aahandiikʼo ati, “Li̱i̱na liye niiye Yohaana.” Ti̱ boona baasweka.
42001064	Du̱mbi̱ Jakaliya aatandika ku̱bu̱gha kandi kusinda Luhanga.
42001065	Baliilanuwa be boona boobaha. Makulu agha ghaamalakaka kyalo kya myena ya Bu̱yu̱daaya eki kyona.
42001066	Ti̱ muntu weena oghu aaghu̱wagha makulu agha, eebu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mwana oghu naaku̱li̱ye bhaawai̱ akuba ati̱ya?” Nanga bakaba baboone ngoku aabyahuwe haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Mukama.
42001067	Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aasʼo Jakaliya oghu, aamu̱bu̱ghi̱i̱si̱ya kulanga ati,
42001068	“Etu̱we baasukulu baa I̱saaleeli̱ tusinde Mukama waatu! Nanga aatubungiiye kandi aatucunguuye.
42001069	Aatuhaaye Mu̱ju̱ni̱ wamaani̱, muusukulu wa mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Mukama Dhau̱dhi̱,
42001070	ngoku Mukama aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye hambele naakoleesi̱ya balangi̱ be bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ati
42001071	akutujuna ngi̱ghu̱ syatu kandi abatwohi̱ye boona.
42001072	Aaghila ati akughilila baataata baatu ngughuma kandi aasuke ndaghaano yee ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye,
42001073	eghi aalahiiye naalaghi̱i̱sani̱ya taata waatu Ebbulahi̱mu̱,
42001074	ati akutujuna ngi̱ghu̱ syatu niikuwo tugubhe ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya tutoobahi̱ye,
42001075	ntukola ebi̱mu̱dheedhi̱ye kandi ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghe, tunaakaaye.”
42001076	Aabu̱ghʼo mwana wee Yohaana oghu ati, “Ti̱ uwe mwana wanje, balakughilaghamu mulangi̱ wa Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu. Nanga oku̱du̱bha kuhikila kulangilila bantu ngoku Mukama akwisa.
42001077	Okughambila bantu be aba ngoku akubajuna haabwa kubaghanila bibhi byabo.
42001078	Haabwa Luhanga waatu kutukunda kandi kutughilila ngughuma, akutuma Mu̱ju̱ni̱ atwisemu naalu̱gha mu eghulu
42001079	kughambila abatamani̱ye Luhanga kandi abakweyongelagha ku̱si̱i̱sa, kabhi akali mu kifubilo kya Luhanga kya kubahwelekeeleli̱ya eki alibaha, kandi atwoleke ngoku tukutunga bu̱si̱nge.”
42001080	Yohaana oghu aakula, kandi aaba wamaani̱ mu mwoyo, aakala mu elungu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kilo eki aatandikiiyemu mulimo ghuwe mu bantu bʼomu ehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱.
42002001	Bwile obu mukama Kai̱saali̱ Agu̱si̱to aatʼo kilaghilo ati bantu boona bʼomu kyalo kiye kyona beehandi̱i̱ki̱i̱si̱ye, babaluwe.
42002002	Kuni niikuwo kwabaaye kwehandi̱i̱ki̱si̱ya kwoku̱du̱bha kubʼo, obu Kwi̱li̱no aabaagha alemi̱ye ehanga lya Si̱li̱ya.
42002003	Nahabweki bu̱li̱ muntu aaghenda kwehandi̱i̱ki̱i̱si̱ya mu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaabo.
42002004	Haabwa Yojeefu̱ kuba muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, aalu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, aaghenda kwehandi̱i̱ki̱i̱si̱ya mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteleheemu mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya hambali taata wee Dhau̱dhi̱ oghu aabyaluuwe.
42002005	Aaghenda kwehandi̱i̱ki̱i̱si̱ya hamui na Mali̱ya oghu aali alu̱ghi̱ye, bhaatu atakamusweye. Mali̱ya oghu akaba aku̱li̱i̱ye.
42002006	Banaliyeyo, Mali̱ya aakwatuwa ku̱byala.
42002007	Aabyala mwana wa mu̱li̱ghaaso wabusaasa, aamuta mu byahi, aamulangaali̱ya mu ki̱i̱bboki̱si̱ eki bitunguwa bikuliilaghamu, nanga bisiika byʼomu looji̱ bikaba ni byasuuye.
42002008	Mu kyalo eki hakaba haliyo bali̱i̱si̱ya, bwile obu baalaalagha mu kisaka bali̱ndi̱ye bitunguwa byabo.
42002009	Du̱mbi̱ malai̱ka wa Mukama aababonekela. Kubbebbeniya kwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Luhanga kwababbeneli̱ya. Ti̱ boobahila kimui.
42002010	Niibuwo malai̱ka oghu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mutoobaha mbaleeteeye Makulu Ghasemeeye, ghakuleka bantu boona mbadheedheluwa kimui.
42002011	Obwalo buni mu tau̱ni̱ ya Dhau̱dhi̱, Mu̱ju̱ni̱ waanu aabyauwe, Ki̱li̱si̱to Mukama.
42002012	Ekikuleka nimumanya, mukusanga mwana nkelembe oghu, bamutaaye mu byahi, bamulangaai̱ye mu ki̱i̱bboki̱si̱ eki bitunguwa bikuliilaghamu.”
42002013	Du̱mbi̱ kiigambi̱ kyamaani̱ kya baamalai̱ka bʼomu eghulu baasu̱ndu̱ka, baalungana na malai̱ka oghu, mbasinda Luhanga bati,
42002014	“Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona abe na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Ti̱ bantu baa munsi aba Luhanga eedheedheu̱we baakale mpempa!”
42002015	Obu baamalai̱ka aba baalu̱ghi̱yʼo, mbaakuuka mu eghulu, bali̱i̱si̱ya aba baaghambilaana bati, “Bhaawai̱, muleke tughende mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbeteleheemu, tulole ekyabaayeyo, eki Mukama aatughambiiye.”
42002016	Du̱mbi̱ baaghenda bwangu-bwangu, baasanga Mali̱ya na Yojeefu̱ hamui na mwana wabo nkelembe bamulangaai̱ye mu ki̱i̱bboki̱si̱ eki bitunguwa bikuliilaghamu.
42002017	Obu bali̱i̱si̱ya aba baaboone mwana oghu baabu̱gha byona ebimukwetʼo ebi malai̱ka aabaghambiiye.
42002018	Ti̱ boona abaabi̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye baaswekela kimui.
42002019	Bhaatu Mali̱ya aakala aholeei̱ye bintu ebi byona, naanabyeli̱li̱kanʼo bhyani mu mutima ghuwe.
42002020	Bali̱i̱si̱ya aba baakuukayo mbahu̱ti̱li̱ya kimui Luhanga kandi mbamusinda. Nanga byona ebi baaghu̱u̱ye nʼebi baaboone bya mwana oghu, bikaba byonini ebi malai̱ka aabaghambiiye.
42002021	Obu mwana oghu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye bilo munaanaa, babyaye be baamusali̱i̱si̱ya. Baamuluka li̱i̱na Yesu, eli malai̱ka aasangu̱u̱we amu̱lu̱ki̱ye, Mali̱ya atakaku̱li̱i̱ye.
42002022	Bwile bwahi̱ka bwa Mali̱ya na Yojeefu̱ kukola mukolo ghwa kwesemeli̱ya ewaa Luhanga, ngoku bilaghilo bya Musa byalaghilagha. Baatwala mwana oghu Yelusaalemu mu Numba ya Luhanga kumuhaayo ewaa Mukama,
42002023	ngoku kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu bilaghilo bya Mukama ngu, “Bu̱li̱ mwana mu̱li̱ghaaso wabusaasa bamughilaghemu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ewaa Mukama.”
42002024	Baahaayo dhee kihonguwa ngoku bilaghilo bya Mukama byalaghilagha babyaye kukola. Kihonguwa eki kyabaagha bu̱u̱bbi̱mbo bubili kedha bu̱u̱pi̱i̱so bubili.
42002025	Bwile obu musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Si̱mi̱yooni̱ akaba ali mu Yelusaalemu. Ali muntu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi ahu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga. Akaba alindiliiye kubona ngoku Luhanga akucungula bantu bʼehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aakalagha naye,
42002026	kandi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akaba naamughambiiye ati taali̱ku̱wa, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu alibona Ki̱li̱si̱to wa Mukama.
42002027	Mwoyo oghu aamughambila kughenda mu Numba ya Luhanga. Niibuwo Mali̱ya na Yojeefu̱ baaki̱dhi̱i̱yemu mwana wabo Yesu oghu kukola mukolo ngoku bilaghilo bya Luhanga byalaghilagha.
42002028	Si̱mi̱yooni̱ aakwata mwana oghu, aamulela, aasi̱i̱ma Luhanga ati,
42002029	“Mukama, si̱ye mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe, noobu ndaku̱wa, nkughenda mpempa kusighikila mu ndaghaano yaawe,
42002030	nanga neenini neeboneeye Mu̱ju̱ni̱
42002031	oghu waatu̱mi̱ye mu bantu boona.
42002032	Niiye ali nga kyeleeli̱ kwoleka batali Bayu̱daaya ngoku oli Luhanga. Bantu baawe bʼehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ bakuba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haabuwe.”
42002033	Yojeefu̱ na Mali̱ya baaswekela kimui haabwa bighambo ebi Si̱mi̱yooni̱ aabu̱ghi̱yʼo mwana oghu.
42002034	Si̱mi̱yooni̱ aabasabila ati Luhanga abahe mu̱gi̱sa. Aaghila Mali̱ya ati, “Luhanga aakomi̱yemu mwana waawe oni. Bakani̱ye mu bantu bʼehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ abaku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja bakujunuwa, bhaatu abakubhenga ku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja bakuhwelekeelela. Niiye akuba kaakulolelʼo kaa ntegheka ya Luhanga ya kujuna bantu be, oghu bantu bakani̱ye bakuhakani̱ya,
42002035	niikuwo byeli̱li̱kano byabo bimanuwe. Ti̱ uwe ni̱na wee, mutima ghulikusaalila munda nga muntu batu̱bhi̱ti̱yemu kihiyo.”
42002036	Mu Numba ya Luhanga eghi hakaba halimu dhee mulangi̱ wa bukali̱ li̱i̱na liye Aana, muhala wa Fanu̱weeli̱, wʼomu ntu̱la ya Aseeli̱. Akaba akaakuuye. Anali mwesiki, akasweluwa, bhaatu haanu̱ma ya myaka musanju̱ eba wee aaku̱wa. Aakala ali mu̱kwi̱si̱ya.
42002037	Aakaakulila kimui, aahi̱ki̱ya myaka kinaanaa nʼenaa. Eesalagha kandi aalaalagha mu Numba ya Luhanga, naalami̱ya, naasi̱i̱ba, kandi naasaba Luhanga.
42002038	Aana oghu aasa eebinga Mali̱ya na Yojeefu̱. Aatandika ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga. Aaghambila bantu boona abaabaagha balindiliiye Luhanga kucungula bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu, ebikwetʼo mwana oghu.
42002039	Obu Yojeefu̱ na Mali̱ya baamali̱ye kukola bintu byona ngoku bilaghilo bya Mukama byalaghilagha, baakuuka ewaabo mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya.
42002040	Mwana oghu aakula kusemeeye, aaba na magheji, kandi Luhanga aamuha mi̱gi̱sa.
42002041	Bu̱li̱ mwaka babyaye baa Yesu baaghendagha Yelusaalemu haa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.
42002042	Obu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili, baaghenda naye, ngoku baaghendaghayo bu̱li̱ mwaka.
42002043	Obu ki̱ghenu̱ eki kyahooyʼo, babyaye be baatandika kukuuka ewaabo. Bhaatu bataamanya ngoku Yesu aati̱ghaaye Yelusaalemu.
42002044	Beeli̱li̱kana bati ali mu bantu aba bakwete kughenda nabo. Obu baamali̱ye kilo kyona mbanaghenda batamuboone, baatandika kumubbala mu nganda syabo nʼomu baabhootu̱ baabo.
42002045	Obu bataamuboone, baakuuka Yelusaalemu mbanamubbala.
42002046	Haanu̱ma ya bilo bisatu, baamusanga mu Numba ya Luhanga, asitami̱ye na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, abategheleei̱ye kandi naababu̱u̱li̱ya bi̱bu̱u̱li̱yo.
42002047	Boona abaaghu̱u̱ye ngoku akwete kukuukamu bi̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kusemeeye, baasweka haabwa magheji agha ali nagho.
42002048	Obu babyaye be aba baamuboone baasweka. Niibuwo ni̱na wee aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mwana wanje, waatu̱koli̱ye otiyo nangaaki? Olole si̱ye na so waawe, tuukaaye ntukubbala tutuntuliiye kimui!”
42002049	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mwambbalagha nangaaki? Tamumani̱ye ngoku nkulaghiluwa kuukala mu numba ya Tita eni?”
42002050	Bhaatu bateetegheeleli̱ya ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.
42002051	Niibuwo aaghendi̱ye nabo, baakuukayo mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱. Aakala abadhooteeye. Bhaatu bintu ebi byona, ni̱na wee aakala naanabyeli̱li̱kanʼo mu mutima ghuwe.
42002052	Yesu eeyongela kukula, aaba na magheji, adheedhi̱ye Luhanga hamui na bantu.
42003001	-
42003002	Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ mutabani̱ wa Jakaliya aatunga butumuwa bwa Luhanga obu aabaagha mu elungu hambali aakalagha. Oghu niighuwo ghwali ghuli mwaka ghwʼeku̱mi nʼetaano ghwa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Ti̱bbeli̱yo mukama wa Looma, obu Ponti̱yo Pilaato aabaagha alemi̱ye di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya. Helude alemi̱ye di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Fi̱li̱po waani̱nawee alemi̱ye di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ebili ya Etu̱li̱ya na Tulakoni̱ti̱. Lisaniya alemi̱ye di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ yʼAbbileene. Bwile obu Anansi na Kayaafa niibo baabaagha bakulu baa bahongi̱.
42003003	Yohaana oghu aaghenda mu bi̱twi̱ke byona ebilabhaane na maasi Yolodaani̱, naanalangilila ati bantu beekuukemu kandi babati̱i̱ji̱buwe niikuwo Luhanga abaghanile bibhi byabo.
42003004	Mulangi̱ I̱saaya akahandiika ngu, “Muntu niibuwo aalangilila mu elungu ati, ‘Mweteekani̱li̱je kwisa kwa Mukama; mukole ebi abbali̱ye!
42003005	Mu̱semeli̱ye bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu, kandi muleke bintu byona ebibatwali̱li̱i̱je.
42003006	Ti̱ bantu boona bakubona oghu Luhanga akutuma kubajuna.’ ”
42003007	Biigambi̱ bya bantu byatandika kwisa ewaa Yohaana kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa. Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Enu̱we abali na bubhi nga bwa njoka, mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa kwonkaha kukuleka Luhanga atabafubila?
42003008	Hatiini mukole ebikwoleka ngoku mweku̱u̱ki̱yemu. Muleke kughila muti Luhanga taakubafubila haabwa kuba baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, nanga mbaghambiiye, Luhanga naabbali̱ye akugubha kuuhila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ baasukulu nankabha mu mabaale ghani!
42003009	Ti̱ nʼendindi Luhanga eeteekani̱i̱je kufubiilila kimui abakukolagha bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye. Ti̱ na bu̱li̱ kiti ekitaakwana bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye, bakukijomba na ndyankui, bakikube mu mulilo.”
42003010	Niibuwo bantu aba baabu̱u̱i̱ye Yohaana oghu bati, “Ti̱ tukole ki?”
42003011	Aabakuukamu ati, “Oghu ali na ngoye ebili, aahʼo oghu atali na luwo; nʼoghu ali na byokuliya, aahʼo oghu atali na biyo.”
42003012	Obu bakumaani̱ya baa musolo nabo baasi̱ye kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, ti̱, etu̱we tukole ki?”
42003013	Aabaghila ati, “Mutasasu̱li̱yagha bantu kusaali̱ya ebi mulaghiiwe.”
42003014	Baasilikale nabo baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Ti̱ etu̱we tukole ki?” Aabaghila ati, “Mutahu̱ngaghʼo bantu bintu byabo kedha kubahabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya. Mwehi̱ghu̱waghe musaala ghwanu ghubamali̱ye.”
42003015	Ngoku bantu baali batandi̱ki̱ye kulindilila Ki̱li̱si̱to kwisa, baatandika kweli̱li̱kana bati kedha Yohaana niiye mukama oghu.
42003016	Bhaatu Yohaana aabaghila boona ati, “Si̱ye nkubabati̱jagha na maasi, bhaatu oghu akwisa andabhi̱ye tani̱hi̱ki̱ye na kuba mu̱heeleli̱ya wee, nanga ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱. Eye akubabati̱ja na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi na mulilo.
42003017	Eeteekani̱i̱je kukola bantu ngoku mu̱li̱mi̱ akweteekani̱jagha akwata kitalo kiye kweha mucele ghuwe kuuyamu bisunga. Oghusemeeye aghubiika mu nguli kandi bisunga abikuba mu mulilo ghutaaku̱li̱magha.”
42003018	Nahabweki Yohaana aakoleesi̱ya milingo ekani̱ye kutebeja bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye.
42003019	Aasoghosa Mukama Helude ati, “Waakoli̱ye kubhi kuswela Helu̱di̱ya mukaa wanjoko waawe Fi̱li̱po, kuni wanjoko waawe oghu anaakaaye.” Aamusoghosa dhee haabwa bintu binji bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bikani̱ye ebi aakolagha.
42003020	Niibuwo Helude aakoli̱ye kintu kibhiihiiye kimui kusaali̱ya byona ebi aali naakoli̱ye; aata Yohaana oghu mu nkomo.
42003021	Bhaatu batakakwete Yohaana oghu, aabati̱ja bantu bakani̱ye. Obu baanabati̱i̱ji̱buwagha, Yesu naye aabati̱i̱ji̱buwa. Naanasaba, eghulu lyaghulika,
42003022	Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aamu̱su̱ndʼo nga ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo. Elaka lyalu̱gha mu eghulu, ndighila liti, “Nuuwe Mwana wanje oghu nku̱ndi̱ye, oghu needheedheeu̱we.”
42003023	Obu Yesu aatandi̱ki̱ye kwegheesi̱ya, akaba ali na myaka nga maku̱mi̱ asatu ya bukulu. Bantu baateekelejagha bati ni mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱; Yojeefu̱ mutabani̱ wa Heeli̱,
42003024	Heeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Matati̱, Matati̱ mutabani̱ wa Leevi̱, Leevi̱ mutabani̱ wa Meleeki̱, Meleeki̱ mutabani̱ wa Yanaai, Yanaai mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱,
42003025	Yojeefu̱ mutabani̱ wa Matati̱ya, Matati̱ya mutabani̱ wa Amosi̱, Amosi̱ mutabani̱ wa Nahu̱mu̱, Nahu̱mu̱ mutabani̱ wa Esi̱li̱, Esi̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Nagaai̱,
42003026	Nagaai̱ mutabani̱ wa Mahati̱, Mahati̱ mutabani̱ wa Matati̱ya, Matati̱ya mutabani̱ wa Si̱meeni̱, Si̱meeni̱ mutabani̱ wa Yoseeki̱, Yoseeki̱ mutabani̱ wa Yooda,
42003027	Yooda mutabani̱ wa Yohanaani̱, Yohanaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Leesa, Leesa mutabani̱ wa Jelubbabbeeli̱, Jelubbabbeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Salati̱yeeli̱, Salati̱yeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Neeli̱, Neeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Meleeki̱,
42003028	Meleeki̱ mutabani̱ wa Aadi̱, Aadi̱ mutabani̱ wa Kosaamu, Kosaamu mutabani̱ wa Eli̱madaamu, Eli̱madaamu mutabani̱ wa Eela,
42003029	Eela mutabani̱ wa Yosuha, Yosuha mutabani̱ wa Eli̱yeeja, Eli̱yeeja mutabani̱ wa Yoli̱i̱mu̱, Yoli̱i̱mu̱ mutabani̱ wa Matati̱, Matati̱ mutabani̱ wa Leevi̱,
42003030	Leevi̱ mutabani̱ wa Si̱mi̱yooni̱, Si̱mi̱yooni̱ mutabani̱ wa Yu̱da, Yu̱da mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱, Yojeefu̱ mutabani̱ wa Yonaamu, Yonaamu mutabani̱ wa Eli̱yaki̱i̱mu̱,
42003031	Eli̱yaki̱i̱mu̱ mutabani̱ wa Meleeya, Meleeya mutabani̱ wa Meena, Meena mutabani̱ wa Matata, Matata mutabani̱ wa Nasani̱, Nasani̱ mutabani̱ wa Dhau̱dhi̱,
42003032	Dhau̱dhi̱ mutabani̱ wa Yese, Yese mutabani̱ wa Obbedi̱, Obbedi̱ mutabani̱ wa Bbowaaji̱, Bbowaaji̱ mutabani̱ wa Salamooni̱, Salamooni̱ mutabani̱ wa Naasoni̱,
42003033	Naasoni̱ mutabani̱ wa Aminadaabbu, Aminadaabbu mutabani̱ wa Adi̱mi̱i̱ni̱, Adi̱mi̱i̱ni̱ mutabani̱ wa Alaani̱, Alaani̱ mutabani̱ wa Heji̱looni̱, Heji̱looni̱ mutabani̱ wa Peleeji̱, Peleeji̱ mutabani̱ wa Yu̱da, Yu̱da mutabani̱ wa Yakobbo,
42003034	Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa I̱saka, I̱saka mutabani̱ wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mutabani̱ wa Teela, Teela mutabani̱ wa Nahu̱li̱,
42003035	Nahu̱li̱ mutabani̱ wa Selu̱gi̱, Selu̱gi̱ mutabani̱ wa Leewa, Leewa mutabani̱ wa Peleegi̱, Peleegi̱ mutabani̱ wa Ebbeeli̱, Ebbeeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Seela,
42003036	Seela mutabani̱ wa Kai̱naani̱, Kai̱naani̱ mutabani̱ wa Alifakaada, Alifakaada mutabani̱ wa Seemu, Seemu mutabani̱ wa Nuha, Nuha mutabani̱ wa Lameeki̱,
42003037	Lameeki̱ mutabani̱ wa Mu̱tu̱seela, Mu̱tu̱seela mutabani̱ wa Enoka, Enoka mutabani̱ wa Yaledi̱, Yaledi̱ mutabani̱ wa Malaleeli̱, Malaleeli̱ mutabani̱ wa Kai̱naani̱,
42003038	Kai̱naani̱ mutabani̱ wa Enosi̱, Enosi̱ mutabani̱ wa Seeji̱, Seeji̱ mutabani̱ wa Adamu, Adamu mutabani̱ wa Luhanga.
42004001	Yesu aalu̱gha mu maasi Yolodaani̱, aasuuye maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Ti̱ Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu aamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ya kughenda mu elungu,
42004002	hambali aamali̱ye bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa Si̱taani̱ naanamwohi̱ya. Aamala bilo ebi byona ataakuliya na kantu koona. Obu bilo ebi byahooye njala yaamukwata.
42004003	Niibuwo Si̱taani̱ aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Okaakuba oli Mwana wa Luhanga, olaghile ebaale lini lifooke byokuliya.”
42004004	Yesu aamughila ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Muntu taakubaagha mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwa byokuliya byonkaha.’ ”
42004005	Niibuwo Si̱taani̱ aamutwete hambali hakangami̱ye, du̱mbi̱ aamwoleka makama ghaa munsi ghoona.
42004006	Si̱taani̱ oghu aamughila ati, “Nkukuha bu̱toki̱ na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya makama agha ghoona. Nanga byona bakabimpa kandi nkugubha kubiha weena oghu mbbali̱ye.
42004007	Nahabweki nuwandami̱i̱ye, bintu ebi byona bikuba byawe.”
42004008	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu ‘Olami̱yaghe Mukama Luhanga waawe kandi aaniiye waaheeleli̱yagha enkaha.’ ”
42004009	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱taani̱ aamutwala mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, aamu̱ni̱i̱ni̱ya haa kasui kakangami̱ye kaa Numba ya Luhanga. Aamughila ati, “Okaakuba oli Mwana wa Luhanga, ohalale weesimbe hansi,
42004010	nanga kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, “ ‘Akulaghila baamalai̱ka be bakuloleelele, bakulinde bhyani.
42004011	Bakukwatilile mu ngalo syabo, niikuwo oteehuulila ebaale ohendeka kighele.’ ”
42004012	Bhaatu Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Otalyohi̱ya Mukama Luhanga waawe.’ ”
42004013	Obu Si̱taani̱ oghu aamali̱ye kwohi̱ya Yesu mu milingo eghi yoona, aamu̱lu̱ghʼo, aalinda kutunga bwile bunji bwa ku̱mwohi̱ya.
42004014	Yesu aakuuka Galilaaya aasuuye maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Makulu ghaamalakaka kyalo eki kyona ngoku aliyeyo.
42004015	Eegheeseli̱ya mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya, ti̱ bantu boona baamusinda.
42004016	Yesu aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ hambali aakuliiye. Obu kilo kya Sabhato kyahi̱ki̱ye, aaghenda mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya ngoku aakolagha. Aamilila kusoma kicweka.
42004017	Baamuha kitabo eki mulangi̱ I̱saaya aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye. Aabbu̱u̱ku̱la hambali kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu,
42004018	“Mwoyo wa Mukama ali hamui nanje, nanga ankomi̱ye kulangilila banaku Makulu Ghasemeeye. Antu̱mi̱ye kulangilila abakwatu̱u̱we ngoku bakulekeluwa, kandi abaaghaaye maaso bakubona, kuha bughabe abami̱ghi̱lu̱u̱we,
42004019	kandi kulangilila mwaka ghwa kisa kya Mukama.”
42004020	Du̱mbi̱ aaswi̱ki̱la hambali aasomagha, kitabo eki aakiha mu̱heeleli̱ya wʼomu elami̱li̱yo eli. Aasitama. Ti̱ bantu boona abaabaaghamu baakala bamuloleleeye.
42004021	Aabaghambila ati, “Oghu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mwaghu̱u̱ye ebi bikwete ku̱bu̱ghʼo, ni̱i̱syoni.”
42004022	Boona baatandika kumusinda, ti̱ bintu bisemeeye ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye byasweki̱ya bantu aba, baaghila bati, “Dhaani oghu taaniiye mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱?”
42004023	Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aaghila bantu aba ati, “Majima kuwo mu̱ku̱ntwi̱la lu̱si̱mo luni muti, ‘Mu̱ku̱mu̱ weetambile.’ Kandi mungile muti, ‘Haabwaki byakuswekani̱ya ebi twaghu̱u̱ye nookolela Kapelenau̱mu̱, otaabikoleeye mu tau̱ni̱ yʼewaanu eni?’
42004024	“Mbaghambiiye majima, taaliyo mulangi̱ nʼomui oghu baku̱hu̱ti̱yagha mu kyalo kyʼewaabo.
42004025	Majima, obu Eli̱ya aabaaghʼo, mbu̱la ekamala myaka esatu nʼekicweka etakatooni̱ye, ti̱ njala yaaghwila kimui mu kyalo eki. Kandi bwile obu bakwi̱si̱ya bakani̱ye Banai̱saaleeli̱ baabona-bonagha.
42004026	Bhaatu haabwa kutahi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo Luhanga taatu̱mi̱ye Eli̱ya oghu kukoonela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya nʼomui Munai̱saaleeli̱, kuuyʼo mu̱kwi̱si̱ya omui oghu akaba ali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nankabha naabaagha ali munamahanga wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Jelafaati̱ mu kyalo kya Si̱dooni̱.
42004027	Kandi obu Eli̱sa aabaaghʼo, Banai̱saaleeli̱ bakani̱ye bakaba balwaye ntumbi, bhaatu haabwa kutahi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo taaliyo Munai̱saaleeli̱ nʼomui oghu Eli̱sa aaki̱li̱i̱ye, kuuyʼo akaki̱li̱ya Namani̱ oghu akaba ali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nankabha naabaagha munamahanga alu̱ghi̱ye Si̱li̱ya.”
42004028	Obu bantu abaabaagha mu elami̱li̱yo eli baaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabasoghosa haabwa kutahi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo, ki̱i̱ni̱gha kyabakwatila kimui boona.
42004029	Du̱mbi̱ baamuka, baamughwilikiilila, baamu̱twesi̱ya mu tau̱ni̱ yabo eghi, baamutwala eegu̱u̱li̱ ya keena hambali bakweye tau̱ni̱ eghi bati niikuwo bamukube haa musiya.
42004030	Bhaatu aabakwama haagati, aaghenda.
42004031	Yesu aahona, aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱, mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Obu kilo kya Sabhato kyahi̱ki̱ye, eegheeseli̱ya mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya.
42004032	Baaswekela kimui ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya, nanga eegheesi̱yagha na bu̱toki̱.
42004033	Mu elami̱li̱yo eli, musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete akaba halimu. Aatandika kutakanganilana kimui ati,
42004034	“Hee! Uwe Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, oku̱tu̱bu̱ni̱ya ki? Waasi̱ye ku̱tu̱tu̱wa? Nkumani̱ye, nuuwe Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye wa Luhanga!”
42004035	Bhaatu Yesu aatanuka ki̱li̱mu̱ eki ati, “Holi̱ya, kandi omu̱lu̱ghʼo!” Ti̱ ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyagenga musaasa oghu haagati ya bantu aba, kyamu̱lu̱ghʼo, kitaamukolʼo kantu na kamui kabhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
42004036	Ti̱ boona baasweka, baaghambilana bati, “Kini nkiki? Oni ali na bu̱toki̱ kandi maani̱! Bhaaba akubhingaghʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱, bibalu̱ghʼo!”
42004037	Makulu ghaa Yesu haabwa ebi aakolagha ghaamalakaka di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya yoona.
42004038	Yesu aalu̱gha mu elami̱li̱yo eli, aaghenda mu ka ya Si̱mooni̱. Ni̱na mukaa Si̱mooni̱ oghu akaba alwaliiye kimui mu̱swi̱ja. Beesengeleli̱ya Yesu bati amu̱ki̱li̱ye.
42004039	Niibuwo Yesu aamiliiye hambali ali, aalaghila mu̱swi̱ja oghu kumukila, ghwamukililʼo, du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu aamuka, aatandika kubateekela.
42004040	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, bantu baaleetela Yesu balwaye baabo boona baa ndwala sya milingo yoona. Mulwaye weena oghu aamu̱ku̱maghʼo aakilagha.
42004041	Yesu aabhingʼo dhee bantu bakani̱ye bi̱li̱mu̱. Obu byabaagha mbibalu̱ghʼo byatakanganagha biti, “Nuuwe Mwana wa Luhanga!” Bhaatu aabitanukagha kandi abitanga ku̱bu̱gha, nanga bikaba bimumani̱ye ngoku aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to.
42004042	Obu bwakeeye, aaghenda haakpengbu̱ enkaha. Niibuwo bantu baatandi̱ki̱ye kumubbala. Obu baamuboone, baalengʼo kumutanga bati ataghenda.
42004043	Bhaatu aabaghila ati, “Nkulaghiluwa kughenda dhee mu maatau̱ni̱ ghanji, kulangililayo Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga. Nanga eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naasa munsi.”
42004044	Niibuwo aaghendi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya yoona naalangilila mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya.
42005001	Kilo kimui, Yesu akaba aamiliiye haa ki̱si̱yo kya nanja ya Genesaleeti̱, bantu bakaniiye kimui beekumaani̱li̱ya hambali ali, kandi baami̱ghi̱i̱li̱lana kumwebinga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa kighambo kya Luhanga.
42005002	Aabona maati̱ abili ghali haai-haai na ki̱si̱yo mu maasi, bakama baaghʼo baghalu̱ghi̱yemu, mbanaabi̱ya bu̱ti̱mba bwabo.
42005003	Aani̱i̱na mu bwa Si̱mooni̱. Aamusaba ku̱bwesu̱kani̱ya kabhii ku̱lu̱gha haa ki̱si̱yo. Du̱mbi̱ aabusitamamu, aatandika kwegheesi̱ya bantu aba.
42005004	Obu aamali̱ye kwegheesi̱ya, aaghila Si̱mooni̱ ati, “Osu̱kane bwati̱ hambali maasi ghatobheeye, muteghe bu̱ti̱mba bwanu, mukukwata nsu̱i̱ sikani̱ye.”
42005005	Si̱mooni̱ aamukuukamu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, twatalibaane twabu̱keesi̱ya, ti̱ tatwakwete na kantu. Bhaatu ngoku wangi̱li̱ye oti mbuteghe, nkubutegha.”
42005006	Obu baabu̱teghi̱ye baakwata nsu̱i̱ sikaniiye kimui, ti̱ bu̱ti̱mba bwabo obu bwabbala ku̱twi̱ka.
42005007	Du̱mbi̱ baalomba baanakyabo abaabagha bali mu bwati̱ bunji kwisa kubakoonela. Baasa, baasu̱li̱ya maati̱ agha ghombi, ti̱ ghaabbala kukota eku̱li̱mu̱ mu maasi.
42005008	Obu Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu aaboone atiyo, aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu, aaghila ati, “Mukama ondeke, ndi muntu mu̱si̱i̱si̱!”
42005009	Aabu̱gha atiyo nanga eye na baanakiye boona bakaba baswekeeye kimui haabwa nsu̱i̱ sikaniiye kimui esi baakwete.
42005010	Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo, nabo dhee baaswekela kimui. Yesu aaghila Si̱mooni̱ oghu ati, “Oleke kwobaha! Kutandikila endindi, okuba mukomani̱ wa bantu.”
42005011	Du̱mbi̱ baasu̱kana maati̱ ghaabo agha haa ki̱si̱yo, baati̱gha byabo byona, baamukwama.
42005012	Kilo kimui, obu Yesu aabaagha ali mu tau̱ni̱ emui, aasanga musaasa alwaye ntumbi. Obu musaasa oghu aamuboone, aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa Yesu, aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Mukama! Olakaba obbali̱ye, gutu onki̱li̱ye niikuwo nsemele.”
42005013	Yesu aananula mukono ghuwe aamu̱ku̱mʼo, aamughila ati, “Mbbali̱ye, kila!” Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu ntumbi yaamukililʼo.
42005014	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye musaasa oghu ati, “Otaghambila muntu nʼomui, kuuyʼo oghende ewaa mu̱hongi̱ akulole, kandi ohonge kisembo eki Musa aalaghiiye nga buukai̱so mu bahongi̱ kubooleka ngoku waaki̱li̱ye kandi waasemela.”
42005015	Noo makulu ghaa Yesu gheeyongela kumalakaka hoona-hoona. Biigambi̱ bya bantu byasagha ku̱mu̱tegheeleli̱ya na kubaki̱li̱ya ndwala syabo.
42005016	Bhaatu Yesu aabalu̱ghaghʼo aaghenda mu bi̱i̱kalo hambali muntu atali aasabilayo.
42005017	Kilo kimui obu Yesu eegheesi̱yagha, bamui mu Bafali̱saayo hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo bakaba basitami̱yʼo. Balu̱ghi̱ye mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ yoona ya di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, na ya Bu̱yu̱daaya nʼomu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu. Mukama akaba amuhaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa ku̱ki̱li̱ya balwaye.
42005018	Niibuwo basaasa baasi̱ye baheekeeye haa kalili musaasa aghenagheneeu̱we. Baalengʼo kumutaahi̱ya mu numba ku̱mu̱ki̱dhi̱ya hambali Yesu ali.
42005019	Bhaatu haabwa bantu kukanilamu kimui, tabaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱mu̱ki̱dhi̱yʼo Yesu. Nahabweki baani̱i̱na baatobhola kihulu haa lusui lwa kisiika eki Yesu eegheeseli̱yaghamu, baakoteli̱yamu musaasa oghu bamulangaai̱ye haa kalili ke. Baamu̱ki̱dhi̱ya hambali Yesu ali.
42005020	Obu aaboone ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo, aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Bhootu̱ syanje, bibhi byawe byakughaniiwe.”
42005021	Niibuwo beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo hamui na Bafali̱saayo baatandi̱ki̱ye kweli̱li̱kana bati, “Musaasa oni akugubha ati̱ya ku̱bu̱gha ngʼeki? Oku ni kwambula Luhanga! Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kughanila bibhi kuuyʼo Luhanga enkaha!”
42005022	Yesu aakenga ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana, aabaghila ati, “Mukwete kweli̱li̱kana mutiyo nangaaki?
42005023	Eki̱dhooti̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ni kyahaa? Kughila nti, ‘Bibhi byawe byakughaniiwe,’ kedha kughila nti ‘Oomuke kandi olubhatange’?
42005024	Bhaatu nkubbala mumanye ngoku, Mwana wa Muntu, ali na bu̱toki̱ munsi muni kughanila bantu bibhi.” Aaghila mulwaye oghu ati, “Nkulaghiiye, oomuke, okome kalili kaawe, weeghendele ewaawe!”
42005025	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aamuka, aakoma kalili ke, eeghendela naasinda Luhanga, boona banamuloleleeye.
42005026	Boona baaswekela kimui kandi baasinda Luhanga bati, “Obwalo, twaboone kyakuswekani̱ya kyamaani̱!”
42005027	Haanu̱ma yʼeki, Yesu aatuwa, aabona mukumaani̱ya wa musolo li̱i̱na liye Leevi̱, asitami̱ye mu ekumaani̱li̱yo liye. Aamughila ati, “Onkwame.”
42005028	Du̱mbi̱ Leevi̱ aamuka, aati̱gha bintu biye byona, aamukwama.
42005029	Leevi̱ oghu aakolela Yesu ki̱ghenu̱ kyamaani̱ mu numba yee. Haa ki̱ghenu̱ eki hakaba haliyo bakumaani̱ya baa musolo bakani̱ye na bantu banji mbaliya hamui na Yesu.
42005030	Niibuwo Bafali̱saayo hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo abaabaagha bali Bafali̱saayo baatandi̱ki̱ye kutonganilana kimui na beeghesebuwa baa Yesu mbaghila bati, “Mukuliyagha na bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱ nangaaki?”
42005031	Obu Yesu aaki̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Abatalwaye tabakubbalagha mutambi̱li̱ bbaa, kuuyʼo abalwaye.
42005032	Tanaasi̱ye haabwa bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bhaatu haabwa basi̱i̱si̱ kwekuukamu.”
42005033	Bamui mu bantu aba baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati, “Beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana hamui na beeghesebuwa baa Bafali̱saayo bakusabagha nsaala kandi basi̱i̱ba, bhaatu baawe bakuliyagha kandi banuwa, nangaaki?”
42005034	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye okugubha oti̱ya kuleka baghenu̱ abali mu bu̱ghenu̱ bwa kuswela mbasi̱i̱ba kuni oghu akuswela anali nabo?
42005035	Noo bwile bu̱li̱hi̱ka obu balibaayamu oghu akuswela oghu, obu niibuwo bali̱si̱i̱ba.”
42005036	Niibuwo Yesu aabatwi̱li̱i̱ye lu̱si̱mo ati, “Taaliyo oghu akubhandikagha ki̱twi̱ke kya lughoye luhyaka haa lughoye lukulu. Naanakoli̱ye kuwo, ki̱twi̱ke kihyaka eki kikubhula lukulu olu kilutemule, kandi ki̱twi̱ke kihyaka eki takikususaana na lughoye lukulu olu.
42005037	Taaliyo nʼomui oghu akutaagha vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka mu mpu sikulu, naanakoli̱ye atiyo, vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka ekwati̱ya mpu sikulu esi eseeseke, kandi mpu esi sibhiiye.
42005038	Bhaatu vi̱i̱ni̱ mpyaka babhonganuuwe kughita mu mpu sihyaka.
42005039	Kandi taaliyo nʼomui haanu̱ma ya kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ nkulu, akubbalagha kunuwa mpyaka, akughilagha ati, ‘Nkulu esaai̱ye.’ ”
42006001	Kilo kya Sabhato kimui, Yesu aasaalilagha mu misili ya ngano. Beeghesebuwa be baakala kukobha mituwe ya ngano eghi mbanaghyesi̱ngeelela mu ngalo, mbanaghiliya.
42006002	Niibuwo bamui mu Bafali̱saayo baabu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Kusighikila mu bilaghilo, mukwete kukola ekitahi̱ki̱ye kukoluwa haa kilo kya Sabhato nangaaki?”
42006003	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye tamukasomagha ebi Dhau̱dhi̱ aakoli̱ye obu eye naaba abaabaagha naye njala yaabaagha ebakwete?
42006004	Akataaha mu Numba ya Luhanga, aaliya migaati̱ eghi bahongeeye Luhanga. Kandi aaghiha nʼabaabaagha naye. Migaati̱ eghi tayaalibuwagha bantu banji kuuyʼo bahongi̱ bonkaha.”
42006005	Niibuwo aamaliliiye naabaghila ati, “Nahabweki Mwana wa Muntu niiye Mukama wa kilo kya Sabhato.”
42006006	Kilo kya Sabhato kinji, Yesu aaghenda mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya, eegheeseli̱yamu. Musaasa anangi̱ye mukono ghwabuliyo akaba alimu.
42006007	Beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo baakala baloleleeye Yesu, alakaba naamu̱ki̱li̱ya kilo kya Sabhato niikuwo bamunyegheelele bati aakoli̱ye mulimo kilo kya Sabhato.
42006008	Bhaatu Yesu aamanya ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana, du̱mbi̱ aaghila musaasa anangi̱ye mukono oghu ati, “Wiise hani.” Musaasa oghu aamuka, aaghenda aamilila hambali Yesu ali.
42006009	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Nkubbala kubabu̱u̱li̱ya, kusighikila mu bilaghilo, ki̱hi̱ki̱ye haa kilo kya Sabhato kukola bisemeeye kedha bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye; ku̱ki̱li̱ya bwomi̱i̱li̱, kedha ku̱bu̱hwelekeeleli̱ya?”
42006010	Aababu̱ngi̱li̱yamu maaso boona, du̱mbi̱ aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Nanula mukono ghwawe.” Aaghunanula, ti̱ ghwakililʼo.
42006011	Du̱mbi̱ beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo aba baasaalililuwa kimui, baatandika kuhanuula eki balakola Yesu.
42006012	Bwile obu Yesu aaghenda haa mwena kusaba; ti̱ akeeseli̱yayo bwile naanasaba Luhanga.
42006013	Obu bwakeeye, aabilikila beeghesebuwa be boona, aakomamu eku̱mi̱ na babili, aba aaghi̱li̱yemu bakwenda be.
42006014	Aba aakomi̱yemu niibo bani: Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalu̱ki̱ye li̱i̱na Peetelo na waani̱nawee Andeleya, Yakobbo, Yohaana, Fi̱li̱po, Batu̱lu̱maayo,
42006015	Matayo, Tomasi, Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa Alifaayo, Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalwanililagha ehanga liye,
42006016	Yu̱da mutabani̱ wa Yakobbo, na Yu̱da Esikalyota oghu akamu̱ghobeli̱ya.
42006017	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kukoma bakwenda be aba, aakota nabo ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, baaki̱dha mu nti̱na ya ghuwo hambali henganiililaane. Kiigambi̱ kya beeghesebuwa be bakaba baliyo na bantu bakaniiye kimui, balu̱ghi̱ye mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ ya di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya nʼomu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, na banji balu̱ghi̱ye haseli̱ye: Ti̱lo na Si̱dooni̱, haa-haai na nanja ya Medi̱teleni̱yani̱.
42006018	Baasa ku̱mu̱tegheeleli̱ya ngoku akwete kwegheesi̱ya. Abaabaagha balwaye baabbalagha bati abaki̱li̱ye. Aba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete aababhingaghʼo biyo.
42006019	Bantu boona baabbalagha ku̱mu̱ku̱mʼo, nanga maani̱ aghaamu̱lu̱ghaghamu ghaabaki̱li̱ya boona.
42006020	Niibuwo Yesu aakaaye aaloleleeye beeghesebuwa be, aabaghila ati, “Muli na mu̱gi̱sa enu̱we banaku mu mwoyo, nanga mukuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
42006021	Muli na mu̱gi̱sa enu̱we aba njala ekwete, nanga muliikuta. Muli na mu̱gi̱sa enu̱we abakwete kulila endindi, nanga muliseka.
42006022	Muli na mu̱gi̱sa bantu mbaaboohi̱ye, bababhenga, babawaawaani̱ya, kandi baababu̱ghʼo kubhi haabwa Mwana wa Muntu!
42006023	“Nanga ebi niibiyo baataata baabo baakoli̱yʼo balangi̱ bʼambele. Nahabweki bantu mbaabatwali̱kani̱i̱ye kubhi batiyo mudheedheluwe kimui, nanga Luhanga aliha enu̱we mpeela ekani̱ye mu eghulu.
42006024	“Ngamulikibona enu̱we baguudha, nanga kudheedhuwa kwanu mukamala kukutunga.
42006025	Ngamulikibona enu̱we abaaku̱ti̱ye endindi, nanga mulikwatuwa njala. Ngamulikibona enu̱we abakwete kuseka endindi, nanga mulituntula kandi mulile.
42006026	Ngamulikibona bantu boona mbaasi̱ndi̱ye enu̱we, nanga niikuwo baataata baabo baasindagha batiyo balangi̱ baa bisubha.”
42006027	“Bhaatu nkughambila enu̱we abantegheleei̱ye nti: Mukundaghe ngi̱ghu̱ syanu, kandi mukolaghe kusemeeye ababoohi̱ye.
42006028	Abalabakiinagha, mubasabilaghe mu̱gi̱sa. Abalabambulagha, mubasabilaghe kusemeeye.
42006029	Muntu naakutali̱i̱ye haa etama, omugaali̱li̱ye na li̱li̱, kandi muntu naatwete kooti̱ yaawe, omuhe nʼesaati̱.
42006030	Muntu naakusabi̱ye kantu omuhaaghe ko. Ti̱ muntu naatwete kintu kyawe, otamuhambi̱li̱jagha ku̱ki̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya.
42006031	Ngoku mwangubbali̱ye baanakyanu kubatwalikani̱ya, aaniikuwo naanu mwabatwalikani̱yagha.
42006032	“Nimwaku̱ndi̱ye ababaku̱ndi̱ye bonkaha, mukughasiluwa ki? Nanga na basi̱i̱si̱ bakukundagha ababaku̱ndi̱ye.
42006033	Kaakuba mutwalikani̱ya kusemeeye abakubatwalikani̱ya kusemeeye, mukughasiluwa ki? Na basi̱i̱si̱ niikuwo bakukolagha batiyo dhee.
42006034	Kandi nimwekopeei̱ye aba mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti bakubasasula, buuye mbiki bikuleka Luhanga abasi̱i̱me? Na basi̱i̱si̱ dhee bakwekopi̱yagha aba bakweli̱li̱kana bati bakubasasula.
42006035	Bhaatu enu̱we mukundaghe ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kandi mubakolaghe kusemeeye, mwekopaghe mutaakunihila kubasasula; Luhanga alibaha musaala ghwamaani̱, kandi mukuba nimwoleka ngoku muli baana baa Luhanga wa Eghulu Munu. Nanga eye akughililagha ngughuma abʼengeso mbhi nʼabataaku̱si̱i̱magha.
42006036	Mughililaghe baanakyanu ngughuma ngoku Eseenu̱we Luhanga akubaghililagha ngughuma.”
42006037	“Mutatwi̱lagha baanakyanu misango, niikuwo naanu Luhanga atabatwi̱laghayo. Mutasoghosagha baanakyanu, niikuwo naanu Luhanga atabasoghosa. Mughanilaghe, naanu mulighaniluwa.
42006038	Luhanga akubaha naaboone ngoku mukuha banakyanu. Mulatungagha bikaniiye kimui ngoku mu̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱ mulungi aku̱pi̱i̱magha kusemeeye, aasu̱li̱li̱ya kimui eki aku̱ghu̱li̱ya makiha oghu akughula; aki̱ki̱bha, aki̱dhi̱ngi̱ya ti̱ ki̱seesekeli̱ya. Ti̱ hambali mukwengaani̱ya kutwalikani̱ya baanakyanu, niikuwo naanu balabatwalikani̱yagha.”
42006039	Yesu aatodha aabaha lu̱si̱mo ati, “Buuye muntu oghu maaso ghaaghaaye akugubha kuhikila muughali̱ wa maaso muunakiye? Bombi tabakwegenga mu ki̱i̱na?
42006040	Mweghesebuwa taasaai̱ye mwegheesi̱ya wee, bhaatu neeghi̱ye bhyani akukola ngʼebi mwegheesi̱ya wee akukolagha.
42006041	Nkiki kyanguleka ookala oboone kabubi kati̱i̱ akali mu li̱i̱so lya muunakyawe, onasaaghu̱u̱we kubona lubbaau luunamu̱li̱to oluli mu li̱i̱so lyawe?
42006042	Buuye okugubha kughila oti̱ya muunakyawe oti, ‘Wai̱, oleke nkuuye kabubi kati̱i̱ akali mu li̱i̱so lyawe,’ kuni onasaaghu̱u̱we kuuya lubbaau luunamu̱li̱to oluli mu li̱i̱so lyawe. Ngobi̱ya uwe, odu̱bhe ooye lubbaau luunamu̱li̱to oluli mu li̱i̱so lyawe, obone bbeni̱-bbeni̱ niikuwo ogubhe kuuya kabubi akali mu li̱i̱so lya muunakyawe.”
42006043	-
42006044	“Nanga bu̱li̱ kiti okukimaniiliagha haa bi̱ghu̱ma byakiyo. Taaliyo oghu angugubha kukobha miyembe haa mpoku̱ kedha mapeela haa kiibbabbangu̱. Taaliyo kiti kisemeeye ekikwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, kedha kiti ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ekikwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma bisemeeye.
42006045	Nanga muntu naabaaye ali na mutima ghusemeeye, akukola kandi abu̱ghe bintu bisemeeye. Bhaatu muntu naabaaye mubhi akukola kandi abu̱ghe bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, nanga muntu aku̱bu̱ghagha ebimuli haa mutima.”
42006046	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Mukungilagha muti, ‘Mukama wanje, Mukama wanje,’ kuni mutaakukola ebi nkubaghambilagha nangaaki?
42006047	Oleke mbooleke kyakulolelo kya muntu weena oghu akunjisaghʼo, aaghu̱wa bighambo byanje kandi abikola.
42006048	Ali nga musaasa oghu aakwelagha numba yee; aalima musingi ghutobheeye, aahi̱ka hambali etaka lyomiiye, aakwelʼo numba yee eghi. Obu maasi ghaasuuye ghaasenda, mighina yaatandika kusamba numba eghi, bhaatu tayaasobooye ku̱ghi̱dhi̱nga-dhi̱ngi̱ya, nanga akaba aghikweye kusemeeye.
42006049	Bhaatu oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha bighambo byanje kandi abhenga kukola ebi bilaghiiye, ali nga musaasa oghu akakwela numba yee hʼetaka magi̱la musingi. Obu maasi ghaasuuye ghaasenda, mighina yaatandika kusamba numba eghi, du̱mbi̱ yeegenga, kandi yaabhiihila kimui!”
42007001	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kughambila bantu aba bighambo ebi byona, aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱.
42007002	Hakaba aliyo musaasa omui oghu akaba atali Mu̱yu̱daaya, ali mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ baa Looma, kandi akaba ali na mu̱heeleli̱ya wee amukundiiye kimui. Ti̱ mu̱koli̱ wee oghu aalwala haai ku̱ku̱wa.
42007003	Obu mukulu wa baasilikale oghu aaghu̱u̱yʼo Yesu, aamutumila bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya naamusaba kwisa ewe ku̱mu̱ki̱li̱li̱ya mu̱heeleli̱ya wee oghu.
42007004	Baaghenda baaki̱dha hambali Yesu ali, baamwesengeleli̱ya bati, “Musaasa oghu abhonganuuwe omukoonele,
42007005	nanga atu̱ku̱ndi̱ye, kandi akatukwelela elami̱li̱yo lyatu.”
42007006	Niibuwo Yesu aaghendi̱ye nabo. Bhaatu obu aabaagha ali haai ku̱ki̱dha haa ka haala, mukulu wa baasilikale oghu aatuma baabhootu̱ siye kughambila Yesu bati, “Mukama wanje oteelu̱hi̱li̱ya busa kwisa ewanje, nanga tanibhonganuuwe uwe kwisa ewanje bbaa.
42007007	Kandi tani̱hi̱ki̱ye kwisa hambali oli nanga oli na bu̱toki̱ busaalukaane. Nahabweki obu̱ghe kwonkaha, mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje akukila.
42007008	Nanga nanje ndi na bantu abalemi̱ye si̱ye abakundaghilagha bya kukola. Nanje nʼaba na baasilikale aba si̱ye ndemi̱ye aba nkulaghilagha bya kukola. Oghu nkughilagha nti, ‘Ghenda,’ akughendagha; oghu nkaakughilagha nti, ‘Wiise,’ akwisagha. Nkaakulaghilagha mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje nti, ‘Kola kini,’ akikola.”
42007009	Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye ebi, aasweka kandi eegaali̱ya aaghila kiigambi̱ kya bantu abaali bamukweme aba ati, “Mbaghambiiye, tankabonagha muntu oghu ali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kutiyo nankabha mu Banai̱saaleeli̱!”
42007010	Ti̱ obu aba mukulu wa baasilikale oghu aali atu̱mi̱ye aba baaku̱u̱ki̱yeyo, baasanga mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aki̱li̱ye.
42007011	Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee Yesu aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ baakughilaghamu Nai̱ni̱, beeghesebuwa be na kiigambi̱ kya bantu baaghenda naye.
42007012	Makaki̱dha ati haai-haai na tau̱ni̱ eghi, aasanga bantu baheeki̱ye mu̱ku̱, mbaghenda kujiika. Oghu akaba aku̱u̱ye akaba ali mutabani̱ wa mu̱kwi̱si̱ya kandi aaniiye ali naye enkaha. Kiigambi̱ kya bantu badongi̱ye na mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu.
42007013	Obu Mukama Yesu aaboone mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu, aamughilila kisa, aamughila ati, “Oleke kulila.”
42007014	Niibuwo aaghendi̱ye aaku̱ma haa sandu̱u̱ku̱ eghi baheekeeyemu mu̱ku̱ oghu, kwemi̱li̱li̱ya abaghu̱heeki̱ye; beemilila. Aaghila ati, “Mutabhana oomuke!”
42007015	Du̱mbi̱ oghu akaba aku̱u̱ye oghu aamuka kandi aatandika ku̱bu̱gha. Yesu aaghila ni̱na mutabhana oghu ati, “Mutabani̱ waawe ngughu!”
42007016	Ti̱ bantu boona abaabaaghʼo boobaha kandi baasinda Luhanga bati, “Mulangi̱ wamaani̱ aatubungiiye! Luhanga aasi̱ye kujuna etu̱we bantu be.”
42007017	Makulu agha ghaamalakaka di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya yoona na maatau̱ni̱ ghanji aghaghyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye.
42007018	Obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabaagha mu nkomo, beeghesebuwa be baamughambila ebi Yesu akwete kukola byona.
42007019	Aabilikila babili mu beeghesebuwa be aba, aabatuma ewaa Mukama Yesu ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye nuuwe oghu baaghi̱li̱ye bati okwisa, kedha tulindilile onji?”
42007020	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye hambali Yesu ali baamughila bati, “Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya tuti, ‘Buuye nuuwe oghu baaghi̱li̱ye bati okwisa, kedha tulindilile onji?’ ”
42007021	Bwile obu Yesu aaki̱li̱ya bantu bakani̱ye, aba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete nʼaba maaso ghaaghaaye.
42007022	Aaghila aba Yohaana aatu̱mi̱ye ati, “Mughende mughambile Yohaana ebi mwaghu̱u̱ye kandi ebi mwaboone, abaaghaaye maaso niibuwo baabona, abalema niibuwo baalubhatanga, abalwaye ntumbi niibuwo baakila kandi baasemela, abaaghaaye matui niibuwo baaghu̱wa, abaku̱u̱ye niibuwo baahu̱mbu̱u̱ka, kandi Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga niibuwo baaghalangilila banaku.
42007023	Ti̱ ali na mu̱gi̱sa oghu ataakuleka ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja.”
42007024	Obu aba Yohaana aatu̱mi̱ye aba baaghendi̱ye, Yesu aatandika kughambila biigambi̱ bya bantu abaabaaghʼo, ebikwetʼo Yohaana oghu. Aaghila ati, “Obu mwaghendagha mu elungu kulola Yohaana, mukaba mumani̱ye muti mukusangayo muntu wa mulingo ki? Mweli̱li̱kanagha kusangayo muntu mwoba kandi oghu atagumiiye haa eki acuuyemu?
42007025	Mwaghendagha kulola muntu oghu alu̱wete kusemeeye? Bbaa, nanga abaku̱lu̱walagha ngoye sisemeleeye kimui bakuukalagha mbeeghonja mu bikaali bya bakama.
42007026	Ti̱ buuye mwaghendagha kulola ani̱? Mulangi̱? Ee, mbaghambiiye majima, oghu asaai̱ye mulangi̱.
42007027	Nanga Yohaana oghu niiye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we byabu̱ghi̱yʼo biti, ‘Ndituma mutumuwa wanje ahikile akuteekani̱li̱ye kihanda otakaasi̱ye.’
42007028	Mbaghambiiye, taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu abyahuwe mukali̱, oghu aabaayʼo oghu asaai̱ye Yohaana. Bhaatu nankabha mwana mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, aliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kusaali̱ya kya Yohaana.”
42007029	(Bantu bakaniiye kimui, nankabha bakumaani̱ya baa musolo, aba Yohaana aali naabati̱i̱je, obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baaghila bati ntegheka ya Luhanga ehi̱ki̱ye.
42007030	Bhaatu Bafali̱saayo na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baabhenga ntegheka ya Luhanga eghi, kandi baabhenga Yohaana kubabati̱ja.)
42007031	“Bantu baa mujo ghuni ndabasusaani̱ya na ki?
42007032	Bali nga baana basitami̱ye mu katale, kandi bakubilikila baanakyabo bati, “ ‘Twabalimbiiye bilimbo bya bu̱ghenu̱, tamwabi̱ni̱ye! Twabalimbila bya lu̱ku̱, mutaalila.’
42007033	Nanga obu mwaboone Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ naasi̱i̱ba kandi ataakunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱, mwaghila muti, ‘Ki̱li̱mu̱ kimuli haa mutuwe.’
42007034	Mwana wa Muntu obu akuliyagha kandi anuwa mukughilagha muti, ‘Mulole ali na mululu, ni mutami̱i̱li̱, kandi bhootu̱ wa bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱!’
42007035	Bhaatu magheji ghaa Luhanga ghakweyolekelagha mu bikoluwa byagho.”
42007036	Kilo kimui Mufali̱saayo omui li̱i̱na liye Si̱mooni̱, aabilikila Yesu ewe. Yesu aasi̱i̱ma aaghendayo, aasitama kuliya.
42007037	Mukali̱ omui mu̱si̱i̱si̱ akaba ali mu tau̱ni̱ eghi, obu aaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Yesu ali mu ka ya Mufali̱saayo oghu, aasa na cu̱pa esemeeye, elimu bigita bisasi̱ye.
42007038	Aasila enu̱ma sya Yesu aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu, aatandika kulila. Mali̱gha ghe ghaagbondi̱ya Yesu mu maghulu. Mukali̱ oghu aakala kumulaghali̱yagho nʼesoke liye. Aakala anamukwete mu maghulu naanamusiighamu bigita ebi.
42007039	Obu Mufali̱saayo oghu akaba abilikiiye Yesu, aaboone atiyo, eeli̱li̱kana ati, “Nguli Yesu oni aabaagha mulangi̱ kwonini, angumani̱ye ngoku mukali̱ oghu ali mu̱si̱i̱si̱, kandi tangu̱mu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye ku̱mu̱ku̱mʼo bbaa!”
42007040	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye Mufali̱saayo oghu ati, “Si̱mooni̱, ndi nʼeki nkubbala ku̱bu̱gha naawe.” Si̱mooni̱ aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, okingambile!”
42007041	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aaghila ati, “Musaasa omui akeekopi̱ya basaasa babili sente. Aaha omui mi̱li̱yooni̱ eku̱mi̱, onji mu̱li̱yooni̱ ghumui.
42007042	Obu bombi basaaghu̱u̱we kumusasula aabaghanila. Ni ani̱ haa babili aba oghu okweli̱li̱kana akamukunda kusaali̱ya muunakiye?”
42007043	Si̱mooni̱ aakuukamu ati, “Nku̱gu̱mi̱ya ni oghu aaghaniiye sikani̱ye.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Waahi̱ki̱i̱ye.”
42007044	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu eegaali̱ya aalola mukali̱ oghu. Aaghila Si̱mooni̱ ati, “Eki mukali̱ oni aakoli̱ye okyeli̱li̱kanʼo! Ku̱lu̱gha naatahi̱ye mwawe muni, tawantwalikani̱i̱ye kwonini ngoku batwalikani̱ya baghenu̱, bhaatu eye anakuntwalikani̱ya kusemeeye.
42007045	Uwe tawahi̱ki̱ye kunguwa mu ki̱ku̱bha, noo eye anankwete mu maghulu ku̱lu̱gha naataahi̱ye muni.
42007046	Tawampaaye bigita bya kwesiigha, bhaatu eye ansi̱i̱ghi̱ye bigita bisasi̱ye mu maghulu.
42007047	Nahabweki nkughambiiye, bibhi biye bikani̱ye bitiyo byamughaniiwe, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye anjoleki̱ye kukunda kukani̱ye kutiyo. Bhaatu oghu aghaniiwe bikee akwolekagha kukunda kukee.”
42007048	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye mukali̱ oghu ati, “Naakughaniiye bibhi byawe.”
42007049	Bantu abaaliyagha beebu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Musaasa oni dhaani akwete kweli̱li̱kana ati niiye ani̱ kughanila bantu bibhi?”
42007050	Yesu aaghila mukali̱ oghu ati, “Ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ju̱ni̱ye; oghende mpempa.”
42008001	Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, Yesu aasaalila mu maatau̱ni̱ nʼomu mi̱bhi̱li̱, naalangilila Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga. Aaghenda na beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili,
42008002	hamui na bakali̱ aba aabhi̱ngi̱yʼo bi̱li̱mu̱ nʼaba aaki̱li̱i̱ye ndwala. Bakali̱ aba ni: Mali̱ya wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Mangadhalina oghu aabhi̱ngi̱yʼo bi̱li̱mu̱ musanju̱,
42008003	na Yowana mukaa Ku̱u̱ja. Ku̱u̱ja oghu aakolagha mulimo ghwa kuloleelela bintu bya Mukama Helude. Hakaba halimu Susaana, na bakali̱ banji bakani̱ye. Bakali̱ aba baahaaghayo bimui hʼetungo lyabo kukoonela Yesu naaba aakalagha nabo.
42008004	Kilo kimui biigambi̱ bya bantu byakala mbinaasa mbi̱lu̱gha mu maatau̱ni̱ mbinagumbaana hambali ali. Obu baagumbaane aabatwi̱la lu̱si̱mo luni ati,
42008005	“Mu̱li̱mi̱ akaghenda kumisa nsigho yee. Obu aanamisagha, bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala mu kihandakati, bantu baabukpeetaaga, noni̱ syasa syabuliya.
42008006	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala mu mabaale. Obu ndimo eghi yaatooye, yaahotoka haabwa kubuluwa maasi mu mabaale omu.
42008007	Bumui haa nsigho bwalaghala mu mahuwa, ghaakula, ghaasoosookeli̱ya ndimo eghi.
42008008	Bumui haa nsigho yee bwalaghala hʼetaka lisemeeye, bwakula, bwana. Bu̱li̱ kasigho kaalu̱ghamu busigho bukaniiye kimui milundi ki̱ku̱mi̱.” Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Oghu ali na matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, aaghu̱we.”
42008009	Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya makulu ghaa lu̱si̱mo olu,
42008010	aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we mukaheebuwa kumanya nsi̱ta sya bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, bhaatu banji baku̱si̱i̱ghwi̱lagha mu nsi̱mo, niikuwo balole batabona, baaghu̱we bateetegheeleli̱ya.
42008011	“Hatiini makulu ghaa lu̱si̱mo olu ngaaghaani: Mu̱mi̱si̱ naaghambi̱ye oghu, eki akumisagha ni kighambo kya Luhanga.
42008012	Nsigho eghi ekalaghala hʼetaka lyʼomu kihandakati, ni bantu abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga, du̱mbi̱ Si̱taani̱ aasa abaayamu kiyo niikuwo batahi̱ki̱li̱ja kandi bajunuwa.
42008013	Nsigho eghi ekalaghala hʼetaka lya mabaale, ni bantu abaku̱du̱bhagha badheedhuwa mbaaghu̱wa kighambo kya Luhanga, bhaatu ngoku bilimuwa bitaakugubha kulebba bitali na mi̱li̱ etaahi̱ye bhyani mu etaka, niikiyo kimui na bantu aba. Baku̱du̱bhagha bahi̱ki̱li̱ja haabwa bwile bukee. Bhaatu bwile bwa kulengeesebuwa haabwa kighambo kya Luhanga mbwahi̱ka du̱mbi̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo kubula.
42008014	Kandi nsigho eghi ekamisuwa mu mahuwa, ni bantu abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga, bhaatu kwelalikiilila bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa nsi eni, kutwali̱li̱ji̱bu̱wa buguudha, na kweghomba bintu binji bileka kighambo kya Luhanga kitabalu̱ghi̱lamu mughaso.
42008015	Na nsigho eghi ekalaghala hʼetaka lisemeeye, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya bantu abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga, bakikwata na mutima ghumui, baba beesighibuwa kandi kibalu̱ghi̱lamu mughaso ghukani̱ye haabwa ku̱gu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo.”
42008016	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akubhaki̱yagha kaatadhooba, akaswi̱ki̱la na kighegha kedha akata e bukungwisi. Bhaatu akukataagha haa meeja niikuwo kabbeneli̱ye abakutaaha mu numba omu.
42008017	Nanga taaliyo kintu kyona eki bantu balikolelela mu ki̱bi̱so ekitalimanuwa, kedha eki bali̱bi̱sa-bi̱sa ekitalimanuwa.
42008018	Mweghendeseleje ku̱tegheeleli̱ya, nanga oghu ali na kantu, niiye akwongeluwʼo, bhaatu oghu atali na kantu, nʼaka akweli̱li̱kana ati ali nako, kakumuuhibuwʼo.”
42008019	Ni̱na wee, na baana baani̱na Yesu baasa hambali ali kumulola, bhaatu bataagubha ku̱mu̱hi̱ka haa-haai haabwa bantu kukanila kimui.
42008020	Niibuwo muntu omui aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Njoko waawe na baana banjoko waawe baamiliiye enja bakukubbala.”
