42008021	Yesu aakuukamu ati, “Maaha kandi baana baamaaha ni abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga kandi bakola ebi kilaghiiye.”
42008022	Kilo kimui Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Muleke tubhasuke luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja.” Baani̱i̱na bwati̱ baaghenda.
42008023	Mbanaghenda, aaghwesaghila. Kyegha kyasa haa nanja, haai ku̱li̱i̱ka bwati̱ obu mu maasi.
42008024	Niibuwo baaghendi̱ye baamu̱su̱su̱mu̱la. Baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, mwegheesi̱ya, twatwi̱ka!” Yesu aamuka, aatanuka kyegha eki na mighina eghi yaasambagha bwati̱ obu byaholi̱ya, nanja yaateekanilana kimui.
42008025	Niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Tamu̱neesi̱ghi̱ye?” Boobaha kandi baasweka. Baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Oni ni muntu wa mulingo ki? Akulaghilagha kyegha na nanja, ti̱ bi̱mu̱u̱ghu̱wa!”
42008026	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baabhasuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja ku̱lu̱gha Galilaaya, baaki̱dha mu kyalo kya Bagadala.
42008027	Makalu̱gha ati mu bwati̱, musaasa wʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete, aamwisʼo. Musaasa oghu akaba naamali̱ye bwile bukani̱ye ataaku̱lu̱wala, kandi taalalagha mu numba bbaa, kuuyʼo mu ki̱i̱kalo eki baajiikaghamu bantu.
42008028	Obu aaboone Yesu, aatakangana, aateeli̱ya mu maghulu ghaa Yesu, aabu̱gha nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Yesu, Mwana wa Luhanga wa Bu̱toki̱ Bwona, oku̱mbu̱ni̱ya ki? Nkwesengeleei̱ye, gutu otambona-boni̱ya!”
42008029	Aabu̱gha atiyo nanga Yesu akaba naaghambiiye ki̱li̱mu̱ eki ati ki̱mu̱lu̱ghʼo. (Kyakabaagha kimukwete, baakala bamu̱li̱ndi̱ye kandi bamu̱boheei̱ye njeghele na mpi̱ngo. Bhaatu aasi̱tu̱wagha, kimukuba mu elungu.)
42008030	Niibuwo Yesu aamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Li̱i̱na lyawe nuuwe ani̱?” Aakuukamu ati, “Kiigambi̱,” nanga bi̱li̱mu̱ bikani̱ye bikaba bimuliyʼo.
42008031	Bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi byesengeleli̱ya Yesu biti, “Gutu otatukuba mu ki̱i̱na kitobheleeye kimui!”
42008032	Haa mwena haai-haai, mpunu sikani̱ye sikaba siliyo nsiliya. Bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi byesengeleli̱ya Yesu biti abi̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye bighende mu mpunu esi haaliisiyo byataahamu. Aabi̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya.
42008033	Obu bi̱li̱mu̱ ebi byalu̱ghi̱yʼo musaasa oghu, byaghenda byataaha mu mpunu esi. Syona syali̱ghi̱ti̱la kimui, syakota mu nanja, syatwi̱ki̱lamu.
42008034	Bali̱i̱si̱ya baa mpunu esi obu baaboone ebyabaayʼo, baali̱gi̱ta baaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ na mu mi̱bhi̱li̱, mbanaghambila bantu makulu agha.
42008035	Bantu aba baasa kulola ekyabaayʼo eki, obu baaki̱dhi̱ye hambali Yesu ali. Baasanga musaasa oghu bi̱li̱mu̱ byalu̱ghi̱yʼo, asitami̱ye mu maghulu ghaa Yesu, alu̱wete kandi ateekaane, boona boobaha.
42008036	Abaaboone ebyabaayʼo musaasa oghu na mpunu esi, baaghambila abaasi̱yʼo aba ngoku musaasa oghu bi̱li̱mu̱ byabaaghʼo aaki̱li̱ye.
42008037	Obu bantu bʼomu kyalo kya Bagadala aba baaboone ekyabaayʼo eki, beesengeleli̱ya Yesu bati alu̱ghe mu kyalo kyabo eki. Niibuwo aani̱i̱ni̱ye bwati̱ kukuuka luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa nanja.
42008038	Musaasa oghu bi̱li̱mu̱ byalu̱ghi̱yʼo oghu aamwesengeleli̱ya ati, “Onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye ngende niikalaghe naawe.” Bhaatu Yesu aamughila ati,
42008039	“Okuuke ewaanu, oghambile bantu bʼewaanu ebi Luhanga aakukoleeye.” Musaasa oghu aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ eghi yoona, naanaghambila bantu ebi Yesu aamukoleeye.
42008040	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa bughuwa ejooba bwa nanja eghi, kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyamwebali̱ya nanga boona bakaba bamulindiliiye.
42008041	Niibuwo musaasa omui, li̱i̱na liye Yai̱lo, mwebembeli̱ wʼelami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya, mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu aasi̱ye aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu naamwesengeleli̱ya ati, aghende naye ewe e ka.
42008042	Ekyaleki̱ye musaasa oghu aabu̱gha atiyo ni nanga akaba ali na muhala wee omui enkaha alwaliiye kimui kandi ali haai ku̱ku̱wa. Manaabukali̱ oghu akaba ali na myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili. Yesu aaghenda na kiigambi̱ kya bantu ki̱mu̱gu̱mbi̱ye.
42008043	Mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki hakaba halimu mukali̱ oghu akaba alwaye bulwaye bwa bakali̱. Amali̱ye na buwo myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼebili. Taaliyo mutambi̱li̱ nʼomui oghu akagubha kumukoonela na kati̱i̱ konkaha bbaa.
42008044	Mukali̱ oghu aasila enu̱ma sya Yesu mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki, aaku̱ma haa lughoye lwa Yesu. Makalu̱ku̱mʼo ati, du̱mbi̱ aakililʼo.
42008045	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ni ani̱ anku̱mi̱yʼo?” Bantu boona beehighaana. Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Wai̱tu̱, naawe oboone ngoku kiigambi̱ kya bantu kini baku̱gu̱mbi̱ye kandi baku̱mi̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye.”
42008046	Bhaatu Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Muntu anku̱mi̱yʼo nanga neehi̱ghu̱u̱ye maani̱ ghaa ku̱ki̱li̱ya ghandu̱ghi̱yemu̱!”
42008047	Obu mukali̱ oghu aaboone ataakugubha kwebi̱sa, aasa naatukumila, aateeli̱ya Yesu mu maghulu. Aabu̱gha haagati ya bantu boona ekyaleki̱ye aaku̱mo Yesu, kandi ngoku du̱mbi̱ aakiliiyʼo.
42008048	Yesu aamughila ati, “Muhala wanje, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, oghende mpempa.”
42008049	Yesu naanabu̱gha, musaasa aalu̱gha mu ka ya mwebembeli̱ oghu, aamughila ati, “Wai̱tu̱, oleke ku̱lu̱hi̱li̱ya busa mwegheesi̱ya, muhala waawe aaku̱u̱ye!”
42008050	Bhaatu obu Yesu aaki̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye aaghila Yai̱lo oghu ati, “Oleke kwobaha. Ohi̱ki̱li̱je si̱ye, muhala waawe akukila.”
42008051	Obu aaki̱dhi̱ye mu ka ya Yai̱lo, Yesu taasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye muntu onji nʼomui kutaaha naye mu numba kuuyʼo Peetelo, Yohaana na Yakobbo hamui na ese na ni̱na manaabukali̱ oghu.
42008052	Basanga bantu boona mbalila manaabukali̱ oghu kandi mbatakanganilana kimui. Bhaatu Yesu aabaghila ati, “Muleke kulila; mwana oni taaku̱u̱ye bbaa, aaghwesaghiiye kwonkaha!”
42008053	Bantu aba baamusekeelela nanga bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku aku̱u̱ye.
42008054	Yesu aataaha naaba aakomi̱yemu aba hambali mu̱ku̱ ghwa manaabukali̱ oghu ghuli. Aamukwata haa mukono, aamubilikila ati, “Manaabukali̱ uwe, oomuke!”
42008055	Manaabukali̱ oghu aatodha aaba mwomi̱i̱li̱, du̱mbi̱ aamuka. Yesu aalaghila babyaye baa manaabukali̱ oghu ati baahe mwana oghu byokuliya.
42008056	Ti̱ babyaye baa mwana oghu baaswekela kimui. Bhaatu Yesu aabeekonkomeelela kutaghambila muntu nʼomui ebyabaayʼo.
42009001	Kilo kimui Yesu aabilikila beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili hamui. Aabaha bu̱toki̱ kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ bya bu̱li̱ mulingo na ku̱ki̱li̱ya ndwala sya milingo yoona.
42009002	Aabatuma kutebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga kandi baki̱li̱ye bantu.
42009003	Aabaghila ati, “Mutaghenda na kantu koona nankabha mwi̱gho, bikapa, byokuliya, kedha sente; kandi mutaghenda na ngoye sinji, kuuyʼo esi mu̱lu̱wete syonkaha.
42009004	Numba eghi balabeebali̱yaghamu, muukalaghemu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ eghi.
42009005	Tau̱ni̱ yoona hambali batalabeebali̱yagha, malu̱ghamu, mu̱ku̱nku̱mu̱laghe tu̱u̱tu̱ ya mu bighanja byanu kwoleka ngoku Luhanga alifubila bantu aba.”
42009006	Niibuwo baaghendi̱ye baakwama mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ yoona mbatebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga kandi mbanaki̱li̱ya balwaye.
42009007	Helude mu̱lemi̱ wa Galilaaya aaghu̱wa byakuswekani̱ya ebi Yesu akwete kukola, aasobeluwa, nanga bamui mu bantu baaghilagha bati ni Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye.
42009008	Banji bati ni mulangi̱ Eli̱ya aaku̱u̱ki̱ye, na banji bati ni omui mu balangi̱ baa hambele aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye.
42009009	Bhaatu Helude aaghila ati, “Nkalaghila bajombʼo Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ mutuwe, ti̱ oghu ni ani̱ nkwete ku̱u̱ghu̱wʼo bintu ebi byona?” Aalengʼo ati anaboone Yesu.
42009010	Bakwenda baa Yesu aba, baakuuka ku̱lu̱gha hambali aabatu̱mi̱ye. Baamughambila ebi baakoli̱ye byona. Aabatwala bonkaha haakpengbu̱ mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetesai̱da.
42009011	Bhaatu bantu bakani̱ye baamanya hambali aaghendi̱ye. Baamukwama, aabeebali̱ya, ti̱ aabeegheesi̱ya haa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga. Aaki̱li̱ya abaabaagha balwaye bwile obu.
42009012	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili baasa baamughila bati, “Olaghe bantu bani, niikuwo baghende mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ nʼomu mahaai-haai, beebbalile byokuliya na haa kulaala, nanga eni tuli mu elungu.”
42009013	Aabakuukamu ati, “Enu̱we mubahe byokuliya.” Baamukuukamu bati, “Tuli na migaati̱ etaano na nsu̱i̱ ebili bhembei̱; kuuyʼo tu̱ghendi̱ye kughula byokuliya ebikumala bantu aba boona.”
42009014	Nanga basaasa bonkaha bakaba bali nga nku̱mi̱ etaano. Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Mubasitami̱ye mu bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu maku̱mi̱ ataano-ataano.”
42009015	Baakola kuwo, bantu boona baasitama.
42009016	Aakwata migaati̱ etaano eghi na nsu̱i̱ ebili esi, aalola eghulu, aasi̱i̱ma Luhanga haabwa byokuliya ebi. Aabheghanga migaati̱ na nsu̱i̱ esi, aakala naanabiha beeghesebuwa be kubiha bantu aba.
42009017	Ti̱ bantu aba boona baaliya baakutila kimui. Beeghesebuwa be baakoma-koma ebyati̱ghaayʼo, baasu̱li̱ya bighegha eku̱mi̱ na bibili.
42009018	Bwile bumui Yesu akaba ali na beeghesebuwa be naasaba. Makamala kusaba aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Bi̱bbu̱la bya bantu bakungilaghamu ani̱?”
42009019	Baamukuukamu bati, “Banji bakughilagha bati nuuwe Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱; banji bati, Eli̱ya, na banji bati oli omui mu balangi̱ bʼambele aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye.”
42009020	Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ti̱ enu̱we mukungilaghamu ani̱?” Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Nuuwe Ki̱li̱si̱to wa Luhanga.”
42009021	Bhaatu Yesu aabeekonkomeelela ati bataghambila muntu nʼomui.
42009022	Aabaghila ati, “Mwana wa Muntu akulaghiluwa kubona-bona bintu bikani̱ye. Akubhenguwa bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Akwitibuwa, bhaatu haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.”
42009023	Yesu aabaghila boona ati, “Muntu weena naanabbali̱ye kunkwama, akulaghiluwa kuleka kwelema, aheeke musalaba ghuwe bu̱li̱ kilo, kandi ankwame.
42009024	Weena oghu akukukutila bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe, akubufweluwa, bhaatu oghu akubuhaayo haabwanje, akubutunga.
42009025	Buuye, kikughasila ki muntu kutunga nsi eni yoona, kandi afeeluwa kedha ahwelekeeleli̱ya bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe?
42009026	Bhaatu oghu akunkwatiluwa nsoni̱ kandi asikwatiluwa butumuwa bwanje, na Mwana wa Muntu alimukwatiluwa nsoni̱ obu aliisa mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye kandi mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Ese wee kandi na kya baamalai̱ka bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
42009027	Mbaghambiiye majima, bamui mu enu̱we abali hani endindi tabaku̱ku̱wa ku̱hi̱ki̱ya baboone bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
42009028	Haanu̱ma ya bilo munaanaa Yesu abu̱ghi̱ye ebi, aaghenda na Peetelo, Yohaana, na Yakobbo haa mwena kusaba.
42009029	Naanasaba, kususa kuwe kwahinduka, ngoye esi alu̱wete syelela kimui dhiyo.
42009030	Du̱mbi̱ balangi̱ babili bʼambele, Musa na Eli̱ya, baaboneka baatandika ku̱bu̱gha naye.
42009031	Baabona mbabbebbeniya na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, baamughambila ngoku akughenda ku̱kwi̱la mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu.
42009032	Peetelo na baanakiye bakaba baghwesaghiliiye kimui. Obu baasu̱su̱mu̱ki̱ye baabona Yesu naabbebbeneli̱ya kimui, na basaasa babili baamiliiye naye.
42009033	Basaasa aba obu baali bali haai ku̱mu̱lu̱ghʼo kughenda, niibuwo Peetelo aaghi̱li̱ye Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, kyabaaye kilungi etu̱we twaba hani endindi! Oleke tubakwelele bunumba busatu: kamui kaawe, kamui kaa Musa, na kamui kaa Eli̱ya.” Aabu̱gha atiyo atamani̱ye eki akwete ku̱bu̱gha.
42009034	Naanabu̱gha atiyo, kicu kyasa kyabaswi̱ki̱li̱la boona, ti̱ beeghesebuwa aba boobahila kimui.
42009035	Du̱mbi̱ elaka lya lyalu̱gha mu kicu eki lyaghila liti, “Oghu niiye Mwana wanje, oghu naakomi̱yemu; mu̱mu̱u̱ghu̱we!”
42009036	Elaka eli makamala ku̱bu̱gha litiyo, baabona Yesu ali enkaha. Ebi baaboone ebi bataabighambila muntu nʼomui bwile obu.
42009037	Obu bwakeeye, Yesu na beeghesebuwa be aba baakota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena oghu, makaki̱dha bati mu nti̱na yaghuwo kiigambi̱ kya bantu kyamaani̱ kyasa kyamusangaana.
42009038	Musaasa omui mu kiigambi̱ eki aabilikila Yesu nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, gutu nkwesengeleei̱ye onkoonele onki̱li̱li̱ye mutabani̱ wanje oni, niiye mwana nkali naye enkaha.
42009039	Ki̱li̱mu̱ kikaakumukwatagha, du̱mbi̱ atandika kutakangana, ti̱ ki̱mu̱tu̱ku̱mi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kimui, bi̱hu̱lo biikala kumutuwa mu kanu̱wa, kimugenga kitamu̱lu̱ghʼo bwangu.
42009040	Neesengeleei̱ye beeghesebuwa baawe nti bamubhingʼo kiyo, baasaaghuwa.”
42009041	Yesu aaghila bantu aba ati, “Ai̱ enu̱we, bantu bateesi̱ghi̱ye kwonini Luhanga kandi bahabi̱ye! Nkuukala naanu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya dhi̱? Ti̱ nkubagu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa? Ondeetele hani mwana waawe oghu.”
42009042	Mbanamuleeta, du̱mbi̱ ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyamukwata, kyamugenga hansi kyakala ku̱mu̱tu̱ku̱mi̱i̱li̱li̱ya kimui. Bhaatu Yesu aalaghila ki̱li̱mu̱ eki ati ki̱lu̱ghʼo mwana oghu. Aamu̱ki̱li̱ya, aamukwati̱ya ese wee.
42009043	Ti̱ bantu boona baasweka, baaghila bati Luhanga ali na bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱. Bantu boona banasweki̱ye haabwa byona ebi Yesu aakolagha, aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati,
42009044	“Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye bhyani eki ndimabaghambila kini, Mwana wa Muntu baku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya mu ngi̱ghu̱ siye.”
42009045	Bhaatu beeghesebuwa be aba tabeetegheleei̱ye eki akumani̱i̱si̱ya, nanga Luhanga aababi̱si̱i̱li̱la kumanya ebikughenda kubʼo Yesu, kandi boobaha ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu makulu ghaa bighambo aabu̱ghi̱ye ebi.
42009046	Beeghesebuwa be aba baatandika kuhakangana bonkaha-na-bonkaha bati ni ani̱ akubabaamu mukulu.
42009047	Yesu aakenga ebi bakwete kweli̱li̱kana du̱mbi̱ aami̱li̱li̱ya mwana haai-haai naye.
42009048	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Weena oghu akubhasila mwana ngʼoni haabwanje, ni̱i̱si̱ye akuba abhasiiye. Kandi oghu akumbhasila, akuba abhasiiye dhee Oghu akantuma. Nanga oghu akubeebundaali̱yamu, niiye akubabaamu mukulu.”
42009049	Yohaana aaghila Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, twaboone muntu naabhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ naakoleesi̱ya li̱i̱na lyawe. Twamutanga nanga taali waatu.”
42009050	Yesu aaghila ati, “Mutamutanga, muntu weena naabaaye ataakukuhakani̱ya ni waawe.”
42009051	Bwile bwa Yesu bwa ku̱ku̱wa niikuwo Luhanga amu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱le amutwale mu eghulu bukaba buli haai ku̱hi̱ka, nahabweki aatwi̱lamu kimui kughenda mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu.
42009052	Anali mu kihanda aatuma bantu kuhikila kutwala makulu agha. Baaghenda mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghumui mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya kumuteekani̱li̱ja bu̱li̱ kintu atakaki̱dhi̱yeyo,
42009053	bhaatu bantu baayo baabhenga kwebali̱ya Yesu na beeghesebuwa be. Nanga aaghendagha kulami̱li̱ya e Yelusaalemu.
42009054	Obu beeghesebuwa be, Yakobbo na Yohaana baaghu̱u̱ye ngoku bantu baabhengi̱ye kumwebali̱ya, baamughila bati, “Mukama, buuye okubbala tulaghile mulilo ghu̱lu̱ghe mu eghulu ghubahwelekeeleli̱ye?”
42009055	Bhaatu Yesu eegaali̱ya, aabatanuka ati eki baabu̱ghi̱ye eki taki̱hi̱ki̱ye.
42009056	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaghenda mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghunji.
42009057	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be mbanalubhatanga mu luguudhe, musaasa omui aamughila ati, “Nkughenda naawe hambali olakaghendagha hoona-hoona.”
42009058	Yesu aamughila ati, “Buuwakame buli na bi̱i̱na, na noni̱ syaba na bisui hambali bikulaalagha. Bhaatu Mwana wa Muntu taali na ki̱i̱kalo kya kuhuumulilamu bbaa.”
42009059	Bwile bunji aaghila musaasa onji ati, “Oose, obe mweghesebuwa wanje.” Bhaatu musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama, oleke ndu̱bhe ngende niikale na tita ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aku̱u̱ye, ni̱mu̱ji̱i̱ki̱ye.”
42009060	Yesu aamughila ati, “Oleke abaku̱u̱ye bajiike abaabo abaku̱u̱ye. Bhaatu uwe oghende olangilile bantu niikuwo babe mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
42009061	Musaasa onji aamughila ati, “Mukama, nkuba mweghesebuwa waawe. Bhaatu onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye oleke ndu̱bhe ngende ndaghe abʼewanje.”
42009062	Yesu aamughila ati, “Ngoku muntu oghu akukolagha atabhonganuuwe kulolakaka enu̱ma, niikiyo kimui dhee, muntu naanankweme aakala anali nʼebinamu̱twali̱li̱i̱je, taakuba na mughaso mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
42010001	Haanu̱ma, Mukama Yesu aakoma beeghesebuwa be banji nsanju̱ na babili, aabatuma babili-babili, kumuhikila kughenda mu maatau̱ni̱ na bi̱i̱kalo hambali akughenda.
42010002	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Haliyo bya kukesa bikani̱ye, bhaatu bakoli̱ niibo bakee. Nahabweki musabe Mukama wa kukesa oghu atume bakoli̱ bakani̱ye mu kukesa kuwe oku.
42010003	Mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye! Ndimabatuma, bhaatu mumanye ngu muli nga byana bya ntaama ndimatuma mu mihaga.
42010004	Mutaghenda na bikapa bya kubiikilamu sente, kedha bikapa bya ngoye. Mutatwala nkai̱to sinji, kuuyʼo esi mu̱lu̱wete syonkaha. Mutatwalagha bwile bukani̱ye kulamu̱ki̱ya bantu mu kihanda.
42010005	“Obu mulabaagha nimutaaha mu numba, mu̱du̱bhaghe mughilaghe muti, ‘Mpempa yonkaha haa bantu baa mu numba eni.’
42010006	Mu numba eghi naabaaye halimu muntu oghu abbali̱ye mpempa, alaghitungagha. Bhaatu ataabaayemu, mpempa eghi elakuukilagha enu̱we.
42010007	Ti̱ numba eghi balabeebali̱yaghamu, muukalaghemu kandi haaniimuwo mwalu̱ghi̱i̱li̱lagha ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ eghi. Muliyaghe kandi munuwaghe ebi balabahaagha byona. Nanga mu̱koli̱ abhonganuuwe kumuha mpeela yee. Mutalu̱ghamu kughoona mu manumba ghanji.
42010008	“Mulakaki̱dhagha mu tau̱ni̱ mbaabeebali̱ya, muliyaghe byokuliya ebi balabahaagha.
42010009	Mu̱ki̱li̱yaghe balwaye abalimu, kandi mughambilaghe bantu baamu muti, ‘Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bwahi̱ki̱ye.’
42010010	Bhaatu obu mulaki̱dhagha mu tau̱ni̱ mbaabhenga kubeebali̱ya mughendaghe mu nguudhe syamu hambali bantu bakani̱ye bali mughilaghe muti,
42010011	‘Tuli maku̱nku̱mu̱la nankabha tu̱u̱tu̱ yʼomu tau̱ni̱ yaanu eni eghi ekwatilaane mu bighanja byatu kwoleka ngoku Luhanga alibafubila. Bhaatu mumanye ngu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bwahi̱ki̱ye.’
42010012	Mbaghambiiye majima, bwile obu Luhanga aliba naatwi̱la bantu musango, alifubila bantu baa tau̱ni̱ eghi kusaali̱ya ngoku alifubila bantu baa tau̱ni̱ ya Sodomu.”
42010013	Ngamulikibona enu̱we bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Kolaji̱i̱ni̱! Ngamulikibona enu̱we bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetesai̱da! Nguli byakuswekani̱ya ebi naakoleeye ewaanu, naabikoleeye Ti̱lo kedha Si̱dooni̱, bangubaaye beeku̱u̱ki̱yemu hambele, balu̱wala ngoye sya bujune, kandi basitama mu ki̱bu̱ kyʼomu mahi̱gha.
42010014	Bhaatu mbaghambiiye, Luhanga ali̱twi̱la enu̱we musango ghwamaani̱ kusaali̱ya ngoku ali̱ghu̱twi̱la bantu baa tau̱ni̱ ya Ti̱lo na ya Si̱dooni̱.
42010015	Ti̱ enu̱we bantu baa Kapelenau̱mu̱ abaabhengi̱ye ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti Luhanga alibaha ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ mu eghulu? Bbaa, alibakuba Eku̱li̱mu̱.
42010016	“Weena oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebyanu, ni̱i̱si̱ye akuba aaghu̱u̱ye, kandi oghu akubhenga ebyanu, ni̱i̱si̱ye akuba abhengi̱ye, kandi oghu akubhenga si̱ye, akuba abhengi̱ye oghu akantuma.”
42010017	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa nsanju̱ na babili aba baaku̱u̱ki̱ye, baasa badheedheleeu̱we kimui, baahi̱ka, baaghila Yesu bati, “Mukama, twakalaghilagha nankabha bi̱li̱mu̱ ku̱lu̱ghʼo bantu mu li̱i̱na lyawe bibalu̱ghʼo.”
42010018	Aabakuukamu ati, “Ee, Luhanga kubaha bu̱toki̱ bwa kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱, naabaagha ndoli̱ye ngoku Luhanga aayaghʼo Si̱taani̱ bu̱toki̱ mulundi ghumui ngoku nkubha ekabbyoka.
42010019	Naabahaaye bu̱toki̱ kukpeetaagha njoka na bunamuntakana, kandi bu̱toki̱ ku̱si̱ngu̱la maani̱ ghoona ghaa ngi̱ghu̱ Si̱taani̱, ti̱ taaliyo ekikubakola kubhi bbaa.
42010020	Bhaatu mutadheedhuwa haabwa bi̱li̱mu̱ kubaaghu̱wa. Mudheedhuwe haabwa mali̱i̱na ghaanu kuba ghahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu eghulu.”
42010021	Bwile obu Yesu aasula maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ti̱ aadheedheluwa kimui. Aaghila ati, “Tita, Mukama wʼeghulu na nsi, nku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma nanga majima agha okaghabisi̱i̱li̱la baamagheji kandi basomi̱ye. Waaghasu̱u̱ku̱li̱la baana bakelembe. Ee, Tita, eki niikiyo waaboone ki̱ku̱dheedhi̱ye kwonini.”
42010022	“Tita niiye akampa bu̱toki̱ bwa bu̱li̱ kintu kyona. Taaliyo nʼomui oghu amani̱ye si̱ye Mwana kuuyʼo Tita oghu, kandi taaliyo oghu amani̱ye Tita kuuyʼo Mwana, kandi nʼaba Mwana akukomaghamu kuleka mbamumanya.”
42010023	Niibuwo eegaai̱ye aaghila beeghesebuwa be mu ki̱bi̱so ati, “Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abakubona ebi enu̱we mukwete kubona.
42010024	Mbaghambiiye, balangi̱ na bakama bakani̱ye bakabbala kubona ebi muboone, bhaatu bataabibona, kandi ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye, bhaatu bataabi̱i̱ghu̱wa.”
42010025	Kilo kimui mwegheesi̱ya wa bilaghilo, aabbala kulengesa Yesu. Aamuka, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, nibhonganuuwe kukola ki niikuwo ntunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo?”
42010026	Yesu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ki̱ti̱ya mu bilaghilo? Uwe obyetegheleei̱ye oti̱ya?”
42010027	Musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, ‘Okundaghe Mukama Luhanga waawe na mutima ghwawe ghwona, bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwawe bwona, maani̱ ghaawe ghoona, na magheji ghaawe ghoona’; kandi, ‘Okundaghe muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini.’ ”
42010028	Yesu aamughila ati, “Waaku̱u̱ki̱yemu kusemeeye. Okolaghe otiyo, Luhanga akwisa kukuha bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.”
42010029	Bhaatu musaasa oghu haabwa kwefoola ati ahi̱ki̱i̱ye, aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Buuye muunakyanje, ni ani̱?”
42010030	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Kilo kimui musaasa aalu̱ghagha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu naahona kughenda Yeli̱ko, aaghuwa mu baji̱ndi̱. Baamukwata, baamu̱tu̱u̱bbu̱la, baamuhuulanga; baamu̱ti̱gha alekeeye bo beeghendela.
42010031	“Kyamu̱gi̱sa ghulungi, mu̱hongi̱ aabungagha mu luguudhe olu. Obu aamusangi̱yʼo naamubona, aamukengeela, aaghenda.
42010032	“Niikiyo kimui dhee, Mu̱leevi̱ aasaalila mu luguudhe olu, obu aahi̱ki̱ye hambali musaasa oghu ali aamubona, naye dhee aamukengeela, aaghenda.
42010033	“Niibuwo Musamali̱ya naye aaki̱dhi̱ye hambali musaasa oghu ali. Obu aamuboone, aamukwatiluwa kisa.
42010034	Aaghenda, hambali musaasa oghu ali aamusiigha magita na vi̱i̱ni̱ mu ngogha baamu̱hu̱taahi̱ye, aamuboha ngogha esi na bbandai̱jo. Du̱mbi̱ aamuta haa ndogooi̱ yee, aamutwala mu looji̱, aamuloleelela.
42010035	“Obu bwakeeye, aakwata sente syengaane na musaala ghwa mu̱koli̱ ghwa bilo bibili, aasiha mukama wa looji̱ eghi. Aamughila ati, ‘Gutu, ololeelele mulwaye wanje oni, kandi nuwaakoleeseei̱ye sente sisaaye haala, nkukusasulamu siyo ninaaku̱u̱ki̱ye.’ ”
42010036	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱u̱i̱ye mwegheesi̱ya wa bilaghilo bya di̱i̱ni̱ oghu ati, “Mabhu̱u̱le, mu basaasa basatu aba, ni ani̱ akatwalikani̱ya musaasa oghu akaghuwa mu baji̱ndi̱ oghu nga muunakiye?”
42010037	Aamukuukamu ati, “Ni oghu akamughilila ngughuma.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Naawe oghende okolaghe otiyo.”
42010038	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be mbanaghenda mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, baaki̱dha mu mu̱bhi̱li̱. Mukali̱ omui mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu li̱i̱na liye Malita eebali̱i̱ye Yesu ati ataahe mu numba yee.
42010039	Mukali̱ oghu akaba ali na mwana waani̱nawee li̱i̱na liye Mali̱ya. Mali̱ya oghu aasitama haai-haai na Mukama, aakala ategheleei̱ye bhyani ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya.
42010040	Bhaatu Malita aakala naanatalibana kubateekani̱li̱ja, ataagubha kusitama ku̱tegheeleli̱ya. Niibuwo aasi̱ye aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Mukama, oghile Malita naye aase ankoonele. Tooboone ngoku andekeelelani̱i̱ye milimo nenkaha?”
42010041	Mukama aamukuukamu ati, “Malita, Malita, otuntuuye kandi niibuwo waatalibana na bintu bikani̱ye,
42010042	bhaatu ekisemeeye nkimui kyonkaha. Ti̱ Mali̱ya eye aatu̱u̱yemu kukola ekisemeeye eki, kandi muntu taakumuuyʼo kiyo bbaa.”
42011001	Kilo kimui Yesu akaba ali haakpengbu̱ naasaba. Obu aamali̱ye kusaba, omui mu beeghesebuwa be aamughila ati, “Mukama, naatu otwegheesi̱ye kusaba ngoku Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ eegheeseei̱ye beeghesebuwa be.”
42011002	Yesu aaghila ati, “Obu mulabaagha nimusaba, mughilaghe muti, “ ‘Eseetu̱we, bantu boona bahu̱ti̱ye li̱i̱na lyawe. Bu̱lemi̱ bwawe bwise.
42011003	Otuhe byokuliya byatu bya bu̱li̱ kilo.
42011004	Otughanile bibhi byatu, ngoku naatu tukughanilagha abakutukolagha kubhi. Otatu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kwohebuwa.’ ”
42011005	Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aabaghila ati, “Mabhu̱u̱le mu̱ghenu̱ naaku̱ku̱dhi̱i̱ye ndinga-ndinga yʼekilo, asanga otali na byokuliya ti̱ oghenda ewaa bhootu̱ syawe omughila oti, ‘Gutu ompe byokuliya ndaku̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱yamu biyo,
42011006	mu̱ghenu̱ anki̱dhi̱i̱ye tandi na byokuliya byakumuha!’
42011007	“Buuye naaku̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu ati, ‘Oleke kuntalibani̱ja, si̱ye nʼabaana banje twalangaaye. Tankugubha kuumuka kukuha kantu koona.’
42011008	Mbaghambiiye majima, taakuumuka kukuha byokuliya ebi nanga uwe kuba bhootu̱ siye, bhaatu akukuha biyo haabwa kuukala noonakonkona, kandi noonamubilikila.
42011009	“Musabe, mukuheebuwa; mubbale, mukutunga; mukonkone, bakubaaghulila.
42011010	Nanga weena oghu akusabagha, akuheebuwagha; oghu akubbalagha, akutungagha; oghu akukonkonagha, bakumuughulilagha.
42011011	“Ni ani̱ mu enu̱we oghu mwana wee angusaba nsu̱i̱, mu ki̱i̱kalo kya nsu̱i̱, amuha njoka?
42011012	Tooli̱ ni mubyaye ki oghu mwana wee angusaba ehuli, amuhamu kanamuntakana?
42011013	Buuye enu̱we bantu babhi, obu mulaba mumani̱ye kuha baana baanu bisembo bisemeeye, buuye Eseenu̱we wʼomu eghulu taakusaali̱yʼo kuha Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye abakumusaba ye!”
42011014	Kilo kimui Yesu aabhingʼo musaasa ki̱li̱mu̱ ekyali kiighaaye musaasa oghu kanu̱wa. Obu ki̱li̱mu̱ eki kyamu̱lu̱ghi̱yʼo, du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu kanu̱wa kaabaagha kaaghaaye oghu, aatandika ku̱bu̱gha. Tooli̱ bantu abaabaaghʼo baakala basweki̱ye.
42011015	Bhaatu bamui mu bantu aba baaghila bati, “Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱, mukulu wa bi̱li̱mu̱, niiye amuhaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhinga bi̱li̱mu̱.”
42011016	Banji mbabbala kulengesa Yesu, baakalagha mbamusaba bati abakolele kyakuswekani̱ya niikuwo bamanye Luhanga alakaba amu̱tu̱mi̱ye.
42011017	Bhaatu haabwa Yesu kumanya byeli̱li̱kano byabo, aabatwi̱la lu̱si̱mo ati, “Bantu baa bu̱lemi̱ bumui mbatandi̱ki̱ye kulwana kandi beetu̱wamu kabili, bu̱lemi̱ obu tabukuukalʼo bbaa. Kandi na bantu baa ka emui mbatandi̱ki̱ye kulwana kandi beetu̱wamu kabili, ka eghi teekutuulʼo.
42011018	Nahabweki Si̱taani̱ neelwani̱i̱si̱i̱ye eenini, akuba eetambulani̱i̱yemu eenini. Bu̱lemi̱ buwe tabukutuulʼo bbaa. Naabaghambiiye ebi nanga bamui mu enu̱we bakwete kughila bati Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱ niiye ampaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhinga bi̱li̱mu̱.
42011019	Ti̱ buuye Bbelejebbu̱u̱li̱ akaakuba aliiye ampaaye bu̱toki̱ kubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱, baana baanu baku̱koleesi̱ya bwani̱? Niibo balileka babatwi̱le musango ngoku muhabi̱ye.
42011020	Bhaatu obu ndaba nimbhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ haabwa bu̱toki̱ Luhanga ampaaye, eki kikuba nkyoleka ngoku bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bubalimu.
42011021	“Si̱taani̱ ali nga musaasa wamaani̱ oghu ali̱ndi̱ye ka yee kwonini, kandi oghu ali na bya kulwani̱i̱si̱ya byona.
42011022	Bhaatu oghu amusaai̱ye maani̱, niiye akumwegimba kumuuyʼo bya kulwani̱i̱si̱ya ebi, kandi amutoole bintu biye byona.
42011023	“Oghu atali hamui nanje, akumpakani̱yagha; kandi oghu ataakukumaani̱yagha hamui nanje, akuhanjaagagha.”
42011024	“Ti̱ ki̱li̱mu̱ kikaku̱lu̱ghaghamu muntu, kikughendagha mu elungu hambali maasi ghatali, nkibbala hambali kikuhuumulila, kandi takikutungaghʼo bbaa. Du̱mbi̱ kighila kiti, ‘Oleke nkuuke mu numba hambali naalu̱ghi̱ye.’
42011025	Ti̱ nkyaki̱dha, kisanga muntu oghu ali nga numba beeheleeye yeeli̱ye, kandi eteekani̱ji̱bu̱u̱we kulungi.
42011026	Du̱mbi̱ kighenda kileeta bi̱li̱mu̱ binji musanju̱ ebikisaai̱ye kusaakala, biisa biikala mu muntu oghu. Ti̱ muntu oghu aba kubhi kusaali̱ya ngoku aabaagha haa ku̱du̱bha.”
42011027	Yesu naanabu̱gha nabo atiyo, mukali̱ aaguganganila mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu eki ati, “Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oghu akaku̱byala kandi akwonki̱ya!”
42011028	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Abali na mu̱gi̱sa ni abaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha kighambo kya Luhanga kandi bakidhootela.”
42011029	Obu Yesu aaboone biigambi̱ bya bantu mbyeyongelela kimui kumwisʼo, aabaghila ati, “Mujo ghwa bantu bani ngabali babhi, bakuukalagha mbabbala kubakolela kyakuswekani̱ya. Bhaatu taaliyo kyakuswekani̱ya kyona ekikubakoleluwa kuuyʼo kya Yona.
42011030	Nanga ngoku Yona aabaaye nga kyakuswekani̱ya mu bantu baa Ni̱neeva, niikuwo na Mwana wa Muntu, akuba atiyo mu bantu baa mujo ghuni.
42011031	Kandi na mukama wabukali̱ oghu akaba alemi̱ye ehanga lya Sebba, alyemilila hamui naanu kandi asi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ye bantu baa mujo ghuni musango. Nanga eye akalu̱gha munsi hambali aseleeye kimui, aasa ku̱tegheeleli̱ya Mukama Solomooni̱ oghu akaba ali na magheji ghakani̱ye. Ti̱ oghu asaai̱ye Solomooni̱ bu̱toki̱ ali hani naanu.
42011032	Haa kilo Luhanga aku̱twi̱lamu bantu musango, bantu baa kibugha kya Ni̱neeva balyemilila hamui naanu mu maaso ghe. Baleke asi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ye enu̱we musango, nanga ebo obu Yona aabatebi̱i̱je haa bikoluwa byabo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, bakeekuukamu. Bhaatu oghu asaai̱ye Yona bu̱toki̱ ali naanu, ti̱ mu̱bhengi̱ye ebi akwegheesi̱yagha.”
42011033	Niibuwo Yesu aatodhi̱ye aabaghila ati, “Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akubhaki̱yagha kaatadhooba akabisa kedha akaswi̱ki̱la na kighegha! Bhaatu akukataagha haa meeja niikuwo kabbeneli̱ye abakutaaha mu numba omu.
42011034	Ngoku maaso ghaanu ghakulekagha mubona kyeleeli̱, niikuwo ebi mukubbalagha kukola mu mitima yaanu bikwolekagha ngoku muli. Bhaatu mitima yaanu niyaabaaye ebhi̱i̱hi̱ye, mukubhiihila kimui.
42011035	Nahabweki, mulole ngu majima agha musangu̱u̱we mumani̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ghaaleki̱ye mwasi̱i̱ma butumuwa bwanje, kitali eki ghakuleka mu̱lu̱ghʼo Luhanga.
42011036	Muntu naasi̱i̱mi̱ye butumuwa bwanje akwolekela kimui bulungi bwa Luhanga ngoku kaatadhooba kabbeneli̱ya bantu.”
42011037	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi, Mufali̱saayo aamubilikila ewe niikuwo baliye kiihulo hamui na Yesu; nahabweki Yesu aasi̱i̱ma aaghenda kuba haa kiihulo eki.
42011038	Bhaatu obu baatandikagha kuliya, Mufali̱saayo oghu aabona Yesu naaliya ataadu̱bhi̱ye kunaaba mu ngalo kwonini, ti̱ Mufali̱saayo oghu aasweka.
42011039	Niibuwo Mukama aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Enu̱we Bafali̱saayo, mu̱kwesemeli̱yagha haagu̱u̱li̱ kuni mitima yaanu eesuuyemu mululu na bubhi.
42011040	Badhoma-dhoma enu̱we! Oghu akahanga mubili niiye akahanga na mutima dhee.
42011041	Mu̱si̱i̱me Luhanga adu̱bhe asemeli̱ye mitima yaanu kandi ebi muli nabiyo mubitambu̱li̱ye banaku na mutima ghusemeeye niikuwo musemela ewaa Luhanga.”
42011042	“Ngamulikibona enu̱we Bafali̱saayo, nanga mukuhaagha Luhanga kimui kyʼeku̱mi̱ kya bu̱li̱ kantu nankabha nga nswigha, bu̱tu̱ngu̱lu̱ kedha bulaala bunji bwona bwʼomu misili yaanu. Bhaatu kusa, mu ngeso syanu tamufuuyʼo kuba na bwengani̱ja kandi tamu̱ku̱ndi̱ye Luhanga. Ebi mwangu̱bi̱koli̱ye byona mutati̱gha na binji.
42011043	“Ngamulikibona enu̱we Bafali̱saayo, nanga mukaakubaagha muli mu malami̱li̱yo, mukubbalagha kusitama mu ntebe sya bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Ti̱ ni mwaba muli mu butale, mubbala bantu babalamu̱ki̱ye babahu̱ti̱i̱ye.
42011044	“Ngamulikibona, nanga muli nga bituulo bitaliyo kaakulolelʼo, ebi bantu bakulubhatangilʼo batamani̱ye ngoku bili bituulo.”
42011045	Niibuwo omui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo aamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, obu waabu̱ghi̱ye otiyo, naatu watwambuuye dhee.”
42011046	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ngamulikibona enu̱we beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, nanga mu̱ku̱heeki̱yagha bantu nku̱mba sibasaalukaane, esi enu̱we mutaakugubha ku̱ku̱mʼo na kati̱i̱ konkaha.
42011047	“Ngamulikibona, nanga mukukwelagha bituulo bya balangi̱, kuni baataata baanu niibo baabaati̱ye.
42011048	Obuuni mukukolagha mutiyo mukubaagha nimwoleka ngoku mu̱sembi̱ye ebi baataata baanu aba baakoli̱yʼo balangi̱ aba; nanga niibo baabaati̱ye, kusa enu̱we mukukwelagha bituulo byabo.
42011049	Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye, Luhanga mu magheji ghe aaghila ati, ‘Ndabatumilagha balangi̱ na bakwenda, bamui mu balangi̱ aba bakubaata kandi banji bababonaboneli̱ye kimui.’
42011050	Nahabweki enu̱we bantu baa mujo ghuni, Luhanga alibatwi̱la musango ghwa kwita balangi̱ aba ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la hambele obu Luhanga aahangi̱ye nsi.
42011051	Kandi ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la obu baati̱ye Abbeli̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baati̱ye Jakaliya, oghu baatiiye haagati ya eki bakuhongelaghʼo bihonguwa na ki̱i̱kalo kilukwela mu Numba ya Luhanga. Mbaghambiiye majima, ebi byona Luhanga ali̱twi̱la bantu baa mujo ghuni musango ghwabiyo.”
42011052	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Ngamulikibona enu̱we beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo! Mukulekagha bantu batamanya Luhanga. Naanu boonini mukubhengagha Luhanga kubalema, kandi mutanga banji ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga kubalema.”
42011053	Obu Yesu aabbalagha kubalu̱ghʼo kughenda, Bafali̱saayo na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo aba baatandika kumuhakani̱li̱ya kimui, kandi baakala ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bi̱bu̱u̱li̱yo byamaani̱-maani̱,
42011054	mbalengʼo ku̱mwohi̱ya bati abu̱ghe kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye niikuwo bamunyegheelele.
42012001	Bwile obu, bantu bakaniiye kimui baagumbaana hambali ali, muntu ataakukuba na kati. Aatandika ku̱bu̱gha na beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwelinde ki̱tu̱mbi̱so kya Bafali̱saayo, niibuwo bu̱ghobi̱ya bwabo.
42012002	Taaliyo kintu kyona eki bantu balikolelela mu ki̱bi̱so ekitalimanuwa, kedha eki bali̱bi̱sa-bi̱sa ekitalimanuwa.
42012003	Nahabweki eki mulabu̱ghi̱lagha mu nsi̱ta, bantu boona balaki̱i̱ghu̱wagha, kandi eki mulabu̱ghi̱lagha mu biiweewe, balakilangililagha bantu boona.
42012004	“Enu̱we baabhootu̱ syanje mbaghambiiye majima, mutoobaha abakugubha kwita mubili, bataakugubha kukola kintu kinji kisaai̱ye haala.
42012005	Oleke mbaghambile oghu mukwobaha. Mwobahe Luhanga oghu haanu̱ma ya kwita mubili, ali na bu̱toki̱ kubakuba mu Gehena. Mbaghambiiye, oghu aaniiye mwobaha.
42012006	Buuye bu̱si̱i̱li̱ya butaano tabaku̱bu̱ghu̱li̱yagha si̱li̱ngi̱ ki̱ku̱mi̱ syonkaha? Bhaatu noobu buba buli buunabwana-bwana, taaliyo na kamui aka Luhanga atamani̱ye.
42012007	Enu̱we boona Luhanga amani̱ye nankabha muhendo ghwa esoke elili haa mutuwe ghwawe. Nahabweki mutoobaha. Muli baa mughaso munu kusaali̱ya bu̱si̱i̱li̱ya bukani̱ye.
42012008	“Mbaghambiiye, weena oghu alyatula mu bantu ati ni wanje, nanje Mwana wa Muntu ndimwatula mu maaso ghaa baamalai̱ka baa Luhanga.
42012009	Bhaatu oghu alineehighaana mu bantu, nanje ndimwehighaana mu maaso ghaa baamalai̱ka baa Luhanga.
42012010	Kandi weena oghu aku̱bu̱ghʼo kubhi Mwana wa Muntu alighaniluwa. Bhaatu weena oghu akwambula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye taalighaniluwa.
42012011	“Bhaatu enu̱we mbaabatwete kubatongani̱ya mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya, kedha mu balemi̱, kedha mu bantu abali na bu̱toki̱, byaku̱bu̱gha bitalibatu̱ntu̱li̱ya.
42012012	Bwile obu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye niiye ali̱beegheesi̱ya bya ku̱bu̱gha.”
42012013	Niibuwo muntu omui mu kiigambi̱ kya bantu abaabaagha bagumbaane aba aaghi̱li̱ye Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, oghambile wamaaha ampe haa bintu ebi tita aati̱ghi̱ye obu aaku̱u̱ye.”
42012014	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Musaasa uwe, ni ani̱ akankoma kuba mu̱cu̱ wa nsonga syanu?”
42012015	Yesu aaghila abaabaaghʼo ati, “Mweghendeseleje! Mwelinde mululu ghwa bu̱li̱ milingo; bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa muntu tabusighikiiye hʼetungo likani̱ye eli ali naliyo bbaa.”
42012016	Niibuwo aabatwi̱li̱i̱ye lu̱si̱mo ati, “Musaasa omui akaba ali na kibanja kiye kyeli̱ya ndimo kusemeeye.
42012017	Eeli̱li̱kana ati, ‘Boojo nkole ki? Tandi na hambali nkubiikila ndimo yanje eni yoona.’
42012018	“Niibuwo aacuuyemu ati, ‘Eki nkukola nkini, nkusakaalula nguli syanje esi syona nkwelemu sisaayʼo kuneetakaka, haaniimuwo naabikila ndimo yanje eghi na bintu byanje byona.’
42012019	Du̱mbi̱ neesi̱i̱me nti, ‘Neebiikiiye etungo elikuleka niimmalʼo kabili. Mpuumule, ndiye, ninuwe, kandi neeghonje.’
42012020	“Bhaatu Luhanga aamughila ati, ‘Mudhoma-dhoma uwe! Obwalo nkukuuya haa musana, kandi muntu onji ati̱ghali̱ye ebi weebiikiiye ebi!’
42012021	“Nahabweki, niikuwo kiliba kitiyo na oghu akwebiikilagha etungo likani̱ye munsi, kuni ali munaku mu maaso ghaa Luhanga.”
42012022	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Nahabweki ndimabaghambila, muteelalikiilila ebi mukwetaaghisibuwa mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu, bintu nga byokuliya, nankabha byaku̱lu̱wala haa mubili ghwanu.
42012023	Nanga bwomi̱i̱li̱ busaai̱ye byokuliya, kandi mubili gusaai̱ye byoku̱lu̱wala.
42012024	Dhaani mulolele haa noni̱. Tasikuhelagha kedha kukesa, tasili na nguli kedha haakubiikila; bhaatu Luhanga aku̱si̱li̱i̱si̱yagha. Enu̱we muli baa mughaso kusaali̱ya noni̱ esi!
42012025	Buuye ni ani̱ mu enu̱we nankabha atuntula ati̱ya oghu akugubha kwongela haa bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe saaha emui yonkaha?
42012026	Tooli̱ ngoku mutaakugubha kukola kantu kati̱i̱ katiyo, bintu ebi bikubatu̱ntu̱li̱yagha nangaaki?
42012027	“Dhaani mulolele haa bimole ngoku bikukulagha. Tabikukolagha mulimo kedha kusona ngoye. Bhaatu mbaghambiiye, nankabha Solomooni̱ mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye kyona, taalu̱wete kusemeeye kwengaani̱ya na kimui haa bimole ebi.
42012028	Luhanga alaba naaku̱lu̱wi̱kagha atiyo bi̱si̱ngo bya mu kisaka, ebiliyo obwalo kandi munkiya babijomba babikuba mu mulilo bihiya, akubalu̱wi̱ki̱la kimui kusaali̱ya biyo, enu̱we abali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kukee!
42012029	Nahabweki byokuliya na byokunuwa bitabatu̱ntu̱li̱yagha.
42012030	Nanga ebi niibiyo bikutwali̱li̱jagha munu abatamani̱ye Luhanga, bhaatu Eseenu̱we amani̱ye ngoku mukubyetaaghisibuwa.
42012031	Kuuyʼo mwekambe kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, kandi bintu mukwetaaghisibuwa ebi byona akubongelʼo biyo.
42012032	“Enu̱we bantu banje, nankabha muli bakee, mutoobaha, nanga kidheedheeye kimui Eseenu̱we kubaha bu̱lemi̱ buwe.
42012033	Mu̱ghu̱li̱ye ebi muli nabiyo, sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu mu musihe banaku. Nimwakoli̱ye mutiyo mukuba mwebiikiiye buguudha butaakuhuwʼo mu eghulu hambali basuma bataakugubha ku̱hi̱ka kedha nenje ku̱bu̱bhi̱i̱ya.
42012034	Nanga hambali buguudha bwawe buli na mutima ghwawe niiyo ghukuukalagha dhee.”
42012035	“Muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je, mu̱lu̱wete kusemeeye kandi na taala syanu nsyaka.
42012036	Mube nga bantu abalindiliiye mukama wabo oghu aghendi̱ye haa bwa kuswela. Niikuwo naaki̱dhi̱ye akonkona haa lwighi du̱mbi̱ baghule bwangu bamwebali̱ye.
42012037	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa baheeleli̱ya aba mukama wabo alisanga beeteekani̱i̱je. Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, alyeteekani̱ja, abasitami̱ye kandi abasembeje baliye.
42012038	Bali na mu̱gi̱sa baheeleli̱ya aba mukama wabo alisanga beeteekani̱i̱je, noobu alikuukila haa nkoko yaakabili kedha yaakasatu ekookela handinga-ndi̱nga ya bwile.
42012039	“Kandi mumani̱ye kini. Nguli nini eka aamanyagha bwile obu musuma akwisa kwibhilamu, tangulekagha musuma naataaha mu numba yee kwibhamu.
42012040	Nahabweki enu̱we muukalaghe mweteekani̱i̱je, nanga Mwana wa Muntu aliisila mu bwile obu mutaakweli̱li̱kana muti niibuwo akwisilamu.”
42012041	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mukama, buuye lu̱si̱mo olu ni̱i̱tu̱we waalu̱twi̱li̱i̱ye, kedha waalu̱twi̱li̱i̱ye bantu boona?”
42012042	Mukama aamukuukamu ati, “Mu̱heeleli̱ya mwesighibuwa kandi wa magheji akukolagha ebi mukama wee abbali̱ye. Mukama wee akumukomagha kuloleelela baheeleli̱ya baanakiye, kubaha byokuliya mu bwile babhonganuuwe kubitungilamu.
42012043	Ali na mu̱gi̱sa mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu mukama wee alikuuka amusanga naakola mulimo ghuwe oghu kusemeeye.
42012044	Mbaghambiiye majima, mukama wee oghu alimuha kuloleelela bintu biye byona.
42012045	Bhaatu mu̱heeleli̱ya mubhi oghu naanaghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Mukama wanje naye aalebbi̱ye hambali aaghendi̱ye,’ du̱mbi̱ atandika kuhuulanga baheeleli̱ye baanakiye, boobusaasa na boobukali̱. Atandika kuliya, kunuwa kandi kwetamiilila.
42012046	Mukama wa mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aliisa mu kilo kandi mu bwile obu mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu atamunihiiye kwisilamu. Aliha mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu kifubilo kyamaani̱ ngoku Luhanga alikuba mu Gehena batali beesighibuwa.
42012047	“Kandi mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu amani̱ye eki mukama wee akubbala akole, bhaatu atakikola; balimuhuula bibbooko bikani̱ye.
42012048	Bhaatu oghu atamani̱ye eki mukama wee akubbala ati akole, akola ekitahi̱ki̱ye, oghu alifubiluwa kukee. Nanga mbaghambiiye, weena oghu Luhanga aahaaye bikani̱ye, niiye alisaba bikani̱ye.”
42012049	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Kwisa kwanje munsi ndi nga muntu naatu̱mi̱ki̱yemu mulilo kughimalakaka. Du̱mbi̱ nkwekumbula mulilo oghu ghutandikilʼo!
42012050	Kandi nkughenda kubona-bonela kimui. Tooli̱ ntuntuliiye kimui ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nimali̱ye kubona-bona ntiyo.
42012051	Mutateekeleja muti naasi̱ye kuleeta mpempa mu bantu. Mbaghambiiye tanaaleeti̱ye mpempa bbaa, naasi̱ye kuleka bantu mbeebaghani̱jamu.
42012052	Kandi ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la endindi numba eghi elabaagha elimu bantu nga bataano, basatu baleebaghani̱jaghʼo ababili bali̱, nʼababili beebaghani̱jaghʼo basatu.
42012053	Mubyaye aleebaghani̱jaghʼo mwana wee, kandi mwana aleebaghani̱jaghʼo mubyaye wee. Mukali̱ aleebaghani̱jaghʼo muhala wee, na manaabukali̱ aleebaghani̱jaghʼo ni̱na wee, ese mwana aleebaghani̱jaghʼo mwana wee, na mwana aleebaghani̱jaghʼo ese wee. Mukali̱ aleebaghani̱jaghʼo mugholi wee, na mugholi aleebaghani̱jaghʼo ni̱nabyala wee.”
42012054	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aaghila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo ati, “Kusa obu mukubonagha kicu kyelaghuuye eghulu ebughuwa ejooba ngamukughilagha muti, ‘Bhaaba olole mbu̱la ekughuwa endindi,’ ti̱ eghuwa kuwo.
42012055	Kandi mwegha ngwatandika kuhunga ngu̱lu̱gha eku̱wa, mughila muti, ‘Obwalo musana ghukutuwa,’ tooli̱ ghutuwa kuwo.
42012056	Ngobi̱ya enu̱we! Mukuukalagha mu̱loli̱ye nsi kedha mwanya tooli̱ mumanya muti mumani̱ye kuteebeleja ebikuba mu mwanya. Ti̱ haabwaki mutaakugubha kusoboolola makulu ghaa bikuboneka bya bilo bini ebikwete kubʼo?
42012057	“Haabwaki buuye mutacuwamu eki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukoluwa mutakatwi̱lu̱u̱we musango?
42012058	Muntu naacuuyemu kukunyegheelela mu kooti̱, olengʼo kumala nsonga syanu naye munali mu kihanda, atakaku̱ki̱dhi̱i̱ye mu maaso ghaa mu̱cu̱. Nanga naanaku̱ki̱dhi̱i̱yeyo, mu̱cu̱ oghu akukukwati̱ya muusilikale akute mu nkomo.
42012059	Mbaghambiiye, tooku̱lu̱ghamu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya osasuuye bu̱li̱ kaasente aka bakukutonga.”
42013001	Bwile obu Yesu naaneegheesi̱ya, bantu baasa baamughambila ngoku mu̱lemi̱ Pilaato aalaghiiye baasilikale be baatila Banagalilaaya mu Numba ya Luhanga, mbanasala bisolo byabo byakuhongela Luhanga, ti̱ saghama ya Banagalilaaya aba yaalungana na ya bisolo baasalagha ebi.
42013002	Niibuwo Yesu aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti ekyaleki̱ye Pilaato aalaghila ati baate Banagalilaaya aba ni nanga ebo kuba basi̱i̱si̱ kusaali̱ya Banagalilaaya banji boona?
42013003	Bbaa! Mbaghambiiye majima, mu̱teeku̱u̱ki̱yemu kandi muleka bibhi byanu naanu dhee Luhanga alibahwelekeeleli̱ya enu̱we boona.
42013004	Tooli̱ bantu eku̱mi̱ na munaanaa aba ki̱twi̱ke kya lugho lwa matafaali lukangami̱ye lwa Silowaamu kyegengeeye baaku̱wa, mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti bakaba bali basi̱i̱si̱ mu Yelusaalemu kusaali̱ya bantu banji boona?
42013005	Bbaa! Mbaghambiiye majima, mu̱teeku̱u̱ki̱yemu kandi muleka bibhi byanu naanu dhee Luhanga alibahwelekeeleli̱ya enu̱we boona.”
42013006	Niibuwo aabatwi̱li̱i̱ye lu̱si̱mo ku̱beegheesi̱ya kwekuukamu, aaghila ati, “Musaasa akahela mu musili ghuwe kiti kya bi̱ghu̱ma mu̱ti̱i̱ni̱. Obu bwile bwa kukobha bi̱ghu̱ma bwahi̱ki̱ye aakighendʼo naabbala kukobha bi̱ghu̱ma ebilaba byani̱yʼo, bhaatu aasanga kitaani̱yʼo na kantu.
42013007	Obu aaboone atiyo, aaghila oghu aaloleelelagha musili oghu ati, ‘Ghuni ni mwaka ghwakasatu niinaasa kubbala bi̱ghu̱ma ebi kiti kini kyani̱ye bhaatu ntaakusangʼo na kantu! Okikonde! Kileke ku̱bhi̱i̱ya etaka kwonkaha.’
42013008	“Oghu aloleleeye musili oghu aamukuukamu ati, ‘Wai̱tu̱, otodhe oleke kimale mwaka ghunji ghumui, nkuta lwejo mu mi̱li̱ yakiyo.
42013009	Mwaka ghukwisa nkyani̱ye nkilungi! Bhaatu kitaani̱ye olaghile bakikonde.’ ”
42013010	Haa kilo kya Sabhato, Yesu eegheeseli̱yagha mu limui mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya.
42013011	Mukali̱ akaba alimu oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kyalamai̱ye kumala myaka eku̱mi̱ na munaanaa. Aakalagha agogomeleeye, taakugubhagha kuununuka ku̱si̱ma.
42013012	Obu Yesu aaboone mukali̱ oghu aamubilikila kumwebinga, amughila ati, “Muhala wanje, bulwaye bwawe obu bwaki̱li̱ye.”
42013013	Makamu̱ku̱mʼo ati du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu aakililʼo. Aanunuka aasi̱ma kandi aatandika kusindila kimui Luhanga.
42013014	Mwebembeli̱ wʼelami̱li̱yo eli aakwatuwa ki̱i̱ni̱gha haabwa Yesu ku̱ki̱li̱ya mukali̱ oghu kilo kya Sabhato. Aaghila bantu abaabaaghamu ati, “Tuli na bilo mukaagha ebi bilaghilo byatu bi̱tu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kukolelamu milimo bu̱li̱ wi̱i̱ki̱. Nahabweki mwisaghe mu bilo ebi kubaki̱li̱ya, bhaatu kilo kya Sabhato bbaa.”
42013015	Mukama aamughila ati, “Ngobi̱ya enu̱we! Buuye tamukusambuulagha nte syanu kedha ndogooi̱ syanu kilo kya Sabhato musitwala kunuwa?
42013016	Nahabwekiini takili kibhi ku̱ki̱li̱ya mukali̱ oni kilo kya Sabhato bbaa! Nanga ni omui mu baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ kandi Si̱taani̱ atuuye amuboheleeye na bulwaye kumala myaka eku̱mi̱ na munaanaa.”
42013017	Yesu akaba makabu̱gha atiyo, abaamuhakani̱yagha boona nsoni̱ syabakwata, bhaatu abataamuhakani̱yagha baadheedheluwa kimui haabwa byakuswekani̱ya ebi aakolagha.
42013018	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga ndabusuusaani̱ya na ki? Kandi ndakoleesi̱ya kyakulolelʼo ki kubusoboololʼo?
42013019	Buli nga kasigho kaa kalatu̱u̱si̱, aka musaasa aatwete, aahela mu musili ghuwe. Kaakula, kafooka kiti kiinamu̱li̱to, ti̱ noni̱ syakwela bisui mu bitai byakiyo.”
42013020	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Nkoleesi̱ye kyakulolelʼo ki kinji kukisusaani̱ya na bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga?
42013021	Buli nga katu̱mbi̱so kati̱i̱ aka mukali̱ aataaye mu ki̱tu̱mbe kya kigaati̱ kiinamu̱li̱to, kandi kaki̱bhi̱mbi̱li̱ya kimui.”
42013022	Obu Yesu aaghendagha e Yelusaalemu, aakwama mu maatau̱ni̱ nʼomu mi̱bhi̱li̱ naaneegheesi̱ya bantu.
42013023	Niibuwo muntu omui aamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mukama wanje, buuye bantu bakee niibo balijunuwa?” Yesu aaghila abamu̱tegheleei̱ye boona ati,
42013024	“Mutʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kutaahila mu mulyango oghubhokaane, nanga mbaghambiiye bakani̱ye balilengʼo kughutaahilamu bhaatu tabaligubha bbaa.
42013025	Ti̱ obu mukama waghuwo aliighalʼo, abaliba mutalimu niibuwo mulitandika kumubilikila nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ni̱mu̱mwesengeleli̱ya muti, ‘Mukama waatu, gutu otuughulile!’ Bhaatu eye alibakuukamu ati, ‘Tanimani̱ye hambali mu̱ku̱lu̱gha.’
42013026	“Mulimughila muti, ‘Twaliyagha hamui naawe, kandi waatwegheeseli̱yagha ewaatu.’
42013027	“Bhaatu alitodha abakuukemu nti, ‘Tambamani̱ye bbaa. Mu̱ndu̱ghʼo nkoli̱ sya bibhi enu̱we!’
42013028	“Ti̱ obu mulibona Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka, Yakobbo, hamui na balangi̱ banji boona bali mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, mulilila kandi mwehi̱ghu̱u̱ye kubhi kwonini haabwa kubona-bona nanga enu̱we kutaba mu bantu aba.
42013029	Bantu batali Bayu̱daaya bali̱lu̱gha bu̱lu̱gha ejooba, bughuwa ejooba, elughulu, na eku̱wa kandi basitame mu bi̱i̱kalo byabo mu ki̱ghenu̱ mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
42013030	Bakani̱ye aba bantu bahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱ endindi baliba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kikee, na bakani̱ye aba bantu baghai̱ye endindi balitunga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.”
42013031	Yesu naanabu̱gha ebi, Bafali̱saayo baamwisʼo, baamughila bati, “Olu̱ghe hani oghende hanji. Helude akubbala kukwita.”
42013032	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mughende mughambile ngobi̱ya ya Helude kandi mubhi oghu muti, ‘Obwalo na munkiya nkubhingʼo bantu bi̱li̱mu̱ kandi nki̱li̱ye balwaye, haa kilo kya kasatu nimaliilile mulimo ghwanje.’
42013033	Nkulaghiluwa kughenda niinakola mulimo ghwanje obwalo, munkiya, na kilo ekikulabhʼo. Taaliyo oghu akunjitila mu kyalo kini bbaa, nanga taaliyo mulangi̱ nʼomui oghu baalaatiiye hanji hoona etali mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu.”
42013034	“Ai̱ enu̱we bantu baa Yelusaalemu, abakwitagha balangi̱ kandi muhuula mabaale bantu Luhanga abatumiiye, nkulengaghʼo kubakumaani̱ya ngoku nkoko ekukumaani̱yagha bwana bwayʼo, bhaatu mubhenga.
42013035	Dheluuni, nkubaleka nga numba etalimu muntu. Mbaghambiiye, tamukutodha kumbona ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu mulyebali̱ya si̱ye nimughila muti ‘Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama.’ ”
42014001	Kilo kya Sabhato kimui, obu Yesu aaghendi̱ye kuliila mwa mwebembeli̱ wa Bafali̱saayo, bantu baakala bamuloleleeye.
42014002	Mu bantu abaabaaghamu, hakaba alimu musaasa alwaye bulwaye bwa ku̱bhi̱mba-kaka.
42014003	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱u̱i̱ye Bafali̱saayo hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo aba ati, “Bilaghilo bi̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye muntu ku̱ki̱li̱ya muunakiye haa kilo kya Sabhato, kedha bbaa?”
42014004	Bhaatu bo baakala baholeei̱ye bhi̱i̱! Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aaku̱mʼo musaasa oghu, aamu̱ki̱li̱ya kandi aamughila ati aghende.
42014005	Niibuwo Yesu aatodhi̱ye aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mwana waawe kedha nte yaawe ni̱yeegengi̱ye mu ki̱i̱na kilo kya Sabhato, okukola ki? Tookukola mulimo ghwa kughibbulamu bwangu?”
42014006	Baatodha baakala baholeei̱ye.
42014007	Obu Yesu aaboone ngoku bamui mu Bafali̱saayo abali haa bu̱ghenu̱ haala bakwete kwekomela ntebe si̱li̱ syonini sya baghenu̱ bakulu, haaniisiyo bakusitamamu, aaha lu̱si̱mo bantu abaabaaghʼo aba ati,
42014008	“Muntu naakubilikiiye haa bu̱ghenu̱ buwe, otaghenda kusitama mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, nanga muntu oghu asobola kuba ali nʼoghu aabilikiiye, oghu akusaai̱ye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
42014009	Muntu oghu akaaku̱ki̱dha, du̱mbi̱ oghu aababilikiiye oghu akwisa akughile ati, ‘Weehi̱ghi̱le oni mu ntebe muni.’ Ti̱ oku̱lu̱ghamu na nsoni̱, oghende ositame mu ki̱i̱kalo kyʼabatali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
42014010	Bhaatu balakakubilikilagha, oghendaghe ositame mu ki̱i̱kalo kyʼabatali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, niikuwo oghu aakubilikiiye akaakwisa, akukughila ati, ‘Wai̱ bhootu̱ syanje, oose eni ositame mu ki̱i̱kalo kisemeeye.’ Du̱mbi̱ naawe oku̱hu̱ta mu baghenu̱ baanakyawe abali haala.
42014011	Nanga weena munakwebhi̱mba-bhi̱mbi̱ya bali̱mu̱bhondi̱ya, kandi oghu akwebundaali̱ya bali̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.”
42014012	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye oghu aamubilikiiye oghu ati, “Olakabaagha oli na bu̱ghenu̱, otabilikilagha baabhootu̱ syawe, baana baa njokowaawe, nganda syawe, kedha baguudha baanakyawe bonkaha. Niwaabilikiiye aba, nabo baliisa kukubilikila haa maghenu̱ ghaabo du̱mbi̱ babe bakusasuuye.
42014013	Bhaatu obu olabaagha oli na bu̱ghenu̱ bwawe, obilikilaghe banaku na balema baa bu̱li̱ mulingo,
42014014	niibuwo olitunga mu̱gi̱sa. Nankabha bo bataakugubha ku̱ku̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱yamu ebyawe, Luhanga alikukola kusemeeye obu bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye bali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka.”
42014015	Obu omui mu bantu abaalyagha na Yesu aba aaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye ebi, aaghila ati, “Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abaliba mu bu̱ghenu̱ bwʼomu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
42014016	Bhaatu Yesu aabatwi̱la lu̱si̱mo luni ati, “Hakaba aliyo musaasa, aateekani̱ja bu̱ghenu̱ buwe, kandi aabilikila bantu bakani̱ye kwisʼo.
42014017	Obu baamali̱ye kuteekani̱ja bu̱li̱ kantu, aatuma mu̱heeleli̱ya wee kughambila aba aabilikiiye ati, ‘Mwise, baateekani̱i̱je bu̱li̱ kantu.’
42014018	“Bhaatu boona baatandika kumughambila byakwekwati̱i̱si̱ya. Wʼoku̱du̱bha aaghila ati, ‘Naaghu̱li̱ye musili ghwanje, nkughenda kughulola; gutu onganile tankwisa.’
42014019	“Onji aaghila ati, ‘Naaghu̱li̱ye nte eku̱mi̱, nkubbala kughenda kusilola silakaba sisemeeye; gutu onganile tankwisa.’
42014020	“Nʼonji niikiyo kimui aaghila ati, ‘Naaleeti̱ye mugholi, nahabweki tankwisa.’ ”
42014021	“Niibuwo mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye, aaghambila mukama wee ebi basaasa aba baabu̱ghi̱ye. Mukama wee aatamuwa, aalaghila mu̱heeleli̱ya wee ati, ‘Oghende bwangu mu nguudhe syona nʼomu buhanda bwi̱si̱ye mu tau̱ni̱, obilikile banaku, baghena-gheneeu̱we, aba maaso ghaaghaaye, na balema.’
42014022	“Obu mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, naakoli̱ye ngʼoku wandaghiiye, bhaatu bantu banaakubulʼo dhee.’
42014023	“Mukama oghu aaghila mu̱heeleli̱ya wee oghu ati, ‘Oghende mu nguudhe nʼomu buhanda bwʼomu kyalo, olengʼo kulola ngu bantu baakani̱ye haa bu̱ghenu̱ bwanje.
42014024	Bhaatu mbaghambiiye, aba naabaagha ndu̱bhi̱ye kubilikila, nʼomui taakuliya byokuliya bya bu̱ghenu̱ bwanje bbaa.’ ”
42014025	Obu Yesu aaghendagha, kiigambi̱ kya bantu bakani̱ye baamukwama. Niibuwo aakebu̱ki̱ye enu̱ma, aabaghila ati,
42014026	“Muntu weena naabbali̱ye kwisa hambali ndi, abhonganuuwe kuleka ese wee na ni̱na wee, mukali̱ wee na baana be, baana baani̱nawee boobusaasa kedha boobukali̱, nankabha bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe bwonini. Ataabaaye atiyo, taakugubha kuba mweghesebuwa wanje.
42014027	Ti̱ weena oghu ataaheeki̱ye musalaba ghuwe ankwama, taakugubha kuba mweghesebuwa wanje bbaa.”
42014028	Yesu eeyongela aabaghila ati, “Dhaani nuwaabbali̱ye kukwela numba, tooku̱dhu̱bha obaliilile muhendo ghwa sente esi ekutwala, olole olakaba oli na syakughimala?
42014029	Nanga nuwaali̱mi̱ye musingi kusa otagubha kughimala, weena oghu akubona musingi oghu akukusekeelela,
42014030	ati, ‘Bhaaba muntu oni kusa akatandika kukwela tooli̱ ataagubha kughimala.’
42014031	“Kedha ni mukama ki, angubbala kulwana na mukama onji, atadu̱bhi̱ye asitama kweli̱li̱kana, obu baasilikale be mutwalo ghumui, balaba mbagubha kwemiliilila oli̱ oghu aasi̱ye na baasilikale mitwalo ebili?
42014032	Naaboone ataakugubha, akutuma bantu kughenda ku̱u̱ghu̱wana nʼoli̱ mu bu̱si̱nge baasilikale bʼoli banaseleeye kimui.
42014033	Niikiyo kimui, weena mu enu̱we oghu ateelekeeseei̱ye byona ebi ali nabiyo, taakugubha kuba mweghesebuwa wanje.
42014034	“Kisula kili na mughaso, bhaatu bu̱nu̱li̱ mbwakihooyemu, buuye bakugubha ku̱bu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yamu bati̱ya?
42014035	Kikuba kitakyali na mughaso ghwona, kuuyʼo kukikuba. “Oghu ali na matui ghaa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa, aaghu̱we.”
42015001	Bwile bumui bakumaani̱ya baa musolo na basi̱i̱si̱ banji baatandika kweku̱maani̱li̱ya hambali Yesu ali ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya.
42015002	Bhaatu Bafali̱saayo na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo abaabaaghʼo batandika kutongana bati, “Bhaaba musaasa oni ni bhootu̱ sya basi̱i̱si̱, kandi akuliyagha nabo.”
42015003	Niibuwo Yesu aabatwi̱li̱i̱ye nsi̱mo kubooleka eki̱leki̱ye naakuukalagha na basi̱i̱si̱, aaghila ati,
42015004	“Mabhu̱u̱le omui mu enu̱we naabaaye ali na ntaama siye ki̱ku̱mi̱ ti̱ emui emubuliilila. Taaku̱ti̱gha si̱li̱ kyenda na mwenda hambali sili, aghende abbale eghi yaabu̱li̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱ya aghiboone?
42015005	Ti̱ naaghiboone akughitwala ewe e ka adheedheeu̱we.
42015006	Maki̱dha du̱mbi̱ abilikile baabhootu̱ siye hamui na baliilanuwa be abaghile ati, ‘Tudheedhuwe nanga naakomi̱ye ntaama yanje eghi yaabaagha ebu̱li̱ye.’
42015007	Niikiyo kimui dhee mu̱si̱i̱si̱ omui neeku̱u̱ki̱yemu, hakubʼo kudheedhuwa kukani̱ye mu eghulu kusaali̱ya bantu kyenda na mwenda abakubhengagha kwekuukamu nanga kwefoola kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
42015008	Aatodha aabaghila ati, “Buuye mukali̱ naabaaye ali na mikwenge yee eku̱mi̱, ti̱ ghumui ghumubuliilila, taakubhaki̱ya taala, eehelele mu numba hoona ku̱hi̱ki̱ya akomi̱ye mukwenge ghuwe oghu?
42015009	Naaghuboone du̱mbi̱, abilikile baabhootu̱ siye hamui na baliilanuwa be abaghile ati, ‘Tudheedhuwe nanga naakomi̱ye mukwenge ghwanje oghwabaagha ghu̱bu̱li̱ye.’
42015010	Niikiyo kimui, mbaghambiiye, baamalai̱ka baa Luhanga bakudheedheluwagha kimui haabwa mu̱si̱i̱si̱ omui oghu akwekuukaghamu.”
42015011	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Hakaba aliyo musaasa ali na batabani̱ be babili.
42015012	Owʼobuto aaghila ese wee ati, ‘Tita, hʼetungo lyona eli oli naliyo eli, ompʼo ebyanje.’ Du̱mbi̱ ese wee oghu aamuhʼo ebiye.
42015013	“Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, mwana oghu aaghu̱li̱ya ebiye byona, aaghenda mu ehanga hambali haseli̱ye, abhi̱hi̱li̱yayo sente esi aahi̱ye mu bintu omu syona mu bi̱si̱mba byakitiyo-kitiyo.
42015014	Neemali̱yo bu̱li̱ kantu aabaagha na ko koona, njala yamaani̱ yaaghuwa mu kyalo eki kyona, atandika kubona-bona.
42015015	Niibuwo aaghendi̱ye eesengeleleli̱ya mutaka wʼomu kyalo eki kumuha mulimo. Aamuha mulimo ghwa ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya mpunu.
42015016	Haabwa muntu nʼomui kutamuha kaakuliya, aatandika kwekumbula kuliya haa byokuliya bya mpunu esi.
42015017	“Niibuwo aatandi̱ki̱ye kweli̱li̱kana ngoku eetwalikani̱i̱ye kubhi, aaghila ati, ‘Njala eli manjitila hani bhaaba, kuni tita ali na bakoli̱ bakani̱ye kandi boona akubahaagha byokuliya bibasaaghilʼo!
42015018	Nkughenda ewaa tita oghu nimughile nti, “Tita, naasi̱i̱si̱i̱ye kimui ewaa Luhanga, kandi naaku̱sobeeleei̱ye kwonini, gutu onganile.
42015019	Tanibhonganuuwe otodhe ongilemu mwana waawe bbaa; hakili onfoole omui mu bakoli̱ baawe.” ’
42015020	Du̱mbi̱ mwana oghu aamuka, aaghenda ewaa ese wee oghu. “Bhaatu anali mu elembo ngʼeli̱, ese wee aamulangi̱ya kandi aamukwatiluwa kisa, du̱mbi̱ aali̱gi̱ta kumwebali̱ya, aahi̱ka aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha.
42015021	“Mwana oghu aaghila ati, ‘Tita, naasi̱i̱si̱i̱ye kimui ewaa Luhanga kandi naaku̱sobeeleli̱ya kwonini. Tanibhonganuuwe otodhe ongilemu mwana waawe. [Hakili onfoole omui mu bakoli̱ baawe.]’
42015022	“Bhaatu mwana oghu atakahendekeei̱ye, ese wee oghu aamwebali̱ya kwonini nga mwana wee, aaghila baheeleli̱ya be ati, ‘Muleete hani bwangu lughoye lusemeeleeye kimui mu̱mu̱lu̱wi̱ke luwo. Mu̱mu̱lu̱wi̱ke mpete mu kyala, kandi mu̱mu̱lu̱wi̱ke nkai̱to.
42015023	Muleete nte enoneeye kimui aaniiyo mwata. Tukole ki̱ghenu̱ kandi tudheedhuwe.
42015024	Mwana wanje oni ali nga muntu akaba aku̱u̱ye aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye kandi akaba abu̱li̱ye, aaboneki̱ye.’ Du̱mbi̱ ki̱ghenu̱ kyatandika.
42015025	“Bwile obu mutabani̱ wa musaasa oghu owʼobukulu akaba anali mu misili naakola. Obu aalu̱ghi̱yeyo neebinga e ka, aaghu̱wa bu̱bi̱na mbwaghooni̱ye e ka ewaabo.
42015026	Niibuwo aabilikiiye omui mu baheeleli̱ya bʼesewee aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, ‘Bu̱bi̱na obu̱ghooni̱ye e ka obu mbwaki?’
42015027	Mu̱koli̱ oghu aamukuukamu ati, ‘Muto waawe niiye aaki̱dhi̱ye, kandi eseenu̱we aalaghiiye twata nte enoneeye kimui, ti̱ ki̱ghenu̱ ekili e ka eghi takili kyabuke. Eseenu̱we adheedheleeu̱we kimui nanga muto waawe aaku̱u̱ki̱ye ali mwomi̱i̱li̱.’
42015028	“Obu mwana wʼobukulu oghu aaghu̱u̱ye atiyo, aasaalililuwa kimui kandi aabhenga na ku̱hi̱ka hambali ki̱ghenu̱ eki kili. Niibuwo ese wee aasi̱ye hambali mwana oghu ali, aatandika ku̱mwesengeleli̱ya ati, ‘Gutu wiise mu ki̱ghenu̱.’
42015029	Bhaatu mwana oghu aabhenga, aaghila ese wee ati, ‘Tita! Ntuuye naawe myaka eghi yoona ni̱nku̱heeleli̱ya. Tankakughayagha mulindi na ghumui. Ti̱ tookampaagha nankabha kabu̱li̱ oti nanje nidheedhuwe na baabhootu̱ syanje.
42015030	Bhaatu mwana waawe oghu aaku̱bhi̱i̱hi̱li̱i̱ye etunga lyawe lyengiiye eghi, aalimalila mu baamalaaya, obu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye, waamwitiiye nte enoneeye kimui!’
42015031	“Ese wee aamughila ati, ‘Mwana wanje, tukuukalagha naawe bu̱li̱ kilo, ti̱ ebyanje byona mbyawe.
42015032	Bhaatu tubhonganuuwe kudheedhuwa kandi kukola ki̱ghenu̱, nanga muto waawe aabaagha aku̱u̱ye, aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye; aabaagha abu̱li̱ye, aaboneki̱ye.’ ”
42016001	Yesu aaghambila beeghesebuwa be lu̱si̱mo lunji ati, “Hakaba aliyo musaasa muguudha; ali na mu̱heeleli̱ya wee oghu aaloleelelagha buguudha buwe obu. Kilo kimui bantu baaghenda baalegha mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu ewaa mukama wee bati akwete ku̱bhi̱i̱ya etungo lya mukama wee oghu.
42016002	Niibuwo aamubilikiiye, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, ‘Onsoboolole, nanga bangambiiye bati okwete ku̱bhi̱i̱ya etungo lyanje. Nkubbala ombalile ngoku waakoleeseei̱ye sente na bintu ebi ololeleeye, nanga tankutodha kukuha mulimo ghwa kuloleelela bintu byanje.’
42016003	“Niibuwo mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu eebu̱u̱i̱ye ati, ‘Mukama wanje alimabhinga si̱ye haa mulimo. Dhelu si̱ye nkughana obwani̱? Tandi na maani̱ ghaa kukolela bantu milimo yamaani̱-maani̱, kandi nsoni̱ sikunkwata kusaba-saba bantu nti bampe bintu.’
42016004	Aaghila ati, ‘Nimani̱ye eki nkukola, niikuwo obu mulimo ghuni ghulankwila, bantu baakale banali baabhootu̱ syanje kandi bampe buukalʼo mu maka ghaabo.’
42016005	“Du̱mbi̱ aabilikila mu ki̱bi̱so bantu, omui-omui, abali na mabanja ghaa mukama wee oghu. Aabu̱u̱li̱ya wʼoku̱du̱bha ati, ‘Oli nʼebanja lya mukama wanje lyengaane haa?’
42016006	“Aamukuukamu ati, ‘Biigalaponi̱ bya mafuta ki̱ku̱mi̱.’ Mu̱koli̱ oghu aamughila ati, ‘Wangu̱hi̱ye, ohandiike oti oli nʼebanja lya biigalaponi̱ maku̱mi̱ ataano.’
42016007	“Aabu̱u̱li̱ya wʼakabili ati, ‘Oli nʼebanja lya mukama wanje lyengaane haa?’ Aamukuukamu ati, ‘Bighegha ki̱ku̱mi̱ bya ngano.’ Aaghila nʼoghu ati, ‘Ohandiike bighegha kinaanaa.’
42016008	“Mu̱heeleli̱ya mu̱ghobi̱ya oghu mukama wee aamusinda haabwa kukola kintu kya magheji kitiyo. Nanga bantu bʼomu nsi muni bali na magheji ghakani̱ye ghaa kukolagana na baanakyabo. Basaai̱ye bantu abahu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga mu kukolangana.
42016009	Niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye nimbaghila nti mu̱koleesi̱ye kusemeeye etungo lyʼomunsi muni kwetungila bu̱u̱bhootu̱, niikuwo obu etungo litahi̱ki̱ye lilibahuwʼo, Luhanga abeebaliye kandi abahe mu eghulu haakuukala bilo nʼebilo.”
42016010	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Muntu ataabaaye mwesighibuwa mu kakee aka bamuhaaye bati akoleesi̱ye, noobu bamuha gbadha-gbadha ya bintu bati abi̱koleesi̱ye taakuba mwesighibuwa bbaa.
42016011	-
42016012	Nahabweki mutaabaaye beesighibuwa mu ku̱koleesi̱ya buguudha bwa munsi muni, Luhanga taakubaha etungo lyanu lyomu eghulu lyamajima.”
42016013	“Taaliyo mu̱heeleli̱ya nʼomui oghu akugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya bakama babili. Akukunda omui, oohe omui, kedha akutʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo ku̱heeleli̱ya omui, aghaye omui. Niikiyo kimui naanu dhee, tamukugubha ku̱heeleli̱ya Luhanga kandi sente.”
42016014	Bafali̱saayo, aba buguudha bwali butwali̱li̱i̱je, obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yesu akwete ku̱bu̱gha, beelolela eli̱ bataabifuwʼo.
42016015	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Enu̱we mu̱kwesemeli̱yagha mu bantu niikuwo babaghile bati muli bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Bhaatu Luhanga eye amani̱ye ngoku mukundiiye kimui sente kusaali̱ya ngoku mu̱mu̱ku̱ndi̱ye. Ebi bantu bakundiiye kimui munsi muni kandi ebibatwali̱li̱i̱je, Luhanga eye taabibbali̱ye bbaa.
42016016	“Bilaghilo na balangi̱ bikabʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aasi̱ye. Ti̱ ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la bwile obu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga niibuwo ghaalangililuwa. Ti̱ bu̱li̱ muntu niibuwo eekamba kubutaahamu na ki̱ku̱bha.
42016017	Eghulu na nsi bilihuwʼo bhaatu taaliyo kaghambo na kamui akali mu bilaghilo akali̱lu̱ghʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kighendeleluwa kyabiyo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
42016018	“Musaasa naabhi̱ngi̱ye mukali̱ wee, aswela onji, akuba asyane, kandi musaasa naasweye mukali̱ oghu eba wee abhi̱ngi̱ye, akuba asyane.”
42016019	Yesu aatodha aaghila ati, “Hakaba haliyo musaasa muguudha oghu akaba atungiiye kimui. Alu̱walagha ngoye sitembeeye kimui. Bu̱li̱ kilo eeghonjelagha kimui ngoku abbali̱ye.
42016020	Haa elembo liye baalangaali̱yaghʼo musaasa munaku li̱i̱na liye Lajaalo. Akaba alwaliiye kimui bibbodhe haa mubili ghuwe ghwona.
42016021	Eekumbulagha kuliya ebyasaaghagha muguudha oghu ebi baakubagha mu kyabbu̱. Ti̱ mbuwa syasagha siikala kulamba-lambila bibbodhe biye ebi.
42016022	“Bwile bwahi̱ka Lajaalo oghu aaku̱wa, baamalai̱ka baasa baamutwala kuukala haai na Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Na muguudha oghu naye aaku̱wa dhee, baamujiika.
42016023	Aaghenda Eku̱li̱mu̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali kubona-bona kutakuhuwaagha. Obu aaloli̱ye, aabona Lajaalo ali hamui na Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
42016024	Niibuwo aabilikiiye nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, ‘Tita Ebbulahi̱mu̱, gutu ongilile kisa, otume Lajaalo akoti̱ye kasonga kaa kyala kiye mu maasi, aghantooni̱ye haa kilimi hakili kimpeheelʼo kati̱i̱, mulilo ghuni niibuwo ghwambona-boneli̱ya kimui.’
42016025	“Bhaatu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, ‘Wai̱, oosuke ngoku waatu̱ngi̱ye bilungi byona ebi waabbalagha, Lajaalo eye naabona-bonela kimui. Bhaatu endindi naye ahumuuye hani, ali na byona ebi akwetaaghisibuwa kandi adheedheleeu̱we kimui. Ti̱ naawe niibuwo waabona-bonela kimui.
42016026	Kandi takili eki kyonkaha, haagati yaatu naawe Luhanga ataayʼo kighona kyamaani̱, niikuwo abakubbala ku̱lu̱gha eni kwisa eghi batagubha, kandi taaliyo wʼewaanu eghi nʼomui oghu akugubha kughulukani̱ya kwisa ewaatu eni bbaa.’
42016027	“Niibuwo musaasa muguudha oghu aatodhi̱ye aaghila ati, ‘Gutu tita, nkwesengeleei̱ye, otume Lajaalo oghu ewaatu ewaa tita,
42016028	nanga naati̱ghi̱yeyo baana baamaaha bataano. Oleke aghende abateelelele beekuukemu bakole ebi̱dheedhi̱ye Luhanga, niikuwo nabo bataliisa mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kubona-bona kini.’
42016029	“Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamukuukamu ati, ‘Baana banjoko waawe bali na ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we Musa na balangi̱, oleke ebi haaliibiyo baaghu̱wa.’
42016030	“Musaasa oghu aatodha aaghila ati, ‘Bbaa, tita Ebbulahi̱mu̱! Muntu naabahi̱ki̱yʼo alu̱ghi̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye, bakwekuukamu.’
42016031	“Bhaatu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aamughila ati, ‘Bataaghu̱u̱ye Musa na balangi̱, tabakunanuka nankabha muntu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye.’ ”
42017001	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Bintu ebikuleeteleja bantu ku̱si̱i̱sa bikulaghiluwa kubʼo. Bhaatu ngalikibona oghu akubileeta.
42017002	Muntu oghu alyehi̱su̱ki̱ya ati hakili nguli baamu̱bohi̱ye ki̱ti̱bo mu bikiya bakiboha haa kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to, bamukuba mu nanja, kukaleka omui mu bato bani naasi̱i̱sa.
42017003	Kandi mwelinde ngoku mukutwalikani̱ya na bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanu. Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja muunakyawe naakusobeleei̱ye, omuhabule eki aasobeei̱ye. Tooli̱ neeku̱u̱ki̱yemu eki aaku̱sobeleei̱ye eki omughanile.
42017004	“Nankabha aku̱sobeeleli̱ya kilo kimui milundi musanju̱, ti̱ bu̱li̱ mulundi akwisʼo naaghila ati, ‘Gutu neeku̱u̱ki̱yemu, onganile,’ omughanilaghe.”
42017005	Niibuwo bakwenda be aba baaghi̱li̱ye Mukama bati, “Otukoonele tube na ku̱ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kusaayʼo.”
42017006	Mukama aakuukamu ati, “Nimwabaaye na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwengaane na kasigho kati̱i̱ kaa kalatu̱u̱si̱, mukughila kiti kiinamu̱li̱to ekili na mi̱li̱ etobheeye muboone eki muti, ‘Odhuuluwe haala osimbuwe mu nanja,’ kikukola kuwo.”
42017007	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Nuwaabaaye oli na mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe, akukukolelagha mu musili kedha aku̱li̱i̱si̱yagha bisolo byawe, naabaaye makaki̱dha ati ku̱lu̱gha mu musili kedha ku̱li̱i̱si̱ya bisolo byawe, du̱mbi̱ wangu̱hi̱ka omughile oti, ‘Oose tuliye’?
42017008	Bbaa, oku̱hi̱ka omulaghile oti, ‘Onteekele, onaabe, olu̱wale kusemeeye, onsembeje ndiye. Nkaakumala kuliya niikuwo naawe oliye.’
42017009	Noobu aku̱u̱ghu̱wa akola ebi waamulaghiiye ebi byona, tooku̱u̱ghu̱wa obhonganuuwe ku̱mu̱si̱i̱ma bwabiyo bbaa.
42017010	Naanu muli nga mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu dhee, mulakamalagha kukola byona ebi Luhanga abalaghiiye kukola, mubhonganuuwe kughilagha muti, ‘Tatukwetaghisibuwa kusi̱i̱mu̱wa, nanga tuli baheeleli̱ya kwonkaha. Twakoli̱ye ebi tulaghiiwe kukola.’ ”
42017011	Obu Yesu aanaghendagha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, aakwamila haa mutaano ghwa di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya na ya Galilaaya.
42017012	Makaki̱dha ati mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghumui, basaasa eku̱mi̱ balwaye ntumbi baasa, baamilila haakpengbu̱ nga hali̱,
42017013	baabilikila nʼelaka lyamaani̱ bati, “Yesu, Mwegheesi̱ya, gutu otughilile kisa!”
42017014	Obu aababoone, aabaghila ati, “Mughende mweyoleke mu bahongi̱ babalole ngoku mwaki̱li̱ye.” Mbanaghenda du̱mbi̱ baakila.
42017015	Omui mu basaasa aba, obu aaboone ngoku aaki̱li̱ye, du̱mbi̱ aakuuka naasinda Luhanga nʼelaka lyamaani̱.
42017016	Aahi̱ka aaghuwa Yesu mu maghulu, kandi aamu̱si̱i̱ma. Musaasa oghu, akaba ali Musamali̱ya.
42017017	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Tanaaki̱li̱i̱ye bantu eku̱mi̱ boona? Ti̱ bali̱ mwenda bali haa?
42017018	Taaliiyo nʼomui oghu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye kwisa ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga, kuuyʼo munamahanga oni enkaha.”
42017019	Niibuwo Yesu aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Oomuke oghende, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
42017020	Kilo kimui bamui mu Bafali̱saayo baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bwile obu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bukubʼo. Aabakuukamu ati, “Bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga obu tabukwisa bantu babuboone bbaa.
42017021	Kandi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kughila ati, ‘Olole mbuni hani!’ Kedha ‘Bu̱li̱ hali̱!’ Nanga bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bubalimu.”
42017022	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Halibʼo bwile obu bantu abampi̱ki̱li̱i̱je balibabona-boneli̱ya kimui haabwanje. Ti̱ bwile obu balyekumbulila kimui bati hakili nguli bamboone niikalʼo nabo kilo kimui bughila, niikuwo batungʼo kasi̱nge, ngʼaka balitunga kilo eki Mwana wa Muntu alikuuka. Bhaatu bwile obu tabalimubona bbaa.
42017023	Bantu baliisa mbabadimaaga bati, ‘Mulole, nguni hani!’ Kedha ‘Ngu̱li̱ hali̱!’ Mutali̱si̱i̱ma ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha.
42017024	Nanga kilo eki Mwana wa Muntu alikuukilamu, bu̱li̱ muntu alimubonela kimui bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngoku bakubonagha nkubha eghi ekubbyokagha ti̱ ebbeneli̱ya kimui kyalo kyona.
42017025	Bhaatu ebi bitakabaayʼo akulaghiluwa kubona-bonela kimui. Nanga bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, bakumubhenga.
42017026	“Obu Mwana wa Muntu aliba ali haai kukuuka, bantu baliba mbakola bintu ngʼebi bantu baakolagha mu bwile obu Nuha aabaagha anaakaaye.
42017027	Bwile obu bantu baakalagha mbaliya, mbanuwa, mbaswela kandi bakali̱ mbasweluwa, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Nuha aataahi̱ye mu bwati̱ buunamu̱li̱to. Luhanga aatooni̱ya mbu̱la ekani̱ye maasi ghaatungeela kyalo kyona bantu aba boona baatwi̱ki̱lamu.
42017028	“Kukuuka kuwe kukuba dhee nga hambele obu Looti̱ aabaagha anaakaaye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Sodomu. Bantu baakalagha mbaliya, mbeesubulila, mbahela ndimo kandi mbekwelela manumba.
42017029	Bhaatu kilo kyonini eki Looti̱ aalu̱ghi̱i̱yemu mu tau̱ni̱ ya Sodomu, mulilo ghwamaani̱ ghwalu̱gha eghulu ghulimu mabaale ghatuumiiye kimui, ghwahwelekeeleli̱ya bantu boona.
42017030	“Niikuwo biliba bitiyo dhee obu Mwana wa Muntu aliba naakuuka. Alikuuka bantu batamwetekani̱li̱i̱je.
42017031	Ti̱ bwile obu muntu oghu aliba ali haa lusui lwa numba yee, atali̱su̱ndu̱ka kutaaha mu numba kuuyamu kantu koona. Kandi oghu aliba ali haa musili atalikuuka eka kwendelayo kantu koona.
42017032	Muusuke ngoku Luhanga aafubiiye mukaa Looti̱ oghu haabwa kulola enu̱ma aasu̱ki̱ye bintu biye.
42017033	Weena oghu akukukutila bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe, akubufeeluwa. Bhaatu weena oghu akubuhaayo haabwanje akubutunga.
42017034	Mbaghambiiye, ti̱ bwile obu, naaku̱u̱ki̱ye mukilo, bantu babili abaliba balangaaye bulili bumui, baamalai̱ka be balitwala omui mu eghulu, bati̱ghʼo omui.
42017035	Naaku̱u̱ki̱ye ntangaali̱, obu bakali̱ babili baliba mbasekula hamui mucele, baamalai̱ka be balitwala omui mu eghulu, bati̱ghʼo omui.” [
42017036	“Kandi obu basaasa babili baliba mbakola hamui haa musili, baamalai̱ka be balitwala omui mu eghulu, bati̱ghʼo omui.”]
42017037	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be aba baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Mukama waatu, ebi biliba haa?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Hambali mu̱ku̱ ghuli, niiho bi̱noni̱ ebikughuliyagha bikwekumaani̱li̱yagha.”
42018001	Yesu aatwi̱la beeghesebuwa be lu̱si̱mo ku̱beegheesi̱ya ngoku babhonganuuwe kuukala mbasaba Luhanga bwile bwona, kandi kutahuwa maani̱.
42018002	Aabaghila ati, “Hakaba aliyo mu̱cu̱ oghu akaba aakaaye mu tau̱ni̱ emui, akaba atoobahi̱ye Luhanga kedha bantu.
42018003	Na mu̱kwi̱si̱ya akaba aakaaye mu tau̱ni̱ eghi dhee. Mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu aakalagha naaghenda ewaa mu̱cu̱ oghu ati amukoonele kijibu kiye, naamughila ati, ‘Gutu, onkingilile ewʼoghu ninyegheleeye.’
42018004	“Mu̱cu̱ oghu aamala bwile bukani̱ye anabhengi̱ye kukoonela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu. Bhaatu haakumaliilila aaghila ati, ‘Noobu ndaba ntakwobaagha Luhanga kedha bantu,
42018005	haabwa mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu kuukala naasa kuntalibani̱ja bwile bwona, nkumukolela eki akubbala, ataliisa anjiyamu mu̱li̱mu̱!’ ”
42018006	Niibuwo Mukama Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mweli̱li̱kanʼo bhyani eki mu̱cu̱ mubhi oghu aabu̱ghi̱ye eki.
42018007	Ti̱ buuye Luhanga taakusaali̱yʼo kukoonela bantu aba aakomi̱yemu kandi abakumusabagha bwile bwona? Mu̱kweli̱li̱kana muti akumala bwile bukani̱ye atakabakooneeye? Bbaa!
42018008	Muleke mbaghambile kini: bwile bwonini obu buliba mbwahi̱ki̱ye, Luhanga alibakoonela bwangu. Bhaatu Mwana wa Muntu obu alikuuka, buuye alisanga bantu banamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je?”
42018009	Kilo kinji Yesu aatodha aatwi̱la lu̱si̱mo bantu abeeyetagha kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi baghaya bantu banji.
42018010	Aaghila ati, “Basaasa babili bakaghenda mu Numba ya Luhanga kusaba. Omui akaba ali Mufali̱saayo, onji ali mukumaani̱ya wa musolo.
42018011	Mufali̱saayo aamilila haakpengbu̱ nga hali̱, aatandika kusabila haa mutima neepanka ati, ‘Nku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga, nanga si̱ye kutaba mu̱si̱i̱si̱ nga bantu banji. Tandi na mululu kedha bu̱ghobi̱ya, kandi tandi mu̱syani̱ nga bantu banji. Nku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma nanga si̱ye tandi mu̱si̱i̱si̱ nga mukumaani̱ya wa musolo oghu.
42018012	Mu wi̱i̱ki̱ nku̱si̱i̱baghamu bilo bibili, kandi nkuhaaghayo kimui kyeku̱mi̱ kyʼebi nkutungagha.’
42018013	Bhaatu mukumaani̱ya wa musolo aamilila haakpengbu̱ nga hali̱, aselaanʼo na Mufali̱saayo oghu, eetu̱li̱ka kandi eeku̱mbata. Aasaba naaghila ati, ‘Luhanga nkwesengeleei̱ye, gutu onganile si̱ye mu̱si̱i̱si̱ oghu asaalukaane.’ ”
42018014	“Mbaghambiiye majima, mukumaani̱ya wa musolo oghu niiye akaghenda ewe naabaluwa kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, oli̱ eye bbaa. Nanga weena munakwebhi̱mba-bhi̱mbi̱ya bali̱mu̱bhondi̱ya, kandi oghu akwebundaali̱ya bali̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.”
42018015	Bantu baaleetela Yesu baana baabo nkelembe bati abaku̱mʼo. Obu beeghesebuwa be baaboone babyaye baa baana aba mbabaleeta, baabatanuka.
42018016	Bhaatu Yesu aaghila ati baleete baana aba hambali ali, aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Muleke baana aba banjisʼo, mutabatanga. Nanga abali nga baana bani niibo baliba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
42018017	Mbaghambiiye majima, muntu weena ataasi̱i̱mi̱ye bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga nga mwana, taakubutaahamu bbaa.”
42018018	Mu̱lemi̱ omui Mu̱yu̱daaya, aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya mulungi, nkole ki niikuwo ntunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo?”
42018019	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Wangi̱li̱yemu mulungi nangaaki? Taaliyo muntu mulungi nʼomui, kuuyʼo Luhanga enkaha.
42018020	Omani̱ye bilaghilo bini: Otali̱syana, otaliita, otaliibha, otalihabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya muunakyawe, ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe.”
42018021	Musaasa oghu aakuukamu Yesu ati, “Ebi byona nkabikwata ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la mu bwana.”
42018022	Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye musaasa oghu naabu̱gha atiyo, aamughila ati, “Oti̱ghaai̱ye kukola kintu kinji kimui kyonkaha, oghende oghu̱li̱ye bintu byawe byona, sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu osihe banaku, wiise onkwame, olitungila buguudha mu eghulu.”
42018023	Bhaatu obu musaasa oghu aaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabu̱gha atiyo, aasaaliluwa kimui nanga akaba atungiiye kimui.
42018024	Obu Yesu aaboone ngoku musaasa oghu asaaluuwe, aakala amuloleleeye, aamughila ati, “Ngakitimbiikilaane kimui baguudha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga!
42018025	Kidhooteeye kimui ngamila kusaalila mu kahulu kaa nkinjo kusaali̱ya muguudha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
42018026	Abaaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baaghila bati, “Buuye, ni ani̱ akugubha kujunuwa?”
42018027	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Eki bantu bataakugubha, Luhanga akukigubha.”
42018028	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Ebyatu byona tukabi̱ti̱gha twakukwama.”
42018029	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, muntu weena oghu aku̱ti̱gha ka yee, mukali̱ wee, baana baani̱na wee, babyaye be, baana be, haabwa kugbatikani̱ya bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga,
42018030	akumuha bintu bikaniiye kimui anali munsi muni kusaali̱ya ebi aati̱ghi̱ye ebi, ti̱ mu bwile buliisa atunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.”
42018031	Yesu aatwala beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili haakpengbu̱, aabaghila ati, “Tulimakoma kughenda Yelusaalemu hambali ebi balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye bati bikubʼo Mwana wa Muntu bikumubeelʼo.
42018032	Akuheebuwayo mu balemi̱ batali Bayu̱daaya, abakumuwawaani̱ya, bamubbaaki̱i̱si̱ye, kandi bamu̱twi̱le matanta.
42018033	Bakumuhuulila kimui kandi bamwite, bhaatu haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.”
42018034	Bhaatu beeghesebuwa be aba baasaaghuwa kwetegheeleli̱ya ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye ebi. Bataakenga eki bikumani̱i̱si̱ya, nahabweki bataamanya eki Yesu aabu̱ghaghʼo kyonini.
42018035	Yesu naaneebinga tau̱ni̱ ya Yeli̱ko, musaasa aaghaaye maaso akaba asitami̱ye haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe, naasaba-saba bantu.
42018036	Musaasa oghu akaba makaaghu̱wa kiigambi̱ kya bantu nkisaala, aabu̱u̱li̱ya abamuli haai ebikwete kulehukana.
42018037	Bamui mu bantu aba baamughila bati, “Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ niiye alimasaala.”
42018038	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aatandika kugugangana ati, “Yesu! Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱! Gutu ongilile kisa!”
42018039	Bantu abaabaagha bahikiiye Yesu baatandika kutanga musaasa oghu bati aholi̱ye. Bhaatu eeyongelela kimui kugugangana ati, “Muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱, ongilile kisa!”
42018040	Yesu eemilila aaghila abaabaagha haai na musaasa oghu ati bamuleete hambali. Obu baamuleeti̱ye, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati,
42018041	“Okubbala nkukolele ki?” Musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama, nkubbala mbone!”
42018042	Yesu aamughila ati, “Obone! Ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe kwaku̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
42018043	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aabonelʼo, kandi aaghenda akweme Yesu, naanasindila kimui Luhanga. Ti̱ bantu boona abaaboone ngoku musaasa oghu aaki̱li̱ye, baasinda Luhanga.
42019001	Yesu naanaghenda mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, aaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ Yeli̱ko.
42019002	Mu tau̱ni̱ eghi hakaba haliyo mukulu wa bakumaani̱ya baa musolo, li̱i̱na liye Jakaayo, kandi akaba atungiiye kimui.
42019003	Aabbalagha kubona Yesu, bhaatu haabwa ku̱di̱i̱da, ataagubha haabwa bantu kukana.
42019004	Niibuwo aali̱gi̱ti̱ye mu maaso hambali Yesu akusaalila, aani̱i̱na mu kiti musikamooli̱ niikuwo abone bhyani Yesu.
42019005	Obu Yesu aahi̱ki̱ye mu nti̱na ya kiti eki, aalola eghulu, aaghila ati, “Jakaayo, osu̱ndu̱ke, obwalo nkulaghiluwa kuliila mwawe.”
42019006	Du̱mbi̱ Jakaayo oghu aasu̱ndu̱ka bwangu-bwangu, eebali̱ya Yesu adheedheeu̱we.
42019007	Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo baaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabu̱gha atiyo kandi naatandika kughendayo, baatamuwa. Baaghila bati, “Alimaghenda mwa mu̱si̱i̱si̱ nangaaki?”
42019008	Obu baanaliyagha, Jakaayo oghu aamilila, aaghila Mukama ati, “Mukama wanje, nkughenda kuha banaku kimui kyakabili kya etunga lyanje. Nkaakuba ninaanaaghi̱ye muntu weena, nku̱mu̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱yamu milundi enaa.”
42019009	Yesu aaghila ati, “Obwalo kujunuwa kwasi̱ye mu numba muni. Nanga musaasa oni naye ni muusukulu wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
42019010	Kandi Mwana wa Muntu akaasa munsi kubbala kandi kujuna ababu̱li̱ye.”
42019011	Obu bantu abaaghendagha na Yesu e Yelusaalemu baali banategheleei̱ye ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya, kandi bali haai ku̱ki̱dhayo, baatandika kweli̱li̱kana bati bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga buli haai kubʼo. Aatandika ku̱bu̱gha nabo mu lu̱si̱mo.
42019012	Aabaghila ati, “Musaasa bahu̱ti̱i̱ye eeteekani̱jagha kubunga mu ehanga linji hambali baaghendagha kumujweka bukama, niikuwo akuuke aase aleme ehanga lyabo eli.
42019013	Atakaghendi̱ye, aabilikila baheeleli̱ya be eku̱mi̱, aaha bu̱li̱ omui mina emui. Aabaghila ati, ‘Mu̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱ye sente esi ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nku̱u̱ki̱ye.’ Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda.
42019014	“Bantu bʼomu ehanga liye eli bakaba bamwohi̱ye, nahabweki baatuma bamui mu baabhootu̱ syabo ewaa mu̱lemi̱ mukulu kumughila bati, ‘Tatubbali̱ye musaasa oghu kuba mukama waatu.’
42019015	“Bhaatu mu̱lemi̱ mukulu aanaha musaasa oghu bukama bwʼehanga eli. Obu musaasa oghu aaku̱u̱ki̱ye, makaki̱dha ati, aabilikila baheeleli̱ya be aba aati̱ghi̱i̱ye sente kwisa hambali ali, niikuwo amanye esi baaghobi̱ye.
42019016	“Obu aaki̱dhi̱ye, wʼoku̱du̱bha aasa, aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, mina wanti̱ghi̱i̱ye yaghobi̱ye milundi eku̱mi̱.’
42019017	“Mukama wee oghu aamughila ati, ‘Weebale, mu̱heeleli̱ya mulungi! Nanga waabaaye mwesighibuwa mu bikee, okuba mu̱lemi̱ wa tau̱ni̱ eku̱mi̱.’
42019018	“Waakabili aasa, aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, mina wanti̱ghi̱i̱ye yaghobi̱ye milundi etaano.’
42019019	“Mukama wee aamughila ati, ‘Okuba mu̱lemi̱ wa tau̱ni̱ etaano.’
42019020	“Niibuwo mu̱heeleli̱ya onji naye aasi̱ye, aaghila ati, ‘Mukama wanje, mina wanti̱ghi̱i̱ye ngini. Nkaghiboha mu katambaala, naaghibiika.
42019021	Nkakwobaha nanga otimbiikaane kandi okubbalagha maghobo ghʼebi otakoli̱ye, kandi okesa ebi otaaheli̱ye.’
42019022	“Mukam wee aamughila ati, ‘Oli mu̱heeleli̱ya mubhi! Nku̱ku̱twi̱la musango kusighikila mu ebi waabu̱ghi̱ye. Okamanya ngoku ntimbiikaane, nkubbalagha maghobo ghʼebi ntakoli̱ye, kandi nkesa ebi ntaaheli̱ye.
42019023	Nkiki kyaleki̱ye sente syanje esi, otaasiha abaku̱si̱su̱u̱bu̱li̱yagha, niikuwo makuuka nsanga si̱ghobi̱ye?’
42019024	“Niibuwo mukama oghu aaghi̱li̱ye baheeleli̱ya be ati, ‘Mumuuyʼo mina eghi, mughihe oghu ali na mina eku̱mi̱.’
42019025	“Baamughila bati, ‘Mukama, eye asangu̱u̱we ali na mina eku̱mi̱!’
42019026	“Aabakuukamu ati, ‘Mbaghambiiye, oghu ali na kantu niiye akwongeluwʼo, bhaatu oghu atali na kantu, nʼaka ali nako kakumuuhibuwʼo.
42019027	Bhaatu ngi̱ghu̱ syanje syona, abambhengi̱ye kuba mukama wabo, mubaleete hani kandi mubaate ninabaloli̱ye.’ ”
42019028	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aabahikila aakoma kughenda Yelusaalemu.
42019029	Aaki̱dha haai na mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbetaniya na ghwa Bbeti̱faage haa mwena Oli̱va. Niibuwo aatu̱mi̱ye babili mu beeghesebuwa be,
42019030	naaghila ati, “Mughende mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu tuli haai ku̱ki̱dhamu oghu mukuba makaghu̱ki̱dhamu, mukusanga kyana kya ndogooi̱ eki muntu atakani̱i̱ni̱yʼo, mukisambuule mukindeetele.
42019031	Ti̱ muntu naababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, ‘Mukukisambuula nangaaki?’ Mumughile muti, ‘Mukama waatu akukibbala.’ ”
42019032	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa babili aba baaghendi̱ye mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu, baasanga kyana kya ndogooi̱ ngoku Yesu aabaghambiiye.
42019033	Mbanakisambuula, bakama baakiyo baababona, baasa baabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa aba bati, “Mukwete kusambuula kyana kya ndogooi̱ eki nangaaki?”
42019034	Beeghesebuwa aba baabakuukamu bati, “Mukama waatu akukibbala.”
42019035	Obu baaki̱ki̱dhi̱i̱ye hambali Yesu ali, baala bimui haa bi̱lu̱walo byabo haa mughongo ghwakiyo, baamu̱ni̱i̱ni̱yʼo.
42019036	Yesu anasitami̱ye haa kyana kya ndogooi̱ eki naaneebinga Yelusaalemu, bantu baala bimui haa bi̱lu̱walo byabo mu luguudhe hansi niikuwo kilubhatangilʼo.
42019037	Naanahona ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena Oli̱va, ali haai ku̱ki̱dha Yelusaalemu. Niibuwo kiigambi̱ kyamaani̱ kya beeghesebuwa be baatandi̱ki̱ye kugolela kimui mbasinda Luhanga badheedheeu̱we haabwa byakuswekani̱ya byona ebi baaboone Yesu naakola.
42019038	Baagolagha mbaghila bati, “Ali na mu̱gi̱sa mukama oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama! Endindi habʼo mpempa yonkaha mu eghulu, ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kibe ewaa Mukama wa eghulu munu!”
