42019039	Niibuwo bamui mu Bafali̱saayo abaabaagha mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki, baaghi̱li̱ye Yesu bati, “Otanuke beeghesebuwa baawe baholi̱ye.”
42019040	Bhaatu Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mbaghambiiye, mbaanaholeei̱ye, mabaale agha ghakutandika kugola.”
42019041	Obu Yesu aahi̱ki̱ye haai-haai na kibugha kya Yelusaalemu naakilangi̱ya, mali̱gha ghamutoona haabwa kibugha eki na bantu baamu. Aaghila ati,
42019042	“Nguli obwalo waabaagha omani̱ye ekukuleetela mpempa! Bhaatu tookiboone bbaa.
42019043	Nanga bwile bukwisa obu ngi̱ghu̱ syawe, baku̱kweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, bakwegimbe, babalwani̱i̱si̱ye, ti̱ tamukubona butwelo.
42019044	Baku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kibugha kyanu kini kandi babatwi̱le kimui enu̱we boona. Taaliyo numba nʼemui eghi eku̱ti̱ghala yʼemiliiye bbaa. Mu̱ku̱twi̱ka mutiyo nanga mwabhengi̱ye oghu Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye kubajuna.”
42019045	Yesu aaki̱dha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu. Haanu̱ma ya bwile, aaghenda mu emui haa bbalaaji sya Numba ya Luhanga. Aatandika kubhinga boona abaaghu̱li̱li̱yaghamu bintu.
42019046	Aabaghila ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Numba yanje elabaagha numba ya kusabilamu,’ bhaatu enu̱we mwaghifooye ki̱i̱kalo kya basuma.”
42019047	Kutandikila bwile obu, Yesu aatandika kughenda bu̱li̱ kilo mu Numba ya Luhanga kwegheesi̱ya bantu. Niibuwo bakulu baa bahongi̱, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, hamui na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baatandi̱ki̱ye kweli̱li̱kana mulingo bakukwata Yesu niikuwo bamwite.
42019048	Bhaatu baabuluwa kahanda kaakumwitilamu, nanga bantu boona baakalagha hambali Yesu ali, kandi ebi eegheesi̱yagha bibadheedheeye kimui.
42020001	Kilo kimui, obu Yesu eegheesi̱yagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, kandi naatebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye, bakulu baa bahongi̱, beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baamwisʼo.
42020002	Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Otughambile bu̱toki̱ oli na buwo kukola ebi byona, kandi bu̱toki̱ obu ni ani̱ aakuhaaye buwo?”
42020003	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ndimababu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kimui, nkubbala mukinkuukemu.
42020004	Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ akaaya haa bu̱toki̱ bwa kubati̱ja? Bukalu̱gha mu eghulu kedha mu bantu?”
42020005	Niibuwo baatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Tumukuukemu tu̱ti̱ya? Ntwamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu tuti Luhanga niiye akamuha buwo, akutughila ati, ‘Ti̱ ekyaleki̱ye mutaahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yohaana oghu nkiki?’
42020006	Kandi ntwaghi̱li̱ye tuti bantu niibo baamuhaaye buwo, bantu bani bakutusaalililuwa, kandi batuhuule mabaale batwite, nanga bantu bakaniiye kimui bamani̱ye ngoku Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabaagha mulangi̱ kwonini.”
42020007	Niibuwo baamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu bati, “Tatumani̱ye hambali bwalu̱ghi̱ye.”
42020008	Yesu naye aabaghila ati, “Kwesi̱i̱ni̱ nanje tankubaghambila oghu ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kukola ebi nkwete kukola.”
42020009	Yesu aatwi̱la bantu boona abaabaaghʼo lu̱si̱mo ati, “Hakaba aliyo musaasa aahela musili ghuwe ghwa bi̱ghu̱ma mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, aaghu̱ti̱ghi̱la bakoli̱ be, eye aaghenda mu ehanga linji hambali haseli̱ye kumalayo bwile bukani̱ye.
42020010	Obu bwile bwa kukobha bi̱ghu̱ma ebi bwahi̱ki̱ye aatuma omui mu baheeleli̱ya be aba ati bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba bamuhe haa bi̱ghu̱ma byʼomu musili ghuwe oghu. Bhaatu bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baahuula oghu aatu̱mi̱ye oghu kandi baamubhinga magi̱la kantu.
42020011	Mukama wa musili oghu aatodha aatuma onji, nʼoghu bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baamuhuula kandi baamuwaawaani̱li̱ya kimui, naye baamubhinga magi̱la kantu.
42020012	Aatodha, aatuma waakasatu, dhelu oghu eye baamuhuulila kimui baamwati̱ya lubaale, kandi baamubhinga mu musili oghu.
42020013	“Niibuwo mukama wa musili oghu eebu̱u̱i̱ye ati, ‘Nkole ki?’ Nahabweki eeli̱li̱kana ati, ‘Eki nkukola, nkutumayo mutabani̱ wanje oghu nkundiiye kimui, kedha oghu eye baku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya!’ Aamutuma, aaghendayo.
42020014	“Bhaatu obu bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba baamuboone, baahanuula kyakukola, baaghila bati, ‘Oghu niiye bakwisa kugweta musili ghuni, nahabweki muleke tumwite niikuwo tughutwalile kimui!’
42020015	Baamughwilikiilila na ki̱ku̱bha, baamu̱twesi̱ya mu musili oghu, baamwita.” Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Mabhu̱u̱le mukama wa musili oghu alikola ati̱ya bapangi̱i̱si̱ya aba?
42020016	“Ali̱hi̱ka alaghile ati baate bapangi̱i̱si̱ya babhi aba boona, kandi musili oghu aghukwati̱ye bantu banji.” Obu bantu abaabaaghʼo baaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabu̱gha atiyo, baaghila bati, “Tu̱ki̱i̱ghwi̱le hala!”
42020017	Yesu aabalola tonono, aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Buuye kitaabaaye kitiyo, Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikumani̱i̱si̱yagha ki obu bikughilagha biti, “ ‘Ebaale eli bakweli̱ baabhengi̱ye, niiliyo lyahaghi̱ki̱ye numba kusaali̱ya ghanji ghoona’?
42020018	Weena oghu alyegengela ebaale eli ali̱twi̱ka-twi̱ka, kandi oghu ebaale eli lilyegengela alikpeetaaguka.”
42020019	Bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baamanya ngoku aaniibo Yesu aatwi̱li̱i̱ya lu̱si̱mo olu. Baabbala kumukwata bwile obu bwonini. Bhaatu boobaha bantu abaabaaghʼo.
42020020	Bantu aba baakala mbanabbala kahanda kaa kumukwatilamu. Baamutumʼo bantu ku̱mwohi̱ya abeefoolagha kuba balungi kuni ni ngi̱ghu̱ si̱ye. Bantu aba baabbalagha bati Yesu abu̱ghe kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye niikuwo bamunyegheelele bati aatu̱u̱ye bilaghilo bya bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma.
42020021	Nahabweki abaamwohi̱yagha aba baaghenda, baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, tumani̱ye ngoku oku̱bu̱ghagha majima ghonkaha, okwegheesi̱yagha ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye. Bantu boona okubengana-ngani̱yagha, kandi okwegheesi̱yagha majima ghoonini ghʼebi Luhanga akubbalagha ati bantu bakole.
42020022	Otughambile buuye ki̱hi̱ki̱ye kusighikila mu bilaghilo etu̱we Bayu̱daaya kuha musolo ghwa Mukama wa Looma kedha bbaa?”
42020023	Yesu aamanya ngoku bakubbala ku̱mwohi̱ya, aabaghila ati,
42020024	“Munjoleke mukwenge oghu mukuhaaghamu musolo.” Baamuhaaghuwo, niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Kisasani̱ na li̱i̱na ebili haa mukwenge ghuni ni byani̱?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Ni bya Kai̱saali̱.”
42020025	Aabaghila ati, “Kwesi̱i̱ni̱ ebya Kai̱saali̱ mubihe Kai̱saali̱ nʼebya Luhanga mubihe Luhanga.”
42020026	Bantu aba baasaaghuwa kwohi̱ya Yesu ku̱bu̱gha kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye mu maaso ghaa bantu boona. Kyakutodha ku̱bu̱gha kyababula, nanga bakaba banasweki̱ye haabwa eki aabaku̱u̱ku̱yemu.
42020027	Bamui mu Basadukaayo abaaghilagha bati bantu tabali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, baasa baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati,
42020028	“Mwegheesi̱ya, Musa akahandiika mu bilaghilo ati musaasa naasweye mukali̱, ti̱ musaasa oghu aku̱wa atabyayʼo mukali̱ oghu mwana, mwana waani̱na musaasa oghu aswele mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu niikuwo abyalile mwana waani̱na wee oghu baana.
42020029	Hakaba aliyo banaani̱na emui musanju̱. Mukulu wabo aaswela mukali̱, bhaatu aaku̱wa atamubyayʼo mwana.
42020030	Oghu amulabhi̱ye aaswela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu, bhaatu naye aaku̱wa atamubyayʼo mwana.
42020031	Mwana waani̱nabo waakasatu naye aaswela mu̱kwi̱si̱ya oghu, naye aaku̱wa dhee. Banaani̱na emui musanju̱ aba boona baaku̱wa batabyayʼo mukali̱ oghu mwana.
42020032	Haakumaliilila mukali̱ oghu naye aaku̱wa.
42020033	Buuye obu Luhanga ali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la bantu boona, mukali̱ oghu aliba mukaa ani̱? Nanga boona musanju̱ bakamuswelʼo.”
42020034	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Bantu abali munsi muni bo bakuswelagha kandi basweluwa.
42020035	Bhaatu aba Luhanga abbali̱ye ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la kandi kuukala nabo munsi ya bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye boona, tabaliswela kedha kusweluwa bbaa.
42020036	Baliba nga Baamalai̱ka abatalikuwa. Baliba baana baa Luhanga haabwa kubahu̱mbu̱u̱la.
42020037	Kandi tukugubha kumanya ngu baku̱u̱ye bali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka, nanga Musa hambele obu aaboone kiti nkyakamu mulilo, aaki̱gu̱mi̱ya ati Mukama ni Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga wa I̱saka, kandi Luhanga wa Yakobbo.
42020038	Eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu noobu balaba mbaaku̱u̱ye hambele, banaakulami̱yagha Luhanga, nanga ewaa Luhanga bantu be boona baakaaye.”
42020039	Bamui mu beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo batali Basadukaayo, baaghila Yesu bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, waaku̱u̱ki̱yemu kusemeeye!”
42020040	Bwile obu taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akatodha aalengʼo ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo kyona.
42020041	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya bantu abaabaagha bamu̱tegheleei̱ye ati, “Beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo bakwegheesi̱yagha bati Ki̱li̱si̱to ni muusukulu wa Dhau̱dhi̱ nangaaki?
42020042	Kuni mu kitabo kya Jabbu̱li̱ Dhau̱dhi̱ eenini akaghila ati, “ ‘Mukama aaghila Mukama ati, “Ositame haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwanje
42020043	ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndifoola ngi̱ghu̱ syawe katebe kaa bighele byawe.” ’
42020044	Buuye Dhau̱dhi̱ eenini obu alaba naaghi̱li̱ye ati Ki̱li̱si̱to ni Mukama wee. Mukama oghu akugubha ati̱ya kuba muusukulu wee?”
42020045	Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba boona baabaagha banategheleei̱ye Yesu, aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati,
42020046	“Mwelinde beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, bakubungagha balu̱wete biigandulo bijambi̱ye kwoleka ngoku bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Ti̱ mbaaba bali mu butale, babbala bantu babalamu̱ki̱ye babahu̱ti̱i̱ye. Mu malami̱li̱yo nʼomu maghenu̱, babbala kusitama mu ntebe sya bi̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
42020047	Bakulombaagaghʼo bakwi̱si̱ya etungo lyabo, beetwalila manumba ghaabo, kandi beesabi̱i̱si̱ya nsaala sijambi̱ye kwesemeli̱ya mu bantu. Bo balitunga kifubilo kyamaani̱.”
42021001	Obu Yesu aabaagha anali mu Numba ya Luhanga, aakala aloli̱ye ngoku baguudha bakwete kuta sente sikani̱ye mu eki baataaghamu bisembo.
42021002	Aabona na mukali̱ mu̱kwi̱si̱ya munaku naasa, naatamu bukwenge bubili.
42021003	Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye bantu abaabaaghamu ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima, mu̱kwi̱si̱ya munaku oghu aataayemu kusaali̱ya bantu boona.
42021004	Nanga banji boona baataayemu ebibasaaghiliiye. Bhaatu eye mu bunaku buwe, aataayemu koona aka aabaagha nako. Taati̱ghaai̱ye kantu koona kaa kumulinda!”
42021005	Bamui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baatandika kusinda Numba ya Luhanga ngoku baaghi̱kwei̱ye mabaale ghasemeeye haabwa bisembo bantu baahongelagha Luhanga. Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati,
42021006	“Muboone Numba ya Luhanga esemeeye eghi, bwile bu̱li̱hi̱ka obu balighiseesa yoona, kandi taaliyo ebaale na limui eli̱li̱ti̱ghala haagu̱u̱li̱ ya liinakyaliyo!”
42021007	Niibuwo bamui mu beeghesebuwa be aba baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya otughambile, manumba agha balighaseesa dhi̱? Kandi nkaakulolelʼo ki kali̱du̱bha kubʼo kwoleka ngu bali haai kughaseesa?”
42021008	Aabakuukamu ati, “Mwelinde, kandi mutali̱si̱i̱ma muntu nʼomui kubahabi̱i̱si̱ya. Nanga bantu bakani̱ye baliisa bu̱li̱ omui neeghilamu ati, ‘Ni̱i̱si̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to.’ Kandi balighila bati, ‘Mpelo eli haai ku̱hi̱ka!’ Nahabweki mutali̱si̱i̱ma ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha.
42021009	Ti̱ noobu mu̱li̱i̱ghu̱wa makulu ghaa bulemo kedha butabanguko, mutalyobaha. Ebi niibiyo bi̱li̱du̱bha kubʼo. Bhaatu mpelo yoonini eliba etakahi̱ki̱ye.”
42021010	Aatodha aabaghila ati, “Mahanga ghalilwana na mahanga ghaanakyaghʼo, na makama ghalilwana na makama ghaanakyaghʼo.
42021011	Mi̱si̱ki̱ eli̱dhi̱ngi̱ya mu bi̱i̱kalo bikani̱ye. Njala yamaani̱ elighwila bantu mu bi̱i̱kalo bikani̱ye. Halibʼo ndwala sihingulaane. Kandi bwakulolelʼo bwamaani̱ obulileka bantu boobahe buliboneka mu mwanya.
42021012	“Bhaatu kubona-bona oku kutakabaayʼo, bantu balibakwata kandi bababona-boni̱ye. Bamui mu enu̱we balibatwala na ki̱ku̱bha mu kooti̱ syʼomu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya, kandi babate mu nkomo. Bamui mu enu̱we balibatwala kubatongani̱ya mu bakama baa bu̱li̱ mulingo haabwanje.
42021013	Oghuuni ghuliba ghuli mu̱gi̱sa ghwanu kuba nimumpeela buukai̱so.
42021014	Ti̱ bwile obu muneesighe, kandi bya ku̱bu̱gha bitalibatu̱ntu̱li̱ya.
42021015	Nanga bwile obu ni̱i̱si̱ye ndibaha magheji na bintu ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱gha, niikuwo atabʼo muntu nʼomui mu ngi̱ghu̱ syanu oghu aligubha kubasi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya musango ati mwahaaye bisubha.
42021016	Bamui mu enu̱we abalibahayo mu ngi̱ghu̱ syanu kubakwata ni babyaye baanu, baana baa ni̱naanu̱we, nganda syanu na baabhootu̱ syanu, kandi baliita bamui mu enu̱we.
42021017	Bantu boona balyoha enu̱we haabwanje.
42021018	Ti̱ noobu balibaata tabaligubha ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya myoyo yaanu bbaa, nanga Luhanga aghi̱li̱ndi̱ye kusemeeye.
42021019	Bhaatu oghu aliikala anagu̱mi̱si̱li̱i̱je, alijuna bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe.”
42021020	Yesu aatodha aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Obu mulibona baasilikale beeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, mumanye ngoku bali haai ku̱ki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya.
42021021	Ti̱ bwile obu bamui mu enu̱we abaliba banali mu Bu̱yu̱daaya baalukile bwangu mu myena. Abaliba banali mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu eki baki̱lu̱ghemu bwangu, kandi abaliba batakilimu bwile obu, batalilengʼo kukikuukamu.
42021022	Naabaghambiiye eki nanga bwile obu niibuwo Luhanga alifubila ngi̱ghu̱ siye haabwa kumujeemela. Kifubilo eki ki̱li̱i̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya byona ebi balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye hambele mu Byahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we.
42021023	Ti̱ bwile obu bakali̱ baku̱li̱i̱ye nʼabakwonki̱ya baana ngabalikibona! Na Bantu boona abali mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu balibona-bonela kimui, nanga Luhanga aliba asaaliluuwe kimui kandi naafubila Bayu̱daaya.
42021024	Baasilikale aba balilwana kandi baate Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye na bihiyo. Balitwala bakani̱ye mu mahanga bali banyankomo. Bantu baa mahanga agha balibona-boneli̱ya kimui bantu abali mu Yelusaalemu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Luhanga eenini aahi̱yʼo batali Bayu̱daaya bu̱toki̱ obu.”
42021025	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Bwakulolelʼo bwamaani̱ buliboneka haa musana, kweli̱, na nsooli̱ya. Bintu ebi bilyoleka ngu kintu kyamaani̱ kili haai kubʼo. Bantu abali munsi yoona balyobaha kandi batuntulile kimui, ti̱ balibuluwa kya kukola nanga maananja ghoona ghaliba ghasuliiye kimui, ngagolela kimui na mighina yagho neesamba bi̱si̱yo.
42021026	Bantu balyobahila kimui na banji balekeele haabwa kubona ngoku bintu bya kabhi kaamaani̱ bikwete kulehukana munsi. Nanga bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekili eghulu mu mwanya kilidhinga-dhinga.
42021027	Niibuwo bantu boona balibona Mwana wa Muntu naasila mu kicu na bu̱toki̱ kandi ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱.
42021028	Ti̱ beeghesebuwa banje balikabona bintu ebi mbyatandika kubʼo, bagumile mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo, kandi badheedheluwe kimui banaloli̱ye eghulu, balindiliiye ekikubʼo. Nanga bintu ebi biliba mbyoleka ngoku Luhanga ali haai kubacungula.”
42021029	Kubooleka ebilibʼo, Yesu aatodha aabaha lu̱si̱mo ati, “Mweli̱li̱kanʼo muyembe hamui na biti binji byona.
42021030	Bikaakwanagha, bi̱ghu̱ma mbyalu̱lu̱mana, mumanya ngoku bili haai kwela.
42021031	Niikiyo kimui dhee, obu mulibona bintu ebi naabaghambiiye ebi mbyatandika kubʼo, mumanye ngoku bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga bubali haai-haai.
42021032	“Mbaghambiiye majima, kubona-bona naaghambi̱ye oku kwona kulibʼo bamui mu bantu abaliyo endindi banaakaaye.
42021033	Nsi na eghulu bilihuwʼo, bhaatu bighambo byanje tabilihuwʼo.
42021034	“Mwelinde, mu mitima yaanu mutatwali̱li̱ji̱bu̱wa bughuwa-ghuwa, tamiilo, na kwelalikiilila bintu byʼensi eni, niikuwo kilo eki kitabakwata nga ki̱ki̱ya.
42021035	Nanga kilo eki ki̱li̱hi̱kʼo bantu boona abali munsi yoona.
42021036	Muukalaghe mweli̱ndi̱ye bwile bwona, nimusaba kutunga maani̱ ghaa kuuluka bintu ebi byona ebikughenda kubʼo, kandi mugubhe kwemilila mu maaso ghaa Mwana wa Muntu.”
42021037	Yesu aaghendagha bu̱li̱ kilo mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga kwegheesi̱ya. Ti̱ bu̱li̱ lwagholo alu̱gha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu aghenda alaala haa mwena Oli̱va.
42021038	Bantu bakaniiye kimui bʼomu kibugha eki baakeelelagha bu̱li̱ kilo mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ngoku Yesu akwete kwegheesi̱ya.
42022001	Bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, na Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, bukaba buli haai ku̱hi̱ka.
42022002	Bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baanabbalagha mulingo ghwakwitilamu Yesu mu ki̱bi̱so haabwa kwobaha bantu.
42022003	Bwile obu bwonini Si̱taani̱ aatandika ku̱koleesi̱ya Yu̱da Esikalyota omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu eku̱mi̱ na babili.
42022004	Aaghenda mu bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na bakulu baa baasilikale abaalindagha Numba ya Luhanga. Aahanuula nabo mulingo oghu akugubha kubakoonelelamu kukwata Yesu.
42022005	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yu̱da oghu akwete ku̱bu̱gha, baadheedhuwa kandi baamulaghiisani̱ya kumusasula sente haabwa mulimo oghu.
42022006	Yu̱da oghu aasi̱i̱ma sente esi baamulaghiisani̱i̱ye esi, du̱mbi̱ bwile obu bwonini aatandikilʼo kubbala kahanda kaa kuhaayo Yesu mu bantu aba mu ki̱bi̱so.
42022007	Kilo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Migaati̱ Etalimu Ki̱tu̱mbi̱so, kandi eki baasalilaghamu kyana kya ntaama kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kyahi̱ka.
42022008	Yesu aatuma Peetelo na Yohaana naaghila ati, “Mughende mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu mututeekani̱i̱li̱je ki̱i̱kalo hamui na kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo eki etu̱we boona tukuliila hamui.”
42022009	Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Okubbala tukuteekani̱li̱ye kiyo haa?”
42022010	Aabaghila ati, “Mukuba makaki̱dha muti mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, mukusanga musaasa eetwi̱ki̱ye munagha ghwa maasi. Mumukwame ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱ki̱dhi̱ye mu numba hambali akughenda.
42022011	Du̱mbi̱ mughile mukama wayo muti, ‘Mwegheesi̱ya aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya tuti: Kisiika kili haa, hambali eye hamui na beeghesebuwa be bakuliila kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo?’
42022012	Akubooleka kisiika kiinamu̱li̱to kya kai̱na yaakabili, bakiteekani̱i̱je kandi kilimu bu̱li̱ kantu. Haaliimuwo mwatuteekani̱li̱ja kiihulo eki.”
42022013	Beeghesebuwa aba baaghenda, baasanga bintu bili kwonini ngoku Yesu aabaghambiiye. Baateekani̱ja kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.
42022014	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, Yesu na bakwenda be baaghenda kuliya.
42022015	Mbanaliya, aabaghila ati, “Neeghombeeye kimui kuliya naanu kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kini ntakaboona-boone.
42022016	Mbaghambiiye majima tankutodha kuliya naanu kiihulo kini ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu tulikiliila hamui mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
42022017	Niibuwo aakwete kiikopo kya vi̱i̱ni̱, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga, aabaha kiyo, naaghila ati, “Enu̱we boona munuwʼo.
42022018	Mbaghambiiye, tankutodha kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu nditodha kughinuwa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga mbwasi̱ye.”
42022019	Niibuwo aakwete mugaati̱, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga, aaghubhegha, aaghuha beeghesebuwa be, naaghila ati, “Ghuni ni mubili ghwanje, oghukuheebuwayo haabwanu. Kini mukikolaghe kunjisuka.”
42022020	Niikiyo kimui dhee, obu baamali̱ye kuliya mugaati̱ oghu, aatodha aakwata kiikopo kya vi̱i̱ni̱, aaghila ati, “Kiikopo kini ni ndaghaano mpyaka ya saghama yanje eghi ekuseesuwa haabwanu.”
42022021	Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aaghila ati, “Dhaani mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye! Oghu aku̱ngobeli̱ya niibuwo twaliya naye endindi!
42022022	Eye Mwana wa Muntu aku̱ku̱wa ngoku kyateekani̱ji̱bu̱u̱we, bhaatu oghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya ngalikibona!”
42022023	Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu aba, baatandika ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya mbabbala kumanya oghu akubbala kukola kintu eki.
42022024	Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baatandika kuhakangana bonkaha-na-bonkaha, mbabbala kumanya oghu akubabaamu mukulu.
42022025	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Bakama baa batali Bayu̱daaya, bakulemagha bantu baabo na ki̱ku̱bha, kandi na balemi̱ abali na bu̱toki̱ bakweghilaghamu bantu baa bantu.
42022026	Bhaatu enu̱we mutaba mutiyo, oghu akubbala kubabaamu mukulu, abhonganuuwe kudhoota, abe nga muto waanu, kandi mu̱heeleli̱ya waanu.
42022027	Dhaani oghu baku̱hu̱ti̱yagha ni ani̱? Oghu akusembejagha biliyo kedha oghu bakubisembejagha? Majima oghu bahu̱ti̱i̱ye ni oghu bakubisembejagha. Bhaatu ni̱i̱si̱ye mbalimu nga musembeja waanu.
42022028	Enu̱we mwakaaye nanje mu kulengeesebuwa kwanje.
42022029	Nahabweki ngoku Tita ampaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa kufooka mu̱lemi̱, nanje dhee ndibafoola balemi̱.
42022030	Nkukola eki niikuwo tuliilaghe hamui mu bu̱lemi̱ bwanje, tulemele hamui bilo nʼebilo, kandi bu̱li̱ omui asitame haa ntebe ya bukama mu ntebe eku̱mi̱ nʼebili ni̱mu̱twi̱la musango ntu̱la eku̱mi̱ nʼebili sya I̱saaleeli̱.”
42022031	Yesu aaghila ati, “Si̱mooni̱, Si̱mooni̱, ontegheeleli̱ye! Si̱taani̱ aasabi̱ye Luhanga ku̱mu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kubalengesa enu̱we boona niikuwo muleke ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja.
42022032	Bhaatu naabasabiiye kukila munu uwe Si̱mooni̱ nti otaleka ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, nanga bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka okukuukilila, bhaatu haanu̱ma ya ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwawe oku kutodha kuguma, weekambi̱i̱si̱ye baanakyawe kutodha kuba na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ku̱gu̱mi̱ye.”
42022033	Peetelo aamughila ati, “Mukama wanje, neeteekani̱i̱je kughenda mu nkomo kandi ku̱ku̱wa hamui naawe.”
42022034	Yesu aamughila ati, “Peetelo, obwalo mukilo nkoko atakakooki̱ye okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu oti toomani̱ye.”
42022035	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱u̱i̱ye beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Obu naabatu̱mi̱ye kutebeja mutali na sente, bikapa, kedha nkai̱to, buuye haliyo eki mwetaaghi̱si̱bu̱u̱we?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Bbaa.”
42022036	Aatodha aabaghila ati, “Bhaatu endindi bintu byahi̱ndu̱ki̱ye. Oghu ali na sente aghende nasiyo, nʼoghu ali na kikapa eki akubungagha nakiyo akitwale dhee. Oghu atali na kihiyo aghu̱li̱ye kooti̱ yee, sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu asighulemu kihiyo.
42022037	Eki naabaghambiiye eki mukikole nanga ndimabaghambila kini nti: Ebi Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we hambele bi̱mbu̱ghi̱yʼo bikulaghiluwa kumbʼo. Mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we haliyo hambali bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, ‘Bakamubalila mu nkoli̱ sya bibhi.’ Kandi ebyampandi̱i̱ku̱u̱wʼo bili haai ku̱hi̱ki̱i̱li̱la.”
42022038	Baamughila bati, “Mukama waatu olole, hani tuliyo na bihiyo bibili.” Yesu aabaghila ati, “Ebi bimali̱ye.”
42022039	Yesu aatuwa, aaghenda haa mwena Oli̱va ngoku aakakolagha, na beeghesebuwa be baamukwama.
42022040	Obu baaki̱dhi̱yeyo, aabaghila ati, “Musabe niikuwo kwohebuwa kutabasi̱ngu̱la.”
42022041	Du̱mbi̱ aabalu̱ghʼo, eesu̱kanʼo kabhii haakpengbu̱, aateeli̱ya, aasaba naaghila ati,
42022042	“Tita, nuwaabaaye osi̱i̱mi̱ye otaleka nimbona-bona ntiyo, bhaatu kitaba ngoku si̱ye mbbali̱ye, kibe ngoku obbali̱ye.” [
42022043	Niibuwo omui mu baamalai̱ka aalu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu, aamu̱gu̱mi̱ya.
42022044	Yesu aasabila kimui nanga akaba eehi̱ghu̱u̱ye bujune na kutuntula kwamaani̱. Ti̱ kiseleeleliyo ki̱su̱si̱ye saghama kyatandika ku̱mu̱hu̱li̱kanga nkinatoona hansi.]
42022045	Obu aamali̱ye kusaba, aamuka aakuuka hambali beeghesebuwa be bali. Aabasanga baghwesaghiiye haabwa kutuntula kukani̱ye okwabamali̱ye maani̱, kyaleka baaghwesaghila.
42022046	Aahi̱ka aabasu̱su̱mu̱la, aabaghila ati, “Mughwesaghiiye nangaaki? Muumuke musabe niikuwo kwohebuwa kutabasi̱ngu̱la.”
42022047	Atakahendekeei̱ye ku̱bu̱gha, Yu̱da omui mu beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili aasa ahikiiye kiigambi̱ kya bantu. Aahi̱ka eebinga Yesu, aamughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha.
42022048	Yesu aamughila ati, “Yu̱da, olimaghobeli̱ya Mwana wa Muntu noomughuwa mu ki̱ku̱bha?”
42022049	Obu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baaboone ebilimaghenda kubʼo, baamughila bati, “Mukama, tuli hani na bihiyo, buuye tulwane?”
42022050	Du̱mbi̱ omui mu beeghesebuwa be aba aabhulayo kihiyo kiye, aajombʼo mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona kutui kwabuliyo.
42022051	Bhaatu Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Dheka! Mutalwana!” Du̱mbi̱ akwata haa kutui kwa musaasa oghu, kwakililʼo.
42022052	Yesu aaghila bakulu baa bahongi̱, baasilikale abaalindagha Numba ya Luhanga, hamui na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya abaasi̱ye kumukwata ati, “Mwanjisiiye mukwete bihiyo na mi̱i̱gho nga baasi̱ye kukwata mu̱ji̱ndi̱ nangaaki?
42022053	Bu̱li̱ kilo naakalagha naanu mu Numba ya Luhanga ni̱neegheesi̱ya bantu, tamwankwete bwile obu bbaa. Bhaatu endindi Luhanga aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye Si̱taani̱ kubakoleesi̱ya haabwa bwile bukee.”
42022054	Abaalindagha Numba ya Luhanga baakwata Yesu baamutwala mu ka ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona. Peetelo aaghenda abalabhi̱ye enu̱ma bukee-buke hali hambali haseli̱yʼo.
42022055	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye, bantu baatu̱mi̱ka mulilo ghwa kwota hanjaakati ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona oghu. Bantu baasitama, baatandika kwota. Niibuwo Peetelo naye aasi̱ye aabasitamamu.
42022056	Naanoota, manaabukali̱ mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aasa. Aakala aloleleeye Peetelo, du̱mbi̱ aaghila bantu abootagha ati, “Musaasa oghu naye aabaagha na Yesu.”
42022057	Peetelo eehighaana ati, “Mukali̱ uwe, musaasa okughamba oghu si̱ye tanimumani̱ye bbaa!”
42022058	Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee, muntu onji aamaniilila Peetelo oghu, aamughila ati, “Naawe majima oli omui mu bantu aba.” Bhaatu Peetelo aatodha eehighaana ati, “Si̱ye bbaa!”
42022059	Haanu̱ma ya saaha nga emui, muntu onji aatodha aamweboheelela ati, “Majima kuwo musaasa oni ni omui mu baakalagha na Yesu, nanga naye dhee ni Munagalilaaya!”
42022060	Peetelo eehighanilana kimui ati, “Ebi okwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi tambimani̱ye kandi tambyetegheleei̱ye bbaa!” Naaneehighaana atiyo, nkoko yaakooka.
42022061	Du̱mbi̱ Mukama eegaali̱ya, aalola Peetelo oghu. Peetelo aasuka ngoku Yesu aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Obwalo nkoko etakakooki̱ye, okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu.”
42022062	Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aatuwa enja, aatandika kulilila kimui.
42022063	Baasilikale abaabaagha bali̱ndi̱ye Yesu mu nkomo, baatandika kumuwaawaani̱ya kandi mbanamuhuula.
42022064	Baamuboha kitambaala haali̱i̱so kandi baamutalangi̱ya, mbanamughila bati, “Mulangi̱ uwe otughambile, ni ani̱ aakuhuuye!”
42022065	Baakala mbanabu̱gha bintu binji bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bikani̱ye byakumuwaawaani̱ya.
42022066	Nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱, Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱, olwaghamu bakulu baa bahongi̱ na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, lwasitama. Baalaghila kuleeta Yesu mu Lukulato olu.
42022067	Obu baamu̱ki̱dhi̱i̱yemu, baamemba aba baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Tughambila, nuuwe Ki̱li̱si̱to?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Nankabha mbaghambila, tamu̱ku̱si̱i̱ma ebi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha bbaa.
42022068	Kandi nankabha mbabu̱u̱li̱ya, tamukunkuukamu.
42022069	Bhaatu mu bwile butaseli̱ye, Mwana wa Muntu akusitama haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Luhanga!”
42022070	Boona baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye nuuwe Mwana wa Luhanga?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Ee, ngoku mwabu̱ghi̱ye.”
42022071	Niibuwo baaghambilaane bati, “Tunaakubbala baakai̱so banji baaki? Etu̱we boonini twehi̱ghwi̱li̱i̱ye ebi aabu̱ghi̱ye.”
42023001	Baamemba abaabaagha mu lukulato olu boona baamuka, baatwala Yesu ewaa Pilaato oghu akaba alemi̱ye di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya bwile obu.
42023002	Baatandika kumunyegheelelela bati, “Twakwete musaasa oghu naajeemeesi̱ya bantu bʼewaatu ati bahakani̱ye bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma. Aabatangagha ati bataha musolo ghwa Kai̱saali̱. Kandi akweghilagha ati niiye Ki̱li̱si̱to, mukama.”
42023003	Pilaato aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Nuuwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, ngoku waakabu̱ghi̱ye.”
42023004	Niibuwo Pilaato aaghi̱li̱ye bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba na bantu boona abaabaaghʼo ati, “Tamboone eki musaasa oni aasobeei̱ye bbaa!”
42023005	Bhaatu bantu aba baatandika kugolela kimui bati, “Musaasa oghu ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya byaleeteli̱i̱je bantu bʼewaatu kuukala mbatu̱wa nsi̱si̱. Akatandikila mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, aahi̱ka na Bu̱yu̱daaya, nʼendindi aatodhi̱ye kukuuka mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu.”
42023006	Obu Pilaato aaghu̱u̱ye bantu aba mbaghila bati Yesu akatandikila e Galilaaya kwegheesi̱ya, niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye Yesu alakaba ali Munagalilaaya.
42023007	Baamughila bati, “Ee,” Du̱mbi̱ aamanya ngoku Yesu alu̱ghi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ eghi Helude alemi̱ye. Aalaghila ati batwale Yesu ewaa Helude, nanga bwile obu naye dhee akaba ali mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu.
42023008	Obu baamu̱ki̱dhi̱i̱yeyo, Helude aadheedheluwa kimui kumubona, nanga akaba naamali̱ye bwile bukani̱ye naabbala kumubona, kandi naaghu̱u̱ye makulu ghakani̱ye ghaa byakuswekani̱ya ebi Yesu aakolagha. Eeli̱li̱kanagha ati Yesu akumukolela kyakuswekani̱ya kyona.
42023009	Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bi̱bu̱u̱li̱yo bikani̱ye, bhaatu Yesu ataamukuukamu na kantu.
42023010	Bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo baamilila, baatandika kunyegheelela Yesu bati aakoli̱ye bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bikani̱ye.
42023011	Helude na baasilikale be baatandika kubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya Yesu kandi baamuwaawaani̱li̱ya kimui. Baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka ki̱lu̱walo kya bukama nga mukama. Du̱mbi̱ Helude aalaghila ati bamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye ewaa Pilaato.
42023012	Helude na Pilaato bakaba bali nguwe na mbu̱li̱, bhaatu kilo eki kyonini baabhootu̱wana.
42023013	Pilaato aabilikila bakulu baa bahongi̱, bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya na bantu boona kugumbaana hamui.
42023014	Obu baagumbaane, aabaghila ati, “Mwandeteeye musaasa oni kandi mwamunyegheelela muti niibuwo aahaaghi̱li̱ya bantu kuhakani̱ya bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma. Bhaatu obu naamu̱bu̱u̱li̱li̱i̱ye bhyani mu maaso ghaanu naasangi̱ye atali na kyona eki aasobeei̱ye hʼebi mukwete kumunyegheelela muti aakoli̱ye.
42023015	Na Mukama Helude taaboone eki musaasa oni aakoli̱ye bbaa, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye aatodha aalaghila ati bamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye hani. Musaasa oni tambhonganuuwe ku̱mu̱twi̱la musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa bbaa!
42023016	Bhaatu nkulaghila baasilikale banje bamuhuule bibbooko, du̱mbi̱ nimulekele aghende.” [
42023017	Mu bilo bya Ki̱ghenu̱ Kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, Pilaato aalekelagha munyankomo omui oghu Bayu̱daaya baasabagha bati alekele.]
42023018	Ti̱ bantu boona abaabaagha mu lukulato olu, obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Pilaato akwete ku̱bu̱gha, baatandika kugolela kimui bati, “Otulekeelele Balaba! Yesu bamubambe haa musalaba!”
42023019	Balaba oghu bakaba bamukwete kandi ali mu nkomo haabwa kuba omui mu bantu abaali bakwatu̱u̱we haabwa kwita bantu e Yelusaalemu mu bulemo bwa kubbala kuuyʼo bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma.
42023020	Pilaato aabbalagha kulekela Yesu, niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aaghambila bantu aba ngoku Yesu atali nʼeki aasobeei̱ye.
42023021	Bhaatu bantu aba beeyongelela kimui kugola bati, “Bamubambe haa musalaba! Bamubambe!”
42023022	Pilaato aatodha aabu̱gha nabo mulundi ghwakasatu ati, “Bhaatu Yesu aatu̱u̱ye musango ki? Nanga si̱ye tamboone ali na musango oghwanguleka ni̱mu̱twi̱la musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa! Nkulaghila bamuhuule bibbooko, du̱mbi̱ nimulekele aghende.”
42023023	Bantu aba beeyongelela kimui kugola bati akulaghiluwa kubambuwa haa musalaba. Haabwa kugola kusaalukaane, haakumaliilila, baadhooti̱ya Pilaato.
42023024	Aasi̱i̱ma ku̱twi̱la Yesu musango ghwa kumubamba haa musalaba ngoku ebo baabbalagha.
42023025	Aalekela Balaba oghu bantu aba baasabi̱ye bati alekele. Balaba oghu akaba akwatu̱u̱we mu nkomo haabwa ku̱tu̱wa bulemo bwa kubbala kuuyʼo bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma, kandi aata muntu mu bulemo omu. Pilaato aalaghila baasilikale be kubamba Yesu haa musalaba ngoku Bayu̱daaya aba baabbalagha.
42023026	Baasilikale aba mbanatwala Yesu hambali bakumubambila, baasangaana musaasa alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kilene, li̱i̱na liye Si̱mooni̱. Bwile obu aalu̱ghagha mu kyalo naaghenda mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu. Baamuhambi̱li̱ja kuheeka musalaba oghu Yesu aabaagha aheeki̱ye, kandi kughenda alabhi̱ye Yesu.
42023027	Bantu bakaniiye kimui baaghenda balabhi̱ye Yesu. Mu bantu aba hakaba halimu bakali̱ abaaghendi̱ye bamulabhi̱ye mbalilila kimui haabwa kutuntula kwamaani̱.
42023028	Yesu eegaali̱ya, aalola bakali̱ aba, aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we bakali̱ abaalu̱ghi̱ye e Yelusaalemu, muleke kulila si̱ye nenkaha, bhaatu mwelile kandi mulile haabwa baana baanu.
42023029	Bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka hambali bantu balighila bati, ‘Bali na mu̱gi̱sa bakali̱ ngumba na matundu aghatakabyalagha na mabeele aghatakonki̱yagha.’
42023030	Ti̱ bwile obu bantu balighila myena bati, ‘Mutwegengele!’ Kandi baghile bwena bati, ‘Mu̱tu̱swi̱ki̱le!’
42023031	Nanga byaba bitiyo haa kiti kibisi, ti̱ bikuba bi̱ti̱ya haa kyomi̱ye?”
42023032	Basaasa babili nkoli̱ sya bibhi baatwaluwa kubambuwa hamui na Yesu.
42023033	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo eki bakughilaghamu “Ki̱i̱kalo kya Kahanga,” baabamba Yesu haa musalaba. Baabamba dhee basaasa babili nkoli̱ sya bibhi aba haa misalaba. Ghwʼomui baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haa luhande lwabuliyo bwa Yesu, na ghwonji haa lwabumesu.
42023034	Niibuwo Yesu aasabi̱ye naaghila ati, “Tita, obaghanile, nanga tabamani̱ye eki bakwete kukola.” Kandi baakoma buluulu kutambulana bi̱lu̱walo biye.
42023035	Bantu boona baneemiliiyʼo, banaloli̱ye ngoku baabambi̱ye Yesu, baasilikale baakoma buluulu kumanya ngoku bakutambulana bi̱lu̱walo biye. Beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baatandika kumubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya bati, “Aajunagha bantu banji. Dheluuni eejune alakaba aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to, oghu Luhanga aakomi̱ye kulema.”
42023036	Na baasilikale abaabambi̱ye Yesu nabo baamubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya dhee. Baamwebinga kumubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya, baamuha vi̱i̱ni̱ esaaliiye.
42023037	Baamughila bati, “Olakaba majima oli Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya, weejune!”
42023038	Musango oghwaleki̱ye baamubamba, baaghuhandiika haa kabbaau ngu “Oni niiye Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.”
42023039	Omui mu nkoli̱ sya bibhi aba baabambi̱ye hamui na Yesu aamubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya ati, “Majima olakaba oli Ki̱li̱si̱to, dheluuni weejune naatu otujune!”
42023040	Bhaatu muunakiye aamusoghosa ati, “Eki̱ku̱ku̱bu̱ghi̱i̱si̱ya kitiyo nkiki? Tookwobaagha kifubilo kya Luhanga? Etu̱we boona baatu̱twi̱li̱i̱ye musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa ghususaane.
42023041	Baatu̱twi̱li̱i̱ye si̱ye hamui naawe musango ghwa kutubamba haa musalaba. Eki niikiyo kifubilo eki tubhonganuuwe kutunga haabwa bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi twakoli̱ye, bhaatu musaasa oghu taali nʼeki aasobeei̱ye.”
42023042	Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Yesu, onjisuke obu okwisa mu bu̱lemi̱ bwawe.”
42023043	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Majima, obwalo okuba nanje mu ki̱i̱kalo kya bu̱si̱nge bwona.”
42023044	-
42023045	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye saaha mukaagha sya ntangaali̱, musana ghwali̱ma, mweli̱ma ghwakwata mu ehanga eli lyona, ghwahi̱ki̱ya saaha mwenda. Bwile obu bwonini, kateni̱ eghi ekaba edhodhookeei̱ye mu Numba ya Luhanga yaatemukamu kabili.
42023046	Yesu aatakila kimui nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Tita, mwoyo ghwanje naaghuta mu mikono yaawe!” Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aatwi̱kana.
42023047	Obu mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ baa Looma aaboone ebyabaayʼo byona, aasinda Luhanga naaghila ati, “Majima musaasa oghu aabaagha atali na musango!”
42023048	Bantu bakaniiye kimui bakaba baasi̱ye kulola ngoku baasilikale bakubamba Yesu. Obu baaboone ebyabaayʼo byona, baakuuka mu maka ghaabo mbadhi̱ngi̱ya mituwe.
42023049	Baabhootu̱ sya Yesu bakani̱ye bakaba beemiliiye hambali haseli̱yʼo baloli̱ye ebikwete kumulehukanʼo. Mu bantu aba hakaba halimu bakali̱ abaabaagha balu̱ghi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, baasi̱ye na Yesu e Yelusaalemu.
42023050	Hakaba haliyo musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Yojeefu̱, akaba alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Alimateya mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya. Akaba ali memba wa lukulato lukulu lwa bengei̱, kandi ali muntu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
42023051	Aakalagha alindiliiye kwisa kwa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga kandi taasi̱i̱mi̱ye ebi baamemba baanakiye baatu̱u̱yemu kandi baakoli̱ye.
42023052	Musaasa oghu, aaghenda ewaa Pilaato, aamusaba ku̱mu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kujiika mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
42023053	Niibuwo aaghendi̱ye, aaghuuya haa musalaba. Aaghuboha mu si̱i̱ti̱ njelu, aaghuta mu kituulo eki baabaagha bali̱mi̱ye mu kikuka, eki baabaagha batakaji̱i̱ki̱yemu muntu nʼomui.
42023054	Kilo eki kikaba kili kyakweteekani̱ja haabwa kilo kya Sabhato, kandi ekaba eli haai kutandika.
42023055	Bamui mu bakali̱ abaalu̱ghi̱ye na Yesu e Galilaaya bakaba baliyo dhee, bakali̱ aba baaghenda na Yojeefu̱ haa kituulo eki baakala baloli̱ye ngoku akwete kuta mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu mu kituulo eki.
42023056	Niibuwo baaku̱u̱ki̱ye Yelusaalemu hambali baabaagha baghooneeye. Baateekani̱ja bigita bisasi̱ye bya kusiigha mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu. Bhaatu kilo kya Sabhato baahuumula ngoku kilaghilo kyalaghilagha.
42024001	Haa Kyasande, kilo kyoku̱du̱bha mu wi̱i̱ki̱, bakali̱ baakeelela nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱, kughenda haa kituulo kutwala bigita bya kusiigha mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
42024002	Obu baaki̱dhi̱yʼo, baasanga ebaale bali̱i̱hi̱ye haa mulyango ghwa kituulo.
42024003	Obu baataahi̱yemu, baasanga mu̱ku̱ ghwa Mukama Yesu ghutalimu.
42024004	Mbaneeli̱li̱kanʼo ekyaghubaayʼo, beetu̱lakaka basaasa babili babeemiliiye ngʼala, balu̱wete nkanji̱ sijelu dhiyo.
42024005	Bakali̱ aba baateeli̱ya kandi beetu̱li̱ka, haali̱i̱so yabo haaku̱ma hansi nanga bakaba boobahiiye kimui. Niibuwo basaasa aba baabaghi̱li̱ye bati, “Ekikubabbali̱ya mwomi̱i̱li̱ mu baku̱u̱ye nkiki?
42024006	Taali hani, aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye! Muusuke eki aabaghambiiye obu aanabaagha naanu e Galilaaya ati,
42024007	Mwana wa Muntu akughenda kuheebuwayo mu mikono ya basi̱i̱si̱, bamubambe haa musalaba, bhaatu haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.”
42024008	Obu bakali̱ aba baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baasuka ebi Yesu aabaghambiiye.
42024009	Baalu̱gha haa kituulo haala baaghenda baaghambila bakwenda baa Yesu eku̱mi̱ nʼomui, nʼaba baakalagha nabo boona.
42024010	Bakali̱ aba ni: Mali̱ya Mangadhalina, Yowana, Mali̱ya ni̱na Yakobbo, hamui na bakali̱ banji, niibo baaghambiiye bakwenda.
42024011	Bakwenda aba baaghu̱wa ebi bakali̱ aba bakwete kubaghambila bili nga bintu byakitiyo-kitiyo kandi baabhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi bakwete ku̱bu̱gha ngoku ghali majima.
42024012	Bhaatu Peetelo aamuka, aali̱gi̱ta kughenda haa kituulo. Obu aaki̱dhi̱yʼo, aagomba, aalangi̱li̱yamu, aabona si̱i̱ti̱ esi baabaagha babohi̱yemu mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu aaniisiyo silimu syonkaha. Du̱mbi̱ aalu̱ghʼo, aakuuka ewe eka asweki̱ye haabwa ebyabaayʼo.
42024013	Kilo Kyasande eki kyonini, babili mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baaghendagha mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu bakughilaghamu Emaau, haai nga mailo musanju̱ ku̱lu̱gha e Yelusaalemu.
42024014	Baaghenda mbahaana makulu ghaa ebyamubaayʼo mu wi̱i̱ki̱ eghi.
42024015	Mbanaghahaana, Yesu aabeebinga aatandika kughenda hamui nabo.
42024016	Bhaatu Luhanga ataabasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kumumaniilila.
42024017	Niibuwo aababu̱u̱i̱ye ati, “Ni makulu ghaaki mukwete kuhaana nimunaghenda?” Baamilila baamulola. Haali̱i̱so yabo oolekagha ngoku batuntuliiye kimui kandi maani̱ ghabahooye haabwa ebyabaayʼo Yesu.
42024018	Niibuwo omui muli ebo, li̱i̱na liye Ku̱lyopa, aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Nuuwe mu̱ghenu̱ enkaha oghu ali mu Yelusaalemu muni oghu atamani̱ye ebyabaayemu bilo bini?”
42024019	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbiki byabaayemu?” Baamughila bati, “Ebyabaayʼo Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱. Aabaagha ali mulangi̱ wamaani̱ mu ebi aakolagha kandi ebi aabu̱ghagha mu maaso ghaa Luhanga na mu maaso ghaa bantu boona.
42024020	“Bakulu baa bahongi̱ na bengei̱ baatu baamuhaayʼo ku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa, baamubamba haa musalaba.
42024021	Twabaagha tumani̱ye tuti niiye akucungula etu̱we Bai̱saaleeli̱. Ti̱ kwongela hali eki, obwalo ni kilo kya kasatu bintu ebi bibaayʼo.
42024022	Kusa ekyatuswekani̱i̱ye, ni obwalo nkyambisi, bamui mu bakali̱ aba tukuukalagha nabo, baakeeleeye baaghenda haa kituulo.
42024023	Obu baaki̱dhi̱yʼo mataahamu baasanga mu̱ku̱ ghuwe ghutalimu. Baakuuka, baasa baatughambila bati haa kituulo baaboone baamalai̱ka abaabaghi̱li̱ye bati ni mwomi̱i̱li̱.
42024024	Na bamui mu bantu aba tukuukalagha nabo baaghendayo dhee, majima nabo dhee baasanga mu̱ku̱ ghuwe ghutali mu kituulo.”
42024025	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Badhoma enu̱we! Mitima yaanu yoomakakaane ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi balangi̱ baabu̱ghi̱ye nangaaki?
42024026	Takyetaaghisibuwagha Ki̱li̱si̱to kubona-bona ebi byona, niikuwo ataahe mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye?”
42024027	Yesu aatandikila haa bya Musa na balangi̱ boona, aabasoboolola bintu byona ebili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebimukwetʼo.
42024028	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ hambali basaasa babili aba baaghendagha, Yesu eefoola nga muntu akubbala kusaala.
42024029	Bhaatu baamwesengeleli̱ya bati, “Wiise tuukale hamui, nanga musana ghulimakota kandi bwile bulimaala.” Nahabweki aasi̱i̱ma aaghenda nabo.
42024030	Obu baataahi̱ye mu numba, baasitama kuliya. Yesu aakwata mugaati̱ aaghubhegha, aasaba naasi̱i̱ma Luhanga haabwa mugaati̱ oghu, kandi aabaha ghuwo.
42024031	Bwile obu maaso ghaabo ghaaghulika, baamumaniilila. Bhaatu eye aababulanganʼo, baaleka kumubona.
42024032	Niibuwo baaghambilaane bati, “Buuye eki taaniikiyo kyaleki̱ye twadheedheluwa kimui mu kihanda ntunaasa obu aatusoboololagha Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we?”
42024033	Du̱mbi̱ basaasa aba baamuka, baakuuka Yelusaalemu bwile obu bwonini. Baasanga beeghesebuwa eku̱mi̱ nʼomui hamui na banji beekumaani̱li̱i̱ye hamui.
42024034	Baaghilagha bati, “Majima Mukama waatu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye kandi aabonekeeye Si̱mooni̱!”
42024035	Niibuwo na babili aba baatandi̱ki̱ye kusoboolola ebyababaayʼo mu luguudhe, kandi ngoku baamumaniliiye obu aabheghi̱ye mugaati̱.
42024036	Ababili aba mbanaghaha, ki̱bbu̱la kyona kyabona Yesu aamiliiye haagati yabo, aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha!”
42024037	Bhaatu bo boobahila kimui baamanya bati baaboone mu̱li̱mu̱.
42024038	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mwobahi̱ye nangaaki? Kandi mukwete kughuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya muti taani̱i̱si̱ye nangaaki?”
42024039	Mulole ngalo syanje na bighele byanje, ni̱i̱syoni neenini! Mu̱nku̱mʼo niikuwo mumanye ngoku aani̱i̱si̱ye neenini. Nanga mu̱li̱mu̱ taghuli na mubili na maku̱wa ebi ndi nabiyo.
42024040	Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabooleka ngalo siye na bighele biye.
42024041	Bhaatu haabwa kusweka kandi kudheedheluwa kimui, bataahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha ghali majima. Niibuwo abaabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukaakuba muli na kookuliya, mukampe nkaliye.”
42024042	Baamuha ki̱twi̱ke kya nsu̱i̱ yookeei̱ye,
42024043	aakikwata, aatandika kukiliya banamu̱loli̱ye.
42024044	Aabaghila ati, “Obu naanabaagha naanu naabaghambilagha nti byona ebi Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱wʼo mu bilaghilo bya Musa, na balangi̱, hamui na Jabbu̱li̱ bikulaghiluwa ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱bu̱wa.”
42024045	Aabasoboolola makulu ghaa Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebi niikuwo bagubhe ku̱byetegheeleli̱ya.
42024046	Aabaghila ati, “Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱mbu̱ghi̱yʼo biti Ki̱li̱si̱to balimubona-boni̱ya kandi haa kilo kya kasatu ahu̱mbu̱u̱ke mu baku̱u̱ye.
42024047	Ti̱ haabwa eki, kwekuukamu na kughaniluwa kwa bibhi bikulaghiluwa kutebejebuwa mu li̱i̱na liye mu mahanga ghoona, kutandikila e Yelusaalemu.
42024048	Ni̱i̱nu̱we baakai̱so baa bintu ebi.
42024049	Nkubatumila eki Tita aabalaghiisani̱i̱ye. Bhaatu mu̱du̱bhe muukale mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱tu̱ngi̱ye maani̱ aghaku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu.”
42024050	Yesu aaghenda na beeghesebuwa be, aabahi̱ki̱ya haai na mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Bbetaniya. Aamu̱ki̱ya mikono kubaha mu̱gi̱sa.
42024051	Naanabaha mu̱gi̱sa, aatwaluwa mu eghulu.
42024052	Du̱mbi̱ beeghesebuwa be aba baatandika kumulami̱ya, kandi baakuuka Yelusaalemu badheedheleeu̱we kimui.
42024053	Ti̱ baaghendagha bu̱li̱ kilo mu Numba ya Luhanga kusinda Luhanga.
43001001	Mu ntandiko hakaba haliyo Kighambo, kandi Kighambo oghu akaba ali hamui na Luhanga, kandi akaba ali Luhanga.
43001002	Akaba ali na Luhanga mu ntandiko.
43001003	Kighambo oghu niiye Luhanga aakoleeseei̱ye kuhanga bintu byona. Niiye majima akahanga bu̱li̱ kintu kyona.
43001004	Niiye akuleka bantu babe boomi̱i̱li̱ bilo nʼebilo, kandi niiye kyeleeli̱ kwoleka bantu ngoku Luhanga ali.
43001005	Kyeleeli̱ kikaaku̱bbeni̱yagha mu mweli̱ma kandi mweli̱ma taghukutangagha kyeleeli̱ eki ku̱bbeni̱ya.
43001006	Luhanga aatuma mutumuwa wee, li̱i̱na liye Yohaana.
43001007	Akaasa kuha buukai̱so obukwetʼo kyeleeli̱ oghu, niikuwo haabuwe bantu boona bagubhe ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja butumuwa obu.
43001008	Yohaana oghu eye taabaagha kyeleeli̱ oghu bbaa, eye akaba ali kai̱so wa kyeleeli̱ oghu.
43001009	Kyeleeli̱ kyamajima oghu aku̱bbeni̱yagha haa bu̱li̱ muntu weena niiye aasagha munsi.
43001010	Nankabha naabaagha munsi, mu bantu aba Luhanga aamu̱koleeseei̱ye kuhanga, bantu aba tabamani̱ye ngoku Luhanga aliiye akamutuma.
43001011	Nankabha naasi̱ye mu bantu be boonini, banamu̱nji̱ mu bantu be aba bakamubhenga.
43001012	Bhaatu boona abaamwebali̱i̱ye kandi baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, akabaha bu̱toki̱ bwa kufooka baana baa Luhanga.
43001013	Tabaafooki̱ye baana be haabwa bubyalilanuwa bwa muntu kedha haabwa kweghomba kwa mubili, kedha haabwa kubbala kwa muntu, bhaatu Luhanga eenini niiye akabafoola kuba baana be.
43001014	Kighambo oghu aafooka muntu kandi aasa aakala naatu. Twabona ngoku ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Ese wee, nanga niiye Mwana wee omui enkaha. Ali na ngughuma sikani̱ye kandi naabu̱gha majima ghonkaha.
43001015	Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ oghu akaasa naaheela Yesu buukai̱so naaghila ati, “Oghu niiye naaghambagha obu naabaghi̱li̱ye nti, ‘Oghu akwisa haanu̱ma yanje ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱, nanga eye akabʼo hambele si̱ye ntakabaayʼo.’ ”
43001016	Haabwa eye kuba na bu̱li̱ kintu kyona, akuukakalagha naatuha mi̱gi̱sa haabwa ngughuma siye.
43001017	Luhanga akatuha bilaghilo biye kukwamila mwa Musa, bhaatu aatughilila ngughuma kandi majima kukwamila mwa Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to.
43001018	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui munsi oghu aalaboone Luhanga, kuuyʼo Mwana wee Omui Enkaha oghu akuukalagha haai naye, niiye akutwolekagha ngoku Luhanga Ese wee ali.
43001019	Bini niibiyo Yohaana aabu̱ghi̱ye obu Bayu̱daaya baatu̱mi̱ye bamui mu bahongi̱ na Baleevi̱, ku̱lu̱gha Yelusaalemu, ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Nuuwe ani̱?”
43001020	Aabakuukamu majima ghoonini ati, “Taani̱i̱si̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to.”
43001021	Baatodha baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye nuuwe Eli̱ya?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Bbaa.” Baatodha baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye nuuwe mulangi̱ baaghi̱li̱ye bati akwisa?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Bbaa.”
43001022	Haakumaliilila baamughila bati, “Buuye nuuwe ani̱? Tukubbala otughambile ngoku ekweyetagha niikuwo tube na kyakughambila abaatu̱tu̱mi̱ye?”
43001023	Yohaana oghu aabakuukamu naabaghambila bighambo ebili mu kitabo kya mulangi̱ I̱saaya ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye elaka lya oghu akwisa naalangilila mu elungu ati, ‘Mweteekani̱li̱je kwisa kwa Mukama; ngoku mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye!’ ”
43001024	Bamui mu bantu aba baatu̱mi̱ye aba abaabaagha bali Bafali̱saayo,
43001025	baabu̱u̱li̱ya Yohaana bati, “Obu olaba otali Ki̱li̱si̱to, kedha Eli̱ya, kedha mulangi̱ oghu baaghi̱li̱ye bati akwisa, okubati̱jagha bantu nangaaki?”
43001026	Aabakuukamu ati, “Si̱ye nkubabati̱jagha na maasi, bhaatu mu enu̱we muntu oghu mutamani̱ye abalimu.
43001027	Niiye oghu akwisa andabhi̱ye kandi tani̱hi̱ki̱ye na kuba mu̱heeleli̱ya wee.”
43001028	Ebi byona bikabʼo e Bbetaniya luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱ hambali Yohaana aabati̱ji̱lagha bantu.
43001029	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo obu Yohaana aaboone Yesu naasa hambali ali, aaghila bantu aabaaghʼo ati, “Mulole Kyana kya Ntaama wa Luhanga bakuhonga niikuwo aghanile bantu bibhi byabo!
43001030	Oni niiye naaghambagha obu naabaghi̱li̱ye nti, ‘Oghu akwisa haanu̱ma yanje ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱, nanga eye akabʼo hambele si̱ye ntakabaayʼo.’
43001031	Nanje neenini nkaba ntamumani̱ye ngoku aliiye Ki̱li̱si̱to, bhaatu kighendeleluwa ekyaleki̱ye naasa kandi naabati̱ja bantu ni̱nkoleesi̱ya maasi niikuwo bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bagubhe kumanya ngoku oghu naaghambagha oghu aasi̱ye.”
43001032	Niibuwo Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabu̱ghi̱ye naaha buukai̱so haa Yesu naaghila ati, “Nkabona Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naalu̱gha mu eghulu naamu̱su̱ndʼo nga ki̱i̱bbi̱mbo aakala naye.
43001033	Nanje nkaba ntamumani̱ye nguli oghu akantuma kubati̱ja atangambiiye ati, ‘Oghu akubati̱ja bantu na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ni oghu okubona Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naasʼo kuukala naye.’
43001034	Ti̱ obu naaboone kuwo, naakimanya ngoku oghu aaniiye Mwana wa Luhanga.”
43001035	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo Yohaana na beeghesebuwa be babili bakaba bali hambali Yohaana aabati̱ji̱lagha.
43001036	Obu aaboone Yesu naasaala, aaghila bantu ati, “Mulole Kyana kya Ntaama wa Luhanga oghu bakuhonga niikuwo Luhanga aghanile bantu bibhi byabo!”
43001037	Obu beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana babili aba baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ baalu̱ghʼo Yohaana, baakwamilila Yesu.
43001038	Obu Yesu eegaai̱ye aababona bamukwamiliiye, aabaghila ati, “Mukubbala ki?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, okughenda kuukala haa?”
43001039	Aabakuukamu ati, “Mwise mulolʼo.” Sikaba sili nga saaha eku̱mi̱ sya lwagholo. Yesu hamui na beeghesebuwa aba baaghenda, baabona hambali aaghendagha kuukala, kandi baakala naye kilo eki.
43001040	Omui mu bantu babili abaaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yohaana aabu̱ghi̱ye, kandi baakwamilila Yesu, hakaba halimu Andeleya waani̱na Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo.
43001041	Eki Andeleya aadu̱bhi̱ye kukola obu aaboone Yesu, akaghenda kughambila waani̱nawee Si̱mooni̱ ati, “Twaboone Masiya” (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya Ki̱li̱si̱to).
43001042	Du̱mbi̱ Andeleya aaleeta waani̱nawee Si̱mooni̱ oghu hambali Yesu ali. Obu Yesu aaboone Si̱mooni̱ oghu aamulola, aamughila ati, “Uwe Si̱mooni̱ mutabani̱ wa Yohaana ku̱lu̱gha endindi balakughilaghamu Peetelo.”
43001043	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo Yesu aatu̱wamu kughenda mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Obu aaki̱dhi̱yeyo, aabona Fi̱li̱po, aamughila ati, “Onkwame.”
43001044	Fi̱li̱po naye akaba aakaaye e Bbetesai̱da hambali Andeleya na waani̱nawee Peetelo baabaagha baakaaye.
43001045	Fi̱li̱po niiye akasangaana Nasanai̱li̱, aamughambila ati, “Twaboone Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱, oghu Musa hamui na balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo bati akwisa.”
43001046	Nasanai̱li̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya Fi̱li̱po ati, “Najaaleeti̱! Haliyo kintu kilungi kyona ekugubha ku̱lu̱gha e Najaaleeti̱?” Fi̱li̱po aamukuukamu ati, “Weenini wiise omwelolele.”
43001047	Obu Yesu aaboone Nasanai̱li̱ naamwebinga hambali ali, aaghila abaabaaghʼo ati, “Mulole Munai̱saaleeli̱ wamajima oghu ataaku̱bu̱ghagha kisubha kyona.”
43001048	Nasanai̱li̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Uwe waammani̱ye oti̱ya?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Obu waabaagha ositami̱ye mu nti̱na ya kiti mu̱ti̱i̱ni̱ Fi̱li̱po atakaasi̱ye kukughambila, si̱ye naasangu̱u̱we nkuboone.”
43001049	Niibuwo Nasanai̱li̱ aaghi̱li̱ye Yesu ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, nuuwe oghu Mwana wa Luhanga kandi Mukama wa I̱saaleeli̱!”
43001050	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Waahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye haabwa kukughambila kwonkaha nti naakuboone ositami̱ye mu nti̱na ya kiti mu̱ti̱i̱ni̱? Bhaatu okweyongela kubona ebisaai̱ye haa eki.”
43001051	Yesu eeyongela kughila Nasanai̱li̱ ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, mulibona eghulu li̱i̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye kandi na baamalai̱ka baa Luhanga mbani̱i̱na kandi mbasu̱ndu̱ka hambali Mwana wa Muntu ali.”
43002001	Haanu̱ma ya bilo bibili, haabʼo bu̱ghenu̱ bwa kuswela mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kaana mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Ni̱na Yesu naye akaba ali haa bu̱ghenu̱ haala,
43002002	kandi Yesu na beeghesebuwa be nabo bakaba bababilikiiye kandi bali haa bu̱ghenu̱ obu dhee.
43002003	Obu vi̱i̱ni̱ yaahooye, ni̱na Yesu aamughila ati, “Vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi baabaagha nayo yaahooye.”
43002004	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Maaha okumbali̱ya ki? Buni tabuli bwile bwanje bwa kukola kintu kyona hʼeki bbaa.”
43002005	Ni̱na wee aaghila abaaheeleli̱yagha haa bu̱ghenu̱ obu ati, “Kyona akubaghambila haliikiyo mwakola.”
43002006	Haai-haai nga haala, hakaba haliyo binagha mukaagha bi̱bu̱mbi̱ye na mabaale, ebi Bayu̱daaya baakoleesi̱yagha haa mukola ghwa kunaaba kusighikila haa bilaghilo bya di̱i̱ni̱ ya Bayu̱daaya. Bu̱li̱ kimui kyaghendaghamu maasi aghali haagati ya li̱ta kinaanaa na ki̱ku̱mi̱ nʼabili.
43002007	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye abaaheeleli̱yagha aba ati, “Mu̱u̱su̱li̱ye maasi mu binagha ebi.” Baaseesamu maasi baabi̱i̱su̱li̱ya kidhi-kidhi.
43002008	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mutahe haa maasi haala, mutwalile mukulu wa bu̱ghenu̱ buni.” Baakola kuwo.
43002009	Obu mukulu wa bu̱ghenu̱ obu aanooye maasi aghamali̱ye kufooka vi̱i̱ni̱, ataamanya hambali vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi yaalu̱ghi̱ye. Bhaatu baheeleli̱ya abaatahi̱ye maasi agha ebo bakaba bamani̱ye. Niibuwo aabilikiiye mugholi wa busaasa haakpengbu̱,
43002010	aamughila ati, “Bu̱li̱ muntu oghu akukolagha bu̱ghenu̱, aku̱du̱bhagha aha bantu vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi esemeleeye kimui, niikuwo baghenu̱ be mbanooye eghi ekani̱ye, aba naabaha eghi etasemeeye bhyani; bhaatu uwe ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nʼendindi waabi̱i̱ki̱ye eghi esemeleeye kimui!”
43002011	Kini niikiyo kyabaaye kyakuswekani̱ya kyoku̱du̱bha eki Yesu aakoli̱ye kandi akakikolela mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kaana mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Akakola eki kwoleka ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye, ti̱ beeghesebuwa be baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43002012	Haanu̱ma ya bu̱ghenu̱ bwa kuswela obu, Yesu aahona mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱ ali hamui na ni̱na wee, baghenji̱ be hamui na beeghesebuwa be. Baamalayo bilo bikee.
43002013	Obu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Bayu̱daaya kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo bwahi̱ki̱ye, Yesu aakoma e Yelusaalemu.
43002014	Obu aahi̱ki̱ye mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, aabona bamui mu bantu mbaghu̱li̱ya nte, ntaama kandi bi̱i̱bbi̱mbo bya kuhonga. Aabona dhee basaasa basitami̱ye haa ntebe mbahi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya sente haa maameeja.
43002015	Yesu aakola kibbooko kya mighuwo, aatandika kubhinga bantu aba boona mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga. Aabhingamu ntaama esi na nte syona; aatu̱li̱kanga meeja syona sya bantu abaahi̱ngi̱i̱si̱yagha sente, kandi na sente syabo esi syona syahanjikana.
43002016	Aaghila abaaghu̱li̱yagha bi̱i̱bbi̱mbo ebi ati, “Bi̱i̱bbi̱mbo ebi mu̱bi̱twesi̱ye enja! Mukugubha mu̱ti̱ya kufoola numba ya Tita kuba katale?”
43002017	Beeghesebuwa be baasuka Ekyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we eki̱ghi̱li̱ye kiti, “Ku̱hu̱ti̱ya numba yaawe kwonini, kukuleka nku̱we.”
43002018	Niibuwo bamui mu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya abaabaaghʼo baaghi̱li̱ye Yesu bati, “Nkyakuswekani̱ya ki okutukolela kutwoleka ngoku oli na bu̱toki̱ kukola bintu bini byona?”
43002019	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mugenge numba eni, kandi si̱ye nkutodha ngikwelele bilo bisatu.”
43002020	Bayu̱daaya aba baamukuukamu bati, “Numba ya Luhanga eni ekatutwalila myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa na mukaagha kughikwela, ti̱ uwe okughikwelela bilo bisatu?”
43002021	Bhaatu numba eghi Yesu aabu̱ghaghʼo ni mubili ghuwe.
43002022	Ti̱ beeghesebuwa be baasuka eki aamani̱i̱si̱yagha haanu̱ma ya Yesu ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye. Baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Ekyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we eki na bighambo ebi Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye.
43002023	Yesu anali Yelusaalemu haa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, bantu bakani̱ye baabona byakuswekani̱ya ebi aakolagha kandi baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43002024	Bhaatu taabasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kumughambila eki abhonganuuwe kukola, nanga eye eenini akaba amani̱ye ebi ebo beeli̱li̱kanagha.
43002025	Taabaayʼo kwetaaghisibuwa kumughambila haa bikwetʼo bantu, nanga eye eenini amani̱ye ebili mu mitima ya bantu boona.
43003001	Hakaba haliyo musaasa li̱i̱na liye Nikodemu, akaba ali Mufali̱saayo, kandi ali mu̱lemi̱ mu Bayu̱daaya.
43003002	Kilo kimui mukilo aaghenda hambali Yesu ali, aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, tumani̱ye ngoku Luhanga aaku̱tu̱mi̱ye kwegheesi̱ya ebi akubbalagha ati bantu bakole. Nanga taaliyo oghu akugubha kukola byakulolelʼo byakuswekani̱ya okukolagha ebi kuuyʼo Luhanga aliiye amu̱tu̱mi̱ye kubikola.”
43003003	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, kuuyʼo muntu atodhi̱ye abyahuwe buhyaka, taakugubha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.”
43003004	Nikodemu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Buuye muntu naamali̱ye kuba muntu mukulu akugubha ati̱ya kutodha ku̱byaluwa? Nkimani̱ye takikugubhukana eye kutodha kukuuka munda ya ni̱na wee kutodha ku̱byaluwa!”
43003005	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Nkughambiiye majima ghoonini, taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kuba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, kuuyʼo abyahuwe kukwama mu maasi kandi mu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
43003006	Bantu baku̱byalagha mubili ghwonkaha, bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye niiye akuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa mwoyo.”
43003007	Eki naaghambi̱ye nti mukulaghiluwa ku̱byaluwa buhyaka kitakuswekani̱ya.
43003008	Ngoku okugubha ku̱u̱ghu̱wa mpwegha neehunga hambali ebbali̱ye, bhaatu otaakugubha kughambila bantu hambali ekwete kughenda kedha ku̱lu̱gha, niikuwo otaakugubha kusoboolola bantu ngoku Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱ buhyaka.
43003009	Nikodemu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Eki kikugubhukana ki̱ti̱ya?”
43003010	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Uwe mwegheesi̱ya wa di̱i̱ni̱ bahu̱ti̱i̱ye mu bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, taweetegheleei̱ye ebi naabu̱ghi̱ye haa ku̱byaluwa buhyaka?
43003011	Nkughambiiye majima ghoonini, tu̱ku̱bu̱ghagha ebi tumani̱ye, kandi tuha buukai̱so bwa ebi twaboone. Bhaatu enu̱we mukubhengagha ku̱si̱i̱ma buukai̱so bwatu.
43003012	Mulakaba mu̱bhengi̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi nkwete kubaghambila haa bikwete kulehukana munsi, mulahi̱ki̱li̱ja mu̱ti̱ya nankabha mbaghambila haa bikwete kulehukana mu eghulu?
43003013	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aalaghendi̱ye mu eghulu kuuyʼo Mwana wa Muntu oghu akalu̱gha mu eghulu.
43003014	Kandi ngoku Musa aakoli̱ye mu kyoma kisasani̱ kya njoka aakita haa mpaghi mu elungu niikuwo dhee na Mwana wa Muntu balimuta batiyo dhee haa musalaba,
43003015	niikuwo weena oghu aku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja atunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.”
43003016	“Kumanya Luhanga naaku̱ndi̱ye nsi, akahayo Mwana wee omui enkaha, niikuwo weena oghu aku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja atahwelekeelela, bhaatu atunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43003017	Nanga Luhanga taatu̱mi̱ye Mwana wee munsi ku̱ghi̱twi̱la musango, bhaatu niikuwo nsi egubhe kujunuwa kukwamu mu Mwana oghu.
43003018	Ti̱ weena oghu aku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, taaku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango, bhaatu weena oghu ataaku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja aamali̱ye ku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango nanga taahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Mwana omui enkaha wa Luhanga.
43003019	Ku̱twi̱la musango kwa Luhanga niikuwo kuli kuti: kyeleeli̱ akaasa munsi, bhaatu bantu baakunda mweli̱ma kusaali̱ya kyeleeli̱ oghu haabwa kubbala kuukala mbanakola bikoluwa byabo bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
43003020	Weena oghu akuukalagha naakola bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, okwohagha kyeleeli̱ kandi taakwisagha hambali kyeleeli̱ kili, nanga akwobahagha bikoluwa biye bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kuboneka.
43003021	Bhaatu oghu akukolagha byamajima akwisagha hambali kyeleeli̱ kili, niikuwo kyeleeli̱ kigubhe kwoleka bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngu ebi akwete kukola Luhanga niiye akwete ku̱mu̱gu̱bhi̱i̱si̱ya kubikola.”
43003022	Haanu̱ma yʼebi, Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaghenda mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya hambali aamali̱ye bwile ali hamui nabo kandi naabati̱ja bantu.
43003023	Bwile obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ naye dhee aabati̱jagha bantu mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ ghwa Ai̱nooni̱ haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Sali̱i̱mu̱ nanga niiyo maasi ghatobheeye ghaabaagha. Kandi bantu bakani̱ye baakalagha mbaasa ewaa Yohaana oghu kubabati̱ja.
43003024	(Yohaana oghu aabati̱jagha bantu batakamukwete kumuta mu nkomo.)
43003025	Bamui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana, baatandika kuhakangana na omui mu Bayu̱daaya haa mi̱ghendi̱yo ya kunaaba niikuwo muntu afooke oghu eeli̱ye mu maaso ghaa Luhanga.
43003026	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yohaana oghu baasi̱ye hambali ali baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, musaasa oghu akaba ali naawe obu waabati̱jagha bantu luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, oghu waatughambiiyʼo, endindi niibuwo aabati̱ja bantu kandi bantu bakani̱ye niibuwo baaghenda hambali ali kubabati̱ja mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kwisa ewaatu.”
43003027	Yohaana aabakuukamu ati, “Muntu kwonkaha taakugubha kukola eki Luhanga atamu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kukikola.
43003028	Nanga naanu boonini mukugubha kuha buukai̱so muti nkaghila nti, ‘Taani̱i̱si̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to, bhaatu si̱ye Luhanga akantuma ku̱du̱bha kwisa eye atakaasi̱ye.’
43003029	Kili ngoku mugholi akubaagha mukali̱ wa musaasa oghu alimamuswela. Ti̱ bhootu̱ sya mugholi wa busaasa akuukalagha naye kandi ategheeleli̱ya ebi aku̱bu̱gha, kandi akaaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha ngoku mugholi wa busaasa oghu aku̱bu̱gha, aaghu̱wa adheedheeu̱we. Ti̱ oku niikuwo kudheedhuwa oku ndi nakuwo endindi.
43003030	Bantu bakulaghiluwa ku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya kukani̱ye, kandi si̱ye bampu̱ti̱ye kukee.
43003031	“Yesu oghu akalu̱gha mu eghulu asaai̱ye bantu boona. Ti̱ muntu oghu babyaliiye munsi muni akubaagha muntu kwonkaha, kandi aku̱bu̱ghagha ebi aboone mbilehukana munsi muni. Bhaatu Yesu oghu akalu̱gha mu eghulu asaai̱ye bantu boona.
43003032	Akuhaagha buukai̱so bwa ebi aaghu̱u̱ye kandi aaboone, bhaatu bantu bakani̱ye bakubhengagha buukai̱so buwe obu.
43003033	Abaku̱si̱i̱magha buukai̱so buwe, bakubaagha mbooleka ngu ebi Luhanga aku̱bu̱ghagha ni majima.
43003034	Nanga oghu Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye oghu aku̱bu̱ghagha bighambo bya Luhanga, nanga Luhanga akamuha bu̱toki̱ bwona buusuuye bwa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
43003035	Ese Mwana oghu amu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kandi akamuha bu̱toki̱ kulema bu̱li̱ kintu kyona.
43003036	Weena oghu aku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Mwana oghu akutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, bhaatu weena oghu akubhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Mwana oghu taakutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, kandi Luhanga akuukala amughiliiye ki̱i̱ni̱gha.”
43004001	Bafali̱saayo baamanya ngoku Yesu akwete kutunga beeghesebuwa bakani̱ye abakwete kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa kusaali̱ya aba Yohaana aabati̱jagha.
43004002	Bhaatu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu niibo baabati̱jagha bantu aba, Yesu eye eenini taabati̱jagha bantu bbaa.
43004003	Obu aamani̱ye ngoku Bafali̱saayo baamani̱ye eki, aalu̱gha mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya kandi aatodha aakuuka mu ya Galilaaya.
43004004	Yesu naanakuuka e Galilaaya, aakwamila mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya.
43004005	Naanakwamila mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ eghi aaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Samali̱ya eghi baaghilaghamu Sikaali̱, eghi eli haai na kibanja eki Yakobbo aahaaye mutabani̱ wee Yojeefu̱.
43004006	Mu ki̱i̱kalo eki niiyo kyahu̱dhu̱ kya Yakobbo kyabaagha. Ti̱ saaha nga mukaagha haala syantangaali̱ kandi Yesu akaba aluwakaki̱ye haabwa kulubhatanga lughendo lu̱seli̱ye, du̱mbi̱ aasitama haai na kyahu̱dhu̱ eki.
43004007	Yesu anali haala mukali̱ oghu akaba akaaye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya eghi, aasa haa kyahu̱dhu̱ haala kutaha maasi, naanaghataha Yesu aamughila ati, “Gutu, ompe haa maasi ghaawe haala ninuwʼo.”
43004008	(Bwile obu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu bakaba baghendi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ kughula byokuliya.)
43004009	Mukali̱ wʼomu Samali̱ya oghu aakuukamu Yesu ati, “Uwe oli Mu̱yu̱daaya kandi si̱ye naaba mukali̱ wʼomu Samali̱ya, ti̱ okugubha oti̱ya kunsaba oti nkuhe maasi ghaa kunuwa?” (Bayu̱daaya tabakukolanganagha na Basamali̱ya.)
43004010	Yesu aakuukamu mukali̱ oghu ati, “Mukali̱ toomani̱ye kisembo eki Luhanga akubbala kukuha kandi toomani̱ye si̱ye oghu nkwete kukusaba nti ompe maasi ghaa kunuwa. Nguli waabaagha omani̱ye si̱ye, wangunsabi̱ye kukuha maasi aghakukuha bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.”
43004011	Mukali̱ oghu aaghila Yesu ati, “Wai̱tu̱, kyahu̱dhu̱ kini kitobheeye kandi tooli na kya ku̱koti̱yamu kutahi̱ya maasi. Ti̱ maasi aghakuleka muntu naatunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, okughaaya haa?
43004012	Taata waatu Yakobbo niiye akatuli̱mi̱i̱si̱li̱ya kyahu̱dhu̱ kini kandi ka yee yoona hani niiyo baakaayagha maasi ghaa kunuwa. Kandi na bisolo biye byona hani niiyo baakabiihilagha maasi ghaa kunuwa. Buuye okubbala kughila oti osaai̱ye Yakobbo oghu?”
43004013	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Weena oghu akunuwaagha maasi aghalu̱ghi̱ye mu kyahu̱dhu̱ kini eliyo likutodhagha limukwata,
43004014	bhaatu weena oghu akunuwaagha maasi agha nkuhaagha taakutodhagha eliyo limukwata bbaa. Nanga maasi agha nkumuha ghakufooka mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe nga nsulo eghi ekuleka naatunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.”
43004015	Mukali̱ oghu aaghila Yesu ati, “Wai̱tu̱, ompe haa maasi agha niikuwo eliyo litalitodha kunkwata kandi ntatodha kuukala niinaasa hani kutaha maasi.”
43004016	Yesu aaghila mukali̱ oghu ati, “Oghende obilikile bali̱i̱ waawe mukuuke naye hani.”
43004017	Mukali̱ oghu aakuukamu Yesu ati, “Tandi na bali̱i̱ wanje bbaa.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Ohi̱ki̱i̱ye kughila tooli na bali̱i̱ waawe.
43004018	Ti̱ majima ghali ngu baakusweyʼo basaasa bataano, kandi musaasa oghu muli naye endindi taakabaaye bali̱i̱ waawe bbaa. Eki waalu̱gha ku̱bu̱gha eki ni majima ghoonini.”
43004019	Mukali̱ oghu aaghila Yesu ati, “Wai̱tu̱, endindi naakimanya ngoku oli mulangi̱.
43004020	Baataata baatu baalami̱li̱yagha Luhanga haa mwena ghuni, bhaatu enu̱we Bayu̱daaya mukughilagha muti Yelusaalemu niikiyo ki̱i̱kalo bantu babhonganuuwe kulami̱li̱yamu Luhanga.”
43004021	Yesu aamughila ati, “Mukali̱ uwe, ohi̱ki̱li̱je ebi nkwete kukughambila nti, bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka hambali bantu bataakulami̱li̱ya Luhanga Eseetu̱we haa mwena ghuni kedha mu Yelusaalemu.
43004022	Enu̱we Basamali̱ya mukulami̱yagha eki mutamani̱ye, bhaatu etu̱we Bayu̱daaya tukulami̱yagha eki tumani̱ye, nanga ku̱lu̱gha mu etu̱we Bayu̱daaya niimuwo Luhanga aahi̱ye oghu aatu̱mi̱ye oghu akujuna bantu musango ghwa bibhi byabo.
43004023	Bhaatu bwile bukwisa, kandi bwamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ka, obu abakulami̱ya mu majima abakulami̱ya Eseetu̱we mu mwoyo kandi mu majima. Aba niibo bantu aba Eseetu̱we aku̱si̱i̱magha kulami̱ya kwabo.
43004024	Luhanga ni mwoyo, kandi abamukulami̱ya babhonganuuwe kumulami̱ya mu mwoyo kandi mu majima.”
43004025	Mukali̱ oghu aamughila ati, “Nimani̱ye ngoku Masiya (oghu bakughilaghamu Ki̱li̱si̱to) akwisa. Ti̱ akaakwisa, niiye akutughambila bintu byona.”
43004026	Yesu aamughila ati, “Si̱ye oghu nkwete ku̱bu̱gha naawe ni̱i̱si̱ye mukama oghu.”
43004027	Yesu naanabu̱gha na mukali̱ oghu, beeghesebuwa be baaki̱dha. Baasweka kusanga naabu̱gha na mukali̱ oghu. Bhaatu taaliyo mweghesebuwa nʼomui oghu akabu̱u̱li̱ya mukali̱ oghu ati, “Okubbala ki?” Kedha ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu bati, “Oku̱bu̱gha na mukali̱ oghu nangaaki?”
43004028	Du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu aati̱gha haala munagha aabaagha aasi̱ye kutahilamu maasi, aaghenda aaghambila bamui mu bantu abaabaagha mu tau̱ni̱ ati,
43004029	“Mwise mulole musaasa oghu angambiiye byona ebi naakakola mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje. Buuye musaasa oghu akugubha kuba ali Ki̱li̱si̱to?”
43004030	Bantu bakani̱ye baalu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ eghi, baatandika kughenda hambali Yesu ali.
43004031	Mukali̱ oghu anali mu tau̱ni̱ kughambila bantu, beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baatandika kumughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, okubeyo kabheghe.”
43004032	Bhaatu Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be aba ati, “Ndi na byokuliya ebi enu̱we mutamani̱yʼo na kantu koona.”
43004033	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa be aba baatandi̱ki̱ye kughambilana bati, “Haliyo muntu oghu anguba amuleeteeye byokuliya?”
43004034	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Byokuliya byanje ni kukola kandi kumala mulimo ghwa Tita oghu akantuma.
43004035	Mumani̱ye ngoku bakughilagha bati, okaakuhelagha ndimo, okughikesagha haanu̱ma ya meeli̱ anaa. Bhaatu ndimabaghila nti, muumuke, mulole ndimo yeeli̱ye ni ya kukesa.
43004036	Ti̱ ngoku mukama wa musili akuhaagha mpeela oghu akukesagha ndimo yee, niikuwo na Luhanga akuha mpeela oghu akwekambi̱i̱si̱yagha bantu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye. Kandi ngoku mukuleka bantu mbahi̱ki̱li̱ja butumuwa bwanje kutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, kili ngoku bakukesagha ndimo. Bombi oghu akuhelagha na oghu akukesagha balidheedheluwa hamui.
43004037	Mumani̱ye ngoku bantu baku̱bu̱ghagha majima bati, ‘Omui akuhelagha, onji akesa.’
43004038	Ndimabatuma niikuwo mwekambi̱i̱si̱ye bantu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye, bhaatu taali̱i̱nu̱we mukuba bʼoku̱du̱bha kubaghambila butumuwa bwa Luhanga. Bantu banji bakakola mulimo ghwa kuhela, enu̱we endindi mulimo ghwanu ni kubagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱ya ku̱bwetegheeleli̱ya niikuwo bahi̱ki̱li̱je si̱ye.”
43004039	Basamali̱ya bakani̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Sikaali̱ eghi baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, nanga mukali̱ oghu akabaghambila ati, “Musaasa oghu angambiiye byona ebi naakakola mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje.”
43004040	Ti̱ obu Basamali̱ya aba baaki̱dhi̱ye hambali Yesu ali, baamwesengeleli̱ya aakale mu tau̱ni̱ yabo eghi, nahabweki Yesu aamala mu tau̱ni̱ eghi bilo bibili.
43004041	Kandi haabwa bighambo ebi Yesu aabaghambilagha, bantu banji bakani̱ye bʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43004042	Baaghila mukali̱ oghu bati, “Endindi twahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je etali haabwa bighambo byawe byonkaha, bhaatu haabwa etu̱we kwehi̱ghwi̱la ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha, kandi twakimani̱ye ngoku majima musaasa oghu aaliiye Mu̱ju̱ni̱ wa bantu bwa munsi.”
43004043	Haanu̱ma ya Yesu kumala bilo bibili mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya eghi, aalu̱ghayo aaghenda mu ya Galilaaya.
43004044	(Yesu akaba naasangu̱u̱we aki̱bu̱ghi̱ye ati mulangi̱ tabaku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱yagha ewaabo.)
43004045	Obu aaki̱dhi̱ye e Galilaaya, bantu abakaaye mu Galilaaya eghi baamwebali̱ya, nanga bakaba bwile bunji mbaghendi̱ye e Yelusaalemu haa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kandi mbaaboone byona ebi Yesu aakoli̱yeyo.
43004046	Yesu aatodha aaghenda mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kaana mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya hambali aahinduuye maasi ghaafooka vi̱i̱ni̱. Hakaba haliyo mu̱lemi̱ mukulu oghu akaba aakaaye e Kapelenau̱mu̱, kandi mutabani̱ wa musaasa oghu akaba alwaliiye kimui.
43004047	Obu musaasa oghu aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu aalu̱ghi̱ye e Bu̱yu̱daaya kandi aaki̱dhi̱ye e Galilaaya, aaghenda hambali Yesu ali eesengeleli̱ya Yesu ati aase, aki̱li̱ye mutabani̱ wee oghu akaba alwaliiye kimui kandi ali haai ku̱ku̱wa.
43004048	Yesu aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Enu̱we bantu tamu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱jagha si̱ye kuuyʼo muboone byakuswekani̱ya ebi nkoli̱ye.”
43004049	Mukulu oghu aaghila Yesu ati, “Wai̱tu̱, gutu wiise ewanje mwana wanje atakaku̱u̱ye.”
43004050	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Oghende, mutabani̱ waawe akukila.” Musaasa oghu aahi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi Yesu aamughambiiye, aaghenda.
43004051	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo obu musaasa oghu aanaghendagha ewe eka, aasangaana baheeleli̱ya be, baamughambila ngoku mwana oghu aabaagha alwaye aaki̱li̱ye.
43004052	Obu aababu̱u̱i̱ye bwile obu mwana oghu aakiliiyemu, baamughila bati, “Mu̱swi̱ja ghwamu̱ki̱li̱ye eso saaha musanju̱ sya ntangaali̱.”
43004053	Du̱mbi̱ ese wa mwana oghu aasuka ngoku obu aliibuwo bwile Yesu aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mwana waawe akukila.” Nahabweki eye na bantu baa ka yee boona baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43004054	Eki niikiyo kyakuswekani̱ya kyakabili eki Yesu aakoleeye Galilaaya haanu̱ma ya ku̱lu̱gha Bu̱yu̱daaya.
43005001	Bwile bunji, Yesu aaghenda Yelusaalemu haa ki̱ghenu̱ kya di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya.
43005002	Mu Yelusaalemu eghi hakaba haliyo kiijongo ekili haai nʼelembo eli ntaama syataahilaghamu kughenda mu kibugha. Kiijongo eki mu Lulamai̱ki̱ bakukighilaghamu Bbeti̱sai̱da. Kandi haliyo bijalaja bitaano ebi̱kyeli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye.
43005003	Mu bijalaja omu niimuwo balwaye baakalagha balangaaye: abaaghaaye maaso, balema, na abaghenagheneeu̱we. [Baakalagha balindiliiye maasi ghʼomu kinjongo eki kubimba niikuwo oghu akukotamu akile.
43005004	Bunji nʼobunji malai̱ka wa Mukama aasagha abi̱mbi̱ya maasi agha, ti̱ weena oghu aadu̱bhagha kukotamu, aakilagha ndwala yee.]
43005005	Hakaba haliyo musaasa omui mu balwaye aba oghu akaba alwaye kumala myaka maku̱mi̱ asatu na munaanaa.
43005006	Obu Yesu aaboone musaasa oghu alangaaye haala, kandi aamanya ngoku aamali̱yʼo bwile bukani̱ye, Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya musaasa oghu ati, “Okubbala kukila?”
43005007	Musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Wai̱tu̱, tankutungagha muntu weena oghu akugubha kunkoonela ku̱nkoti̱ya mu kiijongo eki nkyabi̱mbi̱ye, nkaakulengaghʼo kukotamu nsanga onji naamali̱ye kukotamu.”
43005008	Niibuwo Yesu aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Oomuke, okome kalili kaawe, olubhatange.”
43005009	Du̱mbi̱ musaasa oghu aakila, aakoma kalili ke, aalubhatanga. Kilo eki Yesu aaki̱li̱i̱ye musaasa oghu kikaba kili kilo kya Sabhato.
43005010	Obu Bayu̱daaya baaboone musaasa oghu Yesu aaki̱li̱i̱ye oghu, baamughila bati, “Kilaghilo kitutangi̱ye kukola mulimo ghwona haa kilo kya Sabhato, ti̱ haabwaki uwe oheeki̱ye mukeka ghwawe oghu?”
43005011	Aabakuukamu ati, “Musaasa oghu anki̱li̱i̱ye niiye angi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Okome mukeka ghwawe, olubhatange.’ ”
43005012	Niibuwo baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Ni muntu wa mulingo ki, oghu aaku̱ghi̱li̱ye ati oghukome, olubhatange?”
43005013	Musaasa oghu Yesu aaki̱li̱i̱ye oghu eye akaba atamani̱ye Yesu, nanga Yesu akaba naabulanganilaane mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo.
43005014	Hasaayʼo bwile bukee, Yesu aasanga musaasa oghu mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Oboone ngoku waaki̱li̱ye; otatodha ku̱si̱i̱sa, nanga kintu kinji ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kusaali̱ya haala kikusobola kukubʼo.”
43005015	Musaasa oghu aaghenda, aaghambila Bayu̱daaya ngoku Yesu aniiye aamu̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
43005016	Obu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu aaki̱li̱i̱ye musaasa oghu haa kilo kya Sabhato, baatandika kumuhiighani̱ja.
43005017	Yesu aabaghila ati “Tita Luhanga akukolagha bwile bwona nankabha haa kilo kya Sabhato, kandi eki niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye nanje ninkola dhee.”
43005018	Obu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baalengelʼo kimui na maani̱ ghaabo ghoona kubbala mulingo ghwa kumwita. Etali haabwa kubhenga ku̱hu̱ti̱ya kilaghilo ekikwetʼo kilo kya Sabhato kyonkaha, bhaatu haabwa kughila ati Luhanga ni Ese wee, neetwala kuba engana-ngaane na Luhanga.
43005019	Niibuwo Yesu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, Mwana taakukolagha kintu kyona haabuwe enkaha, bhaatu akukolagha byonkaha ebi akubonagha Ese wee naakola. Nanga byona ebi Ese wee akukolagha, niibiyo na Mwana akukolagha.
43005020	Nanga Ese oghu aku̱ndi̱ye Mwana wee oghu kandi akumwolekagha byona ebi Ese wee oghu akukolagha. Kandi bikoluwa bikani̱ye bisaai̱ye bini bikwolekuwa Mwana oghu, niikuwo enu̱we musaali̱yʼo kusweka.
43005021	Ngoku Ese Mwana oghu aku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱lagha baku̱u̱ye kandi abaha bwomi̱i̱li̱, niikuwo dhee na Mwana oghu akuhaagha bantu aba abbali̱ye bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43005022	Ese Mwana oghu taaku̱twi̱lagha muntu weena musango, bhaatu Mwana wee niiye aahaaye bu̱toki̱ ku̱twi̱la bantu musango.
43005023	Nahabweki bantu bali na ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Mwana ngoku baku̱hu̱ti̱yagha Ese wee. Ti̱ weena oghu akubhenga ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Mwana oghu, akuba abhengi̱ye ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Ese wee oghu akamutuma.”
43005024	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, weena oghu aku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi si̱ye nkwete kumughambila kandi ahi̱ki̱li̱ja oghu akantuma, akutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo. Taaku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango, bhaatu akuba amali̱ye ku̱lu̱gha mu lu̱ku̱, ataahi̱ye mu bwomi̱i̱li̱.
43005025	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, bwile bukwisa kandi bwahi̱ki̱ye, obu baku̱u̱ye baku̱u̱ghu̱wa elaka lya Mwana wa Luhanga, kandi abaku̱u̱ghu̱wa bakuba boomi̱i̱li̱.
43005026	Ngoku Ese Mwana oghu akugubha kuleka bantu mbatunga bwomi̱i̱li̱, niikuwo na Mwana wee akuha bantu bwomi̱i̱li̱.
43005027	Kandi Ese Mwana oghu aamuhaaye bu̱toki̱ bwa ku̱twi̱la bantu musango nanga niiye Mwana wa Muntu.
43005028	Ti̱ eki ndimaghenda kubaghambila kini kitabaswekani̱ya. Bwile buli haai ku̱hi̱ka obu bantu boona abaku̱u̱ye baku̱u̱ghu̱wa elaka liye, kandi boona bahu̱mbu̱u̱ke.
43005029	Abaakoli̱ye kulungi bali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka batunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, bhaatu abaakoli̱ye kubhi bali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka ku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango.
43005030	Tankukolagha kintu kyona haabwanje nenkaha. Nku̱twi̱lagha bantu musango ngoku ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye, kandi ntu̱wamu yanje ni ya bwengani̱ja, nanga tankubbalagha kukola ebi̱ndheedhi̱ye neenini, bhaatu ebi̱dheedhi̱ye oghu akantuma.
43005031	Nguli aabaagha si̱ye nenkaha oghu nkwete kughambila bantu ebinkwetʼo, bantu bakugubha kughila bati ebi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha taghali majima.
43005032	Bhaatu Tita akumpeelagha buukai̱so ngoku ebi nku̱bu̱gha ghali majima, kandi nkimani̱ye ngoku buukai̱so buwe akumpeelagha ngoku aghali majima.
43005033	Mukatuma bantu ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ haa bikwetʼo si̱ye, aabaghambila majima ghoonini.
43005034	Tanku̱bu̱gha eki haabwa kubbala bantu kumpeela buukai̱so, bhaatu naabaghambiiye eki niikuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je kandi Luhanga abajune.
43005035	Yohaana akabu̱gha naanu aabooleka bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngoku aani̱i̱si̱ye Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye, kandi dhaani haa bwile bukee mwabbala ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ebi Yohaana oghu aabu̱ghagha.
43005036	Bhaatu mbaghambiiye byakuswekani̱ya ebi Tita ampaaye kukola kandi kumali̱li̱ja, ebi byonini byoleki̱ye kwonini ngoku aani̱i̱si̱ye Tita aatu̱mi̱ye kusaali̱ya buukai̱so bwa Yohaana ampeeleeye.
43005037	Kandi Tita eenini oghu akantuma, akumpeela buukai̱so ngoku aani̱i̱si̱ye aatu̱mi̱ye. Tamukamu̱u̱ghu̱wagha kandi tamukamubonagha ngoku asu̱si̱ye,
43005038	kandi tamukwete ebi aalaghiiye nanga tamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye oghu aatu̱mi̱ye.
43005039	Mukwekambagha kusoma Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we nanga mukumanyagha muti kwekamba kubyegha kukubaha bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo. Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebi ni̱i̱syoni bi̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo,
43005040	bhaatu kusa enu̱we mukubhengagha ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja niikuwo mbahe bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43005041	Tanaasi̱ye nti niikuwo bantu bansinde.
43005042	Bhaatu enu̱we nimani̱ye mitwalikani̱ye yaanu, nkimani̱ye ngoku ataliyo muntu nʼomui mu enu̱we oghu aku̱ndi̱ye Luhanga.
43005043	Nkaasa mu li̱i̱na lya Tita, kandi enu̱we mwabhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye. Bhaatu muntu onji naasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na liye enkaha, oghu mu̱ku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43005044	Nkimani̱ye tamu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye nanga enu̱we mukubbalagha bantu baanakyanu aaniibo baabasinda mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kubbala Luhanga wamajima aaniiye aabasinda.
43005045	“Bhaatu muteeli̱li̱kana muti si̱ye nkwete kubanyegheelela ewaa Tita. Oghu akubanyegheelela ni Musa nankabha mwesi̱ghi̱ye muti ebi aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye niibiyo bikubajuna.
43005046	Nguli mwasi̱i̱mi̱ye ebi Musa aabaghambilagha mwangu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye, nanga ebi aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ni̱i̱si̱ye byabu̱ghaghʼo.
43005047	Bhaatu buuye ngoku mutaahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ebi Musa aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye, mulahi̱ki̱li̱ja mu̱ti̱ya ebi nkwete kubaghambila?”
43006001	Niibuwo Yesu aabhasu̱ki̱ye aaghenda haa ki̱si̱yo kya luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja ya Galilaaya (eghi bakughilaghamu nanja ya Ti̱bbeli̱yo.)
43006002	Ki̱bbu̱la kyamaani̱ kya bantu kyamukwama nanga bakaba mbaaboone byakulolelʼo byakuswekani̱ya aakoli̱ye bya ku̱ki̱li̱ya balwaye.
43006003	Yesu na beeghesebuwa be baaghenda haa mwena, baasitamʼo.
43006004	Bwile obu Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Bayu̱daaya kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kikaba kili haai ku̱hi̱ka.
43006005	Obu Yesu aaloli̱ye, naabona ki̱bbu̱la kyamaani̱ kya bantu eki mbaasa hambali ali, aaghila Fi̱li̱po ati, “Byokuliya bya bantu aba boona kuliya tukubighulila haa?”
43006006	Aabu̱u̱li̱ya atiyo Fi̱li̱po kumulengesa kwonkaha, nanga eye akaba amani̱ye eki akughenda kukola.
43006007	Fi̱li̱po aamukuukamu ati, “Nankabha bakoleesi̱ya sente syengaane na musaala oghu muntu akukolelagha kumala meeli̱ munaanaa taghukugubha kughula byokuliya ebikumala bantu aba hakili bu̱li̱ omui kuliyʼo kabheghe kati̱i̱ bbaa!”
43006008	Onji mu beeghesebuwa be, Andeleya waani̱na Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo, aaghila ati,
43006009	“Mutabhana ali hani, ali na migaati̱ etaano nabwana-bwana hamui na nsu̱i̱ ebili sinabwana-bwana. Bhaatu ebi bilamala bi̱ti̱ya bantu bakaniiye kimui aba?”
43006010	Yesu aaghila ati, “Musitami̱ye bantu aba boona hansi.” Bu̱si̱ngo bukaba buli mu ki̱i̱kalo eki obukumala bantu aba kusitamʼo. Ti̱ bantu aba boona baasitama haa bu̱si̱ngo haala. Basaasa abaabaagha mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki bakaba bali nga nku̱mi̱ etaano.
43006011	Yesu aakwata migaati̱ eghi, aasi̱i̱ma Luhanga, aaghiha beeghesebuwa be kughitambu̱li̱ya kusighikila ngoku bu̱li̱ muntu aabbalagha. Niikuwo na nsu̱i̱ aakasi̱koli̱ye atiyo dhee.
43006012	Obu bantu aba boona baaliiye mbaakutila kimui, Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mukumaani̱ye bulaghalikuwa bwona obwati̱ghaayʼo, mutati̱ghʼo na kantu koona kubhiiya.”
43006013	Beeghesebuwa aba baakumaani̱ya bulaghalikuwa bwa migaati̱ obu bwona baasu̱li̱ya bighegha eku̱mi̱ na bibili bwa byokuliya ebi obwalaghalikagha abaaliiye aba.
43006014	Haanu̱ma ya bantu aba kubona kyakuswekani̱ya eki Yesu aakoli̱ye eki, baatandika kughila bati, “Majima oni niiye mulangi̱ oghu baaghi̱li̱ye bati akwisa munsi.”
43006015	Yesu aamanya ngoku bantu aba bakwete kubbala kumuhambi̱li̱ja kumufoola mukama na ki̱ku̱bha, du̱mbi̱ aabalu̱ghʼo, aaghenda haa mwena aakalayʼo enkaha.
43006016	Obu bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, beeghesebuwa be baakota ku̱lu̱gha haa mwena, baaghenda haa nanja.
43006017	Bhaatu bwile bwala Yesu atakaku̱u̱ki̱ye. Du̱mbi̱ baani̱i̱na bwati̱ baatandika kubhasuka luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja eghi kughenda mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kapelenau̱mu̱.
43006018	Niibuwo mwegha ghwamaani̱ ghwatandi̱ki̱ye kuhunga haa nanja, maasi ghoona ghaatabukila kimui.
43006019	Haanu̱ma ya beeghesebuwa aba kughenda haa nanja haala mailo esatu kedha esatu nʼeki̱twi̱ke, baabona Yesu naalubhangila haagu̱u̱li̱ ya nanja neebinga bwati̱ obu balimu, ti̱ boona boobaha.
43006020	Bhaatu Yesu aabaghila ati, “Muleke kwobaha, ni̱i̱syoni.”
43006021	Na kudheedhuwa kukani̱ye beeghesebuwa baami̱li̱li̱ya bwati̱ niikuwo Yesu abu̱ni̱i̱nemu, du̱mbi̱ baabona mbaaki̱dhi̱ye haa ki̱si̱yo hambali baaghendagha.
43006022	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu ekyati̱ghaaye lwagholo obu aahaaye bantu migaati̱ haa ki̱si̱yo kya luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja ya Galilaaya e Bbetesai̱da, baamanya ngoku bwati̱ bumui bwonkaha obwabaagha bu̱ti̱ghaayʼo kandi beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baabhasu̱ki̱ye nabuwo luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja. Baamanya dhee ngoku Yesu ataaghendi̱ye nabo mu bwati̱ obu.
43006023	Maati̱ ghanji aghaalu̱ghi̱ye haa mwalo ghwa Ti̱bbeli̱yo ghaaki̱dha haai na ki̱i̱kalo hambali bantu baaliiye byokuliya haanu̱ma ya Mukama Yesu ku̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga.
43006024	Nahabweki obu bantu aba baaboone Yesu ataliyo kandi na beeghesebuwa bataliyo, baani̱i̱na maati̱ agha baabhasuka luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja ya Galilaaya, baaghenda e Kapelenau̱mu̱ kubbalayo Yesu.
43006025	Obu bantu aba baaki̱dhi̱ye luhande lweli̱ lwa nanja ya Galilaaya, baasangayo Yesu, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, waaki̱dhi̱ye hani dhi̱?”
43006026	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, tamukwete kumbala haabwa byakuswekani̱ya nkukolagha. Mukwete kumbala nanga eso naabahaaye migaati̱ mwaliya, mwakuta.
43006027	Muleke kufoola byokuliya kighendeleluwa kyanu kyamaani̱, nanga biyo bikuhuwaaghʼo. Bhaatu eki mukufoola kyamaani̱ mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu kibe ekikubaleetela bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, obu Mwana wa Muntu akubaha. Mwana wa Muntu oghu niiye Luhanga Ese wee aahaaye bu̱toki̱ kuha bwomi̱i̱li̱ obu.”
43006028	Niibuwo baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Buuye nkiki kyonini eki Luhanga akubbala ati tukole?”
43006029	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Eki Luhanga akubbala, ni enu̱we ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja oghu aatu̱mi̱ye.”
43006030	Niibuwo baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Buuye nkyakuswekani̱ya ki eki okutukolela, niikuwo tu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱je? Okukola kyakuswekani̱ya ki?
43006031	Baataata baatu baaliyagha maanu mu elungu; ngoku kili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, ‘Luhanga akabaha byokuliya ku̱lu̱gha eghulu baabiliya.’ ”
