43006032	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, Musa taaniiye akaha baataata baanu byokuliya ku̱lu̱gha eghulu, bhaatu Tita niiye akuhaagha byokuliya byamajima ebi̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu.
43006033	Mugaati̱ oghu Luhanga akuhaagha ni muntu oghu akalu̱gha mu eghulu kandi niiye akuhaagha bantu baa munsi bwomi̱i̱li̱.”
43006034	Baamughila bati, “Wai̱tu̱, otuhaaghe byokuliya ebi.”
43006035	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni byokuliya ebikuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱. Weena oghu akunjisʼo kandi ahi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye taakutodha njala kumukwata, kandi eliyo kumukwata.
43006036	Naabaghambiiye kandi mubona byakuswekani̱ya ebi nkukolagha, bhaatu tamukahi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku aani̱i̱si̱ye Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye.
43006037	Boona aba Tita Luhanga ampaaye bakunjisʼo, kandi weena oghu akunjisʼo, taaliyo nʼomui oghu nkubhinga bbaa.
43006038	Nanga nkalu̱gha mu eghulu etali kwisa kukola ebi si̱ye mbbali̱ye, bhaatu kukola ebi oghu akantuma abbali̱ye.
43006039	Ti̱ eki oghu akantuma abbali̱ye ni ngu aba ampaaye aba atabʼo nʼomui oghu nku̱bu̱li̱yʼo, bhaatu batunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi nibahu̱mbu̱u̱le haa kilo kya mpelo.
43006040	Nanga Tita abbali̱ye ati weena oghu akubonagha Mwana wee kandi amu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja atunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, kandi ndi̱mu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la haa kilo kya mpelo.”
43006041	Obu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba baaghu̱u̱ye batiyo, baasaaliluwa ku̱u̱ghu̱wa naaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye byokuliya ebyalu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu.”
43006042	Baaghila bati, “Oni taaniiye Yesu mutabani̱ wa Yojeefu̱, oghu tumani̱ye ese wee na ni̱na wee? Akugubha ati̱ya kughila ati, ‘Nkalu̱gha mu eghulu?’ ”
43006043	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Muleke kusaaliluwa.
43006044	Taaliyo oghu akugubha ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja kuuyʼo Tita oghu akantuma amu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye, kandi oghu niiye ndi̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la haa kilo kya mpelo.
43006045	Mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we haliyo hambali balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye bati, ‘Luhanga eenini alyegheesi̱ya bantu.’ Ti̱ mbaghambiiye, weena oghu akudhootela kandi eetegheeleli̱ya ebi Tita aabu̱ghi̱ye akunjisʼo.
43006046	Taaliyo nʼomui oghu alaaboonʼo Tita kuuyʼo si̱ye oghu nkalu̱gha hambali Tita Luhanga oghu ali, ni̱i̱si̱ye nenkaha naaboone Tita oghu.
43006047	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, weena oghu aku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja akutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43006048	Ni̱i̱si̱ye byokuliya ebikuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱.
43006049	Nankabha baataata baanu mbaaliiye maanu mu elungu, bwile bukahi̱ka boona baaku̱wa.
43006050	Bhaatu ni̱i̱si̱ye byokuliya ebyalu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu. Kaakuba muntu aliya haa byokuliya haala taaku̱ku̱wa bbaa.
43006051	Ni̱i̱si̱ye byokuliya ebikuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱ ebyalu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu. Ti̱ muntu weena naanaliiye haa byokuliya haala, akuba na bwomi̱i̱li̱ bilo nʼebilo. Byokuliya ebi ni mubili ghwanje, oghu nkuhaayʼo niikuwo bantu baa munsi batunge bwomi̱i̱li̱.”
43006052	Niibuwo Bayu̱daaya aba baatandi̱ki̱ye kuhakanganilana kimui bonkaha na bonkaha bati, “Musaasa oni akugubha ati̱ya kutuha mubili ghuwe kughuliya?”
43006053	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, kuuyʼo muliiye mubili ghwa Mwana wa Muntu kandi munooye na saghama yee, tamukugubha kutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱.
43006054	Weena oghu akuliya haa mubili ghwanje kandi naanuwa haa saghama yanje, niiye akutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, kandi ndi̱mu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la haa kilo kya mpelo.
43006055	Nanga mubili ghwanje kandi na saghama yanje niibiyo byokuliya byamajima.
43006056	Muntu weena oghu akuliya mubili ghwanje kandi naanuwa haa saghama yanje, akuukala anangumiiyʼo kandi nanje ninamughumiiyʼo.
43006057	Nanga ngoku Tita mwomi̱i̱li̱ antu̱mi̱ye, kandi ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwa Tita oghu, niikuwo na weena oghu akuliya si̱ye, akuba mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwanje.
43006058	Ni̱i̱si̱ye byokuliya byamajima ebyalu̱ghi̱ye mu eghulu. Baataata baanu bakaliya maanu, bwile bwahi̱ka baaku̱wa, bhaatu oghu akuliya haa byokuliya bini akuba mwomi̱i̱li̱ bilo nʼebilo.”
43006059	Ebi akabi̱bu̱gha obu eegheeseli̱yagha mu elami̱li̱yo lya Bayu̱daaya e Kapelenau̱mu̱.
43006060	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, bakani̱ye mu beeghesebuwa be baaghila bati, “Ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya ebi nkabitimbikaane bhaawai̱. Ni ani̱ akugubha ku̱byetegheeleli̱ya?”
43006061	Yesu aamanya ngoku ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya byatalibani̱i̱je beeghesebuwa be ku̱byetegheeleli̱ya, aabaghila ati, “Buuye ebi neegheeseei̱ye ebi byabatalibani̱i̱je?
43006062	Ti̱ tamuliswekela kimui obu mulibona Mwana wa Muntu naakuuka mu eghulu hambali aalu̱ghi̱ye?
43006063	Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye niiye akuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱, mubili taghuli na mughaso bbaa. Bighambo naabaghambiiye ebi niibiyo bya mwoyo kandi ebikubaha bwomi̱i̱li̱.
43006064	Bhaatu bakani̱ye mu enu̱we tababbali̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.” (Yesu akabu̱gha eki nanga ku̱lu̱gha mu ntandiko akamanya abataaku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, kandi aamanya nʼoghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya.)
43006065	Eeyongela aabaghila ati, “Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naaghambila bantu nti tabakugubha ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja kuuyʼo Tita abagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱i̱ye.”
43006066	Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu bakani̱ye mu beeghesebuwa be baatandika ku̱mu̱lu̱ghʼo, tabaatodhi̱ye beeyongela kuukala banamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je.
43006067	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱u̱i̱ye beeghesebuwa be eku̱mi̱ na babili ati, “Naanu dhee mukubbala ku̱ndu̱ghʼo kughenda?”
43006068	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama, tulaghenda ewaa ani̱? Nuuwe oku̱bu̱ghagha bighambo ebikuleka ntutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43006069	Tu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je kandi tukimani̱ye ngoku anuuwe Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye wa Luhanga.”
43006070	Niibuwo Yesu aabaku̱u̱ki̱yemu ati, “Taani̱i̱si̱ye nkakoma enu̱we Eku̱mi̱ na babili kuba beeghesebuwa banje? Bhaatu omui mu enu̱we ni wa Si̱taani̱!”
43006071	(Aamani̱i̱si̱yagha Yu̱da mutabani̱ wa Si̱mooni̱ Esikalyota omui mu Eku̱mi̱ na babili, oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya.)
43007001	Haanu̱ma ya Yesu ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aabungila mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Taabbali̱ye kubungila mu ya Bu̱yu̱daaya nanga beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baayo baabbalagha kumwita.
43007002	Bwile obu Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Bayu̱daaya kya Kulaala mu Bujalaja kikaba kili haai ku̱hi̱ka.
43007003	Niibuwo baghenji̱ baa Yesu baamu̱ghi̱li̱ye bati, “Olu̱ghe e Galilaaya eni oghende e Bu̱yu̱daaya niikuwo beeghesebuwa baawe bagubhe kubona byakuswekani̱ya ebi okwete kukola.
43007004	Nanga oghu akubbalagha ati bantu bamumanye taakukolagha bintu mu ki̱bi̱so bbaa. Ngoku okwete kukola bintu weeyoleke munsi oleke bantu bakani̱ye bakumanye.”
43007005	Nanga na baghenji̱ be boonini tabaamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je bbaa.
43007006	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Bwile bwanje bwonini bwa kughenda haa ki̱ghenu̱ tabukahi̱ki̱ye bbaa. Enu̱we mukubonagha bwile bwona bu̱hi̱ki̱ye bwa kughendayo.
43007007	Enu̱we, bantu abatahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Luhanga tababoohi̱ye bbaa, bhaatu boohi̱ye si̱ye, nanga nkuukalagha nimbaghambila nti ebi bakwete kukola bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
43007008	Enu̱we mughende haa ki̱ghenu̱ haala. Si̱ye tankughendayo bbaa, nanga bwile bwanje bu̱hi̱ki̱ye kughendayo tabukahi̱ki̱ye.”
43007009	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aakala e Galilaaya.
43007010	Haanu̱ma ya baghenji̱ be kughenda haa ki̱ghenu̱ eki, Yesu naye aaghenda haa ki̱ghenu̱, bhaatu ataaghenda bantu bamuboone, aaghenda mu ki̱bi̱so.
43007011	Haa Ki̱ghenu̱ haala Bayu̱daaya baatandika kumubbala kandi ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Musaasa oghu ali haa?”
43007012	Bantu abaabaagha haa ki̱ghenu̱ haala baatandika kuhwewelelana mbabu̱gha ebikwetʼo Yesu. Bamui mu bantu aba baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu ni muntu mulungi.” Bhaatu banji baaghila bati, “Bbaa, akudimaagagha bantu.”
43007013	Ti̱ mu bantu aba taaliyo nʼomui oghu akagubha ku̱bu̱gha bbeni̱-bbeni̱ mu bantu haabwa kwobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya abaabaaghʼo.
43007014	Obu Ki̱ghenu̱ eki kyahi̱ki̱ye haagati ya bilo ebi kikuhwelamu, Yesu aaghenda mu Numba ya Luhanga aatandika kwegheesi̱ya bantu.
43007015	Beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya abaabaaghʼo obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya baaswekela kimui kandi baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu taakasomelagha mu maasukuulu ghaatu ghaa byadi̱i̱ni̱, ti̱ ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya ebi aabimani̱ye ati̱ya?”
43007016	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Tankwegheesi̱yagha ebyanje nenkaha bbaa, bhaatu nkwegheesi̱yagha ebya Luhanga oghu akantuma.
43007017	Oghu abbali̱ye kukola ebi Luhanga akubbalagha akumanya obu ndaba ni̱neegheesi̱ya ebi̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga kedha ebyanje nenkaha.
43007018	Muntu oghu akwebu̱ghaghʼo eenini akubaagha naabbala ati bantu bamu̱hu̱ti̱ye. Bhaatu oghu akubbalagha ati bantu bahu̱ti̱ye Luhanga oghu akamutuma aku̱bu̱ghagha majima, kandi taakuhaagha kisubha kyona bbaa.
43007019	Taali̱i̱nu̱we Musa aahaaye bilaghilo bya Luhanga? Taataliyo nʼomui mu enu̱we oghu abikwete. Buuye mukubbala kunjita nangaaki?”
43007020	Ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki baakuukamu Yesu bati, “Ki̱li̱mu̱ kikuli haa mutuwe! Ni ani̱ akubbala kukwita?”
43007021	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Naakoli̱ye kyakuswekani̱ya kimui kyonkaha ti̱ enu̱we boona kyabaswekani̱i̱ye.
43007022	Musa akabalaghila kusali̱i̱si̱yagha baana baanu boobusaasa (nankabha ataabaaye oghu akakitandi̱ki̱i̱si̱ya bhaatu baataata baanu.) Ti̱ mwana woobusaasa naahi̱ki̱i̱ye bilo munaanaa nankabha kili kilo kya Sabhato bakumusalagha.
43007023	Ti̱ enu̱we tamukusalagha mwana woobusaasa haa kilo kya Sabhato? Ti̱ mweli̱li̱kana muti tamwatu̱u̱ye kilaghilo eki Musa aabahaaye. Buuye eki̱leki̱ye si̱ye ku̱ki̱li̱ya musaasa oni haa kilo kya Sabhato enu̱we kibasaaliiye nkiki?
43007024	Muleke ku̱twi̱la musango haagu̱u̱li̱ kwonkaha, mu̱ghu̱tu̱we mu majima ghoonini.”
43007025	Niibuwo bamui mu bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu abaabaaghʼo baaghi̱li̱ye bati, “Oni taaniiye musaasa oghu beebembeli̱ baatu bakubbala kwita?
43007026	Olole nguni niibuwo aabu̱ghi̱la mu bantu bbeni̱-bbeni̱, kandi beebembeli̱ baatu tabaakoli̱yʼo na kantu kumutanga. Buuye beebembeli̱ aba baakimani̱ye kwonini ngu niiye Ki̱li̱si̱to?
43007027	Bakaghila bati taaliyo nʼomui oghu alimanya hambali Ki̱li̱si̱to aku̱lu̱gha, kandi etu̱we ngatumani̱ye hambali musaasa oghu alu̱ghi̱ye.”
43007028	Haala, Yesu naaneegheesi̱ya bantu aba mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga aabaghila ati, “Mukwete kweli̱li̱kana muti mumani̱ye si̱ye kandi mumani̱ye hambali ndu̱ghi̱ye? Si̱ye taneetu̱mi̱ye hani neenini bbaa. Luhanga wamajima niiye akantuma hambali muli. Enu̱we tamumumani̱ye bbaa,
43007029	bhaatu si̱ye nimumani̱ye nanga nkalu̱gha hambali ali kandi niiye akantuma.”
43007030	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha eki bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu aba baabbala kumughwilikiilila, kumukwata, bhaatu taaliyo nʼomui oghu akagubha ku̱mu̱ku̱mʼo, nanga bwile bwa kumukwata bukaba butakahi̱ki̱ye.
43007031	Bhaatu bantu bakani̱ye abaabaagha mu ki̱bbu̱la eki baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja. Baaghila bati, “Buuye obu Ki̱li̱si̱to aliisa, alikola byakulolelʼo byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye kusaali̱ya musaasa oni?”
43007032	Bamui mu Bafali̱saayo abaabaaghʼo baaghu̱wa ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba mbabu̱ghʼo Yesu batiyo, du̱mbi̱ ebo na bakulu baa bahongi̱ baatuma baasilikale kughenda kukwata Yesu.
43007033	Yesu aaghambila ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eegheesi̱yagha eki ati, “Nkuukala naanu bwile bukee, du̱mbi̱ nkuuke ewaa oghu akantuma.
43007034	Enu̱we mukumbala hambali ndi, bhaatu tamukumbona bbaa; kandi hambali nkughenda tamukugubha kughendayo.”
43007035	Niibuwo Bayu̱daaya aba baatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Musaasa oni akubbala kughenda haa hambali tutaakugubha kumubonela? Buuye akubbala kughenda mu Bayu̱daaya baanakyatu abaakaaye mu batali Bayu̱daaya kandi eegheesi̱ye batali Bayu̱daaya aba?
43007036	Aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye ki obu aaghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Mukumbala bhaatu tamukumbona,’ kandi ‘hambali nkughenda tamukugubha kughendayo’?”
43007037	Mu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ eki, kilo kyokumaliilila eki baatwalagha kuba kikulu munu kyahi̱ka. Niibuwo Yesu aamu̱ki̱ye aabu̱gha nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Muntu weena naabaaye eliyo limukwete, oleke anjisʼo, anuwe.”
43007038	Ti̱ muntu weena naahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye, nsulo sya maasi ghaa bwomi̱i̱li̱ ghakusenda ku̱lu̱gha mu mutima ghuwe ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikughilagha.
43007039	(Yesu akabu̱gha eki naamani̱i̱si̱ya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu boona abaku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja baaghendagha kutunga. Ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa bwile obu bakaba batakatu̱ngi̱ye Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nanga Yesu akaba atakaku̱u̱ki̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa mu eghulu.)
43007040	Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba baaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabu̱gha eki, bamui mu ebo baaghila bati, “Majima kuwo ni mulangi̱ oghu baaghi̱li̱ye bati akwisa.”
43007041	Banji baaghila bati, “Ni Ki̱li̱si̱to.” Bhaatu banji baabu̱u̱li̱ya baanakyabo bati, “Ki̱li̱si̱to akugubha ati̱ya ku̱lu̱gha e Galilaaya?
43007042	Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti Ki̱li̱si̱to aku̱lu̱gha mu baasukulu baa Dhau̱dhi̱, kandi bamubyalile mu tau̱ni̱ ya Dhau̱dhi̱ e Bbeteleheemu.”
43007043	Ti̱ ebi Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye byaleka bantu beetambulani̱yamu.
43007044	Banji baabbala kumughwilikiilila, bhaatu taabaayʼo nʼomui oghu akagubha kumukwata.
43007045	Haakumaliilila abaalindagha Numba ya Luhanga baakuuka mu bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na Bafali̱saayo abaali babatu̱mi̱ye kukwata Yesu. Bakulu baa di̱i̱ni̱ aba baabu̱u̱li̱ya baasilikale aba bati, “Ekyaleki̱ye mutaamukwata nkiki?”
43007046	Baasilikale aba baabakuukamu bati, “Tatukabonagha muntu oghu aku̱bu̱ghagha ngoku eye aku̱bu̱ghagha!”
43007047	Bafali̱saayo baababu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mukumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu naanu dhee aabadimaagi̱ye mwasi̱i̱ma?
43007048	Ni ani̱ mwaboone mu etu̱we beebembeli̱ baanu kedha Bafali̱saayo ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je musaasa oghu?
43007049	Taaliyo nʼomui, kuuyʼo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba abatamani̱ye bilaghilo bya Musa. Ti̱ aba Luhanga akubakiina.”
43007050	Niibuwo Nikodemu oghu akaba naadu̱bhi̱ye kughenda hambali Yesu ali kandi oghu akaba ali omui mu baa memba aba, aabu̱u̱i̱ye ati,
43007051	“Buuye bilaghilo byatu bi̱ku̱tu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya ku̱si̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya muntu musango atakadu̱bhi̱ye eetonganʼo?”
43007052	Baamukuukamu bati, “Naawe dhee oli Munagalilaaya? Dhaani naawe weenini okilole, Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti taaliyo mulangi̱ nʼomui oghu abhonganuuwe ku̱lu̱gha e Galilaaya.” [
43007053	Niibuwo baalu̱ghi̱yʼo bu̱li̱ muntu aaghenda ewe eka.
43008001	Bhaatu Yesu aaghenda haa mwena Oli̱va kuhuumulilayo.
43008002	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo nkyambisi aatodha aaghenda mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga. Bantu baagumbaana hambali ali ku̱tegheeleli̱ya ngoku akwegheesi̱ya, du̱mbi̱ aasitama, aatandika ku̱beegheesi̱ya.
43008003	Beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo na Bafali̱saayo baamuleetela mukali̱ oghu baakwete naasyana. Baamu̱mi̱i̱li̱li̱ya mu maaso ghaa bantu aba
43008004	baaghila Yesu bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, mukali̱ oni twamukwete naasyana.
43008005	Bilaghilo bya Musa bikutulaghila kumuhuula mabaale aku̱we. Buuye okubbala oti tumukole ki?”
43008006	Bakamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ki̱bu̱u̱li̱yo eki niikuwo naaku̱u̱ki̱yemu kubhi, batunge kahanda kaa kumunyegheelela bati aatu̱u̱ye bilaghilo byabo. Bhaatu Yesu aagomba, aatandika kuhandiika hansi na kyala kiye.
43008007	Obu beeyongeeye kuukala mbanamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya, aamilila kandi aabaghila ati, “Mu enu̱we boona oghu atali na kibhi aaniiye aadu̱bha kuhuula mukali̱ oghu ebaale.”
43008008	Aatodha aagomba aatandika kuhandiika hansi.
43008009	Obu bantu aba baaghu̱u̱ye Yesu naabu̱gha atiyo, baatandika ku̱lu̱ghʼo omui-omui mbanaghenda. Bakulu niibo baadu̱bhi̱ye kughenda ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baati̱ghi̱yʼo Yesu enkaha, hamui na mukali̱ oghu aanaamiliiyʼo.
43008010	Yesu aamilila aabu̱u̱li̱ya mukali̱ oghu ati, “Abaakunyegheleeye bali haa? Ngabataku̱si̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya musango?”
43008011	Mukali̱ oghu aakuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, taaliyo nʼomui.” Yesu aaghila ati, “Kwesi̱ nanje tanku̱ku̱twi̱la musango bbaa. Oghende, otalitodha kweyongela ku̱si̱i̱sa.”]
43008012	Yesu anali haa bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga aatodha aaghila bantu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni kyeleeli̱ kya nsi kandi oghu akunkwama akutunga kyeleeli̱ kya bwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi taalighendela mu mweli̱ma.”
43008013	Bafali̱saayo abaabaaghʼo baamughila bati, “Okwete ku̱bu̱gha nuweeheela buukai̱so weenini, ti̱ buukai̱so bwawe tabuli bwamajima.”
43008014	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Nankabha ni̱mbu̱gha nineeheela buukai̱so neenini, ebi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha ni majima ghoonini. Bhaatu hambali naalu̱ghi̱ye kandi hambali nkughenda enu̱we tamumani̱yʼo.
43008015	Mu̱ku̱tu̱waagha misango mu nteekeleja ya bantu kwonkaha; bhaatu si̱ye tanku̱twi̱lagha muntu nʼomui musango bbaa.
43008016	Bhaatu si̱ye ninaanatwi̱li̱i̱ye muntu musango, nku̱mu̱twi̱la ghuwo mu majima ghoonini, nanga nkuba atali̱i̱si̱ye nku̱ghu̱tu̱wa nenkaha, nkuba ndi hamui na Tita oghu akantuma.
43008017	Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu bilaghilo byanu ngu baakai̱so babili mbaanahaaye buukai̱so haa kintu ebi baabu̱ghi̱ye ni majima.
43008018	Si̱ye nkwebu̱ghaghʼo neenini nineeheela buukai̱so, kandi na Tita oghu akantuma akumpeelagha buukai̱so dhee.”
43008019	Niibuwo baamu̱bu̱u̱i̱ye bati, “Sowaawe ali haa?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Tamumani̱ye si̱ye kedha Tita, nguli mwabaagha mumani̱ye si̱ye, na Tita mwangumumani̱ye dhee.”
43008020	Yesu akabu̱gha ebi byona obu eegheeseli̱yagha mu Numba ya Luhanga mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali eki baataaghamu bisembo kyabaagha. Ti̱ taabaayʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akagubha kumukwata nanga bwile buwe bwa kumukwata bukaba butakahi̱ki̱ye.
43008021	Yesu aatodha aaghila beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Bwile butaseli̱ye nkubalu̱ghamu nkughenda, enu̱we mukumbala kandi mu̱ku̱we Luhanga atabaghaniiye bibhi byanu. Ti̱ hambali nkughenda tamukugubha kughendayo bbaa.”
43008022	Niibuwo beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba baaghi̱li̱ye bati, “Aaghi̱li̱ye ati tatukugubha kughenda hambali akughenda. Eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu akubbala kughenda kwehita?”
43008023	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Enu̱we muli bantu baa munsi eni, bhaatu si̱ye ndi wa mu eghulu. Enu̱we muli baa munsi eni, bhaatu si̱ye tandi wa munsi eni.
43008024	Niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabaghila nti mu̱li̱kwi̱la mu bibhi byanu; mu̱ku̱kwi̱la mu bibhi byanu kaakuba mubhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja muti, ‘Ni̱i̱syoni ngoku Naabu̱ghi̱ye.’ ”
43008025	Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye nuuwe ani̱?” Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ngoku naabaghambiiye ku̱lu̱gha hambali naatandikiiye ku̱bu̱gha naanu.
43008026	Ndi na bikani̱ye bya ku̱bu̱ghʼo enu̱we kandi kubasi̱ngi̱i̱si̱ya musango. Nanga oghu akantuma aku̱bu̱ghagha majima ghonkaha, kandi nkughambilagha enu̱we bantu baa munsi ebi naaghu̱u̱ye eye naabu̱gha.”
43008027	Tabeetegheleei̱ye ngoku Yesu aabu̱ghaghʼo Ese wee.
43008028	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukakubamba Mwana wa Muntu haa musalaba niibuwo mukumanya ngu Ni̱i̱syoni ngoku naabu̱ghi̱ye nti ndi. Mukumanya ngoku ntaakukolagha kintu kyona haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwanje nenkaha, bhaatu ngoku nku̱bu̱ghagha ebi Tita anjegheeseei̱ye ku̱bu̱gha.
43008029	Kandi Tita oghu akantuma akuukalagha nanje bwile bwona, taakandu̱ghaghʼo ku̱nti̱gha nenkaha bbaa, nanga bwile bwona nkukolagha ebi̱mu̱dheedhi̱ye.”
43008030	Bantu bakani̱ye abaaghu̱u̱ye ebi Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye ebi baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43008031	Niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye Bayu̱daaya abaamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ati, “Nimwakwete ebi nkwete kubaghambila niibuwo mukuba kwonini beeghesebuwa banje.
43008032	Mu̱kwetegheeleli̱ya majima kandi majima agha ghakubaha bughabe.”
43008033	Baamukuukamu bati, “Tuli baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, kandi tatukabaagha basyana baa muntu weena. Okugubha oti̱ya kughila oti tukutunga bughabe?”
43008034	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, muntu weena oghu akuukalagha naasi̱i̱sa, kibhi kikuukalagha kimuboheleeye nga mu̱syana wakiyo.
43008035	Ti̱ mu̱syana taakubaagha na bu̱toki̱ mu ka ngoku mwana wamu eenini akubaaghamu na bu̱toki̱ bilo nʼebilo.
43008036	Ti̱ Mwana oghu naakuhaaye bughabe, okutunga bughabe kwonini.
43008037	Nimani̱ye mukwete kweghila muti muli baana baa Luhanga haabwa kuba baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ bhaatu kusa mukubbala kunjita nanga mukubhengagha ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha.
43008038	Si̱ye nkubaghambilagha ebi Tita angambiiye ku̱bu̱gha, naanu mukukolagha ebi eseenu̱we akubaghambilagha kukola.”
43008039	Baamukuukamu bati, “Ebbulahi̱mu̱ niiye eseetu̱we.” Aabaghila ati, “Nguli mwabaagha baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mwangu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga ngoku Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu aamu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye.
43008040	Bhaatu enu̱we mukubbala kunjita, si̱ye oghu nkwete kubaghambila majima agha naaghu̱u̱ye ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Luhanga. Ebbulahi̱mu̱ taakoli̱ye nga ebi enu̱we mukwete kukola.
43008041	Mukwete kukola ngʼebi eseenu̱we akukolagha.” Baamuhakani̱li̱ya kimui bati, “Etu̱we tatuli bitwekano bbaa, Luhanga enkaha niiye Eseetu̱we.”
43008042	Niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Nguli Luhanga aabaagha Eseenu̱we, mwangu̱nku̱ndi̱ye, nanga si̱ye nkalu̱gha ewaa Luhanga kwisa hani. Taneeleeti̱ye, bhaatu Luhanga niiye akantuma.
43008043	Eki̱leki̱ye mu̱teetegheeleli̱ya ebi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha ni nanga mukubhengagha ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha.
43008044	Enu̱we muli baa eseenu̱we Si̱taani̱ kandi mukubbalagha kukola ebi eye abbali̱ye. Akaba mwi̱ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha mu ntandiko kandi taaku̱bu̱ghagha majima, nanga taakukolagha ebilimu majima. Akaakuhaagha bisubha, akubaagha nooleka ngoku ali, nanga ni mu̱hi̱ wa bisubha kandi niiye ndu̱ghi̱i̱li̱lo ya bisubha byona.
43008045	Bhaatu obu nkwete kubaghambila majima, mu̱bhengi̱ye ku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43008046	Buuye haliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kwoleka kibhi eki naalakola? Obu ndaba nimbaghambila majima, eki̱leki̱ye mutampi̱ki̱li̱ja nkiki?
43008047	Muntu oghu ali kwonini wa Luhanga aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha ebi akumughambilagha. Eki̱leki̱ye mutaahi̱ki̱li̱ja ebi nkwete kubaghambila ni nanga tamuli bantu baa Luhanga.”
43008048	Obu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baamughila bati, “Buuye tatwahi̱ki̱i̱ye kughila tuti oli Musamali̱ya kandi ki̱li̱mu̱ kikuli haa mutuwe?”
43008049	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ki̱li̱mu̱ takindi haa mutuwe bbaa, bhaatu nankabha enu̱we nimungaya, nkwete ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Tita.
43008050	Si̱ye tankubbala nti bantu bahu̱ti̱ye si̱ye bbaa, Luhanga niiye aku̱mpu̱ti̱ya, oghu aku̱twi̱lagha bantu musango mu bwengani̱ja.
43008051	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini weena oghu akukwata ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha, taali̱ku̱wa bbaa.”
43008052	Du̱mbi̱ Bayu̱daaya aba baagola bati, “Endindi twakimanyila kimui ngoku ki̱li̱mu̱ kikuli haa mutuwe! Nanga Ebbulahi̱mu̱ hamui na balangi̱ bakaku̱wa, ti̱ uwe niibuwo okwete kughila oti muntu naakwete ebi oku̱bu̱gha taali̱ku̱wa.
43008053	Buuye uwe osaai̱ye taata waatu Ebbulahi̱mu̱? Eye akaku̱wa, na balangi̱ baaku̱wa. Ti̱ uwe okweli̱li̱kana nuuwe ani̱?”
43008054	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Ni̱neesi̱ndi̱ye neenini, kwesinda kwanje kukuba kutali na mughaso. Tita oghu mukwete kughila muti niiye Luhanga waanu niiye akunsinda.
43008055	Nankabha enu̱we mutamumani̱ye, si̱ye nimumani̱ye, nanje ninaaghi̱li̱ye nti tanimumani̱ye nkuba ni̱mbu̱gha bisubha ngʼanu. Bhaatu nimumani̱ye kandi nkukwatagha ebi aku̱bu̱ghagha.
43008056	Taata waanu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akadheedhuwa kubona kilo eki nkwisilamu munsi. Kandi akakibona ti̱ aadheedhuwa.”
43008057	Bayu̱daaya aba baaghila Yesu bati, “Tookahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka maku̱mi̱ ataano, ti̱ uwe Ebbulahi̱mu̱ okamubona dhi̱?”
43008058	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, Ebbulahi̱mu̱ atakabyahuwe, si̱ye nkaba ndi ngoku Ndi endindi!”
43008059	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye naabu̱gha atiyo, baakoma mabaale kumuhuula gho. Bhaatu Yesu aabalu̱ghamu, aalu̱gha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, aaghenda.
43009001	Obu Yesu aanaghendagha, aabona musaasa oghu akabyaluwa maaso ghamughaaye.
43009002	Beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, musaasa oghu ku̱byaluwa aaghaaye maaso kikaba haabwa kibhi kiye kedha haabwa kibhi kya babyaye be?”
43009003	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Taali musaasa oghu kedha babyaye be baasi̱i̱si̱ye bbaa, eki kikabʼo niikuwo haabuwe bantu babone ngoku Luhanga ali na bu̱toki̱.
43009004	Bwile bunaliyo nkulaghiluwa kukola mulimo ghwa oghu akantuma abbali̱ye. Bwile bukaakwalagha taaliyo oghu akukolagha mulimo ghwona.
43009005	Si̱ye ninali munsi, ni̱i̱si̱ye ndi kyeleeli̱ kya nsi eni.”
43009006	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha eki, aatu̱wa matanta hansi, aaghatabulani̱ya na etaka, aalisiigha musaasa oghu haa maaso.
43009007	Aaghila musaasa oghu ati, “Oghende onaabe haali̱i̱so mu kiijongo Silowaamu.” (Li̱i̱na eli lyamani̱i̱si̱yagha “Oghu batu̱mi̱ye.”) Nahabweki musaasa oghu aaghenda aanaaba haali̱i̱so mu kiijongo eki, ti̱ aakuuka ewe eka maaso ghamu̱u̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye naabona.
43009008	Baliilanuwa baa musaasa oghu abaamubonagha naasaba-saba bantu baaghila bati, “Oghu taaniiye musaasa oghu aakalagha asitami̱ye naasaba-saba bantu?”
43009009	Bamui mu bantu baaghila bati ni musaasa oghu. Bamui mu bantu baaghila bati, “Bbaa, amu̱su̱si̱ye kwonkaha.” Bhaatu musaasa oghu aakala naanaghambila bantu ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye musaasa oghu.”
43009010	Baamughila bati, “Ti̱ maaso agha ghaaku̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye ghati̱ya?”
43009011	Aabakuukamu ati, “Musaasa oghu bakughilaghamu Yesu niiye aakoli̱ye bisaabo aabinsiigha haa maaso. Angila ati ngende mu kyambu kya Silowaamu kandi ninaabe haali̱i̱so. Nahabweki naaghenda naanaabʼo kandi du̱mbi̱ maaso ghanjighulika, naatandika kubona.”
43009012	Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Musaasa oghu ali haa?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Tanimani̱ye bbaa.”
43009013	Niibuwo bantu baatwete musaasa oghu akaba aaghaaye maaso oghu hambali Bafali̱saayo bali.
43009014	Kilo eki Yesu aatabuliiyemu bisaabo aabisiigha musaasa oghu haa maaso kumuughula gho kikaba kili kilo kya Sabhato.
43009015	Nahabweki na Bafali̱saayo baabu̱u̱li̱ya dhee musaasa oghu ngoku maaso ghaamu̱u̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye. Musaasa oghu aabakuukamu ati, “Ansi̱i̱ghi̱ye bisaabo haa maaso, naaghenda naanaaba haali̱i̱so du̱mbi̱ naabona.”
43009016	Bamui mu Bafali̱saayo aba baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu aakoli̱ye eki taalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga, nanga taahu̱ti̱i̱ye kilaghilo kya kilo kya Sabhato.” Bhaatu banji baabu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mu̱si̱i̱si̱ akugubha ati̱ya kukola byakuswekani̱ya ngʼebi?” Du̱mbi̱ bantu aba beetambulani̱yamu.
43009017	Haakumaliilila Bafali̱saayo aba baatodha baabu̱u̱li̱ya musaasa oghu bati, “Waaghi̱li̱ye oti musaasa oghu niiye aakuughuuye maaso. Buuye uwe oku̱mu̱bu̱ghʼo biki?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Ni mulangi̱.”
43009018	Bayu̱daaya aba tabaahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngoku musaasa oghu maaso ghaabaagha ghamughaaye kandi ngoku aaki̱li̱ye aabona ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu baabilikiiye babyaye be baasa.
43009019	Baabu̱u̱li̱ya babyaye baa musaasa oghu bati, “Oni ni mutabani̱ waanu? Oni niiye mukughilagha muti akabyaluwa maaso ghamughaaye? Buuye endindi aagu̱bhi̱ye ati̱ya kubona?”
43009020	Babyaye baa musaasa oghu baakuukamu bati, “Tumani̱ye ngoku ali mutabani̱ waatu, kandi tumani̱ye ngoku aabyahuwe maaso ghamughaaye.
43009021	Bhaatu tatumani̱ye ngoku aaboone kandi tatumani̱ye oghu aamuughuuye maaso. Aku̱li̱ye, mu̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ye, eenini akubaghambila.”
43009022	Babyaye baa musaasa oghu bakabu̱gha batiyo haabwa kwobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba, nanga beebembeli̱ aba bakaba mbaamali̱ye ku̱tu̱wamu bati weena oghu akughila ati Yesu ni Ki̱li̱si̱to, bakumubhinga mu elami̱li̱yo lyabo.
43009023	Niikiyo kyaleki̱ye babyaye baa musaasa oghu baaghila bati, “Aku̱li̱ye, mu̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ye eenini.”
43009024	Baatodha baabilikila musaasa oghu akaba aaghaaye maaso oghu mulundi ghwakabili baamughila bati, “Luhanga aaniiye waasinda, musaasa oghu tumumani̱ye ngoku ali mu̱si̱i̱si̱.”
43009025	Aabakuukamu ati, “Nankabha ali mu̱si̱i̱si̱ kedha atali mu̱si̱i̱si̱ eki tankimani̱ye bbaa. Kintu kimui kyonkaha eki nimani̱ye ni ngu, maaso ghaabaagha ghanjighaaye, bhaatu endindi niibuwo naabona!”
43009026	Baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Aaku̱koli̱yʼo biki? Kandi aakuughuuye ati̱ya maaso?”
43009027	Musaasa oghu aabakuukamu ati, “Naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye bhaatu mwabhenga ku̱u̱ghu̱wa. Mukubbala kutodha ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye nangaaki? Naanu mukubbala kufooka dhee beeghesebuwa be?”
43009028	Beebembeli̱ aba baatandika kubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya musaasa oghu basaakaaye mbamughila bati, “Nuuwe mweghesebuwa wee, etu̱we tuli beeghesebuwa baa Musa.
43009029	Tumani̱ye ngoku Luhanga aabu̱ghagha na taata waatu Musa, bhaatu musaasa oghu nankabha hambali alu̱ghi̱ye tatumani̱yʼo bbaa.”
43009030	Musaasa oghu aabaghila ati, “Eki nkyakuswekani̱ya kwonini! Mukwete kughila muti tamumani̱ye hambali musaasa oghu alu̱ghi̱ye, bhaatu si̱ye anjighuuye maaso naabona!
43009031	Tumani̱ye ngoku Luhanga ataaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha basi̱i̱si̱. Aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha muntu oghu amu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye kandi oghu akukolagha ebi abbali̱ye.
43009032	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aalaghu̱u̱ye ngu haliyo muntu oghu aaghuuye muunakiye maaso oghu abyahuwe ghamughaaye, ti̱ abona.
43009033	Nguli musaasa oghu ataabaagha alu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga, tangu̱koli̱ye kintu ngʼeki aakoli̱ye eki bbaa.”
43009034	Obu aabu̱ghi̱ye eki, baamukuukamu bati, “Uwe okabyaluwa kandi waakulila mu kibhi, ti̱ okulengʼo ku̱twegheesi̱ya oti̱ya?” Du̱mbi̱ baabhinga musaasa oghu mu elami̱li̱yo lyabo.
43009035	Yesu aaghu̱wa ngoku Bayu̱daaya baabhi̱ngi̱ye musaasa oghu mu elami̱li̱yo lyabo. Obu Yesu aaboone musaasa oghu, aamughila ati, “Ohi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Mwana wa Muntu?”
43009036	Musaasa oghu aakuukamu ati, “Wai̱tu̱, ongambile musaasa oghu, niikuwo nanje ni̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je.”
43009037	Yesu aamughila ati, “Waamali̱ye kumubona, kandi niiye oghu akwete ku̱bu̱gha naawe endindi.”
43009038	Musaasa oghu aaghila ati, “Nahi̱ki̱li̱je uwe Mukama!” Du̱mbi̱ aateeli̱ya aalami̱ya Yesu.
43009039	Yesu aaghila ati, “Nkaasa munsi ku̱twi̱la bantu musango, niikuwo aba maaso ghaaghaaye babone kandi abakweli̱li̱kanagha bati baboone mbooleke ngoku baaghaaye maaso.”
43009040	Bamui mu Bafali̱saayo abaabaaghʼo baaghu̱wa eki Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye eki kandi baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye okwete kughila oti naatu tuughaaye maaso?”
43009041	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Nguli mwabaagha maaso ghabaghaaye musango ghwa kibhi taghwangubasi̱ngi̱ye bbaa, bhaatu ngoku mukwete kwefoola muti muboone, eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu musango ghubasi̱ngi̱ye.”
43010001	Yesu eeyongela kubaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, muntu ataakwamiiye mu mulyango kutaaha mu lugho lwa ntaama, bhaatu ani̱i̱ni̱la hanji kutaahayo, akuba ali musuma kandi mu̱ji̱ndi̱.
43010002	Bhaatu oghu akukwamilagha mu mulyango niiye mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya eenini wa ntaama esi.
43010003	Oghu akuukalagha ali̱ndi̱ye haa mulyango oghu akuughulilagha mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya oghu. Ti̱ ntaama esi sikumaniililagha elaka liye. Akubilikilagha ntaama siye esi mu mali̱i̱na agha aasi̱lu̱ki̱ye kandi asi̱twesi̱ya mu lugho olu.
43010004	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱si̱twesi̱yamu syona, du̱mbi̱ aghenda asihikiiye. Ntaama siye esi sighenda simulabhi̱ye nanga simumani̱ye kandi simani̱ye na elaka liye.
43010005	Bhaatu ntaama esi tasikugubha kukwamilila muntu oghu sitamani̱ye. Mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kumukwama, si̱ku̱li̱gi̱ta simuuluke nanga tasimaniliiye elaka lya muntu oghu sitamani̱ye oghu.”
43010006	Yesu aaghambila bantu aba naakoleesi̱ya lu̱si̱mo olu, bhaatu baasaaghuwa kwetegheeleli̱ya eki aamani̱i̱si̱yagha.
43010007	Niibuwo Yesu aatodhi̱ye aabaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, ni̱i̱syoni mulyango ghwa hambali ntaama sikukwamilagha.
43010008	Boona abaadu̱bhi̱ye kwisa si̱ye ntakaasi̱ye, bakaba bali basuma kandi baji̱ndi̱, bhaatu ntaama tasyabaaghu̱u̱ye bbaa.
43010009	Ni̱i̱syoni mulyango, muntu naanakwamiiye muli si̱ye, akujunuwa kandi akuukala naataaha kandi naatuwa mu lugho kandi atunge byokuliya bisemeeye.
43010010	Musuma eye akwisagha kwibha, kwita kandi ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya, bhaatu si̱ye naasi̱ye kuha bantu bwomi̱i̱li̱ kandi mbahe buwo mu buusuuye.
43010011	“Ni̱i̱si̱ye mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya mulungi. Mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya mulungi akwehaaghayo ku̱ku̱wa niikuwo ajune ntaama siye.
43010012	Mu̱koli̱ oghu bahaaye mulimo ghwa kuloleelela kwonkaha taali mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya kwonini kedha mukama wa ntaama esi. Nahabweki akaakubonagha muhaga ghusaakaaye ngwasa, aku̱ti̱ghagha ntaama, ali̱gi̱ta. Du̱mbi̱ muhaga ghusaakaaye oghu ghukwata sinji, esi̱ti̱ghaayʼo sihanjikana, si̱li̱gi̱ta.
43010013	Mu̱koli̱ oghu aku̱li̱gi̱tagha nanga eye ni mu̱koli̱ kwonkaha oghu bahaaye mulimo. Eye taafu̱u̱yʼo ekikubʼo ntaama esi.
43010014	“Ni̱i̱si̱ye mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya mulungi. Nimani̱ye ntaama syanje kandi na ntaama syanje syamanya si̱ye.
43010015	Ti̱ ngoku Tita amani̱ye si̱ye niikuwo nanje nimani̱ye Tita oghu, kandi neeteekani̱i̱je kuhaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje ku̱kwi̱la ntaama syanje esi.
43010016	Haliyo ntaama syanje sinji esitakataahi̱ye mu kigho kyanje. Nasiyo nkulaghiluwa kusileeta dhee mu kigho eki. Nanga nasiyo dhee si̱ku̱u̱ghu̱wa elaka lyanje, kandi nkuba na kigho kimui kya ntaama ekili na mu̱li̱i̱si̱ya omui.
43010017	Tita anku̱ndi̱ye nanga si̱ye nkuhaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanje ku̱kwi̱la ntaama syanje, bhaatu ntodhe mbe mwomi̱i̱li̱.
43010018	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kunjiyʼo bwomi̱i̱li̱ obu bbaa, bhaatu nkubuhaayo haabwa kubbala kwanje. Ndi na bu̱toki̱ kubuhaayo kandi ndi na bu̱toki̱ kutodha ku̱bweku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya. Ti̱ bu̱toki̱ obu Tita niiye akabumpa.”
43010019	Obu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya aba baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, beetambulani̱yamu.
43010020	Bakani̱ye mu ebo baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu tu̱ku̱mu̱tegheeleli̱ya nangaaki? Ki̱li̱mu̱ kimuli haa mutuwe kandi aghuuye esi̱le.”
43010021	Bhaatu banji baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu ki̱li̱mu̱ kikwete taaku̱bu̱ghagha ngʼebi bbaa. Buuye ki̱li̱mu̱ kikugubha kuughula muntu maaso?”
43010022	Bwile obu mu Yelusaalemu hakaba halimu ki̱ghenu̱ kya kuusuka kweli̱ya Numba ya Luhanga. Ti̱ kyalo kikaba ki̱holi̱ye haabwa mbu̱la ekani̱ye.
43010023	Bwile obu Yesu aalubhatangilagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga eghi baaghilaghamu ya Solomooni̱.
43010024	Obu Bayu̱daaya baamuboone, baamweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Tu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kuukala otatu̱kengeseei̱ye ngoku oli? Otughambile bbeni̱-bbeni̱ okaakuba aniiwe Ki̱li̱si̱to?”
43010025	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye bhaatu mwabhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja. Byakuswekani̱ya ebi nkwete kukola haabwa bu̱toki̱ obu Tita ampaaye bwoleki̱ye ngoku ndi.
43010026	Bhaatu enu̱we tamu̱ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱jagha si̱ye nanga tamuli mu ntaama syanje bbaa.
43010027	Ntaama syanje si̱ku̱u̱ghu̱wagha elaka lyanje, nsimani̱ye, kandi sikunkwamagha.
43010028	Nkusihaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, tasilihwelekeelela kandi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aligubha kusinjiyʼo.
43010029	Aba Tita ampaaye basaai̱ye byona, kandi taaliyo oghu alibaayʼo Tita oghu bbaa.
43010030	Si̱ye hamui na Tita oghu tuli omui.”
43010031	Niibuwo Bayu̱daaya aba baatodhi̱ye baakoma mabaale bati bamuhuule gho,
43010032	bhaatu Yesu aabaghila ati, “Naakoli̱ye byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye muboone ebi Tita angu̱bhi̱i̱si̱i̱ye kukola. Buuye nkyakuswekani̱ya ki naakoli̱ye ekikuleka nimubbala kumpuula mabaale?”
43010033	Baamukuukamu bati, “Tatukubbala kukuhuula mabaale haabwa byakuswekani̱ya okwete kukola, bhaatu haabwa kwambula Luhanga, nanga uwe oli muntu kwonkaha bhaatu niibuwo waaghila oti oli Luhanga.”
43010034	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we byanu Luhanga taaghi̱li̱ye ati, ‘Muli baaluhanga’?
43010035	Aba kighambo kya Luhanga kyahi̱ki̱yʼo, akabaghilamu baaluhanga, kandi Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we tamukugubha ku̱bi̱tu̱wa.
43010036	Nahabweki nkiki ki̱leki̱ye mukwete kughila muti naakoli̱ye kibhi kya kwambula Luhanga, kughila nti, ‘Ndi Mwana wa Luhanga’? Kuni Tita niiye akankoma kandi antuma munsi muni.
43010037	Nkaakuba ntaakukolagha nga ebi Tita akukolagha, enu̱we tamubhonganuuwe ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye.
43010038	Bhaatu nkaakuba ninkukolagha nga ebi Tita akukolagha, nankabha enu̱we mu̱bhengi̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye, hakili mubhonganuuwe ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye haabwa byakuswekani̱ya ebi nkukolagha niikuwo mugubhe kumanya kandi kwetegheeleli̱ya ngoku ndi mwa Tita kandi na Tita ali mu si̱ye.”
43010039	Bayu̱daaya aba baatodha baabbala kumukwata, bhaatu Yesu aabalu̱ghamu.
43010040	Niibuwo aatodhi̱ye aabhasuka luhande lweli̱ lwa maasi Yolodaani̱, aaghenda aakala mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali Yohaana anaakaaye aabati̱ji̱lagha bantu.
43010041	Bantu bakani̱ye baasa hambali ali, baaghila bati, “Yohaana taakolagha byakuswekani̱ya, bhaatu byona ebi Yohaana aabu̱ghi̱yʼo Yesu ghaabaaye majima ghoonini.”
43010042	Ti̱ bantu bakani̱ye bʼomu ki̱i̱kalo eki baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu.
43011001	Bwile obu musaasa baaghilaghamu Lajaalo aalwala. Akaba aakaaye Bbetaniya, mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghu Mali̱ya na Malita baabaagha baakaayemu.
43011002	Mali̱ya oghu niiye akaseesa bigita bisasi̱ye haa bighele bya Mukama aamulaghali̱ya biyo na esoke liye. Ti̱ Lajaalo oghu akaba alwaye akaba ali mwani̱nawe.
43011003	Banaani̱neemui babili aba baatumila Yesu makulu bati, “Mukama waatu, bhootu̱ syawe oghu oku̱ndi̱ye alwaye.”
43011004	Obu Yesu aaghu̱u̱ye makulu agha, aaghila ati, “Bulwaye obu tabuli bwa kumwita. Bhaatu bukuleka bantu bahe Luhanga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, kandi buleke bahe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa Mwana wa Luhanga.”
43011005	Yesu akaba akundiiye kimui Mali̱ya na waani̱na wee Malita kandi na Lajaalo oghu.
43011006	Bhaatu nankabha naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Lajaalo oghu alwaye, Yesu aadu̱bha aamala bilo bibili hambali aabaagha.
43011007	Niibuwo aaghambiiye beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwise tukuuke Bu̱yu̱daaya.”
43011008	Beeghesebuwa be aba baamughila bati, “Mwegheesi̱ya, bwile butaseli̱ye Bayu̱daaya baa e Bu̱yu̱daaya baabbalagha kukuhuula mabaale, ti̱ olimabbala kutodha kukuukayo?”
43011009	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Buuye bwile bwa ntangaali̱ tabuli na saaha eku̱mi̱ na ebili? Muntu oghu akulubhatangagha bwile bukeeye taakukobhokagha bbaa, nanga akubaagha aboone haabwa kyeleeli̱ kya munsi muni.
43011010	Bhaatu oghu akulubhatangagha mukilo akukobhokagha nanga taali na kyeleeli̱.”
43011011	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabaghila ati, “Bhootu̱ syatu Lajaalo aaghwesaghiiye, bhaatu nkughendayo ku̱mu̱su̱su̱mu̱la.”
43011012	Beeghesebuwa be aba baamukuukamu bati, “Mukama, Lajaalo akaakuba aghwesaghiiye akukila.”
43011013	Yesu ku̱bu̱gha atiyo aamani̱i̱si̱yagha ngoku Lajaalo aaku̱u̱ye, bhaatu ebo beeli̱li̱kana bati akwete kumani̱i̱si̱ya kughwesaghila mpongo sya bu̱li̱ kilo.
43011014	Niibuwo Yesu aabaghambiiye bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ati, “Lajaalo aaku̱u̱ye,
43011015	ti̱ ndheedheeu̱we haabwanu, nanga aaku̱u̱ye ntaliyo niikuwo mugubhe kweyongela ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye. Nahabweki muleke tughende hambali ali.”
43011016	Tomasi (oghu baaghilaghamu Mulongo) aaghila baanakiye ati, “Bhaawai̱ naatu mwise tughende, batwite hamui naye.”
43011017	Obu Yesu aaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetaniya, aasanga bamali̱ye bilo bbinaa baji̱i̱ki̱ye Lajaalo oghu.
43011018	Tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetaniya eghi ekaba eli nga mailo ebili ku̱lu̱gha Yelusaalemu,
43011019	nahabweki Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye bakaba baalu̱ghi̱ye Yelusaalemu kwisa ku̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya Malita na Mali̱ya, haabwa ku̱kwi̱lu̱wa mwani̱nabo.
43011020	Obu Malita aaghu̱u̱ye ngu Yesu niibuwo aasa, aatuwa kughenda kumusangaana, bhaatu Mali̱ya eye aati̱ghala eka.
43011021	Obu Malita aaboone Yesu, aamughila ati, “Mukama, nguli waabaagha oliyo, mwani̱naasi̱ye tangu̱ku̱u̱ye.
43011022	Bhaatu nimani̱ye nankabha endindi, kyona eki okusaba Luhanga akukukolela kiyo.”
43011023	Yesu aakuukamu Malita ati, “Wanjoko waawe akutodha kuba mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
43011024	Malita aamukuukamu ati, “Nimani̱ye ali̱hu̱mbu̱ka haa kilo kya mpelo obu Luhanga ali̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la bantu boona.”
43011025	Niibuwo Yesu aamughambiiye ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kandi bwomi̱i̱li̱. Oghu aku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja, nankabha aku̱wa akutodha abe mwomi̱i̱li̱.
43011026	Kandi weena oghu akuukala anahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye, taali̱ku̱wa bbaa. Eki oki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je?”
43011027	Malita aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, Mukama, ni̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngoku aaniiwe Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga, oghu akaasa munsi.”
43011028	Obu Malita aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aaghenda aabilikila waani̱nawee Mali̱ya haakpengbu̱, aamughila ati, “Mwegheesi̱ya aasi̱ye kandi akubbala kukubona.”
43011029	Obu Mali̱ya aaghu̱u̱ye atiyo, aamuka aaghenda kumusangaana.
43011030	Bwile obu Yesu akaba atakaki̱dhi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Bbetaniya eghi, akaba anali hambali Malita aamusangaane.
43011031	Obu Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha bali mu numba na Mali̱ya baasi̱ye ku̱mu̱hu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya baaboone naamatuka atiyo kutuwa, nabo baamulabha bamani̱ye bati aaghendi̱ye haa kituulo kulilila yo.
43011032	Obu Mali̱ya aaki̱dhi̱ye hambali Yesu ali naamubona, aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu aamughila ati, “Mukama, nguli waabaagha oliyo, mwani̱naasi̱ye tangu̱ku̱u̱ye bbaa.”
43011033	Obu Yesu aaboone Mali̱ya naalila kandi na Bayu̱daaya aba Mali̱ya aasi̱ye nabo dhee mbalila, kisa kyamukwatila kimui.
43011034	Du̱mbi̱ aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Baamu̱ji̱i̱ki̱ye haa?” Baani̱na Lajaalo aba baaghila bati, “Mukama, wiise tukwoleke.”
43011035	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalila.
43011036	Obu Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha baliyo baaboone naalila, baaghila bati, “Mulole ngoku aali amu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kwonini.”
43011037	Bhaatu bamui mu bantu aba baaghila bati, “Musaasa oghu taaliiye oghu akaki̱li̱ya muntu maaso ghaaghaaye aamuughula gho? Buuye taagu̱bhi̱ye kujuna Lajaalo oghu kutaku̱wa?”
43011038	Yesu anakwatu̱u̱we kisa atiyo eesu̱kana haai na kituulo eki. Kikaba kili ki̱i̱na mu kibaale kiinamu̱li̱to bataaye ebaale liinamu̱li̱to haa mulyango ghwakiyo.
43011039	Yesu aabalaghila ati, “Muuyʼo ebaale eli.” Bhaatu Malita mwani̱na Lajaalo oghu akaba aku̱u̱ye, aaghila Yesu ati, “Mukama endindi anu̱nki̱ye, nanga aakamala bilo bbinaa aku̱u̱ye.”
43011040	Yesu aamughila ati, “Tanaaku̱ghi̱li̱ye nti nuwaampi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, okubona ngoku Luhanga ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyamaani̱?”
43011041	Niibuwo bantu aba baahi̱ye ebaale haa kituulo eki. Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aalola eghulu, aaghila ati, “Tita, nku̱ku̱si̱i̱ma nanga oku̱nji̱ghu̱wagha.
43011042	Nimani̱ye oku̱nji̱ghu̱wagha bwile bwona, bhaatu naabu̱ghi̱ye eki niikuwo bantu abaali hani bahi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.”
43011043	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabilikila nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Lajaalo tuwamu!”
43011044	Ti̱, Lajaalo oghu akaba aku̱u̱ye, aatuwa mu kituulo eki. Mikono yee na maghulu bikaba binabohi̱ye mu ngoye baabaagha bamu̱ji̱i̱ki̱yemu, kandi na katambaala kajelu baabaagha bamu̱bohi̱ye haali̱i̱so kanamuliyo. Yesu aabaghila ati, “Mumusambuule, mumuleke aghende.”
43011045	Nahabweki Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye abaabaagha baasi̱ye kulola Mali̱ya, obu baaboone eki Yesu aakoli̱ye, baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43011046	Bhaatu bamui mu Bayu̱daaya aba baaghenda baaghambila Bafali̱saayo eki Yesu aakoli̱ye.
43011047	Du̱mbi̱ bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na Bafali̱saayo baabilikila baamemba boona baa Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱, baaba na lukulato. Baabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Tukole ki? Musaasa oghu niibuwo aakola byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye.
43011048	Nitwanaleki̱ye eeyongela kubikola, bantu boona baku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, kandi Balooma abalemi̱ye etu̱we bakwisa bahwelekeeleli̱ye numba yaatu ya Luhanga hamui na ehanga lyatu.”
43011049	Niibuwo omui mu bo, li̱i̱na liye Kayaafa, oghu akaba ali mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona mwaka oghu, aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukwete ku̱bu̱gha nga bantu batali na eki mumani̱ye.
43011050	Tamumani̱ye ngu nkilungi muntu omui ku̱ku̱wa haabwa bantu baa ehanga lyatu, mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ehanga lyona kuhwelekeelela!”
43011051	Eki taaki̱bu̱ghi̱ye haabuwe eenini, bhaatu akabu̱gha nga mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona mwaka oghu. Aalanga majima ngoku Yesu abhonganuuwe ku̱kwi̱la bantu bʼomu ehanga lya Bayu̱daaya lyona.
43011052	Tabali bantu baa ehanga lya Bayu̱daaya bonkaha, bhaatu na bantu banji boona baa Luhanga abahanjikaane mu bi̱i̱kalo binji bikani̱ye, boona abakumaani̱li̱ye hamui.
43011053	Nahabweki ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la kilo eki beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baatandika kubbala mulingo balaatilamu Yesu.
43011054	Ekyalu̱ghi̱yemu, Yesu aaleka kubunga bbeni̱-bbeni̱ mu Bayu̱daaya. Bhaatu aalu̱ghayo hamui na beeghesebuwa be, baaghenda baakala mu mu̱bhi̱li̱ oghulabhaane na elungu oghu baaghilaghamu Efulahi̱mu̱.
43011055	Obu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Bayu̱daaya kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo bwali buli haai ku̱hi̱ka, Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baalu̱gha mu byalo, baaghenda e Yelusaalemu. Baaghenda kukola mi̱ghendi̱yo ya kweyeli̱ya ewaa Luhanga, ki̱ghenu̱ eki kitakahi̱ki̱ye.
43011056	Bantu aba baakala mbalola-kaka Yesu, kandi baakalagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Mu̱kweli̱li̱kana ki? Akwisa haa ki̱ghenu̱ hani?”
43011057	Baabu̱u̱lani̱ya batiyo nanga bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na Bafali̱saayo bakaba mbaalaghiiye bati oghu akubona hambali Yesu ali, aghende abaghambile niikuwo bamukwate.
43012001	Bikaba bi̱ti̱ghaaye bilo mukaagha Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo ku̱hi̱ka, Yesu aaki̱dha e Bbetaniya hambali Lajaalo oghu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye aabaagha aakaaye.
43012002	Baatekani̱li̱ja Yesu kiihulo mu ka ya Lajaalo oghu, Malita aatandika kubaheeleli̱ya haa kiihulo eki. Lajaalo naye akaba ali mu bantu abaaliilagha haa meeja emui na Yesu.
43012003	Niibuwo Mali̱ya aasi̱ye akwete cu̱pa esemeeye, elimu bigita bisasi̱ye kandi bi̱tembi̱ye kwonini, aabiseesela Yesu mu bighele kandi aatandika kumulaghali̱ya bighele ebi naakoleesi̱ya esoke liye. Ti̱ kusasa kwa bigita ebi kwamalakaka numba eghi yoona.
43012004	Bhaatu omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu, Yu̱da Esikalyota, oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, aaghila ati,
43012005	“Ekyaleki̱ye bigita ebi bataabi̱ghu̱li̱ya kandi sente esi̱ku̱lu̱ghamu basiha banaku nkiki? Byangu̱lu̱ghi̱yemu sente syengaane na musaala ghwa muntu ghwa mwaka ghwona.”
43012006	Taabu̱ghi̱ye eki nanga ngu afu̱u̱yʼo banaku, bhaatu nanga akaba ali musuma. Niiye akaba ali mu̱bi̱i̱ki̱ wa nsau yabo ya sente kandi bunji na bunji aabhaghamu sente.
43012007	Yesu aaghila ati, “Mumuleke! Aakoli̱ye eki kuteekani̱ja kujiikuwa kwanje.
43012008	Banaku mukuukala nabo bwile bwona, bhaatu si̱ye tankuukala naanu bwile bwona bbaa.”
43012009	Ki̱bbu̱la kyamaani̱ kya Bayu̱daaya baaghu̱wa bantu mbabu̱gha ngoku Yesu ali e Bbetaniya. Du̱mbi̱ baaghendayo, kutali kulola Yesu enkaha bhaatu kulola na Lajaalo oghu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye.
43012010	Nahabweki bakulu baa bahongi̱ baatʼo ntegheka ya kwita Lajaalo oghu dhee,
43012011	nanga haabwa Lajaalo oghu, Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baabalu̱ghʼo kandi baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu.
43012012	Kilo ekyalabhi̱i̱yʼo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaali baasi̱ye haabwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo, baaghu̱wa ngu Yesu niibuwo aasa e Yelusaalemu.
43012013	Nahabweki baajomba bi̱kongu̱bho kandi baaghenda kumusangaana, mbanagola bati, “Ooyee! Ali na mu̱gi̱sa oni oghu aasi̱ye mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama! Ali na mu̱gi̱sa Mukama wa I̱saaleeli̱.”
43012014	Kandi Yesu aabona kyana kya ndogooi̱, aani̱i̱na aakisitamʼo, ngoku kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu,
43012015	“Mutoobaha enu̱we bantu baa Sayu̱u̱ni̱, mulole mukama waanu niibuwo aasa, asitami̱ye haa kyana kya ndogooi̱.”
43012016	Haaku̱du̱bha beeghesebuwa baa Yesu tabeetegheleei̱ye bintu ebi. Bhaatu haanu̱ma ya Yesu kukuuka mu eghulu, niibuwo baasu̱ki̱ye ngoku bintu ebi byahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱wʼo Yesu, kandi ngoku ebyalehukanagha ebi byasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya bintu ebi.
43012017	Ti̱ ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaagha na Yesu obu aabilikiiye Lajaalo mu kituulo kandi aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la mu baku̱u̱ye, beeyongela kulalangi̱ya makulu agha.
43012018	Kighendeleluwa ekyaleki̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki baaghenda hambali Yesu ali, ni nanga bakaaghu̱wa kyakuswekani̱ya eki aakoli̱ye.
43012019	Nahabweki Bafali̱saayo baatandika kughambilana bati, “Ni majima ngu tatuli na eki tukwete kukola kulengʼo kutanga musaasa oghu! Olole ngoku bantu boona bakwete kumukwamilila!”
43012020	Mu bantu abaaghendi̱ye Yelusaalemu kulami̱ya Luhanga mu bwile bwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo hakaba halimu bamui mu Bagi̱li̱ki̱.
43012021	Niibuwo baasi̱ye hambali Fi̱li̱po ali oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye e Bbetesai̱da mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya. Baamughila bati, “Wai̱tu̱, tukubbala kusanga-sangaana na Yesu.”
43012022	Fi̱li̱po aaghenda aaghambila Andeleya, du̱mbi̱ bombi Andeleya na Fi̱li̱po baaghenda baaghambila Yesu.
43012023	Yesu aaghila ati, “Bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Luhanga kuha Mwana wa Muntu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
43012024	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, bataaheli̱ye kasigho kaa ndimo mu etaka, kaku̱wa kakuukalagha kali kasigho kamui konkaha. Bhaatu bakaakukahelagha nkaaku̱wa, niibuwo kaku̱lu̱ghaghamu busigho bukani̱ye.
43012025	Muntu weena oghu akukunda bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe akubufeeluwa, bhaatu oghu akubwoha munsi muni, akuba na bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43012026	Kandi weena oghu aku̱heeleli̱ya si̱ye, akulaghiluwa kunkwamilila, ti̱ hambali nkuba ndi, niiyo naye akuukala dhee. Ti̱ muntu weena naaheeleei̱ye si̱ye, Tita aku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya.”
43012027	Yesu eeyongela kughila ati, “Ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye ntuntuuye, buuye mbu̱ghe nti, ‘Tita, onjune kubona-bona kuni’? Bbaa, nanga eki niikiyo kighendeleluwa ekyaleki̱ye naasa munsi.
43012028	Tita, wooleke bantu ngoku oli na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa!” Aakabu̱ghi̱ye atiyo, elaka lyalu̱gha mu eghulu, lyaghila liti, “Nooleki̱ye bantu ngoku ndi na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, kandi nkutodha kubooleka kiyo!”
43012029	Obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu abaabaaghʼo baaghu̱u̱ye elaka eli bateetegheeleli̱ya bighambo ebi. Bamui mu bo baaghila bati ni nkubha. Bhaatu banji baaghila bati ni malai̱ka akwete ku̱bu̱gha na Yesu.
43012030	Yesu aaghila bantu aba ati, “Elaka eli ndyakughasila enu̱we, talili lyakughasila si̱ye bbaa.
43012031	Bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Luhanga ku̱twi̱la nsi eni musango. Kandi bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Si̱taani̱ oghu alemi̱ye nsi eni Luhanga kumubhingamu.
43012032	Bhaatu si̱ye bakaakumbamba haa musalaba, nkuleka bantu boona baase ewanje.”
43012033	Akabu̱gha eki kwoleka mulingo aaghendagha ku̱kwi̱lamu.
43012034	Niibuwo ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu aba baamu̱ghi̱li̱ye bati, “Tukusomagha mu bilaghilo hambali bi̱ghi̱li̱ye ngu, Ki̱li̱si̱to akuukalʼo bilo nʼebilo, ti̱ uwe okugubha oti̱ya kughila ngu, ‘Mwana wa Muntu bakumubamba haa musalaba’? Ni Mwana wa Muntu wa mulingo ki okwete kughamba?”
43012035	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Kyeleeli̱ kibalimu haabwa bwile bukee. Mubunge munali na kyeleeli̱, mweli̱ma ghutakabahi̱ki̱yʼo. Oghu akubungilagha mu mweli̱ma taakumanyagha hambali akwete kughenda.
43012036	Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je kyeleeli̱ munali nakiyo, niikuwo mugubhe kufooka baana baa kyeleeli̱ eki.” Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aabalu̱ghʼo kandi muntu nʼomui ataamanya hambali aaghendi̱ye.
43012037	Nankabha Yesu naakoli̱ye byakuswekani̱ya ebi byona banabiboone, baabhenga dhee ku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43012038	Eki kikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi mulangi̱ I̱saaya aabu̱ghi̱ye kuba majima ngu: “Mukama, ni ani̱ ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je butumuwa bwatu, kandi ni ani̱ aaboone bu̱toki̱ bwa Mukama?”
43012039	Bhaatu tabaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku aaghi̱li̱ye ati,
43012040	“Aaghaaye maaso ghaabo kandi oomakakani̱ya mitima yabo, niikuwo batagubha kubona na maaso ghaabo, kandi kwetegheeleli̱ya mu mitima yabo, kandi bankuukʼo, mbaki̱li̱ye.”
43012041	I̱saaya akabu̱gha eki nanga akabona ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Yesu kandi aabu̱gha ebikwetʼo Yesu.
43012042	Ti̱ bwile obu bakani̱ye mu beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, bhaatu haabwa kwobaha Bafali̱saayo, boobaha kukyatula mu bantu ngoku baamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je. Boobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bafali̱saayo kubabhinga mu elami̱li̱yo.
43012043	Beebembeli̱ aba baabbalagha bantu babasinde mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Luhanga kubasinda.
43012044	Niibuwo Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye na elaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Weena oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye taani̱i̱si̱ye ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je nenkaha bbaa, ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je na oghu akantuma.
43012045	Ti̱ na oghu aaboone si̱ye, aboone dhee na oghu akantuma.
43012046	Naasi̱ye munsi nga kyeleeli̱, niikuwo weena oghu aku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye, ataakala anali mu mweli̱ma.
43012047	“Muntu weena naanaaghu̱u̱ye butumuwa bwanje kandi abhenga ku̱bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, taani̱i̱si̱ye nku̱mu̱twi̱la musango bbaa, nanga tanaasi̱ye ku̱twi̱la bantu baa munsi musango, nkaasa kubajuna.
43012048	Abakubhengagha si̱ye kandi babhenga ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja butumuwa bwanje, bali na oghu akwisa kubatwi̱la musango. Ti̱ bighambo nkwete kubaghambila bini, niibiyo bilileka haa kilo kya mpelo Luhanga abatwi̱le musango.
43012049	Agha ni majima ghoonini, nanga tankwete ku̱bu̱gha haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwanje neenini, bhaatu Tita oghu akantuma niiye andaghiiye ebi mbhonganuuwe ku̱bu̱gha.
43012050	Kandi nimani̱ye ngoku ebi akulaghilagha bikuhaagha bantu bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo. Nahabweki ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha ni ebi Tita oghu angambiiye ku̱bu̱gha.”
43013001	Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo kikaba kili haai ku̱hi̱ka. Yesu aamanya ngoku bwile buwe bwa ku̱lu̱gha munsi muni kukuuka ewaa Ese wee bwahi̱ki̱ye. Yesu akaba aku̱ndi̱ye beeghesebuwa be abali munsi, kandi ooleka ngoku abakundiiye kwonini ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kumaliilila.
43013002	Baaliyagha kyalwagholo, kandi Si̱taani̱ akaba naamali̱ye kuta kyeli̱li̱kano kya ku̱ghobeli̱ya Yesu mu mutima ghwa Yu̱da Esikalyota, mutabani̱ wa Si̱mooni̱.
43013003	Yesu akaba amani̱ye ngoku Ese wee aamuhaaye bu̱toki̱ haa bu̱li̱ kintu kyona, kandi ngoku aalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga kandi ngoku akukuuka ewaa Luhanga.
43013004	Nahabweki banali haa kiihulo haala Yesu aamuka, eehiyamu kooti̱ eghi aabaagha alu̱wete, kandi eeboha taulo mu mi̱ghelu̱.
43013005	Haanu̱ma ya eki, aata maasi mu bbaafu kandi aatandika kunaabi̱ya beeghesebuwa be mu maghulu, naanaghalaghali̱ya ku̱ghoomi̱ya na taulo eghi aabaagha eebohi̱ye mu mi̱ghelu̱.
43013006	Niibuwo aahi̱ki̱ye hambali Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo ali, Peetelo oghu aamughila ati, “Mukama, taki̱hi̱ki̱ye uwe kunaabi̱ya si̱ye mu maghulu bbaa.”
43013007	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Endindi taweetegheleei̱ye eki nkwete kukola, bhaatu oku̱kyetegheeleli̱ya haanu̱ma.”
43013008	Peetelo aaghila ati, “Tookunaabi̱ya si̱ye mu maghulu bbaa.” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ntaakunaabi̱i̱ye mu maghulu, okuba otali mweghesebuwa wanje.”
43013009	Niibuwo Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu aamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱yemu ati, “Mukama, otaanaabi̱ya mu maghulu honkaha, bhaatu onaabi̱ye mu mikono kandi na mu mutuwe dhee!”
43013010	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Muntu oghu amali̱ye kunaaba taakwetaaghisibuwagha kutodha kunaaba, kuuyʼo akunaabagha mu maghulu honkaha, nanga mubili ghuwe ghwona ghweli̱ye. Enu̱we beeghesebuwa banje mweli̱ye, nankabha etali enu̱we boona.”
43013011	Nanga akaba amani̱ye oghu aku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye aaghila ati tabali beeghesebuwa be boona abeeli̱ye.
43013012	Obu aamali̱ye kunaabi̱ya beeghesebuwa be mu maghulu, aatodha aalu̱waala eki aabaagha eetu̱bu̱u̱yemu, aaghenda aasitama mu ki̱i̱kalo kiye. Aabu̱u̱li̱ya beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mwetegheleei̱ye eki nku̱lu̱gha kubakolela?”
43013013	Aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we mukungilaghamu muti, ‘Mwegheesi̱ya’ kandi ‘Mukama,’ mu̱hi̱ki̱i̱ye kungila mutiyo, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye mwegheesi̱ya kandi Mukama waanu.
43013014	Nahabweki si̱ye Mukama kandi mwegheesi̱ya waanu, naabanaabi̱i̱ye mu maghulu, naanu dhee mubhonganuuwe kunaabangani̱ya mu maghulu.
43013015	Naabooleki̱ye kyakulolelʼo ngu naanu mubhonganuuwe kukola nga eki naabakoleeye.
43013016	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, mu̱heeleli̱ya taasaai̱ye mukama wee, kandi mutumuwa taasaai̱ye oghu amu̱tu̱mi̱ye.
43013017	Ti̱ enu̱we bintu bini mubimani̱ye, nimwabikoli̱ye Luhanga akubaha mu̱gi̱sa.
43013018	“Tankwete kughila nti Luhanga akuha mu̱gi̱sa enu̱we boona. Nkakoma enu̱we nimani̱ye ngoku bu̱li̱ muntu ali. Bhaatu mu enu̱we halimu oghu naakomi̱ye nimani̱ye ngoku aku̱ngobeli̱ya, eki kikaba ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ekyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ekikughilagha kiti, ‘Oghu ali nga bhootu̱ syanje haabwanje kuliya hamui naye niiye aabaaye ngi̱ghu̱ yanje.’
43013019	“Naabaghambiiye ngoku omui mu enu̱we aku̱ngobeli̱ya kitakabaayʼo, niikuwo nkyabaayʼo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je ngu Ni̱i̱syoni Ki̱li̱si̱to.
43013020	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, weena oghu akubhasila oghu ntu̱mi̱ye, ni̱i̱si̱ye akuba abhasiiye, kandi oghu akubhasila si̱ye, akuba abhasiiye oghu akantuma.”
43013021	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha ebi, Yesu aaghu̱wa ali na bujune mu mutima kandi aaghila ati, “Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, omui mu enu̱we aku̱ngobeli̱ya.”
43013022	Beeghesebuwa be aba baatandika kulolana omui-omui, bhaatu bataagubha kutunga mulingo ghwa kumanya oghu akwete kughamba.
43013023	Omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu oghu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye akaba asitami̱ye haai naye hambali baaliilagha.
43013024	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aakolela sai̱ni̱ mweghesebuwa onji oghu akaba asitami̱ye haai na Yesu ati amu̱bu̱u̱li̱ye oghu akwete kughamba.
43013025	Mweghesebuwa oghu eegi̱ma Yesu, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama ni ani̱ okwete kughamba?”
43013026	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni oghu nkuha ki̱twi̱ke kya mugaati̱ ghuni haanu̱ma ya ku̱ghu̱koli̱ya mu bbaaku̱li̱.” Niibuwo aakoleei̱ye ki̱twi̱ke kya mugaati̱ oghu mu bbaaku̱li̱, aakiha Yu̱da Esikalyota mutabani̱ wa Si̱mooni̱.
43013027	Yu̱da oghu makaliya ati ki̱twi̱ke kya mugaati̱ oghu, Si̱taani̱ aataaha mu mutima ghuwe. Yesu aamughila ati, “Eki olimaghenda kukola, okikole bwangu.”
43013028	Bhaatu taabaayʼo nʼomui haa kiihulo haala oghu akakenga ekyaleki̱ye Yesu aaghila atiyo Yu̱da oghu.
43013029	Ngoku Yu̱da aaniiye akaba ali na bujunaani̱ji̱buwa bwa kubiika sente, bamui mu beeghesebuwa aba beeli̱li̱kana bati Yesu niibuwo aamughambila kughula ebi bakwetaaghisibuwa haabwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Beeli̱li̱kana bati kedha niibuwo aamughambila kughula bya kuha banaku.
43013030	Yu̱da oghu makamala ati kuliya mugaati̱ oghu, du̱mbi̱ aatuwa aaghenda. Bwile bukaba mbwali̱ye.
43013031	Haanu̱ma ya Yu̱da oghu kughenda, Yesu aaghila ati, “Bwile bwahi̱ki̱ye bwa Luhanga kwoleka ngoku Mwana wa Muntu ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, kandi haabuwe bantu bakumanya ngoku Luhanga ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.”
43013032	Kaakuba bantu bamanya ngoku Luhanga ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haabwa Mwana wee, Luhanga akwoleka dhee bantu ngoku Mwana wee ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Kandi eki akukikola bwangu.
43013033	“Enu̱we baana banje, nkuukala naanu bwile bukee. Mukumbala, kandi ngoku naaghambiiye Bayu̱daaya, niikuwo ndimaghambila naanu endindi nti hambali nkughenda, tamukugubha kughendayo bbaa.
43013034	“Ndimabaha kilaghilo kihyaka: Mukundangane ngoku nanje naaku̱ndi̱ye enu̱we. Nahabweki mubhonganuuwe kukundangana.
43013035	Nimwakundangaane, bantu boona bakumanya ngoku muli beeghesebuwa banje.”
43013036	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama, okughenda haa?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Hambali nkughenda endindi tamukugubha kughenda yo, bhaatu mukunkwama haanu̱ma.”
43013037	Peetelo oghu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama wanje, ekyanguleka ntakukwama endindi nkiki? Si̱ye neeteekani̱i̱je ku̱ku̱wa haabwawe.”
43013038	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Weeteekani̱i̱je ku̱ku̱wa haabwanje? Nkughambiiye majima ghoonini, nkoko etakakooki̱ye okuba nuwaaneehighaane kasatu.”
43014001	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Mitima yaanu eleke kutuntula. Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je Luhanga kandi mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je nanje dhee.
43014002	Mu numba ya Tita halimu bisiika bikani̱ye. Nguli ghataabaagha majima, tanaangubaghambiiye nti ndimaghendayo kubateekani̱li̱ya bi̱i̱kalo.
43014003	Ti̱ nkaakughenda kandi ninaamala kubateekani̱li̱ja bi̱i̱kalo, nkukuuka mbatwale niikuwo hambali nkuba ndi haaliiyo naanu mwakala dhee nanje.
43014004	Enu̱we mumani̱ye kihanda kya kughenda mu ki̱i̱kalo hambali nkughenda.”
43014005	Tomasi aamughila ati, “Mukama wanje, tatumani̱ye hambali okwete kughenda, buuye kihanda tulakimanya tu̱ti̱ya?”
43014006	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni kihanda kandi majima kandi bwomi̱i̱li̱. Taaliyo oghu akugubha kughenda ewaa Tita atakwamiiye muli si̱ye.
43014007	Nimwabaaye mumani̱ye si̱ye kwonini na Tita mukumumanya dhee. Ti̱ ku̱lu̱gha endindi na kweyongelayo mumumani̱ye kandi mwamuboone.”
43014008	Fi̱li̱po aaghila ati, “Mukama, otwoleke Sowaawe, eki kikuba kitumali̱ye.”
43014009	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Fi̱li̱po, toomani̱ye si̱ye haanu̱ma ya kuukala naanu bwile bukani̱ye obu bwona? Muntu weena oghu aaboone si̱ye, aaboone Tita. Okugubha oti̱ya kughila oti, ‘Otwoleke Sowaawe’?
43014010	Tamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngoku ndi muli Tita kandi na Tita aaba muli si̱ye? Bighambo ebi nkubaghambilagha tabili byanje nenkaha. Bhaatu Tita oghu ali muli si̱ye, niiye akwete kukola mulimo ghuwe.
43014011	Mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je si̱ye ninaabaghi̱li̱ye nti ndi muli Tita kandi na Tita ali muli si̱ye, hakili mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je si̱ye haabwa byakuswekani̱ya ebi mukubonagha ninkola.
43014012	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, nimwahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je si̱ye, mukukola nga ebi naakolagha. Haanu̱ma yanje kughenda ewaa Tita, mukugubha kukola byakuswekani̱ya ebisaai̱ye ebi si̱ye nkwete kukola.
43014013	Kyona eki mukusaba mu li̱i̱na lyanje, nkubakolela kiyo, niikuwo bantu bagubhe kuha Tita ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kukwama mu si̱ye Mwana wee.
43014014	Kaakuba musaba kintu kyona mu li̱i̱na lyanje, nkubakolela kiyo.
43014015	“Kaakuba mukunda si̱ye mukukola ebi nkubalaghilagha kukola.
43014016	Kandi nkusaba Tita Luhanga kubaha Mu̱kooneli̱ onji kuukala naanu bilo nʼebilo.
43014017	Mu̱kooneli̱ oghu ni Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akubooleka majima haa Luhanga. Bhaatu bantu baa nsi tabakugubha kumutangilila kandi kumumanya ngoku ali. Bhaatu enu̱we mumumani̱ye nanga akuukalagha naanu kandi aliba mu enu̱we.
43014018	Tankubati̱gha nga nku̱u̱bbi̱ bbaa, nkutodha kukuuka hambali muli.
43014019	Bwile butaseli̱ya bantu baa munsi tabakutodha kumbona, bhaatu enu̱we mukumbona. Nanga si̱ye ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱, naanu mukuba boomi̱i̱li̱.
43014020	Bwile obu mukumanya ngoku si̱ye hamui na Tita tuli mu bumui kwonini, kandi naanu muli mu bumui kwonini hamui nanje kandi nanje ndi bumui kwonini naanu.
43014021	Weena oghu akukwata bilaghilo byanje, oghu niiye anku̱ndi̱ye. Kandi oghu anku̱ndi̱ye oghu na Tita akumukunda dhee, kandi nanje ni̱mu̱ku̱ndi̱ye dhee kandi nkumweyoleka ngoku ndi.”
43014022	Niibuwo Yu̱da (atali Yu̱da Esikalyota) aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukama, ekikulekagha obbala kutweyoleka kandi otabbala kweyoleka bantu baa munsi ngoku oli nkiki?”
43014023	Yesu aakuukamu ati, “Muntu naabaaye anku̱ndi̱ye, akukwata ebi nkwegheesi̱yagha. Tita akumukunda, kandi tumwisile tuukale hamui naye.
43014024	Muntu weena oghu ataku̱ndi̱ye si̱ye, taakukwata ebi nkwegheesi̱yagha. Bighambo ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye nimbaghambila ebi, tabili byanje nenkaha bbaa, ni bya Tita oghu akantuma.
43014025	“Bini byona naabi̱bu̱ghi̱ye ninali naanu.
43014026	Bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akwisa kuba Mu̱kooneli̱ waanu. Niiye Tita akutuma kwisa mu li̱i̱na lyanje. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu aku̱beegheesi̱ya bintu byona kandi abaasu̱ki̱ye bintu byona ebi naabaghambiiye ninali naanu.
43014027	Ndimabaha mpempa yonkaha, kandi mpempa eghi ni̱i̱si̱ye nenkaha nkugubha kughiha enu̱we. Teeli nga eghi bantu baa nsi bakuhaagha. Nahabweki muleke kutuntula kandi kwobaha.
43014028	“Mwaghu̱u̱ye ningila nti, ‘Nkughenda ewaa Tita kandi nkukuuka hambali muli.’ Nimwabaaye mu̱nku̱ndi̱ye, kughenda ewaa Tita kukubadheedha, nanga Tita ansaai̱ye bu̱toki̱.
43014029	Naabaghambiiye eki kitakabaayʼo, niikuwo nkyabaayʼo mweyongele ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye.
43014030	Tankutodha ku̱bu̱gha naanu bintu bikani̱ye, nanga Si̱taani̱ oghu alemi̱ye nsi eni alimaasa kulwani̱i̱si̱ya si̱ye. Bhaatu taali na bu̱toki̱ haa si̱ye bbaa.
43014031	Bhaatu nkwete kukola ebi Tita andaghiiye kukola niikuwo bantu baa munsi bamanye ngoku nku̱ndi̱ye Tita. “Nahabweki, muleke tu̱lu̱ghe hani tughende.”
43015001	Yesu aaghila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye ki̱ti̱na kyamajima kya mijaabbi̱i̱bbu̱, Tita niiye mu̱li̱mi̱ wa musili oghu.
43015002	Akujombagha etai lyona elili mu si̱ye elitaakwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma. Bhaatu elikwanagha bi̱ghu̱ma akulisaliililagha, niikuwo lyeyongele kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye.
43015003	Enu̱we mwamali̱ye kufooka abeeli̱ye ewaa Luhanga haabwa bighambo naabaghambiiye.
43015004	Muukale mu si̱ye kandi nanje nkuukala mu enu̱we. Taaliyo etai elikugubha kwana bi̱ghu̱ma haabwa liyo lyonkaha, likulaghiluwa kuba lili haa ki̱ti̱na. Naanu dhee tamukugubha kwana bi̱ghu̱ma kuuyʼo muukaaye muli si̱ye.”
43015005	“Ni̱i̱si̱ye ki̱ti̱na; enu̱we mwaba matai. Muntu naakaaye muli si̱ye kandi nanje niikala muli eye, akwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye. Nimwakaaye mutali mu bumui nanje, tamukugubha kukola kintu kyona bbaa.
43015006	Muntu weena ataakaaye muli si̱ye, ali nga etai eli bakukubagha kandi lyoma, matai nga agha bakughakomagha, baghakuba mu mulilo kandi baghoki̱ya.
43015007	Kaakuba muukala muli si̱ye kandi na bighambo byanje biikala mu enu̱we, musabe kyona eki mukubbala kandi kikubakoleluwa.
43015008	Ekikuleka bantu mbaha Tita ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, ni enu̱we kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye, niikuwo mweyoleke ngoku muli beeghesebuwa banje.
43015009	“Ngoku Tita anku̱ndi̱ye, niikuwo nanje mbaku̱ndi̱ye. Nahabweki mutalu̱gha mu kukunda kwanje.
43015010	Nimwakaaye nimunakola ebi naabalaghiiye, kikwoleka ngu munali mu kukunda kwanje, ngoku si̱ye naakaaye niinakola ebi Tita andaghiiye kandi naakala mu kukunda kuwe.
43015011	Naabaghambiiye ebi niikuwo kudheedhuwa kwanje kuukale mu enu̱we, kandi kudheedhuwa oku kuusulile kimui.
43015012	Eki ndimalaghila ni ngu: Mukundangane ngoku nanje naabaku̱ndi̱ye.
43015013	Kukunda kwamaani̱ oku muntu akugubha kuba nakuwo haa baabhootu̱ si̱ye, ni kuhaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe ku̱ku̱wa haabwabo.
43015014	Nimwakaaye nimunakola ebi naabalaghiiye, mukuba nimwoleka ngoku muli baabhootu̱ syanje.
43015015	Tankyabaghilamu baheeleli̱ya, nanga mu̱heeleli̱ya taakumanya ebi mukama wee akutegheka. Bhaatu naabaghi̱li̱yemu baabhootu̱ syanje nanga naabaghambiiye byona ebi Tita angambiiye.
43015016	Taali̱i̱nu̱we mwekomi̱ye kuba beeghesebuwa banje. Bhaatu ni̱i̱si̱ye nkabakoma kandi naabaha mulimo ghwa kughenda kandi kwana bi̱ghu̱ma bikani̱ye kandi bi̱ghu̱ma ebikuukalʼo bilo nʼebilo. Ti̱ kyona eki mulasabagha Tita mu li̱i̱na lyanje alabahaagha kiyo.
43015017	Ndimatodha kubalaghila nti: Mukundangane.”
43015018	“Bantu baa nsi mboohi̱ye enu̱we, muukale mukimani̱ye ngoku baadu̱bhi̱ye kwoha si̱ye.
43015019	Nimwanabaaye mu bumui na bantu baa nsi, bangu̱ku̱ndi̱ye enu̱we ngoku baku̱ndi̱ye baabhootu̱ syabo. Enu̱we tamuli baabo; bhaatu nkakoma enu̱we naabaaye mu bantu aba, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye bantu baa nsi aba boohi̱ye enu̱we.
43015020	Muusuke ebi naabaghambiiye nti, ‘Mu̱heeleli̱ya taasaai̱ye mukama wee.’ Nahabweki ngoku baabona-boneei̱ye si̱ye, naanu bakubabona-boni̱ya dhee. Bakaakuba mbaakwete ebi neegheesi̱yagha, bakukwata na ebyanu dhee.
43015021	Bakubatwalikani̱ya batiyo nanga enu̱we kuba banje, kandi nanga tabamani̱ye oghu akantuma.
43015022	Nguli ntaasi̱ye mbaghambila butumuwa bwa Luhanga, tabangubaaye na musango ghwa bibhi byabo. Bhaatu endindi tabali na kyakwekwati̱i̱si̱ya haabwa bibhi byabo.
43015023	Oghu anjoi̱ye, oohi̱ye dhee na Tita.
43015024	Nguli ntaakoli̱ye mu ebo byakuswekani̱ya ebi muntu onji atakakolagha, tabangu̱si̱ngu̱u̱we musango ghwa bibhi byabo. Bhaatu endindi baboone byakuswekani̱ya ebi, ti̱ boohi̱ye etu̱we bombi, si̱ye kandi Tita.
43015025	Bhaatu eki kikaba ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu bilaghilo byabo ngu, ‘Bakanjoha batali na kighendeleluwa.’
43015026	“Bhaatu nkutumila enu̱we Mu̱kooneli̱ ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Tita, Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akubooleka majima haa Luhanga. Akubaasamu ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Tita kandi akuha buukai̱so naabu̱gha byona ebikwetʼo si̱ye.
43015027	Naanu dhee mubhonganuuwe kuha buukai̱so haa bikwetʼo si̱ye, nanga mwakaaye nanje ku̱lu̱gha hambali naatandikiiye mulimo ghuni.”
43016001	Yesu eeyongela kughila beeghesebuwa be ati, “Naabaghambiiye niikuwo bantu mbaatandi̱ki̱ye kubona-boni̱ya enu̱we haabwanje, mutalu̱gha haa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu.
43016002	Nanga bantu bakutanga enu̱we kughenda kulami̱li̱ya mu malami̱li̱yo ghaabo. Majima bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka obu muntu akweli̱li̱kana ati naati̱ye enu̱we akuba naaheeleli̱ya Luhanga.
43016003	Bakukola bintu ebi byona nanga tabakamani̱ye Tita kedha si̱ye.
43016004	Naabaghambiiye ebi niikuwo bwile mbwahi̱ki̱ye bwa kubona-boni̱ya enu̱we, muukale mumani̱ye ngoku naasangu̱u̱we mbaghambiiye. Tanaabaghambiiye bini obu naatandikagha mulimo ghuni, nanga nkaba ndi hamui naanu.
43016005	“Endindi ndi haai kughenda ewaa oghu akantuma. Bhaatu taaliyo nʼomui mu enu̱we oghu ambu̱u̱i̱ye ati, ‘Okughenda haa?’
43016006	Bhaatu haabwa kubaghambila bintu ebi kyaleki̱ye mwatuntula mu mitima yaanu.
43016007	Nkubbala kubaghambila majima, kughenda kwanje kukughasila enu̱we. Ntaaghendi̱ye, Mu̱kooneli̱ taakwisa mu enu̱we bbaa. Ninaaghendi̱ye, nkumutuma aase mu enu̱we.
43016008	Akaakwisa niiye akwoleka bantu baa nsi majima ngoku bali na kibhi, kandi ngoku Luhanga ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kandi ngoku akubatwi̱la musango haabwa bibhi byabo.
43016009	Akubooleka ngoku bali na kibhi haabwa kutampi̱ki̱li̱ja.
43016010	Akwoleka bantu baa nsi eni oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwonini mu maaso ghaa Luhanga, nanga si̱ye ndimakuuka ewaa Tita, kandi tamukutodha kumbona.
43016011	Niiye dhee akuleka bantu mbamanya ngoku baku̱twi̱lu̱wa musango, nanga Luhanga aamali̱ye ku̱tu̱wamu kufubila Si̱taani̱ oghu alemi̱ye nsi eni.
43016012	“Ndi na bikani̱ye bya kubaghambila, bhaatu tamukubigubha byona bbaa.
43016013	Bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akaakwisa, akubooleka majima haa Luhanga, aku̱beegheesi̱ya majima ghoona ghaa Luhanga. Taaku̱bu̱gha haabwa bu̱toki̱ buwe enkaha bbaa. Akubaghambila ebi aaghu̱u̱ye Tita naabu̱gha. Akutodha abaghambile ebikubʼo mu bwile obukwisa mu maaso.
43016014	Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akumpa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa nanga akukwata ebi nku̱bu̱gha byonini kandi abighambile enu̱we.
43016015	Byona ebi Tita ali nabiyo ni byanje, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabaghila nti Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu akukwata ebi nkumughambila kandi niibiyo byonini akughambila enu̱we.
43016016	“Bwile butaseli̱ye tamukutodha kumbona kandi haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee mukutodha kumbona.”
43016017	Niibuwo bamui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu aba baatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye ki kughila ati, ‘Bwile butaseli̱ye tamukutodha kumbona, kandi haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee mukutodha kumbona,’ kandi kughila ati, ‘Nanga ndimaghenda ewaa Tita’?”
43016018	Baakala mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Aamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye ki kughila ati, ‘bwile bukee’? Ebi akwete ku̱bu̱gha tatu̱byetegheleei̱ye bbaa.”
43016019	Yesu aamanya ngoku bakubbala ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya haa eki aabu̱ghi̱ye eki, niibuwo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mukwete ku̱bu̱u̱lani̱ya haa eki naamani̱i̱si̱i̱ye obu naaghi̱li̱ye nti, ‘Bwile butaseli̱ye tamukutodha kumbona kandi haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee mukutodha kumbona’?
43016020	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, enu̱we mukusaaliluwa kandi mutuntule bhaatu bantu baa nsi ebo bakuba badheedheeu̱we. Mukutuntula bhaatu kutuntula kwanu ku̱ku̱lu̱ghamu kudheedhuwa.
43016021	Kili ngoku mukali̱ oghu bwile buwe bwa ku̱byala bwahi̱ki̱ye akusaaliluwagha. Bhaatu akaaku̱byalagha mwana wee, mukali̱ oghu aabululuwa busaali̱ji̱ obu, nanga aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha adheedheeu̱we munu haabwa mwana aabyaye oghu.
43016022	Niikuwo kili kitiyo naanu dhee, endindi ni bwile bwanu bwa kusaaliluwa, bhaatu nkaakutodha ninaababona mukudheedhuwa, kandi kudheedhuwa oku taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akubaayʼo kuwo bbaa.
43016023	Mbaghambiiye majima ghoonini, bwile obu tamulitodha ku̱mbu̱u̱li̱ya kantu koona. Tita akubaha kyona eki mukusaba mu li̱i̱na lyanje.
43016024	Ku̱hi̱ki̱ya na endindi tamukasabi̱ye kintu kyona mu li̱i̱na lyanje. Musabe, mukutunga eki mwasabi̱ye, kandi mukudheedhuwa kwonini.
43016025	“Nankabha ninaabu̱ghagha naanu haa bintu ebi ni̱nkoleesi̱ya nsi̱mo, bwile bu̱ku̱hi̱ka obu ntaakutodha ku̱koleesi̱ya nsi̱mo esi. Bhaatu nkubaghambila bbeni̱-bbeni̱ haa ebikwetʼo Tita.
43016026	Ti̱ bwile obu mukusaba ebi mukwetaaghisibuwa mu li̱i̱na lyanje, kandi tankwetaaghisibuwa kusaba Tita kubakolela ebi mwasabi̱ye ebi bbaa.
43016027	Tita oghu eenini aku̱ndi̱ye enu̱we nanga enu̱we kukunda si̱ye kandi ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku naalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga.
43016028	Nkaasa mu nsi muni ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Tita, endindi ndimalu̱gha munsi kandi kukuuka ewaa Tita oghu.”
43016029	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yesu aba baaghi̱li̱ye bati, “Hakili endindi waabu̱gha bbeni̱-bbeni̱ otaaku̱koleesi̱ya nsi̱mo.
43016030	Endindi twakimanya ngoku omani̱ye bu̱li̱ kintu kyona, kandi tookwetaaghisibuwa muntu weena ku̱ku̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bi̱bu̱u̱li̱yo. Eki kyaleki̱ye twahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku waalu̱ghi̱ye ewaa Luhanga.”
43016031	Yesu aabakuukamu ati, “Naanu haakumaliilila mwahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je?”
43016032	Bhaatu bwile buli haai ku̱hi̱ka kandi bwamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ka hambali enu̱we boona mukuhanjikana, kandi bu̱li̱ omui akughenda ewe e ka. Mu̱nti̱ghe nenkaha. Bhaatu tanku̱ti̱ghala nenkaha bbaa, nanga Tita ali hamui nanje.
43016033	Naabaghambiiye bintu ebi, niikuwo haabwanu kuba mu bumui nanje mugubhe kutunga mpempa. Munsi muni mukubona-bona. Bhaatu mugume! Si̱ye naasi̱ngu̱u̱ye bu̱toki̱ bwa nsi eni.
43017001	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi byona, aalola eghulu kandi aatandika kusaba naaghila ati, “Tita bwile bwanje bwa kubona-bona kandi ku̱ku̱wa bwahi̱ki̱ye. Ohe Mwana waawe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa niikuwo na Mwana waawe akuhe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
43017002	Nanga okamuha bu̱toki̱ haa bantu boona niikuwo boona aba waamuhaaye abahe bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
43017003	Ekikuleka bantu mbatunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo, ni kumanya ngu nuuwe Luhanga enkaha wamajima. Kandi kumanya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu waatu̱mi̱ye.
43017004	Naakuhaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa hani munsi haabwa kumala mulimo oghu wampaaye kukola.
43017005	Tita, ompe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa endindi mu maaso ghaawe ngoku naabaagha nakiyo nsi etakabaayʼo.”
43017006	“Tita, aba wampaaye bani ku̱lu̱gha mu bantu baa nsi, naabooleki̱ye ngoku oli. Bakaba bali bantu baawe, bhaatu waabaha si̱ye, kandi endindi bakwete kighambo kyawe.
43017007	Endindi ebo bamani̱ye ngu bu̱li̱ kintu kyona eki wampaaye ki̱lu̱ghi̱ye ewaawe.
43017008	Nkabaghambila butumuwa obu wampaaye kandi baabu̱si̱i̱ma. Bamani̱ye kwonini ngoku naalu̱ghi̱ye ewaawe kandi baahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.
43017009	Bani niibo nkwete kusabila. Tankwete kusabila bantu baa nsi, bhaatu nkwete kusabila aba wampaaye, nanga ni bantu baawe.
43017010	Bantu boona abanje ni baawe, kandi boona abaawe ni bantu banje. Bantu aba niibo bakwolekagha ngoku ndi na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
43017011	Si̱ye tankutodha kuukala munsi, nkwisa ewaawe, bhaatu banali munsi. Tita ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, obalinde na bu̱toki̱ bwa li̱i̱na lyawe, li̱i̱na eli wampaaye, niikuwo baakale bali mu bumui ngoku si̱ye naawe tuli mu bumui.
43017012	Obu naanabaagha nabo hani naabali̱ndi̱ye kwonini haabwa bu̱toki̱ obu wampaaye. Nkabalinda niikuwo atabʼo nʼomui oghu akubula, kuuyʼo omui oghu akughenda kuhwelekeelela ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we.
43017013	“Tita ndi haai kukuuka ewaawe, bhaatu bintu bini nkwete ku̱bi̱bu̱gha ninali munsi, niikuwo beeghesebuwa banje bani babe na kudheedhuwa kwanje kubaasulilemu kimui.
43017014	Nkabaghambila butumuwa bwawe, baabu̱si̱i̱ma, ti̱ eki kyaleka bantu baa nsi baabooha. Tabakyali bantu baa nsi, ngoku si̱ye ntali muntu wa nsi.
43017015	Tankwete kubasabila nti obaaye munsi muni, bhaatu obalinde hali omubhi.
43017016	Tabali baa munsi eni, ngoku nanje ntali wa munsi eni.
43017017	Kighambo kyawe ni kyamajima, oleke majima ghabafoole bantu baawe bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
43017018	Ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye munsi, niikuwo nanje ndimabatuma munsi.
43017019	Nkwehaayo nga kihonguwa ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwabo, niikuwo majima ghaawe ghagubhe kubafoola bantu baawe bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
43017020	“Tankwete kusabila beeghesebuwa eku̱mi̱ nʼomui bani bonkaha bbaa. Nkwete kusabila dhee boona abaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja si̱ye kukwama mu butumuwa bwa beeghesebuwa bani,
43017021	nti boona babe mu bumui. Ti̱ ngoku uwe, Tita, oli muli si̱ye, kandi nanje nʼaba muli uwe, oleke nabo babe mu etu̱we, niikuwo bantu baa nsi bahi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.
43017022	Naabahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa eki wampaaye, niikuwo nabo babe mu bumui ngoku naatu tuli mu bumui.
43017023	Nkubbala babe mu bumui ngoku bali mu bumui nanje kandi naawe waaba mu bumui nanje. Oleke babe mu bumui kwonini, niikuwo bantu baa nsi bamanye ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye. Oleke bamanye ngoku obaku̱ndi̱ye mu mulingo ghumui ngoku oku̱ndi̱ye si̱ye.
43017024	“Tita, nkubbala aba wampaaye kilo kimui babe nanje hambali ndi mu eghulu. Nkubbala babone ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa wampaaye, nanga okankunda otakahangi̱ye nsi.
43017025	Tita oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, nankabha bantu baa nsi batakumani̱ye, si̱ye nkumani̱ye, kandi beeghesebuwa banje bamani̱ye ngoku wantu̱mi̱ye.
43017026	Nkabooleka ngoku oli, kandi nkweyongela kubooleka ngoku oli. Nkukola eki niikuwo kukunda wankundiiyemu oku kubaakalemu, kandi nanje niikale muli bo.”
43018001	Obu Yesu aamali̱ye kusaba, eye hamui na beeghesebuwa be baaghenda, baabhasuka kighona kya Ki̱di̱looni̱, baahi̱ka mu musili ghwa bi̱ghu̱ma Oli̱va.
43018002	Yu̱da oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya, akaba asangu̱u̱we amani̱ye ki̱i̱kalo eki baaghendi̱yemu, nanga Yesu aasanguwagha naaghendayo na beeghesebuwa be aba.
43018003	Nahabweki Yu̱da aasa ahikiiye kiigambi̱ kya baasilikale na balemi̱ aba bakulu baa bahongi̱ na Bafali̱saayo baatu̱mi̱ye. Bantu aba baasa bakwete maataala na maatoci̱ hamui na biita bikani̱ye.
43018004	Nahabweki ngoku Yesu aabaagha amani̱ye byona ebikughenda kumubʼo, aabeebinga, aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ni ani̱ mukwete kubbala?”
43018005	Baamukuukamu bati, “Tukwete kubbala Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱.” Yesu aabaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni.” (Na Yu̱da oghu aaghendagha ku̱mu̱ghobeli̱ya anaamiliiyʼo).
43018006	Yesu akaba makamala kughila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni,” du̱mbi̱ baakuukilani̱ya, beegengakaka hansi, haabwa maani̱ ghe.
43018007	Aatodha aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukwete kubbala ani̱?” Baatodha baamukuukamu bati, “Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱.”
43018008	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aabaghila ati, “Naabaghambiiye nti, ni̱i̱syoni. Ti̱ alakaba aali̱i̱syoni mukubbala, muleke abankweme bani ebo baghende.”
43018009	Aabu̱gha ebi ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi aasangu̱u̱we abu̱ghi̱ye ati, “Tita aba wampaaye taaliyo nʼomui oghu ndileka andu̱ghʼo.”
43018010	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu akaba ali na kihiyo aakibhulayo, aajombʼo mu̱heeleli̱ya wa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona kutui kwabuliyo. (Li̱i̱na lya mu̱heeleli̱ya oghu baamughilaghamu Mali̱ku̱si̱).
43018011	Bhaatu Yesu aalaghila Peetelo ati, “Ku̱u̱ki̱yayo kihiyo kyawe eki! Mbhonganuuwe kubona-bona ngoku Tita aategheki̱ye ati mbona-bone.”
43018012	Du̱mbi̱ kiigambi̱ kya baasilikale aba na mukulu wabo hamui na balemi̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, baakwata Yesu. Bamuboha
43018013	baadu̱bha baamutwala ewaa Anansi nkyame sya Kayaafa. Kayaafa oghu niiye akaba ali mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona mwaka oghu.
43018014	Kayaafa oghu niiye akasanguwa ahabuuye beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya ati nkilungi muntu omui ku̱ku̱wa haabwa bantu boona.
43018015	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo hamui na mweghesebuwa onji baaghenda bakweme Yesu. Mweghesebuwa onji oghu, bakaba bamumani̱ye bhyani ewaa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, du̱mbi̱ aataha na Yesu hanjaakati ya mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona.
43018016	Bhaatu Peetelo aakala alindiiye hanja haa mulyango ghwa lugho. Mweghesebuwa oghu baabaagha bamani̱ye ewaa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, aakuuka eesengeleli̱ya manaabukali̱ oghu akaba ali̱ndi̱ye haa mulyango du̱mbi̱ aasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye Peetelo kutaahayo.
43018017	Obu aanataahagha, manaabukali̱ oghu aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Naawe tooli omui mu beeghesebuwa baa musaasa oghu?” Peetelo aakuukamu ati, “Si̱ye bbaa.”
43018018	Bwile obu, mpeu yakwatila kimui, du̱mbi̱ baheeleli̱ya aba hamui na balemi̱ baa Bayu̱daaya beemilila haai na mulilo kwota. Peetelo naye, akaba aamiliiye nabo noota.
43018019	Niibuwo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aabu̱u̱i̱ye Yesu haa njegheesi̱ya yee, hamui na beeghesebuwa be.
43018020	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Bu̱li̱ kilo neegheseli̱yagha mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya kandi na bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, hambali Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye bakwekumani̱li̱yagha. Ti̱ taaliyo eki naabu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱bi̱so bbaa.
43018021	Okwete ku̱mbu̱u̱li̱ya otiyo nangaaki? Obu̱u̱li̱ye abaaghu̱wagha ni̱mbu̱gha. Majima kuwo bamani̱ye ebi naabu̱ghagha.”
43018022	Obu Yesu aabu̱ghi̱ye atiyo, omui mu bakulu abaali beemiliyʼo aamutali̱ya haali̱i̱so. Aaghila Yesu ati, “Niikuwo okukuukaghamu otiyo mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona?”
43018023	Yesu aaghila ati, “Ndakaba ninaabu̱ghi̱ye kubhi, ohe buukai̱so obukwoleka eki naasobeei̱ye. Bhaatu ndakaba ninaabu̱ghi̱ye majima, ekyaleki̱ye wantali̱ya nkiki?”
43018024	Du̱mbi̱ Anansi aalaghila ati bamu̱ku̱u̱ki̱ye banamu̱bohi̱ye ewaa Kayaafa, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona.
43018025	Obu Peetelo aabaagha eemiliiye noota mulilo, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Uwe naawe tooli omui mu beeghesebuwa baa musaasa oghu?” Eehighaana naaghila ati, “Si̱ye bbaa.”
43018026	Omui mu baheeleli̱ya baa mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, lughanda lwa musaasa oghu Peetelo aajombi̱yʼo kutui, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Tanuuwe naaboone oli na musaasa oghu mu musili ghwa biti Oli̱va?”
43018027	Peetelo aatodha eehighaana, du̱mbi̱ bwile bwonini nkoko yaakooka.
43018028	Nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baaghenda ewaa Kayaafa baayayo Yesu, baamutwala mu kikaali kya Pilaato mu̱lemi̱ Mulooma. Bhaatu baabhenga kutaaha mu kikaali kya mu̱lemi̱ oghu. Baabbalagha kuukala baneeli̱ye ewaa Luhanga kusighikila haa mi̱ghendi̱yo yabo, niikuwo bagubhe kuliya haa kiihulo kya Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo.
43018029	Nahabweki Pilaato aatuwa aabeebinga kandi aababu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Musaasa oni, mukumunyeghelelʼo musango ki?”
43018030	Baamukuukamu bati, “Nguli ataatu̱u̱ye musango ghwamaani̱ tatwangu̱mu̱leeti̱ye ewaawe bbaa.”
43018031	Pilaato aaghila ati, “Ngughu; mumutwale, mu̱mu̱twi̱le musango ni̱mu̱koleesi̱ya bilaghilo byanu.” Baamukuukamu bati, “Etu̱we tatuli na bu̱toki̱ bwa ku̱twi̱la muntu weena musango ghwa ku̱ku̱wa.”
43018032	Ebi bikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ebi Yesu aasangu̱u̱we aabu̱ghi̱ye nooleka mulingo oghu aaghendagha ku̱kwi̱lamu.
43018033	Du̱mbi̱ Pilaato akuukayo aataaha mu kikaali kiye, aatodha aabilikila Yesu, aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?”
43018034	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Wambu̱u̱i̱ye otiyo haabwa kweli̱li̱kana kwawe, kedha muntu onji niiye aakughambiiye ebinkwetʼo?”
43018035	Pilaato aamukuukamu ati, “Buuye si̱ye ndi Mu̱yu̱daaya? Ni bantu baawe hamui na bakulu baanu baa bahongi̱ abaakuleeti̱ye ewanje. Ti̱ uwe mbiki waakoli̱ye?”
