43018036	Yesu aamughila ati, “Bukama bwanje tabuli bwa munsi muni bbaa. Nguli bwabaagha buli bwa munsi muni, baheeleli̱ya banje bangulwane na beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya bati batakwata si̱ye. Bhaatu bukama bwanje bu̱lu̱ghi̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji.”
43018037	Pilaato aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Kikumani̱i̱si̱ya oli Mukama?” Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Waahi̱ki̱i̱ye kughila oti ndi mukama. Majima kuwo eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabyaluwa kandi naasa munsi muni. Nkaasa kughambila bantu majima. Muntu weena oghu akubbalagha kumanya majima agha niiye aku̱u̱ghu̱wagha ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha.”
43018038	Pilaato aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Majima kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ki?” Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aatuwa, aaghila Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Bhaawai̱, musaasa oni tamboone ali na musango bbaa!
43018039	Bhaatu nkukola ngoku nkaakukolagha, haa bu̱li̱ Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Nkulekela munyankomo omui oghu mukusaba muti ndekele. Buuye mukubbala ndekele Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya?”
43018040	Baamukuukamu mbagolela kimui bati, “Oghu bbaa, oghu bbaa! Tukubbala olekele Balaba!” Balaba oghu bakaba bamukwete haabwa kuba muheekela.
43019001	Niibuwo Pilaato aalaghiiye baasilikale baahuula Yesu bibbooko bya minuwa.
43019002	Baasilikale aba baali̱ngelela bilandilo bya mahuwa ghajambi̱ye, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka kiyo mu mutuwe nga sipeewa ya bukama, baamu̱lu̱wi̱ka kiigandulo kiimutuku nga mukama.
43019003	Baatandika kughenda omui-omui hambali Yesu ali kumubbaaki̱i̱si̱ya mbamughila bati, “Otuule, uwe Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya!” Baamutalangi̱ya haali̱i̱so.
43019004	Niibuwo Pilaato aatodhi̱ye aatuwa, aaghila ki̱bbu̱la kya Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Nkulaghila batodhe batwesi̱ye Yesu bamuleete hambali muli, niikuwo enu̱we boonini mumanye ngoku si̱ye ntaaboone ali na musango oghu aakoli̱ye.”
43019005	Obu baasilikale aba baatweseei̱ye Yesu, bamu̱lu̱wi̱ki̱ye kilandilo kya mahuwa mu mutuwe, analu̱wete kiigandulo kiimutuku nga mukama, Pilaato aaghila Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Muntu waanu ngughulaaye!”
43019006	Bakulu baa bahongi̱, na beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya makamubona, du̱mbi̱ baatandika kugolela kimui bati, “Bamubambe haa musalaba! Bamubambe!” Bhaatu Pilaato aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we boonini mughende mumubambe, si̱ye tanaaboone ali na musango ndamu̱twi̱la.”
43019007	Bayu̱daaya aba baamukuukamu bati, “Kusighikila mu kilaghilo kyatu, Yesu oghu abhonganuuwe bamwite nanga akabu̱gha kubhi kughila ati eye ni Mwana wa Luhanga.”
43019008	Obu Pilaato aaghu̱u̱ye eki eeyongelela kimui kwobaha,
43019009	du̱mbi̱ aatodha aataaha mu kikaali kiye. Baatodha baamuleetela Yesu du̱mbi̱ aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Dhaani, olu̱ghi̱ye haa?” Bhaatu Yesu ataamukuukamu.
43019010	Pilaato aamughila ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye obhengi̱ye ku̱bu̱gha nanje? Tookimani̱ye ngoku ndi na bu̱toki̱ kulaghila nti bakulekele, kedha nti bakubambe?”
43019011	Yesu aamukuukamu ati, “Bu̱toki̱ obu oli nabuwo haa si̱ye, Luhanga wʼomu eghulu niiye akuhaaye buwo. Nahabweki oghu aalaghiiye ati bandeete ewaawe niiye ali na musango ghwa kibhi kyamaani̱.”
43019012	Ku̱lu̱gha bwile obu du̱mbi̱ Pilaato aabbala kulekela Yesu, bhaatu Bayu̱daaya baagolela kimui bati, “Kaakuba olekela musaasa oghu, okuba otali bhootu̱ sya Kai̱saali̱ mu̱lemi̱ wa Looma, nanga weena oghu akweyetagha ‘Mukama’ akuba ajeemeeye Kai̱saali̱.”
43019013	Obu Pilaato aaghu̱u̱ye eki, aalaghila ati batwesi̱ya Yesu. Pilaato oghu aasitama haa kitebe kiye eki aatwi̱laghʼo misango ekyabaagha hanjaakati eghi baali baaliliiye na mabaale, (eghi mu Lulamai̱ki̱ baaghilaghamu Gabbata.)
43019014	Kilo eki kikaba kili kilo eki beeteekani̱li̱jaghamu haabwa Ki̱ghenu̱ kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Obu syahi̱ki̱ye haai nga saaha mukaagha sya ntangaali̱, Pilaato aaghila Bayu̱daaya aba ati, “Mukama waanu nguni!”
43019015	Bhaatu bo baagola mbaghila bati, “Twala ye eli̱! Twala ye eli̱! Bamubambe!” Pilaato aabaghila ati, “Buuye nilaghile babambe Mukama waanu?” Bakulu baa bahongi̱ aba baamukuukamu bati, “Tatuli na mukama onji, kuuyʼo Kai̱saali̱ enkaha.”
43019016	Haakumaliilila Pilaato aasi̱i̱ma, aalaghila baasilikale be kubamba Yesu. Niibuwo baasilikale baatwete Yesu.
43019017	Baaghenda bamu̱heekeei̱ye musalaba ghuwe. Baamu̱ki̱dhi̱ya mu ki̱i̱kalo bakughilaghamu “Ki̱i̱kalo kya Kahanga” (eki mu Lulamai̱ki̱ baaghilaghamu Gologota.)
43019018	Haala niiyo baamubambiiye hamui na bantu banji babili. Musalaba ghwa omui baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haa luhande lwa buliyo bwa Yesu, na ghwa onji haa luhande lwabumesu, oghwa Yesu baaghu̱u̱mi̱li̱li̱ya haagati.
43019019	Pilaato aahandiika haa kabbaau musango ghwa Yesu, baakata haa musalaba aahandi̱i̱ki̱yʼo ati, “Yesu wa Najaaleeti̱, Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.”
43019020	Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baasoma kihandiiko eki, nanga ki̱i̱kalo hambali baabambiiye Yesu kikaba kili haai na kibugha Yelusaalemu, kandi kihandiiko eki kikaba bakihandi̱i̱ki̱ye mu mi̱bu̱ghe esatu: Lulamai̱ki̱, Lulaati̱ni̱, na Lu̱gi̱li̱ki̱.
43019021	Bakulu baa bahongi̱ baaghenda ewaa Pilaato, baamughila bati, “Otahandiika oti, ‘Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya,’ bhaatu oti, ‘Aaghi̱li̱ye ati ni Mukama wa Bayu̱daaya.’ ”
43019022	Pilaato aabakuukamu ati, “Ebi naahandi̱i̱ki̱ye, niibiyo naahandi̱i̱ki̱ye.”
43019023	Haanu̱ma ya baasilikale kubamba Yesu haa musalaba, baatambulani̱yamu ngoye siye bi̱twi̱ke bbinaa, bu̱li̱ omui aatwalʼo kimui. Bhaatu eki aali alu̱wete mukati kikaba ki̱koleeu̱we mu lughoye lukwataane ku̱lu̱gha haa bikiya ku̱hi̱ka mu malu̱.
43019024	Baaghambilana bati, “Luni tutalutemula, muleke tukome buluulu niikuwo tumanye oghu akulutwala. Eki kikabʼo ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebikughilagha ngu, “Bakatambulana bi̱lu̱walo byanje, baabikomela buluulu kumanya oghu akubitwala.” Nahabweki niikuwo baasilikale aba baakoli̱ye batiyo.
43019025	Ni̱na Yesu na mwana waani̱na ni̱na Yesu, hamui na Mali̱ya mukaa Ku̱lyopa kandi na Mali̱ya Mangadhalina, bakaba baamiliiye haai na musalaba oghu baabambi̱yʼo Yesu.
43019026	Obu Yesu aaboone ni̱na wee aamiliiyʼo hamui na mweghesebuwa wa Yesu oghu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye naye aamiliiye haai, aaghila ni̱na wee ati, “Mutabani̱ waawe ngughu.”
43019027	Aaghila mweghesebuwa oghu ati, “Njoko waawe ngughu.” Du̱mbi̱ ku̱lu̱gha kilo eki mweghesebuwa oghu aatwala ni̱na Yesu ewe e ka kumulinda.
43019028	Yesu aamanya ngoku aamali̱ye mulimo aasi̱ye kukola. Ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya ekyasangu̱u̱we kili mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we, Yesu aaghila ati, “Eliyo linkwete.”
43019029	Hakaba haliyo haala, kanagha kalimu vi̱i̱ni̱ esaali̱ye, nahabweki baasilikale aba baalu̱bi̱ka kijibankoba mu vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi baakita haa kati baaghilaghamu hai̱sopu̱ baaki̱ni̱i̱ni̱ya Yesu haa mu̱nu̱wa kunuwa vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi.
43019030	Obu aanooyʼo, aaghila ati, “Kyahooye.” Du̱mbi̱ aatu̱li̱ka mutuwe, aaku̱wa.
43019031	Bayu̱daaya bakaba batabbali̱ye kilo kya Sabhato ku̱hi̱ka mi̱ku̱ ya bantu baabambi̱ye kilo eki enali haa misalaba. Kilo eki kikaba kili Kilo kya Kweteekani̱ya, nanga ekyalabhi̱yaghʼo kyaghendagha kuba kilo kya Sabhato kandi na kya Kuusuka Kusaaluwʼo. Nahabweki baasaba Pilaato kubasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya kuhenanga bantu abali haa misalaba maghulu niikuwo baayo mi̱ku̱ yabo Sabhato etakahi̱ki̱ye.
43019032	Baasilikale baasa baadu̱bha baahenda maghulu ghaa bantu babili aba baabambi̱ye hamui na Yesu.
43019033	Bhaatu obu baahi̱ki̱yʼo Yesu, baasanga naamali̱ye ku̱ku̱wa, bataamuhenda maghulu.
43019034	Bhaatu omui mu baasilikale aba aatu̱bhi̱ta Yesu nʼeti̱mu̱ mu mbalu̱, ti̱ saghama hamui na maasi byasendela kimui.
43019035	Si̱ye, Yohaana, ni̱i̱si̱ye neenini nkabona bini, kandi nimani̱ye ebi nkwete kuhandiika ngoku ghali majima. Nimani̱ye ngoku nkwete ku̱bu̱gha majima, kandi nkwete ku̱bu̱gha ebi niikuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je buukai̱so obu nkwete kuha haa Yesu.
43019036	Yesu kutamuhenda maghulu kikaasu̱li̱i̱si̱ya Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Eku̱wa liye na limui tabalilihenda,”
43019037	kandi ngoku Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye hanji dhee biti, “Balimulola eenini oghu baatu̱bhi̱ti̱ye.”
43019038	Haanu̱ma ya ebi, Yojeefu̱ wʼomu kyalo kya Alimateya aaghenda ewaa Pilaato. Yojeefu̱ oghu akaba ali mweghesebuwa wa Yesu, bhaatu taabbalagha bantu kumanya eki haabwa kwobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya. Aasaba Pilaato mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu kughujiika. Pilaato aamu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya, du̱mbi̱ Yojeefu̱ oghu aaghuuya haa musalaba.
43019039	Yojeefu̱ aaghenda ewaa Pilaato ali hamui na Nikodemu oghu akaasa ewaa Yesu mukilo. Nikodemu oghu aasa alungani̱i̱ye nsyano esasi̱ye na bigita bisasi̱ye baaghilaghamu miila. Bintu ebi bikaba bi̱hi̱ki̱ye ki̱lo maku̱mi̱ asatu.
43019040	Batwala mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu, baaghuboha mu si̱i̱ti̱ njelu mpyaka baataayemu bigita ebi, ngoku asi̱li̱ ya Bayu̱daaya yaalaghilagha kujiika muntu.
43019041	Haai na hambali baabambiiye Yesu, musili ghukaba ghuliyo kandi ghulimu kituulo kihyaka eki batakaji̱i̱ki̱yemu muntu.
43019042	Haabwa kilo eki kuba eki Bayu̱daaya beeteekani̱jagha haabwa kilo kya Sabhato, kandi na kituulo eki kusanguwa kili haai-haai, du̱mbi̱ baalangaali̱yamu mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu.
43020001	Kilo Kyasande nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ butakakeeye, Mali̱ya Mangadhalina aakeelela haa kituulo, aasanga ebaale baabaagha bataaye haa mulyango ghwa kituulo eki litaliyo, mbaali̱i̱hi̱yʼo.
43020002	Aaghenda naali̱gi̱ta hambali Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo na mweghesebuwa oli̱, oghu Yesu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye, baabaagha. Aabaghila ati, “Mu̱ku̱ ghwa Mukama baaghu̱u̱hi̱ye mu kituulo, kandi tatumani̱ye hambali baamutaaye!”
43020003	Peetelo na mweghesebuwa muunakiye oli̱, baatuwa, baatandika kughenda haa kituulo.
43020004	Bombi baaghenda mbali̱gi̱ta, bhaatu mweghesebuwa oli̱ eye aati̱gha Peetelo, aadu̱bha ku̱ki̱dha haa kituulo.
43020005	Aahi̱ka aagomba aalangi̱li̱li̱yamu, aabona ngoye esi baabaagha babohi̱yemu mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu, sili ngaala, bhaatu ataataaha mu kituulo.
43020006	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo oghu akaba ati̱ghaaye enu̱ma naye aaki̱dha, aahi̱ka aataaha mu kituulo. Aabona ngoye sili haala,
43020007	hamui na lughoye olu baabaagha babohi̱ye Yesu mu mutuwe. Eluwo lukaba balu̱ku̱niiye kaati, lutali hamui nʼolu baabaagha bamu̱bohi̱yemu.
43020008	Haakumaliilila na mweghesebuwa oghu akadu̱bha ku̱ki̱dha haa kituulo, naye dhee aataahamu. Obu aaboone Yesu atalimu, aahi̱ki̱li̱ja ngoku Yesu aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye.
43020009	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo na mweghesebuwa oghu, bakaba batakeetegheeleei̱ye Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ebyaghilagha biti Yesu abhonganuuwe ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye.
43020010	Du̱mbi̱ beeghesebuwa aba baakuukayo mu maka ghaabo,
43020011	bhaatu Mali̱ya aati̱ghala haa kituulo haala naalila. Mali̱ya oghu naanalila, aagomba aalola mu kituulo.
43020012	Aabona baamalai̱ka babili balu̱wete ngoye sijelu, basitami̱ye hambali baabaagha balangaai̱ye mu̱ku̱ ghwa Yesu. Omui ali mu maghulu eku̱wa na onji ali ebulimutuwe.
43020013	Baamughila bati, “Mukali̱ uwe, okwete kulila nangaaki?” Aabakuukamu ati, “Baatwete Mukama wanje, kandi tanimani̱ye hambali baamutaaye!”
43020014	Du̱mbi̱ makeegaaliya ati, aabona Yesu aamiliiye ngaala, bhaatu ataamumaniilila ngoku ali Yesu.
43020015	Yesu aamughila ati, “Mukali̱ uwe, okwete kulila nangaaki? Ni ani̱ okwete kubbala?” Mali̱ya aamanya ati musaasa oghu niiye mu̱koli̱ wa musili oghu, du̱mbi̱ aamughila ati, “Wai̱tu̱, gutu, olakaba aaniiwe waamu̱u̱hi̱yemu, onjoleke hambali waamutaaye, nkumutwala.”
43020016	Yesu aamughila ati, “Mali̱ya!” Du̱mbi̱ Mali̱ya eegaali̱ya, aaguga mu mu̱bu̱ghe ghwabo ghwa Lulamai̱ki̱ ati, “Labbooni̱,” (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya, Mwegheesi̱ya.)
43020017	Yesu aamughila ati, “Otankwatʼo, nanga tankaku̱u̱ki̱ye ewaa Tita. Oghende oghambile baghenji̱ banje oti, ‘Nkukuuka ewaa Tita kandi Eseenu̱we, ewaa Luhanga wanje kandi Luhanga waanu.’ ”
43020018	Mali̱ya Mangadhalina du̱mbi̱ aaghenda aaghambila beeghesebuwa makulu agha ati, “Naaboone Mukama waatu!” Aabaghambila ebi Yesu aamughambiiye kubaghambila.
43020019	Kilo Kyasande eki lwagholo, beeghesebuwa baa Yesu bakaba beekumaani̱i̱ye hamui, beehighaliiye mu numba haabwa kwobaha beebembeli̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, Yesu aasa aamilila haagati yabo, aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha!”
43020020	Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha atiyo, du̱mbi̱ aabooleka ngalo siye na bighele biye. Ti̱, beeghesebuwa aba obu baaboone Mukama Yesu baadheedheluwa kimui.
43020021	Yesu aatodha aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha! Tita ngoku antu̱mi̱ye niikuwo nanje ndimabatuma.”
43020022	Du̱mbi̱ aabahuuhila lwoha, aaghila ati, “Mutunge Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
43020023	Oghu mulaghanilagha bibhi biye, na Luhanga alamughanilagha biyo. Bhaatu oghu mulabhengagha kughanila bibhi biye, na Luhanga taalamughanilagha biyo bbaa.”
43020024	Bwile obu, Tomasi, (oghu baaghilaghamu Mulongo), omui mu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu eku̱mi̱ na babili, akaba atali hamui na baanakiye aba obu baaboone Yesu.
43020025	Haanu̱ma ya kubona Yesu, beeghesebuwa baanakiye baamughambila bati, “Twaboone Mukama waatu!” Bhaatu eye aabaghila ati, “Si̱ye ntaaboone nkolu̱ sya mi̱si̱maali eghi baamukonkomeleeye mu ngalo, kandi nta kyala mu nkolu̱ ya mu mbalu̱ hambali baamu̱tu̱bhi̱ti̱ye, tanku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nti aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye bbaa.”
43020026	Haanu̱ma ya wi̱i̱ki̱ emui, beeghesebuwa aba baatodha beekumaani̱li̱ya hamui mu numba. Bwile obu na Tomasi akaba ali hamui nabo. Nankabha njighi nsyabaagha siighaaye, Yesu aasa aabaamilila haagati aabaghila ati, “Mpempa yonkaha.”
43020027	Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Tomasi, wiise ote kyala kyawe mu nkolu̱ sya mu ngalo syanje sini, nʼomu mbalu̱ syanje muni. Oleke kughuluka-ghu̱lu̱ki̱ya, bhaatu ohi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱.”
43020028	Tomasi aaghila ati, “Nuuwe Mukama kandi Luhanga wanje!”
43020029	Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aamughila ati, “Kumbona niikuwo kwaleka waahi̱ki̱li̱ja? Bali na mu̱gi̱sa abaku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱jagha batamboone.”
43020030	Yesu akakola byakulolelʼo byakuswekani̱ya binji bikani̱ye ebi beeghesebuwa be banaboone, ebitahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kini.
43020031	Bhaatu bini bihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we niikuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku Yesu ali Ki̱li̱si̱to, Mwana wa Luhanga, kandi haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja oku, mutunge bwomi̱i̱li̱ mu eye.
43021001	Niibuwo beeghesebuwa baa Yesu baatodhi̱ye baamubona bali haa nanja ya Ti̱bbeli̱yo.
43021002	Beeghesebuwa aba niibo bani: Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo, Tomasi (oghu baaghilaghamu Mulongo), Nasanai̱li̱ oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kaana mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Galilaaya, Yakobbo na Yohaana batabani̱ baa Jebbedaayo, na beeghesebuwa banji babili, boona bakaba bali hamui.
43021003	Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aabaghila ati, “Ndimaghenda kukomana nsu̱i̱.” Baamughila bati, “Naatu tukughenda naawe.” Du̱mbi̱ baani̱i̱na bwati̱, bhaatu bwile bwakiya kuwo batakwete na kantu.
43021004	Nkyambisi, Yesu aasa aamilila haa ki̱si̱yo, bhaatu beeghesebuwa aba bataakenga ngoku ali Yesu.
43021005	Niibuwo aababilikiiye ati, “Bhaawai̱, tamukakwete na nsu̱i̱ yoona?” Baamukuukamu bati, “Bbaa!”
43021006	Aabaghila ati, “Mukube kati̱mba kaanu luhande lwabuliyo lwa bwati̱ bwanu, mukukwatiya nsu̱i̱.” Obu baakoli̱ye kuwo, kati̱mba kaabasaagha na kubhula nanga kakaba kakwate nsu̱i̱ sikaniiye kimui.
43021007	Niibuwo mweghesebuwa oghu Yesu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye aaghi̱li̱ye Peetelo ati, “Ni Mukama waatu!” Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo eeboha kooti̱ mu mi̱ghelu̱ eghi aabaagha eehi̱i̱yemu obu aakomanagha, du̱mbi̱ aahalala eehuula mu maasi kwebinga Yesu.
43021008	Na beeghesebuwa baanakiye baamukwama mbanabhulaaga kati̱mba aka. Bwati̱ obu bukaba buli haai nga mi̱ta ki̱ku̱mi̱ ku̱lu̱gha haa ki̱si̱yo.
43021009	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye haa ki̱si̱yo baasangaana makala ngaakamu mulilo kandi mbookeli̱yʼo nsu̱i̱, basu̱ndi̱i̱ye na migaati̱ haakpengbu̱ ngaala.
43021010	Yesu aabaghila ati, “Muleete simui haa nsu̱i̱ mwakwati̱i̱ye.”
43021011	Du̱mbi̱ Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aani̱i̱na mu bwati̱ aabhula kati̱mba aka, aakahi̱ki̱ya haa ki̱si̱yo. Kakaba kaasuuyemu nsu̱i̱ siinamu̱li̱to ki̱ku̱mi̱ ataano nʼesatu, bhaatu nankabha nkaabaaghamu nsu̱i̱ sikaniiye kimui esi takaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱twi̱ka.
43021012	Niibuwo Yesu aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Mwise, muliye kya nkyambisi.” Ti̱ taabaayʼo nʼomui mu beeghesebuwa be aba oghu akalengʼo ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe ani̱?” Nanga boona bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku ali Mukama Yesu eenini.
43021013	Yesu aakwata mugaati̱ hamui na nsu̱i̱ aabiha beeghesebuwa be aba.
43021014	Oghu niighuwo ghwabaaye mulundi ghwa kasatu beeghesebuwa baa Yesu kumubona haanu̱ma yee ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye.
43021015	Obu baamali̱ye kuliya, niibuwo Yesu aaghi̱li̱ye Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo ati, “Si̱mooni̱, mutabani̱ wa Yohaana, onku̱ndi̱ye kusaali̱ya bani boona?” Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Ee Mukama wanje, omani̱ye ngoku nku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Ololeelele byana bya ntaama syanje.”
43021016	Yesu aatodha aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Si̱mooni̱, mutabani̱ wa Yohaana, majima kuwo onku̱ndi̱ye?” Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Ee, Mukama wanje, omani̱ye ngoku nku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Ololeelele ntaama syanje.”
43021017	Yesu aabu̱u̱li̱ya Peetelo mulundi ghwa kasatu ati, “Si̱mooni̱, mutabani̱ wa Yohaana, onku̱ndi̱ye?” Peetelo eehi̱ghu̱wa atuntuuye haabwa Yesu ku̱mu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya mulundi ghwakasatu ati, “Onku̱ndi̱ye?” Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, uwe omani̱ye bintu byona. Omani̱ye ngoku nku̱ku̱ndi̱ye.” Yesu aamughila ati, “Oli̱i̱si̱ye ntaama syanje.
43021018	Nkughambiiye majima ghoonini, obu waabaagha onali mwana, weenini weebohagha mu̱ci̱pi̱ ghwawe, olu̱wala oli na bughabe kughenda hambali obbali̱ye. Bhaatu obu waaku̱li̱ye, olahaaghayo mikono yaawe, muntu onji akubohe akutwale hambali otabbali̱ye.”
43021019	Yesu aabu̱gha atiyo kwoleka mulingo Peetelo aku̱ku̱wa kuha Luhanga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa. Du̱mbi̱ Yesu aaghila Peetelo ati, “Ookale onankwamiliiye.”
43021020	Peetelo eegaali̱ya, aabona mweghesebuwa oghu Yesu aabaagha aku̱ndi̱ye abakweme. (Niiye oghu akaba asitami̱ye haai na Yesu haa kiihulo, oghu akamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Mukama waatu, ni ani̱ aku̱ku̱ghobeli̱ya?”)
43021021	Obu Peetelo aamuboone du̱mbi̱ aabu̱u̱li̱ya Yesu ati, “Mukama wanje ti̱ oghu eye mbiki bikumubʼo?”
43021022	Yesu aamughila ati, “Ninaabbali̱ye nti aakale ali mwomi̱i̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nku̱u̱ki̱ye, eki kikukwetʼo ki? Uwe onkwame.”
43021023	Obu beeghesebuwa be baaghu̱u̱ye eki, baatandika kughambilana ngoku mweghesebuwa oghu atali̱ku̱wa. Bhaatu Yesu taaghi̱li̱ye ati mweghesebuwa oghu taali̱ku̱wa, akaghila Peetelo ati, “Ninaabbali̱ye nti aakale ali mwomi̱i̱li̱ ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nku̱u̱ki̱ye, eki kikukwetʼo ki?”
43021024	Mweghesebuwa oghu ni oghu akuhaagha buukai̱so bwa bintu ebi byona ebi aaboone kandi oghu akabihandiika mu kitabo kini. Kandi tumani̱ye ngoku bintu byona aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ngoku ghali majima ghoonini.
43021025	Yesu akakola bintu binji bikani̱ye dhee. Nguli byona baabihandi̱i̱ki̱ye, nku̱gu̱mi̱ya nankabha munsi yoona tabangu̱tu̱ngi̱ye mwanya ghwa kubiikilamu bitabo baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ebi byona bbaa.
44001001	Wai̱ Ti̱yofi̱lo, mu kitabo naadu̱bhi̱ye kukuhandiikila, nkakughambila byona ebi Yesu aakoli̱ye nʼebi eegheeseei̱ye, ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la hambali aatandikiiye,
44001002	ku̱hi̱ki̱ya kilo eki aani̱i̱ni̱ye mu eghulu, haanu̱ma ya kulaghila bakwenda be aakomi̱ye ebi bakukola, haabwa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
44001003	Ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la obu Yesu aaboona-boone, naaku̱wa, aamala bilo maku̱mi̱ anaa naanaboneka mu bakwenda be aba bwile bwona. Aabonekagha mu milingo ekani̱ye, niikuwo bamanile kimui ngoku aahu̱mbu̱u̱ki̱ye. Aabasoboololagha haa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
44001004	Obu aanabaagha nabo, aabaghila ati, “Mutalu̱gha mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu. Mulinde eki naabaghambiiyʼo, eki Tita aabalaghiisani̱i̱ye.
44001005	Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabati̱jagha na maasi, bhaatu mu bilo bikee mukubati̱i̱ji̱buwa na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
44001006	Obu bakwenda aba baatodhi̱ye kusanga-sangaana na Yesu, baamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mukama, buni niibuwo bwile waasi̱ye ku̱ku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya Banai̱saaleeli̱ bu̱lemi̱?”
44001007	Aabaghila ati, “Eki takili kyanu kumanya bwile obu Tita aataayʼo haabwa bu̱toki̱ buwe.
44001008	Bhaatu mukutunga maani̱ Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naabaasi̱yʼo, tooli̱ mukuba baakai̱so banje mu Yelusaalemu, Bu̱yu̱daaya, Samali̱ya, na bi̱i̱kalo byona byʼomunsi yoona.”
44001009	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱bu̱gha ebi, aani̱i̱na mu eghulu banamu̱loli̱ye, kicu kyamu̱swi̱ki̱la baaleka kumubona.
44001010	Obu baabaagha banaloleleeye kimui eghulu ngoku akwete kughenda, beetu̱lakaka basaasa babili babeemiliiye haakpengbu̱ nga haala, balu̱wete nkanji̱ sijelu dhiyo.
44001011	Baabu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Enu̱we Banagalilaaya, munaloli̱ye eghulu nangaaki? Yesu oghu mwaboone naani̱i̱na mu eghulu, alikuuka ngoku mwamuboone naaghenda.”
44001012	Bakwenda aba baalu̱gha haa mwena Oli̱va, baakuuka Yelusaalemu. Mwena oghu ghulabhaane na Yelusaalemu, haai nga ki̱lomi̱ta emui.
44001013	Obu baaki̱dhi̱ye mu kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, baaghenda mu kisiika kya kai̱na yaakabili, hambali baabaagha baghooneeye. Bakwenda aba ni: Peetelo, Yohaana, Yakobbo, Andeleya, Fi̱li̱po, Tomasi, Batu̱lu̱maayo, Matayo, Yakobbo mutabani̱ wa Alifaayo, Si̱mooni̱ oghu aalwanililagha ehanga liye, na Yu̱da mutabani̱ wa Yakobbo.
44001014	Bakwenda aba hamui na Mali̱ya ni̱na Yesu, baana baani̱na Yesu, na bakali̱ banji, baagumbaanagha hamui bwile bwona kusaba.
44001015	Bwile obu ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja haai nga ki̱ku̱mi̱ nʼabili baagumbaana. Peetelo aamilila kubabu̱ghi̱la naaghila ati,
44001016	“Baana baamaaha, ebi Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱bu̱ghi̱ye byabaaye kuwo. Ebi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aabu̱ghi̱ye kukwama mu Dhau̱dhi̱ ku̱bu̱ghʼo Yu̱da oghu akaleeta abaasi̱ye kukwata Yesu.
44001017	Yu̱da oghu naye akaba atulimu, kandi akomeeu̱we kukola naatu mulimo ghuni.”
44001018	(Sente esi aatu̱ngi̱ye haabwa kibhi kiye, aaghulamu musili hambali eeni̱ghi̱i̱ye. Aakasuuka, eegenga, aahu̱u̱li̱ka mala ghaamugbunduuka.
44001019	Bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu boona baaghu̱wa makulu agha. Mu Lulamai̱ki̱ musili oghu bakughughilaghamu Hakaladama, kikumani̱i̱si̱ya Musili ghwa Saghama.)
44001020	Peetelo aatodha aaghila ati, “Kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu kitabo kya Jabbu̱li̱ ngu, “ ‘Oleke numba yee ebe ki̱hu̱ma, tooli̱ muntu atalitodha kughiikalamu.’ Mu ki̱twi̱ke kinji kyaghila kiti, “ ‘Muntu onji atwale mulimo ghuwe.’
44001021	Nahabweki, tukwetaaghisibuwa kukoma muntu oghu aaghendagha naatu bwile bwona obu Mukama Yesu aamali̱ye naatu.
44001022	Abhonganuuwe kuba oghu akatandika obu Yohaana Mubati̱ji̱ aabati̱i̱je Yesu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu aani̱i̱ni̱ye mu eghulu. Niikuwo naye abe kai̱so hamui naatu kughambila bantu haa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwa Yesu.”
44001023	Du̱mbi̱ baahaayo mali̱i̱na ghaa bantu babili: Mati̱ya na Balasaba Yojeefu̱, oghu bantu banji baaghilaghamu Yu̱si̱to.
44001024	Niibuwo baasabi̱ye bati, “Mukama omani̱ye mitima ya bantu boona. Mu bantu babili bani otwolekemu oghu waakomi̱yemu,
44001025	ku̱heeleli̱ya kandi kuba mukwenda mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Yu̱da, oghu akatu̱lu̱ghʼo aatunga ekyali kimusemeleeye.”
44001026	Du̱mbi̱ baakoma buluulu, kumanya oghu Luhanga aakomi̱yemu. Mati̱ya aakomuwa, aaba mukwenda hamui na bali̱ eku̱mi̱ nʼomui.
44002001	Obu kilo kya Pentekooti̱ kyahi̱ki̱ye, bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona bakaba beekumaani̱li̱i̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo kimui.
44002002	Du̱mbi̱ ki̱ku̱ku̱mo nga kya mwegha ghwamaani̱ kyalu̱gha mu eghulu, kyasula mu numba eghi baabaaghamu.
44002003	Baabona bintu bi̱su̱si̱ye nga bilimi bya mulilo; byebaghani̱jamu byaghendʼo bu̱li̱ omui.
44002004	Abaabaaghamu boona baasula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye du̱mbi̱ baatandika ku̱bu̱gha mu mi̱bu̱ghe eghi etali yabo, ngoku Mwoyo oghu aabagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱i̱ye.
44002005	Bwile obu mu Yelusaalemu hakaba haliyo Bayu̱daaya abaalami̱yagha Luhanga bwile bwona, bakaba balu̱ghi̱ye mu mahanga ghaa munsi yoona.
44002006	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ki̱ku̱ku̱mo eki, ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu bakaniiye kimui kyekumaani̱ya. Ti̱ bu̱li̱ muntu aaswekela kimui ku̱u̱ghu̱wa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba mbabu̱gha mu̱bu̱ghe ghwʼewaabo.
44002007	Haabwa kusweka oku, baaghila bati, “Dhaani abakwete ku̱bu̱gha aba boona, tabali Banagalilaaya?
44002008	Haabwaki tu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye mbabu̱gha mu mi̱bu̱ghe yʼewaatu?
44002009	Hani tuliyo abalu̱ghi̱ye mu Paati̱ya, Meedi̱ya, Elaamu, Mesopotami̱ya, Bu̱yu̱daaya, Kapadoki̱ya, Ponto, Asi̱ya,
44002010	Fi̱li̱gi̱ya, Panfu̱li̱ya, Mi̱si̱li̱, na bi̱twi̱ke bya Li̱bbi̱ya ebilabhaane na Kilene. Tuliyo bi̱bbu̱la bibili bya bantu abalu̱ghi̱ye Looma:
44002011	Bayu̱daaya, na bantu banji abaahindukiiye mu di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya. Na banji balu̱ghi̱ye Ku̱leete na Buhalabbu. Tubaaghu̱u̱ye mbabu̱gha mu mi̱bu̱ghe yaatu bintu byamaani̱ ebi Luhanga aakoli̱ye.”
44002012	Ti̱ abaabaaghʼo boona, baasweka kandi baasobeluwa, mbanabu̱u̱lani̱ya bati, “Kini nkiki bhaawai̱?”
44002013	Bhaatu banji baasekeelela bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba mbaghila bati, “Batamiiye.”
44002014	Peetelo aamilila hamui na bakwenda baanakiye eku̱mi̱ nʼomui, aatandika kutebeja ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu eki nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Enu̱we boona Bayu̱daaya baanakyanje na boona abali mu Yelusaalemu, dhaani mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye bhyani.
44002015	Bamui mu enu̱we mukwete kughila muti bantu bani batamiiye, bhaatu tabatamiiye bbaa, sinali saaha esatu sya nkyambisi.
44002016	Ebikwete kulehukana bini byona, ni ebi mulangi̱ Yoweeli̱ aalangi̱ye ati,
44002017	“Luhanga aaghila ati, ‘Mpelo etakahi̱ki̱ye, ndiseesa Mwoyo wanje haa bantu boona. Batabani̱ na bahala baanu balilangilila, batabhana baanu balibonekeluwa, basaasa bakulu baliloota bilooto.
44002018	Na baheeleli̱ya banje boobukali̱ na boobusaasa, ndibaseesʼo Mwoyo wanje mu bilo ebi, kandi balilangilila.
44002019	Ndikola byakuswekani̱ya mu eghulu, kandi bubonelo munsi, halibʼo saghama, mulilo, na mwi̱ka ghwamaani̱.
44002020	Musana ghulifooka mweli̱ma, kandi kweli̱ kulifooka saghama. Ebi bilibʼo kilo kyamaani̱ kandi kya ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Mukama kitahi̱ki̱ye.
44002021	Kandi weena oghu alibilikila li̱i̱na lya Mukama, alijunuwa.’ ”
44002022	Peetelo aatodha aaghila ati, “Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanje, mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye! Yesu wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱ akaba ali kuwo muntu oghu Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye, nanga Luhanga akabooleka bbeni̱-bbeni̱ byakuswekani̱ya na bubonelo ebi aakolagha kukwamila mu Yesu oghu. Naanu boonini bintu ebi mubimani̱ye, nanga byabonekelagha ewaanu hani.
44002023	Luhanga akaba naasangu̱u̱we ategheki̱ye hambele ati Yesu bakumuhaayʼo kumwita. Bhaatu musango ghwa kumwita ni ghwanu, nanga mukaaghu̱wana na bantu babhi kumubamba haa musalaba.
44002024	Bhaatu Luhanga aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la, aamuuya mu busaali̱ji̱ obwaleki̱ye aaku̱wa. Lu̱ku̱ talwangu̱gu̱bhi̱ye kuukala lumuboheleeye.
44002025	Dhau̱dhi̱ akamu̱bu̱ghʼo ati, “ ‘Bwile bwona nkuukalagha mboone Mukama. Nanga ali haa mukono ghwanje ghwabuliyo, tankutukumila bbaa.
44002026	Nahabweki mutima ghwanje ghu̱dheedheeu̱we kandi niibuwo naalimba haabwa kudheedhuwa. Ndaakalagha ndi na kunihila,
44002027	nanga tookundeka Eku̱li̱mu̱, kandi tookuleka oghu Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye waawe naagu̱nda.
44002028	Waaleki̱ye naamanya bihanda bya bwomi̱i̱li̱, okunjikali̱ya ndheedheeu̱we mu maaso ghaawe.’ ”
44002029	Peetelo aaghila ati, “Baana baamaaha, taata waatu Dhau̱dhi̱ teebu̱ghaghʼo nanga akaku̱wa baamujiika, nʼendindi kituulo kiye kili ewaatu hani.
44002030	Bhaatu haabwa kuba mulangi̱, aamanya eki Luhanga aalahiiye naalaghaana naye ati alikoma omui mu baasukulu be, kuba mu̱lemi̱ ngoku aabaagha alemi̱ye.
44002031	Dhau̱dhi̱ aamanya kandi aabu̱gha haa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwa Ki̱li̱si̱to ati Luhanga taaleki̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to wee Eku̱li̱mu̱ mu baku̱wa, kandi mu̱ku̱ ghuwe taghwagu̱ndi̱ye.
44002032	Etu̱we tuli baakai̱so kubaghambila majima ngu Luhanga aahu̱mbu̱u̱ye Yesu oghu.
44002033	Nʼendindi asitami̱ye mu ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa Luhanga. Ese wee Luhanga aamu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye kututumila Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye. Yesu niiye aatuhaaye Mwoyo oghu. Eki niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye nʼebi muboone bikwete kubʼo.
44002034	Dhau̱dhi̱ taani̱i̱ni̱ye mu eghulu, kusa aaghila ati, “ ‘Mukama aaghila Mukama wanje ati, “Ositame haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwanje
44002035	ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu ndifoola ngi̱ghu̱ syawe katebe kaa bighele byawe.” ’ ”
44002036	Peetelo aatodha aaghila ati, “Nahabweki enu̱we boona bantu bʼomu I̱saaleeli̱, mukimanyile kimui ngoku Yesu oghu mwabambi̱ye haa musalaba, Luhanga akamufoola Mukama kandi Ki̱li̱si̱to.”
44002037	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, mitima yaabasaalila munda. Baabu̱u̱li̱ya Peetelo na bakwenda baanakiye bati, “Baana baamaaha tukole ki?”
44002038	Peetelo aabaghila ati, “Mwekuukemu, kandi mubati̱i̱ji̱bu̱we, bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we, mu li̱i̱na lya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to haabwa kughaniluwa bibhi byanu. Mukutunga kisembo kya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
44002039	Ndaghaano eghi ni yaanu na baana baanu, kandi na boona abanaseli̱yeyo, aba Mukama waatu Luhanga akubilikila kumwisʼo boona.”
44002040	Peetelo aatodha aabaghambila bintu binji bikani̱ye. Aabahanuulila ati, “Baana baamaaha mbeesengeleei̱ye, mwejune kifubilo eki Luhanga akuha bantu babhi boona!”
44002041	Ti̱ boona abaasi̱i̱mi̱ye butumuwa obu, baabati̱i̱ji̱buwa. Kandi kilo eki, muhendo ghwa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja ghweyongelʼo haai nga bantu nku̱mi̱ esatu.
44002042	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba baataaghʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo haa njegheesi̱ya ya bakwenda, kuukala mu bumui, kusembela, kandi kusaba.
44002043	Bantu boona baahu̱ti̱yagha Luhanga haabwa byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye ebi bakwenda aba baakolagha.
44002044	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba boona baakalagha hamui, kandi na bintu byabo byona baabitambulana hamui.
44002045	Baaghu̱li̱yagha bimui haa bibanja na bintu byabo, sente esi baayaghamu, baasitambulanagha boona, baha bu̱li̱ muntu ngoku aabbalagha.
44002046	Bakaba bali mu bumui, bu̱li̱ kilo boona baalami̱li̱yagha hamui mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga. Baasembelagha kandi baaliilagha mu maka ghaa baanakyabo badheedheeu̱we, babhasilaane,
44002047	mbasinda Luhanga bwile bwona. Bantu boona baabeeli̱li̱kanaghʼo ngoku bali balungi. Bu̱li̱ kilo Mukama ongelagha haa muhendo ghwabo, bantu abaajunuwagha.
44003001	Kilo kimui Peetelo na Yohaana baaghendagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga saaha mwenda sya ntangaali̱, bwile obu bantu baalami̱li̱yaghamu.
44003002	Baabona baheeki̱ye musaasa oghu akabyaluwa alamaaye mbamutwala hʼelembo, eli bakughilaghamu Elembo Lisemeeye, niikuwo asaba-sabe bantu abaaghendagha mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga.
44003003	Obu aaboone Peetelo na Yohaana bali haai kutaaha, aabasaba ati bamuhe sente.
44003004	Baamulola tonono, Peetelo aamughila ati, “Wai̱, otulole!”
44003005	Nahabweki musaasa oghu aabalolela kimui, neeli̱li̱kana ati bakumuha kantu.
44003006	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Tandi na sente! Bhaatu ndimakuha eki ndi nakiyo. Nkulaghiiye mu li̱i̱na lya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱, oomuke, olubhatange.”
44003007	Aamukwata haa mukono ghwabuliyo, aamu̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya, du̱mbi̱ maghulu ghaa musaasa oghu ghoomiila.
44003008	Aamatuka, aamilila, aatandika kulubhatanga. Aaghenda nabo mu Numba ya Luhanga, naalubhatanga, naahalalani̱ya, kandi naasinda Luhanga.
44003009	Bantu boona abaabaaghamu baamubona naalubhatanga kandi naasinda Luhanga.
44003010	Obu baamumaniliiye ngu ni mulema oghu aakalagha asitami̱ye hʼElembo Lisemeeye lya Numba ya Luhanga naasaba-saba bantu, boona baaswekela kimui haabwa ekyamubaayo.
44003011	Musaasa oghu aadheedheluwa kimui, ti̱ aakala aneeboheleeye Peetelo na Yohaana mu bbalaaji eghi bakughilaghamu Bbalaaji ya Solomooni̱. Bantu boona baali̱gi̱tayo baabagumba, baakala basweki̱ye kubona aki̱li̱ye kandi naahalala.
44003012	Obu Peetelo aaboone ki̱bbu̱la kya bantu kyekumani̱i̱ye, aabaghila ati, “Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanje, ekyabaayo musaasa oni kibaswekani̱i̱ye nangaaki? Mutuloleleeye bwaki, ngʼoghu oti maani̱ ghaatu kedha bu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱le bwatu niibiyo byaleki̱ye twaki̱li̱ya musaasa oni?
44003013	Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, Luhanga wa I̱saka, kandi Luhanga wa Yakobbo, niiye aahaaye ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa mu̱heeleli̱ya wee Yesu, oghu mwahaayeyo muti bamwite kandi mwamwehighaana mu maaso ghaa Pilaato nankabha naabbalagha kumulekela.
44003014	Mukabhenga Alukwela kandi Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, mwasaba kubalekeelela mu̱ji̱ndi̱.
44003015	Mukaleka baata oghu akuhaagha bwomi̱i̱li̱, bhaatu Luhanga aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la. Eki niikiyo tukwete kuheela buukai̱so.
44003016	Musaasa muboone kandi mumani̱ye oni, bu̱toki̱ bwa Yesu bwonkaha niibuwo bwaleki̱ye aakila. Kandi haabwatu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, niikiyo kyaleki̱ye musaasa oni aakilila kimui ngoku enu̱we boona mumuboone.
44003017	“Nahabweki baana baamaaha, haabwa kutamanya ngoku Yesu aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to niikiyo kyaleki̱ye enu̱we na beebembeli̱ baanu mwamuhaayo kumwita.
44003018	Bhaatu Luhanga akaba naalangi̱ye hambele obu aatu̱mi̱ye balangi̱ be kulanga bati Ki̱li̱si̱to akwisa kubona-bona kandi ku̱ku̱wa.
44003019	Nahabweki mwekuukemu, mukuukʼo Luhanga, niikuwo abaghanile bibhi byanu,
44003020	niikuwo bwile bwanu bwa kutunga maani̱ bugubhe ku̱lu̱gha ewaa Mukama kandi abatumile Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu aasangu̱u̱we aghi̱li̱ye ati akubaasamu. Oghu niiye Yesu.
44003021	Bhaatu akulaghiluwa ku̱du̱bha kuukala mu eghulu ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Luhanga akoli̱ye bintu byona buhyaka ngoku aatu̱mi̱ye balangi̱ be baa hambele bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kulanga.
44003022	Nanga Musa akaghila ati, ‘Mukama alikoma mu baghenji̱ baanu mulangi̱ ngʼanje. Mukulaghiluwa ku̱tegheeleli̱ya byona ebi akubaghambila kukola.’
44003023	Ti̱, ‘Weena oghu alabhengagha ku̱tegheeleli̱ya mulangi̱ oghu, Luhanga alamuuyagha mu bantu be kandi ahwelekeelelaghe.’
44003024	Balangi̱ boona abaabaagha na butumuwa bwa Luhanga, otaayemu Samwi̱li̱ hamui nʼabaasi̱ye haanu̱ma yee, bakalanga dhee bintu ebikwete kubʼo bini.
44003025	Majima ni̱i̱nu̱we aba Luhanga aaghambiiye balangi̱ be ku̱bu̱ghʼo. Kandi muli mu ndaghaano eghi aakoleeye baataata baanu, naaghila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati, ‘Kandi mu baasukulu baawe niimuwo nkuheela nganda sya munsi yoona mu̱gi̱sa!’ ”
44003026	Peetelo aatodha aabaghila ati, “Luhanga atakahaaye bantu banji boona mu̱gi̱sa, enu̱we Bayu̱daaya ni̱i̱nu̱we aadu̱bhi̱ye kutumila mu̱heeleli̱ya wee, niikuwo abahe mu̱gi̱sa kubakoonela kwekuukamu bibhi byanu.”
44004001	Obu Peetelo na Yohaana baanabu̱ghi̱lagha bantu aba, bahongi̱, mukulu wa baasilikale abalindagha Numba ya Luhanga, na bamui mu Basadukaayo, baaki̱dhʼo.
44004002	Baasaaliluwa nanga bakwenda aba beegheesi̱yagha kandi baalangilila ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka okuli mu Yesu.
44004003	Du̱mbi̱ baakwata Peetelo na Yohaana. Bhaatu ngoku bwali ni bwahi̱ki̱ye lwagholo, baabata mu nkomo, baalinda bwile kukiya.
44004004	Ti̱ bantu bakani̱ye abaaghu̱u̱ye ebi Peetelo na Yohaana bakwete ku̱bu̱gha baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu. Muhendo ghwa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja ghwaba haai basaasa nku̱mi̱ etaano.
44004005	Nkyambisi ya kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, beebembeli̱, bengei̱, hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo, baaba na Lukulato Lukulu mu Yelusaalemu.
44004006	Anansi, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, Kayaafa, Yohaana, Alekijanda na bantu banji nganda sya Anansi oghu, boona bakaba bali mu Lukulato olu.
44004007	Niibuwo baaleeti̱yemu Peetelo na Yohaana, baabaami̱li̱li̱ya haagati yabo, baababu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Mulema oghu mwamu̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu̱ti̱ya? Kandi ni ani̱ aabahaaye bu̱toki̱ obu?”
44004008	Peetelo aasuuye Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we beebembeli̱ na bengei̱,
44004009	mukaakuba ni̱mu̱tu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya obwalo haabwa kintu kisemeeye eki twakoleeye mulema oni, kandi nimubbala kumanya ngoku aaki̱li̱ye,
44004010	muleke nkighambile enu̱we na bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ boona. Musaasa oni aamiliiye hani endindi akiliiye kimui haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwa Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to wʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Najaaleeti̱. Mukamubamba haa musalaba aaku̱wa, bhaatu Luhanga aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la.
44004011	Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱mu̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo biti, niiye “ ‘Ebaale eli bakweli̱ baabhengi̱ye, niiliyo lyahaghi̱ki̱ye numba kusaali̱ya ghanji ghoona.’
44004012	Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akugubha kutujuna, nanga taaliyo li̱i̱na linji munsi yoona alyaheebeeu̱we bantu elikugubha kutujuna.”
44004013	Obu baamemba abaabaagha mu Lukulato olu baaboone ngoku Peetelo na Yohaana bakwete ku̱bu̱gha batoobahi̱ye, ti̱ baabona bali bantu baa bu̱li̱ kilo kandi batasomi̱ye, baasweka, baamanya ngoku basaasa aba baakalagha na Yesu.
44004014	Bhaatu haabwa kubona musaasa oghu baaki̱li̱i̱ye aamiliiye nabo, baasaaghuwa kubahakani̱ya.
44004015	Baamemba aba baatwesi̱ya Peetelo na Yohaana mu Lukulato olu, baahanuula bati,
44004016	“Basaasa aba tubakole ki? Nanga baakoli̱ye kyakuswekani̱ya, ti̱ bu̱li̱ muntu oghu ali mu Yelusaalemu akimani̱ye, kandi tatukugubha kuhakana tuti takyabaayʼo.
44004017	Bhaatu kutanga makulu ghʼeki baakoli̱ye eki kumalakaka mu bantu boona, oleke tubatangile kimui tuti batatodha kwegheesi̱ya muntu nʼomui mbabu̱ghʼo Yesu.”
44004018	Niibuwo baabilikiiye bakwenda aba Peetelo na Yohaana kutodha kutaahamu. Baabatangila kimui bati, “Mutatodha ku̱bu̱gha kedha kwegheesi̱ya kintu kyona ekikwetʼo Yesu.”
44004019	Bhaatu Peetelo na Yohaana baabakuukamu bati, “Naanu mu̱tu̱wemu, buuye ki̱hi̱ki̱ye etu̱we ku̱hu̱ti̱ya enu̱we mu ki̱i̱kalo kya ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Luhanga?
44004020	Tatukugubha kuleka ku̱bu̱gha ebi twaboone nʼebi twaghu̱u̱ye.”
44004021	Obu abaabaagha mu Lukulato baamali̱ye kuboobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, baabalekela haabwa kubuluwa ekyanguleka mbabafubila. Boobaha bantu boona abaasindagha Luhanga haabwa ekyabaayʼo,
44004022	nanga musaasa oghu kyakuswekani̱ya kya kukila eki kyabaayʼo, akaba asaaye haa myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa ya bukulu.
44004023	Makalekela bati Peetelo na Yohaana, baaghenda hambali baanakyabo bali, baabaghambila byona ebi bakulu baa bahongi̱ na bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya baabaghambiiye.
44004024	Obu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baasabila hamui Luhanga bati, “Mukama Wamaani̱, oghu okahanga nsi nʼeghulu, nanja na ebilimu byona,
44004025	uwe oghu okabu̱gha nookoleesi̱ya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kukwama mu mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe, taata waatu Dhau̱dhi̱, ku̱bu̱gha ati, “ ‘Haabwaki Banamahanga basaaluuwe, kandi bantu mbakuhanuulagha bitaakughasa?
44004026	Bakama baa munsi muni beeteekani̱i̱je, na balemi̱ beekumaani̱i̱ye hamui kuhakani̱ya Mukama kandi kuhakani̱ya oghu aaseeseu̱wʼo magita wee.’
44004027	Majima kuwo, Helude, Ponti̱yo Pilaato, Banamahanga na Banai̱saaleeli̱, bakagumbaana mu kibugha kini kuhakani̱ya mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye Yesu, oghu waaseesi̱yʼo magita.
44004028	Baakola kyonini eki uwe mu magheji na bu̱toki̱ bwawe waasangu̱u̱we otu̱u̱yemu kubʼo.
44004029	Nahabweki Mukama, olole ngoku bakwete kutwobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya. Ohe etu̱we baheeleli̱ya baawe maani̱ ghaa kulangilila kighambo kyawe tutoobahi̱ye.
44004030	Wooleke bantu bu̱toki̱ bwawe, niikuwo tugubhe ku̱ki̱li̱ya balwaye kandi kukola byakuswekani̱ya haabwa bu̱toki̱ bwa mu̱heeleli̱ya waawe ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye Yesu.”
44004031	Obu baamali̱ye kusaba, numba eghi baabaaghamu yaadhinga-dhinga. Boona baasula Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kandi beeyongela kulangilila kighambo kya Luhanga batoobahi̱ye.
44004032	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba boona bakaba bali mu bumui, taaliyo nʼomui oghu aaghilagha ati bintu ebi ali nabiyo mbiye enkaha, bhaatu bu̱li̱ muntu aatambulanagha na muunakiye aka akali nako.
44004033	Bakwenda aba baahaagha buukai̱so bwamaani̱ bwa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka kwa Mukama Yesu. Kandi Luhanga aabaghililagha ngughuma boona.
44004034	Nanga taaliyo nʼomui oghu aabuluwagha kantu koona. Abaabaagha na bibanja kedha manumba baabi̱ghu̱li̱yagha. Sente esyalu̱ghaghamu
44004035	basileetela bakwenda, basitambu̱li̱ya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyabo kusighikila mu byetaagho byabo.
44004036	Kyakulolelʼo, hakaba haliyo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja omui li̱i̱na liye Yojeefu̱. Akaba ali wʼomu ntu̱la ya Leevi̱, bamubyaliiye mu ehanga lya Ki̱pu̱lo, oghu bakwenda baali balu̱ki̱ye kibbaako Balanaba (ekikumani̱i̱si̱ya “Oghu akwekambi̱i̱si̱yagha baanakiye”).
44004037	Aaghu̱li̱ya musili ghuwe, sente esyalu̱ghi̱yemu syona, aasileetela bakwenda kusitambu̱li̱ya abali na byetaagho.
44005001	Bhaatu akaba aliyo musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Ananiya. Eye na mukali̱ wee Safi̱la baaghu̱li̱ya ghumui haa misili yabo.
44005002	Haanu̱ma yabo ku̱u̱ghu̱wana, aati̱ghali̱ya ki̱twi̱ke kya sente esyalu̱ghi̱yemu. Esyati̱ghaayʼo aasileetela bakwenda.
44005003	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Ananiya, Si̱taani̱ aaku̱koleeseei̱ye kwebiikila ki̱twi̱ke kya sente esi waahi̱ye mu musili ghwawe kandi kudimaaga Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye nangaaki?
44005004	Obu waabaagha otakaghu̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye taghwabaagha ghwawe? Noobu wangu̱ghu̱ghu̱li̱i̱ye, sente tawangu̱si̱koleeseei̱ye ngoku obbali̱ye? Waatu̱u̱yemu kukola kintu ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kitiyo nangaaki? Tawadimaagi̱ye bantu, waadimaagi̱ye Luhanga.”
44005005	-
44005006	Ananiya akaba makaaghu̱wa ati bighambo ebi, eegenga aku̱u̱ye. Bamui mu batabhana baasa baaboha mu̱ku̱ ghuwe baaghu̱twesi̱ya, baaghujiika. Ti̱ abaaghu̱u̱ye boona boobahila kimui.
44005007	Haanu̱ma ya saaha ngʼesatu, mukali̱ wee aataaha mu numba eghi atamani̱ye ekyabaayʼo.
44005008	Peetelo aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ongambile, sini niisiyo sente syona esi uwe na bali̱i̱waawe mwatu̱ngi̱ye mu musili ghwanu mwaghu̱li̱i̱ye?” Aakuukamu ati, “Ee, niisiyo esi.”
44005009	Niibuwo Peetelo aamu̱ghi̱li̱ye ati, “Uwe na bali̱i̱waawe mwaghu̱wane kudimaaga Mwoyo wa Mukama nangaaki? Ooghu̱we! Abaku̱lu̱gha kujiika bali̱i̱waawe balimataaha, naawe baku̱ku̱twesi̱ya endindi kukujiika.”
44005010	Du̱mbi̱ mukali̱ oghu eegenga mu maghulu ghaa Peetelo, aaku̱wa. Obu batabhana baaku̱u̱ki̱ye mbaataaha mu numba eghi, baamusanga aku̱u̱ye, baaboha mu̱ku̱ ghuwe, baaghu̱twesi̱ya, baamujiika haakpengbu̱ yʼebawee.
44005011	Ti̱ ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja kyona na bantu banji abaaghu̱u̱ye ebyabaayʼo ebi, boobahila kimui.
44005012	Bakwenda aba baakolagha byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye mu bantu ebyolekagha ngoku Luhanga ali nabo. Kandi bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona baagumbaanagha bu̱li̱ kilo mu emui haa bbalaaji sya Numba ya Luhanga, eghi baaghilaghamu bbalaaji ya Mukama Solomooni̱.
44005013	Nankabha bantu mbabaagha babahu̱ti̱i̱ye, abatali bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boobaagha kuukala mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja eki.
44005014	Bhaatu bantu bakaniiye kimui bakali̱ na basaasa baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Mukama, kandi baaba mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja eki.
44005015	Haabwa byakuswekani̱ya ebi bakwenda aba baakolagha, bantu baaheekagha balwaye baabo babalangaali̱ya haa mikeka na haa malili mu maakpengbu̱ ghaa nguudhe, niikuwo Peetelo naabaaye naasaala, hakili ki̱i̱lu̱ghu̱u̱li̱li̱ya kiye kibahi̱kʼo bakile.
44005016	Bantu bakaniiye kimui abaabaagha baakaaye mu maatau̱ni̱ ghalabhaane na Yelusaalemu, baaleetagha balwaye nʼaba bi̱li̱mu̱ bikwete. Ti̱ balwaye aba boona baakilagha.
44005017	Bwile obu mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona, hamui na Basadukaayo boona abaamuhagilagha, baaghilila bakwenda aba etima.
44005018	Nahabweki baalaghila kukwata bakwenda aba, baabata mu nkomo.
44005019	Bhaatu kilo eki mukilo, malai̱ka wa Mukama aaghula njighi sya nkomo eghi, aatwesi̱yamu bakwenda aba, aabaghila ati,
44005020	“Mughende mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, mwegheesi̱ye bantu mulingo ghwa kutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ buhyaka buni.”
44005021	Nkyambisi cu̱i̱-cu̱i̱ baaghenda mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga, baatandika kwegheesi̱ya bantu. Obu mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aaki̱dhi̱ye hamui na Basadukaayo abaamuhagilagha, baabilikila baamemba boona baa Lukulato Lukulu lwa Banai̱saaleeli̱. Baaba na lukulato, du̱mbi̱ baatuma baasilikale kwendela bakwenda aba mu nkomo kubaleeta mu Lukulato olu kubatongani̱ya.
44005022	Bhaatu obu baasilikale aba baataahi̱ye mu nkomo, bataabasangamu. Du̱mbi̱ baakuuka baaghambila baamemba abaabaagha mu Lukulato omu bati,
44005023	“Obu twaki̱dhi̱ye haa nkomo, twasangi̱ye njighi syona siighaaye bhyani, kandi na bali̱ndi̱ baamiliiye haa milyango balindiiye kimui. Bhaatu obu twaghuuye njighi ntwataaha mu nkomo, tatwabasangi̱yemu.”
44005024	Obu bakulu baa bahongi̱ hamui na mukulu wa baasilikale abaalindagha Numba ya Luhanga baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baasobeluwa mbaneeli̱li̱kana hambali bakwenda aba bali.
44005025	Niibuwo musaasa omui aasi̱ye, aabaghambila ati, “Dhaani mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye! Basaasa aba mwakwete mwata mu nkomo, bali mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga kandi bakwete kwegheesi̱ya bantu.”
44005026	Du̱mbi̱ mukulu wa baasilikale oghu hamui na baasilikale be baaghenda baakwata bakwenda aba, baabaleeta mu Lukulato olu. Boobaha bati bantu bakubahuula mabaale mbaanakwete bakwenda aba na ki̱ku̱bha.
44005027	Obu baabaki̱dhi̱i̱ye mu Lukulato olu, mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aabaghila ati,
44005028	“Tukabalaghila tuti mutatodha kwegheesi̱ya bantu muti Yesu ali na bu̱toki̱. Bhaatu mulole ebi mukwete kukola! Bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu boona niibuwo mwabeegheesi̱ya ebikwetʼo Yesu. Kandi niibuwo mwalengʼo kughila muti ni̱i̱tu̱we twaleki̱ye baamwita.”
44005029	Peetelo na bakwenda baanakiye baakuukamu bati, “Tukulaghiluwa ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Luhanga batali bantu.
44005030	Mukabamba Yesu haa musalaba, aaku̱wa, bhaatu Luhanga oghu baataata baatu baalami̱yagha, aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la.
44005031	Aamusitami̱ya haa luhande lwa mukono ghuwe ghwabuliyo nga Mukama kandi Mu̱ju̱ni̱, niikuwo bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ bagubhe kwekuukamu kandi Luhanga abaghanile bibhi byabo.
44005032	Etu̱we na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu ali kisembo eki Luhanga akuhaagha abaku̱mu̱hu̱ti̱yagha, tuli baakai̱so baa bintu ebi.”
44005033	Obu baamemba abaabaagha mu Lukulato olu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, baasaalililuwa kimui, baabbala kwita bakwenda aba.
44005034	Bhaatu mu Lukulato olu, akaba alimu memba omui li̱i̱na liye Gamalyeli̱. Akaba ali Mufali̱saayo, mwegheesi̱ya wa bilaghilo. Bantu boona bakaba bamu̱hu̱ti̱li̱i̱ye kimui. Aamilila, aalaghila ati batwesi̱ye bakwenda aba mu Lukulato olu haabwa bwile bukee.
44005035	Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye baamemba baanakiye ati, “Banai̱saaleeli̱ baanakyanje, tukulaghiluwa kweli̱li̱kanʼo bhyani eki tukubbala kukolʼo basaasa aba.
44005036	Mu̱u̱su̱ki̱ye hambele ngoku Teu̱di̱ya aajeemeeye bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma, eefoola kuba muntu oghu ali na bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱, bantu haai bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa baamuhagila, bhaatu obu baasilikale baa Looma baamwi̱ti̱ye abaamuhagilagha aba boona baahanjikana, nʼebi aakolagha byona byahuwʼo.
44005037	Haanu̱ma yee, bwile obu bantu beehandi̱i̱ki̱i̱si̱yagha kubabala, Yu̱da Munagalilaaya aajeemela bu̱lemi̱ bwa Balooma. Bantu bakani̱ye baamuhagila, bhaatu naye obu baasilikale baa Looma baamwi̱ti̱ye, abaamuhagilagha boona baahanjikana.
44005038	“Nahabweki kihanuulo kyanje ni kini, basaasa aba mutabakolʼo kantu koona. Kandi muleke kubafuwʼo, nanga ebi bakwete kukola kandi kwegheesi̱ya ebi, ni byabaaye bili bya bantu kwonkaha, bikuhuwʼo dhee.
44005039	Bhaatu ni byabaaye bili bya Luhanga tamukugubha kubitanga. Kandi mukugubha kwesanga nimuhakani̱ya Luhanga!” Baamemba aba, baasi̱i̱ma kihanuulo eki.
44005040	Niibuwo baabilikiiye bakwenda aba kutodha kutaahamu. Baalaghila baasilikale kubahuula bibbooko kandi baabatangila kimui bati batatodha kwegheesi̱ya ngu bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱je Yesu. Baabalekela baaghenda.
44005041	Bakwenda aba baalu̱gha mu Lukulato olu badheedheleeu̱we kimui, nanga bakaba bamani̱ye ngoku Luhanga abahu̱ti̱i̱ye haabwa ku̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ya bantu kubabona-boni̱ya nanga kuba bakwenda baa Yesu.
44005042	Nahabweki beeyongela kughenda bu̱li̱ kilo mu bbalaaji ya Numba ya Luhanga na mu maka kwegheesi̱ya kandi kutebeja bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye ngoku Yesu aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to.
44006001	Bwile obu muhendo ghwa beeghesebuwa ghweyongelela kimui kukana. Bayu̱daaya abaabu̱ghagha Lu̱gi̱li̱ki̱ baatandika kuhakangana na Bayu̱daaya abaabu̱ghagha Luhebbulaayo, nanga abaabu̱ghagha Luhebbulaayo baanaghi̱li̱jagha bakwi̱si̱ya bʼabaabu̱ghagha Lu̱gi̱li̱ki̱ mu kubatambu̱li̱ya bintu bu̱li̱ kilo.
44006002	Niibuwo bakwenda eku̱mi̱ na babili aba baabilikiiye beeghesebuwa boona kwisa mu lukulato. Baaghila bati, “Takili kilungi etu̱we kuukala ntunaghaba bintu mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kutebeja kighambo kya Luhanga.
44006003	Nahabweki baana baamaaha, mwekomemu bantu musanju̱ aba bantu bahu̱ti̱i̱ye, abaasuuye Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kandi abali na magheji, aaniibo twaha mulimo ghwa kughaba bintu.
44006004	Niikuwo etu̱we bwile bwatu bwona tubumale ntusaba kandi ntutebeja kighambo kya Luhanga.”
44006005	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba boona baasi̱i̱ma kihanuulo eki. Baakoma Siteefaano, musaasa ali na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwamaani̱ kandi aasuuye Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Baakoma Fi̱li̱po, Polokolo, Nikanooli̱, Ti̱mooni̱, Pamena, na Nikola wʼomu kibugha kya Anti̱yoki̱ya (wʼomu Anti̱yoki̱ya, oghu akaba adu̱bhi̱ye kutaaha di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya.)
44006006	Baaleeta basaasa aba mu maaso ghaa bakwenda, baabatʼo mikono kandi baabasabila.
44006007	Kighambo kya Luhanga kyeyongela kugbaatikana, ti̱ muhendo ghwa beeghesebuwa ghwakanila kimui mu Yelusaalemu. Na bahongi̱ bakani̱ye baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Mukama Yesu.
44006008	Luhanga aaghilila Siteefaano ngughuma aamuha maani̱ ghaa kuukala naakola byakuswekani̱ya bikani̱ye mu bantu.
44006009	Niibuwo bamui mu bantu bʼomu elami̱li̱yo eli baaghilaghamu lya Basyana Abaatu̱ngi̱ye Bughabe, baasi̱ye baatandika kuhakangana naye. Bakaba bali Bayu̱daaya abaali balu̱ghi̱ye mu mahanga ghaa Kilene, Alekijandi̱li̱ya, Ki̱li̱ki̱ya na mu kyalo kya Asi̱ya.
44006010	Bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aaha Siteefaano oghu magheji. Kandi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akagubha ku̱mu̱si̱nga.
44006011	Niibuwo baahani̱ye bantu kuhabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya Siteefaano bati, “Twaghu̱u̱ye musaasa oghu nambulila kimui Musa hamui na Luhanga.”
44006012	Du̱mbi̱ baahaaghi̱li̱li̱ya bantu, bengei̱ baa Bayu̱daaya, hamui na beegheesi̱ya baa bilaghilo. Bantu aba baasa baakwata Siteefaano baamutwala mu Lukulato Lukulu lwa bengei̱.
44006013	Baataahi̱yamu bamui mu bantu kuhabi̱i̱li̱li̱ya Siteefaano bati, “Musaasa oghu akuukalagha naabu̱ghʼo kubhi ki̱i̱kalo ki̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kini hamui na bilaghilo.
44006014	Twamu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye naaghila ati Yesu wabo wa Najaaleeti̱ oghu akuuhilʼo kimui Numba ya Luhanga waatu kandi ahindulile kimui mi̱ghendi̱yo yoona eghi Musa aatulaghiiye kukola.”
44006015	Obu abaabaagha mu Lukulato olu baaghu̱u̱ye eki, baalola tonono Siteefaano kandi baabona haali̱i̱so yee naabbebbeniya nga Malai̱ka.
44007001	Mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona aabu̱u̱li̱ya Siteefaano oghu ati, “Ebi bakwete kukunyegheelela bati waabu̱ghi̱ye ebi byona ni majima?”
44007002	Siteefaano aakuukamu ati, “Baana baamaaha na baatita, dhaani mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye. Mumani̱ye ngoku hambele taata waatu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ anaakaaye mu ehanga lya Mesopotami̱ya, Luhanga waatu wa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa akamubonekela atakaghendi̱ye kuukala mu tau̱ni̱ ya Halaani.
44007003	Aamughila ati, ‘Olu̱ghe mu nganda syawe, nʼomu ehanga lyanu lini, oghende mu ehanga eli nkukwoleka.’
44007004	“Nahabweki Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aalu̱gha mu ehanga lya Mesopotami̱ya eli, aaghenda aakala mu tau̱ni̱ ya Halaani. Obu ese wee aaku̱u̱ye, Luhanga aaleeta Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu kuukala mu ehanga lya I̱saaleeli̱ eli tulimu lini.
44007005	Ti̱ bwile obu Luhanga taamuhaaye nankabha kahande kati̱i̱ konkaha kʼetaka lya hambali tuli endindi. Bhaatu nankabha Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ataabaagha na mwana bwile obu, Luhanga aamulaghi̱i̱sani̱ya ati akumuha na baasukulu be nsi eni.
44007006	Haanu̱ma Luhanga aamughila ati, ‘Baasukulu baawe aba baku̱du̱bha kuukala mu ehanga linji nga basyana kandi mbababona-boneli̱ya kimui kumala myaka bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa.
44007007	Bhaatu ndifubila abakubabona-boni̱ya aba, du̱mbi̱ niiye baasukulu baawe aba mu ehanga eli, baase bandami̱li̱ye mu ehanga lyabo lini.’
44007008	Kandi Luhanga aalaghila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ kusaali̱i̱si̱ya baana be nga ndaghaano eghi aakoli̱ye naye. Ti̱ obu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aabyaye I̱saka aamusali̱i̱si̱ya haanu̱ma ya bilo munaanaa. I̱saka aabyala Yakobbo, na Yakobbo aabyala batabani̱ be eku̱mi̱ na babili, baataata baatu.
44007009	“Baataata baatu aba booha muto wabo Yojeefu̱ kandi baamu̱ghu̱li̱ya Banami̱si̱li̱. Bhaatu Luhanga aakala anamu̱li̱ndi̱ye,
44007010	aamuuya mu kubona-bona oku, aamuheela kimui magheji. Ti̱ Falaaho, mukama wʼehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱, aamukunda kandi aamuha mulimo ghwa kuloleelela kikaali kiye kyona.
44007011	“Niibuwo njala yaaghuuye mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ na lya Kanaani̱. Ti̱ njala eghi yaabona-boneli̱ya kimui bantu. Baataata baatu tabaatungagha byokuliya.
44007012	Bhaatu obu Yakobbo aaghu̱u̱ye ngu byokuliya bili mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱, aadu̱bha aatumayo batabani̱ be, baataata baatu, kughulayo byokuliya.
44007013	Obu baatodhi̱ye kukuukayo mulundi ghwakabili, Yojeefu̱ aabaghambila ngoku ali mwana waani̱nabo. Ti̱ Falaaho mukama wʼehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ eli, aamanya nganda sya Yojeefu̱ esi.
44007014	Niibuwo Yojeefu̱ aabatu̱mi̱ye kughambila ese wee Yakobbo kwisa na ka yee yoona kuukala mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱. Ka eghi yoona bakaba bali bantu nsanju̱ na bataano.
44007015	Nahabweki Yakobbo aaghenda Mi̱si̱li̱ na ka yee yoona. Eye na batabani̱ be boona niiyo baakwi̱li̱i̱ye.
44007016	Ti̱ oghu aakaku̱wagha, mu̱ku̱ ghuwe baaghuleetagha baghuta mu kituulo hani Sekeemu mu kibanja eki Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aasangu̱u̱we aghu̱li̱ye na batabani̱ baa Hamooli̱.
44007017	“Obu Luhanga aabaagha ali haai kukola eki aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ati akuuya Bayu̱daaya mu kubona-bona, bwile obu bakaba mbakaniiye kimui mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱.
44007018	Kandi mukama onji oghu akaba atamani̱ye Yojeefu̱ niiye akaba alemi̱ye ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ bwile obu.
44007019	Eeli̱li̱kana milingo ya bu̱ghobi̱ya ya kubona-boneli̱yamu baataata baatu aba niikuwo bakeehe. Aabalaghila kutwalagha baana baabo nkelembe mu kisaka hambali haseli̱ye babati̱gheyo, niikuwo bakwi̱leyo.
44007020	“Bwile obu niibuwo baabyaliiyemu Musa. Akaba ali mwana asemeleeye kimui kandi adheedhi̱ye Luhanga. Babyaye be baakala naye ewaabo e ka kumala meeli̱ asatu. Bhaatu bataagubha kuukala banamu̱bi̱si̱ye.
44007021	Niibuwo baamutwete baamuta mu kisaka hambali haseli̱ye, baamu̱ti̱ghayo. Muhala wa Falaaho oghu aamukoma, aamutwala, aatandika ku̱mu̱ku̱li̱ya nga mwana wee.
44007022	Musa oghu aakula, aasomela mu maasukuulu ghaa Banami̱si̱li̱, aaba wamaani̱ mu ebi aabu̱ghagha nʼebi aakolagha.
44007023	“Obu aahi̱ki̱i̱ye myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa, aatu̱wamu kughenda kubunga mu nganda siye Banai̱saaleeli̱.
44007024	Analiyeyo, aabona Munami̱si̱li̱ naakola kubhi Munai̱saaleeli̱. Aaghenda kugama Munai̱saaleeli̱ oghu. Aahuulila kimui Munami̱si̱li̱, aamwitilʼo.
44007025	Aakola eki neeli̱li̱kana ati nganda siye esi sikumanya ngoku aaniiye Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye kwisa kubaaya mu kubona-bona oku, bhaatu baamubhenga.
44007026	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, aabona Bayu̱daaya babili mbalwana. Du̱mbi̱ aaghenda kubali̱na. Aabaghila ati, ‘Baana baamaaha, enu̱we boona muli baani̱na emui Banai̱saaleeli̱, ti̱ mukwete kukolangana kubhi nangaaki?’
44007027	“Bhaatu oghu aakolagha kubhi muunakiye aati̱ngi̱ta eli̱ Musa, aamubhenga, aamughila ati, ‘Ni ani̱ aakufooye mu̱lemi̱ kandi mu̱cu̱ waatu?
44007028	Okubbala kunjita ngoku eso waati̱ye Munami̱si̱li̱?’
44007029	Obu Musa aaghu̱u̱ye eki, aamanya ngoku bantu bakani̱ye baamani̱ye ngoku aati̱ye muntu. Du̱mbi̱ oobaha, aaluka mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ eli. Aaghenda, aakala mu ehanga lya Mi̱di̱yaani̱. Aamalayo myaka ekani̱ye, aaswela kandi aabyalilayo baana babili.
44007030	“Ti̱ Musa akaba naamali̱ye myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa mu ehanga eli. Kilo kimui obu aabaagha mu elungu haai-haai na mwena Si̱naai̱, aabona malai̱ka mu kiti ekyakaghamu mulilo.
44007031	Obu Musa aaboone mulilo oghu aaswekela kimui, nanga aabona kiti eki nkyakamu mulilo bhaatu bibabi byakiyo bitaakuhiya. Du̱mbi̱ aatandika kukyebinga. Niibuwo aaghu̱u̱ye elaka lya Mukama ndimughila liti,
44007032	‘Ni̱i̱si̱ye Luhanga wa baataata baanu, Luhanga wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, I̱saka, kandi Yakobbo.’ Obu Musa aaghu̱u̱ye atiyo ataabbala kutodha kukilola, oobahila kimui kandi aatandika kutukumila.
44007033	“Mukama aamughila ati, ‘Ooyemu nkai̱to syawe, nanga weemiliiye hʼetaka li̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
44007034	Majima kuwo naaboone ngoku bantu banje abali mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ bakwete kubona-bona, kandi naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku bakwete kundiliilila. Nahabweki naasi̱ye kubaaya mu kubona-bona oku. Ndimakutuma endindi oghende mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱ obajune.’
44007035	“Nahabweki Musa oghu Bayu̱daaya baali basangu̱u̱we baabhengi̱ye mbamughila bati, ‘Ni ani̱ aakufooye mu̱lemi̱ kandi mu̱cu̱ waatu?’ Niiye Luhanga aatu̱mi̱ye kubacungula kukwama mu malai̱ka oghu aaboone mu kiti ekyakaghamu mulilo, aamutuma kughenda kuuya Bayu̱daaya mu kubona-bona mu Mi̱si̱li̱ kandi kuba mukama wabo.
44007036	Musa aaya baataata baatu mu ehanga lya Mi̱si̱li̱. Bhaatu atakabaahi̱yeyo, aakola byakuswekani̱ya na bintu binji bikani̱ye kwoleka ngoku Luhanga aamuhaaye bu̱toki̱. Aabakwami̱li̱ya mu Nanja Mutuku na mu elungu. Baamala myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa mbanaghenda.
44007037	“Musa oghu niiye akaghambila dhee Banai̱saaleeli̱ ati, ‘Luhanga alikoma mu baghenji̱ baanu mulangi̱ ngʼanje.’
44007038	Obu baataata baatu baanabaagha mu elungu, Musa aabakumaani̱li̱ya hamui haai-haai na mwena Si̱naai̱. Malai̱ka oghu aamughambila kughambila bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱ aba mulingo oghu bakugubha kukola ebi̱dheedhi̱ye Luhanga niikuwo babe boomi̱i̱li̱.
44007039	“Baataata baatu aba baabhenga Musa ngoku mukwete kubhenga Yesu endindi. Baabhenga kukola ebi aabalaghiiye, kandi bataabbala bati aakale anabalemi̱ye. Baacuwamu bati nkilungi bakuuke Mi̱si̱li̱.
44007040	Niibuwo baaghi̱li̱ye Alooni̱ mukulu wa Musa bati, ‘Otukolele bisasani̱ bya baaluhanga aaniibiyo byaghendagha bituhikiiye, nanga Musa oghu akatuuya Mi̱si̱li̱ tatumani̱ye hambali ali.’
44007041	Nahabweki aabakolela kisasani̱ ki̱su̱si̱ye kyana kya nte. Baakibembela kukilami̱ya. Kandi baakola bu̱ghenu̱ ku̱hu̱ti̱ya kisasani̱ eki Alooni̱ aakoli̱ye eki.
44007042	Bhaatu Luhanga aabalu̱ghʼo, aabaleka baalami̱ya bihanguwa byʼomu mwanya, ngoku kili mu kitabo eki balangi̱ baahandi̱i̱ki̱ye ngu, “ ‘Enu̱we bantu baa I̱saaleeli̱, myaka maku̱mi̱ anaa eghi mwamali̱ye mu elungu taani̱i̱si̱ye mwahongelagha bisembo bbaa.
44007043	Nanga weema eghi mwabungagha mu̱heeki̱ye ni ya luhanga waanu Moleki̱, hamui na luhanga waanu Lefaani oghu mwali mu̱koli̱ye asu̱si̱ye nsooli̱ya. Ebi ni bisasani̱ ebi mwali mwekoleeye kulami̱ya, nahabweki nkuleka mu̱si̱ngu̱lu̱we kandi muuhibuwe mu ehanga lyanu, babaseleli̱ye kimui kusaala Bbabbu̱looni̱.’
44007044	“Baataata baatu bakaba bali na weema mu elungu eghi yoolekagha ngoku Luhanga ali nabo. Bakaba baghikweye kusighikila ngoku Luhanga aalaghiiye kandi aaghyoleki̱ye Musa.
44007045	Baataata baatu nabo baaheeka weema eghi, baasa hamui na Yosuha munsi eni eghi Luhanga aabhi̱ngi̱yemu bantu niikuwo baataata baatu aba baakalemu. Nahabweki niikuwo kyabaaye kitiyo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwile obu Dhau̱dhi̱ aalemi̱ye.
44007046	Ti̱ Dhau̱dhi̱ oghu Luhanga aaghiliiye ngughuma, kandi aamwesengeleli̱ya ati akwelele Luhanga wa Yakobbo oghu numba.
44007047	Luhanga taasi̱i̱mi̱lani̱i̱ye Dhau̱dhi̱ oghu, nanga majima Numba ya Luhanga eghi oghu akaghikwela ni Solomooni̱.
44007048	“Kuni oghu ali Eghulu Munu taakuukalagha mu manumba agha bantu bakweye bbaa. Ngoku mulangi̱ aaghi̱li̱ye ati Mukama aaghila ati,
44007049	“ ‘Eghulu niiliyo ntebe yanje ya bukama, kandi nsi niiyo katebe aka nkukpeetaghʼo. Taaliyo numba eghi mukugubha kunkwelela eghi nku̱hi̱kamu. Kandi taaliyo numba eghi mukugubha kunkwelela kuukalamu bbaa.
44007050	Nanga nsi nʼeghulu na byona ebilimu ni̱i̱si̱ye nkabihanga.’ ”
44007051	Siteefaano aatodha aabaghila ati, “Enu̱we muli ntaaghu̱wa, mitima yaanu yoomakakaane kandi tamuli na matui aghaaku̱u̱ghu̱wagha. Mukubhengagha Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Mukukolagha ngʼebi baataata baanu baakolagha.
44007052	Buuye haliyo mulangi̱ nʼomui oghu baataata baanu bataabona-boneei̱ye? Baatagha balangi̱, otaayemu nʼabaalangagha ngoku oghu Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, akwisa. Ti̱ Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu aasa, bhaatu enu̱we mwamu̱ghobeli̱ya, kandi mwaleka baamwita.
44007053	Nankabha Luhanga naabahaaye bilaghilo biye kukwama mu baamalai̱ka be, enu̱we mukubyeghahilagha.”
44007054	Obu baamemba abaabaagha mu Lukulato olu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi, ki̱i̱ni̱gha kyabakwatila kimui, kandi baatandika kumwenenela ngaga basaaliluuwe kimui.
44007055	Bhaatu Siteefaano aasuliiye kimui Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aalola eghulu, aabona ku̱bbeni̱ya kwa bu̱toki̱ bwa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Luhanga, na Yesu aamiliiye haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa Luhanga.
44007056	Aaghila ati, “Mulole! Mboone eghulu li̱i̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye, ti̱ Mwana wa Muntu aamiliiye haa luhande lwa mukono ghwabuliyo ghwa Luhanga!”
44007057	Obu baaghu̱u̱ye ebi beehighala matui, baagolela kimui du̱mbi̱ baamwisʼo,
44007058	baamughwilikiilila, baamu̱twesi̱ya mu kibugha eki, baatandika kumuhuula mabaale. Saulo aalinda kooti̱ syʼabahuulagha Siteefaano mabaale.
44007059	Mbanamuhuula mabaale, aasaba nʼelaka lyamaani̱ ati, “Mukama Yesu, gutu onsi̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye niise niikale naawe!”
44007060	Niibuwo aateei̱ye, aagugila kimui ati, “Mukama, obaghanile kibhi eki baakoli̱ye kini.” Obu aamali̱ye ku̱bu̱gha eki, du̱mbi̱ aaku̱wa.
44008001	Saulo aasi̱i̱ma kwituwa kwa Siteefaano. Ti̱ kilo eki kyonini abaati̱ye Siteefaano oghu, baatandikilʼo kubona-boneli̱ya kimui ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bʼomu Yelusaalemu. Nahabweki bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bakani̱ye baaluka mu Yelusaalemu baaghenda mu byalo byʼomu maadi̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya na ya Samali̱ya, kuuyo bakwenda bonkaha.
44008002	Bhaatu bantu abaali bataayʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kulami̱ya Luhanga baajiika Siteefaano oghu, kandi baalilila kimui haabwa kwituwa kuwe.
44008003	Kandi Saulo aatandikilʼo kilo eki kyonini kulengʼo ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya kimui ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona. Aatandika kutaaha mu manumba ghaabo naakwata na ki̱ku̱bha bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bakali̱ na basaasa naabata mu nkomo.
44008004	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baa Yesu abaalu̱ki̱ye mu Yelusaalemu aba, baatandika kutebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ eghi baalukiiyemu.
44008005	Omui mu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba li̱i̱na liye Fi̱li̱po, aalukila mu tau̱ni̱ ya di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya, aatandika kutebejayo bantu ngoku Yesu aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to.
44008006	Obu bantu bakani̱ye bʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi baaghu̱u̱ye ebi Fi̱li̱po akwete ku̱bu̱gha, kandi mbaabona byakuswekani̱ya ebi akwete kukola, boona beekambila kimui kukwata ebi aabu̱ghagha.
44008007	Aabhingʼo bantu bakani̱ye bi̱li̱mu̱, ti̱ obu byabaagha mbibalu̱ghʼo byatakanganilanagha kimui. Aaki̱li̱yagha balema bakani̱ye abaabaagha banangi̱ye mikono kedha balamaaye maghulu.
44008008	Nahabweki bantu bʼomu Samali̱ya aba baadheedheluwa kimui.
44008009	Bhaatu mu tau̱ni̱ eghi hakaba aliyo musaasa omui li̱i̱na liye Si̱mooni̱. Akaba naamali̱ye bwile bukani̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Samali̱ya eghi, naanakola maaje. Kandi aaghilagha ati ali na bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱.
44008010	Ti̱ bantu bʼomu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya eghi, boona mwana na mukulu, baamu̱tegheeleli̱yagha bhyani, kandi banji baaghilagha bati, “Musaasa oghu ali na bu̱toki̱ bwa Luhanga obu bakughilaghamu ‘Bwamaani̱.’ ”
44008011	Bantu bakani̱ye baamu̱hu̱ti̱li̱ya kimui haabwa kumala bwile bukani̱ye naakola maaje.
44008012	Bhaatu obu Fi̱li̱po aatebi̱i̱je bantu aba Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga, kandi haa li̱i̱na lya Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, baahi̱ki̱li̱ja. Ti̱ abaahi̱ki̱li̱jagha boona, bakali̱ na basaasa, Fi̱li̱po aababati̱jagha.
44008013	Na Si̱mooni̱ oghu aakolagha maaje aahi̱ki̱li̱ja, du̱mbi̱ Fi̱li̱po aamubati̱ja. Ti̱ taatodhi̱ye aahila Fi̱li̱po oghu kaghele, nanga byakuswekani̱ya ebi Fi̱li̱po aakolagha byaswekani̱li̱yagha kimui Si̱mooni̱ oghu.
44008014	Niibuwo bantu baaghambiiye bakwenda abaati̱ghaaye Yelusaalemu ngoku bantu bakani̱ye bʼomu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya bakwete ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kighambo kya Luhanga, nahabweki bakwenda aba baatumayo Peetelo na Yohaana.
44008015	Obu bakwenda aba baaki̱dhi̱ye mu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya, baasabila bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bahyaka aba, niikuwo Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye abaasʼo.
44008016	Nanga Fi̱li̱po akaba naababati̱i̱je kwonkaha haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Mukama Yesu, bhaatu taaliyo nʼomui oghu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aali naasi̱yʼo.
44008017	Nahabweki Peetelo na Yohaana baatʼo bu̱li̱ mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja mikono kandi aatunga Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
44008018	Obu Si̱mooni̱ aamani̱ye ngoku Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akwete kwisʼo bantu aba haabwa bakwenda babili aba kubatʼo mikono, aabaleetela sente,
44008019	aabaghila ati, “Nanje mumpe dhee bu̱toki̱ obu, niikuwo oghu ndataaghʼo mikono atungaghe Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
44008020	Peetelo aamukuukamu ati, “Luhanga akukukuba mu mulilo ohwelekeelele na sente syawe esi. Nanga waasobeleei̱ye kimui kweli̱li̱kana oti okugubha kughula kisembo kya Luhanga na sente.
44008021	Tootulimu, kandi tooli ki̱twi̱ke kya bu̱heeleli̱ya buni, nanga Luhanga amani̱ye ngoku okwete kweli̱li̱kana bintu bibhihiiye kimui.
44008022	Nahabweki, weekuukemu bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi okwete kweli̱li̱kana ebi, kandi osabe nuweesengeleli̱ya Mukama kukughanila, nanga naabbali̱ye akukughanila.
44008023	Nkimani̱ye ngoku otukwatiluuwe etima lisaalukaane, nanga tooli na kintu kinji eki okukolagha, kuuyʼo ku̱si̱i̱sa kwonkaha.”
44008024	Si̱mooni̱ oghu aaghila Peetelo na Yohaana ati, “Gutu, munsabile ewaa Mukama mu̱mwesengeleli̱ye niikuwo atampa kifubilo mwaghambi̱ye eki.”
44008025	Haanu̱ma ya Peetelo na Yohaana kughambila bantu baa Samali̱ya aba kighambo kya Mukama, baakuuka Yelusaalemu. Mbanaghenda, baasaalila mu mi̱bhi̱li̱ ekani̱ye yʼomu di̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Samali̱ya eghi, mbanatebeja bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga.
44008026	Kilo kimui malai̱ka wa Mukama aaghila Fi̱li̱po ati, “Weeteekani̱je ohone mu luguudhe olu̱honi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha Yelusaalemu kughenda Gaja.” (Luguudhe olu lukaba lusaaliiye mu elungu hambali bantu bakee baakaaye.)
44008027	Nahabweki Fi̱li̱po aaghenda mu luguudhe olu. Aasangaanamu musaasa oghu akaba alu̱ghi̱ye mu ehanga lya Eti̱yopi̱ya. Musaasa oghu akaba ali mu̱koli̱ bahu̱ti̱i̱ye mu ehanga eli. Niiye akaba aloleleeye buguudha bwona bwa mukama wabukali̱ wʼehanga eli, oghu mu mu̱bu̱ghe ghwabo baamulukagha ki̱ku̱ghi̱yo kya Kandake. Musaasa oghu akaba aghendi̱ye Yelusaalemu kulami̱ya Luhanga.
44008028	Bwile obu aakuukagha ewaabo asitami̱ye mu ekyamuheekagha bisolo mbikibhula. Aasomagha kicweka mu kitabo eki mulangi̱ I̱saaya aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye.
44008029	Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aaghila Fi̱li̱po oghu ati, “Weebinge eki̱heeki̱ye musaasa oghu kandi ookale haai-haai naye.”
44008030	Niibuwo Fi̱li̱po eebi̱ngi̱ye eki̱heeki̱ye musaasa oghu. Aaghu̱wa naasoma mu kitabo eki mulangi̱ I̱saaya aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye. Aamu̱bu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Ebi okwete kusoma ebi niibuwo waabyetegheeleli̱ya?”
44008031	Musaasa oghu aamukuukamu ati, “Muntu atabinsobolooye tankugubha ku̱byetegheeleli̱ya bbaa!” Niibuwo aaghi̱li̱ye Fi̱li̱po ati, “Gutu oni̱i̱ne, onsitame haai-haai tughende hamui.” Fi̱li̱po aasi̱i̱ma.
44008032	Ki̱twi̱ke eki musaasa oghu aasomagha kyaghilagha kiti: “Balimutwala kumwita ngoku bakutwalagha kitunguwa kukiita. Taalitongana noobu balimubona-boneli̱ya kimui kandi bamwite. Nanga aliba nga kyana kya ntaama ekitaakutakagha mbakisala.
44008033	Balimwambulila kimui kandi tabalimutwalikani̱ya kusemeeye mamutongani̱ya. Taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu aligubha ku̱bu̱ghʼo ebikwetʼo lu̱byalo luwe, nanga balimwita atakabaaye na mwana munsi.”
44008034	Niibuwo musaasa oghu aabu̱u̱i̱ye Fi̱li̱po ati, “Mulangi̱ oghu akahandiika bighambo bini aabu̱ghaghʼo ani̱? Eebu̱ghaghʼo eenini, kedha aabu̱ghaghʼo muntu onji?”
44008035	Nahabweki Fi̱li̱po aatandika kumusoboolola ebi ki̱twi̱ke eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya. Kandi eeyongela kumutebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Yesu.
44008036	Mbanaghenda mu luguudhe olu, baahi̱ka hambali maasi ghali haakpengbu̱ ya luguudhe olu. Musaasa oghu aaghila Fi̱li̱po ati, “Olole maasi ngali̱, gutu ombati̱je!” [
44008037	Fi̱li̱po aamughila ati, “Nuwaahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je kwonini Yesu tamboone ekikuleka otabati̱i̱ji̱buwa.” Musaasa oghu aakuukamu Fi̱li̱po ati, “Nahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je ngoku Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to ali Mwana wa Luhanga.”]
44008038	Musaasa oghu aalaghila oghu aafugagha ekyamuheekagha kwemi̱li̱li̱ya bisolo ebyakibhulagha. Bombi baaki̱lu̱ghamu, baakota mu maasi agha, du̱mbi̱ Fi̱li̱po aamubati̱ja.
44008039	Obu baanalu̱ghagha mu maasi agha, Mwoyo wa Mukama aabeedungiliisani̱ya, aatwala Fi̱li̱po mu ki̱i̱kalo kinji. Ti̱ musaasa oghu taatodhi̱ye abona Fi̱li̱po, bhaatu aaghenda adheedheeu̱we.
44008040	Fi̱li̱po eesanga ali mu tau̱ni̱ ya Ajoti̱. Obu aanasaalilagha mu kyalo eki, aakala naanatebeja bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga mu tau̱ni̱ syona esili haagati ya tau̱ni̱ ya Ajoti̱ na ya Kai̱saali̱ya. Aaki̱dhi̱la kimui mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kai̱saali̱ya.
44009001	Bwile obu Saulo aakala naanabu̱gha ati akubona-boneli̱ya kimui kandi aate beeghesebuwa baa Mukama. Nahabweki aaghenda ewaa Mukulu wa bahongi̱ boona,
44009002	aamusaba kumuha bbaluwa. Bbaluwa esi si̱mu̱si̱i̱mi̱lani̱ye kughenda mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya aghali mu tau̱ni̱ ya Damasiko, kukwata na ki̱ku̱bha kandi kutwala Yelusaalemu, bakali̱ na basaasa abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Mukama, aba akusangayo.
44009003	Obu Saulo oghu aaneebingagha tau̱ni̱ ya Damasiko eghi, kyeleeli̱ kyamaani̱ kyalu̱gha eghulu, kyamwedungilisani̱ya, kyamubbyokela.
44009004	Du̱mbi̱ eegenga hansi, aaghu̱wa muntu naamughila ati, “Saulo! Saulo! Okwete kumbona-boni̱ya otiyo nangaaki?”
44009005	Saulo aabu̱u̱li̱ya ati, “Nuuwe ani̱ Mukama wanje?” Muntu oghu aakuukamu ati, “Ni̱i̱si̱ye Yesu, oghu okwete kubona-boni̱ya.
44009006	Bhaatu oomuke oghende mu tau̱ni̱ ya Damasiko eghi, muntu akukughambilayo ebi nkubbala okole.”
44009007	Aba Saulo aabaagha nabo beemilila baakala baholeei̱ye bhi̱i̱. Boobaha nanga bakaaghu̱wa elaka lya muntu, bhaatu bataamubona.
44009008	Haakumaliilila Saulo aamuka. Bhaatu obu aabhali̱i̱ye maaso ghaamuughala ataagubha kubona. Nahabweki, abaabaagha naye aba, baamukwata haa mukono, baamutwala mu tau̱ni̱ ya Damasiko eghi.
44009009	Ti̱ aamala bilo bisatu atakaboone, kandi ataakuliya.
44009010	Mu tau̱ni̱ ya Damasiko eghi, hakaba haliyo mweghesebuwa li̱i̱na liye Ananiya. Mukama aamubonekela, aamughila ati, “Ananiya!” Ananiya oghu aakuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, ntegheleei̱ye eki oku̱bu̱gha.”
44009011	Kandi Mukama aamughila ati, “Oghende ewaa Yu̱da haa Luguudhe Lu̱si̱mi̱ye. Obu̱u̱li̱ye muntu kukwoleka musaasa oghu oghoneeyemu, alu̱ghi̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Taluso li̱i̱na liye niiye Saulo, kandi endindi niibuwo aasaba.
44009012	Abonekeeuwe uwe Ananiya nʼomwisʼo, kandi noomutʼo mikono niikuwo agubhe kutodha kubona.”
44009013	Bhaatu Ananiya aakuukamu ati, “Mukama wanje, bantu bakani̱ye niibuwo baabu̱ghʼo musaasa oghu ngoku akwete kubona-boneli̱ya kimui bantu baawe abali Yelusaalemu.
44009014	Ti̱ nʼendindi bakulu baa bahongi̱, baamu̱tu̱mi̱ye hani kukwata bantu boona abakukulami̱yagha, kubatwala Yelusaalemu kubata mu nkomo.”
44009015	Bhaatu Mukama aaghila Ananiya ati, “Oghende, omu̱hi̱kʼo! Nanga naamu̱komi̱ye ku̱mpeeleli̱ya naaghambila bantu batali Bayu̱daaya, bakama baabo, hamui na Banai̱saaleeli̱ ebinkwetʼo.
44009016	Si̱ye nkuleka eetegheeleli̱ye ngoku akubona-bona haabwa kuba mu̱heeleli̱ya wanje.”
44009017	Nahabweki Ananiya aaghenda hambali Saulo aghooneeye. Obu aamuboone du̱mbi̱ aamukwatʼo, aamughila ati, “Wamaaha Saulo, Mukama Yesu oghu waaboone mu luguudhe noonaasa hani niiye antu̱mi̱ye, niikuwo otodhe obone kandi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akwisʼo.”
44009018	Du̱mbi̱ bintu bi̱su̱si̱ye nga bi̱ku̱ku̱ bya nsu̱i̱ byamu̱lu̱gha mu maaso byalaghalika, du̱mbi̱ maaso ghaamuughulika. Aabona bbeni̱-bbeni̱. Aamuka, Ananiya aamubati̱ja.
44009019	Saulo oghu aaliya, du̱mbi̱ aatodha aatunga maani̱. Saulo aamala bwile anali na beeghesebuwa bʼomu Damasiko.
44009020	Du̱mbi̱ aatandika kughenda mu malami̱li̱yo ghaa Bayu̱daaya naatebeja bantu ati, “Yesu ni Mwana wa Luhanga.”
44009021	Ti̱ boona abaaghu̱u̱ye naatebeja atiyo, baasweka, baaghilana bati, “Musaasa oghu bhaaba niiye aaboona-boneli̱yagha kimui bantu bʼomu Yelusaalemu abaalami̱yagha Yesu. Kandi bantu bakwete kughila bati kighendeleluwa ekyaleki̱ye aasa hani ni kukwata bantu abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Yesu kubatwala Yelusaalemu bali banyankomo, niikuwo bakulu baa bahongi̱ babatwi̱le musango.”
44009022	Bhaatu Saulo eeyongela kutebeja Bayu̱daaya abaabagha mu Damasiko aba, kandi kubooleka ngoku Yesu aaniiye Ki̱li̱si̱to. Nahabweki Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha mu Damasiko tabaagu̱bhi̱ye ku̱mu̱si̱nga mu mulingo ghwona.
44009023	Haanu̱ma ya Saulo kumala bilo bikani̱ye mu Damasiko, Bayu̱daaya baayo baahanuula kumwita.
44009024	Niibuwo bantu baaghambiiye Saulo ngoku Bayu̱daaya aba bakubbala kumwita. Ti̱ bu̱li̱ kilo Bayu̱daaya aba beesalagha kandi baalaalagha bali̱ndi̱ye haa maalembo ghaa tau̱ni̱ eghi, niikuwo mbaaboone Saulo oghu bamwite.
44009025	Haanu̱ma ya Saulo kughambila aba aakooneeye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, kilo kimui mukilo baamutwala haa lugho lwa mabaale lukangami̱ye olwabaagha lweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye tau̱ni̱ eghi. Baaboha mighuwo haa kighegha kiinamu̱li̱to, baamu̱koti̱yamu, baamukwami̱ya mu kihulu ekyabaagha haa lugho olu, baamu̱su̱ndu̱ki̱ya luhande lwʼeli̱ lwa lugho olu.
44009026	Obu Saulo aaki̱dhi̱ye e Yelusaalemu, aalengʼo kutandika kuukala na beeghesebuwa baayo. Bhaatu baakala banamwobahi̱ye bati akubakwata, nanga baakalagha mbaneeli̱li̱kana bati taahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je kwonini Yesu.
44009027	Niibuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja omui li̱i̱na liye Balanaba aakooneeye Saulo oghu, aamwanjula mu bakwenda. Aabasoboolola ngoku Saulo aaboone Mukama Yesu obu Saulo oghu aaghendagha e Damasiko. Kandi ngoku Mukama oghu aabu̱ghi̱ye naye. Balanaba aatodha aabaghambila ngoku Saulo aatebi̱i̱je bantu bʼomu Damasiko ebikwetʼo Yesu atoobahi̱ye muntu nʼomui.
44009028	Niibuwo Saulo aatandi̱ki̱ye kuukala na bakwenda hamui na bahi̱ki̱li̱ja banji boona mu Yelusaalemu. Kandi aatandika kutebeja bantu ebikwetʼo Mukama atoobahi̱ye muntu nʼomui.
44009029	Saulo oghu aakalagha nahakangana na Bayu̱daaya abaabu̱ghagha Lu̱gi̱li̱ki̱ haa ebikwetʼo Yesu, kandi aahakanganagha nabo ku̱lu̱gha mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we. Du̱mbi̱ baatandika kweli̱li̱kana mulingo ghwa kumwitilamu.
44009030	Obu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baamani̱ye ngu Bayu̱daaya niibuwo baategheka kwita Saulo, bamui mu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba baamutwala mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kai̱saali̱ya. Baamuteelʼo ntegheka, aani̱i̱na bwati̱ buunamu̱li̱to, aaghenda Taluso ewaabo.
44009031	Nahabweki Bayu̱daaya baaleka kuhiighani̱ja ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja. Bi̱bbu̱la bya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja abaabaagha baakaaye mu byalo bya maadi̱si̱tu̱li̱ki̱ti̱ ya Bu̱yu̱daaya, Galilaaya, na ya Samali̱ya dhaani baateekaana kandi beeyongela kukana. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aabagu̱mi̱ya mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo kandi aabeekambi̱i̱si̱ya kuukala banahu̱ti̱li̱i̱ye kimui Mukama.
44009032	Obu Peetelo aanaghendagha mu bi̱i̱kalo bikani̱ye kubungila bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, aaghenda kubungila bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Liida.
44009033	Aasangayo musaasa li̱i̱na liye Aineeya. Musaasa oghu taagubhagha kulubhatanga nanga akaba alamaaye maghulu, kandi akaba naamali̱ye myaka munaanaa ataakuumuka haa bulili.
44009034	Peetelo aamughila ati, “Aineeya, Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to aku̱ku̱ki̱li̱ya endindi! Oomuke, oku̱ne mukeka ghwawe.” Aineeya oghu aakililʼo du̱mbi̱ aamuka.
44009035	Haanu̱ma ya Mukama Yesu ku̱ki̱li̱ya Aineeya oghu, bantu bakani̱ye bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Liida na kyalo kya Salooni̱, baamubona aki̱li̱ye kandi bahi̱ki̱li̱ja Mukama Yesu.
44009036	Mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa akaba aliyo mweghesebuwa omui wa bukali̱ li̱i̱na liye Taabiita (eli mu Lu̱gi̱li̱ki̱ baaghilaghamu Dooli̱ka). Mukali̱ oghu aakalagha naakolela bantu bintu bilungi kandi aakoonelagha banaku abaha bintu.
44009037	Obu Peetelo aanabaagha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Liida, mukali̱ oghu aalwala, kandi aaku̱wa. Bamui mu bakali̱ bʼomu tau̱ni̱ eghi baanaabi̱ya mu̱ku̱ ghuwe kusighikila mu mi̱ghendi̱yo ya Ki̱yu̱daaya, niikuwo bantu baghujiike. Du̱mbi̱ bakali̱ aba baaghuboha mu si̱i̱ti̱, baaghuta haa di̱i̱lo mu kisiika kya kai̱na yaakabili.
44009038	Tau̱ni̱ ya Liida eghi ekaba eli haai na tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa. Nahabweki, obu beeghesebuwa baaghu̱u̱ye ngoku Peetelo aliyeyo, baatuma babili mu baanakyabo, ku̱mwesengeleli̱ya bati, “Gutu wiise bwangu, tughende naawe ewaatu.”
44009039	Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aaghenda nabo e Yopa. Obu baaki̱dhi̱yeyo, baamutwala mu kisiika kya kai̱na yaakabili. Bakwi̱si̱ya boona abaabaaghamu obu baaboone Peetelo, baamilila baamweli̱ghi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, baatandika kulilila kimui mbanamwoleka ngoye esi Dooli̱ka oghu aabasoneeye anaakaaye.
44009040	Peetelo aabatwesi̱ya boona mu kisiika eki. Du̱mbi̱ aateeli̱ya, aatandika kusaba. Haanu̱ma yʼeki, aahinduka hambali mu̱ku̱ oghu ghuli, aaghila ati, “Taabiita, oomuke!” Du̱mbi̱ aabhali̱ya. Obu aaboone Peetelo, aamuka.
44009041	Peetelo aamukwata haa mukono, aamu̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya. Du̱mbi̱ aabilikila bahi̱ki̱li̱ja hamui na bakwi̱si̱ya, aabooleka Taabiita aakaaye.
44009042	Obu bantu bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa baaghu̱u̱ye kyakuswekani̱ya ekyabaayo eki, bakani̱ye baahi̱ki̱li̱ja Mukama.
44009043	Ti̱ Peetelo aamala bilo bikani̱ye mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa, naanalaala mwa Si̱mooni̱ oghu oomeleli̱yagha mpu.
44010001	Mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kai̱saali̱ya akaba aliyo musaasa li̱i̱na liye Koloneeli̱. Akaba ali mukulu wa baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ bʼomu ki̱bbu̱la kyamaani̱ kya I̱tale, kya baasilikale baa Looma.
44010002	Akaba ali musaasa oghu eye na baa ka yee boona baabaagha bahu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga, aahaaghayo na bwenge kukoonela bantu, kandi aakalagha naasaba Luhanga bwile bwona.
44010003	Kilo kimui, saaha mwenda sya ntangaali̱, malai̱ka wa Luhanga aamubonekela, aataaha hambali ali kandi Koloneeli̱ aamubonela kimui bbeni̱-bbeni̱. Malai̱ka oghu aamubilikila ati, “Koloneeli̱!”
44010004	Ti̱ Koloneeli̱ oobaha, kandi aakala aloleleeye malai̱ka oghu, aamughila ati, “Mbiki Mukama wanje?” Malai̱ka oghu aamughila ati, “Kusaba kwawe na kuhaayo kwawe kukoonela bantu Luhanga aabiboone kandi byamu̱dheedhi̱ye.
44010005	Nahabweki endindi otume bantu mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa, bendeleyo musaasa mali̱i̱na ghe Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo.
44010006	Ali mwa Si̱mooni̱ oghu akwomeleli̱yagha mpu. Si̱mooni̱ oghu aakaaye haai-haai na nanja.”
44010007	Obu malai̱ka oghu aaghendi̱ye, du̱mbi̱ Koloneeli̱ aabilikila babili mu baheeleli̱ya be aba eesi̱ghi̱ye, hamui na muusilikale wee omui mu baamulindagha. Muusilikale oghu naye dhee aalami̱yagha Luhanga.
44010008	Aabasoboolola byona ebi malai̱ka aamughambiiye, du̱mbi̱ aabatuma kughenda mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa.
44010009	Ti̱ kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo, saaha mukaagha sya ntangaali̱, basaasa aba Koloneeli̱ aatu̱mi̱ye bakaba bali haai ku̱ki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa. Bwile obu Peetelo aani̱i̱na eghulu haa numba kusaba.
44010010	Haanu̱ma ya bwile bukee njala yaamukwata. Mbanamuteekela, aabonekeluwa.
44010011	Aabona eghulu li̱i̱ghu̱li̱ki̱ye badhodhookeei̱ye nsondo enaa sya kintu ki̱su̱si̱ye nga si̱i̱ti̱ namu̱li̱to mbaki̱su̱ndu̱ki̱ya hansi.
44010012	Kikaba kilimu bisolo bya milingo yoona na bi̱noni̱.
44010013	Niibuwo aaghu̱u̱ye eleka ndimughila ati, “Peetelo oomuke, oote kandi oliye.”
44010014	Bhaatu Peetelo aakuukamu ati, “Bbaa, Mukama wanje! Tankaliyagha kintu kyona kitasemeeye kandi kitangu̱u̱we.”
44010015	Elaka eli lyatodha lyamughila liti, “Kyona eki Luhanga asemeei̱ye, oleke kughila oti ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.”
44010016	Eki kikabʼo milundi esatu, du̱mbi̱ kintu eki baaki̱ku̱u̱ki̱ya mu eghulu.
44010017	Bwile obu bwonini Peetelo anasweki̱ye haabwa eki aaboone, eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya, basaasa aba Koloneeli̱ aatu̱mi̱ye baasa mbabu̱u̱li̱li̱li̱ya hambali numba ya Si̱mooni̱ oghu akwomeleli̱yagha mpu eli. Baaghi̱ki̱dhʼo, beemilila hʼelembo.
44010018	Baabu̱u̱li̱ya bati, “Buuye hani niiyo musaasa bakughilaghamu Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo aghooneeye?”
44010019	Ti̱ bwile obu Peetelo naaneeli̱li̱kanʼo eki aaboone, eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya, Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aamughila ati, “Si̱mooni̱, basaasa basatu baakwete kukubbala.
44010020	Nahabweki oomuke, oghende hambali bali kandi otabhenga kughenda nabo, nanga ni̱i̱si̱ye neenini naabatu̱mi̱ye kukwisila.”
44010021	Niibuwo Peetelo aaghendi̱ye hambali bali, aabaghila ati, “Ni̱i̱syoni mukwete kubbala. Buuye mbiki byaleki̱ye mwasa?”
44010022	Baamukuukamu bati, “Koloneeli̱, mukulu wa ki̱bbu̱la kya baasilikale ki̱ku̱mi̱ baa Looma niiye aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye ewaawe, ni musaasa ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, oghu aku̱hu̱ti̱yagha Luhanga, kandi Bayu̱daaya boona bamu̱hu̱ti̱li̱i̱ye kimui. Luhanga aamutumiiye malai̱ka kumughila ati, atume bakwisile oghende ewe, niikuwo aaghu̱we butumuwa obu okumughambila.”
44010023	Peetelo aasi̱i̱ma kughenda nabo, bhaatu aabaghila ati balaale. Aakeela aaghenda nabo hamui na bamui mu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bʼomu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa.
44010024	Kilo ekyalabhi̱yʼo baaki̱dha mu tau̱ni̱ ya Kai̱saali̱ya. Baasanga Koloneeli̱ abalindiliiye kandi naabilikiiye nganda siye hamui na baabhootu̱ siye kwisa kusangaana Peetelo.
44010025	Peetelo makaki̱dha ati, Koloneeli̱ aamu̱teeli̱ya mu maghulu kumulami̱ya.
44010026	Bhaatu Peetelo aamu̱u̱mu̱ki̱ya, aamughila ati, “Otandami̱ya! Ndi muntu kwonkaha ngaawe.”
44010027	Du̱mbi̱ Peetelo aakala naanabu̱gha naye, baataaha mu numba hambali bantu boona beekumaani̱li̱i̱ye.
44010028	Niibuwo Peetelo aabaghi̱li̱ye ati, “Enu̱we boona mumani̱ye ngoku bilaghilo byatu Bayu̱daaya bitutangi̱ye kuukala naanu nankabha kubungila enu̱we batali Bayu̱daaya. Bhaatu Luhanga anjoleki̱ye ngoku ntabhonganuuwe kughaya kedha kughila nti muntu taasemeeye mu maaso ghe.
44010029	Nahabweki obu mwatu̱mi̱ye bantu kunjisila tanaabhengi̱ye bbaa. Mungambile, ekyaleki̱ye mwambilikila.”
44010030	Niibuwo Koloneeli̱ aabasobolooye ati, “Obwalo byahi̱ka bilo bbinaa; nkaba ndi mwanje, sili saaha mwenda sya ntangaali̱, ninsaba ngoku nkukolagha bu̱li̱ kilo. Neetu̱lakaka musaasa anjimiliiye nga haala alu̱wete ngoye sinjelu dhiyo!
44010031	Angila ati, ‘Koloneeli̱, Luhanga aaghu̱u̱ye kusaba kwawe, kandi aaboone ngoku okukoonelagha banaku.
44010032	Nahabweki obwalo otume bantu baghende mu tau̱ni̱ ya Yopa, bendeleyo musaasa mali̱i̱na ghe Si̱mooni̱ Peetelo. Aghooneeye mwa Si̱mooni̱ oghu akwomeleli̱yagha mpu. Si̱mooni̱ oghu aakaaye haai-haai na nanja.’
