47010013	Etu̱we tatukwesindagha haabwa kintu eki tutahi̱ki̱li̱ji̱bu̱u̱we kwesinda haabwakiyo bbaa. Tukwesinda haabwa mulimo oghu Luhanga aatu̱tu̱mi̱ye kukola, ti̱ naanu muli ki̱twi̱ke kya mulimo oghu.
47010014	Taaniibuwo twesinda kusaalukaane ngʼoghu oti tatwahi̱ki̱ye ewaanu eghi, bhaatu tu̱hi̱ki̱i̱ye nanga ni̱i̱tu̱we twadu̱bhi̱ye kwisa eghi kubatebejʼo Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
47010015	Tatukwesinda kusaalukaane haabwa mulimo ghwa kutebeja oghu bantu banji bakoli̱ye mu ki̱i̱kalo. Ti̱ kunihila kwatu ni ngu, ngoku ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu kukweyongela kukula, mukutukoonela kugbaatikani̱ya mulimo ghwa kutebeja ewaanu eghi,
47010016	niikuwo etu̱we tugubhe kughenda kutebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga mu bi̱i̱kalo binji ebi̱selaanʼo naanu, hambali muntu onji aatakaghendi̱ye kutebeja, niikuwo twepanke haabwa kutebeja hambali muntu onji atakahi̱ki̱ye.
47010017	Nanga kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu, “Oghu akwepanka, oleke eepankile mu Mukama.”
47010018	Ti̱ muntu weena neesi̱ndi̱ye eenini, Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to taakumusinda bbaa, kuuyʼo akusinda oghu eye eenini asi̱i̱mi̱ye.
47011001	Endindi ndi na kunihila nti mu̱ku̱ngu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja nankabha ni̱mweli̱li̱kana muti ebi nku̱bu̱gha mbya budhoma. Eki nkimani̱ye ngoku mukweyongela ku̱ngu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja.
47011002	Neehi̱ghu̱u̱ye kubhi ngoku Luhanga akwehi̱ghu̱wa kubhi haabwanu kwebaghani̱jʼo Ki̱li̱si̱to. Nanga muli nga manaabukali̱ ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye atamani̱ye basaasa, oghu naahaayeyo kusweluwa musaasa omui enkaha, Ki̱li̱si̱to.
47011003	Bhaatu noobai̱ye nti ngoku njoka yaadimaagi̱ye Eeva hambele, naanu bantu bakugubha ku̱bhi̱i̱ya byeli̱li̱kano byanu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, niikuwo muleke kutʼo na nkokolo ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Ki̱li̱si̱to enkaha mu majima kandi mu buusuuye.
47011004	Muntu akaakwisagha eghi nʼabatebejʼo Yesu onji atali oghu twabatebi̱i̱jʼo, kedha haa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye onji atali oghu mwatu̱ngi̱ye, kedha Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga ghanji ghatali agha mwahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, mukumalagha ghasi̱i̱ma bwangu ebi akwete kwegheesi̱ya.
47011005	Bhaatu tankweli̱li̱kana nti aba mukughilaghamu “bakwenda baa Ki̱li̱si̱to bakulu” aba, bansaai̱ye.
47011006	Nsobola kuba ntaatendekeeu̱we ku̱bu̱gha, bhaatu nkwegheesi̱yagha ebi mmani̱ye. Ti̱ eki twalengi̱yʼo kubasoboolola kiyo bbeni̱-bbeni̱ mu bu̱li̱ mulingo ghwona.
47011007	Buuye si̱ye nkasobi̱ya kwebundaali̱ya kandi ku̱hu̱ti̱ya enu̱we haabwa kubatebejela busa Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga?
47011008	Kikaba ngʼoghu oti nkaabha bi̱bbu̱la bya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja mu bi̱i̱kalo binji haabwa sente naatungagha ku̱lu̱gha ewaabo, kukola mulimo ewaanu eghi.
47011009	Ti̱ bwile obu naamali̱ye naanu eghi, naakabaagha nineetaaghisibuwa sente, tanaatalibani̱jagha muntu nʼomu kunkoonela nasiyo bbaa. Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje abaalu̱ghi̱ye mu kyalo kya Makedoni̱ya bakandeetela ebi neetaghisibuwagha. Si̱ye nkeetantala kubabeela kijibu mu mulingo ghwona, ti̱ eki niikiyo nkakweyongela kukola.
47011010	Majima kuwo ngoku ninakweyongela ku̱bu̱gha majima ghaa Ki̱li̱si̱to, taaliyo muntu nʼomui mu kyalo kya Akaaya kyona oghu akuntanga kwesinda nti nkahi̱ki̱ya kutabasaba sente.
47011011	Obu naaghi̱li̱ye nti tankubabeela kijibu kubasaba sente, buuye ni nanga ngu tambaku̱ndi̱ye? Luhanga amani̱ye ngoku mbaku̱ndi̱ye.
47011012	Nkweyongela kutasi̱i̱ma bu̱kooneli̱ bwona bwa sente ku̱lu̱gha ewaanu eghi, niikuwo beegheesi̱ya aba batagubha kwesinda mbaghila bati bakugubha kukolela busa ngʼatu.
47011013	Bantu ngʼaba mbakwenda baa bisubha, mbakoli̱ abatali na majima, bakwefoolagha kuba bakwenda baa Ki̱li̱si̱to haagu̱u̱li̱ kwonkaha.
47011014	Ti̱ eki takinswekani̱i̱ye bbaa, nanga Si̱taani̱ akugubha kwehindula nsusaana yee, asuse malai̱ka oghu ali na kyeleeli̱ kya Luhanga.
47011015	Nahabweki eki kitabaswekani̱ya, kaakuba abaku̱heeleli̱yagha Si̱taani̱ aba beefoola nga baheeleli̱ya abakukolagha bi̱hi̱ki̱ye. Haa mpelo Luhanga alibafubila haabwa ebi bakukolagha.
47011016	Nkutodha kughila nti, muntu weena ateeli̱li̱kana ati ndi mudhoma haabwa kwebu̱ghʼo. Bhaatu nimwaneeli̱li̱kaane mutiyo, mu̱ntegheeleli̱ye ngoku mwangu̱tegheeleli̱ya mudhoma, niikuwo nanje neesindʼo kabhii nga banji.
47011017	Majima ebi nkwete kwebu̱ghʼo nineepanka bini, teeli ngoku Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to angubbali̱ye, bhaatu nkwete ku̱bi̱bu̱gha ndi nga mudhoma.
47011018	Bhaatu ngoku haliyo bakani̱ye abakwete kwesinda haabwa ebi bakoli̱ye, ngoku abatali bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bakwete kwesinda, nanje dhee nkwesinda haabwa ebi nkukolagha.
47011019	Buuye enu̱we bagheji mutiyo, mu̱ku̱si̱i̱magha mu̱ti̱ya kyona eki badhoma batiyo babaghambiiye?
47011020	Enu̱we mukubonagha byona bisemeeye nankabha bantu babalaghila nga bakoli̱ baabo, kedha batwala etunga lyanu, babalema, kedha babawaawaani̱ya.
47011021	Tamu̱hemu̱ki̱ye kweli̱li̱kana muti etu̱we tukaba baceke, kutabatwalikani̱ya ngoku aba bakubatwalikani̱yagha? Nahabweki nanje nguli naabaagha ndi mudhoma, nangwesi̱ndi̱ye ngabo haabwa ebikulekagha beesinda.
47011022	Balaba mbesinda haabwa kuba Bahebbulaayo, nanje dhee ndi Muhebbulaayo. Balaba bali Banai̱saaleeli̱, nanje dhee ndi Munai̱saaleeli̱. Balaba mbesinda haabwa kuba baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, nanje dhee ndi muusukulu wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ dhee.
47011023	Balaba mbesinda bati mbaheeleli̱ya baa Ki̱li̱si̱to, si̱ye nsaai̱yʼo, kandi batangila bati nguuye esi̱le ku̱bu̱gha eki. Nkoleeye kwonini Ki̱li̱si̱to, bankwete mu nkomo milundi ekani̱ye haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to, bampuuye kwonini haabuwe, kandi baabbali̱ye kunjita haabuwe.
47011024	Bayu̱daaya bakampuula bibbooko bya minuwa milundi kataano, ti̱ bu̱li̱ mulundi bampuulagha bibbooko maku̱mi̱ asatu na mwenda.
47011025	Balooma bampuuye mbooko milundi kasatu, bwile bumui bantu bakampuula mabaale kunjita. Nantu̱ngi̱ye bijibu bya maati̱ ghaanamu̱li̱to asatu kwatika haa nanja ngalimu, ti̱ naalaaye kandi neesala mu nanja,
47011026	kandi naabu̱ngi̱ye kukani̱ye haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to. Mu kubunga oku, naatu̱ngi̱ye bijibu mu kulengʼo kubhasuka maasi, baji̱ndi̱ baabbala kunjita, Bayu̱daaya baanakyanje boonini baabbala kunjita, batali Bayu̱daaya baabbala kunjita, bantu banji bambona-boni̱ya mu bibugha nʼomu byalo, naatu̱ngi̱ye bijibu haa nanja, kandi naatu̱ngi̱ye bijibu mu abakweyetagha bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje.
47011027	Naakolagha kwonini, ntalibana kwonini kandi milundi ekani̱ye naalaalagha ntaghwesaghiiye. Njala yankwatagha kandi eliyo linkwata, bunji nʼobunji byokuliya bimbula. Mpeu yankwatagha nanga kutaba na ngoye sya ku̱lu̱waala ku̱ntu̱u̱mi̱ya.
47011028	Takili eki kyonkaha bbaa, bu̱li̱ kilo naabaagha na bwile butimbiikaane kwebembela bi̱bbu̱la bya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja byona.
47011029	Buuye ni ani̱ oghu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kuwe kukucekagha nanje niikala ntaceki̱ye haabwa kumweyungilila? Ni mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ki oghu bakulekagha asi̱i̱sa niikala mutima ghutansaaliiye munda?
47011030	Ninaabaaye nindaghiluwa kwepanka, nkwepankila mu bintu ebyoleki̱ye buceke bwanje.
47011031	Luhanga kandi Ese Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, oghu bantu babhonganuuwe kusinda bilo nʼebilo, amani̱ye ngoku ntakwete kuha bisubha.
47011032	Mu kibugha kya Damasiko, mu̱lemi̱ oghu mukama baaghilaghamu Alitaayo aabaagha ataayʼo kulema ki̱twi̱ke kya bukama buwe eki, aalaghila baasilikale be kulinda milyango ya kibugha eki niikuwo bankwate.
47011033	Bhaatu bamui mu bantu baayo bankoti̱ya mu kighegha kiinamu̱li̱to, bankwami̱li̱ya mu di̱li̱sa lya lugho olweli̱ghi̱li̱i̱ye kibugha eki bansu̱ndu̱ki̱ya enja yakiyo naaluka.
47012001	Nankabha mutaku̱nsi̱i̱ma nga mukwenda wa Ki̱li̱si̱to, nkulaghiluwa kweyongela kwesinda. Nankabha ntali nʼeki nkutungʼo, nkubaghambilʼo ebi Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to aaleki̱ye naabonekeluwa kandi nʼebi ansu̱u̱ku̱li̱i̱ye.
47012002	Nimani̱ye musaasa ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to, oghu myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼenaa ehooyʼo, oghu akatwaluwa mu eghulu. Alaba naatwahuweyo mu mubili kedha mu mwoyo, si̱ye tanimani̱ye. Luhanga niiye amani̱ye.
47012003	Nkutodha kughila nti, Luhanga alaba naamutwete mu mubili kedha atali mu mubili, Luhanga niiye amani̱ye. Eki nimani̱ye,
47012004	ni ngu akatwaluwa mu ki̱i̱kalo kya Luhanga kisemeleeye kimui, ti̱ Luhanga amughambilayo bintu ebi muntu ataakugubha kusoboolola, kandi ebi muntu atasi̱i̱mi̱lanu̱u̱we ku̱bu̱gha nanga mbyakuswekani̱ya munu bantu ku̱bi̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
47012005	Nangwesinda ku̱bu̱ghʼo ekyabaayʼo musaasa ngʼoghu, bhaatu etali haabwanje nenkaha, nkwesinda haabwa bintu ebikulekagha bantu bambona buceke.
47012006	Nankabha ntu̱wamu kwesinda, tankuba ndi mudhoma bbaa, nanga nkuba ni̱mbu̱gha majima. Bhaatu tankwesinda, nanga tambbali̱ye ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye ni̱neegheesi̱ya nʼebi muboone ninkola, bileke bantu baneeli̱li̱kanʼo kusaali̱ya ngoku kibhonganuuwe.
47012007	Haanu̱ma ya Luhanga kumala kunjoleka byaku̱su̱u̱ku̱lu̱lu̱wa byamaani̱ ebi byona mu eghulu, ampa kijibu kyamaani̱ kya bulwaye obwambona-boneei̱ye ngoku ehuwa likusaalilagha muntu li̱mu̱tu̱bhi̱ti̱ye. Akakola eki kuntanga kwesinda haabwa ebi anjoleki̱ye ebi byona. Si̱taani̱ aabbalagha ku̱koleesi̱ya bulwaye obu kumbona-boni̱ya.
47012008	Nkasaba Mukama milundi esatu nti anjiyʼo kubona-bona oku.
47012009	Bhaatu bu̱li̱ mulundi ankuukaghamu ati, “Tankukuuyʼo bulwaye obu, bhaatu eki okwetaaghisibuwa ni̱i̱si̱ye kukughilila ngughuma, nanga nuwaabaaye oli muceke niibuwo nkukukoonela.” Nahabweki, nkwesinda ku̱bu̱ghʼo bintu ebinkufoola muceke, niikuwo bantu babone ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to aaniiye akumpaagha maani̱ ghaa ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya.
47012010	Eki niikiyo kikulekagha haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to ndheedhuwa, mu buceke, bantu kumbbaaki̱i̱si̱ya, mu bijibu, bantu kumpighani̱ja kandi kubona-bona. Nanga nkakubaagha ndi muceke obu niibuwo Ki̱li̱si̱to akumpaagha maani̱.
47012011	Neefooye nga mudhoma kwebu̱ghʼo nineesinda ntiyo, bhaatu ni̱i̱nu̱we mwampambi̱li̱i̱je kwebu̱ghʼo ntiyo. Ni̱i̱nu̱we mwabaagha mubhonganuuwe kunsinda mutiyo, nankabha ni̱mu̱kweli̱li̱kanagha muti tandi na mughaso, aba mukughilaghamu “bakwenda baa Ki̱li̱si̱to bakulu” aba tabansaai̱ye bbaa.
47012012	Obu naanabaagha naanu eghi, nkagu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja kandi naakolagha bwakulolelo na byakuswekani̱ya kwoleka ngoku ndi mukwenda kwonini wa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
47012013	Eki ntakoli̱ye eghi ni kughila nti munsaghike, ngoku nkukolagha mu bi̱bbu̱la bya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja binji. Mukaakuba ni̱mweli̱li̱kana muti nkasobi̱ya, munganile!
47012014	Neeteekani̱i̱je kwisa kubalolʼo mulundi ghwakasatu, tankubabeela kijibu nanga tankwisa kughila nti mumpe bintu byanu, nkubbala ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu kugume. Mumani̱ye ngoku baana batabhonganuuwe kuteghekela babyaye baabo, bhaatu babyaye bali na kuloleelela baana baabo. Si̱ye Paulo ndi nga mubyaye waanu, nkubakola ntiyo.
47012015	Nahabweki na kudheedhuwa kukani̱ye, nkweheelayo kimui kandi mpeyo koona aka nkali nako haabwanu. Buuye si̱ye kubakunda bhyani, kikuleka enu̱we munkunde kukee?
47012016	Mumani̱ye ngoku ntaghi̱li̱ye nti mumpe sente syʼebi neetaghisibuwagha. Bhaatu bantu bakughilagha bati, nkabaayʼo enu̱we sente mu magheji kandi mu mulingo ghwa kubasoona-soona.
47012017	Buuye bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje aba nkutumagha eghi haliyo oghu ebo baahi̱yʼo sente mu mulingo ghutahi̱ki̱ye kusindeetela?
47012018	Obu naatu̱mi̱ye Ti̱to na mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja muunakyatu oli̱ onji oghu mumani̱ye, buuye bakabakumaani̱yamu eghi sente? Tamumani̱ye ngoku si̱ye hamui na Ti̱to twakolagha eghi bintu bisusaane kandi tuli na kighendeleluwa kimui?
47012019	Kedha niibuwo mweli̱li̱kana muti bwile obu bwona tukwete kwetonganiilila ewaanu tuti tatuli nʼeki tu̱sobeei̱ye! Twabu̱ghagha bintu ebi mu majima mu maaso ghaa Luhanga haabwatu kulungana na Ki̱li̱si̱to. Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, ebi twakoli̱ye byona bikaba haabwa kubagu̱mi̱ya mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu, enu̱we aba tu̱ku̱ndi̱ye.
47012020	Eki neeyungiliiye ni ngu ninaasi̱ye eghi nsobola kusanga banji bataakwetwalikani̱ya ngoku nkubbala bahi̱ki̱li̱ja kwetwalikani̱ya. Nkakubasanga ntiyo nkusaaliluwa kandi mbafubile ngoku mutangubbali̱ye nkole. Ti̱ neeyu̱ngi̱ye nti ninaasi̱ye eghi, nsobola kusanga muusuuye ntongani̱, etima, ki̱i̱ni̱gha kihingulaane, bu̱li̱ omui ali haa kwebbalila biye, ni̱mu̱bu̱ghanganʼo kubhi, muli na lughambo, muli na myepanko ebhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi mutateekaane.
47012021	Neeyu̱ngi̱ye nti ninaatodhi̱ye kwisa eghi, Luhanga akuleka ni̱i̱ghu̱we mpemu̱ki̱ye mu maaso ghaanu. Nkutuntula haabwa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bakani̱ye abanabhengi̱ye kwekuukamu bibhi byabo bya kwebhi̱i̱ya bya bu̱syani̱ na kweghomba kwakitiyo-kitiyo ebi banakwete kukola.
47013001	Ghuni ghukuba mulundi ghwanje ghwakasatu kubabungila. Haliyo hambali Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Bu̱li̱ musango ghukulaghiluwa kuba na baakai̱so babili kedha basatu.”
47013002	Obu naasi̱ye eghi mulundi ghwakabili kubalola, nkateelelela enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona ngoku nkufubila boona abakwete kukola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye. Endindi ngoku ntali eghi ndimatodha kukikuukamu nti, nkaakutodha kwisa eghi nkufubila bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona abaasi̱i̱si̱ye, nʼabakwete ku̱si̱i̱sa.
47013003	Kubafubila oghu kukwoleka ngoku ebi nku̱bu̱ghagha ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to aaniiye akubimpaagha, ti̱ Ki̱li̱si̱to taakubaagha muceke mafubila abakukolagha bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, bhaatu akubafubilagha kwonini.
47013004	Majima Ki̱li̱si̱to akajooka nga muceke obu baamubambagha haa musalaba, bhaatu endindi ni mwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwa maani̱ ghaa Luhanga. Niikiyo kimui naatu dhee endindi twelungani̱i̱ye na Ki̱li̱si̱to mu buceke, bhaatu haabwa maani̱ ghaa Luhanga tukuba boomi̱i̱li̱ hamui naye kandi tu̱heeleli̱ye enu̱we.
47013005	Mweli̱li̱kane bhyani kulola majima mulakaba mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je kuwo. Mweli̱li̱kane majima Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to alaba ali mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu. Kitali eki kilengeso kikuba kibasi̱ngi̱ye.
47013006	Nkunihila eki kikuleka mumanye ngoku tutaasaaghu̱u̱we kuba bakwenda boonini baa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
47013007	Tukubasabilagha Luhanga tuti abagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱ye kutakola kintu kyona ki̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye. Tatukusabagha tutiyo niikuwo enu̱we mutusinde, bhaatu niikuwo mugubhe kukola ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye nankabha banji mbakughilagha bati tatuli bakwenda.
47013008	Tatukukolagha kintu kyona ekukuhakani̱ya majima agha tu̱kwegheesi̱yagha, bhaatu tu̱kwegheesi̱yagha majima ghonkaha.
47013009	Nankabha etu̱we tuceka tukubasabilagha enu̱we kuguma mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu; kandi tukubasabilagha tuti mweyongele kukola ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye.
47013010	Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naabahandiikila bintu ebi ntakaasi̱ye, niikuwo ninaasi̱ye eghi, ntakoleesi̱ya nsakaaye bu̱toki̱ obu Mukama ampaaye. Bu̱toki̱ obu akabumpa ku̱gu̱mi̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu etali kubaku̱u̱ki̱li̱li̱ya.
47013011	Kyokumaliilila bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, ndimabalagha nti mwesalʼo. Mweyongele kukola ebi̱hi̱ki̱ye, mu̱u̱ghu̱we ebi naabahanuliiye, mu̱u̱ghu̱wane kandi muukale hamui mpempa. Ti̱ Luhanga oghu aasuuye kukunda akubaha mpempa yonkaha.
47013012	Mulamukangani̱yaghe nga bahi̱ki̱li̱ja nimughuwana mu ki̱ku̱bha.
47013013	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanu boona eni mbabakeeli̱ya.
47013014	Ngughuma sya Mukama Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, kukunda kwa Luhanga Eseetu̱we, na kulungani̱ya kwa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, biikale naanu enu̱we boona.
48001001	Si̱ye Paulo, mukwenda oghu bantu bataakomi̱ye kandi oghu muntu nʼomui ataatu̱mi̱ye kuba mukwenda, bhaatu oghu Mukama Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to na Luhanga Eseetu̱we oghu akahu̱mbu̱u̱la Ki̱li̱si̱to mu baku̱u̱ye baakomi̱ye kuba mukwenda.
48001002	Ndi hamui na ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyatu boona abali eni, ti̱ ni̱i̱si̱ye naabahandiikila bbaluwa eni enu̱we bi̱bbu̱la bya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona abali mu maatau̱ni̱ ghʼomu kyalo kya Galati̱ya.
48001003	Luhanga Eseetu̱we na Mukama Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to babaghilile ngughuma kandi babahe mpempa yonkaha.
48001004	Ki̱li̱si̱to akeehayo kumwita niikuwo atucungule ku̱lu̱gha mu bibhi byatu, kandi kutujuna nsi ya bibhi eni. Akakikola kusighikila haa kubbala kwa Luhanga waatu kandi Eseetu̱we.
48001005	Luhanga oghu bantu bamuhe ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa bilo nʼebilo. Aami̱i̱na.
48001006	Nsweki̱ye ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ngu mwatandi̱ki̱ye bwangu ku̱lu̱ghʼo Luhanga oghu akaleka mwahi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to haabwa ngughuma esi Ki̱li̱si̱to aabaghiliiye. Kandi ngu mwatandi̱ki̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja butumuwa bunji obu bantu bakwete kughilamu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga.
48001007	Agha taghali Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga ghaamajima bbaa. Majima ghali ngu haliyo eghi bamui mu bantu abakwete kutabangula byeli̱li̱kano byanu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, kandi niibuwo baalengʼo kugaali̱ya Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48001008	Bhaatu nankabha etu̱we bakwenda kedha malai̱ka wʼomu eghulu abatebeja butumuwa bunji obutali Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaamajima agha twabatebi̱i̱je, oghu Luhanga amufubiilile kimui!
48001009	Ndimatodha kubaghambila ngoku twasangu̱u̱we tubaghambiiye nti: Kaakuba muntu weena aba naabatebeja eghi makulu ghasemeeye ghanji aghatali ghaamajima agha mwahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je, muntu oghu majima Luhanga amufubiilile kimui!
48001010	Buuye niibuwo naalengʼo kuleka bantu mbansi̱i̱ma kedha Luhanga nansi̱i̱ma? Kedha buuye niibuwo naalengʼo kukola ebi̱dheedhi̱ye bantu? Kaakuba niikala nindengʼo kukola ebi̱dheedhi̱ye bantu, nkuba ntali mu̱heeleli̱ya wa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48001011	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje nkubbala mumanye ngu, Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga agha naabatebi̱i̱je, takili kintu eki muntu eekoleeye bbaa.
48001012	Tanaaghatu̱ngi̱ye ku̱lu̱gha ewaa muntu weena, kandi muntu weena taaghanjegheeseei̱ye bbaa; Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to enkaha niiye akaghansu̱u̱ku̱li̱la, aaleka naaghamanya.
48001013	Mumani̱ye ngoku neetwalikani̱yagha obu naanabaagha mu di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya, kandi ngoku naabona-boni̱yagha kwonini ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja kya Luhanga, kandi ngoku naalengaghʼo ku̱ki̱hwelekeeleli̱ya.
48001014	Naalengaghʼo kwekamba kwonini kukwata bya di̱i̱ni̱ ya Ki̱yu̱daaya kusaali̱ya Bayu̱daaya bakani̱ye baagaali syanje, kandi naataaghʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kukwata mi̱ghendi̱yo ya baataata baatu.
48001015	Bhaatu nankabha obu naabaagha ntakabyahuwe, Luhanga akasanguwa ankomi̱ye kukola mulimo ghwa kulangilila butumuwa bwa Ki̱li̱si̱to. Angilila ngughuma,
48001016	kandi ansu̱u̱ku̱li̱la naabona Mwana wee Ki̱li̱si̱to, niikuwo ngubhe kulangilila bantu batali Bayu̱daaya butumuwa obu. Kandi taaliyo muntu nʼomui oghu akabu̱njegheesi̱ya bbaa.
48001017	Tanaaghendi̱ye e Yelusaalemu kwebu̱u̱li̱yʼo abaadu̱bhi̱ye kuba bakwenda si̱ye ntakabaaye mukwenda. Bhaatu du̱mbi̱ naaghenda mu kyalo kya Alebbi̱ya, haanu̱ma naalu̱ghayo naatodha naakuuka mu tau̱ni̱ ya Damasiko.
48001018	Haanu̱ma ya myaka esatu Luhanga anjoleki̱ye butumuwa busemeeye obu, naaghenda e Yelusaalemu kusanga-sangaana na Peetelo, naamala naye bilo eku̱mi̱ na bitaano.
48001019	Ninaliyeyo mukwenda oghu naaboone ni Yakobbo enkaha, mu̱ghenji̱ wa Mukama waatu Yesu.
48001020	Majima Luhanga amani̱ye ngoku ebi nkwete kubahandiikila bini bitali bisubha.
48001021	Haanu̱ma ya ku̱lu̱gha Yelusaalemu naaghenda kulangilila butumuwa obu mu kyalo kya Si̱li̱ya na kyalo kya Ki̱li̱ki̱ya.
48001022	Bi̱bbu̱la bya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baa Ki̱li̱si̱to baa Bu̱yu̱daaya, bakaba batamani̱ye si̱ye bbaa.
48001023	Bakaaghu̱wa kwonkaha mbabaha makulu ngu, “Musaasa Paulo oghu aabona-boni̱yagha etu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baa Ki̱li̱si̱to, endindi niibuwo aatebeja bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye haa Ki̱li̱si̱to kuni aadu̱bhagha kulengʼo ku̱hwelekeeleli̱ya abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to.”
48001024	Ti̱ baasinda Luhanga haabwa kuleka si̱ye ni̱ni̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu.
48002001	Haanu̱ma ya myaka eku̱mi̱ nʼenaa ndu̱ghi̱ye e Yelusaalemu, naatodha naakuuka yo, bwile obu naaghenda na bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, Balanaba na Ti̱to.
48002002	Nkaghendayo nanga Luhanga akaba nanjoleki̱ye ati mbhonganuuwe kughendayo. Obu naaki̱dhi̱yeyo, naasoboolola mu ki̱bi̱so beebembeli̱ baa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bonkaha Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga agha nkwegheesi̱yagha mu bantu batali Bayu̱daaya. Nkakikola haabwa kwobaha nti mughaso ghwa ebi naakoli̱ye nʼebi nkwete kukola ghutakwi̱la busa.
48002003	Ti̱ Ti̱to oghu naabaagha naye bakaba batamusali̱ye haabwa kuba Mu̱gi̱li̱ki̱, bhaatu abakutuhakani̱yagha aba, tabamuhambi̱li̱i̱je bati banamusale bbaa.
48002004	Nkabu̱gha na beebembeli̱ aba mu ki̱bi̱so nanga haabwa bamui mu bantu abeefoolagha kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱ja kuni bali na kighendeleluwa kya kubega ebi tukukolagha haabwa bughabe obu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu aatuhaaye kutakwata bilaghilo bya Ki̱yu̱daaya kandi batufoole basyana baa bilaghilo.
48002005	Tatwategheleei̱ye bantu aba na kati̱i̱ konkaha bbaa. Tukabhenga ebyabo niikuwo majima ghaa Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Ki̱li̱si̱to twabatebi̱i̱je ghagubhe kweyongela kubaghasila.
48002006	Ti̱ abaakujookagha nga beebembeli̱ baa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba, tabali na kyona bongeeye haa butumuwa nkwegheesi̱yagha. Tanfu̱u̱yʼo balaba bali beebembeli̱ kedha bbaa, nanga Luhanga taakusoloolagha bantu naalola ngoku basu̱si̱ye haagu̱u̱li̱.
48002007	Bhaatu beebembeli̱ aba, baamanya ngoku Luhanga ampaaye mulimo ghwa kutebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye mu batali Bayu̱daaya kandi ngoku aatu̱mi̱ye Peetelo kutebeja Bayu̱daaya.
48002008	Ngoku Luhanga aahaaye Peetelo bu̱toki̱ bwa kuba mukwenda kutebeja Bayu̱daaya, niiye dhee akampa mulimo ghwa kukola nga mukwenda kutebeja batali Bayu̱daaya.
48002009	Beebembeli̱ bakulu Yakobbo, Peetelo na Yohaana, baamanya ngoku Luhanga mu ngughuma siye ampaaye mulimo ghwa mbaghani̱ja oghu, baakwata si̱ye hamui na Balanaba mungalo kwoleka ngoku tukwete kutebeja butumuwa bumui. Baasi̱i̱ma ngu si̱ye na Balanaba tughende tutebeje batali Bayu̱daaya, ebo batebeje Bayu̱daaya.
48002010	Baatusaba ngu tubhonganuuwe kweyongela kukoonela banaku, kintu eki naali ntaayʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kukola.
48002011	Ninali mu kibugha kya Anti̱yoki̱ya, obu Peetelo aasi̱ye kubungayo, naamuhakani̱ya bbeni̱-bbeni̱ bantu boona baboone, haabwa ki̱sobi̱ aakoli̱ye.
48002012	Obu bamui mu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baabusaasa aba Yakobbo aatu̱mi̱ye Anti̱yoki̱ya eni baabaagha batakaki̱dhi̱ye, Peetelo aaliyagha hamui na batali Bayu̱daaya. Bhaatu obu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba baaki̱dhi̱ye, aatandika ku̱lu̱ghʼo kandi kwecuwʼo batali Bayu̱daaya aba. Oobaha ati, bahi̱ki̱li̱ja abaaghilagha bantu badu̱bhaghe babasalaghe, bakumusoghosa bati akuukalagha na bantu aba batasali̱ye.
48002013	Na bahi̱ki̱li̱ja banji Bayu̱daaya mu Anti̱yoki̱ya beetwalikani̱ya nga Peetelo oghu mu bu̱ghobi̱ya buwe, ti̱ haabwa bu̱ghobi̱ya bwabo obu baahabi̱i̱si̱ya na Balanaba.
48002014	Obu naaboone batakwamiliiye kwonini majima ghaa Makulu Ghasemeeye haa Ki̱li̱si̱to tu̱kwegheesi̱yagha, naasoghosa Peetelo mu maaso ghaa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona nti, “Peetelo oli Mu̱yu̱daaya, ti̱ otuuye eni niwetwalikani̱ya ngʼatali Mu̱yu̱daaya, tawetwalikani̱yagha nga Mu̱yu̱daaya bbaa. Buuye okugubha oti̱ya kulengʼo kuhambi̱li̱ja batali Bayu̱daaya kukwata mi̱ghendi̱yo ya Ki̱yu̱daaya?”
48002015	Naatodha naamughila nti, “Si̱ye hamui naawe tubyahuwe tuli Bayu̱daaya, tatubyahuwe batali Bayu̱daaya aba Bayu̱daaya bakughilamu ‘basi̱i̱si̱.’ ”
48002016	Bhaatu endindi tumani̱ye ngu Luhanga taakubalagha muntu kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa kukwata bilaghilo, bhaatu haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to. Naatu dhee tukahi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu niikuwo Luhanga atubale kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to etali haabwa kukwata bilaghilo. Nanga taaliyo muntu weena oghu Luhanga akubala kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa kukwata bilaghilo.
48002017	Obu etu̱we Bayu̱daaya twatandi̱ki̱ye kubbala mulingo ghwa kubaluwa kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja mu Ki̱li̱si̱to, tukakisanga ngu tuli basi̱i̱si̱ dhee. Buuye eki kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu Ki̱li̱si̱to niiye akutufoolagha basi̱i̱si̱? Majima kuwo bbaa!
48002018	Kaakuba nkuuka haa mi̱ghendi̱yo ya Ki̱yu̱daaya ya kukwata bilaghilo ebi naaleki̱ye, nkufooka mu̱si̱i̱si̱ haabwa kutakwata bilaghilo ebi.
48002019	Nanga kukwama mu bilaghilo nʼebi bilaghiiye nkaku̱wa, niikuwo ngubhe kuukalʼo haabwa Luhanga.
48002020	Nkabambuwa haa musalaba hamui na Ki̱li̱si̱to, ti̱ taali̱i̱si̱ye ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱, bhaatu Ki̱li̱si̱to niiye ali mwomi̱i̱li̱ muli si̱ye. Kandi bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwa mubili buni obu ndi nabuwo endindi, ndi nabuwo haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Mwana wa Luhanga oghu akankunda kandi aahaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe haabwanje.
48002021	Tankughayagha ngughuma sya Luhanga, nanga muntu kubaluwa kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye nkwabaaye kusighikiiye haa kukwata bilaghilo, Ki̱li̱si̱to akuba naakwi̱li̱i̱ye busa.
48003001	Enu̱we Bagalati̱ya badhoma! Ni ani̱ akabalogha? Nkabaghambila bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngoku Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to baamubambi̱ye haa musalaba.
48003002	Nkubbala kubabu̱u̱li̱ya kintu kimui kyonkaha: Mukatunga Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye kedha haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Makulu Ghasemeeye mwaghu̱u̱ye?
48003003	Muli badhoma mutiyo? Haanu̱ma ya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kubatandi̱ki̱i̱si̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, niibuwo mweli̱li̱kana muti haabwa maani̱ ghaanu mukugubha kweku̱li̱ya mu mwoyo?
48003004	Kubona-bona oku kwona haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to kukubakwi̱la busa? Majima kuwo mukabona-bonela busa?
48003005	Luhanga akubahaagha Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi akola byakuswekani̱ya ewaanu eghi, haabwanu kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye, kedha haabwa butumuwa busemeeye bwa Ki̱li̱si̱to mwaghu̱u̱ye?
48003006	Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we hambele bi̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo Ebbulahi̱mu̱ biti, “Akahi̱ki̱li̱ja Luhanga, ti̱ Luhanga aamubala kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.”
48003007	Nahabweki, mubhonganuuwe kwetegheeleli̱ya ngu boona abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Luhanga nga Ebbulahi̱mu̱, mbaana baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
48003008	Hambele Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikasanguwa bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, Luhanga akubala batali Bayu̱daaya kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja. Aasanguwa alangiliiye Ebbulahi̱mu̱ Makulu Ghasemeeye ati, “Muli uwe niimuwo nkuheela mahanga ghoona mu̱gi̱sa.”
48003009	Nahabweki, kini kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu boona abaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to bakutunga mu̱gi̱sa ngʼoghu Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aatu̱ngi̱ye hambele haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
48003010	Boona abakulengaghʼo kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye baki̱i̱nu̱u̱we, nanga Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikughilagha biti, “Akiinuwe weena oghu ataakukolagha byona ebihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we mu bitabo bya bilaghilo kandi abi̱hi̱ki̱ya.”
48003011	Majima taaliyo muntu oghu Luhanga akubalagha kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye, nanga “Oghu ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akuukalʼo haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.”
48003012	Kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye takisusaane na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja. Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Weena oghu akukola kwonini byona ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye, Luhanga akumuha bwomi̱i̱li̱ haabwabiyo.”
48003013	Ki̱li̱si̱to akatucungula ku̱lu̱gha mu mukiino ghwa kusaaghuwa kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye, ti̱ Ki̱li̱si̱to akafooka mukiino haabwatu, nanga Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikughilagha biti, “Akiinuwe oghu baku̱dhodhooki̱ya haa kiti.”
48003014	Ki̱li̱si̱to akatucungula mu bibhi byatu, niikuwo mu̱gi̱sa oghu Luhanga hambele aahaaye Ebbulahi̱mu̱, agubhe kughuha endindi na batali Bayu̱daaya abaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu oghu. Eki kikabʼo niikuwo etu̱we haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, Luhanga atuhe Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu aatulaghani̱i̱je.
48003015	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, oleke mbahe kyakulolelʼo kya bu̱li̱ kilo. Bantu babili bakaakukolagha ndaghaano mbatʼo mikono ku̱ghi̱gu̱mi̱ya, taaliyo oghu akugubha kughibhenga, kedha kwongela kintu kyona haa ndaghaano eghi. Niikuwo na ya Luhanga eli etiyo.
48003016	Luhanga akakolela Ebbulahi̱mu̱ na muusukulu wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu ndaghaano. Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we tabikughilagha biti “na baasukulu be” kumani̱i̱si̱ya bantu bakani̱ye, bhaatu “na muusukulu waawe” kumani̱i̱si̱ya muntu omui Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48003017	Eki nkwete ku̱bu̱gha ni ngu: Luhanga akakola hambele ndaghaano na Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Ti̱ myaka bi̱ku̱mi̱ bbinaa nʼasatu haanu̱ma ya ndaghaano eghi, niibuwo Luhanga aahaaye Musa bilaghilo. Ti̱ bilaghilo ebi tabyadhi̱bi̱i̱ye ndaghaano eghi aakoli̱ye na Ebbulahi̱mu̱ eghi bbaa. Ebi aalaghani̱i̱je Ebbulahi̱mu̱ byona bikubʼo.
48003018	Ntwabaaye baakukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye niikuwo tutunge mi̱gi̱sa ya Luhanga, mi̱gi̱sa eghi tukuba tutaakughitunga haabwa ndaghaano eghi Luhanga aakoli̱ye na Ebbulahi̱mu̱. Bhaatu Luhanga akaghilila Ebbulahi̱mu̱ ngughuma aalaghisani̱ya kuha Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mi̱gi̱sa, ti̱ majima aamuhaayo.
48003019	Ti̱ buuye ekyaleki̱ye Luhanga aaha Musa bilaghilo nkiki? Luhanga akaha Musa bilaghilo kwoleka bantu ngoku majima kibhi kili, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Ki̱li̱si̱to muusukulu wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ oghu ndaghaano eghi yaabu̱ghaghʼo abyahuwe. Luhanga niiye akalaghila baamalai̱ka be kwisa kuha Musa bilaghilo. Ti̱ Musa aafooka mukwenda kughambila bantu bilaghilo ebi.
48003020	Obu Luhanga aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye kuha Ebbulahi̱mu̱ mi̱gi̱sa, takyetaaghi̱si̱bu̱u̱we mukwenda kubʼo, nanga Luhanga eenini niiye aamulaghiisani̱yagha.
48003021	Buuye bilaghilo bihakani̱i̱ye ebi Luhanga aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye Ebbulahi̱mu̱? Bbaa! Nguli haabaaghʼo bilaghilo ebyanguleka bantu baba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, bantu bangutungagha bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo haabwa kukola ebi bilaghilo ebi bilaghiiye.
48003022	Bhaatu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bikughilagha biti kibhi ki̱lemi̱ye bu̱li̱ muntu weena, nahabweki tumani̱ye ngu abaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to bonkaha, niibo bakutunga eki Luhanga aalaghani̱i̱je.
48003023	Luhanga atakooleki̱ye bantu mulingo ghwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to, bilaghilo niibiyo byali bi̱tu̱lemi̱ye kwonini kandi bituboheleeye nga banyankomo, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya obu Luhanga aatu̱su̱u̱ku̱li̱i̱ye mulingo ghwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48003024	Ti̱ bilaghilo biyo Luhanga akabitʼo kutulinda ku̱hi̱ki̱ya Ki̱li̱si̱to aasi̱ye, niikuwo haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to, Luhanga agubhe kutubala kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
48003025	Bhaatu endindi Luhanga aatwoleki̱ye mulingo ghwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to, tatukyalemuwa bilaghilo bbaa.
48003026	Enu̱we boona muli baana baa Luhanga haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu.
48003027	Nanga enu̱we abahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to kandi baababati̱ja mu li̱i̱na lya Ki̱li̱si̱to muli mu bumui naye.
48003028	Muntu naabaaye ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to taaliyo mbaghani̱ja haa Mu̱yu̱daaya kedha atali Mu̱yu̱daaya, mu̱syana kedha wa bughabe, mukali̱ kedha musaasa, nanga mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu enu̱we boona muli bamui.
48003029	Ti̱ ngoku enu̱we mwamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, muli baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱, kandi mukutunga mi̱gi̱sa eghi Luhanga aalaghani̱i̱je kuha baasukulu baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱.
48004001	Eki nkwete ku̱bu̱gha ni ngu mugwetuwa akaakubaagha anali mwana, akubaagha nga mu̱syana kandi kuni niiye alitunga bintu byona ebi ese wee aamulaghiisani̱i̱ye kumuha.
48004002	Akuukalagha analemeeu̱we abakwete kumuloleelela kandi ku̱mu̱ku̱li̱ya ku̱hi̱ki̱ya bwile obu ese wee aataayo kumukwati̱ya bintu ebi bu̱hi̱ki̱ye.
48004003	Niikiyo kimui naatu dhee bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, obu twabaagha tutakahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to, tukaba tu̱lemeeu̱we mi̱ghendi̱yo ya bantu baa nsi eni.
48004004	Bhaatu obu bwile bwonini bwahi̱ki̱ye, Luhanga aatuma Mwana wee Yesu munsi, mukali̱ aamubyala ngoku bantu bakubyaluwagha kandi aalemuwa bilaghilo.
48004005	Luhanga akatuma Yesu munsi niikuwo agubhe kucungula abalemeeu̱we bilaghilo ebi, kandi niikuwo etu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja tugubhe kutunga bughabe bwa kuba baana baa Luhanga.
48004006	Kandi haabwatu kuba baana be, eye hamui na Mwana wee Yesu, bakatuma Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwisa kuukala mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwatu. Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu niiye akulekagha tughila Luhanga tuti, “Abba, Eseetu̱we.”
48004007	Nahabweki endindi tamukyali nga basyana, bhaatu muli baana baa Luhanga, ti̱ ngoku muli baana baa Luhanga, naanu dhee muli bagwetuwa baa ebi aalaghani̱i̱je kuha bantu be.
48004008	Hambele, obu mwabaagha mutakahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Luhanga wamajima, mukaba muli basyana ni̱mu̱heeleli̱ya bisasani̱ ebitali Luhanga eenini.
48004009	Bhaatu endindi mumani̱ye Luhanga, kandi naye aabamanya. Nkiki ki̱leki̱ye mu̱todhi̱ye kutandika kukwata mi̱ghendi̱yo eghi etali na mughaso? Mukubbala kutodha kulemuwa mi̱ghedi̱yo eghi?
48004010	Ni̱i̱ghu̱u̱ye ngu niibuwo mwahu̱ti̱ya bilo bikulu, meeli̱, bwile kandi myaka ebi mutabhonganuuwe kukola!
48004011	Mwaleki̱ye noobaha nti kedha maani̱ naamali̱ye nimbakolelamu mulimo ghwa Luhanga ghaakwi̱li̱i̱ye busa.
48004012	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, mbeesengeleei̱ye, mube ngʼanje nanga tankyesigha bilaghilo, nkaba ngʼanu batali Bayu̱daaya. Ti̱ obu naabaagha eghi tamwankoli̱ye kubhi bbaa.
48004013	Mumani̱ye ngu obu naadu̱bhi̱ye kwisa eghi, nkaasa niikuwo ntungileyo maani̱ haabwa kuba muceke nanga kulwala. Ti̱ eki kyaleka naatunga bwile bwa kubatebeja Makulu Ghasemeeye haa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48004014	Nankabha bantu mbangwobahi̱ye bulwaye bwanje, tamwantwalikani̱i̱ye kubhi bbaa, bhaatu mukaneebali̱ya ngʼoghu oti ndi malai̱ka wa Luhanga kedha Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu eenini ababungiiye.
48004015	Obu naabaagha eghi kudheedhuwa mwabaagha nakuwo oku kwona bwile obu nkiki kyakubaayʼo endindi? Nguli naabasabi̱ye nti, mwehiyemu maaso ghaanu mughampe, mwangu̱ki̱koli̱ye mu̱dheedheeu̱we.
48004016	Buuye endindi mukwete ku̱neeli̱li̱kanʼo kuba nga munanji̱ghu̱wa waanu haabwa kubaghambila majima haa Ki̱li̱si̱to?
48004017	Abakwete kubasoona-soona bati mukwate bilaghilo bya Ki̱yu̱daaya aba, tabakwete kukikola haabwa bulungi bwanu bbaa, niibuwo baabbala bati munjohe, niikuwo ebo aaniibo mwakunda.
48004018	Nkilungi kwekamba kukwata ebi nkwegheesi̱yagha, kasita mwekamba haabwa kighendeleluwa kisemeeye, kandi nimukikola bwile bwona etali obu nkuba ndi eghi kwonkaha.
48004019	Enu̱we abali nga baana banje kandi aba nku̱ndi̱ye, ngoku mukali̱ aku̱byala akwehi̱ghu̱wagha busaali̱ji̱ bukani̱ye, niikuwo nanje nkwete kwehi̱ghu̱wa ntiyo dhee busaali̱ji̱ bukani̱ye haabwanu, ku̱hi̱ki̱ya mu̱fooki̱ye bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baamajima baa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48004020	Nkwete kwekumbula nguli ndi eghi naanu endindi, niikuwo mbamanyohʼo bikani̱ye haa nsonga eghi, nanga ntuntuuye haabwanu.
48004021	Ti̱ enu̱we abakubbala kukola byona ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye, buuye tamukaaghu̱wagha eki Musa aahandi̱i̱ki̱ye mu bilaghilo ebi?
48004022	Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti Ebbulahi̱mu̱ akaba ali na batabani̱ babili. Omui amu̱byayʼo mukali̱ wee mu̱syana, onji aamubyayʼo mukali̱ wee eenini.
48004023	Mutabani̱ wee oghu aabyayʼo mukali̱ wee mu̱syana ni̱na wee akaku̱li̱ya etundu liye ngoku bakali̱ bakaaku̱ku̱li̱yagha babyala; bhaatu mwana wee oghu aabyayʼo mukali̱ wee eenini, akabyaluwa kusighikila ngoku Luhanga eenini aalaghani̱i̱je.
48004024	Ku̱byaluwa kwa batabani̱ babili baa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ aba nkyakukolelo, nanga bakali̱ babili aba booleki̱ye ndaghaano ebili sya Luhanga. Ndaghaano emui ni eghi Luhanga aakoleeye Musa haa mwena Si̱naai̱, eghi ekafoola baana baa Hagali̱ kuba basyana.
48004025	Hagali̱ oghu, nkyakulolelo kya ebyabaaye haa mwena Si̱naai̱ mu kyalo kya Alebbi̱ya, ali dhee nga kibugha kya Yelusaalemu, nanga bantu baamu bali nga basyana kukwata bilaghilo bya Musa.
48004026	Bhaatu Saala, mukali̱ eenini wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ wa bughabe nkyakulolelo kya Yelusaalemu eghi eli mu Eghulu hambali bantu bali na bughabe. Kandi Yelusaalemu eghi niiyo eli nga ni̱naatu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona.
48004027	Nanga kihandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we ngu: “Odheedhuwe uwe mukali̱ ngumba, oghu otali na baana; Obu̱ghe bhyani odheedheeu̱we, nankabha otakaaghu̱wagha busaali̱ji̱ bwa ku̱byala; nanga nankabha bali̱ waawe endindi aku̱leki̱ye, akukuuka ewaawe ti̱ oku̱byala baana bakani̱ye kusaali̱ya mukali̱ oghu endindi ali na bali̱ wee.”
48004028	Nahabweki bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, mwafooki̱ye baana baa Luhanga nga I̱saka kusighikila ngoku Luhanga aalaghani̱i̱je.
48004029	Ti̱ bwile obu mwana oghu akabyaluwa nga baana boona, aatandika kubona-boni̱ya mwana oghu akabyaluwa haabwa maani̱ ghaa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye. Niikuwo bakwete kutubona-boni̱ya batiyo endindi.
48004030	Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Obhinge mukali̱ mu̱syana oghu na Mwana wee. Mutabani̱ wa mukali̱ oghu taakugwetuwa hamui na mutabani̱ wa mukali̱ waawe eenini.”
48004031	Nahabweki bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja tatuli nga baana baa mukali̱ mu̱syana oghu, abakulaghiluwa kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye. Bhaatu tuli nga baana baa mukali̱ wa Ebbulahi̱mu̱ eenini, aba Luhanga aku̱si̱i̱ma haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
48005001	Ki̱li̱si̱to akatucungula niikuwo tube na bughabe tuleke kulemuwa bilaghilo. Nahabweki mugumile haa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu, kandi mutatodha kweleeteleja mugogolo ghwa kulemuwa bilaghilo.
48005002	Mu̱tegheeleli̱ye bhyani eki ndimabaghambila! Kaakuba mu̱si̱i̱ma kubasala muti niikuwo Luhanga abasi̱i̱me, Ku̱ku̱wa kwa Ki̱li̱si̱to takukubaghasila bbaa.
48005003	Ndimatodha kubaghila nti, musaasa weena naanasi̱i̱mi̱ye kumusala, akulaghiluwa kukola byona ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye niikuwo Luhanga amughanile bibhi biye.
48005004	Enu̱we abakwete kulengʼo kukola ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye muti niikuwo Luhanga ababale kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, mwamali̱ye kwebaghani̱jʼo Ki̱li̱si̱to, kandi mwalu̱ghi̱ye haa ngughuma sya Luhanga.
48005005	Bhaatu haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Yesu, Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akulekagha tuukala tunalindiliiye na kunihila kwamaani̱ ngoku Luhanga alitufoola bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
48005006	Nanga ntwabaaye tu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu Luhanga taafu̱u̱yʼo muntu babe bamusali̱ye kedha batamusali̱ye. Kintu kimui kyonkaha eki Luhanga afu̱u̱yʼo ni bantu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to kandi ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja oku kuleka bakundangane.
48005007	Mwali mwekambi̱ye kwesigha Ki̱li̱si̱to mu mulingo ghusemeeye. Ni ani̱ abaleeteli̱i̱je kuleka ku̱hu̱ti̱ya butumuwa bwamajima haa Ki̱li̱si̱to obu naabatebi̱i̱je?
48005008	Oghu akwete kubasoona-soona ku̱lu̱gha haa butumuwa bwamajima, Luhanga oghu akaleka mwahi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to taaniiye amu̱tu̱mi̱ye eghi bbaa.
48005009	Mumani̱ye ngoku bakughilagha bati, “Katu̱mbi̱so kati̱i̱ kakugubha ku̱bhi̱mbhi̱ya ki̱tu̱mbe kya kigaati̱ kiinamu̱li̱to.” Niikuwo na njegheesi̱ya ya bisubha eghi ekugubha ku̱bhi̱i̱ya enu̱we boona.
48005010	Bhaatu ndi na kuguma nti, Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to akubakoonela kuukala munamu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je. Ti̱ oghu akwete kubatabangula byeli̱li̱kano oghu, nankabha aba ali ani̱, Luhanga alimufubila kwonini.
48005011	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, buuye ninaabaaye nindangilila nti basaasa babhonganuuwe babasale, ekyanguleka Bayu̱daaya baanakyanje baakala mbanambona-boni̱ya nkiki? Kandi nguli eki ghabaagha majima, kulangilila kwanje nti Ki̱li̱si̱to akatu̱kwi̱la haa musalaba kutujuna, takwangundeteleeye bijibu bbaa.
48005012	Nkwekumbula nti abakwete kubatalibani̱ja bati eghi baabusaasa babasale, ti̱ ebo boonini bantu batabasala bisusu byonkaha, bhaatu babajombʼo busaasa bwona.
48005013	Enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, Luhanga akatukoma aatuha bughabe ku̱lu̱gha haa ku̱hu̱ti̱ya bilaghilo kutujuna. Bhaatu bughabe bwanu butabaleeteleja kukola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi mibili yaanu ekubbala, ti̱ mukoonelangane kwoleka ngoku mukundangaane.
48005014	Bilaghilo byona bi̱bu̱ghi̱yʼo kilaghilo kimui ekikughilagha kiti, “Okunde muunakyawe ngoku weeku̱ndi̱ye weenini.”
48005015	Bhaatu enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, nimwakaaye nimulwana kandi nimulumangana nga nguwe, mwelinde kitali eki mukumalanganʼo.
48005016	Eki nkubaghambila ni ngu muleke Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aleme bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu, niikuwo mutakola bintu bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye ebi mibili yaanu ekweghomba kukola.
48005017	Nanga ebi mibili yaatu ya bu̱si̱i̱si̱ ekweghombagha kukola bikuhakani̱yagha ebi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akubbalagha tukole. Nʼebi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akubbalagha tukole bikuhakani̱yagha ebi mibili yaatu ya bu̱si̱i̱si̱ ekubbalagha tukole. Ti̱ bintu bibili ebi tabi̱ku̱u̱ghu̱wanagha niikuwo tutagubha kukola ebi twangubbali̱ye kukola.
48005018	Bhaatu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naabaaye alemi̱ye bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu, bu̱li̱ mukuba mutakyalemuwa bilaghilo.
48005019	Bikoluwa bya mibili yaatu ya bu̱si̱i̱si̱ byeyoleki̱ye bbeni̱-bbeni̱ niibiyo bini: bu̱syani̱, bubhi, bughuwa-ghuwa;
48005020	kulami̱ya bisasani̱ bantu beekoleeye, kulaghu̱li̱ya, bunanji̱ghu̱wa, kwetongani̱i̱si̱ya, mpalangani̱, ki̱i̱ni̱gha kisaalukaane, kubbala bu̱li̱ kantu kabe kaawe, kwetambulani̱yamu, kwebhi̱mba-bhi̱mbi̱ya,
48005021	etima, butami̱i̱li̱ na kugyana ku̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, hamui na binji ebi̱su̱si̱ye ngʼebi. Ti̱ abakukolagha bintu ngʼebi tabaliba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Luhanga.
48005022	Bhaatu ebi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akulekagha etu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja tuba nabiyo ni, kukunda, kudheedhuwa, mpempa, ku̱gu̱mi̱si̱li̱ja, kisa, bulungi, bwesighibuwa,
48005023	kuteekaana kandi kwelinda ebi tukukola. Ti̱ taaliyo kilaghilo ekitangi̱ye bantu kwetwalikani̱ya batiyo bbaa.
48005024	Bantu bakaaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱jagha Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu, tabakyatodha kulemuwa kweghomba kwabo kwa mubili. Kweghomba oku kukubaagha ngʼoghu oti kukabambuwa haa musalaba hamui na Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48005025	Ngoku tuli na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, tubhonganuuwe kwetwalikani̱ya ngoku akubbala.
48005026	Tuleke kuukala ntwebhimbha-bhi̱mbi̱ya, ntwendani̱ya kandi ntughililana etima.
48006001	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, naanabaayʼo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja eesanga ali mu kibhi, enu̱we aba Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye anagu̱mi̱i̱ye mubhonganuuwe kumukoonela mu mulingo ghusemeeye aleke kibhi eki niikuwo akuuke mu ki̱bbu̱la kyanu. Bhaatu mamuhabula mwelinde niikuwo naanu mutoohebuwa kukola kibhi ngʼekiye.
48006002	Mukoonelanganaghe mu bijibu byanu. Nimwakoli̱ye mutiyo, mukuba nimukola eki Ki̱li̱si̱to aatulaghiiye.
48006003	Ti̱ muntu neeboone asaai̱ye baanakiye kuni taabasaai̱ye, akuba needimaaga eenini.
48006004	Bu̱li̱ muntu abhonganuuwe kwelola bhyani ebi akwete kukola, niikuwo agubhe kwesinda ataakwelengani̱ya na muntu onji.
48006005	Nanga bu̱li̱ muntu ali na bujunaani̱ji̱buwa bwa kwetwi̱lamu alaba naakukolagha bintu bilungi kedha bbaa.
48006006	Oghu beegheeseei̱ye kighambo kya Luhanga abhonganuuwe kukoonela oghu aamwegheeseei̱ye kiyo naamuha bilungi ebi akwetaaghisibuwa.
48006007	Muntu atabadimaaga, nanga taaliyo oghu akugubha kughaya kifubilo kya Luhanga. Ti̱ Luhanga alisasula bu̱li̱ muntu kusighikila ngoku muntu oghu akwetwalikani̱yagha.
48006008	Abakukolagha ebi buhanguwa bwabo bwa bu̱si̱i̱si̱ bubbali̱ye, Luhanga alibaha kifubilo kya kuhwelekeelela. Bhaatu abakukolagha ebi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye abalaghiiye, alibaha bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo.
48006009	Tutaluwakaka kukola bilungi, nanga obu bwile bwonini bu̱li̱hi̱ka Luhanga alitusasula kaakuba tuukala ntunabikola.
48006010	Nahabweki ntwabaaye ntukola bilungi, oleke tubikolele bu̱li̱ muntu, bhaatu tukile munu kubikolela bʼomu ka ya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja.
48006011	Mulole ngoku si̱ye Paulo neenini ndimahandiika bini na mukono ghwanje ghwonini mu nuguta namu̱li̱to!
48006012	Abakwete kughila bati basaasa babhonganuuwe babasale aba, bakubbala kukola eki niikuwo bantu basinde ebo. Kandi tababbali̱ye Bayu̱daaya kubana-boni̱ya ngoku bakubona-boni̱yagha etu̱we abakwegheesi̱yagha bati Luhanga akughanila bantu bibhi byabo haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to ku̱tu̱kwi̱la haa musalaba.
48006013	Nankabha abakubahambi̱li̱ja kusaluwa aba nabo tabakukolagha byona ebi bilaghilo bilaghiiye. Bakubbalagha bati enu̱we musaluwe niikuwo beesinde bati mwabahu̱ti̱i̱ye.
48006014	Bhaatu si̱ye tambbali̱ye kwesinda haabwa kintu kyona bbaa, bhaatu haabwa Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to ku̱tu̱kwi̱la haa musalaba. Ti̱ haabwa musalaba oghu, si̱ye nsi tangiboonemu mughaso, nayo temboonemu mughaso bbaa.
48006015	Ti̱ endindi basaasa kubasala na kutabasala takili na mughaso bbaa. Ekili na mughaso ni bahi̱ki̱li̱ja kufooka bantu bahyaka haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to.
48006016	Kaakuba mukwata bhyani ebi naabaghambiiye mu bbaluwa eni, Luhanga akubaha mpempa kandi abaghilile ngughuma. Ti̱ taakusighilila enu̱we bonkaha, bhaatu na bahi̱ki̱li̱ja banji boona.
48006017	Ndimamaliilila ningila nti, tambbali̱ye kutodha kuhakangana na muntu weena haa bikwetʼo basaasa kubasala. Nkolu̱ esi ndi nasiyo haa mubili haabwa bantu kumputaali̱ya haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to syoleki̱ye ngoku ndi mu̱koli̱ wa Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu.
48006018	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to abaghilile ngughuma enu̱we boona. Aami̱i̱na.
49001001	Si̱ye Paulo, oghu Luhanga aakomi̱ye mu kubbala kuwe kuba mukwenda wa Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu, naahandiikila enu̱we bantu baa Luhanga abali Efeeso, beesighibuwa mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu.
49001002	Luhanga Eseetu̱we na Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to babaghilile ngughuma kandi babahe mpempa yonkaha.
49001003	Luhanga Ese Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to asi̱i̱mu̱we, oghu akutuhaagha mi̱gi̱sa yoona ya mwoyo ku̱lu̱gha mu eghulu, kukwama mu Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49001004	Nanga atakahangi̱ye nsi akaba naasangu̱u̱we atu̱komi̱ye ati tube mu bumui na Ki̱li̱si̱to, niikuwo Luhanga atufoole bantu bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi abatali na musango mu maaso ghe. Akatukunda,
49001005	kandi aasanguwa atu̱komi̱ye kufooka baana be kukwama mu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, eghi niiyo ekaba ntegheka yee kandi eghi aabbali̱ye,
49001006	Luhanga akakikola niikuwo tumusinde haabwa ngughuma siye sya kuswekani̱ya aatughiliiye busa kukwama mu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu aku̱ndi̱ye.
49001007	Ti̱ Luhanga akatucungula haabwa saghama ya Ki̱li̱si̱to, aatughanila bibhi byatu haabwa ngughuma
49001008	sihingulaane aamali̱ye aghatughilila haabwa magheji ghe na kumanya bintu byona.
49001009	Akaleka twamanya ntegheka yee ya nsi̱ta, eghi eenini aabbali̱ye, eghi emu̱dheedhi̱ye kukwama mu Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49001010	Ntegheka eghi niiyo Luhanga aku̱u̱su̱li̱ya mu bwile obu eenini aboone bu̱hi̱ki̱ye, obu akukumaani̱li̱ya hamui ebi aahangi̱ye byona, bu̱li̱ kintu kyona ekili mu eghulu na munsi kandi Ki̱li̱si̱to aaniiye mukama wabiyo byona.
49001011	Kusaalila mu Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu, Luhanga akatufoola dhee kuba bantu be kusighikila mu ntegheka aali asangu̱u̱we abbali̱ye kukola,
49001012	niikuwo etu̱we abaadu̱bhi̱ye kuta kunihila kwatu mu Ki̱li̱si̱to kutujuna, tumusinde haabwa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kiye.
49001013	Naanu dhee mukafooka bantu baa Luhanga obu mwaghu̱u̱ye butumuwa bwamajima twabatebi̱i̱je, bwa Makulu Ghasemeeye haa Ki̱li̱si̱to aghaaleki̱ye mwajunuwa. Mukahi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to kandi Luhanga ngoku aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye aaha enu̱we Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwoleka ngoku Luhanga alemi̱ye enu̱we nga bantu be.
49001014	Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu aaleki̱ye aasa aakala mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwatu nkaakulolelʼo ngoku alituha eki Luhanga aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye bantu be, niikuwo tumanye ngoku aatucunguuye ku̱lu̱gha mu kibhi, kandi tusinde ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kya Luhanga.
49001015	Haabwa kighendeleluwa eki, ku̱lu̱gha naaghu̱u̱ye ngoku mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱i̱je kwonini Mukama Yesu kandi ngoku mu̱ku̱ndi̱ye bantu baa Luhanga boona,
49001016	tankulekeelelagha ku̱mu̱si̱i̱ma haabwanu, ti̱ bwile bwona obu nkubaagha ninsaba, nkubaasukagha mbasabila.
49001017	Nkuukalagha ninsaba nti Luhanga Ese Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, oghu ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kyona, abahe Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kubaha magheji ghaa kumanya kandi kubasu̱u̱ku̱li̱la kwonini ngoku Luhanga ali.
49001018	Nkubasabilagha dhee nti Luhanga abagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱ye kumanya majima ghe, niikuwo mumanye mi̱gi̱sa yee ekaniiye kimui ya kuswekani̱ya eghi mukunihila kutunga eghi aabilikiliiye bantu be.
49001019	Kandi mugubhe kumanya ngoku bu̱toki̱ buwe buli bwamaani̱ munu obukukoonelagha etu̱we abaku̱hi̱ki̱li̱jagha. Bu̱toki̱ bwamaani̱ obu,
49001020	niibuwo aakoleeseei̱ye mu Ki̱li̱si̱to obu aamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye kandi aamusitami̱ya haa luhande lwa mukono ghuwe ghwabuliyo mu eghulu.
49001021	Nahabweki Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu niiye mu̱lemi̱ wa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa munu oghu alemi̱ye boona abali na bu̱toki̱ mu eghulu na munsi, ki̱ku̱ghi̱yo kiye kya bu̱lemi̱ kisaai̱ye bi̱ku̱ghi̱yo banguha balemi̱ boona, etali mu bwile buni bwonkaha bhaatu dhee mu bwile obuliisa.
49001022	Ti̱ Luhanga akata bintu byona hansi ya bu̱toki̱ bwa Ki̱li̱si̱to, kandi Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu Luhanga ataayʼo kulema bintu byona oghu, niiye mutuwe ghwatu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja.
49001023	Tuli bi̱twi̱ke bya mubili ghwa Ki̱li̱si̱to kandi taali nʼeki abu̱lu̱u̱wʼo mu kutughanikiilila kyakukola, nanga ali hantu hoona kandi aku̱hi̱ki̱li̱li̱yagha bintu byona.
49002001	Ti̱ enu̱we mukaba mu̱kwi̱li̱i̱ye mu nsobi̱ na bibhi byanu.
49002002	Mwakalagha mu bibhi, ngoku bantu baa munsi bali, ni̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ya Si̱taani̱ mukulu wa bi̱li̱mu̱ byʼomu mwanya. Niiye mwoyo endindi akwete kukola mulimo ghwamaani̱ mu bantu abakubhengagha ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Luhanga.
49002003	Hambele naatu bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona, tukaba tuli nga bantu aba. Twakolagha ebi buhanguwa bwatu bwa bu̱si̱i̱si̱, mibili yaatu, na byeli̱li̱kano byatu byabbalagha. Ti̱ naatu Luhanga angutufubiiye na ki̱i̱ni̱gha ngoku akufubila bantu aba.
49002004	Bhaatu Luhanga haabwa ngughuma sikani̱ye aatughiliiye kandi haabwa kutukunda kwonini,
49002005	akeeyongela kutufoola boomi̱i̱li̱ hamui na Ki̱li̱si̱to nankabha ntwabaagha tu̱ku̱u̱ye haabwa bibhi byatu. Enu̱we Luhanga akabajuna haabwa ngughuma siye.
49002006	Ti̱ Luhanga aatu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱la hamui naye kandi aatusitami̱ya hamui naye mu eghulu mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu oghu,
49002007	niikuwo mu bwile obuliisa Luhanga agubhe kutwoleka ngughuma siye syamaani̱ mu kisa aatughiliiye mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu.
49002008	Enu̱we mukahi̱ki̱li̱ja mwajunuwa haabwa ngughuma sya Luhanga. Eki tamwakyekoleeye enu̱we bonkaha, bhaatu ni kisembo kya Luhanga.
49002009	Taabaaye kiyo haabwa bikoluwa byanu, nahabweki atabʼo muntu nʼomui oghu akwepanka.
49002010	Nanga etu̱we Luhanga niiye akatuhanga, aatuhanga ati tulungane na Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu niikuwo tugubhe kukola bikoluwa bilungi, ebi Luhanga aasangu̱u̱we ategheki̱ye hambele ati tukole.
49002011	Nahabweki, enu̱we batali Bayu̱daaya mu bubyalilanuwa bwanu muusuke ngoku mwabaagha hambele. Banai̱saaleeli̱ abakusaluwagha haa mubili baabaghayagha bati nanga enu̱we tabakubasalagha.
49002012	Muusuke ngu bwile obu mukaba mwebaghani̱i̱jʼo Ki̱li̱si̱to, mukaba batababaliiye mu Banai̱saaleeli̱, mukaba mutabalu̱u̱we mu ebi Luhanga aalaghi̱i̱sani̱i̱ye mu ndaghaano siye, mukaba mutali na kunihila, kandi mukaba mutali na Luhanga munsi muni.
49002013	Bhaatu endindi kukwama mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu, enu̱we abaabaagha batamani̱ye Luhanga mukaleetuwa haai-haai naye haabwa saghama ya Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49002014	Nanga Ki̱li̱si̱to eenini niiye atuhaaye mpempa, aalungani̱ya Bayu̱daaya na batali Bayu̱daaya kuba bamui kandi aamalʼo bunanji̱ghu̱wa obwabaagha nga kisiika kibabaghani̱i̱je.
49002015	Ku̱ku̱wa kuwe haa musalaba kukamalʼo bu̱toki̱ bwa bilaghilo bya Ki̱yu̱daaya nʼebi byalaghilagha bantu kukola. Ti̱ kighendeleluwa kiye kyaba kufoola Bayu̱daaya na batali Bayu̱daaya kuba ntu̱la emui mpyaka, kandi niikuwo baakale hamui mpempa,
49002016	kandi ku̱ku̱wa kuwe haa musalaba, kugubhe kuleka Luhanga neeku̱u̱ki̱li̱ya bombi Bayu̱daaya na batali Bayu̱daaya, kandi bunanji̱ghu̱wa bwabo mbuhuwo.
49002017	Ki̱li̱si̱to akaasa aatebeja butumuwa bwa mpempa mu enu̱we batali Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha batamani̱ye Luhanga kandi aatebeja dhee butumuwa bwa mpempa mu Bayu̱daaya abaabaagha bamani̱ye Luhanga.
49002018	Eki niikiyo kikuleka etu̱we bombi haabwa bu̱kooneli̱ bwa Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, ntukugubha ku̱hi̱ka hambali Luhanga Eseetu̱we ali.
49002019	Nahabweki, enu̱we batali Bayu̱daaya tamukyali banamahanga kedha bantu abatamanu̱u̱we mu bantu baa Luhanga. Muli baakali̱ hamui na bantu baa Luhanga kandi baamemba bʼomu ka ya Luhanga.
49002020	Bantu aba bali nga Numba ya Luhanga eghi balangi̱ na bakwenda bali nga musingi ghwayo kandi Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu aaniiye ali ngʼebaale lyamaani̱ elihaghi̱ki̱ye numba eghi.
49002021	Haabwa kulungana na Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu, boona bali nga numba ekukweluwa hamui kufooka numba ya Luhanga ehi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye hambali Mukama akuukala.
49002022	Ti̱ naanu dhee haabwa kulungana na Ki̱li̱si̱to, mukwete kukweluwa hamui kufooka ki̱i̱kalo eki Luhanga akuukalamu mu Mwoyo wee Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye.
49003001	Ti̱ haabwa eki Luhanga aakoli̱ye eki, niikiyo ki̱leki̱ye si̱ye Paulo ndi mu nkomo, nanga nkulangililagha enu̱we batali Bayu̱daaya butumuwa haa Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu.
49003002	Majima kuwo mukaaghu̱wa ngoku Luhanga angiliiye ngughuma ampa bujunaani̱ji̱buwa bwa kubalangilila butumuwa buwe.
49003003	Butumuwa obu, bukwetʼo nsi̱ta eghi Luhanga eenini ansu̱u̱ku̱li̱i̱ye, aaleka naaghimanya, eghi naabahandiikiiyʼo mu biihi-biihi.
49003004	Ti̱, mukaakusoma bini, du̱mbi̱ mu̱kwetegheeleli̱ya ngoku nimani̱ye nsi̱ta haa Ki̱li̱si̱to,
49003005	eghi bantu baali batamani̱ye ku̱lu̱gha hambele, bhaatu endindi eghi Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aaleki̱ye bakwenda na balangi̱ bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye baa Luhanga, baamanya.
49003006	Nsi̱ta eghi ni ngu, batali Bayu̱daaya bakugubha kutunga dhee haa mi̱gi̱sa yoona, nanga nabo ni mubili ghumui naatu, kandi bakutunga haa ebi baalaghi̱i̱sani̱bu̱u̱we mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu kukwama mu Makulu Ghasemeeye.
49003007	Luhanga akampa kisembo kya ngughuma siye angiliiye, ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya haabwa kulangilila Makulu Ghasemeeye agha, niiye nkukolagha haabwa maani̱ ghe.
49003008	Nankabha ntengani̱i̱ye na bantu baa Luhanga banji boona ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa, akangilila ngughuma esi kulangilila batali Bayu̱daaya mi̱gi̱sa ya Ki̱li̱si̱to yamaani̱ eghi muntu ataakugubha kwebbalila.
49003009	Luhanga akankoma kusoboolola bbeni̱-bbeni̱ bantu boona ntegheka ya nsi̱ta eghi, eghi eye oghu akahanga bintu byona aali atakasu̱u̱ku̱li̱i̱ye bantu kughimanya ku̱lu̱gha hambele na hambele.
49003010	Eki aaghendeleeleye ni ngu endindi, ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bagubhe kuleka ebili na bu̱toki̱ kandi na mi̱li̱mu̱ eghi elemi̱ye mu mwanya byona mbigubha kumanya ngoku Luhanga ali na magheji ghahingulaane,
49003011	aghasighikiiye mu bighendeleluwa biye ebi aahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye hambele kukwama mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu Mukama waatu.
49003012	Haabwa kulungana kwatu na Ki̱li̱si̱to kandi ku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja tukugubha ku̱hi̱ka hambali Luhanga ali tutoobahi̱ye kandi tu̱gu̱mi̱ye.
49003013	Nahabweki nkubasaba, mutahuwa maani̱ haabwa kubona mbambona-boni̱ya haabwanu, eki kikubalu̱ghi̱lamu kuba na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
49003014	Eki niikiyo kikulekagha nteeli̱ya ninsaba mu maaso ghaa Eseetu̱we wʼomu eghulu,
49003015	oghu akahanga boona abʼomu eghulu na baa munsi kandi boona aabaha mali̱i̱na.
49003016	Nkusabagha nti Luhanga oghu ali na ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kikani̱ye agu̱mi̱ye mitima yaanu kandi abahe maani̱ naakoleesi̱ya Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye wee.
49003017	Abakolele eki niikuwo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱je ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to ali mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu. Kandi nkusabagha dhee nti eki mulakolagha kyona, ki̱lu̱ghaghe mu kukunda muli na kuwo,
49003018	niikuwo enu̱we hamui na bantu baa Luhanga boona mube na maani̱ ghaa kumanya kwonini lulengo lwa ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to abaku̱ndi̱ye kwonini,
49003019	kandi niikuwo mumanye ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to abaku̱ndi̱ye kusaali̱ya ngoku mukugubha kwetegheeleli̱ya, niikuwo mugubhe kuba kwonini haa lulengo olu Luhanga akubbala.
49003020	Ti̱ Luhanga oghu akugubha kutukolela ebihingulaane kusaali̱ya ebi tukugubha kumusaba kedha kuteekelejʼo, kandi oghu ali na bu̱toki̱ obu aku̱koleesi̱yagha byona ebi akutukolelagha,
49003021	oghu aaniiye aaheebuwa ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa mu ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱lija kandi mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu mu mijo yoona, bilo nʼebilo! Aami̱i̱na.
49004001	Si̱ye Paulo oghu ndi mu nkomo haabwa ku̱heeleli̱ya Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to, ndimabeesengeleli̱ya nti mutwalikani̱ye nga bantu aba Luhanga aabilikiiye ngoku babhonganuuwe kutwalikani̱ya.
49004002	Mudhootele kimui kandi mwetwalikani̱ye bukee-buke; mu̱gu̱mi̱si̱li̱jangane kwoleka ngoku mukundangaane.
49004003	Mutʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kuukala muli mu bumui obu Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akubahaagha, ti̱ mwoleke bumui obu haabwa kuukala hamui mpempa.
49004004	Etu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja tuli mubili ghumui kandi tuli na Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye omui, tuli na kunihila kumui haabwa Luhanga kutubilikila ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49004005	Tuli na Mukama waatu omui enkaha Ki̱li̱si̱to, twaba na ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kandi kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa kumui.
49004006	Twaba dhee na Luhanga omui enkaha kandi Ese wa bantu boona, niiye atu̱lemi̱ye etu̱we boona, niiye akutulaghilagha byakukola kandi aleka tubimala kandi niiye akutuukalaghamu bwile bwona.
49004007	Etu̱we boona Ki̱li̱si̱to mu ngughuma siye akatuha bisembo byambaghani̱ja ngoku abbali̱ye.
49004008	Ngoku mu Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Obu aani̱i̱ni̱ye kusaala hambali mwanya ghuheleeye, aatwala abali nga aba bakwete haa bulemo kandi aaha bantu be bisembo.”
49004009	Kughamba ngu Ki̱li̱si̱to akani̱i̱na kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu akadu̱bha aasa munsi yaatu eni ya bu̱li̱ kilo eghi tulimu.
49004010	Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu akaasa oghu niiye dhee akani̱i̱na kusaalila kimui hambali mwanya ghuheleeye niikuwo bu̱lemi̱ buwe bugubhe kumalakaka kyalo kyona.
49004011	Niiye eenini akaleka bamui baaba bakwenda, banji balangi̱, banji balangi̱li̱li̱ baa Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga, banji kuba bali̱i̱si̱ya kandi banji kuba beegheesi̱ya.
49004012	Akakola eki niikuwo bateekani̱je bantu baa Luhanga kukola mulimo ghwa ku̱mu̱heeleli̱ya kandi bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba nga mubili ghwa Ki̱li̱si̱to bagume mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo.
49004013	Eki kikweyongela mu maaso ku̱hi̱ki̱ya etu̱we boona tuli mu bumui kwonini mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwatu, tumani̱ye kwonini Ki̱li̱si̱to Mwana wa Luhanga, tu̱ku̱li̱ye kwonini mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwatu kandi tubaaye kwonini bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kwengani̱ya ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to ali.
49004014	Nitwabaaye tutiyo tuleka kuba nga abataku̱li̱ye mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja, kutwalilijibuwa njegheesi̱ya ya bisubha. Tutaba nga bwati̱ haa maasi obu mpwegha ekutwalagha eni nʼeli, naatu kutwalilijibuwa bu̱li̱ njegheesi̱ya yoona eghi bantu baa bisubha kandi baa lugheji-gheji bakwegheesi̱yagha.
49004015	Mu ki̱i̱kalo kya kuba tutiyo tu̱bu̱ghi̱langanaghe majima tukundangaane, niikuwo mu byona ebi tukukola tweyongele kukula mu kumanya Ki̱li̱si̱to oghu ali mutuwe ghwa bahi̱ki̱li̱ja boona.
49004016	Niiye akulungani̱yagha kandi akwatani̱ya bu̱li̱ ki̱twi̱ke kya mubili ngoku kili. Nahabweki bu̱li̱ ki̱twi̱ke nkyabaaye nkikola kulungi, mubili ghukukulagha kandi ghukweluwa mu kukunda.
49004017	Nahabweki haabwa bu̱toki̱ obu Mukama Yesu ampaaye ndimaghambila enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja nti mutatodha kweyongela kuukala nga bantu abatamani̱ye Luhanga, abakukuukalagha mbeeli̱li̱kana kukola bintu ebitali na mughaso.
49004018	Nanga eki, tabakugubhagha kwetegheeleli̱ya kusemeeye ebikwetʼo Luhanga, kandi tabakwetwalikani̱yagha nga bantu baa Luhanga nanga kwomakakana kwa mitima yabo haa Luhanga.
49004019	Tabakyeli̱li̱kana kusemeeye bbaa, bakeehelayo kimui kuukala bwile bwona mbakola bikoluwa bya bu̱syani̱, bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwabo buusuuyemu bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bya milingo yoona kandi mbeekumbula kweyongela kubikola.
49004020	Bhaatu enu̱we taaliikuwo baabeegheeseei̱yʼo Ki̱li̱si̱to batiyo bbaa.
49004021	Majima kuwo bakabaghambilʼo yee kandi baabeegheesi̱ya majima aghali mu Yesu oghu.
49004022	Baabeegheesi̱ya ebikwetʼo njikala yaanu obu mwabaagha mutakahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to, kutatodha kuukala nimunakola bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, ebyabaagha biisuuyemu kudimaaguwa na kweghomba kwa milingo yoona.
49004023	Baabeegheesi̱ya bati muleke Luhanga ahindule byeli̱li̱kano byanu niikuwo mutandike kuteekeleja mu mulingo ghuhyaka.
49004024	Kandi mubhonganuuwe kweyoleka kwonini nga bantu bahyaka aba Luhanga aafooye kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye mu majima kandi balukwela.
49004025	Nahabweki bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, aleke kuha bisubha kandi mughambilanaghe majima ghonkaha, nanga etu̱we boona tuli bi̱twi̱ke bya mubili ghumui.
49004026	“Muntu alakakwatuwagha ki̱i̱ni̱gha eelinde atasi̱i̱sa.” Muntu ataleka musana ngukota onakwatu̱u̱we ki̱i̱ni̱gha,
49004027	kandi mutaha Si̱taani̱ kagi̱sa ku̱boohi̱ya kuleka ni̱mu̱si̱i̱sa.
49004028	Weena oghu aabaagha ali musuma atakahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Ki̱li̱si̱to, abhonganuuwe kuleka kwibha, bhaatu eekolele na maani̱ ghe, niikuwo eetungile byakumukoonela kandi nʼebi akukoonela nabiyo abali mu bwetaagho.
49004029	Mutali̱bu̱ghi̱lana bighambo byona bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, bhaatu mu̱bu̱ghi̱lanaghe ebisemeeye kandi ebi̱ku̱gu̱mi̱ya baanakyanu mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwabo kusighikila ngoku bakwetaaghisibuwa, niikuwo bigubhe kughasila abaku̱bi̱tegheeleli̱ya.
49004030	Mutaleka Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye naasaaliluwa, nanga niiye Luhanga aabahaaye nga kaakulolelʼo kwoleka ngoku muli bantu be, kandi ngoku alibacungula kwonini.
49004031	Mulekele kimui kusaakala, ki̱i̱ni̱gha, kusaaliluwa, kwambulana na kuhangililana, hamui na milingo enji yoona ya kuba na etima.
49004032	Bhaatu mughililanganaghe kisa kandi mukolanganaghe kusemeeye, nimughanilangana ngoku naanu kukwama mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Luhanga aabaghaniiye.
49005001	Nahabweki ngoku muli baana baa Luhanga aba aku̱ndi̱ye kwonini, mutwalikani̱ye ngoku eye akutwalikani̱yagha.
49005002	Kandi muukale mukundangaane ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to aatu̱ku̱ndi̱ye eehaayo nga kihonguwa ku̱tu̱kwi̱la kandi eki Luhanga asi̱i̱mi̱ye.
49005003	Hatalibʼo mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nʼomui oghu aku̱syana mu mulingo ghwona, kedha kuba na kweghomba ku̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, kedha mululu, nanga taki̱hi̱ki̱ye bantu baa Luhanga bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kukola ebi.
49005004	Kandi tamubhonganuuwe kuba eghi na kalimi kabhi̱i̱hi̱ye, ku̱bu̱gha bintu byakidhoma-dhoma, kedha kusandaala ku̱bhi̱i̱ye, ebi tabibabhonganuuwe bbaa, bhaatu muukalaghe ni̱mu̱si̱i̱ma Luhanga.
49005005	Nanga mumani̱ye ngoku ataliyo mu̱syani̱, kedha oghu akukola bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye, kedha wa mululu ghwa bintu oghuli nga kulami̱ya bisasani̱, oghu aliba mu bu̱lemi̱ bwa Ki̱li̱si̱to hamui na Luhanga.
49005006	Mutasi̱i̱ma muntu nʼomui kubadimaaga na bighambo ebitali na mutuwe na maghulu, nanga bintu ngʼebi niibiyo bikuleka Luhanga naafubila bantu abamujeemeeye na ki̱i̱ni̱gha.
49005007	Nahabweki muleke kuba mu bumui na bantu aba.
49005008	Hambele mukaba muli nga bantu abali mu mweli̱ma nanga mukaba mutamani̱ye Luhanga, bhaatu endindi haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Mukama muli nga bantu bali mu kyeleeli̱. Mwetwalikani̱ye nga bantu abali mu kyeleeli̱.
49005009	(Nanga muntu oghu ali mu kyeleeli̱, akukolagha bilungi, bi̱hi̱ki̱ye, kandi byamajima.)
49005010	Mutʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kukola ebi̱dheedhi̱ye Mukama.
49005011	Mutakolagha bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye bya mweli̱ma, ebitali na mughaso, bhaatu mwolekaghe bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngoku bili bibhi.
49005012	Nanga bintu ebi abatahu̱ti̱i̱ye Luhanga bakukolagha mu ki̱bi̱so na ku̱bi̱bu̱ghʼo kwonkaha kukukwati̱yagha nsoni̱.
49005013	Bhaatu ebikukwati̱yagha nsoni̱ ebi, kyeleeli̱ kyamajima ghaa Luhanga kikaakubyolekagha, bantu bamanya bbeni̱-bbeni̱ ngoku bili bibhi kwonini.
49005014	Nanga kintu kyona eki kyeleeli̱ kyoleki̱ye bantu bakukibonagha bbeni̱-bbeni̱. Niikiyo kikulekagha bantu baghila bati, “Osu̱su̱mu̱ke, mughwesaghi̱li̱ uwe, ohu̱mbu̱u̱ke mu baku̱u̱ye, Ki̱li̱si̱to akukuha kyeleeli̱ kiye.”
49005015	Nahabweki mwelinde mu mitwalikani̱i̱ye yaanu, muteetwalikani̱ya nga bantu badhoma-dhoma, bhaatu nga bagheji,
49005016	mu̱koleesi̱ye kulungi bwile obu muli na buwo buni, nanga bilo bini bantu bahingulaane kukola bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye.
49005017	Muteetwalikani̱ya nga badhoma-dhoma, bhaatu mwetegheeleli̱ye ebi Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to akubbalagha ati mukole.
49005018	Muteeha tamiilo ya vi̱i̱ni̱ eghi ekubaleeteleja bughuwa-ghuwa. Mu ki̱i̱kalo kyʼeki, muleke Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye aliiye aakala mu bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu kwonini.
49005019	Muukalaghe nimulimbila hamui Jabbu̱li̱ na bilimbo bya mwoyo. Mulimbaghe na mitima yaanu yoona bilimbo byakusinda Ki̱li̱si̱to Mukama waatu.
49005020	Bwile bwona mu̱si̱i̱maghe Luhanga Eseetu̱we haabwa byona, mu li̱i̱na lya Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49005021	Mudhootelangane kwoleka ngoku mu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49005022	Enu̱we bakali̱, mudhootele bʼebaanu̱we ngoku mudhooteeye Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49005023	Nanga musaasa niiye mutuwe ghwa mukali̱ wee ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to ali mutuwe ghwa ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja, aba aaju̱ni̱ye kandi ebo baaba mubili ghuwe.
49005024	Ngoku ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja bali na kudhootela Ki̱li̱si̱to, niikuwo bakali̱ babhonganuuwe kudhootela beebabo mu bu̱li̱ kintu.
49005025	Basaasa mukunde bakali̱ baanu ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to aaku̱ndi̱ye ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja kandi eehaayo kubakwi̱la,
49005026	niikuwo babe bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwa butumuwa buwe kandi kubanaabi̱ya na maasi kukwama mu kubati̱i̱ji̱buwa.
49005027	Niikuwo eeku̱u̱ki̱li̱ye bahi̱ki̱li̱ja aba basemeleeye kimui, batali na kabhi koona kedha kalofu̱ haa mitima yabo, bhaatu bali bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kandi batali na kyona bakubasoghosʼo.
49005028	Niikuwo dhee na basaasa babhonganuuwe kukunda batiyo bakali̱ baabo, ngoku baku̱ndi̱ye mibili yabo yoonini. Oghu akukunda mukali̱ wee akuba nooleka ngoku eeku̱ndi̱ye eenini.
49005029	Nanga taaliyo muntu oghu oohi̱ye mubili ghuwe bbaa, bhaatu aku̱ghu̱li̱i̱si̱yagha kandi oghuloleelela kusemeeye, ngoku Ki̱li̱si̱to akukolagha ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja,
49005030	nanga tuli bi̱twi̱ke bya mubili ghuwe.
49005031	“Eki niikiyo kilalekagha musaasa alekaghe ese wee na ni̱na wee eebohelʼo mukali̱ wee, ti̱ babe muntu omui.”
49005032	Eni ni nsi̱ta yamaani̱ ku̱ghyetegheeleli̱ya, bhaatu eki nkwete ku̱bu̱ghʼo ni Ki̱li̱si̱to na ki̱bbu̱la kya bahi̱ki̱li̱ja.
49005033	Nahabweki, bu̱li̱ mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja weena, akulaghiluwa kukunda mukali̱ wee ngoku eeku̱ndi̱ye eenini, kandi na mukali̱ akulaghiluwa ku̱hu̱ti̱ya eba wee.
49006001	Enu̱we baana, haabwanu kulungana na Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to, mu̱hu̱ti̱ye babyaye baanu, eki niikiyo ki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukola.
49006002	Ebyahandi̱i̱ku̱u̱we bi̱ghi̱li̱ye biti, “Ohu̱ti̱yaghe so waawe na njoko waawe.” Ti̱ eki niikiyo kilaghilo kyoku̱du̱bha hambali Luhanga aalaghiiye kintu kukoluwa aatodha aatʼo eki aalaghani̱i̱je haabwakiyo ati,
49006003	“Bintu bikukughendekela kusemeeye kandi akumalʼo kabili munsi.”
49006004	Beese baana, mulingo mukutwalikani̱yamu baana baanu ghutaleka basaaliluwa; bhaatu mubaku̱li̱ye nimubahana kandi ni̱mu̱beegheesi̱ya mulingo ghwa ku̱hu̱ti̱ya Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49006005	Enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja abali basyana baa bantu, mudhootelaghe bakama baanu baa munsi muni. Mubahu̱ti̱yaghe kandi muboobaaghe na mutima ghumui, ngoku mwangu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye Ki̱li̱si̱to.
49006006	Mutakikola obu baliyo bwonkaha muti niikuwo babasi̱i̱me, bhaatu mukikolaghe muuhiiye haa mutima kwoleka ngoku mu̱hu̱ti̱i̱ye Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to. Kandi mukikolagha kusighikila haa ntegheka ya Luhanga.
49006007	Nahabweki mukole mulimo ghwanu oghu na mutima ghumui ngoku mwangughukoleeye Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to,
49006008	nanga mukimani̱ye ngoku Mukama Ki̱li̱si̱to aliha bisembo muntu weena haabwa bu̱li̱ kilungi eki muntu aakoli̱ye nankabha muntu oghu aba ali mu̱syana kedha atali mu̱syana.
49006009	Naanu bakama baa basyana, mubatwalikani̱yaghe kusemeeye, mutaakuboobahi̱i̱li̱li̱ya, nanga enu̱we hamui nabo Mukama waanu ni omui oghu ali mu eghulu. Kandi eye taakusoloolagha bantu bbaa.
49006010	Hatiini mube baamaani̱ mu kulungana kwanu na Mukama Yesu kukwama mu maani̱ ghe ghaamaani̱.
49006011	Mube na bya kulwani̱i̱si̱ya byona bya Luhanga niikuwo mugubhe kwemiliilila lugheji-gheji lwa Si̱taani̱.
49006012	Nanga tatukwete kulwana na bantu ngʼatu, bhaatu tukwete kulwana na bi̱li̱mu̱ ebili na bu̱toki̱ kandi maani̱ ghaa kulema munsi muni eghi eesuuyemu bubhi, na ebili na bu̱toki̱ kandi maani̱ ghaa kulema mu mwanya.
49006013	Nahabwekiini mube na bya kulwani̱i̱si̱ya byona bya Luhanga, niikuwo bwile bwa Si̱taani̱ kubalu̱mba mbwahi̱ki̱ye mugubhe kumusaagha, niikuwo haakumaliilila kwa byona muukale munagu̱mi̱ye.
49006014	Mube nga muusilikale haa bulemo. Mwebohele haa majima ngoku akwebohagha mu̱ci̱pi̱. Ti̱ mu̱lu̱waale mu ki̱ku̱bha kyoma kya kuba bahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kubalinda.
49006015	Ngoku aku̱lu̱waalagha nkai̱to kweteekani̱ja, aliikuwo naanu mweteekani̱ja kughenda kughambila bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga aghakubaha mpempa.
49006016	Kwongela hʼebi byona, ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu kube nga ngabo yaanu, okukuleka nimusaagha lugheji-gheji lwona lwa bya Si̱taani̱.
49006017	Mu̱lu̱waale kiisipeewa kya kyoma kya kujunuwa, kandi mukwate kihiyo kya Mwoyo, ekili kighambo kya Luhanga.
49006018	Bwile bwona musabaghe haabwa byetaagho byanu byona ngoku Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akubooleka. Muukale mumani̱ye eki, kandi muukale nimusabila bantu baa Luhanga boona.
49006019	Ti̱ nanje dhee munsabile, Luhanga ampaaghe bighambo byaku̱bu̱gha, niikuwo mbu̱ghaghe ntoobahi̱ye obu ndabaagha ninsoboolola bantu nsi̱ta ya kujuna kwa Luhanga eghi eli Makulu Ghasemeeye.
49006020	Makulu Ghasemeeye agha Ki̱li̱si̱to antu̱mi̱ye kulangilila niigho ghaleki̱ye ndi mu nkomo. Munsabile ngu ngubhe kughalangilila ngoku nibhonganuuwe kandi ntoobahi̱ye.
49006021	Ti̱ki̱ko, mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja muunakyanu oghu tu̱ku̱ndi̱ye kandi mu̱heeleli̱ya mwesighibuwa wa Mukama, akubaghambila byona mulingo ndimu eni kandi nʼebi nkwete kukola.
49006022	Eki niikiyo kyaleki̱ye naamutuma eghi niikuwo abaghambile ngoku tuli, kandi abeekambi̱i̱si̱ye mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu.
49006023	Luhanga eseetu̱we na Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to ahe enu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja mpempa, kandi babagu̱bhi̱i̱si̱ye kuukala munahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je Yesu kandi munakundangaane.
49006024	Luhanga aghilile ngughuma enu̱we boona abaku̱ndi̱ye Mukama waatu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to na kukunda okutaahuwʼo.
50001001	Abaahandiika bbaluwa eni, ni̱i̱si̱ye Paulo hamui na Ti̱mi̱seewa, baheeleli̱ya baa Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu. Twahandiikila enu̱we bantu baa Luhanga boona abeelungani̱i̱ye na Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu abali mu tau̱ni̱ ya Fi̱li̱pi̱, hamui na baloleeleli̱ baanu na baheeleli̱ya baanu.
50001002	Luhanga Eseetu̱we hamui na Mukama Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to babaghilile ngughuma kandi babahe mpempa yonkaha.
50001003	Nku̱si̱i̱magha Luhanga wanje bwile bwona obu nkubaasukagha.
50001004	Ti̱ nkaakubaagha nimbasabila enu̱we boona nkwehi̱ghu̱wagha ndheedheeu̱we
50001005	haabwanu kulungana haa mulimo ghwa kulangilila Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga ku̱lu̱ghi̱i̱li̱la kilo mwatandikiiyemu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nʼendindi.
50001006	Nkimani̱ye kwonini nti Luhanga oghu akatandika kubakolamu mulimo ghusemeeye ghwa kubajuna akughumaliilila ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kilo eki Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to alikuukilamu.
50001007	Ki̱hi̱ki̱ye si̱ye kwehi̱ghu̱wa ndheedheeu̱we ntiyo haabwanu enu̱we boona, nanga mukunjikalagha haa mutima. Enu̱we boona Luhanga akabaghilila ngughuma hamui nanje mwankoonela haa mulimo oghu ampaaye ghwa kulwanilila Makulu Ghasemeeye ngoku ghali majima, nankabha obu baabaagha bankwete ndi mu nkomo.
50001008	Luhanga eenini amani̱ye ngoku nkuukalagha nimbeekumbula kandi mbaku̱ndi̱ye na kukunda kwa Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu.
50001009	Nkubasabilagha nti Luhanga abongele magheji na kwetegheeleli̱ya kwona kuukala munakundangaane,
50001010	niikuwo mugubhe kumanya eki̱hi̱ki̱ye kukoluwa kandi muli bantu abatali na kabhi, mutali nʼeki bakubasoghosʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱ya haa kilo eki Ki̱li̱si̱to alikuukilamu.
50001011	Ti̱ nkusaba nti muukalaghe nimukola bikoluwa bi̱hi̱ki̱ye ebikwisagha kukwama mu Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to niikuwo bantu bahe Luhanga ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa kandi bamusinde.
50001012	Bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, nkubbala mumanye ngoku kukwatuwa kwanje mu nkomo kwaleki̱ye Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga ghaagbaatikana.
50001013	Nanga ekyalu̱ghi̱yemu ni bu̱li̱ muntu weena hani, otaayemu na baasilikale abali̱ndi̱ye kikaali kumanya ngoku ndi mu nkomo haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to.
50001014	Ti̱ si̱ye kuba ndi mu nkomo kyaleki̱ye bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyatu beekamba kulangilila kighambo kya Mukama bagu̱mi̱ye kandi batoobahi̱ye.
50001015	Majima ghali ngu bantu banji bakutebejaghʼo Ki̱li̱si̱to bali nʼetima kandi na mpaka, bhaatu banji bakughalangililagha na mutima ghusemeeye.
50001016	Aba niibo bakughalangililagha bali na kukunda, kandi bamani̱ye ngoku ndi mu nkomo hani haabwa kulwanilila Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga agha.
50001017	Aba naadu̱bhi̱ye kughamba aba bakulangililagha Ki̱li̱si̱to haabwa bighendeleluwa byabo boonini, etali mu majima, mbabbala bati niikuwo bandeeteleje kweyongela kumbona-boni̱ya ninali hani mu nkomo.
50001018	Bhaatu eki takili na nsonga bbaa! Ekikulu ni ngu mu mulingo ghwona, nankabha abakulangilila haabwa bighendeleluwa byabo boonini, kedha mu majima, boona bakunalangililagha dhee makulu haa Ki̱li̱si̱to. Ti̱ eki niikiyo kikundheedhagha. Ee, nkuukala niinadheedheeu̱we kwonini,
50001019	nanga nimani̱ye nti haabwa kunsabila kwanu kandi haabwa Mwoyo wa Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to, kuukala nankoonela, byona ebyambaayʼo bikundughilamu kundekela.
50001020	Ndindililiiye kwonini kandi ndi na kunihila ngoku ntangukola kintu kyona ekikumpemula. Ti̱ nankabha mba niikaaye kedha nku̱u̱ye, nkuukala bwile bwona ngu̱mi̱ye haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to. Kandi nkuukala niinakola ebikuleka bantu mbamu̱hu̱ti̱ya.
50001021	Kaakuba niikala ndi mwomi̱i̱li̱, ni haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to, ti̱ ninaaku̱u̱ye eki nkyamughaso kusaali̱yo.
50001022	Kaakuba niikala ninali mwomi̱i̱li̱ mu mubili ghuni kikumani̱i̱si̱ya ngu nkweyongela ku̱heeleli̱ya Ki̱li̱si̱to. Bhaatu kyaku̱tu̱wamu, tankimani̱ye bbaa!
50001023	Kyaku̱tu̱wamu ki̱ndemi̱ye, mbbali̱ye kughenda kuba na Ki̱li̱si̱to, kandi eki niikiyo mboone kisaai̱ye kwonini,
50001024	bhaatu haabwanu nkilungi niikale ninali mwomi̱i̱li̱.
50001025	Nki̱gu̱mi̱i̱ye kwonini kandi nimani̱ye ngoku nkuukala ninali mwomi̱i̱li̱. Nkweyongela kuukala naanu enu̱we boona niikuwo mweyongele kukula kandi mudheedhuwe haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kwanu.
50001026	Ti̱ si̱ye haabwa kutodha kuukala naanu. Ndeke kudheedhuwa kwanu haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu kweyongele kukana haabwa eki ankoleeye.
50001027	Ti̱ nankabha kintu kyona kimbʼo hani, enu̱we mwetwalikani̱ye mu mulingo oghu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Ki̱li̱si̱to ghaghi̱li̱ye ghati mubhonganuuwe kutwalikani̱yamu. Niikuwo, nankabha niisa kubalola eghi kedha ni̱i̱ghu̱wa makulu ghaanu kwonkaha ntaliyeyo, nimanye ngoku munagu̱mi̱ye na mutima ghumui kandi mukwete kutalibana hamui niikuwo bantu banji bagubhe ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga.
50001028	Kandi mutoobahi̱ye mu mulingo ghwona abakuhakani̱yagha enu̱we eghi, nanga aka nkaakulolelʼo akooleki̱ye ebo ngoku balihwelekeelela, bhaatu ngoku enu̱we Luhanga alibakoonela abajune.
50001029	Nanga haabwa Ki̱li̱si̱to, tamwaheebeeu̱we mu̱gi̱sa ghwa ku̱mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja ghwonkaha, bhaatu mukaheebuwa dhee na ghwa kubona-bona haabuwe,
50001030	ngoku mukwete kubona-bona bijibu ngʼebi mwaboone bimbaayʼo, kandi ebi mu̱u̱ghu̱u̱ye binandiyo.
50002001	Kwelungani̱ya kwanu na Ki̱li̱si̱to kukubagu̱mi̱yagha, kubakunda kuwe kubahu̱u̱mu̱li̱ya, Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye oghu abalimu aleka muukala mu bumui, Ki̱li̱si̱to abatwalikangani̱ya kusemeeye, abaghilila kisa.
50002002	Naanu mutʼo ku̱lu̱ na nkokolo kuba na mutima ghumui, kukundangana, kuba mu bumui, kandi kuba na kighendeleluwa kimui, niikuwo ndheedhuwe kwonini.
50002003	Muntu ateebbalilagha ebi̱mu̱dheedhi̱ye enkaha kedha kwepanka, bhaatu mu kwebundaali̱ya, bu̱li̱ muntu eeli̱li̱kanʼo muunakiye kusaali̱ya eye eenini.
50002004	Bu̱li̱ omui mu enu̱we taabhonganuuwe kubbala ebi̱mu̱dheedhi̱ye enkaha, bhaatu dhee ebi̱dheedhi̱ye baanakiye.
50002005	Byeli̱li̱kano byanu bibe ngʼebi Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu aabaagha nabiyo.
50002006	Nankabha eye naabaagha kwonini ngoku Luhanga ali, kuba kuwe ngoku Luhanga ali, taaki̱li̱ye munu kukufuwʼo.
50002007	Bhaatu akakyelekeesi̱ya, aabyaluwa nga bantu kandi aaba mu̱heeleli̱ya.
50002008	Ti̱ amali̱ye kuba ngoku bantu baa bu̱li̱ kilo bakubaagha, eebundaali̱ya, kandi aadhootela Luhanga ku̱hi̱ki̱ya nankabha ku̱kwi̱la haa musalaba!
50002009	Nahabweki eki kyaleka Luhanga aamu̱hu̱ti̱li̱ya kimui, aamuha ki̱i̱kalo kikulu mu eghulu, kandi aamuluka li̱i̱na elisaai̱ye mali̱i̱na ghoona.
50002010	Ti̱ boona abali mu eghulu, munsi na eku̱li̱mu̱ mbaaghu̱u̱ye li̱i̱na lya Yesu eli, boona bamu̱teeleli̱ye malu̱.
50002011	Kandi bu̱li̱ muntu aatule na kanu̱wa ke ngoku Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to aaniiye Mukama, niikuwo kileeteleje bantu kuha Luhanga Ese wee ki̱ti̱i̱ni̱sa.
50002012	Nahabweki, enu̱we baabhootu̱ syanje aba nku̱ndi̱ye, ninali naanu eghi naabaghambilagha bya kukola mu̱nji̱ghu̱wa. Ti̱ nankabha endindi ntali naanu, mubhonganuuwe ku̱u̱ghu̱wa ebi nkubaghambila kukola. Mwekambe kukola ebikwoleka ngoku Luhanga aabaju̱ni̱ye mwobahi̱ye kandi nimutukumila.
50002013	Nanga Luhanga niiye akubakolelaghamu, kukola ebi akubbala kandi kukola kighendeleluwa kiye kisemeeye ngoku kili.
50002014	Mukolaghe bu̱li̱ kintu kyona mutaakutongana kedha kuhakangana,
50002015	niikuwo mutabʼo kabhi kedha kaakubasoghosʼo. Mube baana baa Luhanga abatali na musango, mu mujo ghuni ghwa bantu abahabi̱ye kandi abakukolagha ebitahi̱ki̱ye. Enu̱we haabwa kukola bisemeeye muli nga nsooli̱ya sikwaka mu mweli̱ma mu mwanya.
50002016	Mwekambe kulangilila bantu Makulu Ghasemeeye ghaa Luhanga kubaghambila ngoku bangutunga bwomi̱i̱li̱ butahuwʼo. Eki kilileka nanje niise neesi̱i̱me haa kilo Ki̱li̱si̱to aliisilamu nti, mulimo naakoli̱ye kubalangilila Makulu Ghasemeeye taghwakwi̱li̱i̱ye busa.
50002017	Saghama yanje nankabha eba eli ya kuseesuwa haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja kandi bu̱heeleli̱ya bwanu, ngoku hambele baaseesangagha kyakunuwa haai na kihonguwa Luhanga ku̱ki̱si̱i̱ma, nku̱u̱ghu̱wa nsemeleeuwe kandi ndheedheeu̱we ngoku naanu mu̱dheedheeu̱we.
50002018	Nahabweki naanu dhee mubhonganuuwe kusemeeleluwa kandi kudheedhuwa hamui nanje.
50002019	Mukama Yesu naasi̱i̱mi̱ye, nkunihila kutuma eghi bwangu Ti̱mi̱seewa, niikuwo nanje dhee ndheedhuwe ku̱u̱ghu̱wa makulu aghabakwetʼo eghi.
50002020	Tandi nʼonji oghu ali nga Ti̱mi̱seewa oghu, oghu naye akwehi̱ghu̱wagha afu̱u̱yʼo munu ebikwetʼo bwomi̱i̱li̱ bwanu.
50002021	Nanga banji boona bu̱li̱ muntu akubbalagha ebi̱mu̱dheedhi̱ye byonkaha, bitali ebi Yesu Ki̱li̱si̱to abbali̱ye.
50002022	Bhaatu enu̱we mumani̱ye ngoku Ti̱mi̱seewa eeyoleki̱ye ngoku ali mwesighibuwa kwonini, nanga aakoli̱ye nanje mulimo ghwa kulangilila Makulu Ghasemeeye, ngoku mwana akukolagha na ese wee kwonini.
50002023	Nahabweki nkaakumala kumanya ebikumbʼo mu nkomo eni, nkunihila kumutuma ewaanu eghi bwangu.
50002024	Kandi neesi̱ghi̱ye kwonini Mukama nti, aku̱mpi̱ki̱li̱ja nanje neenini niise ewaanu eghi bwangu.
50002025	Bhaatu neeli̱li̱kaane nti kikwetaaghisibuwa kutuma eghi dhee mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja muunakyatu Epafu̱lodi̱to. Eye ni mu̱koli̱ muunakyanje kandi muusilikale muunakyanu wa Yesu, oghu ni mukwenda waanu ku̱lu̱gha eghi, niikuwo aase ankoonele mu ebi nkwetaaghisibuwa.
50002026	Niibuwo eekumbula kwisa eghi kubalola kandi atuntuuye nanga mukaaghu̱wa ngoku aabaagha alwaye.
50002027	Majima kuwo akaba alwaye kwonini, kandi akakila aku̱wa. Bhaatu Luhanga aamughilila kisa, ti̱ taaniiye aakighiliiye enkaha bhaatu nanje dhee, kunjuna kutuntula kuhingulaane.
50002028	Nahabweki nkubbala kwonini kumutuma eghi, niikuwo nimwatodhi̱ye kumubonʼo mudheedhuwe kandi nanje ni̱i̱ghu̱we mutima ghumpuumulikaane munda.
50002029	Mumwebali̱ye nga mu̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja wa Mukama waatu kandi mu̱dheedheeu̱we kwonini, kandi mu̱mu̱hu̱ti̱ye nga bahi̱ki̱li̱ja banji abali ngaye,
50002030	nanga akakila aku̱wa haabwa mulimo ghwa Ki̱li̱si̱to, aahaayo bwomi̱i̱li̱ buwe kukola eki mutaagu̱bhi̱ye kunkolela haabwa kutaba hani hambali ndi.
50003001	Nahabweki, bahi̱ki̱li̱ja baanakyanje, mudheedhuwe haabwa kulungana na Mukama Yesu. Ti̱ si̱ye tankuluwa kutodha kubahandiikila haa bikwetʼo ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja nanga bikubaghasila.
50003002	Mwelinde bantu abali nga mbuwa mbhi aba, abakuukalagha mbakola bikoluwa bi̱bhi̱i̱hi̱ye kandi abakughilagha bati bahi̱ki̱li̱ja babhonganuuwe babasale.
50003003	Etu̱we bahi̱ki̱li̱ja ni̱i̱tu̱we abasalu̱u̱we kwonini, aba Mwoyo Ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye akulekagha tulami̱ya Luhanga kandi tu̱hu̱ti̱ya Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu. Tatukwesighagha ebi twangukola kutujuna.
50003004	Nanga nguli haabaaghʼo oghu akunihila ati akugubha kwejuna, ni̱i̱si̱ye nangubaaye wʼoku̱du̱bha. Ti̱ nguli haabaaghʼo muntu onji weena oghu akweli̱li̱kana ati ebi akukola byangumujuna, ni̱i̱si̱ye nangubaaye nsaai̱ye boona.
50003005	Nkabyaluwa ndi Munai̱saaleeli̱ wʼomu ntu̱la ya Bbenjami̱i̱ni̱, bansala haa kilo kya munaanaa, ndi Muhebbulaayo kwonini, haa kikwetʼo bilaghilo bya Ki̱yu̱daaya, neekambagha kubikwata kwonini nanga nkaba ndi Mufali̱saayo.
50003006	Noolekagha kwekamba kwanje kwonini haa kubona-boni̱ya abaahi̱ki̱li̱jagha Yesu, ti̱ haa kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye kusighikila haa bilaghilo bya Ki̱yu̱daaya neekamba kutasobi̱yʼo na kimui.
50003007	Ebi naadu̱bhagha kwesigha, endindi haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to tabikyali na mughaso ewanje bbaa.
50003008	Majima, byona nkubibonagha bitali na mughaso obu nkubilengeesani̱yagha na bukulu bwamaani̱ bwa kumanya Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu Mukama wanje. Nkaleka kwesigha kintu kinji kyona kunjuna, kandi naabighilamu ebitali na mughaso niikuwo niikale ninahi̱ki̱li̱i̱je kwonini Ki̱li̱si̱to.
50003009	Ti̱ mbe kwonini mu bumui naye, etali kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye haabwanje neenini kusighikila haa kukwata bilaghilo, bhaatu okukuleetuwagha haabwa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja Ki̱li̱si̱to. Luhanga kubala muntu kuba ahi̱ki̱li̱i̱ye, kusighikiiye haa ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja.
50003010	Eki nkubbala, nkumanya kwonini Ki̱li̱si̱to, kumanya maani̱ aghamu̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ye mu baku̱u̱ye, kubona-bona ngoku naye aaboona-boone kandi kwesusaani̱ya naye mu ku̱ku̱wa kuwe,
50003011	niikuwo nanje dhee mbe na kunihila ngoku ndiisa ku̱hu̱mbu̱u̱ka mu baku̱u̱ye.
50003012	Tankwete kughila nti ebi naamali̱ye kubitunga kedha nti naabaaye muntu oghu atali na kabhi koona, bhaatu nkwekambagha ku̱u̱su̱li̱i̱si̱ya kighendeleluwa kya Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu kya kunfoolamu muntu wee.
50003013	Baana baamaaha, si̱ye neenini tankeeboone nti naamali̱ye ku̱hi̱ka haa kighendeleluwa eki. Bhaatu kintu kimui eki nkwete kukola, ni kuubululuwa ebyasaaye kandi kwekamba kutunga ebili mu maaso.
50003014	Nkwekambagha nga mu̱li̱gi̱ti̱, ku̱hi̱ka haa kumaliilila, niikuwo ntunge kisembo eki Luhanga akwete kumbilikiilila kutunga mu eghulu mu Ki̱li̱si̱to Yesu.
50003015	Etu̱we boona abaku̱li̱ye mu ku̱hi̱ki̱li̱ja niikuwo bintu ebi tubhonganuuwe ku̱byeli̱li̱kanʼo tutiyo. Ti̱ naanabaayʼo muntu weena oghu aku̱byeli̱li̱kanʼo mu mulingo ghwa mbaghani̱ja, Luhanga akuleka mubikenge kusemeeye.
